data_cleaned: Islamic character education for early childhood based on nature in kindergarten This study aims to describe Islamic character education for early childhood in accordance with the nature of development, the concept of evaluating obstacles and challenges in implementing data collection activities through observation, interviews and documentation, then analyzed by reducing, displaying and verifying, holistic education based on Islamic character is implicitly applied in kindergarten with the concept of learning centers and thematic centers available, namely worship, natural materials, design, creation, role play and preparation, the characters built are faith and piety, caring and empathy, intelligent, patient, creative, brave, obedient and disciplined, then routine evaluations are carried out based on the development of basic competencies and targets for character development as a whole based on the nature of children who are naturally unique and different, the obstacles experienced by schools are the lack of cooperation between parents in synergizing habits at home with the development of Islamic character according to the nature of early childhood, educating becomes easy because Allah has given stages of development, independent learning and independent play according to interests and characteristics become a fun experience

desc: Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini penting untuk diolah dalam tehnik, tahap dan langkah serta strategi manajemen pembelajaran. Adapun tujuan penelitian ini adalah: untuk mendapatkan Model Manajemen Tehnik Pembelajaran Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini Dikawasan Pesisir Laut Tomilito Kabupaten Gorontalo Utara. Metode Penelitian ini menggunakan jenis penelitian fenomena masyarakat dengan pendekatan deskriptif kualitatif. Adapun tehnik pengumpulan data: observasi, wawancara dan angket, dengan tehnik analisis pengolahan data; pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data dan penarikan kesimpulan dan verifikasi. Hasil penelitian ini mendapatkan model pembelajaran interaktif dan sistem pembelajaran kooperatif, dengan indikator Manajemen Tehnik Pembelajaran Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini di Kawasan Pesisir pantai adalah: 1) Perencanaan pembelajaran yang berpusat pada anak dikawasan pesisir. 2) Mengorganisir pembelajaran yang aktif dikawasan pesisir. 3) Menggerakkan pendidikan anak usia dini, melalui pengalaman langsung dengan objek dikawasan pesisir 4) mengawasi pembelajaran PAUD mempertimbangkan keseluruhan aspek pengembangan, bermakna, manarik, dan fungsional dikawasan pesisir.
title: Manajemen Tehnik Pembelajaran Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini di Kawasan Pesisir Laut Kabupaten Gorontalo Utara
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood education learning technique management in the coastal area of ​​North Gorontalo Regency Early childhood education is important to be processed in the stage and step techniques and learning management strategies. The purpose of this study is to obtain a model of early childhood education learning technique management in the coastal area of ​​Tomilito, North Gorontalo Regency. This research method uses a type of community phenomenon research with a qualitative descriptive approach. The data collection technique is observation, interviews and questionnaires with data processing analysis techniques, data collection, data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions and verification. The results of this study obtained an interactive learning model and cooperative learning system with indicators of early childhood education learning technique management in the coastal area are child-centered learning planning in the coastal area, organizing active learning in the coastal area, moving early childhood education through direct experience with objects in the coastal area, supervising early childhood learning, considering all aspects of meaningful, interesting and functional development in the coastal area.

desc: Multimedia pembelajaran interaktif adalah solusi yang tepat dan cocok diterapkan oleh guru dalam melaksanakan pembelajaran didalam kelas dalam super smart era. Kemudahan lain yang dirasakan guru guru dapat mempersiapkan materi untuk pembelajaran didalam kelas tanpa terbatas oleh ruang dan waktu. Peneliti menemukan masalah di lapangan dan menemukan bahwa penerapan multimedia pembelajaran interaktif pada pendidikan anak usia dini masih belum optimal. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk memberikan alternatif multimedia pembelajaran interaktif bagi guru PAUD yaitu melalui website Educastudio. Peneitian ini dilaksanakan dengan menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif dengan metode survei. Partisipan yang terlibat sebanyak 30 orang guru. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa 70% guru setuju bahwa website Educa Studio sesuai untuk dimanfaatkan sebagai multimedia pembelajaran interaktif bagi anak usia dini karena menyediakan berbagai video, permainan, lagu, cerita maupun lembar kerja bagi anak usia dini sehingga memudahkan guru dalam melaksanakan pembelajaran dikelas dan membuat peserta didik menjadi semangat dan antusias mengikuti kegiatan pembelajaran dikelas.
title: Pemanfaatan Multimedia Pembelajaran Interaktif berbasis Website Bagi Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Utilization of interactive learning multimedia based on website for early childhood education teachers Interactive learning multimedia is the right solution and is suitable to be applied by teachers in implementing classroom learning in the super smart era. Another convenience felt by teachers is that teachers can prepare materials for classroom learning without being limited by space and time. Researchers found problems in the field and found that the application of interactive learning multimedia in early childhood education is still not optimal. The purpose of this study is to provide an alternative interactive learning multimedia for early childhood education teachers, namely through the educastudio website. This study was conducted using a quantitative approach with a survey method. The participants involved were as many as teachers. The results of the study showed that teachers agreed that the educa studio website was suitable for use as interactive learning multimedia for early childhood because it provides various video games, songs, stories and worksheets for early childhood, making it easier for teachers to carry out learning in class and make students excited and enthusiastic about participating in learning activities in class.

desc: Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk  menganalisis  dan memaparkan bagaimana strategi  komunikasi  antara  dosen dengan  mahasiswa  dalam   mengatasi hambatan mengikuti perkuliahan online. Peneliti menerapkan pendekatan  kualitatif  dengan  metode  studi  kasus,  penelitian ini  melibatkan  satu  orang   dosen  pengampu  dan  mahasiswanya yang berjumlah 30 anak dari UIN Syarif Kasim Riau, Jurusan PIAUD, mata kuliah Asesmen Pembelajaran RA. Hasil dari penelitian menunjukkan selama proses pembelajaran online, mahasiswa mendapat kesulitan untuk mengerti dari materi yang dijelaskan oleh  dosen, dan komunikasi yang baik menjadi kunci utamanya, dosen dan mahasiwa yang mempunyai jalinan komunikasi yang baik yaitu dengan menggunakan strategi kolaborasi antara dosen dan mahasiswa sehingga akan menghasilkan proses penyampaian pengetahuan secara online menjadi maksimal. Dalam hal ini didukung dengan dosen yang secara optimal menciptakan proses pembelajaran yang aktif, inovatif dan variatif, serta dosen memposisikan diri sebagai motivator dan inisiator agar mahasiswa semakin semangat dalam mengikuti pembelajaran online
title: Peningkatan Kualitas Pembelajaran Online melalui Strategi Komunikasi Efektif Selama Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving the quality of online learning through effective communication strategies during the covid pandemic this study was conducted to analyze and explain how communication strategies between lecturers and students in overcoming obstacles to participating in online lectures the researcher applied a qualitative approach with a case study method this study involved one lecturer and his students who were children of uin syarif kasim riau majoring in piaud learning assessment course ra the results of the study showed that during the online learning process students had difficulty understanding the material explained by the lecturer and good communication was the main key for lecturers and students who had good communication relationships, namely by using a collaboration strategy between lecturers and students so that the process of delivering knowledge online would be maximized in this case supported by lecturers who optimally created an active, innovative and varied learning process and lecturers positioned themselves as motivators and initiators so that students were more enthusiastic in participating in online learning

desc: Di era perkembangan saat ini, kesejahteraan dan kejayaan masyarakat dan bangsa bergantung pada masukan kreatif berupa ide-ide baru, penemuan baru, dan teknologi baru. Urgensi dari kemampuan kreatif tidak bisa dihindari di tengah persaingan global yang semakin ketat. Artikel ini bertujuan untuk menggambarkan pengembangan kreativitas anak menggunakan bahan alam. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah kajian pustaka. Data yang diperoleh dianalisis dengan pendekatan tematik. Analisis data menunjukkan bahwa ada ada empat tema yakni bahan alam yang mendukung kreativitas, kegiatan yang mendukung penggunaan bahan alam, peran guru, dan kelemahan penggunaan bahan alam. Implikasi dari hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan bagi guru prasekolah untuk memperbaiki kualitas proses pembelajaran sehingga dapat memunculkan proses berpikir kreatif pada anak menggunakan bahan yang mudah diperoleh.
title: Pengembangan Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini Menggunakan Media Berbasis Alam
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of early childhood creativity using nature-based media in the current era of development, the welfare and glory of society and the nation depend on creative input in the form of new ideas, new discoveries and new technologies, the urgency of creative abilities cannot be avoided amidst increasingly tight global competition, this article aims to describe the development of children's creativity using natural materials, the research method used is a literature review, the data obtained is analyzed using a thematic approach, data analysis shows that there are four themes, namely natural materials that support creativity, activities that support the use of natural materials, the role of teachers and the weaknesses of using natural materials, the implications of the results of this study can be used for preschool teachers to improve the quality of the learning process so that it can bring up creative thinking processes in children using materials that are easily obtained

desc: Artikel ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui apakah pembelajaran daring berdampak pada perilaku sosial emosional anak. Pada saat ini dikejutkan oleh virus covid 19 yang mengharuskan anak-anak untuk melakukan pembelajaran daring, hal ini yang dapat berdampak pada sosial emosional anak. Tujuan peneliti untuk mengetahui dampak pembelajaran daring terhadap perilaku sosial emosional anak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah studi kasus melalui wawancara dengan analisis tematik pada 10 ibu yang memiliki anak bersekolah TK di kabupaten Ngawi. Para ibu diberikan pertanyaan melalui wawancara terkait dampak perilaku sosial emosiaonal anak selama pembelajaran daring. Hasil analisis menunjukan bahwa secara umum perilaku sosial emosiaonal anak selama pembelajaran daring adalah anak kurang bersikap kooperatif karena anak jarang bermain bersama, kurangnya sikap toleransi kurangnya bersosialisasi dengan teman terbatasi adanya belajar dirumah, emosi anak yang terkadang merasa bosan dan sedih, anak merasa rindu teman dan guru serta anak juga tercatat mengalami kekerasan verbal karena proses belajar yang lazim.
title: Dampak Pembelajaran Daring terhadap Perilaku Sosial Emosional Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The impact of online learning on children's social emotional behavior This article aims to determine whether online learning has an impact on children's social emotional behavior at this time shocked by the Covid virus which requires children to do online learning, this can have an impact on children's social emotional The purpose of the researcher to determine the impact of online learning on children's social emotional behavior The method used in this study is a case study through interviews with thematic analysis of mothers who have children attending kindergarten in Ngawi Regency The mothers were given questions through interviews related to the impact of children's social emotional behavior during online learning The results of the analysis show that in general children's social emotional behavior during online learning is that children are less cooperative because children rarely play together Lack of tolerance Lack of socializing with friends Limited by studying at home Children's emotions sometimes feel bored and sad Children miss friends and teachers And children are also recorded as experiencing verbal violence because of the usual learning process

desc: Kurikulum merdeka dirancang agar siswa mempunyai potensi kemandirian yang berdasarkan penguatan karakter Pancasila. Proses aplikasi kurikulum masih mempunyai kendala. Pembelajaran kurikulum merdeka sebaiknya dijalankan dengan manajemen  berbasis sekolah. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui aspek saja yang perlu ditingkatkan pada pelaksanaan kurikulum merdeka di Taman Kanak kanak di kecamatan Cilengsi Bogor dan untuk mengetahui kendala yang ditemui dalam pelaksanaan kurikulum merdeka pada TK di kota Bogor. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah metode kualitatif. Responden, terdiri dari guru, kepala sekolah dan orang tua siswa. Penelitian dilakukan pada  sekolah taman kanak-kanak di kota Bogor Jawa Barat. Hasil penelitian adalah, aspek manajemen dan pengelolaan pendidikaan berdasarkan kurikulum Merdeka merupakan aspek yang paling penting dikelola, disamping aspek-aspek lain. Kendala utama dalam pelaksanaan kurikulum merdeka adalah guru memerlukan pemahaman yang utuh tentang kurikulum, dan perlu persiapan sarana dan prasarana yang lebih lengkap. Pemerintah perlu mengevaluasi sejauh mana keberhasilan kurikulum tersebut.
title: Problematika Manajemen Kurikulum Merdeka pada Siswa Taman Kanak-Kanak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: problems of independent curriculum management for kindergarten students independent curriculum is designed so that students have the potential for independence based on strengthening the character of Pancasila the curriculum application process still has obstacles independent curriculum learning should be carried out with school-based management the purpose of this study is to find out which aspects need to be improved in the implementation of the independent curriculum in kindergartens in Cilengsi District, Bogor and to find out the obstacles encountered in the implementation of the independent curriculum in kindergartens in Bogor City the research method used is a qualitative method respondents consisted of teachers, principals and parents of students the research was conducted at kindergartens in Bogor City, West Java the results of the study are the aspects of management and administration of education based on the independent curriculum are the most important aspects to manage in addition to other aspects the main obstacle in implementing the independent curriculum is that teachers need a complete understanding of the curriculum and need to prepare more complete facilities and infrastructure the government needs to evaluate the extent to which the curriculum is successful

desc: Children aged 5-6 years have four types of tasks in counting ability, which are to distinguish between bigger and smaller, calculations, number identification, and simple arithmetic. This study involved 22 children aged 5-6 years in Kindergarten, Sleman, Special District, Yogyakarta. This study used the quasy experiment method by using the experimental class and control class by giving different treatments. Children who participated in using interactive learning media by using a computer called Kebun Buah media and tested whether they can count various kinds of fruit. The results of research showed that Kebun Buah media affected counting ability on children aged 5-6 years, the results of post-test counting ability of children in the experimental class using Kebun Buah media increased  to 88 in average while in the control class using a number card media obtained an average 78.9. This study was conducted by utilizing technology that can increase the implications of education in learning and improving counting ability of early childhood in the use of technological means in the classroom.
title: Kebun Buah Learning Media for Early Childhood Counting Ability
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Kebun Buah learning media for early childhood counting ability children aged years have four types of tasks in counting ability which are to distinguish between bigger and smaller calculations number identification and simple arithmetic this study involved children aged years in kindergarten sleman special district yogyakarta this study used the quasy experiment method by using the experimental class and control class by giving different treatments children who participated in using interactive learning media by using a computer called Kebun Buah Media and tested whether they could count various kinds of fruit The results of research showed that Kebun Buah Media affected counting ability on children aged years the results of posttest counting ability of children in the experimental class using orchard media increased to in average while in the control class using a number card media obtained an average this study was conducted by using technology that can increase the implications of education in learning and improving counting abilities of early childhood in the use of technological means in the classroom

desc: The purpose of this research was to determine how the covid-19 epidemic affected early childhood cognitive development. Principals, instructors, parents, and students served as informants in this study. The data collection techniques used in this study were inquiry in interview which were carried out to find out several things related to the impact of Covid-19 on students' cognitive development. The descriptive qualitative method was employed to analyze the data. The findings revealed that the cognitive development students during online learning during the Covid-19 pandemic, fell into the capable and quite capable categories in terms of problem-solving skills, logical thinking skills, and symbolic thinking skills. students' cognitive development is achieved because teachers make every effort to give learning materials or tasks that encourage students' cognitive development. The presence of certain parents who are less supportive or do not participate in the online learning system has another impact on children's cognitive development. Students do not do the assignments given by the teacher because there is no guidance due to busy parents so that there are differences in cognitive development between one student and another
title: Impact of Learning From Home: Cognitive Development of Early Childhood Education Student in Pandemic Covid – 19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: impact of learning from home cognitive development of early childhood education students in pandemic covid the purpose of this research was to determine how the covid epidemic affected early childhood cognitive development principals instructors parents and students served as informants in this study the data collection techniques used in this study was inquiry in interview which were carried out to find out several things related to the impact of covid on students cognitive development the descriptive qualitative method was employed to analyze the data students the findings revealed that the cognitive development during online learning during the covid pandemic fell into the capable and quite capable categories in terms of problem solving skills logical thinking skills and symbolic thinking skills students cognitive development is achieved because teachers make every effort to provide learning materials or tasks that encourage students cognitive development the presence of certain parents who are less supportive or do not participate in the online learning system has another impact on childrens cognitive development students do not do the assignments given by the teacher because there is no guidance due to busy parents so that there are differences in cognitive development between one student and another

desc: Teachers as learning movers are often still having difficulties and are less successful in attracting students' attention to learning and freezing students' roles and social development. Some of the factors that cause the failure of students' social development include the lack of innovation and teacher competency in each lesson. This study aims to determine the form of activities that are applied by the teacher in the rotating roles method to develop students' social competence. This study uses a qualitative approach to the type of case study. This research is located in RA. Misbahul Islam Sogaan Pakuniran. Collecting data in this study used interview techniques with school principals, homeroom teachers for grades A and B, observation, and documentation. The data analysis used is data reduction, data presentation and conclusion. The results of the study mentioned RA. Misbahul Islam Sogaan Pakuniran in applying the rotating roles method was able to develop the social skills of his students effectively, such as being empathetic, sympathetic, happy, independent, cooperative, and easy to socialize with his friends. The rotating roles learning method is modified into 3 stages in practice, consisting of forming student learning formations as the opening stage, demonstrating the student's role as the core stage, and reflecting on the student's role.
title: The Rotating Roles Method as a Determinant of the Social Development of Early Age Students
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the rotating roles method as a determinant of the social development of early age students teachers as learning movers are often still having difficulties and are less successful in attracting students attention to learning and freezing students roles and social development some of the factors that cause the failure of students social development includes the lack of innovation and teacher competency in each lesson this study aims to determine the form of activities that are applied by the teacher in the rotating role method to develop students social competence this study uses a qualitative approach to the type of case study this research is located in ra misbahul islam Sogaan Pakuniran collecting data in this study used interview techniques with school principals homeroom teachers for grades A and B Observation and documentation the data analysis used is data reduction data presentation and conclusion the results of the study mentioned Ra Misbahul Islam Sogaan Pakuniran in applying for the rotating roles The method was able to develop the social skills of his students effectively such as being empathetic sympathetic happy independent cooperative and easy to socialize with his friends the rotating roles learning method was modified into stages in practice consisting of forming student learning formations as the opening stage demonstrating the students role as the core stage and reflecting on the students role

desc: Keluarga Sejahtera terbagi atas keluarga pra sejahtera, keluarga sejahtera 1, keluarga sejahtera 2, keluarga sejahtera 3, dan keluarga sejahtera 3 plus. Keluarga yang bisa mencukupi kebutuhan dasar, tapi belum bisa mencukupi kebutuhan sosial psikologisnya disebut keluarga sejahtera 1. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui terdapat tidaknya pengaruh lingkungan Keluarga Sejahtera 1 (KS-1) terhadap pemenuhan hak bermain dan hak rekreasi di Kecamatan Dukuhseti, serta untuk mengetahui faktor pendukung dan penghambat pemenuhan hak bermain dan hak rekreasi di Kecamatan Dukuhseti. Menggunakan metode penelitian kuantitatif analisis regresi linier sederhana dengan melakukan dua kali pengujian terhadap variabel bebas. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat pengaruh lingkungan KS-1 terhadap pemenuhan hak bermain dan hak rekreasi pada anak. Adapun faktor penghambat lingkungan KS-I terhadap pemenuhan hak bermain dan hak rekreasi meliputi: cara orang tua mendidik, kondisi ekonomi orang tua, dan latar belakang kebudayaan. Sedangkan faktor pendukung meliputi: interaksi antar anggota keluarga, suasana rumah, dan perhatian orang tua.
title: Pengaruh Lingkungan Keluarga Terhadap Pemenuhan Hak Bermain dan Hak Rekreasi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the family environment on the fulfillment of the right to play and the right to recreation. Prosperous families are divided into pre-prosperous families, prosperous families, prosperous families, prosperous families and prosperous families plus families that can meet basic needs but have not been able to meet their social psychological needs are called prosperous families. This study aims to determine whether or not there is an influence of the prosperous family environment on the fulfillment of the right to play and the right to recreation in Dukuhseti sub-district and to determine the supporting and inhibiting factors for the fulfillment of the right to play and the right to recreation in Dukuhseti sub-district using a quantitative research method of simple linear regression analysis by conducting two tests on the independent variables. The results of the study indicate that there is an influence of the family environment on the fulfillment of the right to play and the right to recreation in children. The inhibiting factors of the family environment on the fulfillment of the right to play and the right to recreation include the way parents educate, the economic conditions of parents and cultural background, while the supporting factors include interactions between family members, the atmosphere of the house and parental attention.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menggambarkan implementasi program PAUD Holistik Integratif di TK Bakti Baitussalam dengan pedoman Peraturan Presiden No. 60 Tahun 2013. Model evaluasi yang digunakan yaitu IPP (Input, process, product) dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Narasumber yaitu guru, kepala sekolah, serta orang tua siswa. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui wawancara, observasi, dan studi dokumen. Teknik analisis data menggunakan Miles dan Hubberman yaitu kondensasi dan penyajian data, serta penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menggambarkan implementasi program PAUD Holistik Integratif di TK Bakti Baitussalam ditinjau dari aspek evaluasi input mengacu pada Standar Operasional Prosedur (SOP), yaitu terdapat layanan pendidikan, perlindungan, pengasuhan, kesejahteraan, kesehatan, dan gizi, aspek evaluasi proses sudah terintegrasi dan bekerja sama dengan Dinas Pendidikan, Puskesmas, Kepolisian, dan orang tua dan Aspek produk yaitu layanan kesehatan gizi, pendidikan, moral, emosional dan pengasuhan sudah berjalan dengan baik. Tingkat keberhasilan program yang tinggi sehingga sekolah dapat meningkatkan kualitas penyelenggaraan program.
title: Evaluasi Implementasi Program PAUD Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Evaluation of the implementation of the holistic integrative early childhood education program This study aims to describe the implementation of the holistic integrative early childhood education program in TK Bakti Baitussalam with the guidelines of presidential regulation no. year The evaluation model used is IPP input process product with a qualitative approach, namely the source teacher, the principal and parents of students, data collection techniques through interviews, observation and document studies, data analysis techniques using Miles and Hubberman, namely condensation and presentation of data and drawing conclusions, the results of the study describe the implementation of the holistic integrative early childhood education program in TK Bakti Baitussalam, reviewed from the input evaluation aspect referring to the standard operating procedure SOP, namely there are education services, protection, care, welfare, health and nutrition, the process evaluation aspect has been integrated and in collaboration with the education office, health center, police and parents and the product aspect, namely health services, nutrition, education, morals, emotions and care, has been running well, the program's success rate is high so that schools can improve the quality of program implementation

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi pentingnya pembelajaran anak tentang nilai keislaman yang dimuat dalam pembelajaran BCCT (Beyond centers and circle Time). Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui koneksitas pembelajaran BCCT dengan nilai keislaman dalam mengembangkan kecerdasan verbal lingusitik. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif deskritif. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan teknik observasi, wawancara dan studi dokumentasi. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan di TK Tasywiquth Thullab Salafiyah (TBS) Kudus pada kelompok B berjumlah 15 anak. Analisis data dalam penelitian ini dilaksanakan melalui pengumpulan data, reduksi data, display data dan kesimpulan atau verifikasi data. Hasil penelitian ini Integrasi pembelajaran BCCT dengan nilai keislaman dalam mengembangkan kecerdasan verbal linguistic di TK TBS kudus dapat dilihat melalui dua tahap yaitu proses dan pencapaian integrasi pembelajaran, dalam proses pembelajaran kurikulum yang dilaksanakan di TK TBS Kudus yaitu tentang pengembangan pembiasaan, pengembangan kemampuan dasar, muatan lokal (ASWAJA), pengembangan diri, pendidikan karakter, pengenalan lingkungan.
title: Integrasi Pembelajaran BCCT dalam Mengembangkan Kecerdasan Verbal Linguistik dan Nilai-Nilai Keislaman
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: integration of bcct learning in developing verbal linguistic intelligence and Islamic values ​​this study is motivated by the importance of children's learning about Islamic values ​​contained in bcct learning beyond centers and circle time the purpose of this study is to determine the connectivity of bcct learning with Islamic values ​​in developing verbal linguistic intelligence this study uses a qualitative descriptive method data collection techniques with observation techniques interviews and documentation studies this study was conducted at tk tasywiquth thullab salafiyah tbs kudus in group b totaling 100 children data analysis in this study was carried out through data collection data reduction data display and conclusions or verification of data the results of this study the integration of bcct learning with Islamic values ​​in developing verbal linguistic intelligence at tk tbs kudus can be seen through two stages, namely the process and achievement of learning integration in the curriculum learning process implemented at tk tbs kudus, namely about developing habits developing basic abilities local content aswaja self-development character education environmental recognition

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meninjau strategi guru dan keterlibatan orang tua dalam upaya pemahaman konsep sains anak TK Islam Al-Azhar 41 Palembang selama pandemi melalui pembelajaran daring. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode survei dengan jenis pendekatan deskriptif kuantitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui wawancara dengan dua orang guru dan penyebaran angket kepada 31 orang tua. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa strategi guru dalam mempersiapkan pembelajaran sains seperti; mengadakan sosialisasi guru dengan melibatkan orang tua dan melakukan briefing antar sesama guru dengan mempelajari video tutorial sains ternyata dapat menambah rasa percaya diri guru dalam mengajarkan sains serta menjadi lebih kreatif memilih konten sains yang tepat. Disamping itu, ditemukan lebih dari 50% orang tua terlibat dalam pembelajaran sains anak, mulai dari persiapan, proses, dan evaluasi. Kerja sama antara guru dan orang tua dalam pemahaman konsep sains anak mampu membantu anak berpikir lebih kritis, memecahkan masalah, dan mengetahui sebab-akibat dari sesuatu yang diamati di lingkungannya
title: Strategi Guru dan Keterlibatan Orangtua dalam Pemahaman Konsep Sains Anak Selama Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teacher strategies and parental involvement in understanding children's science concepts during covid This study aims to review teacher strategies and parental involvement in efforts to understand children's science concepts at Alazhar Islamic Kindergarten in Palembang during the pandemic through online learning This study uses a survey method with a quantitative descriptive approach, data collection techniques through interviews with two teachers and distributing questionnaires to parents The results of the study indicate that teacher strategies in preparing science learning such as holding teacher socialization by involving parents and conducting briefings between teachers by studying science tutorial videos can increase teacher confidence in teaching science and become more creative in choosing the right science content In addition, it was found that more than parents were involved in children's science learning starting from preparation, process and evaluation, cooperation between teachers and parents in understanding children's science concepts can help children think more critically, solve problems and know the cause and effect of something observed in their environment

desc: Penggunaan media pembelajaran yang belum optimal dan rendahnya kemampuan pendidik dalam membuat media video edukasi mengakibatkan kurangnya stimulasi terhadap perkembangan keterampilan sains anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan membuat video edukasi berbasis model pembelajaran guided inquiry yang layak, praktis dan efektif. Penelitian ini menggunakan riset dan pengembangan dengan pendekatan model ADDIE dengan tahap Analisis, Desain, Development, Implementation, dan Evaluation. Video edukasi merupakan gabungan antara audio dan visual dalam menyampaikan informasi sehingga anak usia dini lebih mudah menangkap informasi karena menggunakan dua indera. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian bahwa pengembangan video edukasi berbasis model pembelajaran guided inquiry untuk keterampilan sains anak dinyatakan sangat valid oleh ahli materi  dan ahli media dengan persentase 89% dan 83%. Hasil praktikalitas pengembangan video edukasi untuk keterampilan sains dinyatakan sangat praktis, dengan hasil rata-rata persentase praktikalitas 91%. Hasil persentase efektivitas anak diperoleh 91% yang dinyatakan sangat efektif. Dapat disimpulkan media video edukasi berbasis model pembelajaran guided inquiry untuk keterampilan sains di Taman Kanak-kanak dinyatakan sangat valid, sangat praktis, dan sangat efektif.
title: Pengembangan Video Edukasi Berbasis Model Pembelajaran Guided Inquiry untuk Keterampilan Sains di TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of educational videos based on guided inquiry learning models for science skills in kindergarten the use of learning media that is not optimal and the low ability of educators in making educational video media results in a lack of stimulation for the development of children's science skills this study aims to create educational videos based on guided inquiry learning models that are feasible, practical and effective this study uses research and development with the addie model approach with the stages of analysis design development implementation and evaluation educational videos are a combination of audio and visuals in conveying information so that early childhood children find it easier to capture information because they use two senses based on the results of the study that the development of educational videos based on guided inquiry learning models for children's science skills was stated to be very valid by material experts and media experts with the percentage and results of the practicality of the development of educational videos for science skills stated to be very practical with the average results of the percentage of practicality of the percentage of effectiveness of children obtained which were stated to be very effective it can be concluded that educational video media based on guided inquiry learning models for science skills in kindergartens is stated to be very valid, very practical and very effective

desc: Mahasiswa harus memiliki kreativitas yang tinggi agar dapat memenuhi kebutuhan dunia kerja. Kenyataannya, kreativitas mahasiswa masih rendah dan belum ada produk berupa modul berbasis riset yang dapat meningkatkan kreativitas mahasiswa. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui bagaimana perancangan modul berbasis riset pada mata kuliah psikologi pendidikan untuk meningkatkan kreativitas mahasiswa IAIN Batusangkar yang memenuhi kriteria valid, praktis dan efektif. Penelitian ini menggunakan jenis penelitian dan pengembangan. Subyek penelitian adalah 30 orang mahasiswa Jurusan PIAUD semester II yang sedang mengambil mata kuliah psikologi pendidikan. Proses pengembangan dilakukan dalam empat tahap, yaitu pendefinisian, perancangan, pengembangan dan diseminasi. Proses validasi dilakukan oleh 2 orang pakar materi psikologi pendidikan anak usia dini dan 1 orang ahli media. Analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah analisis kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa modul psikologi pendidikan berbasis riset telah memenuhi kriteria valid, praktis dan efektif untuk meningkatkan kreativitas kognitif maupun nonkognitif
title: Development of Research-Based Modules in Educational Psychology Lectures to Improve Creativity
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of research-based modules in educational psychology lectures to improve creativity students must have high creativity in order to meet the needs of the world of work in reality student creativity is still low and there is no product in the form of a research-based module that can improve student creativity this study aims to find out how to design a research-based module in educational psychology courses to improve the creativity of IAIN Batusangkar students who meet the criteria for valid, practical and effective this study uses the type of research and development the subjects of the study were students majoring in PIAUD semester II who were taking educational psychology courses the development process was carried out in four stages, namely defining the design, development and dissemination the validation process was carried out by experts in early childhood educational psychology material and media experts the data analysis used in this study was qualitative and quantitative analysis the results of the study showed that the research-based educational psychology module had met the criteria for valid, practical and effective in improving cognitive and non-cognitive creativity

desc: Teacher professionalism plays an essential role in educational institutions. Therefore, appropriate management is needed to realize the teacher's professional performance as expected. This study aims to analyze career management in building the teacher's professional performance in early childhood education institutions. The research method used is a qualitative case study type. Case study qualitative research was chosen to answer and explain the phenomenon of career management that has been carried out by finding more appropriate ways today. Data was obtained using observation, interviews and documentation. Data analysis techniques are data collection, data reduction, data presentation and conclusion. The study results show that there are four points carried out by institutions in building teacher professional performance, including; Internal and external analysis, strengthening work commitment, good competence, and continuous evaluation. Career management is the main ingredient that needs to be developed by educational institutions in fostering a professional attitude towards their performance so that the desired goals can be realized optimally.
title: Career Management in Building Teacher Professional Performance
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: career management in building teacher professional performance teacher professionalism plays an essential role in educational institutions therefore appropriate management is needed to realize the teachers professional performance as expected this study aims to analyze career management in building the teachers professional performance in early childhood educational institutions the research method used is a qualitative case study type case study qualitative research was chosen to answer and explain the phenomenon of career management that has been carried out by finding more appropriate ways today data was obtained using observation interviews and documentation data analysis techniques are data collection data reduction data presentation and conclusion the study results show that there are four points carried out by institutions in building teacher professional performance including internal and external analysis strengthening work commitment good competence and continuous evaluation career management is the main ingredient that needs to be developed by educational institutions in fostering a professional attitude towards their performance so that the desired goals can be realized optimally

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis terkait kemampuan konsep bilangan anak usia 3-4 tahun di Kober Mentari Preschool Kecamatan Sumedang Utara Kabupaten Sumedang Tahun Pelajaran 2019/2020 dengan media Montessori number rods. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah library research adalah serangkaian kegiatan melalui 6 langkah kegiatan yaitu studi literatur, pengumpulan data, konsep yang diteliti, konseptualisasi, Analisa, kesimpulan dan saran. Peneliti menggunakan teknik analisis data kualitatif deskriptif, adapun sumber data dalam penelitian ini merupakan sumber data yang dipakai peneliti seperti jurnal ilmiah nasional, artikel yang berkaitan dengan ebook dan jurnal yang relevan dengan penelitian ini. Hasil dari penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa melalui penggunaan media Montessori number rods dapat meningkatkan kemampuan konsep bilangan anak usia 3-4 tahun, kegiatan pembelajaran mengenai konsep bilangan menjadi mudah dan menyenangkan bagi anak, media pembelajaran yang dapat meningkatkan aspek-aspek perkembangan anak usia dini dan anak tidak merasa sedang belajar namun mereka merasa sedang bermain.
title: Analisis Kemampuan Konsep Bilangan Anak Usia 3-4 Tahun dengan Media Montessori Number Rods
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of children's number concept ability aged years with montessori number rods media this study aims to analyze related to children's number concept ability aged years in kober mentari preschool sumedang utara district sumedang regency academic year with montessori number rods media the research method used is library research is a series of activities through steps of activities namely literature study data collection concepts studied conceptualization analysis conclusions and suggestions researchers use descriptive qualitative data analysis techniques the data sources in this study are data sources used by researchers such as national scientific journals articles related to ebooks and journals that are relevant to this study the results of this study indicate that through the use of montessori number rods media can improve children's number concept ability aged years learning activities regarding the concept of numbers become easy and fun for children learning media that can improve aspects of early childhood development and children do not feel like they are learning but they feel like they are playing

desc: Pemahaman akan tujuan pendidikan merupakan inti dari suksesnya sebuah pendidikan. Seorang pendidik jika melaksanakan proses mengajar dengan hanya sekedar menyampaikan pelajaran tanpa menekankan dan merencanakan tujuan dari pembelajaran tersebut, akan menimbulkan sebuah bahaya yang sangat jelas bagi anak didik, karena pendidikan tanpa tujuan merupakan sebuah proses yang tidak akan mencapai hasil yang maksimal dan hanya berjalan sebagai rutinitas saja. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis hasil penerapan tujuan pendidikan Islam berbasis pendekatan holistik integratif pada anak usia dini dengan melihat berbagai fenomena penurunan kulaitas pendidikan. Penelitian ini menggunakan studi kepustakaan dengan sumber utama buku Ahdaf At-Tarbiyah Al-Islamiyah karya Dr. Majid Irsan Al-Kailaniy dan buku Ushul At-Tarbiyah wa At-Ta’lim yang mencakup tentang konsep pendidikan Islam. Penelitian ini menghasilkan: (1) Pentingnya peran tujuan dalam proses pendidikan (2)Krisis pendidikan zaman sekarang terhadap tujuan pendidikan (3) Definisi “Amal Shaleh”dalam pendidikan Islam (4) Pendidikan akal (At-tarbiyah Al-‘aqliyah) berbasis pendekatan holistik integratif (5) Pendidikan akhlaq (At-tarbiyah Al-khuluqiyah) berbasis pendekatan holistik integratif (6) Pendidikan jasmani (At-tarbiyah Al-jismiyah) berbasis pendekatan holistik integratif
title: Konsep Tujuan Pendidikan Islam pada Anak Usia Dini Berbasis Pendekatan Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the concept of the purpose of Islamic education in early childhood based on an integrative holistic approach understanding of the purpose of education is the core of the success of an education an educator if carrying out the teaching process by simply delivering lessons without emphasizing and planning the purpose of the learning will cause a very clear danger to students because education without a purpose is a process that will not achieve maximum results and only runs as a routine this study aims to analyze the results of the application of the purpose of Islamic education based on an integrative holistic approach in early childhood by looking at various phenomena of declining quality of education this study uses a literature study with the main source of the book ahdaf attarbiyah alislamiyah by dr majid irsan alkailaniy and the book ushul attarbiyah wa attalim which covers the concept of Islamic education this study produces the importance of the role of goals in the educational process the current educational crisis towards the purpose of education definition of good deeds in Islamic education attarbiyah alaqliyah reason education based on an integrative holistic approach moral education attarbiyah alkhuluqiyah based on an integrative holistic approach physical education attarbiyah aljismiyah based on an integrative holistic approach

desc: Akibat pandemi Covid-19 ini, membuat pola belajar mengajar yang jauh berbeda dari sebelum pandemi. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mencari tahu perbedaan penggunaan media lembar kerja dan Loose Part dalam memfasilitasi anak belajar. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah data primer hasil pengamatan pembelajaran media Lembar Kerja dan Loose Part. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah catatan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Data yang terkumpul dianalisis tema-tema yang muncul dari penggunaan masing-masing media. Hasil dari penelitian menunjukkan bahwa penerapan media Loose Part dalam kegiatan pembelajaran efektif dalam mengatasi kejenuhan pada anak usia dini. Kejenuhan pada anak usia dini terutama setelah anak lama tidak belajar di sekolah karena pandemi Covid-19. Dan penerapan antara media Lembar Kerja dan Loose Part menunjukkan perilaku anak yang berbeda. Pada media Lembar Kerja, anak cenderung tidak bersemangat, mengantuk, tidak fokus dan tidak bebas berkreativitas. Sedangkan penggunaan media Loose Part menunjukkan anak tampak antusias, berkonsentrasi, dan bebas berkreativitas
title: Penerapan Media Loose Parts dalam Mengatasi Kejenuhan Anak di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of loose parts media in overcoming children's boredom during the Covid pandemic due to the Covid pandemic, the teaching and learning pattern is very different from before the pandemic. This study aims to find out the differences in the use of worksheets and loose parts in facilitating children's learning. The method used in this study is descriptive qualitative. The data used in this study is primary data from observations of learning using worksheets and loose parts. The data collection technique used is observation notes, interviews and documentation. The collected data is analyzed. The themes that emerge from the use of each media. The results of the study indicate that the application of loose parts media in learning activities is effective in overcoming boredom in early childhood. Boredom in early childhood, especially after children have not studied at school for a long time due to the Covid pandemic and the application of worksheets and loose parts media shows different children's behavior. In worksheets, children tend to be unenthusiastic, sleepy, unfocused and not free to be creative, while the use of loose parts media shows that children appear enthusiastic, concentrate and are free to be creative.

desc: Bermain masak-masakan merupakan aktivitas yang digemari oleh anak-anak ternyata mengandung konsep matematika yaitu bilangan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan bahan ajar materi bilangan menggunakan konteks memasak kue bola ubi yang valid dan praktis. Metode yang digunakan yaitu design research tipe development studies yang terdiri dari  preliminary dan formative evaluation. Subjek penelitian yaitu 6 expert dan 17 siswa di salah satu TK di Kota Palembang. Data penelitian dikumpulkan melalui angket, observasi, dokumentasi, dan walkthrough. Penelitian ini menghasilkan bahan ajar yang valid berdasarkan komentar dan saran dari para ahli serta hasil perhitungan menggunakan indeks Aiken’s V yang terkategori validitas tinggi. Serta terkategori sangat praktis terlihat dari siswa dapat dengan mudah dalam menggunakan instrument yang sudah dikembangkan. Bahan ajar ini diharapkan menjadi pembelajaran menarik sehingga memunculkan minat dalam belajar
title: Belajar Bilangan dengan Konteks Memasak Kue Bola Ubi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: learning numbers with the context of cooking sweet potato balls playing cooking is an activity that is popular with children, it turns out that it contains mathematical concepts, namely numbers, this study aims to produce teaching materials for number material using the context of cooking sweet potato balls that are valid and practical, the method used is design research, development studies type consisting of preliminary and formative evaluation, the research subjects are experts and students in one of the kindergartens in the city of Palembang, research data was collected through observation questionnaires, documentation and walkthroughs, this study produced valid teaching materials based on comments and suggestions from experts and the results of calculations using the Aikens v index which is categorized as high validity and categorized as very practical, as seen from students being able to easily use the instruments that have been developed, this teaching material is expected to be an interesting learning experience that will raise interest in learning

desc: This research aimed to develop a picture story book media feasible for building the self-awareness of early childhood children and reveal the effectiveness of the developed picture story book media.This research and development (RD) referred to the development procedure developed by Borg and Gall. The data analysis used the qualitative anaylisis and independent sample t-test. Sampling technique used purposive sampling. The preliminary field testing sujects consisted of 6 students of Al Amien Kindergarten. The main field testing subjects consisted of 30 students of Al Amien Kindergarten. The operational field testing subjects consisted of 40 students of ABA Karangmalang Kindergarten. The result of this research was as follows. First, the developed picture story book media was feasible to be used for building the self-awareness of early childhood students. It was proven from the result of media and material validation, also the result from teacher and children questionnaire. Second, the developed picture story book media was effective in building the self-awareness of 5 – 6 years old students significantly.
title: Developing Picture Story Book Media for Building the Self-Awareness of Early Childhood Children
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: developing picture story book media for building the self-awareness of early childhood children this research aimed to develop a picture story book media feasible for building the self-awareness of early childhood children and revealing the effectiveness of the developing picture story book media this research and development rd referred to the development procedure developed by borg and gall the data analysis used the qualitative analysis and independent sample test sampling technique used purposive sampling the preliminary field testing subjects consisted of students of al amien kindergarten the main field testing subjects consisted of students of al amien kindergarten the operational field testing subjects consisted of students of aba karangmalang kindergarten the result of this research was as follows first the developed picture story book media was feasible to be used for building the self-awareness of early childhood students it was proven from the result of media and material validation also the result from teacher and children questionnaire second the developed picture story book media was effective in building the self-awareness of years old students significantly

desc: The purpose of this study was to obtain information on understanding of early childhood education in coastal communities in the Buton Islands. This research uses descriptive qualitative research. The subjects in this study were teachers, and parents in the coastal district of Buton.  Based on the results of the study, the coastal communities in the Buton Islands do not yet fully have knowledge about the nature of early childhood development.  Based on the results of the study showed that parents could not distinguish between ECE and Kindergarten. Kindergarten in not part of ECE and so that in learning process, parents emphasis on academic achievement without providing the the character building. Parents only focus on on reading and writing without paying attention to aspects of moral and religious values, physical, motor, social, emotional. In the aspect of the role of involvement, it shows the lack of role as parents of students to be involved in the implementation of early childhood education including parenting program activities, volunteers, communication, collaboration and learning at home. Lack of understanding of coastal parents in Buton Islands towards the implementation of early childhood education, it is necessary for schools to involve families in educational programs in order to gain enlightenment and knowledge about early childhood education.
title: Coastal parents Perceptions of the Implementation of Early Childhood Education in Buton Islands
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: coastal parents perceptions of the implementation of early childhood education in the Buton Islands the purpose of this study was to obtain information on understanding of early childhood education in coastal communities in the Buton Islands in the coastal district of Buton based on the results of the study the coastal communities in the Buton Islands do not yet fully have knowledge about the nature of early childhood development based on the results of the study showed that parents could not distinguish between preschool and kindergarten kindergarten in not part of ece and so that in learning process parents emphasize on academic achievement without providing the character building parents only focus on reading and writing without paying attention to aspects of moral and religious values ​​physical motor social emotional in the aspect of the role of involvement it shows the lack of role as parents of students to be involved in the implementation of early childhood education including parenting program activities volunteers communication collaboration and learning at home lack of understanding of coastal parents in Buton Islands towards the implementation of early childhood education it is necessary for schools to involve families in educational programs in order to gain enlightenment and knowledge about early childhood education

desc: Pemodelan sikap berbahasa guru dalam pendidikan anak usia dini dapat berpengaruh besar terhadap perkembangan karakter, kognisi, serta motorik anak. Sehingga, strategi berbahasa guru PAUD yang tepat dapat membentuk anak menjadi berkarakter, cerdas dan trampil. Dengan demikian, penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui bagaimana strategi sikap kebahasaan guru dapat memaksimalkan tujuan afektif, kognitif, dan psikomotorik bahasa anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan strategi fenomenologi. Data dikumpulkan dari 20 guru PAUD di Kecamatan Mengwi melalui tes unjuk kerja mengajar dalam vidio dan kuesioner. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa guru berhasil membangkitkan olah rasa bahasa, mengaktivasi realisasi bahasa, dan membangkit nalar kebahasaan Anak. Tingkat kompleksitas kalimat guru dikategorikan Sedang dengan jenis kata sederhana. Dari unsur prosodik, tempo ujaran guru bervariatif mulai dari Pelan ke Sedang dengan penggunaan gestur dan kontak mata yang tepat. Dengan demikian, penelitian ini menyatakan bahwa pemodelan verba pedagogi, guru dapat mengoptimalkan perkembangan sikap, nalar, dan realisasi bahasa anak dengan baik
title: Sikap Kebahasaan Guru sebagai Pemodelan Pendidikan  Bahasa Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teacher language attitude as a model for early childhood language education teacher language attitude modeling in early childhood education can have a major influence on the development of children's cognitive and motoric character so that the right early childhood teacher language strategy can shape children into intelligent and skilled characters thus this study aims to determine how teacher language attitude strategies can maximize the cognitive and psychomotor affective goals of children's language this study uses a qualitative approach with a phenomenological strategy data were collected from early childhood teachers in Mengwi sub-district through teaching performance tests in videos and questionnaires the results of the study showed that teachers succeeded in awakening language sense processing activating language realization and awakening children's linguistic reasoning the level of complexity of teacher sentences is categorized as moderate with simple word types from prosodic elements the tempo of teacher speech varies from slow to moderate with the use of appropriate gestures and eye contact thus this study states that teacher pedagogical verb modeling can optimize the development of children's reasoning and language realization attitudes well

desc: Implementasi pembelajaran yang berkaitan dengan alam pada peserta didik PAUD seringkali terabaikan. Untuk mengentaskan permasalahan kerusakan lingkungan, perlu adanya penanaman karakter peduli lingkungan sejak anak dalam tahapan usia dini, salah satunya melalui pengenalan lingkungan alam sekitar, Literasi alam memberikan kesempatan bagi peserta didik untuk berinteraksi langsung dengan lingkungan sekitarnya seperti tumbuhan, hewan, dan ekosistem alam lainnya. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui hasil dari penerapan pembiasaan nilai-nilai kepedulian lingkungan melalui prinsip pembelajaran. Penelitian dilakukan dengan menggunakan pendekatan penelitian kualitatif deskriptif. Teknik pengambilan sampel yang dilakukan adalah purposive sampling. Penelitian ini menggunakan teknik pengumpulan berupa hasil dokumentasi, observasi, dan wawancara terstruktur. Uji keabsahan data yang digunakan adalah uji kredibilitas, uji transferabilitas, uji dependabilitas, dan uji konfirmabilitas. Melalui penelitian ini dapat disimpulkan bahwa implementasi prinsip pembelajaran di SALAM yakni; jaga diri, jaga teman, jaga lingkungan, dapat menjadi alternatif kegiatan literasi budaya yang dilakukan secara kontekstual terhadap kelestarian lingkungan.
title: Pembiasaan Nilai-Nilai Kepedulian Lingkungan pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Prinsip Pembelajaran
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: habituation of environmental care values ​​in early childhood through learning principles implementation of learning related to nature in early childhood students is often overlooked to eradicate environmental damage problems, it is necessary to instill a caring character since children are in the early stages of life, one of which is through introduction to the natural environment around them, natural literacy provides opportunities for students to interact directly with their surroundings such as plants, animals and other natural ecosystems, the purpose of this study is to determine the results of the application of habituation of environmental care values ​​through learning principles, the research was conducted using a qualitative descriptive research approach, the sampling technique used was purposive sampling, this study used a collection technique in the form of documentation results, observation and structured interviews, the data validity test used was a credibility test, transferability test, dependability test and confirmability test, through this study it can be concluded that the implementation of learning principles in greetings, namely guarding yourself, guarding your friends, guarding the environment, can be an alternative cultural literacy activity that is carried out contextually towards environmental sustainability

desc: Literasi dini adalah kemampuan anak usia dini untuk membaca, menulis dan berhitung. Literasi anak usia dini berkembang dan diperoleh di rumah maupun lingkungan sosialnya. Pentingnya literasi di era digital bagi anak usia dini menuntut perhatian serius. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjelaskan pola pengembangan literasi bagi anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah pendekatan kualitatif. Data bersifat deskriptif berupa kata-kata tertulis dari informan yaitu fasilitator, orangtua siswa, kepala sekolah serta perilaku yang dapat diamati. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa literasi dini dengan memproduksi buku cerita berdampak mendorong percepatan perkembangan bahasa bagi anak usia dini. Modal sosial sebagai elemen pokok dalam pengembangan literasi dini berhubungan dengan kerjasama dalam menjalin komunikasi, memberi dukungan serta keteladanan dari orang tua dan fasilitator untuk menciptakan lingkungan belajar. Kondisi ini menghadirkan parenting di sekolah yang terpadu dengan proses pembelajaran secara alami dan bukan kegiatan yang diselenggarakan secara terbatas pada setiap semester yang bersifat monoton.
title: Pengembangan Literasi Dini melalui Kerjasama Keluarga dan Sekolah di Taman Anak Sanggar Anak Alam Yogyakarta
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early literacy development through family and school cooperation in the children's park, Sanggar Anak Alam Yogyakarta Early literacy is the ability of early childhood to read, write and count Early childhood literacy develops and is obtained at home and in their social environment The importance of literacy in the digital era for early childhood requires serious attention This study aims to explain the pattern of literacy development for early childhood The research method used is a qualitative approach The data is descriptive in the form of written words from informants, namely facilitators, parents, students, principals and observable behavior The results of the study indicate that early literacy by producing story books has an impact on encouraging the acceleration of language development for early childhood Social capital as a basic element in the development of early literacy is related to cooperation in establishing communication Providing support and role models from parents and facilitators to create a learning environment This condition presents parenting in schools that are integrated with the learning process naturally and not activities that are held in a limited manner in each semester which are monotonous

desc: Keberadaan sekolah menjadi tempat munculnyabibit-bibitpenerus bangsa yang berperilaku menyimpang, melalui bullying. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengamati bentuk perilaku bullying yang terjadi pada anak usia prasekolah dan mengelompokkan tindakan preventif guru terhadap perilaku bullying yang terjadi pada anak usia prasekolah. Metode penelitian yaitu pendekatan kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data berupa interview dan observasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa bentuk bullying yang dilakukan anak seperti; mengejek, mengolok-olok, memukul, mencubit, menendang, menginjak kaki, mendorong teman. Tindakan preventif guru bersifat tindakan rasionalitas instrumental, dengan bentuk melerai dan memisahkan anak yang sedang memukul/mengejek temannya, disertai dengan cara memisahkan tempat duduk antar siswa sehingga mereka tidak kembali ricuh. Tindakan bersifat rasional nilai, seperti guru menegur anak yang memukul, menendang, mengejek, mencubit, mendorong temannya. Kemudian guru menyuruh anak untuk meminta maaf kepada temannya. Selanjutnya tindakan bersifat tindakan afektif, di mana guru menghibur si anak saat temannya mendorong, mengejek, mencubit, mengolok-olok anak tersebut.
title: Stop Bullying: Analisis Kesadaran dan Tindakan Preventif Guru pada Anak Pra Sekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: stop bullying analysis of awareness and preventive actions of teachers in preschool children the existence of schools as a place for the emergence of the seeds of the nation's successors who behave deviantly through bullying the purpose of this study is to observe the form of bullying behavior that occurs in preschool children and to group the preventive actions of teachers against bullying behavior that occurs in preschool children the research method is a qualitative approach data collection techniques in the form of interviews and observations the results of the study indicate that the form of bullying carried out by children such as teasing teasing hitting pinching kicking stepping on feet pushing friends the teacher's preventive actions are instrumental rationality actions in the form of breaking up and separating children who are hitting teasing their friends accompanied by separating seats between students so that they do not return to chaos the actions are rational value such as teachers reprimanding children who hit kicking teasing pinching pushing their friends then the teacher tells the child to apologize to their friends the next action is an affective action where the teacher comforts the child when his friend pushes teasing pinching teasing the child

desc: Children were considered weak and lack of experience. The perspectives, nevertheless, have changed; children are competent to deliver their voices. Therefore, there is a need to do research with children so that adults can understand their childhood. The principles of research with children and research with adults might differ. The researchers did qualitative study analysing documents, highlighting the differences between them. Three themes appeared. The first is ethical aspect; children's researchers need to gain consent from children's gatekeepers. The second is rapport building; researchers apply unique strategies, such as role-playing to provide comfort during the research. The last is child-rights based approach; researchers should consider that children's insights can contribute to adults' understanding of children's experiences. This study's practical implication is that it contributes information to potential researchers to apply specific strategies for research with children that might not be applied to research with adults because of their maturity nature.
title: A Critical Analysis of Research with Children: Differences from Research with Adults
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: a critical analysis of research with children differences from research with adults children were considered weak and lack of experience the perspectives nevertheless have changed children are competent to deliver their voices therefore there is a need to do research with children so that adults can understand their childhood the principles of research with children and research with adults might differ the researchers did qualitative study analyzing documents highlighting the differences between them three themes appeared the first is ethical aspect children's researchers need to gain consent from children's gatekeepers the second is rapport building researchers applying unique strategies such as as roleplaying to provide comfort during the research the last is child rights based approach researchers should consider that children's insights can contribute to adults' understanding of children's experiences this studies practical implications is that it contributes information to potential researchers to apply specific strategies for research with children that might not be applied to research with adults because of their mature nature

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kognitif anak usia dini melalui pengembangan Media Cube Learning. Penelitian pengembangan ini mengikuti langkah-langkah model Dick and Carey. Instrumen yang digunakan dalam mengoleksi data penelitian dengan lembar interview, lembar observasi, lembar dokumentasi lembar angket. Tanggapan ekspert materi, ekspert media, ekspert bahasa, seluruh tanggapannya berkategori “produk sangat memiliki kelayakan”.  Tanggapan anak-anak dari evaluasi uji one to one, small group, dan field trial, seluruh tanggapannya berkategori “produk sangat baik”. Simpulan hasil pengukuran efektivitas produk menunjukan jika daya berpikir peserta didik anak usia dini dalam tingkat perkembangan kognitif, belajar dan bermain dapat ditingkatkan menggunakan media Cube Learning. Cube Learning memiliki kebaharuan dan keunggulan karena didesain menarik, penuh berbagai macam warna, gambar, angka, huruf, dan satu cube mampun memuat dua puluh delapan isi sehingga memudahkan guru memberikan pembelajaran, dan mampu membangkitkan kemauan anak-anak untuk bermain dan belajar secara psikogis, yang akhirnya meningkatkan kognitif anak usia dini.
title: Meningkatkan Kognitif Anak Usia Dini melalui Pengembangan Media Cube Learning
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improve early childhood cognitive through cube learning media development this study aims to improve early childhood cognitive through cube learning media development this development research follows the steps of the dick and carey model instruments used in collecting research data with interview sheets observation sheets documentation sheets questionnaire sheets responses material experts media experts language experts all responses are categorized as products that are very feasible children's responses from the evaluation of one to one small group tests and field trials all responses are categorized as very good products the conclusion of the results of measuring the effectiveness of the product shows that the thinking power of early childhood students in the level of cognitive development of learning and playing can be improved using cube learning media cube learning has novelty and advantages because it is designed attractively full of various colors of pictures numbers letters and one cube can contain twenty-eight contents so that it makes it easier for teachers to provide learning and is able to arouse children's willingness to play and learn psychologically which ultimately improves early childhood cognitive

desc: Penelitian ini didasarkan oleh Sistem pembelajaran daring sangat berbeda dengan sistem pembelajaran tatap muka sebelumnya. Guru dan orang tua mengalami banyak kendala saat pembelajaran daring. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui evaluasi pembelajaran anak usia dini yang dilakukan guru pada masa belajar dari rumah di Kelurahan Sumur Dewa Kecamatan Selebar Kota Bengkulu. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Subjek yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah kepala sekolah dan guru di PAUD Harapan Bunda, PAUD Muslifa, PAUD Harapan Ananda. Data dikumpulkan melalui observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa evaluasi pembelajaran anak usia dini yang dilakukan guru pada masa belajar dari rumah di Kelurahan Sumur Dewa Kecamatan Selebar Kota Bengkulu di PAUD Harapan Bunda, PAUD Muslifa, PAUD Harapan Ananda itu guru rata-rata tidak dapat melakukan evaluasi secara maksimal dikarenakan pembelajaran daring sangat banyak mengalami kendala seperti orang tua tidak ada alat komunikasi, Guru tidak membuat RPPM khusus pembelajaran daring, tidak ada kuota, tugas tidak dikumpulkan tepat waktu.
title: Evaluasi Pembelajaran Anak Usia Dini pada Masa Belajar dari Rumah di Kota Bengkulu
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: evaluation of early childhood learning during home learning in Bengkulu City This study is based on an online learning system that is very different from the previous face-to-face learning system. Teachers and parents experience many obstacles during online learning. This study aims to determine the evaluation of early childhood learning carried out by teachers during home learning in Sumur Dewa Village, Selebar District, Bengkulu City. This study is a qualitative descriptive study. The subjects used in this study were the principal and teachers at PAUD Harapan Bunda, PAUD Muslifa, PAUD Harapan Ananda. Data was collected through observation, interviews and documentation. The results of this study indicate that the evaluation of early childhood learning carried out by teachers during home learning in Sumur Dewa Village, Selebar District, Bengkulu City. In PAUD Harapan Bunda, PAUD Muslifa, PAUD Harapan Ananda, teachers on average cannot carry out evaluations optimally because online learning experiences many obstacles, such as parents do not have communication tools, teachers do not make a special RPPM for online learning, there is no quota, assignments are not collected on time.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendesain pembelajaran berbasis STEAM menggunakan media SELASI. Media SELASI ini adalah singkatan dari media seni kolase kreasi, yang mengintegrasikan beberapa mata pelajaran yaitu SBdP, Matematika, dan Bahasa Jawa. Selain itu, penelitian ini juga bertujuan untuk mendeksripsikan sisi kreatif, kritis dan inovatif yang dilakukan peserta didik saat melakukan aktivitas STEAM yang dirancang. Desain aktivitas diujicobakan ke tiga kelompok siswa skala kecil dari tiga kota yang berbeda sesuai tempat tinggal pengumpul data. Data ujicoba dikumpulkan dengan teknik observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Data kemudian dianalisis untuk mendapatkan desain aktivitas STEAM yang sesuai untuk siswa kelas 2 SD. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa desain STEAM yang telah dibuat peneliti dapat memicu kreativitas, kekritisan dan inovasi peserta didik. Peserta didik menjadi kreatif dengan mempertimbangkan estetik dalam pemilihan jenis bahan yang akan ditempel, kritis dalam menyesuaikan gambar dengan alas yang telah disediakan sebagai pilihan serta berinovasi dalam pemilihan tata letak jenis bahan tempel yang dipilih dengan mempertimbangkan estetik pula. Berdasar hasil penelitian ini, aktivitas STEAM dengan media SELASI bisa dijadikan alternatif dalam pembelajaran di kelas 2 sekolah dasar.
title: Desain Pembelajaran STEAM dengan Media Selasi untuk Peserta Didik Kelas II SD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: steam learning design with selasi media for grade II elementary school students this study aims to design steam-based learning using selasi media this selasi media is an abbreviation of creative collage art media that integrates several subjects, namely sbdp mathematics and Javanese language in addition this study also aims to describe the creative critical and innovative side carried out by students when carrying out steam activities that are designed the activity design is tested on three small-scale student groups from three different cities according to the place of residence of the data collector the trial data is collected using observation techniques interviews and documentation data is then analyzed to obtain a steam activity design that is suitable for elementary school students the results of this study indicate that the steam design that has been made by researchers can trigger creativity, criticality and innovation of students students become creative by considering aesthetics in choosing the type of material to be pasted critical in adjusting the image to the base that has been provided as an option and innovating in choosing the layout of the type of pasted material chosen by considering aesthetics as well based on the results of this study steam activities with selasi media can be used as an alternative in learning in elementary school classes

desc: This study aims to know of understanding of authoritative parenting style and affected the children behaviour while using a gadget. This is qualitative with data collection from an interview, observation, and document. Analysis of the data used by Miles and Huberman. The subject is parents and their children lived at Yogyakarta. This result is the parents with authoritative parenting can classify, analyze, comparing, and evaluate their parenting style. With those understanding gives the effect on children when the children used gadget at home such as show discipline and follow the parent's rules; the children have critical thinking and independent using the gadget. Even though authoritative parenting identical with gives freedom, they have to give limit time for children to use a gadget, 6 - 7 hours in a week. Another recommendation does not give the children a gadget even though a gadget is one of the basic need for communication.
title: The Effect of Parenting Styles for Childrens Behaviour on Using Gadget at Revolution Industry
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
