desc: Maze Karpet Covid-19 merupakan alat permainan edukatif yang relative tepat digunakan untuk mengoptimalkan perkembangan, menstimulasi dan memotivasi anakdalam pengembangan motorik kasar. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengenalkan kepada masyarakat luas tentang permainan Maze Karpet Covid-19 yang terbukti efektif untuk mengembangakan motorik kasar anak. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan yaitu penelitian kualitatif deskriptif. Penggumpulan data penelitian dilakukan mealuli kegiatan observasi, dokumentasi dan wawancarakepada dua guru RA Kelompok B di lembaga RA Az-Azuhdi kota Lubuklinggau Provinsi Sumatera Selatan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Maze Karpet Covid-19  menjadi permainan edukatif  yang efektif untuk meningkatkan motorik kasar anak;  ditemukan 13 dari 14 anak telah terstimulasi perkembangan motorik kasarnya tanpa mengalami kesulitan dalam  melaksanakan permainan Maze Karpet Covid-19, dan hanya satu anak yang mengalami kesulitan sehingga harus diberikan special treatment oleh gurunya untuk dapat bermain Maze. Dengan demikian, Maze Karpet Covid-19 sungguh efektif untuk  menstimulasi motorik kasar dan sangat menarik digunakan sebagai permainan edukatif untuk anak usia dini
title: Strategi Stimulasi Perkembangan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini Melalui Maze Karpet Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood gross motor development stimulation strategy through covid carpet maze covid carpet maze is an educational game tool that is relatively appropriate for optimizing development, stimulating and motivating children in gross motor development. The purpose of this study is to introduce the wider community to the covid carpet maze game which has been proven effective in developing children's gross motor skills. The type of research used is descriptive qualitative research. Data collection was carried out through observation, documentation and interviews with two RA group B teachers at the Azazuh RA institution in Lubuklinggau City, South Sumatra Province. The results of the study showed that the covid carpet maze is an effective educational game for improving children's gross motor skills. It was found that the children had stimulated their gross motor development without experiencing difficulty in playing the covid carpet maze game and only one child had difficulty so that he had to be given special treatment by his teacher to be able to play the maze. Thus, the covid carpet maze is truly effective in stimulating gross motor skills and is very interesting to use as an educational game for early childhood.

desc: Pendekatan Science Technology EngineeringArts Mathematics (STEAM) pada anak usia dini hadir dikarenakan adanya tuntutakn era revolusi Industi 4.0, yang mampu menstimulus skills abad 21. Namun dalam pengintegrasian bidang-bidang ilmu STEAM dengan kegiatan bermain anak masih ditemukan kesenjangan gender. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengkaji implementasi STEAM dalam mengkonstruksi kesetaraan gender pada anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Subjek penelitian ini adalah anak berusia 5-6 tahun sebanyak 17 anak, 2 guru dan kepala sekolah. Teknik pengambilan sampel yang digunakan adalah teknik purposive sampling. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan wawancara, observasi dan studi dokumentasi. Teknik analisis menggunakan tematik analisis dan memvalidasi ulangkan dengan teknik triangulasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa (1) implementasi STEAM di PAUD; serta (2) kegiatan STEAM dan proses konstruksi kesetaraan gender. Penelitian ini menyimpulkan bahwa implementasi STEAM merupakan praktik baik untuk mengkonstruksi kesetaraan gender pada anak usia dini.
title: Implementasi STEAM dalam Mengkonstruksi Kesetaraan Gender pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of steam in constructing gender equality in early childhood science technology engineering arts mathematics steam approach in early childhood is present due to the demands of the industrial revolution era which is able to stimulate skills century but in the integration of steam science fields with children's play activities there is still a gender gap this study aims to examine the implementation of steam in constructing gender equality in early childhood the research method used is qualitative with a case study approach the subjects of this study were children aged years as many as children teachers and principals the sampling technique used is purposive sampling technique data collection was carried out by interview observation and documentation study the analysis technique used thematic analysis and re-validation with triangulation technique the results of the study showed that the implementation of steam in early childhood as well as steam activities and the process of constructing gender equality this study concluded that the implementation of steam is a good practice for constructing gender equality in early childhood

desc: Orang tua di Indonesia memanfaatkan gadget lebih dominan sebagai hiburan. Tujuan penelitian mendeskripsikan efektivitas dalam peningkatan pola pengasuhan postif pada anak usia dini  dalam penggunaan aplikasi parents and kids. Penelitian menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif eksperimen dengan desain Pre-Experimental desaign. Lokasi penelitian di PAUD program Kelompok Bermain di Kota Baru Driyorejo Gresik. Responden pada penelitian ini, yaitu orang tua Kelompok Bermain (KB) sejumlah 45 dengan teknik Quota Random Sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan tes (pretes-posttes), observasi dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian diketahui terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan. Orang tua terampil dalam menyediakan lingkungan yang aman bagi anak. Orang tua melakukan diskusi kecil mengenai kegiatan apa saja yang dilakukan. Orang tua memahami dirinya sebagai support sistem bagi anak. Kebutuhan kasih sayang dibutuhkan sebagai bentuk dukungan batin yang dimiliki anak. Mendukung pola asuh anak dibutuhkan kegiatan parenting, baik dilakukan secara luring maupun daring. Penggunaan aplikasi parents and kids membantu orang tua memperoleh informasi, sehingga dapat sebagai rekomendasi orang tua dan guru untuk membuat inovasi parenting.
title: Aplikasi Parents and Kids Berbasis Android untuk Meningkatkan Keterampilan Pola Pengasuhan Positif Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Android-based parents and kids application to improve positive parenting skills for children, parents in Indonesia use gadgets more dominantly as entertainment. The purpose of the study is to describe the effectiveness of improving positive parenting patterns in early childhood in the use of the parents and kids application. The study used a quantitative experimental approach with a pre-experimental design. The location of the study was at the PAUD playgroup program in the new city of Driyorejo, Gresik. The respondents in this study were parents of the KB playgroup, a number of whom used the quota random sampling technique. Data collection techniques used pre-test-posttest observation and documentation. The results of the study showed that there were significant differences. Parents were skilled in providing a safe environment for children. Parents had small discussions about what activities parents did. They understood themselves as a support system for their children. The need for affection was needed as a form of inner support that children had. Supporting childcare patterns required parenting activities, both offline and online. The use of the parents and kids application helps parents obtain information so that it can be a recommendation for parents and teachers to make parenting innovations.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan proses dan hasil pembelajaran melalui pelaksanaan penggunaan media gambar yang dapat meningkatkan kesiapan membaca anak usia dini di Taman Kanak-Kanak Pembina Negeri Tualang Kabupaten Siak, Riau. Metode penelitian ini adalah Tindakan Kelas (PTK). Subyek penelitian ini berjumlah 19 orang anak usia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini terdiri dari dua siklus dan setiap siklus terdiri dari tiga pertemuan.Teknik analisis data digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah analisis data kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Analisis data kualitatif dengan cara menganalisis data dari hasil catatan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan adanya peningkatan kesiapan membaca anak melalui media gambar adalah rata-rata skor kesiapan membaca anak pada siklus I sebesar 47,37% dan siklus II meningkat sebesar 76,15%. Kesimpulan, penggunaan media gambar dapat meningkatkan kesiapan membaca anak usia dini
title: Meningkatkan Perkembangan Membaca Melalui Buku Cerita Rakyat Melayu pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Improving reading development through Malay folklore books for early childhood This study aims to describe the process and results of learning through the implementation of the use of image media that can improve the reading readiness of early childhood children in the Kindergarten Pembina Negeri Tualang, Siak Riau Regency. The research method is classroom action ptk. The subjects of this study are children aged years. This study consists of two cycles and each cycle consists of three meetings. The data analysis technique used in this study is quantitative and qualitative data analysis. Qualitative data analysis by analyzing data from the results of observation notes, interviews and documentation. The results of this study indicate an increase in children's reading readiness through image media. The average score for children's reading readiness in cycle I is and cycle II increases by. The conclusion is that the use of image media can improve the reading readiness of early childhood children.

desc: Pelaksanaan pendekatan BCCT di KB/TK Realfunrainbow Preschool Salatiga mengalami berbagai kendala sehingga dilakukan kebijakan baru untuk mengatasinya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui penerapan, faktor pendukung dan penghambat, alasan perubahan kebijakan serta mengetahui upaya-upaya dalam mengatasi problematika penerapan pendekatan BCCT. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif. Data dikumpulkan melalui observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Data dianalisa dengan metode deskriptif. Hasil menunjukkan bahwa kebingungan pada anak, fokus anak dalam menyelesaikan tugas atau proyek pada sentra-sentra, kesulitan guru membuat rancangan pembelajaran, dan kesulitan guru melakukan evaluasi menjadi alasan perubahan kebijakan. Hubungan antara pendidik dengan orang tua sangat baik, fasilitas atau sarana prasarana yang ada sudah cukup memadai, kurikulum sudah terstruktur untuk membantu pendidik dalam membuat rencana pembelajaran, dan minimnya kebosanan anak menjadi faktor-faktor pendukung perubahan kebijakan ini. Meskipun masalah pembagian waktu pendidik membuat RKH, kurangnya pengembangan ragam main dan menciptakan APE yang disesuaikan dengan tema, pola perubahan serta kemampuan SDM sebagai faktor-faktor penghambat.
title: Penerapan Pendekatan BCCT di KB-TK Realfunrainbow Preschool Salatiga
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of the BCCT approach in KBTK Realfunrainbow Preschool Salatiga implementation of the BCCT approach in KBTK Realfunrainbow Preschool Salatiga experienced various obstacles so that a new policy was made to overcome them this study aims to determine the implementation of supporting and inhibiting factors the reasons for the policy change and to find out efforts to overcome the problems of implementing the BCCT approach this study is a qualitative study data was collected through observation interviews and documentation data was analyzed using descriptive methods the results showed that confusion in children children's focus on completing tasks or projects in centers the difficulty of teachers making learning plans and the difficulty of teachers conducting evaluations were the reasons for the policy change the relationship between educators and parents was very good the existing facilities or infrastructure were sufficient the curriculum was structured to help educators in making learning plans and the lack of boredom of children were supporting factors for this policy change although the problem of dividing educators' time made the lack of development of various games and creating games that were adjusted to the theme of the pattern of change and the ability of human resources as inhibiting factors

desc: Perkembangan motorik halus anak adalah salah satu bagian penting dalam perkembangan setiap individu. Sehingga dibutuhkan kegiatan untuk stimulasi perkembangan motorik halus. Namun, guru-guru masih kesulitan dalam menentukan kegiatan yang seusai dengan kegiatan sehari-hari atau sesuai dengan practical life skill. Oleh karena itu, penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis kebutuhan guru tentang buku panduan  stimulasi motorik halus berbasis practical life skill. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah kualitatif deskriptif. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan kuisioner terbuka melalui google form disebar pada 20 guru PAUD yang dipilih melalui random sampling. Teknik analisis data dengan miles and hubermen terdiri dari pengumpulan data, reduksi data, display data dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa belum ada buku panduan berbasis practical life skills untuk mengembangkan motorik halus anak. Guru memerlukan buku panduan motorik halus yang sistematis dan terstruktur untuk meningkatkan kualitas pembelajaran di PAUD.
title: Analisis Kebutuhan Pengembangan Buku Panduan Stimulasi Motorik Halus Berbasis Practical Life Skill
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the need for the development of a guidebook for fine motor stimulation based on practical life skills. Children's fine motor development is an important part of the development of each individual, so activities are needed to stimulate the development of fine motor skills, but teachers still have difficulty in determining activities that are in accordance with daily activities or in accordance with practical life skills. Therefore, this study aims to analyze the needs of teachers regarding a guidebook for fine motor stimulation based on practical life skills. The method used in this study is qualitative descriptive. Data collection techniques use open questionnaires via Google Form distributed to selected PAUD teachers through random sampling. Data analysis techniques with Miles and Hubermen consist of data collection, data reduction, data display, and drawing conclusions. The results of the study indicate that there is no guidebook based on practical life skills to develop children's fine motor skills. Teachers need a systematic and structured fine motor guidebook to improve the quality of learning in PAUD.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan model pembelajaran keterampilan koping untuk mengelola emosi negatif anak usia 4-6 tahun. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian pengembangan yang mengacu pada langkah-langkah desain pembelajaran ADDIE. Subjek penelitian ini adalah ahli model pembelajaran, ahli materi, ahli media, anak TK berusia 4-6 tahun, dan guru TK di wilayah DIY yang ditentukan dengan teknik cluster proporsional random sampling. Pengumpulan data menggunakan skala, wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Analisis data dilakukan secara kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa model pembelajaran keterampilan koping meliputi sintaks yang terdiri dari rasional strategi, identifikasi emosi anak, latihan dan praktik, penugasan, dan pembiasaan. Model pengembangan pembelajaran keterampilan koping ini dinyatakan valid karena memiliki V hitung lebih besar dari V tabel 5%. Selain itu, model ini juga efektif untuk mengelola emosi negatif anak usia 4-6 tahun karena hasil uji Wilcoxon Signed Ranks menunjukkan nilai (Sig.) 0,0000,05.
title: Koping untuk Mengembangkan Kemampuan Mengelola Emosi Negatif Anak Usia 4-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: coping to develop the ability to manage negative emotions in children aged years This study aims to produce a learning model for coping skills to manage negative emotions in children aged years This study is a development study that refers to the steps of addie learning design The subjects of this study were learning model experts, material experts, media experts, kindergarten children aged years and kindergarten teachers in the DIY region which were determined by the cluster proportional random sampling technique Data collection using an interview scale, observation and documentation Data analysis was carried out quantitatively and qualitatively The results of the study showed that the learning model for coping skills includes syntax consisting of rational strategies, identification of children's emotions, exercises and practices, assignments and habits This learning development model for coping skills is declared valid because it has a calculated v greater than the table v In addition, this model is also effective for managing negative emotions in children aged years because the results of the Wilcoxon signed ranks test show a sig value

desc: Masalah penelitian ini adalah apakah melalui kegiatan bermain dan bernyanyi dapat meningkatkan perkembangan bahasa pada anak usia dini? Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui melalui kegiatan bermain dan bernyanyi dapat meningkatkan perkembangan bahasa anak usia dini, penelitian ini bisa menjadi referensi ilmiah kalangan pendidikan, bagi guru dalam melaksanakan kegiatan bermain dan bernyanyi sebagai bagian dari kegiatan belajar anak, desain dalam penelitian ini adalah Perencanaan, Pelaksanaan, Observasi dan Refleksi. Hasil penelitian kegiatan sebelum siklus nilai rata-rata siklus yang diperoleh anak adalah 27,50% dalam kategori MB, nilai rata-rata siklus yang diperoleh anak adalah 44,79% dalam kategori MB, Nilai rata-rata siklus I diperoleh anak sebesar 44,79% dalam kategori MB. siklus II diperoleh anak 53,12% berkembang dalam kategori BSH, dan nilai rata-rata siklus III yang diperoleh anak adalah 84,37% dalam kategori BSB.
title: Melalui Kegiatan Bermain dan Bernyanyi dapat  Mengembangkan Bahasa untuk Anak 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: through playing and singing activities can develop language for children years the problem of this research is whether through playing and singing activities can improve language development in early childhood this research aims to find out through playing and singing activities can improve language development in early childhood this research can be a scientific reference for education circles for teachers in implementing playing and singing activities as part of children's learning activities the design in this research is the planning of the implementation of observations and reflections on the results of the research activities before the cycle the average value of the cycle obtained by the child is in the category mb the average value of the cycle obtained by the child is in the category mb the average value of cycle i obtained by the child is in the category mb cycle ii obtained by the child developing in the category bsh and the average value of cycle iii obtained by the child is in the category bsb

desc: This article is the result of research conducted by the author at one of the Foundation for Early Childhood Education (ECE) in the city of Bandung. Starting from the hectic variety of field trip activities organized by each PAUD institution, there were complaints from parents of students regarding funds that had to be spent if the field trip was out of town, and other pros and cons in aspects of PAUD children's learning methods.  The results of the research conducted show as follows: 1) field trip activities as an effective learning method used by teachers in the gross motor learning process in the PAUD; 2) the communication process carried out in field trip activities consists of communicator aspects, messages given, and the media used , and the result or effect in the field trip.
title: Communication Process in Field Trip as a Learning Method for PAUD Children in Bandung
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: communication process in field trip as a learning method for preschool children in Bandung this article is the result of research conducted by the author at one of the foundations for early childhood education ece in the city of Bandung starting from the hectic variety of field trip activities organized by each preschool institution there were complaints from parents of students regarding funds that had to be spent if the field trip was out of town and other pros and cons in aspects of preschool children's learning methods the results of the research conducted show as follows field trip activities as an effective learning method used by teachers in the gross motor learning process in the preschool the communication process carried out in field trip activities consists of communicator aspects messages given and the media used and the result or effect in the field trip

desc: Motivasi merupakan salah satu faktor utama dalam menunjang hasil belajar siswa. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis penerapan media pembelajaran kartu bergambar dalam meningkatkan motivasi belajar anak usia dini. Dalam metode studi literatur, kami menyelidiki literatur yang relevan dengan topik ini dan mengidentifikasi temuan-temuan kunci. Hasilnya mengungkapkan bahwa media pembelajaran kartu bergambar memiliki potensi besar dalam meningkatkan motivasi belajar anak usia dini. Desain yang menarik, unsur interaktif, dan keterlibatan anak merupakan faktor penting. Faktor individu dan variasi dalam penggunaan media juga berdampak signifikan. Kerjasama antara orang tua dan pendidik menjadi penting, serta perlu ada evaluasi dan pengembangan berkelanjutan. Hasil penelitian ini memberikan pemahaman yang lebih mendalam tentang cara meningkatkan motivasi belajar anak usia dini melalui media pembelajaran kartu bergambar.
title: Media Kartu Bergambar untuk Anak Usia Dini: Apakah Memiliki Pengaruh terhadap Peningkatan Motivasi Belajar?
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: picture card media for early childhood does it have an influence on increasing learning motivation motivation is one of the main factors in supporting student learning outcomes this study aims to analyze the application of picture card learning media in increasing learning motivation of early childhood in the literature study method we investigated the literature relevant to this topic and identified key findings the results revealed that picture card learning media has great potential in increasing learning motivation of early childhood attractive design interactive elements and child involvement are important factors individual factors and variations in the use of media also have a significant impact cooperation between parents and educators is important and there needs to be continuous evaluation and development the results of this study provide a deeper understanding of how to increase learning motivation of early childhood through picture card learning media

desc: Pembelajaran membatik yang diterapkan pada AUD dengan menggunakan canting plastic serta cairan malam dingin dirancang bertujuan untuk menghindarkan anak dengan kompor pada saat membatik sehingga pembelajaran membatik dapat dikenalkan pada anak sejak dini. Salah satu implementasi pembelajaran membatik adalah untuk mengembangkan kecakapan motorik halus pada AUD. Penelitian ini berjenis deskriptif kuantitatif serta metode survey melalui teknik observasi dengan menggunakan instrument penelitian lembar observasi  checklist yang berisi teknik dasar membatik. Beberapa teknik dasar membatik terdiri dari nyungging, njaplak, nglowong, ngiseni, nyolet, ngelir, mopok dan nglorod. Hasil penelitian implementasi pembelajaran membatik pada AUD, masuk dalam jenis kategori “sangat baik” serta data mendeskripsikan bahwa dalam pelaksanaan pembelajaran membatik akan mampu untuk memupuk kemampuan motorik halus pada anak
title: Implementasi Pembelajaran Membatik Berbasis Budaya pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of culture-based batik learning in early childhood batik learning applied to aud using plastic canting and cold wax liquid is designed to prevent children from using stoves when batik so that batik learning can be introduced to children from an early age one of the implementations of batik learning is to develop fine motor skills in aud this research is descriptive quantitative and survey method through observation techniques using research instruments observation checklist sheets containing basic batik techniques several basic batik techniques consist of nyungging njaplak nglowong ngiseni nyolet ngelir mopok and nglorod the results of the research on the implementation of batik learning in aud are included in the very good category and the data describes that in the implementation of batik learning it will be able to foster fine motor skills in children

desc: To create good learning achievement, it is necessary to pay attention to several factors, one of which is the method used. Mnemonic learning aims to make it easier for young children to master tajwid material. This study aims to determine the level of learning achievement of Early Childhood Education (PAUD) Mikhrajul Ulum Jambearum Sumberjambe Jember students. The research approach used is a qualitative type of case study. Data collection techniques used are observation, interviews and documentation. The data analysis was carried out circularly, starting from data collection, reduction, data display and conclusion. The study results showed that it became easier for students to master Tajweed material without feeling pressured and bored because, in practice, the teacher used songs, acronyms, and mind mapping in learning Tajweed material. Learning that takes place is very enjoyable. As for its application, the teacher's creativity is needed in developing methods (singing, acronyms, concept maps) that are appropriate to the learning material so that students can more easily master and remember the material and feel happy and not burdened in learning
title: Mnemonic Learning Strategies in Improving Mastery of Tajwid Materials
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: mnemonic learning strategies in improving mastery of tajwid materials to create good learning achievement it is necessary to pay attention to several factors one of which is the method used mnemonic learning aims to make it easier for young children to master tajwid material this study aims to determine the level of learning achievement of early childhood education paud mikhrajul ulum jambearum Sumberjambe Jember students the research approach used is a qualitative type of case study data collection techniques used are observation interviews and documentation the data analysis was carried out circularly starting from data collection reduction data display and conclusion the study results showed that it became easier for students to master tajweed material without feeling pressured and bored because in practice the teacher used songs acronyms and mind mapping in learning tajweed material learning that takes place is very enjoyable as for its application the teachers creativity is needed in developing methods singing acronyms concept maps that are appropriate to the learning material so that students can more easily master and remember the material and feel happy and not burdened in learning

desc: Masa pandemi covid-19 saat ini memberikan dampak dalam bidang apapun termasuk pendidikan. Salah satunya dalam bidang pendidikan anak usia dini yang mengharuskan guru untuk melakukan pembelajaran daring. Tujuan penelitian yaitu untuk mendapatkan informasi kesiapan guru Taman Kanak-kanak menghadapi pembelajaran daring masa pandemi covid-19. Subjek penelitian 10 orang guru TK di Kota Pariaman, Sumatera Barat. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan deskriptif kualitatif, dengan teknik pengumpulan data angket dan wawancara. Teknik analisis menggunakan model Miles dan Huberman (Analysis Interactive Model). Hasil menunjukkan 6 dari 10 guru Taman Kanak-kanak sudah siap menghadapi pembelajaran daring, namun 4 dari guru Taman Kanak-kanak belum siap melakukan pembelajaran daring. Hal ini dipengaruhi oleh fasilitas yang kurang memadai dari pihak guru dan orangtua dan masih adanya anggapan bahwa pembelajaran daring ini sulit dilakukan. Kesiapan guru Taman Kanak-kanak melakukan pembelajaran daring pada masa pandemi covid-19 ini sangat diperlukan. Persiapan dimulai dari rencana pembelajaran, mengkomunikasikan dengan orang tua, dan fasilitas pendukung lainnya.
title: Kesiapan Guru TK Menghadapi Pembelajaran Daring Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: kindergarten teacher readiness to face online learning during the covid pandemic the current covid pandemic has an impact on any field including education, one of which is in the field of early childhood education which requires teachers to conduct online learning the purpose of the study is to obtain information on the readiness of kindergarten teachers to face online learning during the covid pandemic the research subjects were kindergarten teachers in pariaman city, west sumatera the type of research used was descriptive qualitative with questionnaire and interview data collection techniques the analysis technique used the miles model and huberman analysis interactive model the results showed that kindergarten teachers were ready to face online learning but kindergarten teachers were not ready to conduct online learning this was influenced by inadequate facilities from teachers and parents and there was still an assumption that online learning was difficult to do the readiness of kindergarten teachers to conduct online learning during the covid pandemic is very necessary preparation starting from the learning plan communicating with parents and other supporting facilities

desc: Kurikulum modifikasi di PAUD inklusif sangat dibutuhkan untuk mendukung PAUD holistik integratif. Sekolah penyelenggara inklusif saat ini masih banyak yang belum menerapkan kurikulum modifikasi. Penelitian ini melihat bagaimana penerapan modifikasi kurikulum di PAUD inklusif sebagai salah satu unsur pendukung dalam penerapan PAUD holistik integratif. Penelitian dilakukan dengan menggunakan systematic literature review yaitu melakukan identifikasi dan evaluasi secara kritis terhadap penelitian-penelitian yang relevan, serta mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data dari penelitian-penelitian tersebut. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pemerintah telah mengeluarkan aturan yang mendukung modifikasi kurikulum di PAUD inklusif, tetapi analisis literatur memperlihatkan bahwa masih terdapat sekolah-sekolah yang belum menerapkan modifikasi kurikulum, meski banyak juga PAUD inklusi yang telah melakukannya. Selain itu terdapat beberapa PAUD inklusi yang melakukan modifikasi kurikulum hanya ketika proses pembelajaran, belum pada administrasi pembelajaran. Melalui penelitian ini dapat menjadi upaya untuk meningkatkan kesadaran dan pemahaman tentang pentingnya modifikasi kurikulum pada PAUD inklusif di Indonesia guna mendukung program PAUD Holistik Integratif.
title: Modifikasi Kurikulum untuk Mengakomodasi Pendidikan Inklusif Guna Mendukung PAUD Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: curriculum modification to accommodate inclusive education to support holistic integrative early childhood education modified curriculum in inclusive early childhood education is very much needed to support holistic integrative early childhood education many inclusive schools currently still have not implemented modified curriculum this study looks at how the implementation of curriculum modification in inclusive early childhood education as one of the supporting elements in the implementation of holistic integrative early childhood education the study was conducted using systematic literature review, namely identifying and critically evaluating relevant studies and collecting and analyzing data from these studies the results of the study show that the government has issued regulations that support curriculum modification in inclusive early childhood education but literature analysis shows that there are still schools that have not implemented curriculum modification although many inclusive early childhood education have done so in addition there are several inclusive early childhood education that only carry out curriculum modification when the learning process is not yet in the learning administration through this study can be an effort to increase awareness and understanding of the importance of curriculum modification in inclusive early childhood education in Indonesia to support the holistic integrative early childhood education program

desc: Absolute character education was undertaken in the 21st century in early childhood as curative measures and social pathology in the community, but a preventive measure to the formation the good character of each student have not effectively used in character education. In addition to cognitive learning students' character formation should be noted. In fact, often the formation of character early on is often forgotten. The aim of research explained comprehensively the nature of character education in the 21st century in childhood, explained comprehensively the use of models of learning in character education in the 21st century in childhood, explained comprehensively use learning approaches in character education in the 21st century to children aged early. The research method used in this study is a literature review is to connect research with the existing literature and fills the gaps in previous research. The results obtained in this study the use of the learning model of character education in the 21st century in childhood is the process of empowering the learner process of humanization (humanizing), and the process of acculturation, learning models of education namely learning model planting value, based on the development of moral reasoning, value analysis, and project citizen, effective use helps learners develop competencies become good citizens
title: Penggunaan Model Pembelajaran Pendidikan Karakter Abad 21\ pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Keterampilan motorik kasar memberikan dampak positif bagi kehidupan anak jangka panjang. Permainan sirkuit pos geometri adalah kegiatan bermain yang dapat menstimulasi perkembangan motorik kasar anak, sehingga untuk melihat pengaruh permainan sirkuit pos geometri terhadap motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh permainan sirkuit pos geometri terhadap motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah quasi experiment dengan one group pretest-posttest design. Subjek penelitian melibatkan 20 orang anak. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan cara observasi dan tes. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukan adanya pengaruh permainan sirkuit pos geometri terhadap motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Hal ini dibuktikan  oleh uji hipotesis nilai sig. (2-tailed) sebesar 0,000 yang artinya sig.  0,05 maka, dapat disimpulkan bahwa terdapat pengaruh yang signifikan antar hasil pretest dan posttest. Hal tersebut memberikan implikasi bahwa permainan sirkuit pos geometri berpengaruh secara signifikan dalam menstimulasi motorik kasar anak.
title: Pengaruh Permainan Sirkuit Pos Geometri Terhadap Motorik Kasar Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effect of geometric post circuit games on gross motor skills in children aged years Gross motor skills have a positive impact on children's long-term lives. Geometric post circuit games are play activities that can stimulate children's gross motor development. So, to see the effect of geometric post circuit games on gross motor skills in children aged years, this study aims to determine the effect of geometric post circuit games on gross motor skills in children aged years. The method used in this study was a quasi experiment with one group pretest-posttest design. The research subjects involved children. Data collection techniques were carried out by means of observation and testing. The results of this study showed that there was an effect of geometric post circuit games on gross motor skills in children aged years. This was proven by the hypothesis test. The sig-tailed value was 1, which means sig. So it can be concluded that there is a significant influence between the pretest and posttest results. This implies that geometric post circuit games have a significant effect on stimulating children's gross motor skills.

desc: Implementasi pengembangan pembelajaran kinesthetic intelligence pada anak usia dini masih menunjukkan adanya permasalahan teknis dalam proses belajar mengajar. Studi ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis bagaimana permasalahan pengembangan kinesthetic intelligence dan solusi dalam meningkatkan minat belajar pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini bersifat deskriptif dengan pendekatan kualitatif melalui studi kasus pembelajaran kinestetik pada anak usia dini. Pengambilan data dilakukan melalui observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa permasalahan pembelajaran kinestetik pada anak usia dini adalah anak kurang semangat dalam belajar, cenderung pasif bergerak, less respond dan kurang percaya diri yang disebabkan kurang maksimalnya kreativitas guru dalam menggunakan metode pembelajaran, dan media pembelajaran yang variatif. Solusi dari permasalahan degradasi minat belajar anak usia dini adalah melalui kegiatan yang bersifat kolektif untuk membantu menstimulasi aspek perkembangan kinesthetic intelligence anak melalui kegiatan yang klasikal, seperti menari, menyusun straw, dan bermain peran. Kegiatan kolektif ini didukung oleh kreativitas guru, metode dan media belajar.
title: Kinesthetic Intelligence pada Anak Usia Dini: Permasalahan dan Solusinya
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Kinesthetic intelligence in early childhood problems and solutions Implementation of kinesthetic intelligence learning development in early childhood still shows technical problems in the teaching and learning process This study aims to analyze how the problems of kinesthetic intelligence development and solutions in increasing interest in learning in early childhood This study is descriptive with a qualitative approach through a case study of kinesthetic learning in early childhood Data collection was carried out through observation, interviews and documentation The results of the study showed that the problems of kinesthetic learning in early childhood are that children are less enthusiastic in learning, tend to be passive, move less respond and lack self-confidence which is caused by the lack of maximum teacher creativity in using varied learning methods and media The solution to the problem of degradation of interest in learning in early childhood is through collective activities to help stimulate aspects of the development of children's kinesthetic intelligence through classical activities such as dancing, stacking straws and role playing This collective activity is supported by the creativity of teachers, learning methods and media

desc: Penelitian ini akan mengungkap bagaimana kepemimpinan trasnsformasional melakukan perubahan dengan memberikan motivasi inspirasi agar menjadi prestasi nyata. Tujuan riset ini untuk menganalisis kepemimpinan transformasional dalam menumbuhkan motivasi insipirasi. Metode penelitian ini adalah kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Subyek dalam peneletian ini yaitu kepala sekolah, tata usaha, guru dan perwakilan orang tua siswa. Pengumpulan data menggunakan wawancara, dokumentasi dan observasi. Analisis data menggunakan teknik analisis Miles Huberman. Hasil riset membuktikan bahwa kepemimpinan trasnsformasional dalam menumbukan motivasi inspirasi dilakukan melalui penjabaran visi, misi sekolah untuk mencapai tujuan. Motivasi inspirasi dapat menumbuhkan semangat kerja kepada pendidik, tenaga pendidik, dan menciptakan berbagai macam inovasi, perubahan organisasi, untuk meningkatkan mutu pendidikan dalam rangka menjawab tuntutan masyarakat global
title: Kepemimpinan Transformasional dalam Menumbuhkan Motivasi Inspirasi pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: transformational leadership in fostering inspirational motivation in early childhood education this study will reveal how transformational leadership makes changes by providing inspirational motivation to become real achievements the purpose of this research is to analyze transformational leadership in fostering inspirational motivation this research method is qualitative with a case study approach the subjects in this study are the principal, administration, teachers and representatives of parents of students data collection using interviews documentation and observation data analysis using miles huberman analysis techniques the results of the research prove that transformational leadership in fostering inspirational motivation is carried out through the elaboration of the school's vision and mission to achieve goals inspirational motivation can foster work enthusiasm for educators and create various kinds of organizational change innovations to improve the quality of education in order to answer the demands of the global community

desc: This research is motivated by the preservation and implementation of religious values and local wisdom, it is a case study with a qualitative approach, where the data collected from observation and interviews. The results showed that the Al-Islam kemuhammadiyahan and local wisdom value had been described in the lesson plan and the learning implementation. The value of the Dewata Seuwae is a form of instilling faith in children by introducing Allah creation, the holy book, and the Prophet. The values of alempureng and amaccangang are instilled so that they are always honest. Agettengeng means adherence to principles and responsibility to the ummah, nation, and state. The value of aperrukeng is a child's primary asset for cooperation and a sense of caring for the people around them. This research proves that religion and culture can coexist harmoniously, and their values can be used in thematic Learning in early childhood
title: Thematic Learning in Kindergarten Based on Al-Islam Kemuhamadiyahan and Local Wisdom
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: thematic learning in kindergarten based on Alislam Kemuhammadiyahan and local wisdom this research is motivated by the preservation and implementation of religious values ​​and local wisdom. It is a case study with a qualitative approach where the data collected from observation and interviews the results showed that the Alislam Kemuhammadiyahan and local wisdom value has been described in the lesson plan and the learning implementation the value of the dewata seuwae is a form of instilling faith in children by introducing allah creation the holy book and the prophet the values ​​of alempureng and amaccangang are instilled so that they are always honest can coexist harmoniously and their values ​​can be used in thematic learning in early childhood

desc: Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk menghasilkan suatu media edukasi perlindungan anak untuk mengurangi perilaku kekerasan pada anak. Perlindungan anak merupakan permasalahan yang harus mendapatkan perhatian dari setiap pihak. Untuk meningkatkan perlindungan terhadap anak diperlukan suatu media edukasi yang dapat digunakan dengan mudah oleh setiap pihak, baik oleh orang tua, guru, maupun anak tersebut. Media edukasi yang dihasilkan dalam penelitian ini adalah dalam bentuk buku cerita bergambar. Berdasarkan hasil uji validasi oleh tiga orang ahli diperoleh hasil sebesar 95% dalam kategori sangat baik. Hasil uji lapangan pada 15 orang tua, 14 orang guru, dan 11 orang anak juga diketahui bahwa media edukasi buku bergambar sangat baik dan dapat dipahami dari segi cover, isi, dan tampilan buku cerita. berdasarkan hasil analisis data maka dapat disimpulkan bahwa buku cerita seri perlindungan anak sangat baik, sehingga dapat digunakan untuk meningkatkan pengetahuan orang tua, guru, dan anak tentang perlindungan anak sehingga dapat mengurangi perilaku kekerasan pada anak.
title: Pengembangan Media Edukasi Perlindungan Anak Untuk  Mengurangi Kekerasan Pada Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of child protection education media to reduce violence against children this study was conducted to produce a child protection education media to reduce violent behavior against children child protection is a problem that must receive attention from all parties to improve protection against children an educational media is needed that can be used easily by all parties both by parents teachers and children the educational media produced in this study is in the form of a picture story book based on the results of the validation test by three experts obtained results in the very good category the results of the field test on parents teachers and children it is also known that the picture book education media is very good and can be understood in terms of the cover content and appearance of the story book based on the results of the data analysis it can be concluded that the child protection series story book is very good so that it can be used to increase the knowledge of parents teachers and children about child protection so that it can reduce violent behavior against children

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh antara metode pembelajaran mind map dan gaya kognitif independen dependen terhadap kemampuan membaca permulaan. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitiann kuantitatif, metode yang digunakan adalah metode eksperimen dengan menggunakan desain faktorial 2x2. Penelitian ini menggunakan randomisasi untuk menentukan subjek penelitian untuk kelompok eksperimen dan kelompok kontrol. Populasi penelitian adalah anak TK kelompok B. Data penelitian diperoleh dari hasil observasi yang dilakukan dengan menggunakan lembar instrumen, kemudian data yang diperoleh di analisis. Dalam pengujian hipotesis menggunakan analisis varian anava dua jalur. Hasil penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa metode pembelajaran dan gaya kognitif dapat mempengaruhi kemampuan membaca permulaan. Terdapat interaksi yang signifikan antara penerapan metode pembelajaran dan gaya kognitif dalam menentukan kemampuan membaca permulaan.
title: Metode Pembelajaran Mind Map dan Bercerita dengan Gaya Kognitif, Pengaruhnya terhadap Kemampuan Membaca Permulaan
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: mind map learning method and storytelling with cognitive style its influence on early reading ability this study aims to determine the influence between mind map learning method and independent dependent cognitive style on early reading ability this study is a quantitative study the method used is an experimental method using factorial design x this study uses randomization to determine the research subjects for the experimental group and the control group the research population is kindergarten children group b research data is obtained from the results of observations carried out using instrument sheets then the data obtained is analyzed in hypothesis testing using two-way ANOVA variance analysis the results of the study reveal that learning methods and cognitive styles can affect early reading ability there is a significant interaction between the application of learning methods and cognitive styles in determining early reading ability

desc: Motivasi dan komitmen guru PAUD untuk tetap berjuang dalam kondisi penuh tantangan ini salah satunya dipengaruhi oleh tingkat flourishing, perkembangan dan pertumbuhan optimal individu dalam berbagai aspek kehidupan mereka, termasuk kesejahteraan spiritual, emosional, psikologis, dan sosial. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk menggali nilai yang melandasi komitmen mengajar guru PAUD untuk dihubungkan dengan konseptualisasi flourishing. Pendekatan fenomenologi yang merupakan bagian dari metode kualitatif digunakan dalam penelitian ini. Subjek penelitian merupakan 25 orang guru PAUD yang masih aktif mengajar dan telah mengajar minimal selama 10 tahun. Hasil menunjukan bahwa guru PAUD menunjukkan komitmen dan motivasi untuk tetap bertahan menjadi guru PAUD terlepas dari rendahnya pendapatan yang diperoleh. Nilai-nilai yang melandasi komitmen dan motivasi tersebut dapat digambarkan dengan kesejahteraan yang menggabungkan komponen sosial, psikologis, spiritual, dan emosional yang merupakan aspek dari flourishing. Flourishing pada guru PAUD akan meningkatkan lingkungan belajar, motivasi, dan pertumbuhan profesional bagi siswa maupun guru. Dengan demikian, institusi pendidikan harus memprioritaskan
title: Flourishing Guru: Kunci Motivasi dan Komitmen Mengajar Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: flourishing teachers key motivation and commitment to teaching early childhood education teachers motivation and commitment of early childhood education teachers to continue to struggle in these challenging conditions is influenced by the level of flourishing optimal development and growth of individuals in various aspects of their lives including spiritual emotional psychological and social well-being the purpose of this study is to explore the values ​​that underlie the commitment to teaching early childhood education teachers to be connected with the conceptualization of flourishing the phenomenological approach which is part of the qualitative method used in this study the subjects of the study were early childhood education teachers who were still actively teaching and had been teaching for at least years the results showed that early childhood education teachers showed commitment and motivation to remain as early childhood education teachers regardless of the low income they received the values ​​that underlie this commitment and motivation can be described as well-being that combines social psychological spiritual and emotional components which are aspects of flourishing flourishing in early childhood education teachers will improve the learning environment motivation and professional growth for students and teachers thus educational institutions must prioritize

desc: Kurikulum Merdeka secara tiba-tiba menjadi menu wajib pada organisasi pendidikan, yang mana realita dalam implementasinya kurangnya sosialisasi, pelatihan, dan buku. Hal tersebut berimbas pada tuntutan terhadap kepala sekolah, yang harus berperan aktif dan kreatif yang menggali informasi dan belajar melaksanakan. Sebagai nahkoda oraganisasi pendidikan khususnya Sekolah Dasar (SD), kepala sekolah tentunya menjadi faktor penting pada pelaksanaan kurikulum ini. Hal tersebut yang mendasari penelitian ini, dengan cara menganalisis gaya kepemimpinannya dalam proses pelaksanaan kurikukum baru ini. Metode penelitian ini yaitu inkuiri naturalistik yang mana melibatkan kepala sekolah, guru dan tenaga kependidikan di Sekolah Dasar yang telah melaksanakan kurikulum merdeka belajar. Data dikumpulkan melalui wawancara, observasi serta dokumentasi. Kemudian melakukan kegiatan analisis melalui pengumpulan data, Reduksi Data, Penyajian Data, dan Kesimpulan. Hasil Penelitian menunjukkan bahwa gaya kepemimpinan yang digunakan, adalah gaya kepemimpinan demokratis, dengannya tercipta model hubungan interpersonal yang baik, dan pimpinan lebih berorientasi pada tugas dan bawahan. Hal tersebut berpengaruh pada implementasi bawahanya, yang berimbas pada terlaksaksananya dengan baik kurikulum merdeka.
title: Gaya Kepemimpinan Kepala Sekolah dalam Pelaksanaan Kurikulum Merdeka Belajar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The principal's leadership style in implementing the independent learning curriculum The independent curriculum suddenly became a mandatory menu in educational organizations where the reality in its implementation was the lack of socialization of training and books. This had an impact on the demands on the principal who had to play an active and creative role in exploring information and learning to implement as the captain of the educational organization, especially elementary schools. The principal is certainly an important factor in the implementation of this curriculum. This is what underlies this research by analyzing his leadership style in the process of implementing this new curriculum. This research method is a naturalistic inquiry which involves the principal, teachers and education personnel in elementary schools who have implemented the independent learning curriculum. Data was collected through interviews, observations and documentation, then carried out analysis activities through data collection, data reduction, data presentation and conclusions. The results of the study showed that the leadership style used was a democratic leadership style with which a good interpersonal relationship model was created and the leader was more oriented towards tasks and subordinates. This influenced the implementation of his subordinates which had an impact on the implementation of the independent curriculum properly.

desc: Kinerja guru dalam melakukan tugas dan tanggung jawab akan memberikan dampak yang besar terhadap tercapainya tujuan sebuah lembaga pendidikan. Tujuan tersebut akan tercapai jika kinerja kerja tersebut dipengaruhi gaya kepemimpinan kepala sekolah. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui kinerja guru pendidikan anak usia dini ditinjau dari gaya kepemimpinan kepala sekolah dan motivasi kerja. Adapun sampel pada penelitian ini yakni 56 orang guru Pendidikan anak usia dini di kota bandar lampung. Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan metode kuantitatif dengan melihat pengaruh dari variabel yang diteliti. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah kuisioner, dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan pada penelitian ini adalah regresi linier berganda. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa gaya kepemimpinan kepala sekolah dan motivasi kerja guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD) secara bersama-sama berpengaruh positif dan signifikan terhadap kinerja guru. Semakin tepat gaya kepemimpinan yang diterapkan, maka kinerja para guru akan semakin baik. Kinerja guru dapat ditingkatkan ketika para guru mempunyai motivasi kerja yang lebih baik
title: Kinerja Guru Ditinjau dari Gaya Kepemimpinan Kepala Sekolah dan Motivasi Kerja
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teacher performance in terms of the principal's leadership style and work motivation Teacher performance in carrying out tasks and responsibilities will have a major impact on achieving the goals of an educational institution. These goals will be achieved if the work performance is influenced by the principal's leadership style. This study aims to determine the performance of early childhood education teachers in terms of the principal's leadership style and work motivation. The sample in this study was early childhood education teachers in the city of Bandar Lampung. This study was conducted using a quantitative method by looking at the influence of the variables studied. The data collection technique used was a questionnaire and documentation. The data analysis technique used in this study was multiple linear regression. The results of the study showed that the principal's leadership style and the work motivation of early childhood education teachers simultaneously had a positive and significant effect on teacher performance. The more appropriate the leadership style applied, the better the performance of the teachers. Teacher performance can be improved when teachers have better work motivation.

desc: Perkembangan anak usia dini termasuk dalam kategori rendah. Tujuan penelitian ini melihat gambaran lingkungan sosial masyarakat, perilaku sosial anak usia dini, dan hubungan kedua variabel. Jenis penelitian ini ialah penelitian korelasional. Populasi penelitian ini adalah 68 orang dan 60% sampel diambil dengan menggunakan teknik stratified random sample. Alat pengumpulan data menggunakan angket dan teknik analisis menggunakan rumus persentase dan product moment. Hasil di temukan bahwa terdapat hubungan yang signifikan antara lingkungan sosial masyarakat dengan perilaku sosial anak. Dampak dari perilaku sosial, anak menjadi agresif, emosional, dan rendah diri. Anak usia dini perlu meningkatkan perilaku terhadap lingkungan sosial di masyarakat dengan pengawasan orang tua.
title: Hubungan Lingkungan Sosial Masyarakat dengan Perilaku Sosial Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The relationship between the social environment of society and the social behavior of early childhood children. The development of early childhood is included in the low category. The purpose of this study is to see the description of the social environment of society, the social behavior of early childhood children and the relationship between the two variables. This type of research is correlational research. The population of this study is people and the sample was taken using the stratified random sample technique. Data collection tools use questionnaires and analysis techniques using percentage and product moment formulas. The results found that there is a significant relationship between the social environment of society and children's social behavior. The impact of children's social behavior is aggressive, emotional and low self-esteem. Early childhood needs to improve behavior towards the social environment in society with parental supervision.

desc: Penanaman literasi budaya dan kreativitas melalui pembelajaran tari untuk lebih mencintai kebudayaannya sendiri bagi anak usia dini. Untuk itu, tujuan artikel ini, menjelaskan proses penanaman literasi tari dan kreativitas melalui pembelajaran tari pada anak usia dini. Motede penelitian ini kualitatif, pengumpulan data yang dilakukan dengan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Analisis dilakukan selama proses pengumpulan data dengan menarik kesimpulan dari fokus penelitian. Hasil yang ditemukan proses penananaman literasi tari melalui pembelajaran tari, anak menjadi lebih memahami berbagai gerak dan lagu-lagu daerah, menghargai berupa melakukan gerak dan menyanyikan lagu daerah lain, melakukan analisis terutama berkaitan dengan teknik, secara tidak disadari bagi anak telah menerapkan pengetahuan tentang kebudayaan dalam kehidupannya. Hasil penelitian berkaitan dengan kreativitas, bagi anak usia dini menjadi terampil dan lancar dalam menari, luwes, pengekspresian, dan keterampilan merinci urutan gerak, serta kemampuan berimajinasi
title: Strategi Penanaman Literasi Budaya dan Kreativitas bagi Anak Usia Dini melalui Pembelajaran Tari
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strategy of instilling cultural literacy and creativity for early childhood through dance learning instilling cultural literacy and creativity through dance learning to love their own culture more for early childhood for that purpose this article explains the process of instilling dance literacy and creativity through dance learning in early childhood this research method is qualitative data collection conducted by observation interviews and documentation analysis conducted during the data collection process by drawing conclusions from the focus of the research the results found the process of instilling dance literacy through dance learning children become more understanding of various movements and regional songs appreciate in the form of doing movements and singing other regional songs conduct analysis especially related to techniques unconsciously for children have applied knowledge about culture in their lives research results related to creativity for early childhood become skilled and fluent in dancing flexible expression and skills detailing the sequence of movements and the ability to imagine

desc: Kemampuan lambang bilangan bagi anak usia dini penting dirangsang untuk memahami konsep matematika dijenjang pendidik selanjutnya. Akan tetapi pemahaman guru dalam mengajarkan matematika yang baik dan tepat masih kurang, sehingga dilakukan penelitian terkait dengan konsep bilangan terhadap pendekatan open-ended sebagai metode pembelajaran anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah kuasi eksperimen dengan sampel penelitian adalah anak-anak dari kelas A yang terbagi menjadi dua kelas dengan menggunakan lembar observasi sebagai teknik pengumpulan data yang kemudian dianalisis dengan menggunakan uji t. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan data pre-test pada dua kelas memiliki kemampuan yang sama. Setelah diberikan treatment dan dilakukan post-test diperoleh perhitungan uji statistik menggunakan t-test bahwa terdapat perbedaan konsep bilangan anak usia dini setelah diberikan pembelajaran dengan pendekatan open-ended, sehingga anak usia dini mampu menyelesaikan konsep bilangan matematika yang bersifat abstrak melalui pembelajaran yang terbuka dengan memberikan kesempatan kepada anak dalam memecahkan masalah sendiri.
title: Pendekatan Open-Ended dalam Mempengaruhi Kemampuan Mengenal Konsep Bilangan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: through open learning by giving children the opportunity to solve their own problems

desc: Attitude is an aspect that needs attention because it is a polemic problem in children today. This article aims to initiate the concept of art learning as a social emotional learning program. It can be said that art education has a further meaning than just a process of transferring knowledge and skills, but art education can be used as an effort to develop Emotional Intelligence (EQ) and Intellectual (IQ) this is because art education itself is based on mental (moral), analysis, and synthesis, besides that art is seen as having the essential value to touch one's emotional plain. Literature review is the method in this research with data collection techniques from keyword searches: (1) social emotional learning and (2) art learning for children through Google Scholar. The results of the study found that social emotional learning through art education is seen as something interesting and crucial to be studied and further formulated into a formulation, where the concepts of Art Learning and Social Emotional Learning are used as a foothold and then analyzed, and led to the finding that art learning can be used as a social emotional learning program to be able to improve the five domains of children's social emotional competence. This research has implications for children's social emotional development including awareness and appreciation skills as a form of affection that can be applied later in social life.
title: Art Learning for Children as a Social Emotional Learning Program
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: art learning for children as a social emotional learning program attitude is an aspect that needs attention because it is a polemic problem in children today this article aims to initiate the concept of art learning as a social emotional learning program it can be said that art education has a further meaning than just a process of transferring knowledge and skills but art education can be used as an effort to develop emotional intelligence eq and intellectual iq this is because art education itself is based on mental moral analysis and synthesis besides that art is seen as having the essential value to touch ones emotional plain literature review is the method in this research with data collection techniques from keyword searches social emotional learning and art learning for children through google scholar the results of the study found that social emotional learning through art education is seen as something interesting and crucial to be studied and further formulated into a formulation where the concepts of art learning and social emotional learning are used as a foothold and then analyzed and led to the finding that art learning can be used as a social emotional learning program to be able to improve the five domains of children's social emotional competence this research has implications for children's social emotional development including awareness and appreciation of skills as a form of affection that can be applied later in social life

desc: Early childhood is a period that requires guidance and development of self-development in order to train independence. However, training independence in early childhood cannot be done carelessly and must start from small things. This study aims to examine efforts to train early childhood independence through the "I Can" program based on self-accustoming at Sinar Harapan Kindergarten, Kedopok, Probolinggo. This research uses a descriptive qualitative approach with a case study type to examine the program. After the data were collected through interviews and observations, the data analysis techniques were data reduction, data display, and data verification. The results showed that the "Aku Bisa" program consisted of routine activities carried out from the time students arrived at school until the time of learning was over and evaluation with the parents of students every two months. The implication is that efforts to train children's independence will be successful if parents also support program activities and monitor their development
title: The "Aku Bisa" Program; Efforts to Train Early Childhood Independence
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the I can program efforts to train early childhood independence early childhood is a period that requires guidance and development of selfdevelopment in order to train independence however training independence in early childhood cannot be done carelessly and must start from small things this study aims to examine efforts to train early childhood independence through the i can program based on self-accustoming at Sinar Harapan Kindergarten Kedopok Probolinggo This research uses a descriptive qualitative approach with a case study type to examine the program after the data were collected through interviews and observing the data analysis techniques were data reduction data display and data verification the results showed that the I can program consisting of routine activities carried out from the time students arrived at school until the time of learning was over and evaluated with the parents of students every two months the implication is that efforts to train children's independence will be successful if parents also support program activities and monitor their development

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis strategi kegiatan ekstrakurikuler pramuka dalam membentuk karakter peserta didik. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif, data dikumpulkan melalui observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Data kemudian dianalisis dengan tahapan reduksi data, penyajian data, verifikasi dan kesimpulan. Penelitian ini dilakukan selama 6 bulan mulai bulan April-September 2019 dengan informan guru dan peserta didik. Lokasi penelitian ini adalah SDN 1 Talaga dan SDN 2 Talaga. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa perencanaan kegiatan ekstrakurikuler pramuka dalam membentuk karakter peserta didik memuat pengetahuan dan keterampilan kepramukaan dengan perencanaan jangka panjang dan jangka pendek. Kemudian pelaksanaan kegiatan ekstrakurikuler pramuka dalam membentuk karakter peserta didik terbagi atas pengetahuan dan ketereampilan atau tehnik kepramukaan. Selanjutnya evaluasi kegiatan ekstrakurikuler pramuka dalam membentuk karakter peserta didik terbagi atas evaluasi bagi peserta didik dan evaluasi bagi pembinanya dalam hal ini guru-guru
title: Membentuk Karakter melalui Kegiatan Ekstrakurikuler Pramuka pada Anak Usia 6-8 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: character building through scouting extracurricular activities for children aged years This study aims to analyze the strategy of scouting extracurricular activities in shaping the character of students This study is a qualitative study Data was collected through observation Interviews and data documentation then analyzed with the stages of data reduction Data presentation Verification and conclusions This study was conducted during the months starting from April September with teacher and student informants The location of this study was SDN Talaga and SDN Talaga The results of the study showed that the planning of scouting extracurricular activities in shaping the character of students includes scouting knowledge and skills with long-term and short-term planning Then the implementation of scouting extracurricular activities in shaping the character of students is divided into knowledge and skills or scouting techniques Then the evaluation of scouting extracurricular activities in shaping the character of students is divided into evaluation for students and evaluation for their mentors in this case teachers

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini dilakukan adalah menganalisis perkembangan penelitian mengenai Pengenalan rambu lalu lintas pada anak usia dini dan dampak pengenalan rambu lalu lintas terhadap tingkat disiplin seseorang dalam berkendaraan di masa akan datang. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam artikel ini adalah pendekatan VOSviewer bibliometrik, dan untuk mencari dan mengambil metadatanya menggunakan aplikasi Publish or Perish (PoP) versi 7.31. kemudian data dianalisis secara deskriptif berdasarkan tahun terbit publikasi, nama publisher, produktivitas peneliti, dan ranking jurnal. Hasil dari penelitian ini adalah masih jarangnya penelitian yang membahas topik pengenalan rambu lalu lintas pada anak usia dini khususnya di Indonesia menurut perspektif ilmu transportasi. Harapannya bila sudah ditanamkan kesadaran berlalu lintas maka ketika anak berusia 17 tahun atau pada umur anak boleh menggunakan kendaraan, mereka akan memahami tentang berlalu lintas dengan catatan program edukasi pengenalan rambu lalu lintas telah diintegrasikan ke dalam program pendidikan anak usia dini guna mendorong perilaku aman dan bertanggung jawab di jalan raya.
title: Pengenalan Rambu Lalu Lintas pada Anak Usia Dini: Pendekatan Metode Vosviewer dalam Kajian Literatur Sistematis
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Introduction to traffic signs in early childhood using the Vosviewer method approach in a systematic literature review The purpose of this study was to analyze the development of research on the introduction of traffic signs in early childhood and the impact of introducing traffic signs on a person's level of discipline in driving in the future The research method used in this article is the Vosviewer bibliometric approach and to search for and retrieve metadata using the publish or perishpop version application, then the data was analyzed descriptively based on the year of publication, publisher name, researcher productivity and journal ranking The results of this study are that there is still a lack of research discussing the topic of introducing traffic signs in early childhood, especially in Indonesia. According to the perspective of transportation science, it is hoped that if traffic awareness has been instilled, then when children are years old or at the age when children are allowed to use vehicles, they will understand about traffic, with the note that the traffic sign introduction education program has been integrated into the early childhood education program to encourage safe and responsible behavior on the highway

desc: Penelitian kualitatif deskriptif ini memiliki tujuan untuk menganalisis kemampuan berpikir logis AUD melalui permainan Montessori ditinjau dari gender, yang melibatkan 16 siswa TK dari 8 sekolah yang ada di Kabupaten Aceh Tengah. Data dalam penelitian ini diperoleh melalui tes, observasi dan wawancara. Analisis data dilakukan dengan cara transkrip data, reduksi data, validasi atau triangulasi data, penyajian data dan penarikan kesimpulan. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian diketahui bahwa kemampuan berpikir logis dan simbolik siswa berada pada level Berkembang Sesuai Harapan. Pada indikator mengenal perbedaan berdasarkan ukuran “lebih dari”, “kurang dari” dan “paling/ter”, siswa laki-laki berada pada level Berkembang Sangat Baik dan siswa perempuan pada level Berkembang Sesuai Harapan. Pada indikator mengklasifikasikan benda berdasarkan warna, bentuk dan ukuran (3 variasi), siswa laki-laki berada pada level Berkembang Sesuai Harapan dan siswa perempuan pada level Mulai Berkembang. Pada indikator mengurutkan benda berdasarkan ukuran dari paling kecil ke paling besar atau sebaliknya, serta mengenal pola ABCD-ABCD, baik siswa laki-laki maupun siswa perempuan berada pada level Berkembang Sesuai Harapan dan Mulai Berkembang
title: Analisis Kemampuan Berpikir Logis Anak Usia Dini melalui Permainan Montessori
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of logical thinking skills of early childhood through Montessori games This descriptive qualitative research aims to analyze the logical thinking skills of children through Montessori games in terms of gender involving kindergarten students from schools in Central Aceh district. Data in this study were obtained through observation tests and interviews. Data analysis was carried out by means of data transcription, data reduction, validation or triangulation of data. Data presentation and drawing conclusions based on the results of the study, it is known that students' logical and symbolic thinking skills are at a developing level according to expectations on the indicator of recognizing differences based on size more than less than and most. Male students are at a very well developed level and female students are at a developing level according to expectations on the indicator of classifying objects based on color, shape and size. Variations. Male students are at a developing level according to expectations and female students are at a starting level of development on the indicator of sorting objects by size from smallest to largest or vice versa and recognizing the ABCDABCD pattern. Both male and female students are at a developing level according to expectations and starting to develop.

desc: Gamifikasi memberikan ruang pembelajaran baru dalam pendidikan STEAM terhadap para akademisi dan praktisi pendidikan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjelaskan persepsi dari kalangan pendidik terhadap gamifikasi pembelajaran sebagai kebutuhan yang diterapkan pada multidisiplin ilmu. Penelitian ini menerapkan metode kualitatif dengan analisis deskriptif. Alur penelitian yang dilakukan adalah penyebaran kuisoner, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Subjek penelitian ini adalah mahasiswa pendidikan dasar dengan jumlah 13 responden. Hasil penelitian yang diungkapkan terdapat persetujuan tentang kebutuhan gamifikasi sebagai sebuah inovasi penerapan pendidikan STEAM. Tiga Elemen gamifikasi yang teridentifikasi dalam pendidikan STEAM dapat dilakukan dalam dengan menyesuaikan kompetensi guru dan karakteristik peserta didik. Jenis permainan yang menggunakan gamifikasi pembelajaran dalam pendidikan STEAM adalah dengan digitalisasi atau media pembelajaran konkrit. Upaya pengembangan bakat dan minat dapat diimplementasikan dengan rencana pembelajaran berbasis multidisiplin ilmu yang diterapkan pada permainan minecraft. Kebutuhan pembelajaran di era abad 21 menurut persepsi mahasiswa bidang pendidikan digitalisasi akan mendukung indeks kinerja utama perguruan tinggi.
title: Persepsi Mahasiswa Pendidikan Dasar terhadap Gamifikasi dalam Pendidikan STEAM
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: perception of elementary education students towards gamification in steam education gamification provides new learning space in steam education for academics and education practitioners this study aims to explain the perception of educators towards gamification of learning as a need applied to multidisciplinary science this study applies qualitative methods with descriptive analysis the research flow carried out is the distribution of questionnaires interviews and documentation the subjects of this study are elementary education students with the number of respondents the results of the study revealed there was agreement on the need for gamification as an innovation in the application of steam education three elements of gamification identified in steam education can be done in by adjusting teacher competence and student characteristics the type of game that uses gamification of learning in steam education is by digitalization or concrete learning media efforts to develop talents and interests can be implemented with a multidisciplinary-based learning plan applied to the minecraft game learning needs in the 21st century era according to the perception of students in the field of digital education will support the main performance index of higher education

desc: Pendidikan karakter perlu ditanamkan mulai dari usia dini, nilai-nilai pendidikan karakter dapat diperoleh dari cerita rakyat yang ada di Indonesia khususnya di daerah Minahasa. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk: menganalisis cerita rakyat Minahasa yang digunakan dalam penanaman nilai pendidikan karakter. Penelitian menggunakan penelitian kualitatif dengan metode penelitian deskriptif di PAUD Anggrek Kelurahan Malalayang Barat. Peneliti sebagai instrumen kunci, dan pengambilan data dilakukan dengan wawancara kepada guru-guru PAUD. Teknik analisis data: membuat transkrip hasil wawancara, mengklasifikasikan data berdasarkan fokus penelitian, penemuan makna, dan  pengujian keabsahan. Penemuan dalam hasil penelitian adalah terdapat beberapa cerita rakyat Minahasa yang dapat digunakan dalam penanaman nilai karakter, nilai karakter di antaranya meningkatkan keimanan dan ketaqwaan kepada Tuhan yang Maha Esa, menghormati orang tua, dan peduli lingkungan, kegiatan pembiasaan yang dapat dilakukan untuk mendukung penanaman pendidikan karakter dengan beribadah secara teratur, bertutur kata dengan sopan dan santun, dan merawat tanaman dan hidup bersih.
title: Penanaman Nilai Pendidikan Karakter dari Cerita Rakyat Minahasa melalui Pembiasaan Perilaku Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
