data_cleaned: instilling character education values ​​from Minahasa folklore through early childhood behavioral habits character education needs to be instilled from an early age character education values ​​can be obtained from folklore in Indonesia, especially in the Minahasa region this study aims to analyze Minahasa folklore used in instilling character education values ​​the study used qualitative research with descriptive research methods at Paud Anggrek, West Malalayang Village the researcher as the key instrument and data collection was carried out by interviewing Paud teachers data analysis techniques made transcripts of interview results classified data based on research focus discovery of meaning and testing the validity of findings in the results of the study are that there are several Minahasa folklore that can be used in instilling character values ​​character values ​​include increasing faith and piety to God Almighty respecting parents and caring for the environment habituation activities that can be carried out to support the instillation of character education by worshiping regularly speaking politely and courteously and caring for plants and living clean

desc: Penguasaan bahasa anak usia usia dini dapat bervariasi terutama saat mengenal huruf hijaiyah sebagai huruf Arab yang dipergunakan Indonesia menjadi bahasa kedua. Pemahaman huruf hijaiyah melalui metode iqro’ oleh guru terhadap anak usia dini di TK Al Huda Laweyan Surakarta. Riset berikut dijalankan berbentuk riset kualitatif yang sifatnya deskriptif. Tujuan riset berikut ialah guna mendapatkan data perihal kapabilitas dalam mengenali huruf hijaiyah anak usia dini lewat pembelajaran Iqro yang tengah dilangsungkan serta peranan orang tua dalam mendukung pemahaman bahasa lewat metode pembelajaran tersebut. Implementasi metode iqro' pengajar ketika pengenalan huruf hijaiyah terhadap anak usia dini terdiri dari anak melafalkan ataupun membaca huruf hijaiyah satu per satu di bawah bimbingan pengajar memakai buku iqro.
title: Strategi Guru dalam Meningkatkan Kemampuan Membaca Huruf Hijaiyah Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teacher strategies in improving the ability to read the hijaiyah letters of early childhood children's language mastery can vary, especially when recognizing the hijaiyah letters as Arabic letters used in Indonesia as a second language. Understanding the hijaiyah letters through the iqro method by teachers for early childhood children at TK Al Huda Laweyan Surakarta. The following research was carried out in the form of qualitative research which is descriptive in nature. The purpose of the following research is to obtain data regarding the ability to recognize the hijaiyah letters of early childhood children through the ongoing iqro learning and the role of parents in supporting language understanding through this learning method. The implementation of the iqro method by teachers when introducing the hijaiyah letters to early childhood children consists of children reciting or reading the hijaiyah letters one by one under the guidance of teachers using the iqro book.

desc: Tujuan dari peneltian adalah mengetahui kendala orangtua dalam mendidik AUD pada saat pandemic covid-19. Pendekatan penelitian menggunakan kuantitatif dengan metode servey. Populasi nya adalah orangtua yang memiliki AUD Usia 3-7 tahun. Pengumpulan data menggunakan angket di sebar secara online melalui whatapps dengan bantuan google form. Instrument penelitian merupakan turunan dari teori. Sampel yang digunakan 54 orangtua dari Provinsi DIY, Jawa Tengah dan Jawa Barat. Hasil Penelitian adalah kendala orangtua di pengaruhi faktor eksternal dan internal dalam mendidik anak. Faktor internal kendala yang dihadapi orangtua adalah kecapakan dalam hal mendidik anak dan kendala faktor eksternal yang dihadapi oleh orangtua adalah media pembelajaran. Maka perlu solusi dalam memberikan kecapakan kepada orangtua baik dari pemerintah maupun sekolah serta penggunaan media yang ada disekitar orangtua dan AUD agar dapat melakukan pendidikan secara efektif tanpa kendala pada masa pandemic Covid-19 yang mampu menjawab tantangan di era globalisasi
title: Kendala Orang Tua dalam Mendidik Anak Usia Dini pada Saat Pandemi Covid 19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Obstacles of parents in educating early childhood during the Covid pandemic The purpose of the study was to determine the obstacles of parents in educating early childhood during the Covid pandemic The research approach used quantitative methods with survey methods The population was parents who had early childhood education aged 18-24 years Data collection using questionnaires distributed online via WhatsApp with the help of Google Form The research instrument is a derivative of the sample theory used by parents from the provinces of DIY, Central Java and West Java The results of the study are that parental obstacles are influenced by external and internal factors in educating children Internal factors The obstacles faced by parents are the ability to educate children and the external factor obstacles faced by parents are learning media So a solution is needed to provide skills to parents from both the government and schools as well as the use of media around parents and early childhood education so that they can carry out education effectively without obstacles during the Covid pandemic which is able to answer challenges in the era of globalization

desc: Menumbuhkan kepribadian religious melalui pembiasaan morning activity akan bermuara pada terbentuknya kepribadian religius. Penelitian ini secara khusus bertujuan untuk menganalisis proses pembelajaran pendidikan anak usia dini melalui pembiasaan morning activity untuk penanaman nilai-nilai karakter religious di Paud Tiga Bahasa Nailun Nabhan. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian lapangan dengan menggunakan pendekatan naratif kualitatif. Subjek dipilih menggunakan sampel yang ditargetkan. Dalam penelitian ini metode observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi digunakan untuk pengumpulan data. Hasil  penelitian ini menunjukkan 1) alur kegiatan morning activity melalui pembiasaan setiap pagi sebelum pelajaran inti dilakukan melakukan pembacaan doa sehari-hari, hadits dan surah-surah pendek; 2. karakter yang berkembang dari pembiasaan tersebut yaitu:  jujur, disiplin, dan mandiri sehingga dapat disimpulkan bahwa penanaman nilai karakter melalui morning activity menjadi agen yang membantu pembentukan karakter religius yakni: jujur, disiplin dan mandiri
title: Penanaman Nilai Karakter Religius  melalui Pembiasan Morning Activity pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: instilling religious character values ​​through morning activity habits in early childhood fostering a religious personality through morning activity habits will lead to the formation of a religious personality this study specifically aims to analyze the learning process of early childhood education through morning activity habits for instilling religious character values ​​in three-language PAUD Nailun Nabhan this study is a field study using a qualitative narrative approach subjects were selected using targeted samples in this study observation methods interviews and documentation were used to collect data the results of this study show the flow of morning activity activities through habits every morning before the core lesson is carried out reading daily prayers hadiths and short surahs the character that develops from these habits is honest discipline and independence so it can be concluded that instilling character values ​​through morning activity becomes an agent that helps form religious character namely honest discipline and independence

desc: Gerakan radikalisme terus berkembang dan merambah pada kalangan anak usia dini. Polemik radikalisme pada anak usia dini juga muncul di lembaga formal. Penataan pendidikan harus dilakukan dengan sungguh-sungguh melalui penguatan Islam yang moderat pada anak sejak dini agar terhindar dari paham radikal. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui bagaiaman upaya penguatan moderasi beragama pada anak usia dini sebagai upaya pencegahan radikalisme. Metode penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian kualitatif deskriptif. Teknik pengumpulan data adalah observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah model Miles dan Huberman yakni reduksi data, display, dan verifikasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa penguatan moderasi beragama pada anak usia dini meliputi empat aspek moderasi beragama yaitu penanaman komitmen kebangsaan, penguatan toleransi, anti kekerasan, dan pengenalan dan pelestarian kebudayaan lokal. Menguatkan moderasi beragama perlu diajarkan pada anak sejak dini agar anak mampu memiliki sifat-sifat moderat dan mencegah terjadinya radikalisme di masa yang akan datang.
title: Penguatan Moderasi Beragama pada Anak Usia Dini sebagai Upaya Pencegahan Radikalisme di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Strengthening religious moderation in early childhood as an effort to prevent radicalism during the Covid pandemic, radicalism movements continue to grow and spread to early childhood, the polemic of radicalism in early childhood also appears in formal institutions, educational arrangements must be carried out seriously through strengthening moderate Islam in children from an early age to avoid radicalism, the purpose of this study is to find out how to strengthen religious moderation in early childhood as an effort to prevent radicalism, this research method uses descriptive qualitative research, data collection techniques are observation, interviews and documentation, data analysis techniques used are the miles and huberman model, namely data reduction, display and verification, the results of the study show that strengthening religious moderation in early childhood includes four aspects of religious moderation, namely instilling a national commitment, strengthening tolerance, anti-violence and introducing and preserving local culture, strengthening religious moderation needs to be taught to children from an early age so that children are able to have moderate characteristics and prevent radicalism in the future

desc: Perkembangan bahasa sangat penting untuk anak, anak mampu saling berhubungan dengan orang lain, berbagi ungkapan yang dirasakan oleh anak, dan dapat mengekspresikan perasaannya,  dalam pengembangan pengetahuan dan keterampilan bahasanya. Tanpa bahasa, anak tidak dapat berinteraksi dengan kelompok sosialnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui  guru dalam mengembangkan bahasa anak usia 5-6 tahun. Metode dalam penelitian ini yaitu metode tanya-jawab. Adapun hasil penelitian yaitu (1) guru telah dapat memperkirakan alokasi waktu yang tepat yang digunakan untuk menerapkan metode tanya jawab dalam menggunakan bahasa keseharian anak; (2) guru telah menggunakan media boneka tangan sesuai dengan isi ceritanya; (3) guru memusatkan perhatian seperti bertepuk tangan, bernyanyi dan menggunakan suara khas yang menarik; (4) guru mengembangkan bahasa anak dalam menghargai bacaan menggunakan boneka tangan; (5) guru saat menggunakan boneka tangan menggunakan variasi suara, gerakan dan ekspresi wajah; (6) guru mengkomunikasikan secara lisan dari kegiatan tanya jawab menggunakan bahasa keseharian; (7) guru melakukan recalling terhadap anak untuk memperoleh capaian pembelajaran.
title: Metode Tanya Jawab dengan Media Boneka Tangan untuk Mengembangkan Bahasa Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Question and answer method with hand puppet media to develop early childhood language language development is very important for children to be able to relate to others share expressions felt by children and can express their feelings in developing their knowledge and language skills without language children cannot interact with their social groups this study aims to find out teachers in developing the language of children aged years the method in this study is the question and answer method the results of the study are that teachers have been able to estimate the right time allocation used to apply the question and answer method in using children's everyday language teachers have used hand puppet media according to the content of the story teachers focus attention such as clapping singing and using a distinctive voice that is interesting teachers develop children's language in appreciating reading using hand puppets teachers when using hand puppets use variations in voice movements and facial expressions teachers communicate verbally from question and answer activities using everyday language teachers do recalling to children to obtain learning outcomes

desc: Playing mathematics in early childhood based on semiotics gives children the opportunity to identify objects, look for signs and interpret signs so that they can solve problems in games. This study aims to describe semiotic based early childhood mathematics play activities. The research was conducted at the PAUD Lab School, Muhammadiyah University of Jember. The research subjects were 5 children from group B. The results showed that the activities of playing mathematics in early childhood based on semiotics were (1) collecting information related to semiotic-based math games, (2) looking for objects that matched the game and counting the number of objects found, (3) looking for relevant signs and signs. that are relevant to the number of objects found, (4) associated with signs of knowledge that have been previously possessed and look for all signs according to the objects found, (5) the child retells the play that has been done
title: Playing Mathematics in Early Childhood Based on Semiotics
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: playing mathematics in early childhood based on semiotics playing mathematics in early childhood based on semiotics gives children the opportunity to identify objects look for signs and interpret signs so that they can solve problems in games this study aims to describe semiotic based early childhood mathematics play activities the research was conducted at the preschool lab school muhammadiyah university of jember the research subjects were children from group b the results showed that the activities of playing mathematics in early childhood based on semiotics were collecting information related to semiotic based math games looking for objects that matched the game and counting the number of objects found looking for relevant signs and signs that are relevant to the number of objects found associated with signs of knowledge that have been previously possessed and look for all signs according to the objects found the child retells the play that has been done

desc: Engineering dapat mengembangkan ketrampilan 4C (communication, collaboration, critical thinking, and creativity) anak usia dini. Namun, banyak guru yang belum dapat merencanakan pembelajaran Engineering dengan baik. Penelitian ini bertujuan mendeskripsikan langkah-langkah perencanaan Engineering dalam pembelajaran outdoor anak usia dini. Jenis penelitian ini adalah kualitatif deskriptif. Subjek penelitian ini adalah 34 sekolah TK se-Jawa Tengah. Metode pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan cara observasi, dokumentasi dan wawancara kepada guru. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan yaitu reduksi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan terdapat lima langkah perencaaan Engineering dalam  pembelajaran outdoor di PAUD yaitu a) identifikasi tema di lingkungan outdoor yang bisa diselidiki anak-anak; b) identifikasi masalah dalam tema tersebut; c) menggali minat anak terhadap tema tersebut; d) macam-macam gagasan dan solusi yang mungkin berhasil untuk mengatasi masalah tersebut dan e) mempersiapkan material/bahan-bahan yang bisa digunakan anak untuk menyelesaikan masalah tersebut. Implikasi dari penelitian ini yaitu sebagai panduan guru PAUD dalam melakukan perencanaan  Enngineering  dalam pembelajaran outdoor
title: Perencanaan Engineering  Design Process Pada Pembelajaran outdoor di PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Engineering design process planning in outdoor learning in early childhood education can develop early childhood communication collaboration critical thinking and creativity skills, but many teachers have not been able to plan engineering learning properly. This study aims to describe the steps of engineering planning in outdoor learning for early childhood. This type of research is qualitative descriptive. The subjects of this study are kindergartens in Central Java. Data collection methods are carried out by means of observation, documentation and interviews with teachers. The data analysis techniques used are data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions. The results of the study indicate that there are five steps in engineering planning in outdoor learning in early childhood education, namely: a. identifying themes in the outdoor environment that children can investigate. b. identifying problems in the theme. c. exploring children's interest in the theme. d. various ideas and solutions that might be successful in overcoming the problem. e. preparing materials that children can use to solve the problem. The implications of this study are as a guide for early childhood education teachers in carrying out engineering planning in outdoor learning.

desc: Bahasa Inggris sebagai bahasa kedua sangat penting untuk diajarkan sejak dini. Akan tetapi, dalam mengajarkan Bahasa Inggris pada anak usia dini perlu metode dan pengajaran yang tepat dan efektif. Kosakata. Kosakata Bahasa Inggris anak dikembangkan dengan cara anak belajar mengaitkan arti dan bunyi. Kosakata Bahasa Inggris yang dimiliki oleh anak di TK Aisyiyah Kragilan Banjarsari masih sangat kurang. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui efektivitas buku ajar Happy Thinkingdalam meningkatkan kosakata awal anak di TK Aisyiyah Kragilan Banjarsari. Sedangkan metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yaitu metode eksperimen berbentuk one group pre-test dan post-test design yang digunakan untuk mengetahui pengaruh dari penggunaan buku ajar Happy Thinking terhadap peningkatan kosakata awal anak. Hasil penelitian yang diperoleh pada penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwapenggunaan Buku Ajar Happy Thinking efektifuntuk meningkatkan Kemampuan Kosakata Anak di TK Aisyiyah Kragilan, Banjarsari, Surakarta
title: Efektivitas Buku Ajar Happy Thinking Unit IIIParts of the Plantuntuk Meningkatkan Kosakata Awal Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of the Happy Thinking Unit III Parts of the Plant textbook to improve early childhood vocabulary English as a second language is very important to be taught early on, but in teaching English to early childhood, it is necessary to have the right and effective methods and teaching. Children's English vocabulary is developed by children learning to associate the meaning and sound of English vocabulary owned by children in TK Aisyiyah Kragilan Banjarsari is still very lacking. The purpose of this study was to determine the effectiveness of the Happy Thinking textbook in improving children's early vocabulary in TK Aisyiyah Kragilan Banjarsari, while the research method used in this study was an experimental method in the form of one group pretest and posttest design which was used to determine the effect of using the Happy Thinking textbook on improving children's early vocabulary. The results of the study obtained in this study indicate that the use of the Happy Thinking textbook is effective in improving children's vocabulary skills in TK Aisyiyah Kragilan Banjarsari Surakarta.

desc: Tujuan penelitian untuk mengetahui dan mendeskripsikan konsep sains, proses sains, dan bentuk aplikatif sains anak usia dini yang diperoleh setelah menggunakan alat permainan edukatif di PP IPTEK TMII. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode analisis konten dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa konsep sains, proses sains, dan bentuk aplikatif sains anak usia dini setelah menggunakan alat permainan edukatif di PP IPTEK TMII Jakarta dapat meningkatkan literasi sains anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menyimpulkan bahwa pengembangan literasi sains anak usia dini dapat dilakukan dengan memilih dan menggunakan alat permainan edukatif dalam bentuk konsep sains, proses sains, dan aplikatif sains. Rekomendasi penelitian yaitu mengusulkan untuk menambahkan alat permainan edukatif (APE) yang ada di PP IPTEK TMII Jakarta Timur, seperti bola gelinding, telepon pipa, musik pipa, musik dapur, bola berpacu, mesin putar, katrol, dan berjabat tangan dalam melengkapi alat permainan edukatif di taman bermainan permukiman.
title: Analisis Pengembangan Literasi Sains Anak Usia Dini melalui Alat Permainan Edukatif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the development of early childhood science literacy through educational game tools The purpose of the study was to determine and describe the concept of science, the process of science and the form of application of early childhood science obtained after using educational game tools at PP IPTek TMII The method used in this study is the content analysis method with a qualitative approach The results of the study indicate that the concept of science, the process of science and the form of application of early childhood science after using educational game tools at PP IPTek TMII Jakarta can improve early childhood science literacy This study concluded that the development of early childhood science literacy can be done by selecting and using educational game tools in the form of the concept of science, the process of science and the application of science The research recommendation is to propose to add educational game tools ape that are at PP IPTek TMII East Jakarta such as rolling balls, telephones, music pipes, music pipes, kitchens, racing balls, rotating machines, pulleys and shaking hands in completing educational game tools in residential playgrounds

desc: The Qur'an guides us to always speak kindly and gently to everyone. The purpose of this study is to describe the use of gadgets on communication ethics in early childhood in the perspective of the Qur'an. This type of research uses descriptive qualitative case study approach. The subjects involved in this study were 17 children aged class B2, teachers, and parents of students at RA An-Najah I. Data collection in the study was carried out using interviews, observation, documentation studies, and data identification with research instruments in the form of guidelines interviews and observations. Researchers used three stages in analyzing data which included reduction, data presentation, and drawing conclusions. The results of the study show that: the use of gadgets has an influence on children's communication ethics. Negative communication ethics that arise due to the use of gadgets in early childhood in the form of a very bad way of communicating with parents, namely by speaking in a harsh tone to parents, teachers and fellow peers which is contrary to the context of communication ethics according
title: The Use of Gadgets on Ethics of Early Childhood Communication From the Perspective of the Qur'an
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the use of gadgets on ethics of early childhood communication from the perspective of the quran the quran guides us to always speak kindly and gently to everyone the purpose of this study is to describe the use of gadgets on communication ethics in early childhood in the perspective of the quran this type of research uses descriptive qualitative case study approach the subjects involved in this study were children aged class b teachers and parents of students at ra annajah i data collection in the study was carried out using interviews observation documentation studies and data identification with research instruments in the form of guidelines interviews and observations researchers used three stages in analyzing data which included reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions the results of the study show that the use of gadgets has an influence on children's communication ethics negative communication ethics that arise due to the use of gadgets in early childhood in the form of a very bad way of communicating with parents namely by speaking in a harsh tone to parents teachers and fellow peers which is contrary to the context of communication ethics according

desc: The rate of child language development at age varies. Proficiency is influenced by internal factors and external factors. One environment that impact on children's language development is parenting parents. The purpose of this study was to determine the relationship between parenting parents on children's language development. The method used in the study was a descriptive cross sectional analititik. The population of this study were 30 children. In this study, samples were taken by total sampling. The study was conducted by distributing questionnaires and observation sheets. Research results obtained from the data parenting permissive parenting as much as 36.7%, authoritarian parenting as much as 33.3%, and democratic parenting as much as 30%. The results of observation of 30 children 70% were suspected in language development and 30% of normal in language development. From the results of the chi-square test showed p value of 0.015 is smaller than the value of α is 0.05. There is a relationship between parents' parenting on children's language development.
title: Hubungan Pola Asuh Orang Tua Terhadap Perkembangan Bahasa  Anak Prasekolah (3-5 Tahun)  Di PAUD  Al-Hasanah Tahun 2014
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The relationship between parenting patterns on the language development of preschool children at preschool Alhasanah. The rate of child language development at age varies proficiency is influenced by internal factors and external factors. One environmental factor that impacts on children's language development is parenting parents. to determine the relationship between parenting parents on children's language development the method used in the study was a descriptive cross sectional analysis the population of this study were children in this study samples were taken by total sampling the study was conducted by distributing questionnaires and observation sheets research results obtained from the parenting data permissive parenting as much as authoritarian parenting as much as and democratic parenting as much as the results of observation of children were suspected in language development and of normal in language development from the results of the chisquare test showed p value of is smaller than the value of α is there is a relationship between parents parenting on children's language development

desc: Kreativitas anak sangat penting ditanamkan sejak dini. Penelitian ini mengemukakan pengaruh permainan konstruktif dan percobaan sains terhadap kemampuan kreativitas anak. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah quasy eksperiment dengan desain Posttest Only Control Group Design, dengan teknik pengambilan sampel yaitu teknik random sampling. Pengumpulan data berupa test dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data penelitian menggunakan analisis varians Manova. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat perbedaan kreativitas pada anak yang mengikuti permainan konstruktif dan percobaan sains. Melalui hasil penelitian ini dapat diperoleh suatu permainan dan percobaan yang efektif dapat meningkatkan kreativitas anak usia dini.
title: Pengaruh Permainan Konstruktif dan Percobaan Sains terhadap Kreativitas Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of constructive play and science experiments on the creativity of children aged years Children's creativity is very important to be instilled from an early age This study suggests the influence of constructive play and science experiments on children's creativity abilities The type of research used is a quasi-experimental design with a posttest only control group design with a sampling technique, namely a random sampling technique Data collection in the form of tests and documentation The research data analysis technique uses MANOVA variance analysis The results of the study show that there are differences in creativity in children who participate in constructive play and science experiments Through the results of this study, an effective game and experiment can be obtained to increase the creativity of early childhood children

desc: Perilaku agresif menjadi salah satu permasalahan yang dialami oleh anak usia sekolah dan kian meningkat, baik secara nonverbal maupun verbal. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui hubungan lingkungan teman sebaya dan bermain game online yang mengandung unsur kekerasan dengan perilaku agresif. Analisis penelitian mengguanakan cross-sectional dan observasi. Populasi penelitian sebanyak 224. Pengambilan sampel dengan cara teknik probability sampling dengan menggunakan proportional stratified random sampling dan diperoleh sebanyak 144 respondent. Analisis data menggunakan uji Spearmen’s Rho. Hasil penelitian didapatkan terdapat hubungan lingkungan teman sebaya dengan perilaku agresif. Tidak adan hubungan bermain game online yang mengandung unsur kekerasan dengan perilaku agresif. Siswa yang mempunyai karakteristik lingkungan teman sebaya yang baik dan intensitas bermain game online rendah akan memiliki sikap dan perilaku yang baik. Lingkungan yang buruk dan intensitas bermain game online yang tinggi dapat mempengaruhi perilaku. Penelitian ini sebagai bahan refferensi dan edukasi bagi orang tua tentang bahaya game online terhadap pembentukan sikap dan kepribadian anak di lingkungan keluarga di era kurangnya komunikasi sosial antar keluarga.
title: Hubungan Lingkungan Teman Sebaya dan Game Online dengan Perilaku Agresif Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: peer environment and online games relationship with aggressive behavior in children aggressive behavior is one of the problems experienced by school-age children and is increasing both nonverbally and verbally the purpose of this study is to determine the relationship between peer environment and playing online games that contain elements of violence with aggressive behavior research analysis using cross-sectional and observation research population as many as sampling using probability sampling technique using proportional stratified random sampling and obtained as many respondents data analysis using spearmens rho test the results of the study showed that there is a relationship between peer environment and aggressive behavior there is no relationship playing online games that contain elements of violence with aggressive behavior students who have good peer environment characteristics and low intensity of playing online games will have good attitudes and behavior bad environment and high intensity of playing online games can influence behavior this study as reference material and education for parents about the dangers of online games on the formation of attitudes and personalities of children in the family environment in an era of lack of social communication between families

desc: Anak tunarungu yang memiliki kesulitan dalam hal mendengar karena ada gangguan pada pendengaran mereka, hal ini dapat menjadi penghambat dalam perkembangan berkomunikasi mereka. Pada umumnya anak tunarungu, kegiatan membaca permulaan meliputi pengenalan huruf, kata dan kalimat yang sederhana. Tujuan dari artikel ini adalah untuk menganalisa dan mengetahui peranan Media Busy Book dan perkembangannya dalam peningkatan kemampauan membaca permulaaan bagi anak tunarungu. Jenis Research and Development. Media Busy Book mendapatkan persentase penilaian yang menunjukkan kriteria sangat baik. Uji coba media Busy Book yang dilakukan di lapangan kepada anak tunarungu menunjukkkan kategori Baik. Sehingga diambil kesimpulan bahwa pembelajaran di SLB layak menggunakan media Busy Book. Media Busy Book dalam proses interaksi dan pelaksanaan belajar mengajar dapat menjadi solusi dalam kefektifan kemampuan membaca permulaan bagi anak tunarungu.
title: Media Busy Book untuk Kemampuan Membaca Permulaan Anak Tunarungu di SLB
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: busy book media for early reading skills of deaf children in special needs deaf children who have difficulty in hearing because of hearing disorders this can be an obstacle in their communication development in general deaf children early reading activities include the introduction of letters words and simple sentences the purpose of this article is to analyze and determine the role of busy book media and its development in improving early reading skills for deaf children research and development type busy book media gets a percentage of assessment that shows very good criteria busy book media trials conducted in the field for deaf children show a good category so it is concluded that learning in special needs is feasible to use busy book media busy book media in the process of interaction and implementation of teaching and learning can be a solution in the effectiveness of early reading skills for deaf children

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh antara metode pelatihan dan persistensi terhadap kompetensi pedagogik guru pendidikan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kuantitatif, metode yang digunakan adalah expost facto. Desain yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah desain factorial 2x2 (desain noneksperimental). Sampel penelitian ini adalah guru pendidikan anak usia dini yang pernah mengikuti pelatihan/diklat berjenjang tingkat dasar di wilayah Jakarta Timur. Pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah teknik non tes dengan instrumen berupa angket/kuisioner. Data yang diperoleh dianalisis dengan menggunakan ANAVA dua jalur dan uji tuckey. Hasil penelitian mengungkapkan terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan antara rata-rata skor kompetensi pedagogik guru pendidikan anak usia dini yang mengikuti metode pelatihan dalam jaringan (daring/online) dan rata-rata skor kompetensi pedagogik guru pendidikan anak usia dini yang mengikuti metode pelatihan tatap muka, serta terdapat pengaruh interaksi antara metode pelatihan dan persistensi terhadap skor kompetensi pedagogik guru pendidikan anak usia dini.
title: Metode Pelatihan dan Persistensi Berpengaruh terhadap Kompetensi Pedagogik Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: training methods and persistence have an effect on the pedagogical competence of early childhood education teachers This study aims to determine the effect of training methods and persistence on the pedagogical competence of early childhood education teachers This study is a quantitative study The method used is ex post facto The design used in this study is a factorial design x non-experimental design The sample of this study is early childhood education teachers who have participated in elementary level training in East Jakarta The data collection used is a non-test technique with an instrument in the form of a questionnaire The data obtained were analyzed using two-way ANOVA and the Tuckey test The results of the study revealed that there was a significant difference between the average pedagogical competence score of early childhood education teachers who participated in online training methods and the average pedagogical competence score of early childhood education teachers who participated in face-to-face training methods and there was an interaction effect between training methods and persistence on the pedagogical competence score of early childhood education teachers

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan media reading domino sebagai media belajar membaca bahasa Inggris pada anak usia dini 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini termasuk jenis penelitian dan pengembangan yang mengembangkan media reading domino yang berisi materi media belajar membaca bahasa Inggris bagi anak.Subjek penelitian dalam penelitian ini adalah 44 anak TK B Lab Kristen Satya Wacana.Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan observasi dan wawancara untuk mendapatkan informasi.Data dianalisis secara deskriptif kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa, pada uji validitas media reading domino sebagai media belajar membaca bahasa Inggris pada anak usia 5-6 tahun termasuk dalam kategori sesuai dan uji validitas media untuk materi termasuk dalam kategori sangat sesuai dengan sedikit perbaikan yang dilakukan dalam tahap revisi. Dengan demikian, media reading domino sebagai media belajar membaca bahasa Inggris dapat digunakan untuk tahap selanjudnya yaitu tahap uji coba produk.
title: Pengembangan Reading Domino sebagai Media Belajar Membaca Bahasa Inggris Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of reading domino as a medium for learning to read English for children aged years This study aims to develop reading domino media as a medium for learning to read English for children of early age years This study is a type of research and development that develops reading domino media containing media material for learning to read English for children The subjects of this study were children of TK B, Christian Satya Discourse Lab Data collection techniques were carried out by observation and interviews to obtain information Data were analyzed descriptively quantitatively and qualitatively The results of the study showed that in the validity test of reading domino media as a medium for learning to read English for children aged years it was included in the appropriate category and the validity test of media for material was included in the very appropriate category with a few improvements made in the revision stage Thus, reading domino media as a medium for learning to read English can be used for the next stage, namely the product trial stage

desc: Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini digambarkan sebagai upaya untuk pembinaan yang diberikan kepada anak sejak lahir hingga usia enam tahun. Pembinaan ini dicapai dengan memberikan stimulasi intelektual yang akan meningkatkan kecakapan fisik mereka. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui seberapa baik kelompok B Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini dalam menyimak sambil diceritakan dongeng dengan menggunakan boneka kertas. Pendekatan penelitian eksperimental digunakan dalam penelitian ini. Penelitian ini menguji dampak penggunaan media boneka kertas sebagai terapi terhadap kemampuan mendengarkan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menguji pengaruh penggunaan boneka kertas sebagai terapi terhadap keterampilan mendengarkan anak kecil. Setelah dilakukan pengujian dapat dikatakan bahwa di Cibiru, Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia, kemampuan mendengarkan siswa muda dapat ditingkatkan dengan penggunaan alat yang disebut boneka kertas. Kontribusi dari penelitian ini adalah dapat meningkatkan pendengaran anak melalui dongeng dengan menggunakan media wayang kertas.
title: Pengaruh Media Wayang Kertas terhadap Kemampuan Mendengar pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of paper puppet media on listening skills in early childhood education is described as an effort to provide guidance given to children from birth to the age of six years. This guidance is achieved by providing intellectual stimulation that will improve their physical skills. The purpose of this study was to determine how good group b of early childhood education was in listening while being told fairy tales using paper puppets. An experimental research approach was used in this study. This study tested the impact of using paper puppet media as therapy on the listening skills of early childhood children. This study tested the effect of using paper puppets as therapy on the listening skills of young children. After testing, it can be said that in Cibiru, University of Education, Indonesia, the listening skills of young students can be improved by using a tool called a paper puppet. The contribution of this study is that it can improve children's hearing through fairy tales using paper puppet media.

desc: Kegelisahan orang tua terhadap perilaku moral anak yang tidak mencerminkan nilai agama selalu saja terjadi, sehingga menjadi wacana hangat yang terus didiskusikan. Karena itu, penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mencari solusi bagaimana pembentukan perilaku nilai moral anak melalui pendidikan Islam. Penelitian ini berbentuk kualitatif kepustakaan (Librari Research) dengan menggunakan content analysis. Kesimpulan penelitian ini adalah; Pendidikan Islam melihat bahwa solusi dalam pembentukan perilaku nilai moral agama bagi anak usia dini terdiri dari lima tahap. Pertama pilihlah pasangan yang kuat agamanya, sebagai calon orang tua anak. Kedua didiklah perilaku anak mulai dari dalam kandungan dengan melakukan hal yang baik. Ketiga setelah lahir segera azankan, karena kalimat azan mengandung pendidikan nilai moral agama yang tinggi. Keempat berikan nama yang baik, karena panggilan nama yang baik adalah do’a bagi anak. Kelima berikan pendidikan di lingkungan yang baik, karena lingkungan sangat mewarnai perilaku moral agama anak
title: Solusi Pembentukan Perilaku Nilai Moral Anak Usia Dini Melalui Pendidikan Islam
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: solutions for the formation of moral values ​​in early childhood through Islamic education parents' anxiety about children's moral behavior that does not reflect religious values ​​always occurs so that it becomes a hot discourse that continues to be discussed therefore this study aims to find solutions on how to form children's moral values ​​through Islamic education this study is in the form of qualitative library research using content analysis the conclusion of this study is that Islamic education sees that the solution in the formation of religious moral values ​​for early childhood consists of five stages first choose a partner who is strong in religion as a prospective parent of the child second educate the child's behavior starting from the womb by doing good things third after birth immediately call the call to prayer because the call to prayer contains high religious moral education fourth give a good name because a good name is a prayer for the child fifth provide education in a good environment because the environment greatly colors the child's religious moral behavior

desc: Kesibukan orang tua dalam memenuhi kebutuhan hidup bukan menjadi penghalang kewajibannya menanamkan pendidikan karakter anak sejak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui bagaimana cara dan peran para orang tua membangun elemen intrakulikuler yang mencakup tiga elemen stimulasi yang saling terintegrasi pada anak usia dini baik secara offline maupun online setelah diberikan pendidikan parenting. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian evaluatif yang menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan hasil penelitiannya adalah pendidikan parenting memberikan pengaruh perubahan positif pada cara berfikir para orang tua di desa Pengilon. Pendekatan humanistik melalui komunikasi sebagai teman bermain dan role model dalam memberikan contoh kebaikan lebih efektif, dan perkembangan era digital juga memberikan dampak pada penerapan parenting. Impikasinya anak lebih dapat mengamalkan nilai-nilai agama, mengetahui hal yang baik dan buruk, lebih berani mengaktualisasikan diri baik dalam berhitung, seni dan kreasi serta tanggap terhadap informasi.
title: Parenting: Optimalisasi Peran Orang Tua dalam Membentuk Elemen Intrakulikuler Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: parenting optimizing the role of parents in forming intracurricular elements of early childhood parents' busyness in meeting their living needs is not an obstacle to their obligation to instill character education in children from an early age the purpose of this study is to find out how and the role of parents in building intracurricular elements that include three elements of stimulation that are integrated with each other in early childhood both offline and online after being given parenting education this study is an evaluative study that uses a qualitative approach with the results of the study being that parenting education has a positive effect on the way of thinking of parents in Pengilon Village the humanistic approach through communication as a playmate and role model in providing examples of goodness is more effective and the development of the digital era also has an impact on the implementation of parenting the implication is that children are better able to practice religious values ​​knowing good and bad things are more courageous in actualizing themselves both in counting art and creation and responsive to information

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh beberapa hal yang ditemukan peneliti pada riset awal. Proses pembelajaran di sekolah belum ada menggunakan sumbang duo baleh untuk meningkatkan kecerdasan interpersonal. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan game edukasi berbasis budaya lokal sumbang duo baleh untuk anak usia dini. Peneliti perlu memecahkan masalah ini melalui penelitian R  D (Research and Development) dengan model ADDIE, yakni dengan analysis, design, development, implementation dan evaluation. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan angket. Hasil Validasi pengembangan game edukasi berbasis budaya lokal sumbang duo baleh layak digunakan dengan hasil rata-rata Aiken’s V oleh Ahli materi yaitu 0,807 dan dengan hasil rata—rata Aiken’s V oleh Ahli Media yaitu 0,80. Hasil praktikalitas game edukasi berbasis budaya lokal sumbang duo baleh dinyatakan sangat praktis dengan hasil rata-rata persentase yaitu 84,4% sangat praktis. Hasil persentase efektivitas yaitu 81,25% (efektif) dengan game edukasi berbasis budaya lokal sumbang duo baleh sangat berhasil untuk digunakan. Dapat disimpulkan game edukasi berbasis budaya lokal sumbang duo baleh untuk meningkatkan kecerdasan interpersonal dinyatakan valid, praktis, dan efektif.
title: Game Edukasi Berbasis Budaya Lokal Sumbang Duo Baleh untuk Meningkatkan Kecerdasan Interpersonal Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Educational game based on local culture sumbang duo baleh to improve children's interpersonal intelligence This study was motivated by several things found by researchers in early research, the learning process in schools has not used sumbang duo baleh to improve interpersonal intelligence, this study aims to produce an educational game based on local culture sumbang duo baleh for early childhood, researchers need to solve this problem through research r d research and development with the addie model, namely with analysis design development implementation and evaluation, data collection techniques using questionnaires, the results of the validation of the development of educational games based on local culture sumbang duo baleh are suitable for use with an average result of aikens v by material experts, namely and with an average result of aikens v by media experts, namely the results of the practicality of educational games based on local culture sumbang duo baleh are stated to be very practical with an average percentage result of very practical, the percentage result of effectiveness is effective with educational games based on local culture sumbang duo baleh are very successful to use, it can be concluded that educational games based on local culture sumbang duo baleh to improve interpersonal intelligence are stated to be valid, practical and effective

desc: Guru SDN 013 Sukamaju telah menggunakan internet sebagai sumber belajar siswa walaupun dengan masalah jaringan yang tidak stabil dan fasilitas wifi yang ada digunakan secara terbatas. Tujuna penelitian deskriptif kualitatif ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan bagaimana pemanfaatan internet sebagai sumber pembelajaran dengan melibatkan 3 guru sebagai responden di kelas III SDN 013 Suka Maju. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui wawancara dan observasi, dan dianalisis dengan langkah: data collection, data reduction, display data, verifikasi, dan conclution drawing and verification. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa pemanfaatan internet di kelas III SDN 013 Suka Maju memberikan manfaat yang baik bagi siswa dan guru. Guru di kelas III SDN 013 Suka Maju menggunakan halaman web www.academia.com dan www.wikipedia.com sebagai sumber pembelajaran yang telah ditelaah sebelumnya untuk melihat kesesuaiannya bagi siswa. Internet digunakan dengan intensitas yang dibatasi didampingi dengan penggunaan buku yang bertujuan agar siswa menyenangi literasi melalui buku dan internet. Keterbatasan jaringan internet dalam proses pembelajaran menjadi kendala di dalam kelas. Guru kembali menggunakan buku dalam proses pembelajaran dan melakukan diskusi bersama siswa di dalam kelas. Siswa diawasi ketika mengakses internet oleh guru.  Penggunaan internet memberikan kemudahan bagi guru dan mempengaruhi hasil belajar dan minat siswa di dalam kelas III SDN 013 Suka Maju.
title: Pemanfaatan Internet sebagai Sumber Belajar Siswa di Kelas Rendah Sekolah Dasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Utilization of the internet as a learning resource for students in the lower grades of elementary school teachers at SDN Sukamaju have used the internet as a learning resource for students even though the network is unstable and the existing wifi facilities are used in a limited way. The purpose of this qualitative descriptive study is to describe how the use of the internet as a learning resource by involving teachers as respondents in class III SDN Suka Maju. Data collection was carried out through interviews and observations and analyzed using the steps of data collection, data reduction, display, data verification and conclusion drawing and verification. The results of this study indicate that the use of the internet in class III SDN Suka Maju provides good benefits for students and teachers. Teachers in class III SDN Suka Maju use the web pages www academia.com and www wikipedia.com as learning resources that have been previously reviewed to see their suitability for students. The internet is used with limited intensity accompanied by the use of books that aim to make students enjoy literacy through books and the internet. Limited internet network in the learning process is an obstacle in the classroom. Teachers use books again in the learning process and hold discussions with students in the classroom. Students are supervised when accessing the internet by teachers. The use of the internet makes it easier for teachers and influences learning outcomes and student interests in class III SDN Suka Maju.

desc: Latar belakang penelitian ini berawal dari jarangnya guru menggunakan media dalam bentuk permainan sebagai alat bantu pembelajaran, apalagi media berbentuk permainan ular tangga pada proses pembelajaran. Penelitian ini memiliki tujuan dalam rangka pengembangan media pembelajaran tematik terpadu menggunakan media ular  tangga untuk anak usia 5-6 tahun. Jenis penelitian ini adalah Research and Development ( R  D) menggunakan teori Sugiyono (20013). Satu tahap terakhir yang tidak penulis lakukan yaitu tahap penyebaran (dessemination) dikarenakan pandemi COVID-19 yang masih mewabah ketika penelitian dilakukan. Berdasarkan validasi yang telah dilakukan menunjukkan bahwa pengembangan media ular tangga sudah valid dan dapat digunakan dalam proses pembelajaran. Aktivitas bermain ular tangga dapat membantu anak dalam meningkatkan keterampilan berbicara karena dilaksanakan dalam bentuk bermain
title: Penggunaan Media Ular Tangga pada Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun untuk Meningkatkan Keterampilan Berbicara
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The use of snakes and ladders media for children aged years to improve speaking skills The background of this study began with the rarity of teachers using media in the form of games as a learning aid, especially media in the form of snakes and ladders games in the learning process. This study aims to develop integrated thematic learning media using snakes and ladders media for children aged years. This type of research is research and development r d using Sugiyono's theory. One last stage that the author did not do was the dissemination stage because the Covid pandemic was still rampant when the study was conducted. Based on the validation that had been carried out, it showed that the development of snakes and ladders media was valid and could be used in the learning process. Snakes and ladders playing activities can help children improve their speaking skills because they are carried out in the form of playing.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menggambarkan dan menganalisis pelaksanaan peran orangtua dalam mengenalkan virus corona pada anak prasekolah. Metode penelitian menggunakan kualitatif dengan pendekatan deskriptif. Subjek penelitian berjumlah lima keluarga yang memiliki anak usia prasekolah. Penentuan subjek menggunakan teknik purposive sampling yaitu dengan kriteria keluarga yang memiliki anak usia pra sekolah yaitu usia 3-6 tahun dan berlokasi di RT 006 RW 07, Perum 2, Tangerang, Banten. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan metode wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Analisis data menggunakan model Miles and Huberman dengan tahap pengumpulan data, reduksi data, display data, dan ferivikasi data. Kesimpulan dari penelitian ini adalahorangtua telah melaksanakan perannya dalam mengenalkan Covid-19 menggunakan media TV, HP dan youtube; menjadi contoh dalam tindakan pencegahan;serta mengajarkan berbagai tindakan pencegahan dengan pendampingan, penjelasan, serta bujukan dan rayuan terutama bagi anak yang sulit untuk melaksanakan tindakan perlindungan diri dari Covid-19. Namun, pengenalan Covid-19 lebih banyak dilakukan ibu dibandingkan ayah. Sehingga diperlukan kerjasama dan peran ayah untuk mendukung dan melengkapi usaha yang dilakukan ibu dalam mengenalkan Covid-19 kepada anak.
title: Pengenalan Covid-19 pada Anak Usia Prasekolah: Analisis pada Pelaksanaan Peran Orangtua di Rumah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Introduction of Covid in preschool children Analysis of the implementation of the role of parents at home This study aims to describe and analyze the implementation of the role of parents in introducing the corona virus to preschool children The research method uses qualitative with a descriptive approach The research subjects are five families who have preschool children The determination of subjects using purposive sampling techniques, namely with the criteria of families who have preschool children, namely the age of years and located in RT RW Perum Tangerang Banten Data collection was carried out using the interview method, observation and documentation Data analysis using the Miles and Huberman model with the stages of data collection, data reduction, data display and data verification The conclusion of this study is that parents have carried out their role in introducing Covid using TV, cellphones and YouTube as examples of preventive measures and teaching various preventive measures with explanations and persuasion and seduction, especially for children who find it difficult to carry out self-protection measures from Covid, but the introduction of Covid is carried out more by mothers than fathers, so cooperation and the role of fathers are needed to support and complement the efforts made by mothers in introducing Covid to children

desc: Manajemen sangat penting bagi terselenggaranya sistem pendidikan yang bermutu dan berkelanjutan. Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu mendeskripsikan manajemen pengelolaan pembelajaran ekstrakurikuler seni. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif dan teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Subjek  dalam penelitian ini adalah kepala sekolah dan guru. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa manajemen pengelolaan pembelajaran ekstrakurikuler seni dilaksanakan menggunakan POAC. Hal ini dapat dilihat dari proses manajemennya yang dimulai dari Planning yaitu dengan penentuan kegiatan pembelajaran ekstrakurikuler, menentukan anggaran biaya, mencari guru yang hendak mengampu. Organizing yaitu hanya sebatas pembagian tugas kepada pihak yang terlibat dalam pembelajaran ekstrakurikuler seni. Actuating yaitu terdapat tiga jenis seni yaitu seni musik dengan angklung, seni rupa dengan melukis dan seni tari dengan menari. Controlling yaitu dengan penilaian secara global yang dilakukan oleh guru masing-masing kemudian dilaporkan kepada kepala sekolah. Bahwasannya manajemen pengelolaan pembelajaran ekstrakurikuler seni sudah terlaksana dengan baik.
title: Manajemen Pengelolaan Pembelajaran Ekstrakurikuler Seni di TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of extracurricular arts learning management in kindergarten management is very important for the implementation of a quality and sustainable education system the purpose of this study is to describe the management of extracurricular arts learning management this study uses qualitative descriptive methods and data collection techniques using interviews observation and documentation the subjects in this study are the principal and teachers the results of the study show that the management of extracurricular arts learning management is carried out using POAC this can be seen from the management process which starts from planning namely by determining extracurricular learning activities determining the budget looking for teachers who will teach organizing namely only limited to dividing tasks to parties involved in extracurricular arts learning actuating namely there are three types of arts namely music with angklung fine arts with painting and dance with dancing controlling namely with a global assessment carried out by each teacher then reported to the principal that the management of extracurricular arts learning management has been implemented well

desc: The purpose of this research is to describe the understanding of early childhood education teachers on thematic learning planning. The focus of this research is the extent to which early childhood education teachers understand about thematic learning planning. This research is a descriptive research conducted at Raudhatul Athfal (RA) Se-Kecamatan Ajung. The population in this research are teachers of RA Se-Kecamatan Ajung where the sample selection is done by simple random sampling. Data collection tool in this research by using questionnaire. From the result of data analysis, it can be concluded that the average of early childhood teacher's understanding on thematic learning planning is 76%, so that it can be categorized that the teacher has understood the aspect of thematic learning planning.
title: Pemahaman Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini Terhadap Perencanaan Pembelajaran Tematik
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood education teachers' understanding of thematic learning planning the purpose of this research is to describe the understanding of early childhood education teachers on thematic learning planning the focus of this research is the extent to which early childhood education teachers understand about thematic learning planning this research is a descriptive research conducted at raudhatul athfal ra sekecamatan ajung the population in this research are teachers of ra sekecamatan ajung where the sample selection is done by simple random sampling data collection tool in this research by using questionnaire from the result of data analysis it can be concluded that the average of early childhood teachers understanding on thematic learning planning is so that it can be categorized that the teacher has understood the aspect of thematic learning planning

desc: Doodle adalah gambar sederhana yang dapat memiliki makna representasi konkret atau yang terdiri dari garis acak dan abstrak, dalam hal ini biasanya disebut coretan. Teknik Menggambar Doodle dilakukan dengan tujuan untuk mengasah kemampuan seni anak sehingga mampu meransang perkembangan dan kreativitas anak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode deskriptif kualitatif dengan teknik pengumpulan data melalui wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil dari penelitian ini dapat dilihat dari kemampuan menggambar anak, selain itu juga terlihat dari semangat, minat, dan anak idik dalam melakukan kegiatan menggambar. Kreativitas anak juga terlihat dari adanya ide-ide baru dalam menggambar yang di lakukan anak. Sehingga dapat dikatakan bahwa menggambar doodle dapat meningkatkan kreatifitas kemampuan menggambar anak.
title: Analisis Menggambar Doodle Terhadap Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: In this case, it is usually called a doodle drawing technique, which is done with the aim of honing children's artistic abilities so that they can stimulate children's development and creativity. The method used in this study is a qualitative descriptive method with data collection techniques through interviews and documentation. The results of this study can be seen from children's drawing abilities. In addition, it can also be seen from the enthusiasm, interest and children in carrying out drawing activities. Children's creativity can also be seen from the existence of new ideas in drawing that children do, so it can be said that drawing doodles can increase children's creativity in drawing abilities.

desc: Permainan tradisional adalah bagian penting dari masa kanak-kanak dan merupakan warisan nenek moyang yang harus dijaga dan dilestarikan agar tidak punah. Pelestarian permainan tradisional di dunia bermain anak sangatlah penting karena memberikan banyak manfaat untuk perkembangan anak. Oleh karena itu, guru sebagai bagian dari pendidikan, seharusnya mengenalkan anak pada permainan tradisional. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan dan menganalisis permainan tradisional apa yang ada di Kecamatan Lakudo dan kontribusi taman kanak-kanak dalam pelestarian permainan tradisional di Kecamatan Lakudo Kabupaten Buton Tengah. Metode pendekatan kualitatif dengan desain penelitian fenomenologi digunakan dalam penelitian ini, dengan teknik pengumpulan data melalui observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa taman kanak-kanak di Kecamatan Lakudo memainkan peran penting dalam melestarikan permainan tradisional karena tempat bertemunya anak-anak untuk belajar sambil bermain dan sosialisasi. Penelitian ini juga menemukan beberapa permainan tradisional yang diperkenalkan oleh guru kepada anak-anak, seperti
title: Kontribusi Taman Kanak-Kanak dalam Pelestarian Permainan Tradisional di Lakudo Kabupaten Buton Tengah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The contribution of kindergartens in preserving traditional games in Lakudo, Central Buton Regency. Traditional games are an important part of childhood and are a legacy of our ancestors that must be maintained and preserved so that they do not become extinct. Preserving traditional games in the world of children's play is very important because it provides many benefits for children's development. Therefore, teachers as part of education should introduce children to traditional games. The purpose of this study is to describe and analyze what traditional games are in Lakudo District and the contribution of kindergartens in preserving traditional games in Lakudo District, Central Buton Regency. A qualitative approach method with a phenomenological research design was used in this study with data collection techniques through observation, interviews and documentation. The results of the study indicate that kindergartens in Lakudo District play an important role in preserving traditional games because they are a meeting place for children to learn while playing and socializing. This study also found several traditional games introduced by teachers to children such as

desc: Dunia internasional dekat dengan kehidupan anak-anak modern, sehingga pendidikan Taman Kanak-kanak (TK) memerlukan kurikulum ini melalui pendidikan multikultural. Kurikulum ini jarang ada di Lembaga TK karena minimnya pengetahuan dan jumlah guru TK yang fokus di bidang ini. Penelitian dilakukan dengan pengumpulan data melalui observasi selama 3 kali kunjungan ke TK, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Kunjungan pertama, peneliti mengumpulkan minat siswa terhadap metode pembelajaran dan menemukan metode pembelajaran dengan bermain puzzle, kemudian dilakukan pengenalan kurikulum internasional melalui metode kreativitas mengajar. Selanjutnya peneliti mempresentasikan materi dengan permainan puzzle, dimulai dengan pengenalan nama negara, mengaplikasikannya pada permainan, dan menguji siswa untuk menyebutkan nama negara tertentu. Peneliti menemukan kemudahan bagi siswa dalam mengingat dan mengucapkan nama-nama negara, sehingga dapat disimpulkan bahwa penyampaian kurikulum baru dengan metode bermain puzzle dapat meningkatkan kemampuan kognitif anak usia dini khususnya untuk mengenal dunia internasional sebagai materi pendidikan multikultural
title: Perkenalan Dunia Internasional sebagai Pendidikan Multikutural pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Metode Bermain Puzzle
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Introduction of the international world as multicultural education for early childhood through the puzzle playing method, the international world is close to the lives of modern children so that kindergarten education requires this curriculum through multicultural education, this curriculum is rarely available in kindergarten institutions because of the lack of knowledge and the number of kindergarten teachers who focus on this field, the study was conducted by collecting data through observation during visits to kindergartens, interviews and documentation of the first visit, the researcher collected students' interest in learning methods and found a learning method by playing puzzles, then an introduction to the international curriculum was carried out through the creativity teaching method, then the researcher presented the material with a puzzle game starting with the introduction of country names, applying it to the game and testing students to mention the names of certain countries, the researcher found it easy for students to remember and pronounce the names of countries, so it can be concluded that the delivery of a new curriculum with the puzzle playing method can improve the cognitive abilities of early childhood children, especially to get to know the international world as multicultural education material

desc: Penelitian ini mengidentifikasi nilai pedagogis tarian Lulo guna memperkuat karakter persatuan pada anak usia dini. Penelitian dilatarbelakangi oleh berita tentang banyaknya tindakan-tindakan kekerasan dan bullying di kalangan siswa, di mana anak-anak menjadi aktornya. Oleh karena itu, dibutuhkan sebuah nilai yang bisa menguatkan rasa kasih dan persatuan. Melalui pendekatan ethnography, peneliti melibatkan beberapa pihak sebagai sumber informasi, seperti: tokoh masyarakat, ahli kurikulum, administrator sekolah; kepala sekolah dan guru-guru (partisipan FGD). Dokumentasi dari observasi langsung untuk memberikan visual serta mengkonfirmasi data-data dari wawancara. Analisa data dilakukan sesuai prosedur analisa interkatif, analisa domain dan taksonomi Spradley. Peneliti menyimpulkan jika tarian lulo memenuhi prinsip-prinsip kurikulum untuk menjadi media dan atau input pembelajaran di pendidikan anak usia dini, karena tarian lulo berisi unsur kegiatan pikir, olah hati, olah rasa, karsa, serta olah raga dan mengandung nilai-nilai positif. Internalisasi tarian Lulo dalam kurikulum pendidikan membekali anak didik dengan nilai-nilai yang mengajarkan rasa persatuan, saling menghargai, cinta perdamaian, toleransi dan patuh terhadap aturan mutlak diperlukan. Penanaman semangat persatuan tersebut bisa dimulai sejak masa emas (golden age) anak yaitu pendidikan dasar dan usia dini. Di samping itu, kebijakan tersebut adalah upaya memelihara dan melestarikan budaya sebagai warisan yang berharga.
title: Identifikasi Nilai Pedagogis Tarian Lulo untuk Memperkuat Rasa Persatuan pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: identification of pedagogical value of lulo dance to strengthen the sense of unity in early childhood this study identifies the pedagogical value of lulo dance to strengthen the character of unity in early childhood the study was motivated by news about the many acts of violence and bullying among students where children are the actors therefore a value is needed that can strengthen the sense of love and unity through an ethnographic approach the researcher involved several parties as sources of information such as community leaders curriculum experts school administrators principals and teachers fgd participants documentation from direct observation to provide visuals and confirm data from interviews data analysis was carried out according to interactive analysis procedures domain analysis and spradley taxonomy the researcher concluded that lulo dance meets the principles of the curriculum to be a medium and or input for learning in early childhood education because lulo dance contains elements of thought activities heart exercise feelings will and sports and contains positive values ​​internalization of lulo dance in the education curriculum equips students with values ​​that teach a sense of unity mutual respect love peace tolerance and obedience to the rules absolutely necessary instilling the spirit of unity can be started since the golden age of children namely basic education and early childhood in addition the policy is an effort to maintain and preserve culture as a heritage that valuable

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan produk penilaian yang digunakan untuk mengukur kemampuan penalaran proporsional mahasiswa calon guru anak usia 6-7 Tahun. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah penelitian pengembangan dengan model Borg and Gall, yang meliputi pengumpulan informasi, perencanaan, pengembangan produk awal, ujicoba one to one, revisi hasil ujicoba, ujicoba skala kecil dan ujicoba skala besar. Subjek penelitian ini adalah mahasiswa S1 PGSD yang dilakukan sebanyak tiga tahap ujicoba, yaitu uji coba one to one sebanyak 10 orang mahasiswa, uji coba kelompok kecil sebanyak 15 orang mahasiswa, dan uji coba kelompok besar sebanyak 30 orang mahasiswa. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan angket dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data dalam penelitian ini adalah analisis data kualitatif dan analisis data kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian berdasarkan uji coba yang telah dilakukan serta dilihat dari tingkat kesukaran, reliabel dan kevalidan soal, maka diperoleh hasil akhir dari penggunaan produk penilaian sebesar 64,79%. Dari hasil tersebut menunjukkan bahwa model yang dikembangkan menunjukkan interpretasi yang baik dan layak untuk diimplementasikan sebagai alat penilaian untuk mengukur kemampuan penalaran proporsional.
title: Model Penilaian Kemampuan Penalaran Proporsional pada Mahasiswa Calon Guru Anak Usia 6-7 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: proportional reasoning ability assessment model for prospective teacher students aged 1-3 years old This study aims to develop an assessment product used to measure the proportional reasoning ability of prospective teacher students aged 1-3 years old The research method used is development research with the Borg and Gall model which includes collecting information on initial product development planning, one-to-one trials, revision of trial results, small-scale trials and large-scale trials The subjects of this study were elementary school students who were tested in three stages, namely one-to-one trials of 1,000 students, small group trials of 1,000 students and large group trials of 1,000 students. Data collection techniques were carried out using questionnaires and documentation. Data analysis techniques in this study were qualitative data analysis and quantitative data analysis. The results of the study were based on trials that had been carried out and seen from the level of difficulty, reliability and validity of the questions, the final results of the use of the assessment product were obtained from these results, indicating that the developed model showed good interpretation and was feasible to be implemented as an assessment tool to measure proportional reasoning ability.

desc: This research aimed to investigate the impact of the implementation of transformational leadership on the performance of Early Childhood Education (PAUD) teachers in the digital era. The importance of the research topic lies in its potential to improve the quality of early childhood education, enhance teacher performance, and provide valuable insights into effective leadership practices in the digital era. The research method employed was a survey, with data collected through questionnaires distributed to 100 PAUD teachers and 20 PAUD principals experienced in using digital technology in teaching. The collected data were analyzed using descriptive and regression statistical techniques. The research results indicate that transformational leadership significantly enhances the performance of PAUD teachers in integrating digital technology into their teaching practices. Innovation encouragement, creativity development, and sustained support from school leaders are vital in implementing this leadership approach. This research concludes that transformational leadership plays a vital role in improving the quality of PAUD learning in the digital era. Therefore, PAUD school leaders need to actively promote this leadership approach to support teachers in addressing the challenges of digital technology.
title: Implementation of Transformational Leadership on the Performance of PAUD Teachers in the Digital Era
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of transformational leadership on the performance of early childhood education preschool teachers in the digital era the importance of the research topic lies in its potential to improve the quality of early childhood education enhance teacher performance and provide valuable insights into effective leadership practices in the digital era the research method employed was a survey with data collected through questionnaires distributed to early childhood teachers and early childhood principals experienced in using digital technology in teaching the collected data were analyzed using descriptive and statistical regression techniques the research results indicate that transformational leadership significantly enhances the performance of preschool teachers in integrating digital technology into their teaching practices innovation encouragement creativity development and sustained support from school leaders are vital in implementing this leadership approach this research concludes that transformational leadership plays a vital role in improving the quality of preschool learning in the digital era therefore preschool school leaders need to actively promote this leadership approach to support teachers in addressing the challenges of digital technology

desc: Keterlambatan bahasa dan bicara harus dikenali oleh orangtua sejak dini, agar tata laksana yang diberikan dapat memaksimalkan kapasitas bahasa dan bicara yang dimiliki anak. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk mendiskripsikan strategi pelaksanaan intervensi dini bahasa dan bicara pada anak speech delay. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah pendekatan kualitatif dengan desain studi kasus. Subjek penelitian berjumlah satu orang yaitu anak berusia 4 tahun. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui observasi, wawancara dan dokumen (catatan harian, dokumen chek list instrumen penilaian pencapaian perkembangan bahasa dan bicara, video kegiatan program intervensi dini). Metode analisis data menggunakan analisis deskriptif dengan pendekatan kualitaif. Berdasarkan hasil pembahasan dapat disimpulkan bahwa terdapat peningkatan bahasa dan bicara anak speech delay setelah diberikan intervensi dini selama 20 kali pertemuan. Peningkatan kemampuan bahasa dan bicara dapat dibuktikan dari hasil instrumen cheklist dengan menandai ketercapaian indikator bahasa dan bicara yakni anak mampu menjawab pertanyaan sederhana, mengungkapkan perasaan dengan kata sifat, mengatakan keinginan dan menyebutkan kata-kata yang dikenal.
title: Intervensi Dini Bahasa dan Bicara Anak Speech Delay
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early intervention for language and speech in children with speech delay Language and speech delays must be recognized by parents early on so that the management provided can maximize the language and speech capacity of the child. This study was conducted to describe the strategy for implementing early language and speech intervention in children with speech delay. The research method used was a qualitative approach with a case study design. The research subject was one person, namely a child aged years. Data collection techniques were through observation, interviews and documents, daily notes, checklist documents, language and speech development achievement assessment instruments, videos of early intervention program activities. Data analysis methods used descriptive analysis with a qualitative approach. Based on the results of the discussion, it can be concluded that there was an increase in the language and speech of children with speech delay after being given early intervention during the meeting. The increase in language and speech skills can be proven from the results of the checklist instrument by marking the achievement of language and speech indicators, namely children are able to answer simple questions, express feelings with adjectives, say desires and mention words that are known.

desc: Seni tari pada anak usia dini berfungsi sebagai sarana untuk mengembangkan kemampuan dalam gerak yaitu mengekspresikan diri, kemampuan presepsi, pengetahuan, pemahaman artistic serta estetik pada anak. Banyak tarian mampu menstimulasi aspek motorik kasar anak salah satunya tari tikus buntung. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengembangan kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini di salah satu lembaga Taman Kanak-Kanak di Kabupaten Klaten. Metode penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian kualitatif deksriptif. Adapun teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan yaitu teknik observasi, dokumentasi, dan wawancara.  Hasil analisis penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Tari Tikus Buntung dapat mengembangkan kemampuan motorik kasar pada anak-anak di TK PGRI Juwiring Klaten. Pengembangan motorik kasar tersebut diperoleh ketika anak melakukan gerakan-gerakan tubuh yang dilakukan ketika anak menari. Misalnya berlari, melompat, meloncar, berputar, serta gerakan-gerakan lainnya. Selain itu melalui Tari Tikus Buntung anak-anak dapat melatih otot-otot agar dapat terkoordinasi, kuat dan seimbang.
