Sehingga perkembangan motoik kasar anak usia dini dapat berkembang dengan baik.
title: Tari Tikus Buntung untuk Mengembangkan Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Tikus Buntung dance to develop gross motor skills in early childhood dance art in early childhood functions as a means to develop the ability in movement, namely expressing oneself, the ability of perception, knowledge, understanding, artistic and aesthetic in children, many dances are able to stimulate the gross motor aspects of children, one of which is the Tikus Buntung dance, this study aims to determine the development of gross motor skills in early childhood in one of the kindergarten institutions in Klaten district, this research method uses a qualitative descriptive research method, the data collection techniques used are observation, documentation and interview techniques, the results of the research analysis show that the Tikus Buntung dance can develop gross motor skills in children in TK Pgri Juwiring Klaten, the development of gross motor skills is obtained when children make body movements that are carried out when children dance, for example running, jumping, spinning and other movements, besides that through the Tikus Buntung dance, children can train their muscles so that they can be coordinated, strong and balanced so that the development of gross motor skills in early childhood can develop well

desc: Pandemi Covid-19 mengakibatkan perubahan kebijakan di berbagai sektor di Indonesia, salah satunya adalah sektor pendidikan. Pendidikan di Indonesia mengubah kebijakan pembelajaran tatap muka menjadi pembelajaran dalam jaringan. Penelitian ini menganalisis kecerdasan emosi anak usia 5-6 tahun pada saat pembelajaran daring selama pandemi. Kecerdasan emosional anak mengalami perubahan selama pandemi covid-19. PeneIitian ini merupakan peneIitian kuantitatif dengan metode survei. Sumber data daIam peneIitian ini adaIah orang tua dan anak yang berjumlah 71 anak. Teknik pengumpuIan data diIakukan meIaIui penyebaran angket secara onIine meIaIui google form. HasiI peneIitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat hubungan antara pembeIajaran daIam jaringan seIama pandemi dengan kecerdasan emosionaI anak usia 5-6 tahun. Hubungan tersebut dapat dibuktikan dengan perubahan emosionaI anak seIama pembeIajaran daIam jaringan diIaksanakan. Anak menjadi kurang dapat mengontrol emosi, kurang memiliki motivasi dalam belajar serta kurangnya sosialisasi dengan orang lain
title: Analisis Kecerdasan Emosional Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun dalam Pembelajaran Daring Selama Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of emotional intelligence of children aged 18-24 years in online learning during the pandemic The Covid pandemic has resulted in policy changes in various sectors in Indonesia, one of which is the education sector. Education in Indonesia has changed the policy of face-to-face learning to online learning. This study analyzes the emotional intelligence of children aged 18-24 years during online learning during the pandemic. Children's emotional intelligence has changed during the Covid pandemic. This study is a quantitative study with a survey method. The data sources in this study are parents and children totaling 18 children. The data collection technique was carried out by distributing questionnaires online via Google Form. The results of the study show that there is a relationship between online learning during the pandemic and the emotional intelligence of children aged 18-24 years. This relationship can be proven by changes in children's emotions during online learning. Children become less able to control their emotions. They have less motivation to learn and lack socialization with others.

desc: Kompetensi guru adalah kompetensi dan atau pengetahuan, kemampuan serta keterampilan yang harus dimiliki oleh seorang guru. Kompetensi guru ini terdiri dari empat kompetensi, yaitu: kompetensi pribadi, sosial, pedagogik, dan profesional. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan kompetensi profesional guru pada suatu lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini yang selama ini belum diperhatikan secara maksimal. Metode yang digunakan pada penelitian ini adalah penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Metode ini memiliki empat tahapan, yaitu: pengumpulan data, reduksi data, pengolahan data, dan kesimpulan. Data-data pada penelitian ini bersumber dari 10 orang guru di salah satu lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini di Kabupaten Kampar, Riau. Hasil penelitian ini dapat menunjukan kompetensi profesional guru (kompetensi metodik dan kompetensi sosial) pada lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini yang meningkat selama penelitian ini dilakukan. Oleh karena itu, penelitian ini dapat menjadi acuan untuk perbaikan ketiga kompetensi guru lainnya dalam meningkatkan kompetensi pribadi, sosial, dan pedagogik.
title: Kompetensi Profesional Guru pada Lembaga Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: professional competence of teachers in early childhood education institutions teacher competence is the competence and/or knowledge, abilities and skills that must be possessed by a teacher this teacher competence consists of four competencies namely personal, social, pedagogical and professional competence this study aims to describe the professional competence of teachers in an early childhood education institution that has not been given maximum attention the method used in this study is qualitative descriptive research this method has four stages namely data collection data reduction data processing and conclusions the data in this study came from teachers in one of the early childhood education institutions in Kampar Regency, Riau the results of this study can show the professional competence of teachers methodical competence and social competence in early childhood education institutions which increased during this study therefore this study can be a reference for improving the other three teacher competencies in improving personal, social and pedagogical competence

desc: Penelitian ini dilatar belakangi oleh permasalahan yang terjadi dalam proses pelaksanaan pembelajaran yang ditandai dengan belum adanya buku ajar yang dapat membantu menjelaskan konsep-konsep mata kuliah. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui kevalidan, kepraktisan, dan keefektifan modul atau buku ajar perencanaan pembelajaran PIAUD. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode RD model 4-D dari Thiagarajan dan Melvynl. Subjek dalam penelitian ini adalah mahasiswa PIAUD UIN Raden Fatah Palembang, dengan instrumen pengumpulan data berupa observasi, angket yang divalidasi oleh ahli materi, desain, bahasa untuk menguji kualitas modul atau buku ajar dan dokumentasi. Berdasarkan penilaian ahli materi dengan kategori sangat valid, penilaian ahli desain dengan kategori sangat valid, dan penilaian ahli bahasa dengan kategori valid. Sedangkan penilaian uji coba lapangan dengan angket responden tingkat keefektifan uji coba skala kecil dengan kategori sangat efektif serta angket responden uji coba skala besar dengan kategori sangat efektif. Bahan ajar ini dinyatakan sangat efektif untuk digunakan mahasiswa dalam proses perkuliahan mata kuliah perencanaan pembelajaran PIAUD
title: Pengembangan Buku Ajar Mata Kuliah Perencanaan Pembelajaran Pendidikan Islam Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of textbooks for early childhood Islamic education learning planning courses this research is motivated by problems that occur in the learning implementation process which is marked by the absence of textbooks that can help explain the concepts of the course this research aims to determine the validity of the practicality and effectiveness of the module or textbook for early childhood Islamic education learning planning this research uses the rd model d method from thiagarajan and melvynl the subjects in this study were students of early childhood Islamic education at UIN Raden Fatah Palembang with data collection instruments in the form of observation questionnaires validated by language design material experts to test the quality of modules or textbooks and documentation based on the assessment of material experts with a very valid category the assessment of design experts with a very valid category and the assessment of language experts with a valid category while the assessment of field trials with respondent questionnaires the level of effectiveness of small-scale trials with a very effective category and respondent questionnaires for large-scale trials with a very effective category this teaching material is declared very effective for use by students in the lecture process of early childhood Islamic education learning planning courses

desc: Untuk meningkatkan budaya literasi, dibutuhkan model pembelajaran Literasi yang menyenangkan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menguji efektivitas mengembangkan konsep Fun Garden of Literacy yang ramah bagi siswa sekolah dasar. Melalui Fun Garden of Literacy digunakan untuk mengembangan literasi siswa. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian eksperimental dengan desain pretest-posttest. Sampel dalam penelitian ini berjumlah 100 siswa. Penentuan sampel menggunakan simple random sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data adalah tes dan observasi. Teknik analisis data adalah statistik deskriptif dan uji-t (uji-t). Temuan perhitungan menunjukkan bahwa hasil t adalah 4,53 dengan tingkat signifikansi 0,002, yang lebih kecil dari 0,05. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan ada perbedaan dalam hasil tes sebelum dan sesudah diberikan Fun Garden of Literacy. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Fun Garden of Literacy efektif dalam meningkatkan keterampilan baca tulis siswa sekolah dasar. Fun Garden of Literacy dapat menumbuhkan minat baca anak.
title: Efektivitas Pengembangan Karakter melalui Fun Garden of Literacy Bagi Anak Usia 7 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effectiveness of character development through fun garden of literacy for children aged years to improve literacy culture requires a fun literacy learning model this study aims to test the effectiveness of developing the concept of fun garden of literacy that is friendly to elementary school students through fun garden of literacy used to develop student literacy this study uses an experimental research method with a pretestposttest design the sample in this study amounted to students the determination of the sample using simple random sampling data collection techniques are tests and observations data analysis techniques are descriptive statistics and t-tests the findings of the calculation show that the t-test results are with a smaller level of significance than the results of the study indicate that there are differences in test results before and after being given fun garden of literacy based on the results of the study indicate that fun garden of literacy is effective in improving the reading and writing skills of elementary school students fun garden of literacy can foster children's interest in reading

desc: Latar belakag penelitian ini mengidentifikasi rendahnya pemahaman dan persiapan PAUD terhadap potensi bencana, menegaskan perlunya transformasi siaga bencana sebagai strategi proaktif dalam meningkatkan kesiapsiagaan. Obyek penelitian adalah satuan PAUD sebagai unit dasar pendidikan. Tujuan utama adalah mengukur efektivitas transformasi siaga bencana dalam memperkuat safety culture di lingkungan PAUD melalui pendidikan kebencanaan. Temuan penelitian menunjukkan bahwa partisipasi aktif dalam program pendidikan kebencanaan secara signifikan meningkatkan pemahaman dan kesiagaan di kalangan tenaga pengajar, siswa, dan orang tua di lingkungan PAUD. Selain itu, pendekatan pembelajaran yang melibatkan interaksi langsung dengan skenario bencana melalui simulasi juga terbukti menjadi metode yang efektif untuk membangun keterampilan tanggap darurat. Peserta didik yang terlibat dalam latihan simulasi tersebut menunjukkan peningkatan yang nyata dalam kemampuan bekerja sama, kepemimpinan, dan pengambilan keputusan di bawah tekanan. Simpulan penelitian menegaskan bahwa integrasi pendidikan kebencanaan mampu membentuk budaya keselamatan yang lebih baik di PAUD dan masyarakat sekitar terhadap bencana alam.
title: Transformasi Siaga Bencana: Membangun Safety Culture melalui Pendidikan Kebencanaan di Satuan PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: disaster preparedness transformation building safety culture through disaster education in early childhood education units the background of this study identified the low understanding and preparation of early childhood education units for potential disasters emphasizing the need for disaster preparedness transformation as a proactive strategy in improving preparedness the object of the study is early childhood education units as basic education units the main objective is to measure the effectiveness of disaster preparedness transformation in strengthening safety culture in early childhood education environments through disaster education the findings of the study indicate that active participation in disaster education programs significantly increases understanding and preparedness among teachers, students and parents in early childhood education environments in addition, a learning approach that involves direct interaction with disaster scenarios through simulations has also proven to be an effective method for building emergency response skills students involved in the simulation exercise showed a marked increase in their ability to work together, lead and make decisions under pressure the conclusion of the study confirms that the integration of disaster education is able to form a better safety culture in early childhood education units and the surrounding community against natural disasters

desc: Pengembangan kecerdasan anak usia dini memerlukan proses yang tidak mudah sebab anak usia dini memiliki keunikan yang berbeda antara anak satu dengan yang lainnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis dan mengkaji tentang meningkatkan kecerdasan visual spasial anak usia dini melalui media game gartic di RA Raisul Anwar Kotaanyar Probolinggo. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif. Teknik analisis datanya dilakukan melalui reduksi data memilih data yang dibutuhkan dalam penelitian, kemudian display data menampilkan data-data yang dipilih, dan dilanjut penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menghasilkan keadaan lembaga RA Raisul Anwar menggunakan media game gartic dalam upaya meningkatkan kecerdasan visual spasial anak didik, game gartic yang dikemas menarik mampu memberikan ketertarikan yang mampu memancing kecerdasan visual spasial anak muncul dan berkembang. Implementasi game gartic dilakukan melalui cara analisis kebutuhan, pengenalan kecerdasan visual spasial melalui game gartic, evaluasi kegiatan, rencana berjenjang
title: Meningkatkan Kecerdasan Visual Spasial Anak Usia Dini Melalui Media Game Gartic
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving visual spatial intelligence of early childhood through gartic game media the development of early childhood intelligence requires a process that is not easy because early childhood has different uniqueness between one child and another this study aims to analyze and examine about improving visual spatial intelligence of early childhood through gartic game media in ra raisul anwar kotaanyar probolinggo this study uses a qualitative approach the data analysis technique is carried out through data reduction selecting the data needed in the study then displaying the selected data and continuing to draw conclusions the results of the study resulted in the state of the ra raisul anwar institution using gartic game media in an effort to improve the visual spatial intelligence of students gartic games that are packaged attractively are able to provide interest that can provoke children's visual spatial intelligence to emerge and develop the implementation of gartic games is carried out through the analysis of the needs of introducing visual spatial intelligence through gartic games evaluation of tiered plan activities

desc: Keterbatasan guru dalam menerapkan model pembelajaran sentra menjadi permasalahan dalam menyampaikan materi, karena kurangnya pedoman pembelajaran sentra di sekolah. Tujuan penelitian ini  untuk menghasilkan produk berupa video model pembelajaran sentra berbasis multikultural yang layak digunakan. Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan menggunakan metode pengembangan Research  Development (RD) mengacu pada model ADDIE (Analysis, Design, Develop, Implementation, and Evaluation). Adapun teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan observasi, wawancara, dan angket. Angket berupa lembar penilaian video model pembelajaran terdiri dari ahli materi, ahli media, dosen, guru, dan mahasiswa. Media video model pembelajaran sentra berbasis multikultural menjadi salah satu alternatif guru, mahasiswa, dan dosen yang dapat dijadikan sebagai sumber informasi dan pedoman dalam menyampaikan materi pembelajaran
title: Pengembangan Video Model Pembelajaran Sentra Berbasis Multikultural  di TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of multicultural-based center learning model videos in kindergartens, teachers' limitations in implementing center learning models become a problem in delivering material due to the lack of center learning guidelines in schools. The purpose of this study is to produce a product in the form of a multicultural-based center learning model video that is suitable for use. This study was conducted using the research development rd development method referring to the addie analysis design develop implementation and evaluation model. The data collection technique was carried out by observation, interviews and questionnaires. The questionnaire was in the form of a video assessment sheet for the learning model consisting of material experts, media experts, lecturers, teachers and students. The multicultural-based center learning model video media is one alternative for teachers, students and lecturers that can be used as a source of information and guidelines in delivering learning materials.

desc: Seni Burok merupakan jenis permainan tradisional yang sudah dikenal oleh masyarakat daerah Pantura Kabupaten Cirebon. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan proses dan hasil belajar melalui modifikasi seni tradisional burok untuk meningkatkan kemampuan gerak dasar lokomotor anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian campuran. Dilakukan 12 pertemuan dibagi menjadi dua siklus. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah analisis data kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Kemampuan gerak dasar lokomotor meningkat pada siklus pertama dibandingkan pada pra siklus dan meningkat lagi setelah siklus kedua. Peningkatan tersebut membuktikan bahwa permainan seni Burok dapat melatih gerak dasar lokomotor dimensi berjalan, dimensi berlari, dimensi melompat, selain itu dapat melatih kemampuan mendengar, kemampuan berbicara, kemampuan berperan serta kemampuan keterampilan
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Gerak Dasar Lokomotor Anak melalui Modifikasi Seni Tradisional Burok
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving children's basic locomotor movement skills through modifications to traditional burok art. Burok art is a type of traditional game that is already known by the people of the Pantura region, Cirebon Regency. This study aims to describe the process and results of learning through modifications to traditional burok art to improve children's basic locomotor movement skills. This study uses a mixed research method. Meetings are divided into two cycles. Data analysis techniques used are qualitative and quantitative data analysis. Basic locomotor movement skills increase in the first cycle compared to the pre-cycle and increase again after the second cycle. This increase proves that the burok art game can train basic locomotor movements in the walking dimension. Running dimension. Jumping dimension. In addition, it can train listening skills. Speaking skills. Role-playing skills. Skills.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis penerapan metode storytelling berbasis cerita rakyat sasak untuk menanamkan nilai-nilai karakter pada anak Taman Kanak-Kanak di TK Ummi Adniyah NW Sekarteja. Penelitian yang digunakan adalah penelitian kualitatif. Jenis Pendekatan yang digunakan adalah pendekatan deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data adalah observasi, Wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Instumen pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah peneliti, Lembar Observasi, dan wawancara. Uji keabsahan data dengan uji credibility, Uji Transferability, kebergantungan dependability dan kepastian confirmability. Proses analisis data dilakukan dengan menggunakan model analisis interaktif Miles  Huberman yaitu Data Collection, Data Display, Data Reduction, dan Conclusion Drawing. Hasil dari penelitian didapatkan kegiatan storytelling dengan menggunakan cerita rakyat mampu untuk menanamkan nilai-nilai karakter. Nilai-nilai karakter yang muncul diantaranya adalah karakter tanggung jawab, mandiri, jujur, religious, dan kerjasama. Karakter yang muncul merupakan sebuah akumulasi yang muncul dari perilaku anak-anak setelah mendengarkan cerita rakyat yang digunakan seperti lelampaq Lendong Kaoq dan  Tegodek-godek dan Tetuntel-tuntel
title: Penanaman Nilai-Nilai Karakter melalui Kegiatan Storytelling dengan Menggunakan Cerita Rakyat Sasak pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: instilling character values ​​through storytelling activities using Sasak folklore in early childhood This study aims to analyze the application of storytelling methods based on Sasak folklore to instill character values ​​in kindergarten children at Ummi Adniyah NW Sekarteja The research used is qualitative research The type of approach used is a qualitative descriptive approach Data collection techniques are observation, interviews and documentation Data collection instruments used are researchers, observation sheets and interviews Data validity test with credibility test Transferability test Dependability and certainty Confirmability The data analysis process was carried out using the Miles Huberman interactive analysis model, namely data collection, data display, data reduction and conclusion drawing The results of the study showed that storytelling activities using folklore were able to instill character values ​​The character values ​​that emerged include the character of responsibility, independence, honesty, religious and cooperation The characters that emerged were an accumulation that emerged from children's behavior after listening to the folklore used such as lelampaq lendong kaoq and tegodekgodek and tetunteltuntel

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengkaji perkembangan penelitian mengenai karakter Pancasila anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan adalah studi literatur dengan menggunakan aplikasi Publish or Perish dan Google Scholar sebagai sumber data. Pencarian dilakukan pada publikasi jurnal yang telah terindeks pada Google Scholar dengan kata kunci karakter Pancasila, pendidikan anak usia dini, kearifan budaya lokal dari tahun 2013 hingga 2023 dengan menghasilkan sebanyak 994 artikel. Temuan menunjukkan bahwa publikasi pada topik ini mengalami pertumbuhan signifikan sejak tahun 2016 hingga puncaknya di tahun 2021. Hasilnya bahwa Pendidikan karakter berbasis kearifan budaya lokal berperan positif dalam meningkatkan karakter anak usia dini yang berlandaskan nilai-nilai Pancasila. Dalam konteks Kurikulum Merdeka dan Proyek Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila (P5). Pendekatan ini menjadi solusi alternatif dalam membentuk generasi yang berkarakter, menghargai keanekaragaman budaya, dan memiliki pengetahuan tentang nilai-nilai lokal. Peran pendidik menjadi sentral dalam mengembangkan strategi pembelajaran kreatif dan inovatif.
title: Penguatan Karakter Pancasila Anak Usia Dini melalui Kearifan Budaya Lokal: Sebuah Studi Literatur
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strengthening the character of Pancasila in early childhood through local cultural wisdom a literature study this study aims to examine the development of research on the character of Pancasila in early childhood the method used is a literature study using the publish or perish application and google scholar as a source of search data is carried out on journal publications that have been indexed on google scholar with

desc: This study aims to analyze the planning, implementation, and supervision of learning in the 4.0 industrial revolution era at one kindergarten school located in Pematangsiantar since early childhood education is expected to produce creative, character, competent and innovative graduates which can only be done through the creation of conducive learning conditions supported by learning management. The research method used is a qualitative approach with descriptive research. The research was carried out at one kindergarten school located in Pematangsiantar with data collection techniques through interviews and observations. The results showed that based on existing competencies in the 4.0 industrial revolution era, there were innovations and a number of breakthroughs produced by teachers in improving the quality of learning in the form of curriculum development and the use of information and communication technology in carrying out several approaches and learning strategies. One of the breakthroughs that has been made is video learning for early childhood. All processes of innovation and breakthroughs in the learning process are supported by the ability of teachers to implement good learning management principles.
title: How to Improve the Quality of Learning for Early Childhood? An Implementation of Education Management in the Industrial Revolution Era 4.0
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: how to improve the quality of learning for early childhood an implementation of education management in the industrial revolution era this study aims to analyze the planning implementation and supervision of learning in the industrial revolution era at one kindergarten school located in pematangsiantar since early childhood education is expected to produce creative character competent and innovative graduates which can only be done through the creation of conducive learning conditions supported by learning management the research method used is a qualitative approach with descriptive research the research was carried out at one kindergarten school located in pematangsiantar with data collection techniques through interviews and observations results showed that based on existing competencies in the industrial revolution era there were innovations and a number of breakthroughs produced by teachers in improving the quality of learning in the form of curriculum development and the use of information and communication technology in carrying out several approaches and learning strategies one of the breakthroughs that has been made is video learning for early childhood all processes of innovation and breakthroughs in the learning process are supported by the ability of teachers to implement good learning management principles

desc: Penurunan pencapaian aspek perkembangan motorik kasar anak akibat kegiatan PJJ sehingga perlunya dilakukan pembelajaran tatap muka terbatas. Oleh karena itu, strategi pembelajaran guru menjadi penting untuk mengoptimalkan pembelajaran dan perkembangan anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui upaya guru dalam menstimulasi perkembangan motorik kasar anak pada pembelajaran tatap muka terbatas. Merupakan penelitian kualitatif dengan metode deskriptif. Penelitian dilakukan di Lembaga PAUD Kabupaten Sleman Yogyakarta dengan jumlah sampel penelitian sebanyak 6 informan (guru). Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Analisis data yang digunakan adalah pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menggambarkan bahwa upaya yang dilakukan guru dapat dilaksanakan secara efektif dengan menggunakan metode ceramah dan praktik langsung, memanfaatkan dan memodifikasi media yang ada, memanfaatkan waktu yang sangat terbatas meskipun pelaksanaannya berbeda-beda sesuai dengan kondisi dan kebutuhan anak sehingga perkembangan aspek motorik kasar tetap dapat terstimulasi dengan baik.
title: Upaya Guru dalam Menstimulasi Perkembangan Motorik Kasar pada Pembelajaran Tatap Muka Terbatas
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teachers' efforts in stimulating gross motor development in limited face-to-face learning decreased achievement of gross motor development aspects of children due to distance learning activities so that limited face-to-face learning is needed therefore teacher learning strategies are important to optimize children's learning and development this study aims to determine teacher efforts in stimulating gross motor development of children in limited face-to-face learning is a qualitative study with a descriptive method the study was conducted at the Sleman Regency PAUD institution in Yogyakarta with a total of 100 teacher informants data collection techniques using observation interviews and documentation data analysis used is data collection data reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions the results of the study illustrate that the efforts made by teachers can be implemented effectively by using lecture methods and direct practice utilizing and modifying existing media utilizing very limited time even though the implementation varies according to the conditions and needs of the child so that the development of gross motor aspects can still be stimulated properly

desc: Playing is a learning method that best suits learning in early childhood. The clap hand games is one of the types of play that is applied in Early Childhood Education. The purpose of education in early childhood is to develop six aspects of its development namely; aspects of religious and moral norms, aspects of the physical and motor, aspects of cognition, aspects of the emotional social, aspects of language and aspects of art. This study aimed to know the utilization of deep pat game on improving aspects of cognitive in early childhood. The subjects of this study were children of group B Taman Kanak-Kanak (TK) Flamboyan Mekar Tapung District Kampar regency a number of 14 girls and 8 boys. Data collection Technic used is documentation, questionnaire, and interview. This research involves the Ikatan Guru Taman Kanak-Kanak Indonesia (IGTKI) Tapung District to gain input in the development of game pat in order to obtain results. The results of the analysis showed that 86% of children could increase aspects of cognitive development
title: Useful of Clap Hand Games for Optimalize Cogtivite Aspects in Early Childhood Education
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: usefulness of clap hand games to optimize cognitive aspects in early childhood education playing is a learning method that best suits learning in early childhood the clap hand gamesis one of the types of play that is applied in early childhood education the purpose of education in early childhood is to develop six aspects of its development namely aspects of religious and moral norms aspects of the physical and motor aspects of cognition aspects of the emotional social aspects of language and aspects of art this study aims to know the utilization of deep pat game on improving aspects of cognitive in early childhood the subjects of this study were children of group btamandakanak tk flamboyan bloom tapung district kampar regency a number of girls and boys data collection technique used is documentation questionnaire and interview analysis showed that children could increase aspects of cognitive development

desc: Sebagai dampak adanya wabah Covid 19 maka  diterapkan model pembelajaran dari rumah secara daring.  Dalam penerapannya banyak ditemukan kendala dan tantangan baik yang dikemukakan oleh orang tua maupun oleh guru di lapangan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk memperoleh data tentang pendapat anak terhadap pembelajaran daring yang telah dilakukannya selama ini. Responden dalam penelitian ini adalah 105 anak usia 5-6 tahun di wilayah Bandung.  Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah metode kuantitatif dengan teknik survey sedangkan analisis data  menggunakan analisis deskriptif dengan menggunakan prosentase. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa pada umumnya 57,1% anak-anak merasa bosan belajar di rumah dan lebih menyukai belajar di sekolah. Sedangkan sekitar 42,9% menyatakan senang belajar di rumah. Data tersebut menunjukkan bahwa anak-anak sebagian besar cenderung menyukai kegiatan belajar di sekolah dibandingkan dengan belajar di rumah. Anak-anak merasa bosan dengan kegiatan belajar dari rumah secara daring.
title: Evaluasi Pelaksanaan Pembelajaran Daring di TK Dari Perspektif Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: evaluation of the implementation of online learning in kindergarten from the perspective of early childhood as an impact of the covid outbreak, the online home learning model was implemented in its implementation, many obstacles and challenges were found, both expressed by parents and teachers in the field. This study aims to obtain data on children's opinions on online learning that they have done so far. The respondents in this study were children aged years in the Bandung area. The research method used was a quantitative method with a survey technique, while data analysis used descriptive analysis using a percentage. The results of the study showed that in general children felt bored studying at home and preferred studying at school, while around 100 stated that they were happy to study at home. The data shows that most children tend to prefer learning activities at school compared to studying at home. Children feel bored with online learning activities from home.

desc: Studi penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi karena pada abad 21 di Indonesia sedang mengalami gawat darurat  pendidikan. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengembangkan model permainan yang relevan untuk anak usia dini berbasis barang bekas di sekitar lingkungan anak. Penelitian ini adalah rangkaian Riset dan Pengembangan (Research  Development) melalui Model ADDIE: analyze (A), design (D), develop (D), implementation (I), evaluate (E). Objek penelitian ini dilaksanakan pada 5 lembaga satuan pendidikan PAUD yaitu 75 peserta didik. Teknik mengumpulkan data melalui teknik observasi, wawancara, dokumentasi kemudian dianalisis menggunakan analisis kuantitatif sederhana. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukan bahwa dari hasil uji efektifitas pada tabel gain berkategori sedang dan data telah diuji efektifitasnya berdistribusi tergolong normal dan uji t pretest dan posttest terjadi perubahan yang signifikan. Kesimpulan penelitian ini model permainan yang dikembangkan dapat meningkatkan kompetensi abad 21 pembelajaran PAUD.
title: Pengembangan Model Permainan Berbasis Barang Bekas untuk Membangun Kompetensi Abad 21 pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of a game model based on used goods to build century competencies in early childhood this research study was motivated because in the century in Indonesia is experiencing an educational emergency the purpose of this study is to develop a relevant game model for early childhood based on used goods around the child's environment this study is a series of research and development research development through the addie analyze a design d develop d implementation i evaluate e model the object of this research was carried out at the early childhood education unit institution, namely students the technique of collecting data through observation techniques interviews documentation then analyzed using simple quantitative analysis the results of this study indicate that from the results of the effectiveness test in the gain table are categorized as moderate and the data has been tested for effectiveness is distributed normally and the pretest and posttest t tests show significant changes the conclusion of this study the game model developed can improve the century competency of early childhood learning

desc: Generasi Milenial untuk konteks perspektif perkembangan sosial anak usia dini adalah mereka dengan karakteristik tersendiri  yaitu orang tua (ibu atau ayah) lahir pada tahun 1980 hingga 2000 an mempunyai anak balita dan anak yang akan memasuki usia sekolah.   Tujuan penelitian mendapatkan informasi tentang peran orang tua milenial dalam pengasuhan aspek perkembangan sosial  anak  usia dini di Provinsi Jawa Tengah. Pendekatan yang digunakan deskriptif kuantitatif yang mendeskripsikan, menganalisis, dan menjelaskan orang tua millennial dalam aspek perkembangan sosial anak usia dini. Data yang dipakai  berasal dari Survey Kinerja Akuntabilitas  Program BKKBN tahun 2019.  Novelty  penelitian pengasuhan orang tua Milenial dalam perkembangan sosial anak dengan cara disekolahkan dalam paud/play group/day care  sebesar 62.6 persen , anak  diajak bersosialisasi sebesar 74.7 persen sedangkan  bermain dengan teman sebaya sebesar 91.6 Persen.  Aspek perkembangan sosial lainnya  untuk anak dikursuskan 10.9 persen dan anak diikutkan lomba sebesar 20 persen
title: Partisipasi Orang Tua Milenial dalam Aspek Perkembangan Sosial Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: participation of millennial parents in the social development aspect of early childhood the millennial generation for the context of the perspective of social development of early childhood are those with their own characteristics, namely parents who are mothers or fathers born in the year to have toddlers and children who will enter school age the purpose of the study was to obtain information about the role of millennial parents in the care of the social development aspect of early childhood in Central Java province the approach used was quantitative descriptive which described analyzing and explaining millennial parents in the social development aspect of early childhood the data used came from the performance accountability survey of the BKKBN program in the year novelty research on the care of millennial parents in the social development of children by being schooled in PAUDplay groupday care by percent children were invited to socialize by percent while playing with peers by percent other aspects of social development for children were given courses percent and children were included in competitions by percent

desc: Keterbatasan pemberian stimulasi sensori pada tahun-tahun pertama kelahiran anak telah memunculkan berbagai perilaku anak dengan masalah sensori, sehingga menjadi kendala dalam beraktivitas sehari-hari saat anak memasuki dunia prasekolah. Berlatar kondisi itu maka penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan produk media cetak berupa buku panduan aktivitas pembelajaran yang dapat menstimulasi kemampuan sensori anak usia 4-6 tahun dengan pendekatan bermain inderawi berbasis tujuh indera yang membantu guru dalam menstimulasi sensori anak. Metode penelitian menggunakan Research and Development (RD) dengan model pengembangan ADDIE yang terintegrasi dengan model Rowentree. Penelitian ini dilakukan pada 35 orang guru Taman Kanak-Kanak se Kecamatan Cempaka Putih, Jakarta Pusat. Berdasarkan hasil analisis data menunjukkan bahwa buku panduan yang dikembangkan memiliki kualitas yang sangat valid dan sangat layak untuk digunakan para guru dalam dalam memberikan stimulasi sensori yang terintegrasi dengan aktivitas pembelajaran yang tersusun secara terstruktur dan terkonsep, sehingga anak dapat berperilaku tepat terhadap sensasi yang muncul di lingkungan sekitar.
title: Pengembangan Media Stimulasi Sensori Anak Usia 4-6 Tahun Berbasis Aktivitas Bermain Tujuh Indera
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of sensory stimulation media for children aged 18-24 years based on seven-sensory play activities limitations in providing sensory stimulation in the first years of a child's birth have given rise to various behaviors of children with sensory problems so that they become obstacles in their daily activities when children enter the preschool world with the background of these conditions, this study aims to produce a printed media product in the form of a learning activity guidebook that can stimulate the sensory abilities of children aged 18-24 years with a sensory play approach based on seven senses that helps teachers in stimulating children's sensory the research method uses research and development rd with the addie development model integrated with the rowentree model this study was conducted on kindergarten teachers in cempaka putih sub-district, central jakarta based on the results of data analysis shows that the guidebook developed has a very valid quality and is very suitable for use by teachers in providing sensory stimulation that is integrated with learning activities that are structured and conceptualized so that children can behave appropriately towards the sensations that arise in the surrounding environment

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menguji dan mendeskripsikan model pembelajaran TLPIE berbasis drawing-coloring art dalam menstimulasi kemampuan berpikir kreatif anak. Penggunaan data dari sampel anak usia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian dilakukan dengan menggunakan metode one group pretest-posttest dan dianalisis menggunakan uji t-dependen dan uji N-Gain Score. Kategori pengukuran berpikir kreatif anak dengan mengadopsi the Analysing Children’s Creative Thinking Framework dan dikembangkan sesuai dengan tahapan pelaksanaan pembelajaran berbasis drawing-coloring art. Berdasarkan hasil paired sample t-test dan uji N-Gain Skor, pembelajaran berbasis drawing-coloring art dapat menstimulasi kemampuan berpikir kreatif anak secara efektif. Hal ini dikarenakan adanya prinsip dukungan interaksi sosial, kesempatan bereksplorasi, dan scaffolding pada model pembelajaran berbasis drawing-coloring art. Interaksi sosial terwujud dalam bentuk komunikasi dua arah atau dengan melakukan tanya jawab berkenaan dengan apa yang akan dan apa yang sudah dilakukan oleh anak dan kesempatan bereksplorasi memberikan peluang bagi anak untuk mengembangkan pemikiran kreatifnya.
title: Efektivitas Model Pembelajaran TLPIE berbasis Drawing-Coloring Art dalam Menstimulasi Kemampuan Berpikir Kreatif Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of the tlpie learning model based on drawing-coloring art in stimulating the creative thinking skills of early childhood This study aims to test and describe the tlpie learning model based on drawing-coloring art in stimulating the creative thinking skills of children. The use of data from a sample of children aged years. The study was conducted using the one group pretest-posttest method and analyzed using the dependent t test and the ngain score test. The category of measuring children's creative thinking by adopting the analyzing children's creative thinking framework and developed according to the stages of implementing drawing-coloring art-based learning based on the results of the paired sample t test and the ngain score test. Drawing-coloring art-based learning can stimulate children's creative thinking skills effectively. This is due to the principle of supporting social interaction, opportunities to explore and scaffolding in the drawing-coloring art-based learning model. Social interaction is manifested in the form of two-way communication or by asking questions regarding what the child will and has done and the opportunity to explore provides opportunities for children to develop their creative thinking.

desc: A person's self-confidence level is different; in essence, every human being is created to have self-confidence, but self-confidence is different from one another. Some grow and develop from birth, but some are obtained from several factors, such as parenting and environmental stimulation. This study aims to determine the management of parenting methods in growing children's self-confidence. The research method used is a qualitative case study type method. The research results show that; the parenting method in stimulating the development of self-confidence in students is carried out in the following stages: program planning, classification of parenting programs, implementation of parent gathering programs, and program evaluation. The management of the parenting method used turns out to be able to stimulate children's self-confidence optimally because the management is carried out continuously by involving the collaboration of teachers and student guardians; this collaboration is a novelty from previous research and through collaboration makes students more confident, independent and able to adapt to the environment.
title: Increasing Children's Self-Confidence through Parenting: Management Perspective
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: increasing children's self-confidence through parenting management perspective a persons self-confidence level is different in essence every human being is created to have self-confidence but self-confidence is different from one another some grow and develop from birth but some obtained are from several factors such as parenting and environmental stimulation this study aims to determine the management of parenting methods in growing children's self-confidence the research method used is a qualitative case study type method the research results show that the parenting method in stimulating the development of self-confidence in students is carried out in the following stages program planning classification of parenting implementation programs of parent gathering programs and program evaluation the management of the parenting method used turns out to be able to stimulate children's self-confidence optimally because the management is carried out continuously by involving the collaboration of teachers and student guardians this collaboration is a novelty from previous research and through collaboration makes students more confident independent and able to adapt to the environment

desc: Anak usia dini memerlukan banyak sekali informasi untuk mengisi pengetahuannya agar siap menjadi manusia sesungguhnya. Dalam hal ini memberikan pengetahuan tentang kearifan lokal di setiap daerah kepada anak-anak. Penelitian ini secara umum bertujuan untuk meneliti dan mengembangkan suatu media pembelajaran. Secara khusus penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menentukan hasil pencapaian pengetahuan menggunakan media pembelajaran interaktif dan media konvensional. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah menggunakan metode kuantitatif. Desain penelitian ini menggunakan quasi group design. Hasil dan pembahasan dalam penelitian ini dapat ditarik kesimpulan bahwa hasil pencapaian media pembelajaran interaktif kearifan lokal kabupaten semarang menggunakan video animasi lebih besar dari pada hasil pencapaian media pembelajaran interaktif kearifan lokal kabupaten semarang menggunakan video konvensional. Saran dalam penelitian ini yaitu dapat melakukan penelitian lanjutan terkait Media Pembelajaran Interaktif Kearifan Lokal Kabupaten Semarang dengan menggunakan tema atau daerah lainnya
title: Penerapan Media Pembelajaran Interaktif Kearifan Lokal Kabupaten Semarang
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The application of interactive learning media of local wisdom of Semarang Regency, early childhood requires a lot of information to fill their knowledge so that they are ready to become real humans, in this case providing knowledge about local wisdom in each region to children. This study generally aims to research and develop a learning media. Specifically, this study aims to determine the results of achieving knowledge using interactive learning media and conventional media. The research method used in this study is to use a quantitative method. This research design uses a quasi group design. The results and discussion in this study can be concluded that the results of achieving interactive learning media of local wisdom of Semarang Regency using animated videos are greater than the results of achieving interactive learning media of local wisdom of Semarang Regency using conventional videos. The suggestion in this study is to conduct further research related to interactive learning media of local wisdom of Semarang Regency using other themes or regions.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengeksplorasi peran permainan edukatif dalam pengembangan keterampilan berbicara bahasa Inggris pada anak usia dini. Metode studi literatur digunakan untuk menyelidiki berbagai aspek literatur terkait, terutama yang berkaitan dengan integrasi permainan edukatif. Fokus utama penelitian ini adalah pada konteks pendidikan anak usia dini. Dengan menggunakan metode ini, penelitian dapat menggali wawasan mendalam mengenai bagaimana permainan edukatif dapat diintegrasikan secara efektif dalam proses pendidikan anak usia dini. Dalam penelitian ini, temuan utama mengungkap bahwa permainan edukatif memiliki dampak positif yang signifikan terhadap motivasi, pengembangan kosakata, dan keterampilan sosial anak-anak. Sebagai langkah konkrit, integrasi permainan edukatif ke dalam kurikulum telah menunjukkan peningkatan yang berarti dalam konteks pembelajaran sehari-hari di lingkungan pendidikan. Para peneliti menyoroti bahwa efek positif ini tidak hanya bersifat sementara, tetapi juga berkelanjutan seiring berjalannya waktu. Dengan memasukkan permainan edukatif, guru dapat menciptakan pengalaman belajar yang lebih menarik dan interaktif bagi siswa, meningkatkan kualitas pembelajaran di kelas. Hasil penelitian ini mendukung penerapan strategi pembelajaran yang dinamis dan menyenangkan. Kesimpulannya, permainan edukatif berperan penting dalam mendukung pengembangan keterampilan berbicara bahasa Inggris pada anak usia dini.
title: Peran Permainan Edukatif dalam Mengembangkan Keterampilan Berbicara Bahasa Inggris pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of educational games in developing English speaking skills in early childhood This study aims to explore the role of educational games in developing English speaking skills in early childhood The literature study method is used to investigate various aspects of related literature, especially those related to the integration of educational games The main focus of this study is on the context of early childhood education By using this method, the study can explore in-depth insights into how educational games can be effectively integrated into the early childhood education process In this study, the main findings revealed that educational games have a significant positive impact on children's motivation to develop vocabulary and social skills as a concrete step The integration of educational games into the curriculum has shown significant improvements in the context of everyday learning in the educational environment The researchers highlighted that these positive effects are not only temporary but also sustainable over time By incorporating educational games, teachers can create more interesting and interactive learning experiences for students Improve the quality of learning in the classroom The results of this study support the implementation of dynamic and fun learning strategies Conclusion Educational games play an important role in supporting the development of English speaking skills in early childhood

desc: Aceh merupakan daerah rawan bencana dan anak-anak menjadi kelompok yang paling rentan menjadi korban sehingga pengetahuan kebencanaan perlu diberikan sedini mungkin. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui bagaimana persepsi calon guru PAUD terkait penambahan pendidikan mitigasi bencana kedalam kurikulum PAUD. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif.  Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui wawancara via Google Formulir (GForm) yang dibagikan pada mahasiswa calon guru PAUD sebanyak 75 orang di Prodi Pendidikan Islam Anak Usia Dini UIN Ar-Raniry, Banda Aceh. Hasil penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa para calon guru PAUD setuju jika pendidikan mitigasi bencana dimasukkan kedalam kurikulum PAUD karena akan menghasilkan sumber daya manusia yang tangguh dan siap siaga bencana
title: Persepsi Calon Guru PAUD terhadap Kurikulum Berbasis Pendidikan Mitigasi Bencana
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Perception of prospective early childhood education teachers towards disaster mitigation education-based curriculum Aceh is a disaster-prone area and children are the most vulnerable group to become victims so that disaster knowledge needs to be provided as early as possible. The purpose of this study was to determine the perception of prospective early childhood education teachers regarding the addition of disaster mitigation education to the early childhood education curriculum. This study used a qualitative descriptive method. Data collection was carried out through interviews via Google Form Gform which was distributed to prospective early childhood education teacher students as many as 100 people in the Islamic education study program for early childhood UIN Arraniry Banda Aceh. The results of the study revealed that prospective early childhood education teachers agreed that disaster mitigation education should be included in the early childhood education curriculum because it would produce human resources who are resilient and disaster-ready.

desc: Pembelajaran Kreativitas Seni Rupa anak usia dini mengharuskan pendidik untuk dapat mendesain pembelajaran dengan memanfaatkan media/bahan sebagai sarana penyalur pembelajaran agar lebih menarik serta menyenangkan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis penggunaan bahan sisa pada pembelajaran kreativitas seni rupa anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian dengan metode penelitian deskriptif kualitatif dengan melakukan pengamatan aktivitas untuk memperoleh data fakta serta menganalisisnya dengan tepat. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan Observasi, Wawancara dan Dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data pada penelitian ini menggunakan langkah-langkah pengumpulan data, reduksi data, display data, verivikasi dan penegasan kesimpulan. Hasil dari penelitian menunjukan bahwa bahan sisa dapat menjadi media yang efektif serta ekonomis yang mampu menarik perhatian dalam pembelajaran kreativitas seni rupa pada anak usia dini. Dampak penggunaan bahan sisa menjadikan pembelajaran kreativitas seni rupa menjadi lebih menyenangkan, menciptakan lingkungan kelas yang tidak monoton, mendorong anak untuk aktif dalam pembelajaran serta anak dapat membuat sebuat karya seni rupa sesuai dengan ide dan imajinasi yang ada pada pikiran
title: Analisis Penggunaan Bahan Sisa pada Pembelajaran Kreativitas Seni Rupa Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the use of leftover materials in early childhood art creativity learning Early childhood art creativity learning requires educators to be able to design learning by utilizing media materials as a means of delivering learning to make it more interesting and enjoyable This study aims to analyze the use of leftover materials in early childhood art creativity learning This study is a study with a qualitative descriptive research method by observing activities to obtain factual data and analyzing them appropriately Data collection was carried out by observation, interviews and documentation Data analysis techniques in this study used data collection steps, data reduction, data display, verification and confirmation of conclusions The results of the study showed that leftover materials can be an effective and economical medium that can attract attention in early childhood art creativity learning The impact of using leftover materials makes learning art creativity more enjoyable Creating a non-monotonous classroom environment Encourages children to be active in learning and children can create works of art according to the ideas and imaginations in their minds

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan peran orangtua terhadap kesiapan sekolah anak usia dini di TK Aisyiyah III Kecamatan Rumbai Pesisir Kota Pekanbaru. Masalah yang ditemukan dilapangan anak masih belum bisa mandiri, masih didampingi orangtua ketika berada disekolah dan dibantu oleh orangtua dalam mengerjakan tugas disekolah. Orangtua adalah hal terpenting didalam pertumbuhan dan perkembangan anak.Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif. Untuk mengetahui tanggapan dari responden, teknik penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah dengan menggunakan skala likert 4. Hasil dari penelitian, orangtua sangat berperan penting dalam kesiapan sekolah anak yaitu bertanggungjawab terhadapan kesiapan sekolah anak, memotivasi, sebagai role model,sebagai pengawas dan sebagai konselor sehingga semua kebutuhan dalam kesiapan sekolah anak terpenuhi
title: Peran Orangtua terhadap Kesiapan Sekolah Taman Kanak-Kanak pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of parents in the readiness of kindergarten schools for early childhood This study aims to describe the role of parents in the readiness of early childhood schools in TK Aisyiyah III, Rumbai Pesisir sub-district, Pekanbaru city. The problems found in the field are that children are still not independent. They are still accompanied by their parents when they are at school and assisted by their parents in doing their homework at school. Parents are the most important thing in the growth and development of children. This study is a descriptive study to determine the responses of respondents. The research technique used in this study is to use a Likert scale. The results of the study are that parents play a very important role in children's school readiness, namely being responsible for children's school readiness, motivating them as role models, as supervisors and as counselors so that all needs in children's school readiness are met.

desc: Salah satu fungsi dari pengembangan kecerdasan spiritual adalah kesadaran anak atas eksitensi dirinya, kekurangannya, serta kelebihan, guna menuju pribadi dengan kesehatan fisik dan mental yang baik di masa depan. Tujuan penelitian yakni mendeskripsikan proses dan hasil pembelajaran melalui media permainan ular tangga dengan tema Islami untuk meningkatkan kecerdasan spiritual anak kelompok B RA Uniq Pekanbaru, Riau. Subjek penelitian 15 anak rentang usia 5-6 tahun. Metode penelitian menggunakan studi tindakan model Kemmis dan Mc. Taggart, dengan teknik pengumpulan data dengan instrumen non-tes: observasi, catatan lapangan, dan wawancara. Penelitian ini berjalan dengan dua siklus, siklus pertama mencakup empat kali tatap muka dan siklus kedua dengan tiga kali tatap muka. Analisis data dilakukan secara mix method antara kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil riset menunjukkan adanya perubahan kecerdasan spiritual anak melalui alat permainan edukatif ular tangga bertema islami dengan rata-rata skor kecerdasan spritual anak pada pra-siklus sebesar 36,07 mengalami peningkatan pada siklus pertama sebesar 62,86 dan pada siklus kedua sebesar 72. Disarankan bagi guru dan peneliti selanjutnya agar mengembangkan ular tangga bertema Islami untuk optimalisasi aspek perkembangan anak lainnya.
title: Impresi Permainan Edukatif atas Kecerdasan Spiritual  untuk Putra-Putri Rentang Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: impression of educational games on spiritual intelligence for children aged 15-20 years one of the functions of developing spiritual intelligence is children's awareness of their existence, their shortcomings and advantages in order to become individuals with good physical and mental health in the future the purpose of the study is to describe the process and results of learning through the media of the snake and ladder game with an Islamic theme to improve the spiritual intelligence of children in group B ra uniq pekanbaru riau the research subjects were children aged 15-20 years the research method used the action study model kemmis and mc taggart with data collection techniques with non-test instruments observation field notes and interviews this study ran with two cycles the first cycle included four face-to-face meetings and the second cycle with three face-to-face meetings data analysis was carried out using a mix method between qualitative and quantitative the results of the study showed a change in children's spiritual intelligence through the educational game tool snake and ladder with an Islamic theme with an average score of children's spiritual intelligence in the pre-cycle of experiencing an increase in the first cycle of 15 and in the second cycle of 15 it is recommended for teachers and further researchers to develop snakes and ladders with an Islamic theme to optimize other aspects of child development

desc: Metode yang digunakan pada penelitian ini adalah metode eksperimen yang melibatkan dua kelompok yaitu kelompok eksperimen. Sesuai dengan variabel penelitian yang telah disebutkan diatas, ada lima sumber yang akan dijaring untuk keperluan penelitian ini. Data tersebut antara lain: prestasi belajar ranah kognitif, motivasi belajar yang dijaring melalui angket Media gambar untuk aspek kognitif diperoleh persentase sebesar 85,50%, dan untuk aspek psikomotor diperoleh persentase sebesar 84,00%, sedangkan hasil belajar posttest pada penggunakan model pembelajaran konvensional untuk aspek kognitif diperoleh persentase sebesar 65,00%. pembelajaran berbasis Media gambar untuk aspek kognitif diperoleh persentase sebesar 85,50%, dan untuk aspek psikomotor diperoleh persentase sebesar 84,00%, sedangkan hasil belajar posttest pada penggunakan model pembelajaran konvensional untuk aspek kognitif diperoleh persentase sebesar 65,00%, dan untuk aspek psikomotor diperoleh persentase sebesar 60,50%. Berdasarkan hasil belajar posttest aspek kognitif dan aspek psikomotor setelah penggunaan media pembelajaran berbasis Media gambar dapat diambil keputusan bahwa penggunaan media pembelajaran lebih efektif digunakan untuk kegiatan belajar-mengajar pada mata pelajaran PLSBT Materi Lingkungan. Hal tersebut ditunjukan dari hasil belajar posttest aspek kognitif diperoleh persentase sebesar 85,50% dan aspek psikomotor diperoleh persentase sebesar 84,00%.
title: Efektifitas Media Pembelajaran Bebrbasis Gambar pada Materi Lingkungan PLSBT terhadap  Prestasi Belajar Mahasiswa Prodi PG-PAUD STKIP Pahlawan Tuanku Tambusai
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of image-based learning media on environmental material plsbt towards the learning achievement of students of pgpaud study program stkip Pahlawan tuanku tambusai The method used in this study is an experimental method involving two groups, namely the experimental group according to the research variables mentioned above, there are five sources that will be collected for the purposes of this study, the data include learning achievement in the cognitive domain, learning motivation which is collected through a questionnaire, image media for the cognitive aspect obtained a percentage of and for the psychomotor aspect obtained a percentage of while the posttest learning results on the use of conventional learning models for the cognitive aspect obtained a percentage of and for the psychomotor aspect obtained a percentage of while the posttest learning results on the use of conventional learning models for the cognitive aspect obtained a percentage of and for the psychomotor aspect obtained a percentage of based on the posttest learning results for the cognitive aspect and the psychomotor aspect obtained a percentage of based on the posttest learning results for the cognitive aspect and the psychomotor aspect after the use of image-based learning media, it can be concluded that the use of learning media is more effective for teaching and learning activities in the plsbt subject, environmental material, this is indicated by the posttest learning results for the cognitive aspect obtained a percentage of and the psychomotor aspect obtained a percentage of

desc: Al-Quran tidak saja berfungsi ‘sebagai kitab suci umat Islam yang mengatur tentang tata cara dalam ibadah ‘saja, namun mengandung unsur adanya isyarat pendidikan komunikasi dalam keluarga. ‘Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengeksplorasi pentingnya kemampuan berkomunikasi efektif dalam keluarga kaitannya dengan proses pendidikan anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode kualitatif dengan pendekatan analisis, sumber data di dapatkan dari bahan literatur berupa buku, jurnal dan kitab tafsir Ibnu Katsir, Tafsir al-Mannar, Tafsir Al-Azhar, Tafsir Fi zdilal al-Qur’an  serta tafsir Al-Misbah. Temuan penelitian ini menunjukan bahwa ada beberapa isyarat bentuk komunikasi yang digambarkan dalam Al-Quran yang berhubungan dengan metode komunikasi, yaitu metode Qaulan baliigha, Qaulan maisuura, qaulan layyina, qaulan ma‟rufa, qaulan kariima dan qaulan sadiida, term komunikasi tersebut memberikan isyarat tentang cara berkomunikasi yang baik, dalam konteks pendidikan ‘anak usia dini pada keluarga. Kesimpulan dalam ‘penelitian ini adalah bahwa keluarga ‘dalam hal ini orang tua perlu memahami pola komunikasi yang efektif, dan Al-Quran telah memberikan isyarat bagaimana ‘membangun komunikasi yang ideal.
title: Komunikasi Efektif pada ‘Anak Usia Dini dalam Keluarga Menurut Al-Qur’an
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: effective communication in early childhood in the family according to the Qur'an the Qur'an not only functions as a holy book for Muslims that regulates the procedures for worship but also contains elements of communication education signals in the family this study aims to explore the importance of effective communication skills in the family in relation to the process of early childhood education the method used in this study is a qualitative method with an analytical approach data sources obtained from literature in the form of journals and books of Ibn Kathir's interpretation, Almannar's interpretation, Alazhar's interpretation, Fi Zdilal's interpretation of the Qur'an and Almisbah's interpretation the findings of this study indicate that there are several communication signals described in the Qur'an that are related to communication methods, namely the Qaulan Baliigha method, Qaulan Maisuura method, Qaulan Layyina method, Qaulan Marufa method, Qaulan Karima method and Qaulan Sadiida method these communication terms provide signals about how to communicate well in the context of early childhood education in the family the conclusion in this study is that families in this case parents need to understand effective communication patterns and the Qur'an has provided signals on how to build ideal communication

desc: Mengoptimalkan kegunaan smartphone khususnya bagi anak usia dini adalah penerapan teknologi Augmented Reality, yaitu teknologi yang menggabungkan objek dunia maya dengan dunia nyata secara realtime. Adapun tujuan penelitian adalah tersusunnya sebuah media berbasis Augmented Reality yang dapat diterapkan di lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini dan melihat peningkatan pemahaman guru mengenai penggunaan augmented reality. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode pengembangan dengan tahapan penelitian Analysis, Desain, Development, Implementation dan Evaluation. Subjek penelitian adalah guru pada TK Madani Cendekia Rumbai. Adapun hasil penelitian yaitu tersusunnya media pembelajaran berbasis augmented reality dan terjadi peningkatan pengetahuan dan pemahaman guru setelah dilakukan ujicoba kurikulum berbasis augmented reality pada subjek penelitian yang telah dilakukan, terdapat peningkatan yang signifikan pengetahuan guru antara sebelum dengan sesudah mengikuti ujicoba model kurikulum berbasis augmented reality.
title: Pengembangan Media Pembelajaran Anak Usia Dini berbasis Augmented Reality
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of early childhood learning media based on augmented reality optimizing the usefulness of smartphones especially for early childhood is the application of augmented reality technology, namely technology that combines virtual world objects with the real world in real time, the purpose of the study is to compile an augmented reality-based media that can be applied in early childhood education institutions and see an increase in teacher understanding regarding the use of augmented reality, this study uses a development method with stages of research, analysis, design, development, implementation and evaluation, the research subjects are teachers at TK Madani Cendekia Rumbai, the results of the study are the compilation of learning media based on augmented reality and there is an increase in teacher knowledge and understanding after the trial of the augmented reality-based curriculum on the research subjects that have been carried out, there is a significant increase in teacher knowledge between before and after participating in the trial of the augmented reality-based curriculum model

desc: Karakter dasar manusia terbentuk pada masa kanak-kanak sehingga pendidikan seks seyogyanya diberikan lebih awal. Berdasarkan masih banyaknya guru dan orang tua yang memiliki tingkat pengetahuan terbatas terhadap pendidikan seks pada anak usia dini, sumber belajar guru dan orang tua dalam mengajarkan seksualitas masih terbatas, serta pentingnya pendidikan seksual sejak anak usia dini. Sehingga penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis level agreement atau tingkat kesepakatan antara guru dan orang tua dalam mengidentifikasi persepsi pendidikan seks anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif. Penelitian ini menerapkan teknik non-probability sampling dengan purposive sampling. Data dianalisis menggunakan koefisien Cohen’s Kappa untuk mengukur tingkat kesepakatan antar penilai. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan adanya persamaan persepsi atau kesepemahaman antara level agreement guru dan orang tua terhadap pendidikan seks anak usia dini.
title: Level Agreement Persepsi Guru dan Orang Tua Terhadap Pendidikan Seks Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: level agreement of teacher and parent perceptions of early childhood sex education basic human character is formed in childhood so that sex education should be given earlier based on the fact that there are still many teachers and parents who have limited knowledge of sex education in early childhood learning resources for teachers and parents in teaching sexuality are still limited and the importance of sex education since early childhood so this study aims to analyze the level of agreement or level of agreement between teachers and parents in identifying perceptions of early childhood sex education this study uses a quantitative approach this study applies a nonprobability sampling technique with purposive sampling data is analyzed using the cohens kappa coefficient to measure the level of agreement between assessors the results of the study indicate that there is a similarity in perception or understanding between the level of agreement of teachers and parents regarding early childhood sex education

desc: Pandemi COVID-19 menghadirkan tantangan bagi pelaksanaan pembelajaran PAUD sehingga orang tua berperan penting dalam pemanfaatan teknologi digital. Tujuan penelitian ini yaitu untuk mengetahui pengaruh pemanfaatan teknologi digital terhadap peran orang tua pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif dengan metode survei. Jumlah sampel sebanyak 277 responden (Orang tua). Penelitian ini dilaksanakan di Provinsi Banten, Indonesia. Angket digunakan untuk mengumpulkan data penelitian yang disusun berdasarkan skala Likert. Angket divalidasi oleh tiga ahli dengan tiga cara, yakni validitas isi, konstruk, dan empiris. Analisis data melalui penggunaan SEM (Structural Equation Model) dengan software SmartPLS versi 3.0. Temuan penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat pengaruh teknologi digital terhadap peran orang tua dalam memanfaatkan gadget secara signifikan. Hasil penelitian ini dapat dijadikan petunjuk bagi orang tua dalam memanfaatkan teknologi sehingga orang tua dapat memaksimalkan perannya dengan segala perkembangan yang terjadi.
title: Peran Orang Tua dalam Pemanfaatan Teknologi Digital pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of parents in the use of digital technology in early childhood the covid pandemic presents challenges for the implementation of early childhood education so that parents play an important role in the use of digital technology the purpose of this study is to determine the effect of the use of digital technology on the role of parents in early childhood this study uses a quantitative approach with a survey method the number of samples as many as parent respondents this study was conducted in the province of banten indonesia a questionnaire was used to collect research data which was compiled based on a likert scale the questionnaire was validated by three experts in three ways, namely content validity construct and empirical data analysis through the use of sem structural equation model with smartpls software version the findings of the study indicate that there is a significant influence of digital technology on the role of parents in utilizing gadgets the results of this study can be used as a guide for parents in utilizing technology so that parents can maximize their role with all the developments that occur

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk memperoleh data secara empiris tentang pengaruh pretend play dan jenis kelamin terhadap kemampuan berpikir divergen anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif dengan menggunakan metode eksperimen dengan rancangan factorial 2x2, dengan variabel terikat dalam penelitian ini adalah kemampuan berpikir divergen anak sedangkan variabel bebasnya pretend play dengan variabel atribut adalah yang terdiri dari 2 (dua) taraf yaitu jenis kelamin yang terdiri dari perempuan dan laki - laki. Sampel dalam penelitian ini yaitu anak kelas TK B orange dan apple di Taman Kanak-Kanak Kristen Cahaya Bangsa tahun pelajaran 2018/2019 yang terdiri dari 39 orang. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukan bahwa terdapat pengaruh yang signifikan pada pretend play dan jenis kelamin terhadap kemampuan berpikir divergen.
title: Pengaruh Pretend Play dan Jenis Kelamin terhadap Kemampuan Berpikir Divergen Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of pretend play and gender on the divergent thinking ability of children aged years This study aims to obtain empirical data on the influence of pretend play and gender on the divergent thinking ability of children This study uses a quantitative approach using an experimental method with a factorial design x with the dependent variable in this study is the child's divergent thinking ability while the independent variable is pretend play with the attribute variable consisting of two levels, namely gender consisting of girls and boys The sample in this study were children in grade B Orange and Apple Kindergarten at Cahaya Bangsa Christian Kindergarten in the academic year consisting of 12 people The results of this study indicate that there is a significant influence of pretend play and gender on divergent thinking ability

desc: Latar belakang penelitian ini pencegahan stunting melalui ketahanan pangan lokal Banten dan pengasuhan digital. Tujuan penelitian menganalisis pencegahan stunting melalui pola pemberian makanan bergizi variasi olahan labu kuning, ikan lele dan pemanfaatan aplikasi digital kesehatan pertumbuhan perkembangan anak. Metode penelitian kuantitatif menggunakan survei. Responden ibu yang memiliki anak balita berjumlah 197 orang. Pengumpulan data yaitu kuesioner online. Analisis data statistik deskriptif. Kesimpulan utama ibu telah mampu mencegah stunting untuk mencukupi kebutuhan nutrisi balita. Ibu dapat memilih, mengolah, menyajikan variasi makanan bergizi untuk anak dengan produk pangan lokal yaitu variasi olahan labu kuning dan ikan lele. Kontribusi penelitian ini yaitu setiap keluarga dapat menjaga ketahanan pangan dan memanfaatkan pengasuhan digital melalui aplikasi kesehatan digital untuk meningkatkan pertumbuhan dan perkembangan anak usia dini secara optimal sesuai dengan usia dan standar kesehatan di Indonesia.
title: Pencegahan Stunting melalui Ketahanan Pangan Lokal Banten dan Pengasuhan Digital
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: stunting prevention through local food security in Banten and digital parenting background of this study stunting prevention through local food security in Banten and digital parenting research objectives analyze stunting prevention through nutritious food provision patterns, variations of processed pumpkin, catfish and the use of digital applications for children's growth and development health quantitative research methods using a survey of respondents mothers who have toddlers totaling 1,000 people data collection is an online questionnaire descriptive statistical data analysis main conclusion mothers have been able to prevent stunting to meet the nutritional needs of toddlers mothers can choose to process and serve a variety of nutritious foods for children with local food products, namely variations of processed pumpkin and catfish the contribution of this study is that each family can maintain food security and utilize digital parenting through digital health applications to improve the growth and development of early childhood optimally according to age and health standards in Indonesia

desc: Stressor yang dihadapi orang tua selama masa pandemi bersifat makro dan mempengaruhi seluruh aspek kehidupan. Kondisi pandemi memberikan tantangan yang besar bagi orang tua untuk tetap dapat mengembangkan keterampilan parenting yang positif saat berinteraksi dengan anak di rumah. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui keterampilan pengasuhan orang tua dengan anak usia dini ditinjau dari tingkat pendidikan dan lama pernikahan selama masa pandemi. Penelitian menggunakan desain penelitian kuantitatif komparatif. Subyek terdiri dari  490 orang tua yang terdiri 449 ibu dan 41 ayah yang  memiliki anak usia 4-6 tahun, berdomisili di wilayah Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta dan sekitarnya. Pemilihan subyek dilakukan secara simple random sampling. Pengumpulan data menggunakan skala keterampilan pengasuhan yang telah diuji validitas dan reliabilitasnya. Analisis data dilakukan dengan menguji perbedaan rerata skor keterampilan pengasuhan ditinjau dari tingkat pendidikan dan lama pernikahan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat perbedaan keterampilan pengasuhan yang signifikan antara orang tua yang berpendidikan tinggi dengan yang bukan berpendidikan tinggi.
