Tidak terdapat perbedaan keterampilan pengasuhan ditinjau dari  lama pernikahan
title: Keterampilan Pengasuhan Orang Tua terhadap Anak Usia Dini selama Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parenting skills of parents towards early childhood during the pandemic stressors faced by parents during the pandemic are macro in nature and affect all aspects of life the pandemic conditions present a major challenge for parents to continue to be able to develop positive parenting skills when interacting with children at home this study aims to determine the parenting skills of parents with early childhood in terms of education level and length of marriage during the pandemic the study used a comparative quantitative research design subjects consisted of parents consisting of mothers and fathers who have children aged years domiciled in the Special Region of Yogyakarta and its surroundings subject selection was carried out using simple random sampling data collection using a parenting skills scale that has been tested for validity and reliability data analysis was carried out by testing the difference in the average score of parenting skills in terms of education level and length of marriage the results of the study showed that there was a significant difference in parenting skills between parents with high education and those who were not highly educated there was no difference in parenting skills in terms of length of marriage

desc: In the contemporary technological era, the significance of marketing for educational institutions has experienced a significant surge. The effective execution of marketing tactics can aid in the recruitment of prospective students and concurrently elevate the standing of the institution. Marketing initiatives should be carried out prudently and in accordance with the technological progressions that occur. The objective of this study is to furnish insights for early childhood education institutions in formulating efficacious marketing tactics that align with contemporary demands. The primary emphasis of this investigation is on qualitative analysis. Methods for gathering information include paying close attention and taking detailed notes, with subsequent analysis including data reduction, visualisation, and conclusions. The results of this study show that to develop marketing strategies in the digital era, schools need to consider factors such as market characteristics and needs, the use of social media and online platforms, data security, the quality of educators, and the needs of students. Therefore, they should consider the needs and characteristics of the market and develop educational content that is relevant and appealing to prospective students and parents, which implies that by optimising technology and online platforms and considering the needs and characteristics of the market, schools can improve the reputation and quality of education offered and help increase parental and community involvement in promoting education.
title: Marketing Strategy for Early Childhood Education (ECE) Schools in the Digital Age
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: marketing strategy for early childhood education ece schools in the digital age in the contemporary technological era the significance of marketing for educational institutions has experienced a significant surge the effective implementation of marketing tactics can aid in the recruitment of prospective students and concurrently elevate the standing of the institutional marketing initiatives should be carried out prudently and in accordance with the technological developments that occur the objective of this study is to furnish insights for early childhood education institutions in formulating effective marketing tactics that align with contemporary demands the primary emphasis of this investigation is on qualitative analysis methods for gathering information include paying close attention and taking detailed notes with subsequent analysis including data reduction visualization and conclusions the results of this study show that to develop marketing strategies in the digital era schools need to consider factors such as market characteristics and needs the use of social media and online platforms data security the quality of educators and the needs of students therefore they should consider the needs and characteristics of the market and develop educational content that is relevant and appealing to prospective students and parents which implies that by optimizing technology and online platforms and considering the needs and characteristics of the market schools can improve the reputation and quality of education offered and help increase parental and community involvement in promoting education

desc: This activity aims to carry out a model of children's learning assistance through optimizing the role of parents to be more enthusiastic in facing this new normal era. Not a few parent feel confused and difficult in assisting their children in learning. This research used participatory action research method. The program target of this activity is 30 parent and 15 facilitator from keluarga harapan program. It can be seen that the activities carried out have optimized various parties and can achieve the expected output. Based on the activity , beneficiary families are motivated and have high enthusiasm in spreading the knowledge and skills they have acquired to other families. So, from this activity the community service team highlighted several important things that have been done starting from paying attention to the concept of adult learning, strengthening the focus on social capital and also introducing the importance of peer teaching
title: Intensification the Role of Parent for Learning Assistance Model at Home in The New Normal Era
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: intensification of the role of parents for learning assistance model at home in the new normal era this activity aims to carry out a model of children's learning assistance through optimizing the role of parents to be more enthusiastic in facing this new normal era not a few parents feel confused and difficult in assisting their children in learning this research used participatory action research method the program target of this activity is parent and facilitator from family hope program it can be seen that the activities carried out have optimized various parties and can achieve the expected output based on the activity beneficiary families are motivated and have high enthusiasm in spreading the knowledge and skills they have acquired to other families so from this activity the community service team highlighted several important things that have been done starting from paying attention to the concept of adult learning strengthening the focus on social capital and also introducing the importance of peer teaching

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh permasalahan pendidikan karakter yang hingga kini belum menunjukkan hasil yang memuaskan ditandai dengan munculnya berbagai tindakan destruktif seperti korupsi, kekerasan, kejahatan seksual, narkoba, dan perusakan. Penelitian ini bertujuan mendeskripsikan pola pembentukan karakter ulul albab pada anak usia dini berdasarkan isyarat Al-Qur’an melalui pola pembelajaran pedagogikal sebagai upaya meminimalisir tindakan destruktif. Metode penelitian ini menggunakan studi pustaka sedangkan teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan teknik dokumentasi dengan melacak berbagai referensi kepustakaan sebanyak 50 literatur yang relevan bersumber dari berbagai jurnal, buku dan kitab serta referensi lainnya yang terbit minimal 10 tahun terakhir. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian diperoleh bahwa pembentukan karakter ulul albab pada anak usia dini harus dimulai dengan pembentukan pendengaran, penglihatan, dan hati (nalar fitri) yang didesain secara terstruktur melalui pola pendekatan pedagogis.
title: Pedagogi Pembentukan Karakter Ulul Albab pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: pedagogy of character formation of ulul albab in early childhood this study is motivated by the problem of character education which until now has not shown satisfactory results marked by the emergence of various destructive actions such as corruption violence sexual crimes drugs and vandalism this study aims to describe the pattern of character formation of ulul albab in early childhood based on the signs of the Qur'an through pedagogical learning patterns as an effort to minimize destructive actions this research method uses literature studies while the data collection technique uses documentation techniques by tracking various literature references as much as possible relevant literature sourced from various journals books and scriptures and other references published at least in the last year based on the results of the study it was obtained that the formation of ulul albab character in early childhood must begin with the formation of hearing vision and heart natural reason which is designed in a structured manner through a pedagogical approach pattern

desc: Kemandirian merupakan faktor penting dalam menentukan masa depan anak. Peran dan pola asuh orang tua serta kerjasama dengan pihak sekolah menjadi faktor pendukung kemandirian anak di rumah maupun di sekolah. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis kemandirian anak melalui pengaruh peran orang tua dan pola asuh orang tua melalui kerjasama sekolah dengan orang tua. Metode penelitian menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif. Sampel penelitian menggunakan teknik total sampling sebanyak 172 orang anak. Teknik pengumpulan data penelitian ini dilakukan dengan menyebarkan kuesioner kepada responden. Hasil kuesioner tersebut kemudian dianalisis dengan menggunakan teknik analisis jalur. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan adanya pengaruh peran orang tua dan pola asuh orang tua melalui kerjasama sekolah dengan orang tua terhadap kemandirian anak. Anak dapat melakukan tugasnya sendiri tanpa tergantung dengan orang lain baik di rumah maupun di sekolah.
title: Kerjasama Orang tua dengan Sekolah dan Pola Asuh Orang tua Berpengaruh terhadap Kemandirian Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: cooperation between parents and schools and parenting patterns have an effect on children's independence independence is an important factor in determining a child's future the role and parenting patterns of parents and cooperation with the school are supporting factors for children's independence at home and at school this study aims to analyze children's independence through the influence of the role of parents and parenting patterns through cooperation between schools and parents the research method uses a quantitative approach the research sample uses a total sampling technique as many as 1,000 children the data collection technique for this study was carried out by distributing questionnaires to respondents the results of the questionnaire were then analyzed using path analysis techniques the results of the study showed the influence of the role of parents and parenting patterns through cooperation between schools and parents on children's independence children can do their own tasks without depending on others both at home and at school

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui kinerja ocb (perilaku warga organisasi) dalam hal kepemimpinan pendidikan, dan integritas pada guru anak usia dini di Kabupaten Bogor. Metode yang digunakan adalah survei dengan studi korelasional yang melibatkan 94 sampel. Ada instrumen yang mengukur kinerja ocb (perilaku kewarganegaraan organisasi) (rel. 812), kepemimpinan pendidikan (rel .796), dan integritas (rel. 915). Hubungan antara variabel kepemimpinan pendidikan dengan kinerja (perilaku warga organisasi) dilakukan analisis regresi sederhana. Hasil analisis regresi sederhana ini mendapatkan persamaan ? = 52,409 + 0,511X1 dengan Fhitung sebesar 77,04 dan 1,195. Hubungan antara variabel integritas guru dengan kinerja (perilaku warga organisasi) dilakukan analisis regresi sederhana. Hasil analisis regresi sederhana ini mendapatkan persamaan ? = 52,079 + 0,532X2 dengan Fhitung sebesar 75,89 dan 1,573, dan hubungan antara variabel kepemimpinan pendidikan (X1), kompetensi guru (X2) bersama-sama dengan kinerja (perilaku warga organisasi) (Y ) dilakukan analisis regresi berganda. Hasil analisis regresi berganda yang menghasilkan persamaan regresi ? = 47,806 + 0,281X1 + 0,277X2 dengan Fhitung sebesar 43,102.
title: Kinerja OCB pada guru PAUD ditinjau dari Educational leadership dan Integritas
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

The method used is a survey with a correlational study involving samples. There are instruments that measure the performance of OCB organizational citizenship behavior, educational leadership, and integrity. The relationship between educational leadership variables and organizational citizenship behavior performance is carried out by a simple regression analysis. The results of this simple regression analysis obtain an equation of + x with f count of and. Multiple regression analysis is carried out. The results of the multiple regression analysis produce a regression equation of + x + x with f count of

desc: Fenomena rendahnya pemanfaatan teknologi informasi dan komunikasi oleh guru PAUD dalam mengembangkan kompetensi mengelola pembelajaran di PAUD secara mandiri terjadi di sebagian besar lembaga PAUD. Penyebabnya adalah kurangnya kemampuan dan motivasi guru PAUD untuk menggunakan TIK sehingga membutuhkan banyak bimbingan dan pendampingan dalam memanfaatkan TIK sebagai alat bantu mengajar. Penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif untuk mengetahui pemanfaatan teknologi informasi dan komunikasi dalam menunjang pembelajaran di PAUD. Subyek yang digunakan meliputi 33 kepala sekolah dan 33 guru PAUD di Kota Yogyakarta dengan sampel sebesar 15% dari 222 populasi. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan skala dan checklist. Pengintegrasian TIK dalam pembelajaran di PAUD dipengaruhi oleh terbatasnya penguasaan guru untuk memahami dan kecakapan dalam aspek pemanfaatan personal computer serta jaringan nirkabel, terbatasnya semangat guru dalam melaksanakan transformasi yang menggabungkan penggunaan TIK terhadap pembelajaran dalam kelas, serta terbatasnya sarana dan prasarana TIK dalam mendukung pembelajaran.
title: Pemanfaatan Teknologi Informasi dan Komunikasi dalam Menunjang Pembelajaran di PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Utilization of information and communication technology in supporting learning in early childhood education The phenomenon of low utilization of information and communication technology by early childhood education teachers in developing competence in managing learning in early childhood education independently occurs in most early childhood education institutions. The cause is the lack of ability and motivation of early childhood education teachers to use ICT so that they need a lot of guidance and assistance in utilizing ICT as a teaching aid. This study uses quantitative descriptive research to determine the utilization of information and communication technology in supporting learning in early childhood education. The subjects used include school principals and early childhood education teachers in the city of Yogyakarta with a sample of ± 100% of the population. Data collection techniques use scales and checklists. Integration of ICT in early childhood education is influenced by the limited mastery of teachers to understand and skills in aspects of utilizing personal computers and wireless networks. The limited enthusiasm of teachers in implementing transformations that combine the use of ICT with classroom learning and the limited facilities and infrastructure of ICT in supporting learning.

The average number of experimental class is 83.25 and the control class average is 76. Based on data analysis that thitung  ttabel 2,161 2,07387. title: Pengaruh Kirigami Terhadap Kemampuan Motorik Halus Anak di Taman Kanak-Kanak

desc: PAUD’s teachers are the second basic laying figures of education after parents. PAUD’s teachers must have expertise in this field. But in reality there are still many teachers who have not met national standards. The purpose of this research is to discuss the problems of teachers in PAUD’s institutions which include academic qualifications and linearity of graduates. This research uses qualitative method of descriptive approach, techniques used is observation, interview, and documentation, data analysis is done from data collection to conclusion. The results showed that the teachers at RA Bakti 7 Wonorejo did not meet the national standards as PAUD’s teachers, it is known from the graduates of every teacher that nothing is relevant to the field of PAUD. There are 4 teachers with 2 S1 public education and 2 S1 Islamic education. The problem is the lack of human resources of PAUD’s teachers in accordance with national standards.
title: Problematika Linieritas dan Pemenuhan Kualifikasi Akademik Guru dalam Lembaga PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: problems of linearity and fulfillment of teacher academic qualifications in early childhood institutions. Early childhood teachers are the second basic laying figures of education after parents. Early childhood teachers must have expertise in this field but in reality there are still many teachers who have not met national standards. The purpose of this research is to discuss the problems of teachers in early childhood institutions which include academic qualifications and linearity of graduates this research uses qualitative method of descriptive approach techniques used is observation interview and documentation data analysis is done from data collection to conclusion the results showed that the teachers at ra bakti wonorejo did not meet the national standards as early childhood teachers it is known from the graduates of every teacher that nothing is relevant to the field of early childhood there are teachers with s public education and s Islamic education the problem is the lack of human resources of early childhood teachers in comply with national standards

desc: Pendidikan jasmani di Sekolah Luar Biasa (SLB) memiliki peran yang sangat penting dalam meningkatkan aspek afektif, kognitif dan psikomotorik.. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengembangkan Model Pembelajaran Pengembangan Keterampilan Motorik Anak terhadap Disabilitas Intelektual (DI). Metode Penelitian ini menggunakan prosedur Research and Development (RD) Borg dan Gall untuk mengembangkan dan memvalidasi produk pendidikan. Subjek uji coba adalah guru Pendidikan Olahraga dan siswa SLB Palembang. Jenis data dalam penelitian ini adalah Mix method desain, dan instrumen yang digunakan adalah kuisioner dan observasi (rubrik assessment). Analisis data menggunakan uji-t dan uji Wilcoxon. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa model pembelajaran yang melibatkan aktivitas fisik adaptif dan latihan kemampuan fisik dan gerakan dapat meningkatkan kinerja fisik dan kognitif siswa dengan DI. Simpulan model pembelajaran dapat meningkatkan keterampilan motorik, keterampilan kognitif, serta meningkatkan kesenangan dan fokus perhatian pada anak-anak dengan Disabilitas Intelektual (DI) ringan yang berusia 5-6 tahun, baik laki-laki maupun perempuan.
title: Model Pengembangan Keterampilan Motorik My Home Environment terhadap Anak Disabilitas Intelektual
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The model of developing motor skills in my home environment for children with intellectual disabilities, physical education in special schools with special needs has a very important role in improving the affective, cognitive and psychomotor aspects. The purpose of this study was to develop a learning model for developing motor skills in children with intellectual disabilities. This research method uses the Rd Borg and Gall research and development procedure to develop and validate educational products. The test subjects were physical education teachers and special needs students in Palembang. The type of data in this study is a mix method. The design and instruments used were questionnaires and observations. The data analysis rubric used the t-test and Wilcoxon test. The results of the study showed that a learning model involving adaptive physical activity and physical and movement ability training can improve students' physical and cognitive performance. In conclusion, the learning model can improve motor skills, cognitive skills, and increase pleasure and focus of attention in children with mild intellectual disabilities aged 18-24 years, both male and female.

desc: Kegiatan belajar di Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD) saat ini lebih banyak memanfaatkan alat atau teknologi kekinian yang minim aktifitas fisik. Akibatnya motorik anak kurang terlatih. Oleh karena itu, penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini melalui permaian sirkuit bola keranjang. Studi dilakukan di Kelompok B Taman Kanak-kanak Napabale Kelurahan Lalodati Kecamatan Puuwatu, Kota Kendari. Peneliti menerapkan prosedur penelitian tindakan. Nilai PAP 75% dijadikan sebagai standar keberhasilan secara klasikal. Tindakan dilakukan dalam 2 siklus, masing-masing siklus terdiri dari 2 pertemuan dan evaluasi hasil belajar. Hasil penelitian didapati permainan bola keranjang berhasil meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini. Permainan ini memenuhi prinsip-prinsip sebuah permainan sebagai media belajar di Pendidikan PAUD.
title: Sirkuit Bola Keranjang:  Permainan untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Basketball circuit game to improve gross motor skills of early childhood learning activities in early childhood education PAUD currently utilize more modern tools or technology that minimize physical activity, resulting in children's motor skills being less trained therefore this study aims to improve gross motor skills of early childhood through basketball circuit games the study was conducted in group b of Napabale Kindergarten, Lalodati Village, Puuwatu District, Kendari City the researcher applied the action research procedure PAP values ​​were used as the standard of success in a classical manner actions were carried out in cycles each cycle consisted of meetings and evaluation of learning outcomes the results of the study found that basketball games succeeded in improving gross motor skills of early childhood this game meets the principles of a game as a learning medium in PAUD education

desc: Anak secara hukum berhak mendapatkan perlindungan, namun dalam kenyataannya hak-hak anak masih belum terlindungi dan terpenuhi secara optimal terutama di lembaga PAUD. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjelaskan pentingnya profesionalisme guru PAUD dalam penyelenggaraan perlindungan anak berdasarkan Undang-undang Nomor 35 Tahun 2014. Hasil penelitian ditemukan bahwa Profesionalisme Guru anak usia dini sangat penting dalam penyelenggaraan Perlindungan Anak karena sebagian besar kasus perlidungan anak terjadi dalam lembaga pendidikan.
title: Urgensi Profesionalisme Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini dalam Penyelenggaraan Perlindungan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The urgency of professionalism of early childhood education teachers in implementing child protection. Children are legally entitled to protection, but in reality children's rights are still not optimally protected and fulfilled, especially in early childhood education institutions. This study aims to explain the importance of professionalism of early childhood education teachers in implementing child protection based on Law Number 1999. The results of the study found that the professionalism of early childhood teachers is very important in implementing child protection because most cases of child protection occur in educational institutions.

desc: Kegiatan eating clean bekal sehat di RA Al-Muqoddasah dilaksanakan sebagai bentuk kepedulian lembaga pendidikan terhadap kesehatan generasi penerus bangsa. Dengan menggunakan metode analisis dekriptif, peneliti menggambarkan bagaimana tumbuhnya kesadaran anak akan makanan sehat dari kegiatan Eating clean dan memperkenalkan anak untuk merasakan berbagai masakan dan olahan makanan sehat yang penuh gizi. Kegiatan tersebut terdiri atas fruit day, vegetable day, bread and milk day, tubers day, dan biscuit day. Hasilnya dari 25 orang anak 90% anak menyukai bekal makanan sehat yang bervariasi dan diolah dengan sehat dan 99% respon orang tua pun merasakan dampak dari eating clean, yaitu ketika mereka merasa terbantu untuk menyiapkan menu harian anak dan pengenalkan makanan sehat untuk anak. Pengenalan makanan sehat yang penuh nutrisi dan gizi seimbang bagi anak sedini mungkin sangatlah penting
title: Literasi Kesehatan pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Kegiatan Eating Clean
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Health literacy in early childhood through eating clean activities Eating clean healthy food activities at ra almuqoddasah are carried out as a form of concern for educational institutions for the health of the nation's next generation using descriptive analysis methods, researchers describe how children's awareness of healthy food grows from eating clean activities and introducing children to taste various healthy dishes and processed foods that are full of nutrition. These activities consist of fruit day, vegetable day, bread and milk day, tubers day and biscuit day. The results are that children like healthy food supplies that are varied and processed healthily and parents' responses also feel the impact of eating clean, namely when they feel helped to prepare their children's daily menus and introduce healthy food to children. Introducing healthy food that is full of nutrition and balanced nutrition for children as early as possible is very important.

desc: Model pembelajaran Kognitif moral di Sekolah masih jarang tersentuh oleh para pendidik. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk membuktikan bahwa dengan penggunaan model kognitif moral cerita dilema moral berbentuk animasi dapat meningkatkan pertimbangan moral siswa. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah mix method dengan pendekatan kualitatif (observasi), kuantitatif (uji pre-test dan post-test) dengan subjek penelitian 33 orang siswa kelas III SD. Hasil penelitian, terdapat perbedaan nilai hasil pre-test dan post-test dengan rata-rata N-gain score diperoleh angka 0,67 dengan kategori sedang. Adapun N-gain score 67,5% dengan kategori tafsiran cukup efektif. Hasil tersebut membuktikan bahwa uji pre-test dan post-test pertimbangan moral siswa kelas III di SDN 4 Kenanga melalui model pembelajaran kognitif moral menggunakan media cerita animasi dapat memberikan pertimbangan moral yang lebih maju atau lebih baik. Hal ini menjadi kebaruan dalam dunia pendidikan kajian kognitif moral bahwa animasi bisa meningkatkan pertimbangan moral siswa kelas rendah.
title: Model Pembelajaran Kognitif Moral Berbentuk Cerita Animasi Dilema Moral Bagi Siswa Kelas Rendah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The cognitive moral learning model in the form of animated moral dilemma stories for lower grade students. The cognitive moral learning model in schools is still rarely touched by educators. The purpose of this study is to prove that by using the cognitive moral model of animated moral dilemma stories, it can improve students' moral judgment. The research method used is a mix method with a qualitative approach, quantitative observation, pretest and posttest tests with research subjects of grade III elementary school students. The results of the study show differences in the pretest and posttest results with an average score of ngain obtained with a number in the moderate category, while the ngain score with a fairly effective interpretation category. These results prove that the pretest and posttest tests of moral judgment of grade III students at SDN Kenanga through the cognitive moral learning model using animated story media can provide more advanced or better moral considerations. This is a novelty in the world of education. The study of cognitive morals that animation can improve the moral judgment of lower grade students.

desc: Sebagian besar anak-anak belum mencapai tingkat gerak dasar yang maksimal karena minimnya kesempatan untuk latihan dan aktivitas gerak yang menurun menyebabkan gerak dasar menjadi lemah dalam gerakan khusus. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui bagaimana penerapan Cooperative Learning dalam meningkatkan keterampilan gerak dasar pada siswa sekolah dasar (SD). Metode penelitian ini adalah survey. Instrumen yang dipakai untuk mengumpulkan data adalah observasi dan angket dengan menggunakan skala likert. Subjek penelitian ini adalah 10 guru pendidikan jasmani dengan jumlah siswa 60 orang di kelas 1 sekolah dasar dengan menggunakan teknik cluster sampling. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa model pembelajaran gerak dasar berbasis Cooperative Learning dapat diterapkan untuk meningkatkan keterampilan gerak dasar anak usia 7-8 tahun, dilihat dari tingkat kepuasan yaitu pada persentase 91,2 % yang berada pada kriteria baik dengan kata lain penerapan Cooperative Learning mampu meningkatkan keterampilan gerak dasar anak.
title: Penerapan Cooperative Learning dalam Meningkatkan Keterampilan Gerak Dasar pada Siswa Usia 7-8 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of cooperative learning in improving basic movement skills in students aged years most children have not reached the maximum basic movement level because of the lack of opportunities for practice and decreased movement activity causing basic movements to become weak in special movements this study aims to determine how the application of cooperative learning in improving basic movement skills in elementary school students the research method is a survey the instrument used to collect data is observation and questionnaires using a Likert scale the subjects of this study were physical education teachers with a number of students in elementary school classes using cluster sampling techniques the results of the study indicate that the basic movement learning model based on cooperative learning can be applied to improve the basic movement skills of children aged years seen from the level of satisfaction, namely the percentage that is in the good criteria in other words the application of cooperative learning is able to improve children's basic movement skills

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu untuk merencanakan, melaksanakan dan melakukan kurikulum pendidikan anak usia dini. Metode penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif. Perencanaan kegiatan pembelajaran terdiri atas perencanaan Tahunan (prota) dan Semester (prosem), perencanaan Mingguan dan perencanaan Harian. Dalam pengorganisasian bahan ajar keagamaan, menggunakan metode qiro’ati sebagai pedomannya dan dengan tahnik klasikal dan individual. Pelaksanaan kurikulum mengimplementasikan kurikulum merdeka belajar. Subjek penelitian ini adalah tiga guru dan satu kepala sekolah. Pengumpulan data berupa wawancara dengan guru dalam berlangsungnya proses pembelajaran, berpedoman pada wawancara dengan narasumber langsung, dilanjutkan dengan observasi, peneliti melakukan pengamatan terhadap guru, anak dan lingkungan sekitar. Setelah data terkumpul maka akan dianalisis dengan deskriptif kualitatif untuk menghasilkan kesimpulan yang benar dan sesuai dengan masalah yang ada. Berdasarkan hasil observasi, pengelolaan kurikulum dijalankan dengan menerapkan prinsip-prinsip manajemen yang meliputi, planning (perencanaan), organizing (pengorganisasian), actuating (penggerakan), controlling (pengontrolan) dan evaluating (evaluasi).
title: Pengelolaan Manajemen Kurikulum Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of early childhood education curriculum management the purpose of this study is to plan, implement and carry out the early childhood education curriculum this research method uses a qualitative method of planning learning activities consisting of annual planning prota and semester prosem weekly planning and daily planning in organizing religious teaching materials using the qiroati method as a guideline and with classical and individual techniques curriculum implementation implementing the independent learning curriculum the subjects of this study were three teachers and one principal data collection in the form of interviews with teachers during the learning process guided by interviews with direct sources followed by observations researchers observe teachers children and the surrounding environment after the data is collected it will be analyzed with qualitative descriptive to produce conclusions that are correct and in accordance with the existing problems based on the results of observations curriculum management is carried out by applying management principles which include planning planning organizing organizing actuating driving controlling controlling and evaluating evaluation

desc: Tujuan penelitian adalah mendeskripsikan kemampuan cipta lagu pada guru Taman Kanak-Kanak se-Yogyakarta. Masalah penelitian ini adalah belum optimalnya kemampuan guru dalam kemampuan cipta lagu. Populasi penelitian yaitu guru TK se-Yogyakarta dan sampel diambil sejumlah 97 guru. Penelitian dilakukan dari bulan Februari-Juli 2020. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan angket dalam format googleform. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah survey. Teknik analisis data menggunakan statistik deskriptif. Hasil penelitian: kemampuan guru dalam cipta lagu masuk dalam kategori kurang. Hal ini dibuktikan dengan prosentase kemampuan guru dalam unsur irama dan ilmu bentuk musik (di bawah 56%). Faktor yang mempengaruhi kurangnya kemampuan guru dalam cipta lagu anak yaitu belum semua guru adalah lulusan S1 jurusan PAUD, muatan mata kuliah seni musik belum membahas tentang teknik mencipta lagu untuk anak. Saran: perlu adanya semacam pelatihan cipta lagu bagi guru yang bermuara pada lomba cipta lagu.
title: Kemampuan Cipta Lagu pada Guru Taman Kanak-Kanak se-Yogyakarta
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: songwriting ability of kindergarten teachers in Yogyakarta The purpose of this study is to describe the songwriting ability of kindergarten teachers in Yogyakarta The problem of this study is the suboptimal ability of teachers in songwriting ability The population of the study was kindergarten teachers in Yogyakarta and the sample was taken from a number of teachers The study was conducted from February to July The data collection technique used a questionnaire in Google Form format The research method used was a survey The data analysis technique used descriptive statistics The results of the study The ability of teachers in songwriting is in the category of less This is evidenced by the percentage of teacher ability in the elements of rhythm and musical form science below The factors that influence the lack of teacher ability in children's songwriting are that not all teachers are graduates of the PAUD department The content of the music arts course has not discussed the technique of creating songs for children The suggestion is that there needs to be some kind of songwriting training for teachers that culminates in a songwriting competition

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh rendahnya kualitas pembelajaran di TK Aisyiyah Klodran, seperti guru masih menyampaikan pembelajaran yang monoton, fokus pada membaca dan menulis dan belum mempergunakan salah satu media teknologi dalam pembelajaran. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui persepsi guru terhadap penggunaan media pembelajaran berbasis video di TK Aisyiyah Klodran. Pendekatan kualitatif dipergunakan pada penelitian ini sebagai studi kasus. Teknik penghimpunan data pada penelitian ini ialah observasi, dokumentasi, dan wawancara. Pada penelitian ini, analisis data yang terjadi yaitu mereduksi data, menyajikan data, dan menarik kesimpulan. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dapat disimpulkan bahwasanya persepsi guru terhadap penggunaan media pembelajaran berbasis video sangat positif, dengan demikian ditarik kesimpulan bahwasanya penggunaan media pembelajaran berbasis video mampu meningkatkan perhatian siswa, meningkatkan motivasi siswa, dan meningkatkan efektifitas pembelajaran pada siswa.
title: Persepsi Guru terhadap Pemanfaatan Media Pembelajaran Berbasis Video pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teachers' perceptions of the use of video-based learning media in early childhood This study was motivated by the low quality of learning in TK Aisyiyah Klodran, such as teachers still delivering monotonous learning focused on reading and writing and have not used one of the technological media in learning. The purpose of this study was to determine teachers' perceptions of the use of video-based learning media in TK Aisyiyah Klodran. A qualitative approach was used in this study as a case study. Data collection techniques in this study were observation, documentation and interviews. In this study, the data analysis that occurred was reducing data, presenting data and drawing conclusions. Based on the results of the study, it can be concluded that teachers' perceptions of the use of video-based learning media are very positive. Thus, it can be concluded that the use of video-based learning media can increase students' attention, increase students' motivation and increase the effectiveness of learning in students.

desc: Konsep bilangan merupakan dasar dari keterampilan matematika. Sejak usia prasekolah, anak-anak dapat memahami konsep ini. Pencapaian keterampilan dasar ini akan mempengaruhi keterampilannya dimasa yang akan datang. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk melihat apakah melalui permaian ular tangga mampu meningkatkan kemampuan mengenal konsep bilanggan anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan adalah penelitian tindakan kelas (PTK). Data dikumpulkan melalui observasi dan dokumentasi. Subyek penelitian melibatkan anak usia 5-6 tahun. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kemampuan mengenal konsep bilangan anak usia dini meningkat setelah dilaksanakan tindakan penelitian melalui permainan ular tangga. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan sebagai salah satu alternatif bagi guru PAUD ketika mengenalkan konsep bilangan kepada siswa. Penelitian selanjutnya juga dapat memperhatikan kelemahan dalam artikel ini sebagai kajian berikutnya.
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Konsep Bilangan melaui Bermain Ular Tangga pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving the ability of number concepts through playing snakes and ladders in early childhood the concept of numbers is the basis of mathematical skills since preschool age children can understand this concept the achievement of this basic skill will affect their skills in the future this study aims to see whether through playing snakes and ladders can improve the ability to recognize the concept of numbers in early childhood the method used is classroom action research ptk data is collected through observation and documentation research subjects involve children aged years the results of the study show that the ability to recognize the concept of numbers in early childhood increases after the research action is carried out through the snakes and ladders game the implications of the results of this study can be used as an alternative for early childhood teachers when introducing the concept of numbers to students further research can also pay attention to the weaknesses in this article as a subsequent study

desc: Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan tujuan untuk mengetahui proses perancanaan pembelajaran, pelaksanaan pembelajaran dan penilaian pembelajaran. Metode penelitian ini adalah metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode evaluasi model CIPP dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Lokasi penelitian ini adalah Kelompok Bermain Nurain di Mola Selatan Kecamatan Wangi-wangi Selatan Kabupaten Wakatobi Subyek dalam penelitian ini adalah pelaksanaan proses standar PAUD di Kelompok Bermain Nurain. Faktor yang diteliti adalah Kepala Sekolah dan guru. Teknik Pengumpulan data adalah teknik observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian ini adalah perencanaan dan penyusunan program semester dan kegiatan harian masih dilakukan oleh para guru dengan menyontek buku yang dibeli. Kelompok Bermain Nurain baru sebatas membuat rencana kegiatan harian sesuai dengan buku tanpa melakukan modifikasi. Hal ini tentu saja menimbulkan pertanyaan mengapa kebiasaan ini terus dipertahankan padahal sekolah-sekolah seharusnya mampu membuat perencanaan pembelajarannya sendiri. Dengan demikian, pada aspek proses sekolah ini belum sesuai dengan standar PAUD. Kegiatan pelaksanaan pembelajaran meliputi pembukaan, inti dan penutup sebagaimana tertuang dalam standar PAUD. Namum kegiatan masih dominan terjadi di dalam kelas dengan suasana teacher center yang menekankan pembelajaran pada kognisi anak. Dari sisi metode pembelajaran, maka belum sesuai dengan standar PAUD. Yang dapat dikatakan menyangkut penilaian adalah pertama Kelompok Bermain Nurain ini melakukan penilaian melalui pengamatan dan unjuk kerja. Namun, penilaian tersebut tidak dicatat secara individu melalui narasi melainkan berkelompok dengan memakai simbol angka.
title: Evaluasi Pelaksanaan Standar Proses di Satuan Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Evaluation of the implementation of process standards in early childhood education units This study was conducted with the aim of knowing the learning planning process, implementation of learning and assessment of learning. This research method is the research method used in this study is the CIPP model evaluation method with a qualitative approach. The location of this study is the Nurain playgroup in South Mola, South Wangiwangi District, Wakatobi Regency. The subjects in this study are the implementation of the PAUD standard process in the Nurain playgroup. The factors studied are the principal and teachers. Data collection techniques are observation techniques, interviews and documentation. The results of this study are the planning and preparation of semester programs and daily activities are still carried out by teachers by cheating on books purchased by the new Nurain playgroup, only making daily activity plans according to the book without making modifications. Of course, this raises the question of why this habit continues to be maintained even though schools should be able to make their own learning plans. Thus, in terms of the process, this school is not in accordance with PAUD standards. Learning implementation activities include opening, core and closing as stated in the PAUD standards. However, activities still predominantly occur in the classroom with a teacher-centered atmosphere that emphasizes learning on children's cognition. From the learning method perspective, it is not in accordance with PAUD standards. What can be said to be related to assessment is the first playgroup. This nurain carries out assessments through observation and performance, but these assessments are not recorded individually through narratives but rather in groups using number symbols.

desc: Keterampilan vokasional sangat diperlukan bagi anak berkebutuhan khusus, karena dapat membantunya untuk lebih mandiri dan membantu mengarahkan perilakunya, serta dapat membantu orang tua dalam proses pengasuhan anak dengan kebutuhan khusus. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah  menganalisis literatur pengajaran keterampilan vokasional kepada anak berkebutuhan khusus. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan systematic review dengan mencari artikel jurnal di sage journal, scopus, dan springer link. Artikel yang memenuhi kriteria untuk digunakan dalam review ini adalah artikel yang melakukan penelitian dengan topik anak berkebutuhan khusus, pendekatan pengajaran, dan keterampilan vokasional.  Ada 17 artikel yang memenuhi kriteria inklusi untuk mendukung pembahasan dalam penelitian ini. Hasil analisa dari artikel yang terpilih ialah terdapat dua media yang paling banyak digunakan dalam upaya pengajaran keterampilan vokasional terhadap anak berkebutuhan khusus. Secara umum kedua media itu terdiri video berbasis mobile dan metode penundaan waktu konstan serta e-coaching. Adapun untuk artikel lainnya meneliti mengenai tugas-tugas dasar sebuah pekerjaan.
title: Implementasi Pembelajaran Keterampilan Vokasional untuk Anak Berkebutuhan Khusus: Sebuah Tinjauan Sistematis
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of vocational skills learning for children with special needs a systematic review of vocational skills is very necessary for children with special needs because it can help them to be more independent and help direct their behavior and can help parents in the process of raising children with special needs the purpose of this study is to analyze the literature on teaching vocational skills to children with special needs this study uses a systematic review approach by searching for journal articles in sage journal scopus and springer links articles that meet the criteria for use in this review are articles that conduct research on the topic of children with special needs teaching approaches and vocational skills there are articles that meet the inclusion criteria to support the discussion in this study the results of the analysis of the selected articles are that there are two media that are most widely used in efforts to teach vocational skills to children with special needs in general both media consist of mobile-based videos and constant time delay methods and ecoaching while for other articles researching the basic tasks of a job

desc: Gotong royong merupakan salah satu nilai karakter kebangsaan Indonesia yang melekat dalam kehidupan masyarakat. Meski demikian, saat ini banyak anak usia dini tumbuh dengan suasana individual. Penelitian dilakukan untuk mendesain paket pembelajaran tokoh “Sema (Semut Merah)” sebagai sarana penanaman karakter gotong royong anak usia 4-6 tahun. Studi ini menggunakan metode kualitatif dengan teknik analisis Miles Huberman. Paket pembelajaran tokoh Sema terdiri dari materi pembelajaran, buku cerita, lagu, video pembelajaran, asesmen dan aktivitas bersama orang tua. Paket pembelajaran menerjemahkan karakter gotong royong yang abstrak menjadi perilaku konkrit berdasarkan kisah keteladanan tokoh Sema yang menginspirasi. Berdasarkan temuan penelitian disimpulkan proses implementasi memiliki pola: 1) penyamaan persepsi pendidik, 2) pengembangan program sesuai ciri dan karakterisik satuan PAUD, 3) praktik mengajar mandiri, 4) membangun komunikasi efektif dengan orang tua mengenai nilai karakter, 5) proses implementasi dan asesmen, serta 6) pemberian umpan balik oleh peserta didik dan orang tua
title: Karakter Gotong Royong dalam Paket Pembelajaran Sema
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: become concrete behavior based on the exemplary story of an inspiring Sema figure based on research findings it is concluded that the implementation process has a pattern of similarity in educator perceptions, program development according to the characteristics and characteristics of early childhood education units, independent teaching practices, building effective communication with parents regarding character values, implementation and assessment processes and providing feedback by students and parents

desc: Perkembangan motorik kasar pada anak usia 5-6 tahun saat ini belum optimal. Permasalahan tersebut disebabkan oleh pembelajaran fisik motorik yang diterapkan di TK belum sesuai dengan tahap-tahap pembelajaran, belum adanya panduan yang baku dan terstruktur pada saat Pandemi Covid 19 diterapkan secara daring, jarang bergerak di luar ruangan dan anak lebih banyak duduk di depan laptop atau smartphone. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mengembangkan model pembelajaran bermain outdoor lempar tangkap bola untuk mengembangkan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Metode dalam penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan penelitian dan pengembangan (R  D) model Borg and Gall. Analisis data dalam penelitian ini adalah deskriptif kuantitatif. Subjek penelitian ini adalah anak TK Pedagogia, Kota Yogyakarta berjumlah 26. Teknik pengumpulan data pada penelitian ini yaitu lembar observasi ceklis dan wawancara. Pengembangan model ini di validasi oleh 2 ahli materi dan 6 ahli model, setelah itu di uji coba kelayakan serta efektifitasnya pada kelompok kecil dan kelompok besar. Hasil penelitian dan pengembangan model bermain outdoor lempar tangkap bola menunjukkan memiliki kelayakan untuk membantu mengembangkan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun.
title: Model Pembelajaran Bermain Outdoor Lempar Tangkap Bola untuk Mengembangkan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Outdoor play learning model of throwing and catching the ball to develop gross motor skills in children aged years Gross motor development in children aged years is currently not optimal This problem is caused by physical motor learning applied in kindergartens is not in accordance with the stages of learning There is no standard and structured guide during the Covid pandemic implemented online Rarely move outdoors and children sit more in front of laptops or smartphones The purpose of this study is to develop an outdoor play learning model of throwing and catching the ball to develop gross motor skills in children aged years The method in this study uses the research and development approach r d model borg and gall Data analysis in this study is descriptive quantitative The subjects of this study were kindergarten children in the city of Yogyakarta Pedagogia totaling 100 Data collection techniques in this study were observation sheets, checklists and interviews The development of this model was validated by material experts and model experts After that, its feasibility and effectiveness were tested in small groups and large groups The results of the research and development of the outdoor play model of throwing and catching the ball showed that it had the feasibility to help develop gross motor skills in children aged years

desc: Periode prasekolah memberikan peran penting pada aspek perkembangan bahasa anak. Hal ini dikarenakan anak mulai melakukan proses sosialisasi dan interaksi dengan berbagai hal. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah meningkatkan kemampuan berbicara anak usia 3-4 tahun menggunakan pendekatan think, pair, and share. Sebanyak 10 anak dilibatkan sebagai subjek dalam penelitian ini. Jenis penelitian ini adalah Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK) yang terdiri dari 2 siklus. Setiap siklus terdiri dari tahapan perencanaan, pelaksanaan tindakan, observasi dan refleksi. Instrumen yang digunakan dalam pengumpulan data yaitu lembar observasi. Metode yang digunakan untuk menganalisis data adalah teknik analisis deskriptif kuantitatif. Analisis data pada siklus I menunjukkan bahwa kemampuan berbicara anak berada pada angka 63% atau dengan kriteria mulai berkembang. Sengkan pada siklus 2, kemampuan berbicara anak berapada pada angka 82% atau berada pada tahap berkembang sesuai harapan. Kesimpulannya, model pembelajaran kooperatif tipe think, pair, and share dapat kemampuan berbicara anak. Hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan oleh guru PAUD sebagai variasi pendekatan pengajaran sehingga hasil belajar anak meningkat termasuk dalam kemampuan berbicaranya.
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Berbicara Anak Usia 3-4 tahun Menggunakan Pendekatan Think, Pair, and Share
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving the speaking ability of children aged years using the think pair and share approach the preschool period plays an important role in the aspect of children's language development this is because children begin to carry out the process of socialization and interaction with various things the purpose of this study is to improve the speaking ability of children aged years using the think pair and share approach as many children as possible are involved as subjects in this study this type of research is classroom action research ptk which consists of cycles each cycle consists of stages of planning implementation of actions observation and reflection the instruments used in data collection are observation sheets the method used to analyze data is quantitative descriptive analysis techniques data analysis in cycle i shows that children's speaking ability is at a number or with the criteria of starting to develop while in the cycle children's speaking ability is at a number or is at a stage of development according to expectations the conclusion of the cooperative learning model type think pair and share can improve children's speaking ability the results of this study can be used by preschool teachers as a variation of the teaching approach so that children's learning outcomes increase including their speaking ability

desc: Pembelajaran mengenal budaya cendrung terlupakan oleh guru sehingga pembelajaran mengenai budaya belum terlaksana. Hal tersebut terlihat dari RPPH bahkan kurikulum yang tidak memuat budaya. Selain itu belum adanya media untuk mengenalkan budaya Minangkabau seperti tentang makanan tradisional, sehingga pengetahuan anak tentang budayanya sendiri masih rendah. Hal ini terlihat dari anak yang belum mengenal nama makanan tradisional Minangkabau bahkan lebih mengenal nama makanan cepat saji dan snack instan.. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan Pengembangan Video Edukasi Gizi Berbasis Makanan Tradisional dalam Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau Anak Usia Dini yang valid, praktis, dan efektif. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode pengembangan model ADDIE (Analisis, Desain, Development, Implemention, dan Evaluation). Hasil validitas Pengembangan Video Edukasi Gizi Berbasis Makanan Tradisional dalam Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau Anak Usia Dini dinyatakan valid dan hasil kelayakan media sangat layak digunakan, dengan nilai rata-rata Aiken’s V  oleh  ahli materi yaitu 0,83 dan  hasil nilai rata-rata Aiken’s V oleh ahli media yaitu 0,84. Hasil praktikalitas Pengembangan Video Edukasi Gizi Berbasis Makanan Tradisional dalam Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau Anak Usia Dini dinyatakan sangat praktis, dengan hasil rata-rata persentase praktikalitas yaitu 93%. Hasil presentase efektivitas yaitu 96% dan Pengembangan Video Edukasi Gizi Berbasis Makanan Tradisional dalam Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau Anak Usia Dini dinyatakan sangat efektif. Dapat disimpulkan media Video Edukasi Gizi Berbasis Makanan Tradisional dalam Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau Anak Usia Dini dinyatakan valid, praktis dan efektif.
title: Video Edukasi Gizi Berbasis Makanan Tradisional dalam Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Traditional food-based nutrition education video in introducing Minangkabau culture learning to recognize culture tends to be forgotten by teachers so that learning about culture has not been implemented this can be seen from the RPPH even the curriculum that does not contain culture besides that there is no media to introduce Minangkabau culture such as about traditional food so that children's knowledge of their own culture is still low this can be seen from children who do not know the name of traditional Minangkabau food even more familiar with the name of fast food and instant snacks this study aims to produce the development of a valid, practical and effective traditional food-based nutrition education video in introducing Minangkabau culture to early childhood This study uses the Addie model development method, design analysis, development, implementation and evaluation of the validity results of the development of traditional food-based nutrition education videos in introducing Minangkabau culture to early childhood stated valid and the results of the media feasibility are very suitable for use with an average Aikens v value by material experts, namely and the results of the average Aikens v value by media experts, namely the results of the practicality of the development of traditional food-based nutrition education videos in introducing Minangkabau culture to early childhood stated very practical with the results of the average percentage of practicality, namely the results of the percentage of effectiveness, namely and the development of traditional food-based nutrition education videos in introducing Minangkabau culture to early childhood It was stated that it was very effective, it can be concluded that educational video media for nutrition based on traditional food in introducing Minangkabau culture to young children was stated to be valid, practical and effective.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui peningkatan keterampilan mengajar guru madrasah diniyyah takmiliyyah melalui teknik menyimak, bermain, dan bercerita yang disingkat dengan teknik MATA. Penelitian dilaksanankan pada bulan oktober dengan menggunakan metode Participatory Rural Appraisal (PRA) dengan model analisis kuantitatif. Subjek penelitian ini adalah guru madrasah yang berada di 18 diniyyah takmiliyyah yang berlokasi di wilayah kabupaten Bandung tepatnya di kecamatan Pangalengan desa Lamajang. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan adanya peningkatan pemahaman guru setelah menggunakan teknik MATA, yakni meningkat rata-rata sampai pada angka 78,9 %, mengalami peningkatan sejumlah 23,3% dari kemampuan awal rata-rata berada pada 49%. Adapun kendala yang dihadapi, misalnya guru sulit mengkondisikan anak untuk tetap fokus, mencari strategi agar anak tetap semangat dan antusias dalam mengikuti pelajaran, dan penguasaan dan penerapan teknik MATA masih belum maksimal. Sedangkan dampak positif penerapan teknik MATA ini meningkatkan keaktifan dan kreatifitas guru dan mampu melibatkan seluruh siswa dalam pembelajaran. Adapun saran yang direkomendasikan dalam penelitian ini adalah hendaknya diadakan pelatihan-pelatihan lainnya bagi guru, kemudian diberikan contoh-contoh praktek pembelajaran yang lebih banyak dalam bentuk buku dan CD pelatihan agar diperluas kembali jangkauannya.
title: Upaya Meningkatkan Keterampilan Mengajar Baca Tulis Al-Qur`an  bagi Guru
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts to improve the skills of teaching reading and writing the Qur'an for teachers This study aims to determine the improvement in the teaching skills of teachers of Diniyah Takmiliyyah Islamic Schools through the technique of listening, playing and telling stories which is abbreviated as the eye technique The study was conducted in October using the participatory rural appraisal method with a quantitative analysis model The subjects of this study were teachers of Islamic schools in Diniyah Takmiliyyah located in Bandung Regency, precisely in Pangalengan District, Lamajang Village The results of the study showed an increase in teacher understanding after using the eye technique, namely an increase in the average to a number of increasing numbers from the initial ability on average at The obstacles faced, for example, teachers find it difficult to condition children to stay focused on finding strategies so that children remain enthusiastic and enthusiastic in following lessons and mastery and application of the eye technique are still not optimal, while the positive impact of applying this eye technique increases the activeness and creativity of teachers and is able to involve all students in learning The suggestions recommended in this study are that other training should be held for teachers and then given examples of more learning practices in the form of books and training CDs so that their reach is expanded again

desc: Program MBKM dipercaya mampu mengasah keterampilan life skills mahasiswa. Tujuan artikel adalah menganalisis implementasi life skills dalam program MBKM berdasarkan persepsi mahasiswa program studi PG PAUD. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Data primer untuk melihat implementasi life skills menggunakan data Google Form yang dibagikan kepada mahasiswa program studi PG PAUD yang lolos Kampus Mengajar Batch 1 sebanyak 7 orang. Data sekunder diambil dari Instrumen Survei Implementasi MBKM 2021 yang diakses melalui SPADA DIKTI. Pengambilan data dilakukan selama 1 bulan yaitu bulan Desember 2021 yang melibatkan 88 mahasiswa program studi PG PAUD. Subyek dalam penelitian ini berjumlah 7 orang yang lolos Kampus Mengajar Batch 1. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Data dikumpulkan, diolah menggunakan teknik pengolahan data kualitatif Miles dan Hubermen. Kesimpulannya implementasi life skills telah sesuai dengan tujuan dan harapan dari program MBKM. Program MBKM merupakan salah satu kegiatan yang sangat mendukung tercapainya pembentukan life skills calon guru PAUD.
title: Persepsi Mahasiswa Program Studi PGPAUD terhadap Implementasi Life Skills dalam Program MBKM
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: perception of pgpaud study program students towards the implementation of life skills in the mbkm program mbkm program is believed to be able to hone students' life skills the purpose of the article is to analyze the implementation of life skills in the mbkm program based on the perception of pg paud study program students this research is a qualitative descriptive study primary data to see the implementation of life skills using google form data that is distributed to pg paud study program students who pass the campus teaching batch as many as people secondary data is taken from the mbkm implementation survey instrument accessed through spada dikti data collection was carried out during the month of December involving pg paud study program students the subjects in this study were people who passed the campus teaching batch data collection was carried out by observation interviews and documentation data collected processed using qualitative data processing techniques miles and hubermen the conclusion is that the implementation of life skills is in accordance with the goals and expectations of the mbkm program the mbkm program is one of the activities that greatly supports the achievement of the formation of life skills for prospective paud teachers

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini untuk menganalisis perubahan sikap anak berusia 5-6 tahun sebelum dan sesudah dilakukan storytelling. Jenis penelitian berupa penelitian kualitatif yang mengaplikasikan pendekatan deskriptif. Pengumpulan data dengan mengaplikasikan: tehnik observasi, wawancara beserta dokumentasi. Observasi terhadap aktivitas anak yang berjumlah 11 anak. Dari hasil penelitian terlihat anak cenderung antusias serta mendalami hal yang dikisahkan, rasa ingin tahu anak mengalami peningkatan, serta anak dapat menyesuaikan diri dengan temannya. Beberapa cerita rakyat yang disampaikan kepada anak sudah disederhanakan oleh guru agar isi cerita lebih ringkas dan mudah dipahami anak. Perubahan perilaku yang terlihat anak yang awalnya masih acuh dengan temannya setelah diberikan treatment storytelling anak mulai menunjukkan sikap tolong menolong, saling memberi, serta berkerja sama dengan teman. Nilai karakter kepedulian sosial dapat diperoleh dari kegiatan pembiasaan yang diterapkan dalam kehidupan sehari-hari anak usia 5-6 tahun seperti bersedekah, berbagi dengan teman, mengajak anak bertanggung jawab, kerjasama dengan anak, bermain bersama teman. Karakter kasih sayang, tanggung jawab dan tolong menolong juga bisa dipupuk dari rumah.
title: Eksistensi Storytelling Berbasis Cerita Rakyat sebagai Upaya Menumbuhkan Karakter Kepedulian Sosial Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The existence of storytelling based on folklore as an effort to foster children's social awareness character. The purpose of this study was to analyze changes in the attitudes of children aged years before and after storytelling. The type of research was qualitative research that applied a descriptive approach to data collection by applying observation techniques, interviews and documentation of observations of children's activities. From the results of the study, it was seen that children tended to be enthusiastic and explored the things told. Children's curiosity increased and children were able to adjust to their friends. Several folktales told to children had been simplified by the teacher so that the contents of the story were more concise and easier for children to understand. Changes in behavior were seen in children who were initially indifferent to their friends. After being given storytelling treatment, children began to show an attitude of helping each other, giving and working together with friends. Social awareness character values ​​can be obtained from habituation activities that are applied in the daily lives of children aged years such as giving alms, sharing with friends, inviting children to be responsible, cooperating with children, playing with friends, the character of compassion, responsibility and helping each other can also be fostered from home.

desc: Perilaku kekerasan terhadap anak merupakan suatu tindakan yang salah dan kerap dilakukan oleh orang terdekat  anak yaitu ibu dalam bentuk fisik, verbal dan emosinal sehingga mempengaruhi perkembangan dan mengancam harga diri anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui faktor-faktor yang memicu terjadinya perilaku kekerasan ibu terhadap anak selama masa pandemi covid 19. Menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Pengambilan sampel dilakukan dengan teknik purposive sampling. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui wawancara mendalam dan observasi dengan teknik analisis data tematik. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa faktor-faktor yang memicu perilaku kekerasan yang dilakukan ibu kepada anak selama pandemi covid 19 yaitu (1) faktor emosional, ibu merasa tidak sabar dan kesulitan membangun motivasi anak saat belajar di rumah; (2) faktor ekonomi, ibu yang bekerja tidak memiliki waktu untuk menemani anak belajar dan tekanan pekerjaan membuat ibu melapiaskan emosinya kepada anak; (3) faktor kultural, ibu merasa memiliki anak dan berhak melakukan apapun pada anak
title: Perilaku Kekerasan Ibu Terhadap Anak Selama Pandemi Covid 19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Violent behavior of mothers towards children during the covid pandemic Violent behavior towards children is a wrong action and is often carried out by the closest person to the child, namely the mother in the form of physical, verbal and emotional, so that it affects the development and threatens the child's self-esteem. This study aims to determine the factors that trigger violent behavior of mothers towards children during the covid pandemic using a qualitative descriptive method with a case study approach. Sampling was carried out using a purposive sampling technique. Data collection was carried out through in-depth interviews and observations with thematic data analysis techniques. The results of the study showed that the factors that triggered violent behavior carried out by mothers towards children during the covid pandemic were emotional factors, mothers felt impatient and had difficulty building children's motivation while studying at home. Economic factors, working mothers did not have time to accompany their children to study and work pressure made mothers vent their emotions on their children. Cultural factors, mothers felt they owned children and had the right to do anything to their children.

desc: Penanaman karakter sejak dini sangat menentukan pembentukan kepribadian anak. Pengenalan Budaya Melayu Riau sebagai jati diri dan karakter anak budaya melayu riau sangat penting bagi anak dalam mewarisi budaya yang ada di lingkungan masyarakatnya. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengembangkan produk Pengembangan Video Animasi Putri Tujuh untuk Penanaman Nilai Karakter di Taman Kanak-Kanak Melati. Produk ini dikembangkan sesuai dengan tahapan perkembangan anak dengan tema dan sub tema serta indikator yang dilaksanakan menurut  kurikulum  2013 PAUD. Penelitian ini menggunakan Metode research and development dari ADDIE dengan teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan angket. Uji coba dilakukan untuk mengetahui validitas, praktikalitas, dan efektivitas produk Pengembangan Video Animasi Putri Tujuh untuk Penanaman Nilai Karakter di Taman Kanak-Kanak Melati. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Video Animasi Putri Tujuh dinyatakan valid, praktis, dan efektif untuk Penanaman Nilai Karakter di Taman Kanak-Kanak Melati.
title: Pengembangan Video Animasi Putri Tujuh untuk Penanaman Nilai Karakter di Taman Kanak-Kanak Melati
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of animated video of seven princesses for instilling character values ​​in melati kindergarten instilling character from an early age is very important in shaping the child's personality introduction to riau malay culture as the identity and character of children riau malay culture is very important for children in inheriting the culture that exists in their community the purpose of this study is to develop a product of developing animated video of seven princesses for instilling character values ​​in melati kindergarten this product is developed according to the stages of child development with themes and sub-themes and indicators implemented according to the early childhood education curriculum this study uses the research and development method from addie with data collection techniques using questionnaires trials were conducted to determine the validity of the practicality and effectiveness of the product of developing animated video of seven princesses for instilling character values ​​in melati kindergarten the results of the study indicate that the animated video of seven princesses is declared valid, practical and effective for instilling character values ​​in melati kindergarten

desc: Penelitian ini mengemukakan model komunikasi persuasif pada pembelajaran materi praktek shalat fardhu pada anak usia dini. Jenis penelitian ini adalah studi kasus dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Teknis analisis data menggunakan model Spradley yakni dengan melakukan analisis domain. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa model komunikasi persuasif sangat mendukung bagi guru dalam proses pembelajaran materi praktek shalat fadhu pada anak usia dini. Untuk mendukung komunikasi persuasif maka guru harus menguasai materi shalat fardhu sesuai tarjih Muhammadiyah, strategi pembelajaran yang menarik, kondisi belajar yang mendukung dan adanya dukungan dari kepala sekolah. Melalui penelitian ini juga diperoleh informasi bahwa media pembelajaran berbasis audio visual praktek shalat fardhu sesuai Sunnah sangat dibutuhkan dalam mendukung model komunikasi persuasif yang diterapkan oleh guru
title: Model Komunikasi Persuasif pada Pembelajaran Materi Praktek Shalat Fardhu pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: persuasive communication model in learning material on the practice of obligatory prayers in early childhood this study presents a persuasive communication model in learning material on the practice of obligatory prayers in early childhood this type of research is a case study with a qualitative approach data collection techniques with observation interviews and technical documentation data analysis using the Spradley model, namely by conducting domain analysis the results of the study show that the persuasive communication model is very supportive for teachers in the learning process of material on the practice of obligatory prayers in early childhood to support persuasive communication, teachers must master the material on obligatory prayers according to the Muhammadiyah tarjih interesting learning strategies supportive learning conditions and support from the principal through this study also obtained information that audio visual-based learning media on the practice of obligatory prayers according to the sunnah are very much needed in supporting the persuasive communication model applied by teachers

desc: The Covid-19 pandemic has an impact on every aspect of human life, one of which is the mental health of the  children. There are drastic changes in the child's life cycle and activities that cause mood fluctuations, feelings of sadness, fear, that cause excessive stress reactions. The Covid-19 pandemic is a difficult situation for children, even the impact affects their future. Therefore, there is a need for early detection to track children's mental health. This research  aimed to inform teachers' in Bekasi city of their understanding of children's mental health conditions during the Covid-19 pandemic. The purpose of this research is that teachers will have skills in early detection of mental health in children. The method employed descriptive analysis  and used  survey methods, and questionnaires  in collecting  the data. The results of this study reveal that early detection knowledge is very important to be understood by teachers as a preventive step in preventing young children's mental health disorders in the future, so that children can be productive and active again to live their lives
title: in Crisis : Early Detection of Young Children’s Mental Health During the Covid-19 Pandemic in Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: in crisis early detection of young children's mental health during the covid pandemic in Indonesia the covid pandemic has an impact on every aspect of human life one of which is the mental health of the children there are drastic changes in the child's life cycle and activities that cause mood fluctuations feelings of sadness fear that cause excessive stress reactions the covid pandemic is a difficult situation for children even the impact affects their future therefore there is a need for early detection to track children's mental health this research aimed to inform teachers in bekasi city of their understanding of children's mental health conditions during the covid pandemic the purpose of this research is that teachers will have skills in early detection of mental health in children the method employed descriptive analysis and used survey methods and questionnaires in collecting the data the results of this study reveal that early detection knowledge is very important to be understood by teachers as a preventive step in preventing young children's mental health disorders in the future so that children can be productive and active again to live their lives

desc: Program Pembelajaran Jarak Jauh (PJJ) dilakukan untuk memutus rantai penyebaran virus Covid-19. Tujuan penelitian untuk mengetahui program PJJ dari perspektif orangtua dan peran orangtua di dalamnya. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah survei deskriptif, data diperoleh melalui angket terbuka dan tertutup, subjek dari penelitian ini adalah orangtua yang memiliki anak berusia 3-6 tahun. Hasil penelitian mengungkapkan program PJJ dari perspektif orangtua dan peran orangtua dalamnya. Adapun peran orangtua berdasarkan hasil penelitian yakni; pengganti guru di sekolah (edukator), memberikan fasilitas yang mendukung dan memberi motivasi belajar. Penelitian juga mengungkapkan kelebihan dan kekurangan dalam PJJ, dari program ini orangtua merasa lebih erat hubungannya dengan anak, namun ada kesulitan yang dirasakan orangtua pada program PJJ, yakni; sinyal, pekerjaan, waktu untuk menemani anak belajar, metode pembelajaran, fokus anak untuk belajar, bahan-bahan yang sulit dicari, pengumpulan tugas dalam bentuk video, orangtua kurang faham IT, mengatur emosi anak ketika belajar, finansial, anak hanya nurut kepada guru.
title: Perspektif dan Peran Orangtua dalam Program PJJ Masa Pandemi Covid-19 di PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: perspective and role of parents in the distance learning program during the covid pandemic in early childhood education distance learning program distance learning is carried out to break the chain of transmission of the covid virus the purpose of the study was to determine the distance learning program from the perspective of parents and the role of parents in it the research method used was a descriptive survey data was obtained through open and closed questionnaires the subjects of this study were parents who had children aged years the results of the study revealed the distance learning program from the perspective of parents and the role of parents in it the role of parents based on the results of the study is a substitute teacher at school educators provide facilities that support and motivate learning the study also revealed the advantages and disadvantages of distance learning from this program parents feel closer to their children but there are difficulties felt by parents in the distance learning program namely work signals time to accompany children to study learning methods focus children on learning materials that are difficult to find collection of assignments in the form of videos parents do not understand it regulate children's emotions when studying financially children only obey the teacher

desc: Orang tua perlu mengetahui bagaimana memanfaatkan teknologi tersebut agar memberikan dampak positif bagi perkembangan bahasa anaknya. Tujuan dalam penelitian ini adalah mengembangkan buku saku untuk orang tua tentang pendampingan anak dalam mengoptimalkan aspek perkembangan bahasanya di era digital. Model pengembangan yang digunakan adalah 4D yaitu define, design, develop, dan disseminate yang diadaptasikan menjadi 4P yaitu pendefinisian, perancangan, pengembangan, dan penyebaran. Subjeknya adalah 10 orang tua di kota Pontianak, sumber data berasal dari 20 guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini serta melibatkan para psikolog yang bekerja di PAUD dan dosen PG-PAUD untuk mendapatkan data validasi ahli materi dan validasi ahli media. Metode yang digunakan wawancara dan angket dengan teknik analisis data analisis deskriptif kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan buku saku ini layak digunakan setelah mendapatkan masukan dari subjek penelitian maupun validator ahli materi dan ahli media.
title: Pengembangan Buku Saku: Pendampingan Orang Tua untuk Optimalisasi Perkembangan Bahasa Anak Usia Dini di Era Digital
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
