data_cleaned: The purpose of this study is to develop a learning center video media and produce valid, practical and effective learning video media. The type of research is research and development rd. The data collection techniques used in this study are interviews and questionnaires. This development procedure refers to the development of the Addie model based on the results of the study that the validity test by experts is categorized as very valid. The practicality test is carried out by teachers, categorized as very practical. While the effectiveness is carried out by children with an effective category and children with an ineffective category. Learning video media can be used as an alternative form for teachers in using learning media. Learning video media can make it easier for teachers to deliver material. In addition, the learning video media developed is designed in an interesting and fun way so that children can easily remember the learning material.

desc: Lembaga Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini berperan sebagai wadah optimalisasi perkembangan anak, salah satunya adalah pengembangan keterampilan motorik halus yang penting dalam mendukung peningkatan life skills anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis aktivitas pengembangan motorik halus di KBIT Al-Aqsha melalui pendekatan penelitian kualitatif-studi kasus. Pengambilan data melalui teknik observasi, studi dokumen dan wawancara kepada tiga orang informan yang dipilih secara purposive sampling dengan teknik analisis data melalui proses kondensasi data, penyajian data dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa aktivitas pengembangan motorik halus anak di KBIT Al-Aqsha sudah mulai berkembang sejak satu bulan proses pembelajaran yang distimulasi melalui aktivitas menggambar bebas, kegiatan meniru obyek, kegiatan kombinasi, mengajarkan cara memegang alat makan dan alat tulis dengan benar, menggunting pola, melipat dan menempel gambar, mewarnai dan eksplorasi kegiatan dan penggunaan media yang unik. Evaluasi ketercapaian dilakukan melalui penilaian unjuk kerja, observasi dan pemberian tugas yang dilakukan sebagaimana indikator yang telah ditetapkan.
title: Optimalisasi Aktivitas Pengembangan Motorik Halus Anak Usia Dini Usia 3-4 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: optimization of fine motor development activities for early childhood aged years Early childhood education institutions play a role as a forum for optimizing child development, one of which is the development of fine motor skills which are important in supporting the improvement of children's life skills This study aims to analyze fine motor development activities in kbit alaqsha through a qualitative research approach, case study, data collection through observation techniques, document studies and interviews with three informants selected by purposive sampling with data analysis techniques through data condensation processes, data presentation and drawing conclusions, the results of the study indicate that children's fine motor development activities in kbit alaqsha have begun to develop since one month of the learning process that is stimulated through free drawing activities, activities to imitate objects, combination activities, teaching how to hold cutlery and stationery correctly, cutting, folding and sticking patterns, coloring pictures and exploring activities and the use of unique media, evaluation of achievement is carried out through performance assessment, observation and assignments carried out as per the established indicators

desc: Kemampuan berfikir simbolik merupakan bagian dari aspek perkembangan kognitif. Dalam mengoptimalisasi kemampuan berfikir simbolik media yang digunakan adalah permainan edukatif setatak angka. Permainan edukatif setatak angka dipilih karena permainan ini belum banyak digunakan dalam menstimulasi kemampuan berfikir simbolik. Penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian kualitatif dengan metode deskriptif. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui dan mendeskripsikan permainan setatak angka dalam menstimulasi kemampuan berfikir simbolik anak usia dini. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa permainan edukatif setatak angka yang digunakan sangat menarik dan dapat menstimulasi kemampuan berfikir simbolik anak usia 4-5 tahun dalam mengenal lambang bilangan, membilang banyak benda 1- 10 dan mengenal konsep bilangan ternyata berkembang sesuai harapan.
title: Permainan Edukatif Setatak Angka dalam Menstimulasi Kemampuan Berfikir Simbolik Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: educational game of a set of numbers in stimulating the symbolic thinking ability of early childhood symbolic thinking ability is part of the cognitive development aspect in optimizing symbolic thinking ability the media used is the educational game of a set of numbers the educational game of a set of numbers was chosen because this game has not been widely used in stimulating symbolic thinking ability this study uses qualitative research with descriptive methods the purpose of this study is to find out and describe the game of a set of numbers in stimulating the symbolic thinking ability of early childhood the results of the study show that the educational game of a set of numbers used is very interesting and can stimulate the symbolic thinking ability of children aged years in recognizing number symbols counting many objects and recognizing the concept of numbers turned out to develop as expected

desc: Penelitian perkembangan pengenalan keaksaraan (arab dan latin) awal anak di lingkungan TK Muslimat NU ini berdasarkan observasi yang menemukan problem pengembangan bahasa anak dalam pembelajaran. Penelitian ini bertujuan: 1. Menghasilkan produk media pembelajaran Smart Bag yang layak, efektif dalam meningkatkan perkembangan anak usia 4-5 tahun, 2. Memberikan informasi dan ilmu baru terkait tema penelitian. Model penelitian yang digunakan ADDIE (Assume, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation). Data penelitian diperoleh dari hasil observasi, wawancara, angket, dokumentasi, uji validasi ahli. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan perolehan data 90,2 dari ahli, sembilan puluh tiga persen dari hasil uji kelompok kecil, dan 94,4 persen dari hasil uji kelompok besar, total keseluruhan memperoleh 92,5 persen. Hasil klasifikasi 86-100 persen tergolong dalam kategori sangat valid dan dapat digunakan. Dengan demikian maka media Smart Bag sebagaimana yang dipaparkan pada hasil tersebut layak digunakan sebagai media pembelajaran khususnya bagi yang memiliki kesamaan persoalan sebagaimana yang peneliti paparkan tersebut di atas, yaitu terkait dengan pengembangan media pembelajaran.
title: Pengembangan Media Pembelajaran Smart Bag untuk Keaksaraan (Arab dan Latin) Awal pada Anak TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of smart bag learning media for early Arabic and Latin literacy in kindergarten children research on the development of early Arabic and Latin literacy in children in the Muslimat NU kindergarten environment is based on observations that found problems with children's language development in learning this study aims to produce a smart bag learning media product that is appropriate and effective in improving the development of children aged years providing new information and knowledge related to the research theme the research model used addie assume design development implementation evaluation research data was obtained from the results of observations interviews questionnaires documentation expert validation tests the results of the study showed that data obtained from experts ninety-three percent of the results of small group tests and percent of the results of large group tests the total overall obtained percent classification results percent are included in the very valid category and can be used thus the smart bag media as described in the results is appropriate for use as a learning medium especially for those who have the same problems as the researcher explained above, namely related to the development of learning media

desc: Semakin maju perkembangan zaman semakin canggih pula perkembangan teknologi. Pola pikir manusiapun semakin meningkat lebih kreatif dan imajinatif dalam memahami dunia. Perkembangan Media informasi semakin beragam aplikasi muncul dan disukai oleh  anak-anak. Apa jadinya jika tidak ada batasan pengelolaan siaran melalui media yang banyak di tonton oleh anak-anak, dimana anak-anak terutama anak usia dini yang belum mengerti mana baik dan buruk, tak jarang juga apa yang mereka tonton bisa jadi panutan. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui peran TV sekolah sebagai media syiar konten edukasi bagi anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif dengan teknik  mengumpulkan data lapangan, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil dari penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa peran TV sekolah sebagai media syiar bagi anak usia dini sangat penting dan bermanfaat bagi anak-anak sebagai media pembelajaran di rumah maupun disekolah, anak lebih kreatif dan inovatif.
title: Peran TV Sekolah sebagai Media Syiar Konten Edukasi bagi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of school TV as a medium for broadcasting educational content for early childhood The more advanced the development of the era, the more sophisticated the development of technology, the more human thought patterns are increasing, more creative and imaginative in understanding the world of information media development, more diverse applications appear and are liked by children, what would happen if there were no limits to broadcast management through media that are widely watched by children where children, especially early childhood children who do not understand what is good and bad, not infrequently what they watch can be a role model The purpose of this study is to determine the role of school TV as a medium for broadcasting educational content for early childhood This study uses a qualitative descriptive method with the technique of collecting field data, interviews and documentation The results of this study indicate that the role of school TV as a medium for broadcasting for early childhood is very important and beneficial for children as a learning medium at home and at school Children are more creative and innovative

desc: Pentingnya pengenalan prefiks bahasa Gorontalo dan bahasa Suwawa pada anak usia dini. Karena kedua bahasa tersebut digunakan masyarakat sebagai alat komunikasi serta pedoman/aturan yang mengatur tata cara berbahasa daerah yang baik dan benar sesuai dengan kaidah. Tujuan penelitian mendeskripsikan komparasi aspek morfologi bahasa Gorontalo dan Suwawa dilihat dari proses reduplikasi pada anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yaitu deskriptif kualitatif dengan teknik komparatif. Hasil penelitian yaitu bahasa Gorontalo dan bahasa suwawa memilki bentuk yang sama. Dilihat dari penggunaan yang melekat pada bentuk dasar mengakibatkan perubahan baik pada proses morfologinya, makna, dan fungsi. Kedua bahasa tersebut memiliki hubungan yang sepadan, baik segi bentuk ataupun maknanya. Dampak dari penelitian ini adalah anak mampu menggunakan bahasa daerah Gorontalo dan Suwawa dalam kehidupan sehari-hari.
title: Bahasa Gorontalo dan Bahasa Suwawa pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Gorontalo language and Suwawa language in early childhood the importance of introducing Gorontalo language and Suwawa language prefixes in early childhood because both languages ​​are used by the community as a means of communication and guidelines for rules that regulate the correct and proper way to speak regional languages ​​according to the rules of the research objectives describe the comparative aspects of the morphology of the Gorontalo and Suwawa languages ​​seen from the reduplication process in early childhood the research method is descriptive qualitative with comparative techniques the results of the research are that the Gorontalo language and Suwawa language have the same form seen from the use that is attached to the basic form resulting in changes in both the morphological process the meaning and function of the two languages ​​have a comparable relationship in terms of form and meaning the impact of this research is that children are able to use the Gorontalo and Suwawa regional languages ​​in everyday life

desc: Aspek motorik dan sosial pada anak usia dini perlu ditingkatkan, dan salah satunya dapat dilakukan melalui pembelajaran atau kegiatan seni tari, karena pada dasarnya anak usia dini suka dengan tarian. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui dan menganalisis pengaruh pembelajaran sendratari Ramayana dan tari kreasi terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar dan perilaku sosial anak. Jenis penelitian adalah penelitian kuantitatif. Populasi penelitian adalah anak pada 16 TK yang berjumlah 616 anak. Teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan rumus Slovin dan diperoleh jumlah sampel sebanyak 243 anak. Penentuan sampel menggunakan cluster proportional random sampling,. Teknik pengumpulan data  menggunakan lembar observasi dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data menggunakan statistik parametrik dengan analisis regresi. Hasil penelitian menyimpulkan (1) pembelajaran sendratari Ramayana dan tari kreasi secara parsial dan simultan memiliki pengaruh positif dan signifikan terhadap motorik kasar anak; (2) pembelajaran sendratari Ramayana, tari kreasi, dan kemampuan motorik kasar  secara parsial dan simutan memiliki pengaruh positif dan signifikan terhadap perilaku sosial anak. Implikasi dari penelitian ini adalah guru TK dapat menggunakan sendratari Ramayana dan tarian kreasi sebagai media pembelajaran untuk meningkatkan kemampuan motorik dan perilaku sosial anak usia dini, sekaligus melestarikan budaya Sendratari Ramayana sebagai warisan budaya Indonesia.
title: Pengaruh Pembelajaran Sendratari Ramayana dan  Tarian Kreasi terhadap  Motorik dan Perilaku Sosial Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of learning Ramayana dance drama and creative dance on children's motor skills and social behavior. Motor and social aspects in early childhood need to be improved and one of them can be done through dance learning or activities because basically early childhood likes dance. This study aims to determine and analyze the influence of learning Ramayana dance drama and creative dance on children's gross motor skills and social behavior. The type of research is quantitative research. The population of the study was children in kindergarten with a total of 1,000 children. The sampling technique used the Slovin formula and the number of samples obtained was 1,000 children. The sample determination used cluster proportional random sampling. The data collection technique used observation and documentation sheets. The data analysis technique used parametric statistics with regression analysis. The results of the study concluded that learning Ramayana dance drama and creative dance partially and simultaneously had a positive and significant influence on children's gross motor skills. Learning Ramayana dance drama and creative dance and gross motor skills partially and simultaneously had a positive and significant influence on children's social behavior. The implication of this study is that kindergarten teachers can use Ramayana dance drama and creative dance as a learning medium to improve the motor skills and social behavior of early childhood while preserving the Ramayana dance drama culture as an Indonesian cultural heritage.

desc: This study aims to analyze parenting activities in shaping the character of early childhood at Taman Posyandu Anak Salih. The research method used is a qualitative case study type. Researchers conducted interviews with principals and teachers at the institution. The study results indicate that the formation of children's character requires a continuous and consistent process, both when the child is in the family environment, school environment, and community environment. Schools in approaching parents through parenting activities are carried out through; 1) planning includes determining the time, place of materials, and media needed in parenting activities; 2) implementation, namely the form of parental meetings or parent classes by prioritizing the discussion and sharing process; 3) evaluation in the parenting program using question and answer according to the material that has been conveyed with parents and meetings regarding ongoing programs conducted by educators and managers so that parents become partners in the formation of children's character.
title: Management of Parenting Activities in Forming Character of Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of parenting activities in forming character of early childhood this study aims to analyze parenting activities in shaping the character of early childhood at taman posyandu anak salih the research method used is a qualitative case study type researchers conducted interviews with principals and teachers at the institution the study results indicate that the formation of children's character requires a continuous and consistent process both when the child is in the family environment school environment and community environment schools in approaching parents through parenting activities are carried out through planning including determining the time place of materials and media needed in parenting activities implementation namely the form of parental meetings or parent classes by prioritizing the discussion and sharing process evaluation in the parenting program using questions and answers according to the material that has been conveyed with parents and meetings regarding ongoing programs conducted by educators and managers so that parents become partners in the formation of children's character

desc: Kajian ini berfokus untuk mengevaluasi kemampuan anak usia dini dalam melafalkan ulang pada buku cerita bergambar dengan Standar Tingkat Pencapaian Perkembangan Anak (STPPA) yang sesuai. Masa depan pada anak usia dini terdapat peranan penting dalam bercerita, terutama dengan bimbingan dari orang tua atau guru. Kepala sekolah, guru kelas A, serta 16 anak menjadi poin atau topik utama pada kajian ini. Deskriptif kualitatif adalah salah satu teknik dalam kajian ini dengan cara mengumpulkan data atau informasi melalui angket, dokumentasi pribadi, serta studi observasi. Penelusuran atau kajian analisis ini difokuskan dengan cara pemilahan data, penyajian data serta pembuatan konklusi dengan model yang saling berhubungan oleh Miles dan Huberman. Keasasan data atau informasi diverifikasi dengan triangulasi. Hasil kajian studi menunjukkan bahwa pada aspek bahasa, kemampuan menceritakan kembali buku cerita bergambar sesuai dengan indikator dan STPPA, menunjukkan kemampuan sedang dan rendah pada tahapan penyelesaian.
title: Analisis Kemampuan Anak Usia 4-5 Tahun dalam Menceritakan Kembali Buku Cerita Bergambar yang Telah Dibacakan
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the ability of children aged years in retelling picture story books that have been read This study focuses on evaluating the ability of early childhood children in retelling picture story books with the standard level of achievement of child development stppa that is appropriate for the future in early childhood there is an important role in storytelling especially with guidance from parents or teachers, principals, class A teachers and children become the main points or topics in this study Qualitative descriptive is one of the techniques in this study by collecting data or information through personal documentation questionnaires and observational studies, tracing or this analysis study is focused on sorting data, presenting data and making conclusions with interconnected models by miles and huberman The principle of data or information is verified by triangulation The results of the study show that in terms of language, the ability to retell picture story books according to the indicators and stppa shows moderate and low abilities at the completion stage

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis kegiatan mendongeng dalam meningkatkan perkembangan nilai moral anak usia dini. Diketahui bahwa daya imajinasi anak sedang berkembang, dan daya imajinasi inilah yang dimanfaatkan oleh pendidik maupun peneliti dalam meningkatkan nilai moral anak. Metode dalam penelitian ini pun menggunakan kajian literatur dengan menelaah 25 jurnal terkait kegiatan mendongeng dan peningkatan kemampuan moral anak usia dini. Berdasarkan hasil kajian literatur yang telah peneliti kaji, peneliti menemukan konsep dongeng yang sesuai seperti memiliki pesan dengan sifat cerita yang menyenangkan dan menghibur; mengandung nilai moral yang secara tidak langsung mampu mendidik anak; membuat anak fokus dan terlibat aktif; cerita harus memiliki sesuatu yang menarik rasa penasaran anak; bersifat santai; mengembangkan moral dan karakter anak; sesuai dengan umur dan perkembangan anak, dan memiliki literature yang kaya. Tidak monoton tentang satu tema saja. Adapun indikator yang menjadi tolak ukur dalam dongeng yang peneliti temukan anatara lain sabar, santun, jujur, mandiri, bertanggung jawab, percaya diri, peduli, dan sabar
title: Analisis Kegiatan Mendongeng dalam Meningkatkan Perkembangan Nilai Moral Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of storytelling activities in improving the development of moral values ​​in early childhood This study aims to analyze storytelling activities in improving the development of moral values ​​in early childhood It is known that children's imagination is developing and this imagination is utilized by educators and researchers in improving children's moral values ​​The method in this study also uses a literature review by reviewing journals related to storytelling activities and improving the moral abilities of early childhood Based on the results of the literature review that researchers have studied, researchers found a suitable fairy tale concept such as having a message with a fun and entertaining story nature containing moral values ​​that are indirectly able to educate children, making children focus and actively involved, the story must have something interesting, the child's curiosity is relaxed, developing children's morals and character according to the child's age and development and having rich literature, not monotonous about one theme only, the indicators that are used as benchmarks in fairy tales that researchers found include patience, polite, honest, independent, responsible, confident, caring and patient

desc: Tujuan dalam penelitian ini adalah meningkatkan kemampuan problem solving melalui implementasi sistem thinking dalam proses pembelajaran anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan Jenis penelitian kualitatif dengan pendekatan system thinking. Subjek penelitian adalah siswa-siswi TK Triwala. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi langsung, dokumentasi, dan dianalisis dengan metode deskriptif kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa implementasi system thinking dalam proses pembelajaran dapat meningkatkan kemampuan berpikir sistem, berpikir logis anak usia dini bisa untuk menyelesaikan suatu permasalahan melalui hal sederhana dengan stimulus gambar serta panah. Kemampuan siswa untuk menyelesaikan permasalahan pada anak usia dini perlu dilatih dan dibiasakan untuk menjadi sebuah kompetensi siswa dalam menyelesaikan berbagai permasalahan sebagai indikator proses pendidikan yang berkualitas.
title: Meningkatkan Kemampuan Problem Solving melalui System Thinking dalam Proses Pembelajaran Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving problem solving skills through system thinking in the early childhood learning process The purpose of this study is to improve problem solving skills through the implementation of system thinking in the early childhood learning process This study uses a qualitative research type with a system thinking approach The subjects of the study were students of TK Triwala The data collection technique used direct observation, documentation and was analyzed using a qualitative descriptive method The results of the study indicate that the implementation of system thinking in the learning process can improve the ability to think logically The ability to think logically The ability to solve problems in early childhood can be used to solve problems through simple things with image stimuli and arrows The ability of students to solve problems in early childhood needs to be trained and accustomed to becoming a student competency in solving various problems as an indicator of a quality education process

desc: Kehidupan anak orang tua adalah lingkungan pertama dari sumber bahasa dan lingkungan sosial, komunikasi yang terjalan dari anak dan orang tua dipercaya sungguh berpengaruh kepada perkembangan bahasa pada anak lalu peran orang tua ialah tentang aturan orang tua dalam memberikan anak tentang bagaimana mereka mengajarkan, mendidik anak tentang semua hal yang terkait dengan perkembangan bahasa terhadap anak yang amat membentuk oleh sebuah hubungan yang sehat yang terjalin antar orang tua dan anak pendidikan dari orang tua juga sungguh berpengaruh terhadap perkembangan pada penggunaan bahasa anak selain itu, jika keluarga memelihara sikap demokratis maka akan membuat perkembangan pada anak menjadi lebih berhasil pengaruh cara asuh dan status sosial ekonomi pada kemampuan bahasa anak tidak akan terasa secara langsung melainkan harus melewati proses proses komunikasi terhadap orang tua dan anak penelitian ini juga memiliki tujuan untuk dapat mengetahui bagaimana perkembangan bahasa yang terjadi pada anak usia 5-6 tahun dengan metode literatur review penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian kualitatif.
title: Peran Orang Tua dalam Mengembangkan Bahasa Anak Pada Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of parents in developing children's language at the age of years of a child's life parents are the first environment of language sources and the social environment of communication that occurs between children and parents is believed to have a real influence on language development in children then the role of parents is about the rules of parents in giving children about how they teach educating children about all things related to language development towards children which is very shaped by a healthy relationship that is established between parents and children education from parents also has a real influence on the development of children's language use besides that if the family maintains a democratic attitude then it will make the development of children more successful the influence of parenting methods and socio-economic status on children's language abilities will not be felt directly but must go through a process of communication with parents and children this study also aims to be able to find out how language development occurs in children aged years with the literature review method this study uses qualitative research

desc: Penelitian ini didasarkan pada pengembangan metode berdasarkan kondisi pembelajaran yang ada dan mencapai hasil pembelajaran yang diinginkan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengeksplorasi metode asesmen perkembangan anak berkebutuhan khusus di kelas Satuan Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini Sejenis (SPS) Alam Atifa Bogor, Jawa Barat. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah kualitatif, dengan melibatkan tiga subjek penelitian, yaitu seorang anak autisme (SY), guru kelas, dan guru pendamping. Dalam penelitian ini, instrumen penelitian yang digunakan meliputi wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Data dianalisis secara deskriptif melalui tahap pengumpulan, pengolahan, dan interpretasi data. Hasil penelitian ini diharapkan dapat memberikan pemahaman yang lebih mendalam tentang asesmen perkembangan anak berkebutuhan khusus pada kalangan guru-guru pendidikan anak usia dini di Bogor.
title: Perkembangan Anak dengan Kebutuhan Khusus melalui Observasi yang Mendalam
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of children with special needs through in-depth observation this study is based on the development of methods based on existing learning conditions and achieving the desired learning outcomes this study aims to explore the assessment method for the development of children with special needs in the early childhood education unit class of the type of SPS Alam Atifa Bogor West Java the research method used is qualitative involving three research subjects namely an autistic child, the class teacher and the assistant teacher in this study the research instruments used include interviews, observations and documentation data are analyzed descriptively through the data collection, processing and interpretation stages the results of this study are expected to provide a deeper understanding of the assessment of the development of children with special needs among early childhood education teachers in Bogor

desc: Anak autis memiliki kesulitan dalam membangun interaksi dan mempertahankan interaksi dengan orang lain seperti kontak mata dan atensi. Mengupayakan perkembangan keterampilan bahasa dan sosial anak autis sangat penting untuk memberikan makna pada setiap keinginan dan kebutuhan yang dimiliki oleh anak tersebut dengan cara humanis, sehingga kegiatan menyenangkan saat dilakukan. Metode penelitian ini adalah eksperimen dengan subjek tunggal yaitu anak perempuan usia 4 tahun 7 bulan yang didiagnosis sebagai penyandang ASD dan kegiatan dilakukan 20 sesi pertemuan. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui pengamatan langsung dan wawancara semi terstruktur dengan orang tua . Melalui analisis statistik deskriptif, hasil penelitian menunjukkan ada peningkatan kemampuan bahasa dan sosial komunikasi pada anak autis, tampak anak memiliki kesadaran lingkungan lebih baik, memiliki inisiatif membangun interaksi dengan lingkungan, lebih aktif dan partisipatif dalam pembelajaran serta menunjukkan keceriaan dalam setiap kegiatan. Hanya saja keterbatasan dalam penelitian ini adalah keterlibatan orang tua  untuk melanjutkan kegiatan di rumah belum konsisten.
title: Efektifitas Son-Rise Program dalam Meningkatkan Keterampilan Bahasa, Sosial Komunikasi pada Anak Autis
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effectiveness of the sonrise program in improving social communication language skills in autistic children autistic children have difficulty in building interactions and maintaining interactions with others such as eye contact and attention trying to develop the language and social skills of autistic children is very important to give meaning to every desire and need that the child has in a humanistic way so that the activities are fun when carried out this research method is an experiment with a single subject, namely a girl aged 15-20 months who was diagnosed as an ASD sufferer and the activities were carried out in a data collection meeting session through direct observation and semi-structured interviews with parents through descriptive statistical analysis the results of the study showed that there was an increase in language and social communication skills in autistic children it seems that children have better environmental awareness have the initiative to build interactions with the environment more actively and participatively in learning and show joy in every activity only the limitation in this study is that the involvement of parents to continue activities at home is not consistent

desc: Kemampuan adversity quotient (AQ) dapat membantu anak bertahan dan menemukan pemecahan masalah pada situasi yang sulit. AQ berperan dalam memprediksi dan menentukan keberhasilan seseorang. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisa perkembangan adversity quotient anak usia dini pasca pandemi Covid-19. Penelitian ini menggunakan sampel sebanyak 52 anak usia dini. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui observasi. Instrumen yang digunakan adalah lembar observasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kuantitatif. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian diketahui bahwa kemampuan AQ pada anak usia dini berada dalam ketgori tinggi. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan sebagai dasar penelitian selanjutnya yang memiliki topik sejenis. Selain itu, daapt digunakan sebagai dasar penyusunan kebijakan program sekolah untuk mengoptimalkan kemampuan AQ.
title: Kemampuan Adversity Quotient pada Anak Usia Dini Pasca Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: adversity quotient ability in early childhood post covid adversity quotient ability aq can help children survive and find solutions to problems in difficult situations aq plays a role in predicting and determining a person's success this study aims to analyze the development of adversity quotient in early childhood post covid pandemic this study used a sample of as many as early childhood data collection was carried out through observation the instrument used was an observation sheet the data analysis technique used was descriptive quantitative based on the results of the study it is known that the aq ability in early childhood is in the high category the implications of the results of this study can be used as a basis for further research that has a similar topic besides that it can be used as a basis for compiling school program policies to optimize aq ability

desc: Pola asuh keluarga amat penting guna proses pertumbuhan anak di masa depan, dimana kegunaan keluarga sebagai tempat membimbing serta membentukkan karakter anak. Penelitian ini dilakukan pada satu anak dan bermaksud guna tahu pola asuh yang diimplementasikan kakek dan nenek pada anak yang dari latar belakang keluarga broken home. Metode studi yang dipergunakan yakni pendekatan kualitatif bersama metode penganalisisan deskriptif yang bermaksud guna mendeskripsikan kejadian yang ada, yang berlangsung ketika itu, ataupun dimasa sebelumnya. Hasil studi menunjukkan ada 2 kecondongan pola asuh kakek serta nenek yang ditemukan yakni pola asuh permisif serta pola asuh antara permisif bersama otoriter sedang pola asuh ibu lebih ke pola asuh demokratis selaras bersama kutipan wawancara singkat yang menekankan bahwa semuanya memiliki batasan yang harus konsisten dilakukan supaya anak lebih mandiri. Kedua pola asuh itu condong berefek  negatif kepada sifat anak, yakni tidak mandiri serta manja. Disebuah keluarga, orang tua yang paling penting serta diharap saat melaksanakan fungsi pengasuhan pada anak meskipun dalam kondisi keluarga broken home agar semua aspek perkembangan anak bisa berkembang secara optimum.
title: Pola Asuh Kakek dan Nenek terhadap Anak dengan Orang Tua Broken Home
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parenting patterns of grandparents towards children with parents from broken homes Family parenting patterns are very important for the child's growth process in the future where the usefulness of the family as a place to guide and shape the child's character This study was conducted on one child and intended to find out the parenting patterns implemented by grandparents in children from a broken home family background The study method used was a qualitative approach with a descriptive analysis method that intended to describe the events that took place at that time or in the past The results of the study showed that there was a tendency for the parenting patterns of grandparents found, namely permissive parenting patterns and parenting patterns between permissive and authoritarian, while the mother's parenting pattern was more towards democratic parenting in line with a short interview quote that emphasized that everything has limits that must be consistently carried out so that children are more independent Both parenting patterns tend to have a negative effect on the child's nature, namely not being independent and spoiled in a family The most important parents and it is hoped that when carrying out the function of parenting on children even in a broken home family condition so that all aspects of child development can develop optimally

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis keberhasilan program pengembangan kognitif dan emosional anak Kelompok Bermain (KB) Holistik Integratif melalui sistem pembelajaran sentra berbasis kawasan pesisir pantai. Penelitian dilaksanakan di KB yang berada di kawasan Pesisr Pantai dengan melibatkan enam belas anak dan seorang guru, tiga orang kader posyandu serta lima orangtua anak pada pendidikan KB Pasia Mutiara, Ulak Karang Selatan, Kota Padang, Indonesia. Metode Penelitian ini adalah kualitatif dengan pendekatan grounded research. Hasil analisis diperoleh pengembangan kognitif yang dilaksanakan berupa kegiatan dengan model sentra yang dimodisfikasi dengan kondisi. Keunikan program pengembangan terlihat dengan adanya pembelaajaran berbasis pesisir pantai yang terintegrasi dengan posyandu balita. Pembelajatan sentra yang dilakukan cukup unik yang dinamakan Sentra Buka Lapak yaitu model sentra dengan hanya menggunakan satu kelas dengan banyak container sentra. Keberhasilan Program Pengembangan terlihat dari terjadinya peningkatan perkembangan yang positf pada aspek kognitif dan emosional anak kelompok Bermain holistik integrative ini.
title: Analisis Pengembangan  Kognitif dan Emosional Anak Kelompok Bermain Berbasis Kawasan Pesisir Pantai
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of cognitive and emotional development of children in coastal area-based playgroups This study aims to analyze the success of the cognitive and emotional development program for children in the integrative holistic family planning playgroup through a coastal area-based center learning system. The study was conducted in a family planning center located in the coastal area involving sixteen children and one teacher, three Posyandu cadres and five parents of children in the Pasia Mutiara Ulak Karang Selatan family planning education, Padang City, Indonesia. This research method is qualitative with a grounded research approach. The results of the analysis obtained cognitive development carried out in the form of activities with a center model that was modified with the unique conditions of the development program can be seen from the existence of coastal-based learning that is integrated with toddler Posyandu. The center learning that is carried out is quite unique, namely the Buka Lapak center, namely a center model using only one class with many center containers. The success of the development program can be seen from the increase in positive development in the cognitive and emotional aspects of children in this integrative holistic playgroup.

desc: This article aims to examine the role of the family in educating children in the era of Al-Qur'an-based digital disruption. This is based on the fact that changes in the era of digital disruption can affect the behavior and character of a child who is in the process of finding his identity. By using pure literature research and descriptive data analysis techniques, this article concludes that the role of the family in children's education is crucial to their growth and development. Families must strive to educate, direct, and project each child to fill their lives with solid beliefs so that they consistently carry out Islamic law and are saved from all calamities in this world and the hereafter. There are at least five roles of the family in educating children in the era of Al-Qur'an-based disruption that deserves attention, namely: as the foundation of religion, as forming the character of children, influencing children's self-confidence, instilling mutual respect, and being able to improve achievement in school. Of course, these five roles can be used as guidelines for every family in educating their children based on the Koran in the era of digital disruption
title: Family: Foundation of Children's Education in the Era of Qur'anic Disruption
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: family foundation of children's education in the era of quranic disruption this article aims to examine the role of the family in educating children in the era of quran-based digital disruption this is based on the fact that changes in the era of digital disruption can affect the behavior and character of a child who is in the process of finding his identity by using pure literature research and descriptive data analysis techniques this article concludes that the role of the family in children's education is crucial to their growth and development families must strive to educate directly and project each child to fill their lives with solid beliefs so that they consistently carry out Islamic law and are saved from all calamities in this world and the hereafter there are at least five roles of the family in educating children in the era of Al-Quran-based disruption that deserves attention namely as the foundation of religion as forming the character of children influencing children's self-confidence instilling mutual respect and being able to improve achievement in school of course these five roles can be used as guidelines for every family in educating their children based on the newspaper in the era of digital disruption

desc: Kecerdasan interpersonal anak belum banyak dikembangkan secara terstruktur dengan baik. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk menerapkan kegiatan bermain konstruktif dalam meningkatkan kecerdasan interpersonal pada anak TK di Kabupaten Gowa. Rancangan penelitian ini menggunakan metode eksperimen dengan jenis penelitian Quasi eksperimen semu. Desain peneilitian yang digunakan yaitu Nonequivalent Control Group Design. Teknik pengambilan sampel pada peneltian ini menggunakan teknik simple random sampling, dengan jumlah populasi 40 anak dan junlah sampel 20 anak. Teknik pengumpulan data pada penelitian ini adalah observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Analisis data yang digunakan adalah uji t untuk membandingkan dua kelompok eksperimen dan kontrol. Data yang diuji menggunakan skor kecerdasan interpersonal. Hasil perhitungan uji t diperoleh t(hitung) =2,178 dengan harga t(tabel)=1,734 dan dk= 18 dengan taraf signifikan α= 0.05 sehingga ditemukan adanya perbedaan signifikan antara kedua kelompok. Hasil penelitian dapat disimpulkan bahwa anak yang bermain konstruktif dapat meningkatkan kecerdasan interpersonal anak. Kecerdasan ini dapat dikembangkan dalam pembelajaran Anak di Taman Kanak-kanak.
title: Model Bermain Konstruktif untuk Meningkatkan Kecerdasan Interpersonal Anak TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: constructive play model to improve interpersonal intelligence of kindergarten children interpersonal intelligence of children has not been developed in a structured manner well the purpose of this study is to apply constructive play activities in improving interpersonal intelligence in kindergarten children in Gowa district this research design uses an experimental method with a quasi-experimental research type the research design used is nonequivalent control group design the sampling technique in this study used a simple random sampling technique with the number of child populations and the number of child samples the data collection technique in this study was observation interviews and documentation data analysis used was the t test to compare the two experimental and control groups the data tested using interpersonal intelligence scores the results of the t test calculation obtained t count with a t table value and dk with a significant level of α so that a significant difference was found between the two groups the results of the study can be concluded that children who play constructively can improve children's interpersonal intelligence this intelligence can be developed in children's learning in kindergarten

desc: Untuk mendukung pertumbuhan anak usia dini yang sesuai dengan tahap perkembangan yang baik dibutuhkan tingkat kecerdasan emosional yang optimal. Namun harapan ini tidak menunjukkan pada kondisi yang ideal di banyak tempat. Pada TK Muslimat 01 Ponorogo, faktanya menunjukkan data yang mencengangkan; mayoritas muridnya memiliki kecerdasan emosional sedang dan bahkan rendah sehingga membutuhkan bantuan dari guru untuk melatih kecerdasan emosionalnya. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk menemukan model bimbingan kelompok yang efektif untuk melatih kecerdasan emosional anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan Research and Development jenis Mixed Methods. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui teknik observasi dan wawancara. Pedoman observasi merujuk pada indikator yang dikembangkan oleh Mashar. Sedangkan pedoman wawancara yang digunakan peneliti  divalidasi  tiga orang ahli. Teknis analisis data secara deskriptif untuk data kualitatif dan ANCOVA untuk data kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa, Model Bimbingan Kelompok Berorientasi Rekreatif (BKBR) terbukti efektif melatih kecerdasan emosional anak di TK Muslimat 01 Ponorogo.
title: Bimbingan Kelompok Berorientasi Rekreatif (BKBR): Model Alternatif untuk Melatih Kecerdasan Emosional Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: recreational-oriented group guidance bkbr alternative model for training emotional intelligence of early childhood to support the growth of early childhood in accordance with the stage of good development, an optimal level of emotional intelligence is needed, but this hope does not show ideal conditions in many places at TK Muslimat Ponorogo, in fact, shows astonishing data, the majority of students have moderate and even low emotional intelligence so that they need help from teachers to train their emotional intelligence. The purpose of this study is to find an effective group guidance model for training children's emotional intelligence. This study uses a mixed methods type of research and development approach. Data collection is carried out through observation and interview techniques. Observation guidelines refer to indicators developed by Mashar, while the interview guidelines used by researchers were validated by three technical experts. Data analysis is descriptive for qualitative data and ancova for quantitative data. The results of the study indicate that the recreational-oriented group guidance model bkbr has proven effective in training children's emotional intelligence at TK Muslimat Ponorogo.

desc: Gerak bagi manusia merupakan kebutuhan terlebih bagi anak yang masih dalam proses tumbuh kembang. Penelitian ini berupaya untuk melakukan deteksi dini motorik kasar anak usia 4-6 Tahun di Kota Palu. Penelusuran yang dilakukan menggunakan penelitian deksriptif. Sampel terdiri dari 344 anak terbagi atas 168 orang anak laki-laki dan 176 anak perempuan yang tersebar di 20 lembaga PAUD yang ada di kota Palu dengan menggunakan teknik total sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan 4 jenis tes yakni (1) tes meloncat tanpa awalan, (2) tes berdiri satu kaki, (3) tes kekuatan tangan, dan (4) tes kecepatan. Teknik analisis dengan menggunakan analisis deskriptif persentase. Adapun kesimpulan yaitu hasil pengukuran ditemukan kondisi motorik kasar anak berada pada kategori sedang sehingga dapat dikatakan masih dalam tahap perkembangan. Olehnya itu, hendaknya guru PAUD lebih menekankan model pembelajaran yang memacu kemampuan gerak motorik kasar sehingga dapat mendukung pencapaian prestasi anak di masa depan.
title: Deteksi Dini Motorik Kasar pada Anak Usia 4-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early detection of gross motor skills in children aged years, movement for humans is a necessity, especially for children who are still in the process of growth and development. This study attempts to conduct early detection of gross motor skills in children aged years in the city of Palu. The search was conducted using descriptive research. The sample consisted of children divided into boys and girls who were spread across early childhood education institutions in the city of Palu using the total sampling technique. Data collection techniques used the following types of tests: the jumping test without a start, the one-legged standing test, the hand strength test, and the speed test. Analysis techniques using descriptive percentage analysis. The conclusion is that the measurement results found that the child's gross motor skills were in the moderate category, so it can be said that they are still in the development stage. Therefore, early childhood education teachers should emphasize learning models that encourage gross motor skills so that they can support children's achievements in the future.

desc: Supervisi guru memberikan dampak bagi pengembangan profesionalitasnya. Pelaksanaan supervisi dilakukan oleh kepala sekolah secara periodik. Kegiatan ini merupakan aspek penting dari pengawasan pendidikan, dengan tujuan meningkatkan kualitas pengajaran Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk menggambarkan pelaksanaan supervisi akademik di taman kanak-kanak. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah studi kasus di empat sekolah. Analisis data dilakukan dengan dengan cara reduksi data (data reduction), penyajian data (data display) dan penarikan kesimpulan (conclusion drawing verification) yang dilakukan secara bersamaan Hasil analisis data menunjukkan bahwa pelaksanaan supervisi akademik di TK ditemukan beberapa tema di antaranya perencanaan supervisi, ruang lingkup, dan faktor-faktor yang mempengaruhi supervisi. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan sebagai acuan bagi sekolah untuk melakukan supervisi guru. Selain itu, pelaksanaan dan evaluasi dapat menjadi referensi kebijakan bagi dinas pendidikan untuk dapat meningkatkan kualitas guru
title: Eksplorasi Fenomena Supervisi Akademik pada Satuan Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: exploration of the phenomenon of academic supervision in early childhood education units teacher supervision has an impact on the development of their professionalism the implementation of supervision is carried out by the principal periodically this activity is an important aspect of educational supervision with the aim of improving the quality of teaching the purpose of this study is to describe the implementation of academic supervision in kindergarten the research method used is a case study in four schools data analysis is carried out by means of data reduction data reduction data presentation data display and drawing conclusions conclusion drawing verification which is carried out simultaneously the results of data analysis indicate that the implementation of academic supervision in kindergarten found several themes including supervision planning scope and factors that influence supervision the implications of the results of this study can be used as a reference for schools to supervise teachers in addition the implementation and evaluation can be a reference for policy for the education office to be able to improve teacher quality

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu untuk mendeskripsikan pendampingan orang tua dalam proses belajar anak pada masa pandemi Covid-19. Penelitian ini menggunakan rancangan penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif. Alat pengumpulan data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah angket. Penelitian ini dilakukan di TK Bakti 6 Kowang, Tamanmartani, Kalasan, Sleman. Subyek penelitian ini yaitu orang tua/ wali murid kelompok A dan B. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pendampingan orang tua dalam proses belajar anak pada masa pandemi Covid-19 di TK Bakti 6 Kowang didapatkan hasil yaitu cukup optimal yang kemudian disajikan dalam bentuk tabel dan grafik. Hasil tersebut diperoleh dari empat aspek yaitu pengawasan kegiatan dan penggunaan waktu belajar, menyediakan fasilitas belajar, menolong kesulitan belajar, dan bantuan dalam kegiatan belajar. Melalui penelitian ini diharapkan dapat memberikan beberapa rekomendasi untuk penelitian selanjutnya di masa yang akan datang.
title: Pendampingan Orang Tua dalam Proses Belajar Anak pada Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: parental guidance in the learning process of children during the Covid pandemic The purpose of this study is to describe parental guidance in the learning process of children during the Covid pandemic This study uses a quantitative descriptive research design The data collection tool used in this study is a questionnaire This study was conducted at TK Bakti Kowang Tamanmartani Kalasan Sleman The subjects of this study were parents of students in groups a and b The results of the study show that parental guidance in the learning process of children during the Covid pandemic at TK Bakti Kowang The results are quite optimal which are then presented in the form of tables and graphs The results were obtained from four aspects, namely supervision of activities and use of learning time Providing learning facilities Helping with learning difficulties and assistance in learning activities Through this study, it is hoped that it can provide several recommendations for further research in the future

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menyusun panduan setting Breakout Room untuk guru dalam memaksimalkan pemanfaatan aplikasi Zoom Meeting, dan melakukan uji kelayakannya. Penelitian ini didasari oleh merebaknya pandemi COVID-19, menjadikan transisi digitalisasi pendidikan berlaku lebih cepat. Oleh karenanya, sekolah, guru, orangtua, dan anak didik “dipaksa” untuk beradaptasi, menyelenggarakan pembelajaran yang adaptif dengan menggunakan media belajar daring. Dengan menerapkan prosedur penelitian R  D, peneliti mere-konstruksi konsep Sugiono menjadi semi R  D (tanpa diseminasi model). Penelitian ini menyimpulkan bahwa: panduan setting breakout rooms disusun untuk membantu guru memaksimalkan penggunaan aplikasi zoom meeting untuk mendukung pembelajaran di masa pandemi Covid-19. Berdasarkan uji kelayakan produk, ditemukan jika panduan tersebut, berkualifikasi baik sekali dengan keputusan sangat layak. Untuk memaksimalkan pemanfaatannya, guru harus pro-aktif secara mandiri mengembangkan keterampilan mereka. Di samping itu, administrator sekolah (kepala sekolah, manajer) juga perlu menginisiasi program-program dan mengikutsertakan guru-gurunya pada berbagai pelatihan-pelatihan pengembangan kecakapan diri guru, baik itu kecakapan pedagogis, sosial, kepribadian, profesional, dan pengetahuan terkini (teknologi).
title: Memaksimalkan Fitur Breaking Rooms Zoom Meeting  pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Maximizing the Zoom Meeting Breaking Rooms Feature in Early Childhood Education During the Covid Pandemic This study aims to compile a breakout room setting guide for teachers in maximizing the use of the Zoom Meeting application and conducting a feasibility test. This study is based on the outbreak of the Covid pandemic, making the transition to digital education faster, therefore schools, teachers, parents and students are forced to adapt to organizing adaptive learning using online learning media by implementing research procedures r d researchers reconstructed Sugiono's concept into semi r d without dissemination of the model. This study concludes that the breakout room setting guide was compiled to help teachers maximize the use of the Zoom Meeting application to support learning during the Covid pandemic based on the product feasibility test, it was found that the guide was very well qualified with a very feasible decision to maximize its use, teachers must be proactive in independently developing their skills, in addition, school administrators, principals, managers also need to initiate programs and involve their teachers in various teacher self-skill development training, both pedagogical, social, personality, professional skills and the latest knowledge of technology.

desc: Penelitian ini bermaksud mengetahui hubungan antara efikasi diri ayah melalui value of children terhadap keterlibatan pengasuhan anak usia dini. Metode penelitian menggunakan metode kuantitatif korelasional dengan Path Analysis bantuan SPSS2 2.0. Penelitian melibatkan 122 ayah yang mempunyai anak usia 2-6 tahun, yang dilakukan melalui purposive sampling. Skala yang digunakan yaitu skala keterlibatan pengasuhan ayah yang di adaptasi dari Inventory of Father Involvement (IFI) disusun oleh Hawkins, variabel efikasi diri ayah Fathering Self Efficacy Scale (FSES) disusun oleh Sevigny dan adaptasi skala value of children disusun oleh Hoffman. Pengambilan data melalui penyebaran secara offline dan online (google form). Dengan hasil penelitian menunjukkan terdapat pengaruh tidak langsung antara efikasi diri ayah melalui value of children terhadap keteribatan ayah dalam pengasuhan dengan hasil (0,59456  0,555).
title: Efikasi Diri Ayah dalam Keterlibatan Pengasuhan Anak Usia Dini Ditinjau dari Value of Children
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Father's self-efficacy in early childhood care involvement reviewed from the value of children This study aims to determine the relationship between father's self-efficacy through the value of children on early childhood care involvement The research method uses a quantitative correlational method with path analysis assisted by SPSS The study involved fathers who had children aged years which was carried out through purposive sampling The scale used was the father's care involvement scale adapted from the inventory of father involvement ifi compiled by Hawkins Father's self-efficacy variable Fathering self-efficacy scale fses compiled by Sevigny and adaptation of the value of children scale compiled by Hoffman Data collection through offline and online distribution Google form with the results of the study showing that there is an indirect effect between father's self-efficacy through the value of children on father's involvement in care with the results

desc: The cause of the low ability of students' communicationin mathematics learning in SMP Negeri Rumbio Jaya Kampar include learning method that is still centered on the teacher, one of the efforts is by using problem based learning model with problem solving approach. This research was conducted to improve the students’ communication mathematical ability. Type of the research is quasi-experimental (quasi-experimental). This study was conducted at grade VII SMP Negeri 1 Rumbio Jaya academic year 2013/2014. The researcher uses random sampling to take the sample. the test of communication ability of mathematical are used asthe instruments. Quantitative data were analyzed by using t-test for hypothesis 1and2, t’ test was used for hypothesis 3, and two-way Anova test for hypotheses 4. Based on the research that (1) students’ communication mathematical ability who are taught through problem based learning model with problem solving approach is better (2) there is no interaction between learning model with the students’ beginning knowledge in influencing students' communication mathematical ability.
title: Pengaruh Model Pembelajaran Berbasis Masalah  dengan Pendekatan Pemecahan Masalah terhadap Kemampuan Komunikasi Matematis Siswa
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the influence of the problem-based learning model with a problem-solving approach on students' mathematical communication abilities the cause of the low ability of students communication in mathematics learning in SMP Negeri Rumbio Jaya Kampar include learning method that is still centered on the teacher one of the efforts is by using problem based learning model with problem solving approach this research was conducted to improve the students' communication mathematical ability of communication ability of mathematical are used as the instruments quantitative data were analyzed by using t test for hypothesis and t test was used for hypothesis and two way anova test for hypothesis based on the research that students communication mathematical ability who are taught through problem based learning model with problem solving approach is better there is no interaction between learning model with the students beginning knowledge in influencing students communication mathematical ability

desc: Masih banyak guru yang belum dapat memanfaatkan Teknologi, Informasi dan Komunikasi  (TIK) dalam pembelajaran di Taman Kanak-kanak (TK). Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui bagaimana persepsi guru mengenai pentingnya TIK dalam perencanaan, pelaksanaan dan evaluasi pembelajaran di TK di kota Pontianak melalui metode deskriptif dalam bentuk penelitian survei dengan menggunakan alat ukur kuesioner yang diberikan kepada guru TK yang ada di kota Pontianak. Pendekatan penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah pendekatan kuantitatif. Data dianalisis dengan menggunakan teknik analisis deskriptif persentase. Teknik pengambilan sampel yang digunakan adalah simple random sampling, yaitu sebanyak 676 orang guru TK di kota Pontianak. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan sebanyak 75% guru-guru TK di kota Pontianak menyatakan pentingnya TIK dalam merencanakan pembelajaran. Sebanyak 85% guru-guru TK di kota Pontianak menyatakan bahwa TIK memiliki peran yang sangat penting dalam melaksanakan pembelajaran dan sebanyak 96% guru TK di kota Pontianak menyatakan bahwa TIK sangat penting dalam mengevaluasi pembelajaran
title: Persepsi Guru Mengenai Pentingnya TIK dalam Pembelajaran di Taman Kanak-Kanak Kota Pontianak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teachers' perceptions of the importance of ICT in learning in kindergartens in Pontianak city. There are still many teachers who have not been able to utilize information and communication technology (ICT) in learning in kindergartens. The purpose of this study was to determine the perceptions of teachers regarding the importance of ICT in planning, implementing and evaluating learning in kindergartens in Pontianak city through descriptive methods in the form of survey research using a questionnaire measuring instrument given to kindergarten teachers in Pontianak city. The research approach used in this study is a quantitative approach. Data was analyzed using descriptive percentage analysis techniques. The sampling technique used was simple random sampling, namely as many as 100 kindergarten teachers in Pontianak city. The results of the study showed that as many as 100 kindergarten teachers in Pontianak city stated the importance of ICT in planning learning. As many as 100 kindergarten teachers in Pontianak city stated that ICT has a very important role in implementing learning and as many as 100 kindergarten teachers in Pontianak city stated that ICT is very important in evaluating learning.

desc: This study aims to determine the effect of using hand puppet media on story-listening skills in children aged 5-7. The method used in this study is a quasi-experimental research design with a control group pretest-posttest design. This study took a sample of 32 experimental and 32 control class students. The instrument of this research is a test. The data analysis technique used the SPSS Statistic 25 program. Based on the study results, it can be seen from the comparison of the average pretest and post-test of the experimental and control classes. In other words, the use of learning media for children aged 5-7 years, both hand puppets and paper puppets, have the same effect on story-listening skills.
title: The Influence of Hand Puppet Media on Early Childhood Story Listening Skills
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the influence of hand puppet media on early childhood story listening skills this study aims to determine the effect of using hand puppet media on story listening skills in children aged the method used in this study is a quasi-experimental research design with a control group pretest posttest design this study took a sample of experimental and control class students the instrument of this research is a test the data analysis technique used the spss statistical program based on the study results it can be seen from the comparison of the average pretest and posttest of the experimental and control classes in other words the use of learning media for children aged years both hand puppets and paper puppets have the same effect on story listening skills

desc: Periode usia emas anak usia dini merupakan masa eksplorasi, identifikasi, kepekaan, dan bermain. Untuk mengoptimalkan pertumbuhan dan perkembangan anak diperlukan pemilihan metode pembelajaran yang tepat. Salah satunya metode storytelling berbasis kearifan lokal Bali. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui pengaruh metode storytelling berbasis kearifan lokal Bali terhadap kemampuan bahasa anak usia dini dibandingkan kelas dengan metode konvensional. Penelitian ini termasuk penelitian ekperimen, Quasi Experimental Design, rancangan yang digunakan adalah nonequivalent control group desaign. Subjek penelitian ini anak Kelompok B sebanyak 60 anak, 30 anak di kelas kontrol dan 30 anak di kelas eksperimen. Hasil analisis multivariat tests of between-subjects effects menunjukkan bahwa hubungan antara metode storytelling dengan bahasa memberikan harga F sebesar 54.637 dengan signifikansi 0,000 yang signifikan pada taraf signifikansi 0,05. Terdapat perbedaan kemampuan bahasa yang diakibatkan oleh perbedaan metode pembelajaran yang diberikan. Hal ini berarti metode storytelling berbasis kearifan lokal Bali berpengaruh terhadap kemampuan bahasa anak usia dini
title: Pengaruh Metode Storytelling Berbasis Kearifan Lokal Bali terhadap Kemampuan Bahasa Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the Balinese local wisdom-based storytelling method on the language skills of early childhood The golden age period of early childhood is a period of exploration, identification, sensitivity and play to optimize the growth and development of children. It is necessary to choose the right learning method, one of which is the Balinese local wisdom-based storytelling method. The purpose of this study was to determine the influence of the Balinese local wisdom-based storytelling method on the language skills of early childhood compared to classes with conventional methods. This study included quasi-experimental research. The design used was nonequivalent control group design. The subjects of this study were children in group B as many as children in the control class and children in the experimental class. The results of the multivariate analysis of tests of between-subjects effects showed that the relationship between the storytelling method and language gave an f value of 0.00 with significant significance. At the level of significance, there were differences in language skills caused by differences in the learning methods given. This means that the Balinese local wisdom-based storytelling method has an effect on the language skills of early childhood.

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui pengaruh penggunaan media pembelajaran (audio visual dengan media pembelajaran visual) dan motivasi diri terhadap keterlibatan orang tua dalam pendidikan anak di TK Kabupaten Mojokerto. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah eksperimen dengan desain faktorial 2 X 2, sampel berjumlah 56 diambil secara random dari populasi yang terbagi dalam empat kelompok, setiap kelompok terdiri dari 14 orang tua peserta didik. Instrumen yang digunakan berupa: angket motivasi diri orang tua siswa, dan kuesioner keterlibatan orang tua dalam pendidikan anak. Data penelitian dianalisis dengan analisis varians (ANAVA) dua jalur dan dilakukan uji lanjut karena terdapat interaksi antar faktor. Hasil pengujian hipotesis menunjukkan bahwa keterlibatan orang tua pada pendidikan anak di TK dapat ditingkatkan yang melalui pembelajaran orang tua menggunakan media audio visual bagi orang tua memiliki motivasi diri tinggi, dan sebaliknya keterlibatan orang tua pada pendidikan siswa di TK dapat ditingkatkan yang melalui pembelajaran orang tua menggunakan media visual bagi orang tua memiliki motivasi diri rendah. Keberbaruan penelitian ini menunjukkan pentingnya keterlibatan orang tua dalam proses penyelenggaraan pendidikan.
title: Pengaruh Media Pembelajaran dan Motivasi Diri terhadap Keterlibatan Orang Tua dalam Pendidikan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of learning media and self-motivation on parental involvement in children's education The purpose of this study was to determine the influence of the use of audio-visual learning media with visual learning media and self-motivation on parental involvement in children's education in kindergartens in Mojokerto Regency. The research method used was an experiment with a factorial design x. Samples were taken randomly from a population divided into four groups. Each group consisted of parents of students. The instruments used were questionnaires on the self-motivation of parents of students and questionnaires on parental involvement in children's education. The research data were analyzed using two-way ANOVA variance analysis and further testing was carried out because there was interaction between factors. The results of the hypothesis test showed that parental involvement in children's education in kindergartens can be increased through parental learning using audio-visual media for parents who have high self-motivation and vice versa. Parental involvement in students' education in kindergartens can be increased through parental learning using visual media for parents who have low self-motivation. The novelty of this study shows the importance of parental involvement in the process of organizing education.

desc: Pendidikan seksual menjadi aspek penting yang perlu diajarkan kepada siswa sejak usia dini sebagai fondasi untuk menjaga diri dari berbagai jenis kekerasan seksual pada anak yang terjadi di Indonesia. Sebagai salah satu penyelenggara pendidikan anak untuk usia dini dalam bentuk formal, Islamic pre-school menjadi pilihan yang populer di kalangan orang tua. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengeksplorasi sikap dan persepsi guru Islamic pre-school terhadap pendidikan anak usia dini di Makassar. Hasil penelitian ini menujukan bahwa pendidikan seksual di Islamic pre-school dilaksanakan dengan menyandingkan nilai-nilai ajaran agama Islam sehingga bentuk pengajaran semakin kompleks dan memberikan banyak manfaat. Pengetahuan guru dalam menerapkan tentang pendidikan seksual ini bersumber dari partisipasi mereka di masyarakat sehingga terdapat pemaknaan yang berbeda tentang pendidikan seksual dari setiap guru. Beberapa orang tua siswa juga masih menganggap tabu sehingga kurang mampu mengajarkan pendidikan seksual di rumah, padahal peran pendidikan seksual yang diajarkan oleh guru di Islamic pre-school harus juga diterapkan di lingkungan keluarga. Meski demikian, pendidikan seksual mendapatkan respon positif dari orang tua siswa.
title: Bagaimana Islamic Pre-School Mengajarkan Pendidikan Seksual ? Sikap dan Persepsi para Guru
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: How Islamic Preschools Teach Sexual Education Attitudes and Perceptions of Teachers Sexual Education is an important aspect that needs to be taught to students from an early age as a foundation for protecting themselves from various types of sexual violence against children that occur in Indonesia as one of the providers of early childhood education in the form of formal Islamic preschools are a popular choice among parents This study aims to explore the attitudes and perceptions of Islamic preschool teachers towards early childhood education in Makassar The results of this study indicate that sexual education in Islamic preschools is carried out by juxtaposing the values ​​of Islamic teachings so that the form of teaching is increasingly complex and provides many benefits Teachers' knowledge in implementing this sexual education comes from their participation in society so that there are different meanings of sexual education from each teacher Some parents of students also still consider it taboo so that they are less able to teach sexual education at home even though the role of sexual education taught by teachers in Islamic preschools must also be applied in the family environment Even so, sexual education gets a positive response from parents of students

desc: Taman Kanak-Kanak (TK) Negeri Timung merupakan salah satu TK yang terletak di Manggarai Raya dan sejak tahun 2019 sudah menerapkan PAUD Holistik Integratif (HI). Tujuan dilakukannya penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan penerapan layanan PAUD HI. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif deskriptif. Data yang dibutuhkan dalam penelitian ini adalah data yang terkait dengan penerapan layanan PAUD HI. Data tersebut diperoleh dengan menggunakan teknik pengumpulan data wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Analisis data menggunakan teknik analisis deskriptif kualitatif yaitu reduksi data, display data, dan kesimpulan serta verifikasi data. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian disimpulkan bahwa TK Negeri Timung telah menyelenggarakan layanan PAUD HI yakni yang berkaitan dengan layanan pendidikan, layanan kesehatan, gizi dan perawatan, layanan pengasuhan, layanan perlindungan, dan layanan kesejahteraan. TK Negeri Timung juga telah menjalin kerjasama dengan berbagai pihak diantaranya tenaga kesehatan, JPIC, UNIKA Santu Paulus Ruteng, dan orang tua anak usia dini. Meskipun dalam pelaksanaannya ada yang terprogram atau dengan kata lain termuat dalam kurikulum lembaga tetapi ada juga kegiatan yang sifatnya incidental.
title: Penerapan Layanan PAUD Holistik Integratif di Satuan PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of holistic integrative early childhood education services in kindergarten units TK Negeri Timung is one of the kindergartens located in Manggarai Raya and has implemented holistic integrative early childhood education since 2017. The purpose of this study is to describe the implementation of early childhood education services. This study is a descriptive qualitative study. The data needed in this study is data related to the implementation of early childhood education services. The data was obtained using data collection techniques, interviews, observations and documentation. Data analysis uses qualitative descriptive analysis techniques, namely data reduction, data display and conclusions. And data verification. Based on the results of the study, it was concluded that TK Negeri Timung has organized early childhood education services, namely those related to education services, health services, nutrition and care, foster care services, protection services and welfare services. TK Negeri Timung has also collaborated with various parties, including health workers, JPIC Unika Santu Paulus Ruteng and parents of early childhood children. Although in its implementation there are some that are programmed or in other words included in the institution's curriculum, there are also incidental activities.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis pembentukan karakter pada anak usia dini melalui metode bercerita. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif. Tempat penelitian yaitu Kelompok Bermain Harapan Bunda Wonogiri dengan subjek penelitian anak usia 3-4 tahun dan guru. Teknik pengumpulan data pada penelitian ini menggunakan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa karakter baik yang diperoleh dari cerita “Saat Beruang Mengantre Panjang” adalah berperilaku sabar, tidak berprasangka buruk, dan berperilaku sopan. Hambatan yang dihadapi oleh guru dalam pembentukan karakter melalui cerita yaituadaya kondisi orang tua yang kurang peduli terhadap kondisi anak dan proses pembelajaran saat di sekolah, pemberian tugas di rumah yang kurang sejalan dengan pemberian tugas di sekolah dan kurangnya media pembelajaran yang memadai.
title: Upaya Pembentukan Karakter melalui Metode Bercerita “Saat Beruang Mengantre Panjang” pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: character building efforts through storytelling methods when bears queue for a long time in early childhood This study aims to analyze character building in early childhood through storytelling methods This study uses a qualitative descriptive method The research location is the Harapan Bunda Wonogiri playgroup with research subjects aged children and teachers Data collection techniques in this study used observation interviews and documentation The results of the study showed that good characters obtained from the story when bears queue for a long time are behaving patiently, not being prejudiced and behaving politely The obstacles faced by teachers in character building through stories are the condition of parents who are less concerned about the condition of their children and the learning process at school Giving homework that is not in line with giving homework at school and the lack of adequate learning media

desc: Pada abad ke-21 ini, setiap manusia termasuk anak usia dini menghadapi tantangan globalisasi. Berdasarkan penelitian terdahulu disimpulkan bahwa pembelajaran yang dapat mempersiapkan anak untuk memiliki kemampuan abad ke-21 adalah pendekatan yang berorientasi pada anak. Pendekatan Reggio Emilia adalah salah pendekatan yang berorientasi pada anak. Pendekatan ini menggunakan pembelajaran berbasis proyek dan menggunakan material terbuka yang telah teruji dapat mengembangkan kemampuan abad ke-21, namun Pendekatan ini memiliki komponen pembelajaran lain. Maka tujuan penelitian ini adalah ingin melihat apakah  seluruh komponen Pendekatan ini mampu menjawab tantangan kemampuan di abad ke-21, dan apakah pendekatan dari kota Italia ini dapat diaplikasikan di dalam konteks pendidikan Indonesia. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian tinjauan pustaka, menganalisa 2 buku sumber data primer tentang Pendekatan Reggio Emilia, 1 buku sumber data primer tentang Pendidikan menurut Ki Hajar Dewantara dan 62 artikel yang terdiri dari sumber data primer dan sekunder tentang Pendekatan Reggio Emilia dan Kemampuan abad ke-21.
title: Pendekatan Reggio Emilia dalam Menjawab Tantangan  Kemampuan Anak Usia Dini Abad 21
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Reggio Emilia approach in answering the challenges of early childhood abilities in the 20th century. In this century, every human being, including early childhood, faces the challenges of globalization. Based on previous research, it was concluded that learning that can prepare children to have 20th century abilities is a child-oriented approach. The Reggio Emilia approach is one of the child-oriented approaches. This approach uses project-based learning and uses open materials that have been proven to develop 20th century abilities. However, this approach has other learning components.
