data_cleaned: storytelling with hand puppets to increase empathy in children aged 18-24 years old children who behave aggressively tend to have low empathy because they do not understand and care about others this study aims to determine the effectiveness of storytelling with hand puppets in increasing empathy in children aged 18-24 years old the study involved a TPA in Bekasi storytelling intervention using hand puppets with four story scripts for four days the stories were arranged based on aspects of esc and children's daily lives and used hand puppets designed by themselves which are the latest research empathy measurement using the empathy scale for children esc in the form of picture cards with short stories consisting of emotions happy sad angry and afraid data analysis using the Wilcoxon signed-rank test which showed a significant difference in the average empathy value p between before and after the intervention the second posttest conducted two weeks after the intervention still showed a significant increase in empathy scores this shows that storytelling with hand puppets is effective in increasing empathy in children aged 18-24 years old

desc: Guru yang berperan sebagai agent of change berupaya membentuk dan menghasilkan generasi yang potensial dan unggul dengan kompetensi professionalnya. Setiap guru perlu melakukan upaya refleksi diri untuk menilai sejauh mana kompetensi yang ia miliki diimplementasikan selama mengajar. Oleh karena itu, studi ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan pandangan guru mengenai perannya sebagi agent of change serta bagaimana mereka mengimplementasikannya. Pendekatan studi kasus digunakan dalam studi ini dengan teknik pengambilan data wawancara terbuka secara online. Penelitian ini menemukan lima tema yang menjadi fokus utama peran guru sebagai agent of change: (1) guru professional memiliki peran sentral dan ujung tombak pendidikan; (2) peran agent of change dalam diri guru; (3) upaya guru meningkatkan peran sebagai agent of change; (4) faktor penghambat peran guru sebagai agent of change; dan (5) strategi guru mengatasi hambatan sebagai agent of change. Implikasi hasil penelitian dibahas lebih lanjut dalam artikel ini.
title: Guru sebagai Agen of Change dalam Pendidikan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teachers as agents of change in children's education teachers who act as agents of change strive to form and produce a potential and superior generation with their professional competence every teacher needs to make self-reflection efforts to assess the extent to which the competence they have is implemented during teaching therefore this study aims to describe teachers' views on their role as agents of change and how they implement it case study approach is used in this study with open online interview data collection techniques this study found five themes that are the main focus of the role of teachers as agents of change professional teachers have a central role and are the spearhead of education the role of agents of change in teachers teachers' efforts to improve their role as agents of change factors inhibiting the role of teachers as agents of change and teachers' strategies to overcome obstacles as agents of change the implications of the research results are discussed further in this article

desc: Pasca pembelajaran daring saat pandemi covid-19, berpengaruh terhadap kemampuan motorik halus anak, disebabkan aktivitas anak lebih banyak berhubungan dengan gadget daripada melatih gerakan otot tangan.Penelitian ini dilaksanakan dengan tujuan untuk mengetahui perkembangan motorik halus pada anak usia dini pasca pembelajaran daring. Jenis penelitian yang dilakukan adalah penelitian kualitatif deskriptif, dengan partisipan berjumlah 3 orang yang berasal dari Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD) berbeda dengan inisial HY 6 tahun (laki-laki), S 5 tahun (perempuan) dan HR 4 tahun (perempuan). Analisis dari hasil peneilitan yang dilakukan menunjukan bahwa  ketiga partisipan mengalami keterlambatan perkembangan motorik halus pada bagian mengontrol gerakan tangan yang dialami partisipan HR, bagian yang berpola pada tingkat sederhana dialami oleh partisipan S, serta pola pada tingkat sulit dialami oleh partisipan HY. Faktor yang melatarbelakangi keterlambatan ini diantaranya  penerapan sistem pembelajaran yang dilakukan secara daring saat pandemi covid-19, kurangnya stimulasi perkembangan oleh guru maupun orang tua, serta pengetahuan orang tua terhadap perkembangan motorik halus pada anak
title: Perkembangan Motorik Halus pada Anak Usia Dini Pasca Pembelajaran Daring Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: fine motor development in early childhood after online learning during the covid pandemic post online learning during the covid pandemic has an impact on children's fine motor skills because children's activities are more related to gadgets than training hand muscle movements this study was conducted with the aim of determining the development of fine motor skills in early childhood after online learning the type of research conducted is descriptive qualitative research with participants totaling people from early childhood education paud different with the initials hy years male s years female and hr years female analysis of the results of the research conducted showed that the three participants experienced delays in fine motor development in the part of controlling hand movements experienced by participant hr the part that was patterned at a simple level was experienced by participant s and the pattern at a difficult level was experienced by participant hy the factors behind this delay include the implementation of an online learning system during the covid pandemic lack of developmental stimulation by teachers and parents and parental knowledge of fine motor development in children

desc: Dari hasil penelitian PISA dan hasil studi PIRLS menyebutkan bahwa indonesia pada tahun 2012 memiliki budaya literasi dan tingkat kemampuan literasi membaca yang rendah. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengembangkan media blog literasi membaca pada pembelajaran bahasa Indonesia di kelas III Sekolah Dasar serta mengetahui kelayakan dari media. penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian pengembangan Research and Developmet (RD) dengan model FOUR-D. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan yaitu angket, uji coba produk. Kelayakan media pembelajaran blog literasi membaca diperoleh dari hasil validasi dan uji coba media. Hasil validasi ahli materi dan validasi ahli media pembelajaran memperoleh kategori sangat layak. Uji coba yang digunakan yaitu pretest-postest pada 18 orang siswa dan mendapatkan respon siswa dengan kategori sangat baik. adanya evaluasi didalam blog untuk siswa memudahkan untuk mengukur kemampuan literasi siswa. Maka hasil penelitian pengembangan ini menyatakan bahwa media blog literasi membaca untuk siswa kelas III Sekolah Dasar sangat layak digunakan dalam pembelajaran.
title: Pengembangan Blog Literasi Membaca untuk Meningkatkan Literasi Membaca Siswa Sekolah Dasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of reading literacy blog to improve elementary school students' reading literacy from the results of the pisa study and the results of the pirls study stated that Indonesia in the year had a low literacy culture and reading literacy ability level. This study aims to develop reading literacy blog media in Indonesian language learning in grade III of elementary school and to determine the feasibility of this media. This study uses research and development research and development rd with the fourd model. The data collection technique used is a product trial questionnaire. The feasibility of reading literacy blog learning media is obtained from the results of validation and media trials. The results of the validation of material experts and validation of learning media experts obtained a very feasible category. The trial used was pretest-posttest on students and got student responses with a very good category. The evaluation in the blog for students makes it easy to measure students' literacy abilities. The results of this development research state that reading literacy blog media for grade III elementary school students is very feasible to use in learning.

desc: Literasi baca tulis ini sangat penting dilakukan karena dapat menunjuang prestasi anak untuk mencapai kesusuksan di masa yang akan datang sehingga memerlukan strategi, oleh karena itu pengembangnnya perlu strategi yang tepat. Tujuan dari penelitian yaitu untuk mendeskripsikan strategi yang digunakan guru dalam mengembangkan literasi baca tulis untuk anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Objek penelitiannya adalah pengembangan literasi baca tulis pada anak usia dini. Subjek penelitian ini yaitu guru BA dengan menggunakan teknik purposive sampling yang jumlah partisipasinya sebanyak empat orang. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi dan wawancara. Data divalidasi dengan metode triagulasi teknik. Teknik analisis data menggunakan model Miles dan Hubermen dengan tahap yaitu reduksi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa strategi pengembangan literasi di dalam kelas dengan menggunakan metode bermain, metode bercerita, sudut baca, menempel teks di dinding kelas, dan menggunakan buku jilid. Strategi di luar kelas yaitu berkujung ke perpustakaan daerah, menggunakan permainan tradisional, dan kerja sama dengan orang tua. Penggunaan strategi ini cukup efektif dilakukan.
title: Strategi Pengembangan Literasi Baca Tulis (Praliterasi) untuk Menunjang Pengetahuan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Pre-literacy literacy development strategy to support children's knowledge of literacy literacy is very important to do because it can support children's achievements to achieve success in the future so that it requires a strategy therefore its development requires the right strategy the purpose of the study is to describe the strategies used by teachers in developing literacy literacy for early childhood this study is a qualitative descriptive study the object of the study is the development of literacy literacy in early childhood the subject of this study is teacher ba using purposive sampling technique with a total participation of four people data collection technique using observation and interviews data is validated using the triangulation method data analysis techniques using the miles and hubermen models with stages namely data reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions the results of the study indicate that literacy development strategies in the classroom using the play method storytelling method reading corner sticking text on the classroom wall and using bound books strategies outside the classroom are visiting the regional library using traditional games and cooperation with parents the use of this strategy is quite effective

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui inovasi pembelajaran yang dilakukan guru PAUD selama masa pandemi Covid-19, serta dampak pemanfaatan dan adaptasi aplikasi pembelajaran daring (APD) berdasarkan aspek kognitif, afektif, dan psikomotorik. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah kuantitatif-deskriptif. Instrumen penelitian yang digunakan berbasis platform google form dengan sampel sebanyak 369 orang. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Inovasi Pembelajaran Daring (IPD) yang digunakan oleh guru PAUD cukup berkembang dengan baik. 30 variasi APD dan 4 variasi pembelajaran hybrid menjadi bentuk implementasinya. Praktik baik ini merupakan bentuk adaptasi teknologi dan informasi yang diharapkan berlanjut. Dampak penggunaan APD ini dalam hal pemanfaatan dan adaptasi APD meliputi aspek kognitif, afektif, dan psikomotorik. Ternyata lebih banyak guru yang memiliki pengalaman menggunakan APD, bahkan yang tidak berpengalaman mengganggap APD yang digunakan tidak menyulitkan. Penggunaan APD tidak dianggap mendukung tumbuh kembang kognitif, sikap, maupun psikomotorik, meskipun APD dianggap mendukung kemampuan kognitif, perkembangan sikap, dan perkembangan psikomotorik.
title: Inovasi Pembelajaran Daring dan Dampak Bagi PAUD Selama Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: online learning innovation and impact on early childhood education during the covid pandemic this study aims to determine the learning innovation carried out by early childhood education teachers during the covid pandemic and the impact of the use and adaptation of online learning applications apd based on cognitive affective and psychomotor aspects the type of research used is quantitative descriptive the research instrument used is based on the google form platform with a sample of 100 people the results of the study indicate that the online learning innovation ipd used by early childhood education teachers is quite well developed the variation of apd and the variation of hybrid learning are the forms of its implementation this good practice is a form of adaptation of technology and information that is expected to continue the impact of using this apd in terms of the use and adaptation of apd includes cognitive affective and psychomotor aspects it turns out that more teachers have experience using apd even those who are inexperienced consider the apd used does not make it difficult to use apd is not considered to support cognitive development of attitudes or psychomotor even though apd is considered to support cognitive abilities development of attitudes and psychomotor development

desc: Keterampilan sosial memegang peranan penting dalam kehidupan anak usia dini, anak dapat dapat berkomunikasi, bersosialisasi, serta berinteraksi bersama teman sebaya atau orang lain yang ada di lingkungan sekitarnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan keterampilan sosial anak melalui permainan Make A Match. Peneliti menggunakan Penelitian Tindakan Kelas sebagai metode penelitian untuk mendapatkan hasil yang diharapkan. Penelitian dilaksanakan dalam dua siklus. Pada siklus I kegiatan bermain Make A Match dibagi menjadi enam kelompok, satu kelompok terdiri dari dua anak. Saat kegiatan berlangsung anak mencari pasangan sesuai kartu yang telah diperoleh dan mencari partner sesuai pasangannya. Siklus satu nilai yang belum memenuhi target yang direncanakan. Dilanjutkan tindakan siklus dua, peneliti membagi menjadi empat kelompok, masing-masing terdiri dari tiga anak. Kartu yang dibagi terdapat tiga jenis, yaitu: kartu bergambar, kartu bayangan, dan kartu angka. Di siklus ini anak mencari pasangan sesuai dengan jumlah gambar berwarna dan jumlah gambar bayangan yang dicocokkan dengan angkanya. Hasil tindakan menunjukkan peningkatan keterampilan social sesuai dengan target yang direncanakan.
title: Peningkatan Keterampilan Sosial melalui Metode Bermain Kooperatif  Tipe Make A Match pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving social skills through cooperative play methods type make a match in early childhood social skills play an important role in the lives of early childhood children can communicate socialize and interact with peers or other people in their environment this study aims to improve children's social skills through the make a match game researchers use classroom action research as a research method to obtain the expected results the study was carried out in two cycles in cycle i the make a match play activity was divided into six groups one group consisting of two children during the activity the child looks for a partner according to the card that has been obtained and looks for a partner according to their partner cycle one values ​​that have not met the planned target are continued with action cycle two researchers divide into four groups each consisting of three children the cards that are divided there are three types namely picture cards shadow cards and number cards in this cycle children look for partners according to the number of colored pictures and the number of shadow pictures that are matched with the numbers the results of the action show an increase in social skills according to the planned target

desc: Bahasa adalah alat komunikasi yang berbentuk simbologi berbasis suara yang dihasilkan oleh pita suara manusia. dapat dilihat sebagai sarana untuk mengekspresikan ide yang muncul ke pikiran. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menguji hubungan antara perhatian orang tua, tingkat pendidikan, pola komunikasi, dan kemampuan berbicara, serta pengaruh perhatian orang tua terhadap kemampuan berbicara jika dikaitkan dengan pola komunikasi tidak langsung. Analisis jalur digunakan dalam teknik penelitian ini sebagai strategi deskriptif kuantitatif. Ada 124 orang tua dalam sampel penelitian. Dalam penelitian ini, observasi, dokumentasi, dan kuesioner digunakan sebagai metode pengumpulan data. Analisis peta frekuensi, analisis regresi berganda, dan analisis rute digunakan untuk menguji hipotesis. Menurut temuan penelitian, kemampuan berbicara, perhatian orang tua, kebiasaan komunikasi, dan tingkat pendidikan semuanya berpengaruh
title: Pengaruh Tingkat Pendidikan dan Perhatian Orang Tua pada Pola Komunikasi terhadap Kemampuan Berbicara Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of education level and parental attention on communication patterns on children's speaking ability Language is a communication tool in the form of sound-based symbology produced by the human vocal cords can be seen as a means of expressing ideas that come to mind This study aims to test the relationship between parental attention, education level, communication patterns and speaking ability and the influence of parental attention on speaking ability when associated with indirect communication patterns Path analysis is used in this research technique as a quantitative descriptive strategy There are parents in the research sample In this study, observation, documentation and questionnaires were used as data collection methods Frequency map analysis Multiple regression analysis and route analysis were used to test the hypothesis according to research findings Speaking ability Parental attention Communication habits and education level all have an effect

desc: Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah menduduki urutan ketiga yang memiliki daerah 3T terbanyak se-Indonesia. Fasilitas penunjang proses pembelajaran dari rumah di masa pandemi covid-19 menjadi keterbatasan bagi guru 3T. Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu untuk menganalisis strategi home visit yang dilakukan oleh guru sebagai implementasi PAUD dari rumah di daerah 3T pada masa pandemi covid-19. Penelitian ini menggunakan mix method yaitu menggabungkan antara penelitian kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Sampel terdiri dari 235 orang guru TK, KB, dan SPS yang ada di Kabupaten Sigi. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan menyebarkan angket. Peneliti juga menggunakan daftar wawancara dan dokumentasi sebagai data pendukung. Teknik analisis data dengan menggunakan Miles  Hubberman. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan sekitar 84,3% guru mengimplementasikan strategi home visit sebagai pembelajaran pada masa pandemi. Adapun tahapannya yakni: 1) tahap persiapan; 2) tahap pelaksanaan; 3) tahap kegiatan lanjutan; dan 4) tahap monitoring dan evaluasi. Strategi home visit ini menjadi solusi bagi guru PAUD dengan segala keterbatasan agar tetap memberikan layanan yang terbaik untuk anak usia dini di daerah 3T.
title: Home Visit: Strategi PAUD dari Rumah bagi Guru di Daerah 3T pada Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: home visit strategy for early childhood education from home for teachers in area t during the covid pandemic Central Sulawesi province ranks third with the most areas t in Indonesia supporting facilities for the learning process from home during the covid pandemic are a limitation for teachers t the purpose of this study is to analyze the home visit strategy carried out by teachers as an implementation of early childhood education from home in area t during the covid pandemic this study uses a mix method, namely combining quantitative and qualitative research the sample consists of kindergarten, kb and sps teachers in sigi district the data collection technique is carried out by distributing questionnaires the researcher also uses a list of interviews and documentation as supporting data the data analysis technique uses miles hubberman the results of the study show that around teachers implement the home visit strategy as learning during the pandemic the stages are the preparation stage the implementation stage the advanced activity stage and the monitoring and evaluation stage this home visit strategy is a solution for early childhood education teachers with all their limitations so that they can continue to provide the best service for early childhood in area t

desc: Orang tua memiliki peran penting dalam meningkatkan keterampilan emosi dan kecerdasan sosial anak usia dini, sehingga orang tua perlu  memiliki keterampilan koping dalam menghadapi dan menyelesaian permasalahan anak.  Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui dan menganalisis pengaruh pelatihan keterampilan koping orang tua terhadap kecerdasan emosi dan keterampilan sosial anak. Jenis penelitian adalah penelitian eksperimen tipe pretest-posttest group design. Populasi dan sampel penelitian adalah peserta didik TK/RA yang berada di Kecamatan Pedan Kabupaten Klaten, dan teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan purposive sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data  menggunakan kuesioner dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data menggunakan analisis regresi. Hasil penelitian membuktikan bahwa pelatihan koping orang tua memiliki pengaruh signifikan terhadap kecerdasan emosi anak dan keterampilan sosial anak. Penelitian sebelumnya merupakan penelitian korelasional, sedangkan penelitian sekarang merupakan penelitian eksperimen dengan memberikan perlakuan pada orang tua. Dampak dari penelitian ini adalah orang tua (kelompok eksperimen) yang diberikan pelatihan koping memiliki keterampilan dalam memahami, menghadapi dan menyelesaikan permasalahan anak.
title: Pengaruh Pelatihan Keterampilan Koping Orang Tua terhadap Kecerdasan Emosi  Keterampilan Sosial Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effect of parental coping skills training on emotional intelligence and children's social skills parents have an important role in improving emotional skills and social intelligence of early childhood children so that parents need to have coping skills in facing and solving children's problems this study aims to determine and analyze the effect of parental coping skills training on emotional intelligence and children's social skills the type of research is experimental research type pretestposttest group design population and research samples are TKR students in Pedan District, Klaten Regency and the sampling technique uses purposive sampling data collection techniques using questionnaires and documentation data analysis techniques using regression analysis the results of the study prove that parental coping training has a significant effect on children's emotional intelligence and children's social skills previous research was a correlational study while the current study is an experimental study by providing treatment to parents the impact of this study is that parents in the experimental group who were given coping training have skills in understanding facing and solving children's problems

desc: Kepemimpinan transformasional merupakan gaya kepemimpinan melakukan perubahan untuk mencapai performa lebih baik. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui bagaimana kepemimpinan transformasional kepala PAUD meningkatkan mutu pendidik. Metode penelitian menggunakan pendekatan kualitiatif dengan jenis studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data yakni pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kepemimpinan transformasional kepala PAUD untuk meningkatkan mutu pendidik melalui empat aspek yakni: Idealized influence yang ditunjukkan melalui keteladanan, kewibawaan, menjunjung nilai-nilai kemanusiaan, semangat tinggi dan keteguhan dalam menjalankan komitmen, etos kerja serta sikap religius. Inspirational motivation melalui perilaku yang memotivasi pendidik untuk terus berupaya meningkatkan kinerja dengan standar yang menjadi tugas pokok pendidik. Intellectual stimulation dengan kegiatan pengembangan wawasan pendidik seperti pelatihan dan pendidik, seminar, worksop. Individualized consideration melalui pemberian perhatian secara personal kepada pendidik dengan cara perenungan, pertimbangan dengan proses berfikir serta indentifikasi kebutuhan para pendidik.
title: Kepemimpinan Transformasional Kepala PAUD untuk Meningkatkan Mutu Pendidik
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Transformational leadership of PAUD principals to improve the quality of educators Transformational leadership is a leadership style that makes changes to achieve better performance The purpose of this study is to determine how the transformational leadership of PAUD principals improves the quality of educators The research method uses a qualitative approach with a case study type Data collection techniques use observation Interviews and documentation Data analysis techniques include data collection Data reduction Data presentation and drawing conclusions The results of the study indicate that the transformational leadership of PAUD principals to improve the quality of educators through four aspects, namely idealized influence which is shown through exemplary authority Upholding humanitarian values ​​High enthusiasm and determination in carrying out commitment Work ethic and religious attitude Inspirational motivation through behavior that motivates educators to continue to strive to improve performance with standards that are the main tasks of educators Intellectual stimulation with activities to develop educator insight such as training and educator seminars Workshops Individualized consideration through giving personal attention to educators by means of reflection Consideration with the process of thinking and identifying the needs of educators

desc: Pendidikan karakter sangat utama untuk diaplikasikan, sehingga pendidikan tidak hanya mengutamakan keberhasilan akademik yang bermuara pada pengetahuan keilmuan saja namun harus dapat mewujudkan anak didik yang memiliki karakter yang baik. Tujuan Penelitian ini untuk mengetahui pengaruh pembelajaran berbasis proyek terhadap penguatan profil pelajar pancasila. Penelitian menggunakan metode kualitatatif dan subyek penelitian terdiri dari Kepala Sekolah, 2 guru kelas, dan 27 peserta didik. Teknik pengumpulan data meliputi observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Menggunakan “analisis data mengalir”. Penguatan profil pelajar pancasila melalui pembelajaran berbasis proyek dengan mengangkat topik “aku sayang bumi” dapat terwujud dengan baik dan lancar. Karakter sesuai profil pelajar pancasila muncul ketika anak terlibat langsung dalam proses pembelajaran, baik dari tahap permulaan, pengembangan dan penyimpulan. Dari proyek “aku sayang bumi”, profil pelajar Pancasila yang muncul meliputi beriman dan bertaqwa kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Esa dan berakhlaq mulia, mandiri, kreatif, gotong-rotong, berkebinakaan global serta bernalar kritis.
title: Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila melalui Pembelajaran Berbasis Proyek di Taman Kanak-Kanak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Strengthening the profile of Pancasila students through project-based learning in kindergartens, character education is very important to apply so that education does not only prioritize academic success that leads to scientific knowledge but must be able to create students who have good character. The purpose of this study was to determine the effect of project-based learning on strengthening the profile of Pancasila students. The study used a qualitative method and the research subjects consisted of the principal, class teacher and students. Data collection techniques included observation, interviews and documentation using flowing data analysis. Strengthening the profile of Pancasila students through project-based learning by raising the topic of I love the earth can be realized well and smoothly. Character according to the profile of Pancasila students appears when children are directly involved in the learning process, both from the initial stage of development and conclusion of the I love the earth project. The profile of Pancasila students that emerged includes believing and being devoted to God Almighty and having noble morals, being independent, creative, mutual cooperation, being globally tolerant and having critical reasoning.

desc: Quality classroom management contributes to creating learning environment that allows the realization of various teacher roles. One way to support this is by building good teacher-student relationship. This study aims at describing the relationship between teachers and students at a kindergarten school in Malang and discusses its aspects in relation to classroom management principles. After conducting qualitative research using one-week classroom observation and literature study, this study found that almost all aspects of teacher-student relationship were identified, namely conducting informal conversations with students, paying attention to students’ activities, using physical gestures and movements, implementing positive interaction strategies, providing affirmative reactions to incorrect responses, and exhibiting an assertive connection. The other aspect that was missed was acknowledging students’ different characteristics
title: Teacher-Student Relationships at a Kindergarten School as Viewed from Classroom Management Principles
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teacherstudent relationships at a kindergarten school as viewed from classroom management principles quality classroom management contributes to creating a learning environment that allows the realization of various teacher roles one way to support this is by building good teacherstudent relationships this study aims at describing the relationship between teachers and students at a kindergarten school in Malang and discussing its aspects in relation to classroom management principles after conducting qualitative research using one week classroom observation and literature study this study found that almost all aspects of teacher student relationships were identified namely conducting informal conversations with students paying attention to student activities using physical gestures and movements implementing positive interaction strategies providing affirmative reactions to incorrect responses and exhibiting an assertive connection the other aspect that was missed was recognizing students different characteristics

desc: PAUD Holistik Integratif (PAUD HI) merupakan faktor penting dalam pendidikan. Faktor penghambat yang menjadi kendala dalam implementasi di Kabupaten Temanggung meliputi sosialisasi dari pemerintah setempat yang kurang intensif, pemahaman pendidik yang rendah, sarana dan prasarana, sumber dana serta peran pihak pihak terkait. Berdasarkan kondisi tersebut membutuhkan peran tenaga professional yang mendampingi lembaga untuk implementasi dengan baik yaitu dengan menugaskan tim fasilitator. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui peran fasilitator dalam pendampingan pelaksanaan PAUD HI di Kecamatan Ngadirejo. Metode yang digunakan adalah kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus, menggunakan teknik observasi, wawancara (kepala sekolah, guru, wali murid dan fasilitator), serta dokumentasi. Keabsahan data diuji dengan triangulasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa fasilitator mempunyai peran penting yaitu sebagai inisiator, inspirator, motivator, organisator, teladan, pembimbing, korektor dan mediator. Peran fasilitator yang dilaksanakan dalam tupoksi (edukasi, pendampingan, evaluasi, monitoring dan pelaporan) membantu pelaksanaan PAUD HI di lembaga satuan PAUD sehingga berjalan lebih baik.
title: Peran Fasilitator dalam Pendampingan Pelaksanaan PAUD Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of facilitators in assisting the implementation of holistic integrative early childhood education. Holistic integrative early childhood education. Paud hi is an important factor in education. Inhibiting factors that are obstacles to implementation in Temanggung Regency include socialization from the local government that is less intensive, low understanding of educators, facilities and infrastructure, sources of funds and the role of related parties based on these conditions, the role of professional staff is needed to accompany institutions for good implementation, namely by assigning a team of facilitators. This study aims to determine the role of facilitators in assisting the implementation of Paud hi in Ngadirejo District. The method used is qualitative with a case study approach using observation techniques, interviews with school principals, teachers, parents and facilitators, and documentation. The validity of the data is tested by triangulation. The results of the study indicate that facilitators have an important role, namely as initiators, inspirators, motivators, organizers, role models, guides, correctors and mediators. The role of facilitators carried out in the duties and functions of education, assistance, evaluation, monitoring and reporting, assisting the implementation of Paud hi in Paud unit institutions so that it runs better.

desc: Perkembangan keaksaraan anak usia dini perlu diberikan stimulus sejak dini tidak hanya oleh pendidik atau orang tua tetapi perlu kolaborasi antar orang tua dan pendidik. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis kolabarasi orang tua dan pendidik dalam menstimulus perkembangan keaksaraan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif deskriptif yang dilakukan pada KB Sultan Qaimuddin Kendari. Penelitian ini dilakukan pada bulan Desember 2021-Maret 2022, informan dalam penelitian ini adalah kepala sekolah, pendidik dan orang tua peserta didik pada KB Sultan Qaimuddin Kendari. Teknik Pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi, sedangkan teknik analisis data menggunakan pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menemukan bahwa bentuk-bentuk kolaborasi yang dilakukan orang tua dan pendidik dalam memberikan stimulus perkembangan keaksaraan anak usia dini adalah merangsang minat anak untuk berbicara, latihan menggabungkan bunyi bahasa, memperkaya perbendaharaan kata, mengenalkan kalimat melalui cerita dan nyanyian, dan mengenalkan lambang huruf.
title: Kolaborasi Orang Tua dan Pendidik dalam Menstimulus Perkembangan Keaksaraan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Collaboration of parents and educators in stimulating the development of early childhood literacy Early childhood literacy development needs to be given stimulus from an early age not only by educators or parents but also collaboration between parents and educators This study aims to analyze the collaboration of parents and educators in stimulating the development of early childhood literacy This study is a descriptive qualitative study conducted at KB Sultan Qaimuddin Kendari This study was conducted in December March The informants in this study were the principal, educators and parents of students at KB Sultan Qaimuddin Kendari The data collection technique used observation, interviews and documentation while the data analysis technique used data collection, data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions The results of the study found that the forms of collaboration carried out by parents and educators in providing stimulus for the development of early childhood literacy are stimulating children's interest in speaking, practicing combining language sounds, enriching vocabulary, introducing sentences through stories and songs and introducing letter symbols

desc: Lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini dapat mengembangkan perilaku prososial anak mengunakan kegiatan bermain engrang batok, dalam kegiatan ini, aspek pertumbuhan dan perkembangan anak dapat teransang dengan baik, tujuan dilakukannya penelitian ini adalah untuk mengembangkan perilaku prososial anak melalui kegiatan bermain engrang batok, Pada penelitian ini dapat digunakan sebagai referensi bagi peneliti berikutnya, dan bagi para pendidik guna melakukan pembelajaran dalam ruangan kelas, pada penelitian ini mengunakan metode PTK dengan siswanya sebanyak 14 Anak, juga mengunakan desain Perencanaan, pelaksanaan, pengamatan dan refleksi. Diakhir siklus mendapatkan  80,36% dengan keriteria anak meningkat sangat bagus. Anak-anak akan melompati dan mendorong batok dengan kaki mereka, menciptakan gerakan yang menyenangkan dan menantang, bermain enggrang batok memberikan kesempatan bagi anak-anak untuk berinteraksi dengan teman sebaya mereka. Melalui interaksi ini, mereka belajar mengenali dan memahami perasaan orang lain, mengontrol emosi mereka sendiri, mengatasi konflik,  ini membantu mereka dalam membangun hubungan sosial yang sehat dan positif.
title: Kegiatan Bermain Engrang Batok  dapat  Mengembangkan Perilaku Prososial Anak 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The activity of playing stilts on coconut shells can develop children's prosocial behavior. Early childhood education institutions can develop children's prosocial behavior using stilts on coconut shells. In this activity, aspects of children's growth and development can be stimulated well. The purpose of this study is to develop children's prosocial behavior through stilts on coconut shells. In this study, it can be used as a reference for subsequent researchers and for educators to conduct classroom learning. In this study, the PTK method was used with as many students as possible. The children also used the design of the implementation planning, observation and reflection at the end of the cycle. The criteria for children to improve were very good. Children would jump and push the coconut shells with their feet, creating fun and challenging movements. Playing stilts on coconut shells provides an opportunity for children to interact with their peers. Through this interaction, they learn to recognize and understand other people's feelings, control their own emotions, overcome conflicts. This helps them build healthy and positive social relationships.

desc: The research problem is the lack of children's ability to recognize the concept of numbers, the child can only mention the numbers in sequence. The purpose of research is to improve math skills early childhood through clever game clock and method of the research is mixed method of qualitative and quantitative as well as the type of research is a classroom action research. The results of each cycle research shows the increase of mathematical abilities of children, ranging from the first cycle is generally still low after the action on the second cycle increased.
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Matematika Anak Usia Dini Melalui Permainan Jam Pintar di Taman Kanak - Kanak Pembina Kec. Bangkinang Kota
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving the mathematical abilities of early childhood through smart clock games in the Pembina Kindergarten Kec Bangkinang Kota the research problem is the lack of children's ability to recognize the concept of numbers the child can only mention the numbers in sequence the purpose of research is to improve mathematics skills early childhood through clever game clock and method of the research is mixed method of qualitative and quantitative as well as the type of research is a classroom action research the results of each cycle research shows the increase of mathematical abilities of children ranging from the first cycle is generally still low after the action on the second cycle increased

desc: Penerapan pembelajaran Al-Qur’an di TKQ Riyadlushshibyan bertujuan untuk menghasilkan anak usia dini menjadi anak yang qurani dan menghasilkan potensi anak-anak usia dini sebagai sumber daya manusia (SDM) berdasarkan Al-Qur'an. Penelitian  ini bertujuan mengkaji bagaimana pelaksanaan pembelajaran Al-Qur'an terhadap perkembangan nilai agama dan moral (NAM) pada anak usia dini di TKQ Riyadlushshibyan. Penelitian ini memakai jenis penelitian deskriptif kualitatif dengan pengumpulan data yang dilakukan langsung di lokasi penelitian dan yang menjadi informan dalam penelitian ini adalah kelompok B (usia 5-6 tahun) yang berjumlah 13 orang. Cara untuk mengumpulkan datanya memakai teknik wawancara, observasi, serta dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian memperlihatkan bahwasannya dalam pelaksanaan pembelajaran Al-Qur'an pada perkembangan NAM anak usia dini menunjukan bahwa anak dapat mengetahui do’a pendek sehari-hari, anak mengetahui surat-surat yang biasa dibaca ketika shalat, anak mengetahui hari besar agama Islam, dan anak menunjukan perilaku sopan, hormat, peduli, toleransi, dan mampu menjaga kebersihan diri.
title: Implementasi Pembelajaran Al-Qur’an Terhadap Perkembangan Nilai Agama dan Moral Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of the learning of the Qur'an on the development of religious and moral values ​​of early childhood implementation of the learning of the Qur'an in TKQ Riyadlushshibyan aims to produce early childhood into children who are Qur'anic and produce the potential of early childhood as human resources based on the Qur'an this study aims to examine how the implementation of the learning of the Qur'an on the development of religious and moral values ​​​​of nam in early childhood in TKQ Riyadlushshibyan this study uses a type of qualitative descriptive research with data collection carried out directly at the research location and the informants in this study were group b years of age totaling 100 people the method for collecting data using interview techniques observation and documentation the results of the study show that in the implementation of the learning of the Qur'an on the development of nam in early childhood shows that children can know short daily prayers children know the letters that are usually read when praying children know the important days of Islam and children show polite behavior respectful caring tolerance and are able to maintain personal hygiene

desc: Pola asuh orang tua mempunyai andil dalam tumbuh kembang anak, dan anak lebih banyak menghabiskan waktu di rumah di masa pandemi ini. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk menganalisis jenis pola asuh dan program yang diterapkan orang tua buruh tani dalam menanamkan perilaku ibadah shalat lima. Metode penelitian yang digunakan yaitu kualitatif deskriptif. Partisipan pada penelitian ini berjumlah 20 orang ibu-ibu yang bekerja sebagai buruh tani, mempunyai anak berusia 4-6 tahun, dan beragama Islam. Partisipan orang tua hanya diwakili oleh ibu karena peran ibu lebih banyak dalam mendidik anak di rumah. Instrumen penelitian yang digunakan yaitu: pedoman wawancara, lembar observasi, dan hasil dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa orang tua buruh tani menerapkan pola asuh permissive indulgent, pola asuh demokratis, dan pola asuh otoriter. Sedangkan program yang diterapkan orang tua buruh tani dalam menanamkan perilaku ibadah shalat lima waktu terdiri dari empat cara, yaitu: (1) memasukkan anak ke sekolah dan madrasah; (2) mengajak dan membiasakan anak melaksanakan shalat lima waktu berjamaah di rumah; (3) menyampaikan contoh keteladanan dari Rasulullah SAW, atau nasehat; dan (4) memberikan motivasi.
title: Pola Asuh Orang tua Buruh Tani dalam Menanamkan Perilaku Ibadah Anak di Masa Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parenting patterns of farm laborers' parents in instilling children's religious behavior during the pandemic Parenting patterns have a role in children's growth and development and children spend more time at home during this pandemic. This study was conducted to analyze the types of parenting patterns and programs implemented by farm laborers' parents in instilling the behavior of praying five times a day. The research method used is qualitative descriptive. The participants in this study were mothers who worked as farm laborers and had children aged 18-24 years and were Muslim. Parent participants were only represented by mothers because the mother's role was greater in educating children at home. The research instruments used were interview guidelines, observation sheets and documentation results. The results of the study revealed that farm laborers' parents implemented a permissive indulgent parenting pattern, a democratic parenting pattern and an authoritarian parenting pattern. Meanwhile, the programs implemented by farm laborers' parents in instilling the behavior of praying five times a day consisted of four methods, namely sending children to school and madrasahs, inviting and getting children used to performing the five daily prayers in congregation at home, conveying exemplary examples from the Prophet Muhammad SAW or advice and providing motivation.

desc: Penggunaan gawai semakin diadopsi dan digunakan oleh anak sejak dini sehingga orang tua memainkan peranan penting dalam membentuk penggunaan gawai yang aman dan sehat agar terhindar dampak negatif. Tujuan dari penelitian ini untuk mengetahui pendampingan orang tua dalam membatasi, mengatur, dan mengelola penggunaan gawai pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan kualitatif deskriptif. Pengumpulan data dilakukan menggunakan wawancara. Data yang terkumpul dianalisis menggunakan teknik analisis grounded theory melalui open coding, focus coding, axial coding, dan theoretical coding. Subjek pada penelitian ini adalah tiga orang tua yang memiliki anak dengan usia 2- 5 tahun. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa orang tua memberikan pendampingan dengan membatasi, mengatur, dan mengelola penggunaan gawai. Adapun batasan yang diberikan oleh orang tua kepada anaknya dalam penggunaan gawai yaitu, batasan waktu, batasan aplikasi, batasan jarak, batasan konten, dan batasan perangkat. Penelitian ini diharapkan dapat memberikan gambaran bagi orang tua mengenai batasan-batasan yang dapat digunakan untuk membentuk penggunana gawai yang aman, nyaman, dan sehat bagi anak.
title: Pendampingan Orang Tua dalam Membatasi Penggunaan Gawai Pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: parental guidance in limiting the use of gadgets in early childhood the use of gadgets is increasingly adopted and used by children from an early age so that parents play an important role in forming safe and healthy gadget use to avoid negative impacts the purpose of this study is to determine parental guidance in limiting, regulating and managing gadget use in early childhood this study uses qualitative descriptive data collection is carried out using interviews the collected data is analyzed using grounded theory analysis techniques through open coding focus coding axial coding and theoretical coding the subjects in this study were three parents who have children aged years the results of the study show that parents provide guidance by limiting, regulating and managing gadget use the limitations given by parents to their children in using gadgets are time limits application limits distance limits content limits and device limits this study is expected to provide an overview for parents regarding the limitations that can be used to form safe, comfortable and healthy gadget use for children

desc: Penelitian ini memiliki tujuan untuk mendeskripsikan pembentukan karakter anak suku Ngada ( usia 6-8 tahun) melalui budaya Nalo di kampung Lodo kabupaten Ngada Nusa Tenggara Timur. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode kualitatif enografi. Analisis data yang digunakan menggunakan analisis data Spradley. Data penelitian ini diperoleh dari hasil observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Temuan dari penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa karakter baik atau positif anak dapat terbentuk melalui budaya Nalo. Karakter baik yang terbentuk dari budaya Nalo seperti religius, tanggung jawab, menghargai, kerja sama, dan sikap kekeluargaan yang tinggi. Ditemukan bahwa karakter tersebut terbentuk karena adanya faktor pendukung seperti niai filosofi, perspesi masyrakat, dan pembiasaan masyarakat suku Ngadha dalam melestarikan budaya Nalo. Pembentukkan karakter anak melalui budaya Nalo dilakukan di rumah dan masyarakat, dilakukan saat berkumpul makan dan minum bersama (Ka Papa Fara, Inu Papa Resi) yang selalu dilengkapi dengan minuman adat yang dikenal dengan sebutan moke.
title: Pembentukan Karakter Anak melalui Budaya Nalo pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Character formation of children through nalo culture in early childhood This study aims to describe the character formation of Ngada tribe children aged 18-24 years through nalo culture in Lodo Village, Ngada Regency, East Nusa Tenggara. The method used in this study is a qualitative method of enography. Data analysis used using Spradley data analysis. The data in this study were obtained from the results of observations, interviews and documentation. The findings of this study indicate that good or positive character in children can be formed through nalo culture. Good character formed from nalo culture such as religious, responsible, valuing, cooperation and a high family attitude. It was found that this character was formed because of supporting factors such as philosophical values, community perceptions and the habits of the Ngadha tribe in preserving nalo culture. Character formation of children through nalo culture is carried out at home and in the community when gathering to eat and drink together. Ka papa fara inu papa resi which is always accompanied by traditional drinks known as moke.

desc: Pola asuh orang tua terhadap anaknya mendasari penggunaan gawai. Orang tua yang menerapkan pola asuh demokratis memberikan gawai sejak dini pada anaknya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui hubungan antara pola asuh demokratis dan intensitas penggunaan gawai. Dalam penelitian ini, metode yang digunakan adalah metode korelasi dan ex post facto. Data yang dikumpulkan menggunakan kuesioner dan untuk menguji hipotesis menggunakan teknik korelasi product moment. Hasil perhitungan penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa r hitung lebih besar dari r tabel (0,4710,179). Berdasarkan hasil penelitian, dapat disimpulkan bahwa ada hubungan positif dan signifikan antara pola asuh demokratis dan intensitas penggunaan gawai oleh anak. Orang tua akan lebih lebih kreatif dalam mengasuh anak serta memberikan waktu pendampingan anak dalam bermain. Gawai memang dibutuhkan untuk sarana komunikasi namun perlu diatur intensitas penggunaanya.
title: Hubungan Pola Asuh Demokratis dan Intensitas Penggunaan Gawai pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the relationship between democratic parenting patterns and the intensity of gadget use in early childhood the parenting pattern of parents towards their children underlies the use of gadgets parents who apply democratic parenting patterns provide gadgets to their children from an early age this study aims to determine the relationship between democratic parenting patterns and the intensity of gadget use in this study the method used is the correlation method and ex post facto data collected using a questionnaire and to test the hypothesis using the product moment correlation technique the results of the calculation of this study indicate that r count is greater than r table based on the results of the study it can be concluded that there is a positive and significant relationship between democratic parenting patterns and the intensity of gadget use by children parents will be more creative in raising children and providing time to accompany children in playing gadgets are indeed needed for communication facilities but the intensity of their use needs to be regulated

desc: Permasalahan yang muncul pada proses implementasi Kurikulum merdeka yaitu membutuhkan kolaborasi dari para pendidik, kesulitan dalam penilaian dokumentasi, dan belum terbukanya pada perubahan kurikulum dari kurikulum 2013 menjadi kurikulum merdeka. Tujuan dari penelitian ini mendeskripsikan implementasi kurikulum merdeka di lembaga Taman Kanak-Kanak (TK) melalui literasi proyek Profil Pelajar Pancasila. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kuantitatif melalui hasil angket dan diperkuat secara kualitatif melalui hasil observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan melibatkan 89 guru dan 3 kepala lembaga TK di Kota Yogyakarta yang diambil menggunakan metode purposive sampling. Metode kualitatif menggunakan model dari Miles dan Huberman yang berupa pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data, uraian, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Instrumen penelitian yang dikembangkan telah memenuhi validitas ahli. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa implementasi kurikulum merdeka melalui literasi proyek profil pelajar pancasila di lembaga TK dapat dikatakan cukup berhasil. Dengan demikian implementasi kurikulum merdeka ini dapat terus dilakukan oleh lembaga TK dengan penyesuaian pada karakteristik lembaga.
title: Literasi Proyek Profil Pelajar Pancasila dalam Implementasi Kurikulum Merdeka pada Lembaga TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: literacy project profile of pancasila students in the implementation of the independent curriculum in kindergarten institutions problems that arise in the process of implementing the independent curriculum, namely requiring collaboration from educators difficulties in assessing documentation and not being open to changing the curriculum from curriculum to independent curriculum the purpose of this study describes the implementation of the independent curriculum in kindergarten institutions through literacy project profile of pancasila students this study uses a quantitative descriptive method through the results of the questionnaire and is strengthened qualitatively through the results of observation interviews and documentation data collection was carried out by involving teachers and heads of kindergarten institutions in the city of Yogyakarta which were taken using the purposive sampling method qualitative method using a model from miles and huberman in the form of data collection data reduction data presentation descriptions and drawing conclusions the research instruments developed have met expert validity the results of the study indicate that the implementation of the independent curriculum through literacy project profile of pancasila students in kindergarten institutions can be said to be quite successful thus the implementation of this independent curriculum can continue to be carried out by kindergarten institutions with adjustments to the characteristics of the institution

desc: Pandemi Covid-19 menyebabkan sekolah perlu memilih metode pembelajaran yang sesuai. Salah satu metode yang dapat memfasilitasi siswa adalah blended learning. Penggunaan metode tersebut di satuan PAUD masih sangat minim pembahasannya. Artikel ini bertujuan untuk memberikan gambaran implementasi dan tantangan metode blended learning  untuk anak usia dini menggunakan metode kualitatif fenomenologis. Enam guru PAUD di Yogyakarta menjadi partisipan yang dipilih melalui teknik purposive sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan menggunakan wawancara. Hasil dari analisis data menunjukkan bahwa terdapat lima tema yang menjadi fokus utama dalam implementasi metode blended learning. Aspek keterlibatan tersebut adalah : pemahaman guru terhadap metode blended learning, persiapan blended learning, respon dan pemahaman anak ketika blended learning, faktor yang mempengaruhi keberhasilan blended learning, kesesuaian metode blended learning untuk PAUD. Implikasi hasil penelitian dibahas lebih lanjut dalam artikel
title: Blended Learning untuk Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini: Implementasi dan Tantangannya
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: blended learning for early childhood education implementation and challenges the covid pandemic has caused schools to need to choose the appropriate learning method one method that can facilitate students is blended learning the use of this method in early childhood education units is still very minimal discussion this article aims to provide an overview of the implementation and challenges of the blended learning method for early childhood using a qualitative phenomenological method six early childhood education teachers in Yogyakarta became participants selected through purposive sampling techniques the data collection technique used was interviews the results of the data analysis showed that there were five themes that were the main focus in the implementation of the blended learning method the involvement aspect is the teacher's understanding of the blended learning method preparation for blended learning children's responses and understanding when blended learning factors that influence the success of blended learning the suitability of the blended learning method for early childhood the implications of the research results are discussed further in the article

desc: Mutu pendidikan hanya dapat ditingkatkan melalui peningkatan kinerja guru. Termasuk kinerja guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD) akan mampu meningkat manakala mampu mengetahui faktor-faktor yang mampu meningkatkannya, antara lain kepempimpinan visioner, dan Manajemen Berbasis Sekolah (MBS). Penelitian ini menggundakan metode kuantitatif dengan pendekatan structural equation modelling (SEM). Jumlah populasi yaitu 1.098 orang, dengan ukuran sampel 110 orang. Teknik sampling menggunakan proporsional random sampling. Data dianalisis dengan SmartPLS 3.3. hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa, kepemimpinan visioner berpengaruh terhadap kinerja guru, 2) MBS berpengaruh pada kinerja guru, 3) kepemimpinan visioner mempunyai efek terhadap kualitas PAUD, 4) MBS berpengaruh pada kualitas PAUD, 5) kinerja guru mempunyai efek pada kualitas PAUD, 6) Kinerja guru efektif dalam memediasi pengaruh tidak langsung kepemimpinan visioner terhadap kualitas PAUD, 7) kinerja guru berperan efektif dalam memediasi pengaruh tidak langsung MBS terhadap kualitas PAUD.
title: Pengaruh Kepemimpinan Visioner dan Manajemen Berbasis Sekolah terhadap Kinerja Guru dan Implikasinya pada Kualitas PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of visionary leadership and school-based management on teacher performance and its implications on the quality of early childhood education. The quality of education can only be improved through improving teacher performance, including the performance of early childhood education teachers. Early childhood education will be able to improve when they are able to identify factors that can improve it, including visionary leadership and school-based management. MBS This study uses a quantitative method with a structural equation modeling approach. The population is people with a sample size of people. The sampling technique uses proportional random sampling. The data was analyzed using SmartPLS. The results of the study indicate that visionary leadership has an effect on teacher performance. MBS has an effect on teacher performance. Visionary leadership has an effect on the quality of early childhood. MBS has an effect on the quality of early childhood. Teacher performance has an effect on the quality of early childhood. Teacher performance is effective in mediating the indirect effect of visionary leadership on the quality of early childhood. Teacher performance plays an effective role in mediating the indirect effect of MBS on the quality of early childhood.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui tantangan orang tua saat mendampingi anak usia 6-7 tahun belajar di rumah selama pandemi COVID-19. Subjek penelitian ini adalah 526 orang tua (ibu) dari anak yang berusia 6-7 tahun (usia rata-rata = 33 tahun, SD = 4.71 ) dari 51.60% laki-laki dan 41.3% perempuan yang baru mulai bersekolah dimasa pandemi COVID-19. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kuantitatif dengan rancangan penelitian cross sectional. Teknik pengambilan data menggunakan google form yang disebarkan melalui grup-grup Whatsapp ibu-ibu yang memiliki anak usia 6-7 tahun dan sudah mulai bersekolah selama satu bulan. Data dianalisis menggunakan komputerisasi. Hasil survey menunjukkan bahwa ibu-ibu harus menjadi guru pengganti dengan mengajarkan serta menjelaskan tugas-tugas yang diberikan gurunya kepada anak usia 6-7 tahun (66.20%). Ibu merasa kesulitan mengajarkan dan mendampingi anak usia 6-7 tahun belajar di rumah di masa pandemi COVID-19 (71.10%). Sebanyak 78.20% ibu-ibu menginginkan anak-anak kembali belajar di sekolah bersama guru.
title: Tantangan Orang Tua Mendampingi Anak Usia 6-7 tahun Belajar di Rumah selama Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: challenges of parents accompanying children aged years studying at home during the covid pandemic this study aims to determine the challenges of parents when accompanying children aged years studying at home during the covid pandemic the subjects of this study were parents of mothers of children aged years with an average age of years elementary school from boys and girls who had just started school during the covid pandemic this study is a quantitative study with a cross-sectional research design the data collection technique used google form which was distributed through whatsapp groups of mothers who have children aged years and have started school for one month the data was analyzed using computerization the results of the survey showed that mothers had to become substitute teachers by teaching and explaining the tasks given by their teachers to children aged years mothers found it difficult to teach and accompany children aged years studying at home during the covid pandemic as many mothers wanted their children to return to school with teachers

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh Revolusi Industri 4.0 yang menuntut sumber daya manusia yang memiliki kemampuan untuk 4C yaitu Communication, Colaboration, Creativity, dan Critical thinking. Model Pembelajaran STEAM salah satu solusi model pembelajaran yang dapat menyiapkan siswa mengikuti kebutuhan revolusi industri 4.0, Akan tetapi masih banyak guru yang kesulitan untuk menerapkan pembelajaran berbasis STEAM, untuk itu peneliti mengembangkan media pembelajaran scanbook. Jenis penelitian ini yaitu penelitian pengembangan berdasarkan kerangka ADDIE. Scanbook divalidasi oleh 2 orang ahli dan 6 orang validator praktisi, Scanbook di ujicobakan di TK Laboratorium FKIP Unri dengan jumlah sampel 20 orang siswa. Pengambilan data melalui observasi dan angket, sedangkan analisis data menggunaka rumus persentasi. Dari hasil validasi ahli media scanbook dinyatakan sangat layak, hasil ujicoba pada siswa dinyatakan media sangat layak digunakan untuk anak usia dini, dan dari guru didapatkan juga menyatakan media scanbook sangat layak untuk pembelajaran STEAM. Dari hasil penelitian tersebut dapat disimpulkan bahwa Scanbook dapat digunakan dalam pembelajaran berbasis STEAM pada lembaga PAUD
title: Pengembangan Scanbook untuk Pembelajaran Berbasis STEAM di Lembaga PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of scanbook for steam-based learning in early childhood education institutions this research is motivated by the industrial revolution that demands human resources who have the ability to c namely communication collaboration creativity and critical thinking the steam learning model is one of the learning model solutions that can prepare students to follow the needs of the industrial revolution but there are still many teachers who have difficulty implementing steam-based learning for that the researcher developed scanbook learning media this type of research is development research based on the addie scanbook framework validated by experts and validators scanbook practitioners were tested in the TK laboratory fkip unri with a sample of students data collection through observation and questionnaires while data analysis uses a percentage formula from the results of expert validation scanbook media is stated to be very feasible the results of the trial on students stated that the media is very feasible to use for early childhood and from teachers it was also obtained that scanbook media is very feasible for steam learning from the results of the study it can be concluded that scanbooks can be used in steam-based learning in early childhood education institutions

desc: Meskipun masih terdapat kontroversi untuk mengenalkan literasi dwibahasa bagi anak usia dini di Indonesia, tetapi fenomena ini semakin marak di ranah pendidikan. Beberapa sekolah telah memprogramkan kegiatan ini sebagai bagian dari keunggulan mereka. Artikel ini mengeksplorasi penggunaan big book storytelling yang diterapkan oleh sebuah taman kanak-kanak yang ada di Banjarmasin, Indonesia. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menemukan strategi penerapan big book storytelling yang tepat untuk pengenalan kemampuan dwibahasa bagi anak usia dini serta melihat respon mereka terhadap penggunaan media tersebut di dalam kelas. Penelitian ini menggunakan desain penelitian tindakan kolaboratif, dengan wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi sebagai instrumen pengumpulan data terkait persiapan, pelaksanaan, dan refleksi pasca tindakan. Penelitian ini melibatkan dua orang guru dan 24 anak sebagai partisipan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa big book storytelling dapat digunakan untuk mengenalkan kosakata dwibahasa dengan tiga tahapan, yaitu 1) pengenalan kosakata melalui flashcard, 2) storytelling interaktif, dan 3) kuis interaktif. Berdasarkan hasil observasi, media yang digunakan bisa mempertahankan antusiasme anak dalam belajar, mengenalkan kosakata baru dalam dwibahasa, serta meningkatkan interaksi berbahasa. Implikasi pedagogis terhadap pembelajaran dwibahasa untuk anak usia dini didiskusikan.
title: Membangun Literasi Dwibahasa melalui Big Book Storytelling untuk Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Building bilingual literacy through big book storytelling for early childhood although there is still controversy to introduce bilingual literacy for early childhood in Indonesia but this phenomenon is increasingly widespread in the realm of education several schools have programmed this activity as part of their excellence this article explores the use of big book storytelling implemented by a kindergarten in Banjarmasin Indonesia this study aims to find the right strategy for implementing big book storytelling to introduce bilingual skills for early childhood and see their response to the use of this media in the classroom this study uses a collaborative action research design with interviews observation and documentation as instruments for collecting data related to preparation for implementation and post-action reflection this study involved two teachers and children as participants the results of the study show that big book storytelling can be used to introduce bilingual vocabulary with three stages namely vocabulary introduction through interactive flashcard storytelling and interactive quizzes based on observation results the media used can maintain children's enthusiasm in learning to introduce new vocabulary in bilingual and increase language interaction pedagogical implications for bilingual learning for early childhood are discussed

desc: Pengasuhan anak usia dini masih banyak dikendalikan nenek. Pada masa pandemi Covid-19, nenek merupakan lansia rentan terinfeksi sehingga dituntut mampu mencegah penularan untuk dirinya sendiri dan cucunya. Pencegahan penularan Covid-19 sama antara lansia, orang dewasa dan anak-anak. Nenek berperan mendampingi cucunya agar terhindar dari penularan Covid-19. Jenis penelitian kualitatif. Partisipan dalam penelitian ini nenek yang mengasuh cucunya karena ibunya bekerja sebanyak 25 orang. Penelitian di Kecamatan wilayah pesisir pantai Kabupaten Probolinggo, Jawa Timur. Analisis dengan triangulasi dan tematik analisis. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan nenek mampu untuk membangun proses interaksi yang berlangsung terus menerus kepada cucunya tentang pencegahan Covid-19. Diperlukan kerja sama antara semua pihak baik dari nenek pengasuh, orang tua dari anak, tenaga kesehatan dan semua pihak agar pencegahan terhadap penularan Covid-19 efektif baik kepada anak-anak.
title: Cara Asuh Nenek pada Anak Usia Dini di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: how grandmothers care for early childhood during the covid pandemic early childhood care is still largely controlled by grandmothers during the covid pandemic grandmothers are elderly people who are vulnerable to infection so they are required to be able to prevent transmission for themselves and their grandchildren prevention of covid transmission is the same between elderly adults and children grandmothers play a role in accompanying their grandchildren to avoid covid transmission type of qualitative research participants in this study grandmothers who care for their grandchildren because their mothers work as many as people research in the coastal sub-district of Probolinggo Regency, East Java analysis with triangulation and thematic analysis of the results of the study showed that grandmothers were able to build a continuous interaction process with their grandchildren about preventing covid cooperation is needed between all parties, both from grandmothers, caregivers, parents of children, health workers and all parties so that prevention of covid transmission is effective for children

desc: Nilai-nilai moral penting ditanamkan sejak anak usia dini untuk mencapai keluhuran martabat manusia. Penelitian ini bertujuan mendeskripsikan nilai-nilai moral dan metode pendidikan nilai-nilai moral yang dikembangkan oleh para guru di Taman Kanak-Kanak.  Pendekatan penelitian ini adalah kualitatif. Setting penelitian adalah Taman Kanak-Kanak berbasis ajaran Islam di Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta dan Jawa Tengah. Subjek penelitian adalah guru-guru Taman Kanak-Kanak sebanyak 140 orang. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan  adalah  diskusi grup terfokus. Teknik analisis data menggunakan analisis interaktif model Miles  Huberman. Keabsahan data menggunakan triangulasi sumber. Hasil penelitian menyimpulkan: Nilai moral yang dikembangkan guru adalah religiusitas, kemandirian, percaya diri, kejujuran,  disiplin, toleransi, peduli sosial,  respek, dan kesabaran. Metode yang digunakan adalah keteladanan, pembiasaan, memberi nasehat, bercerita, dialog, sosiodrama, kunjungan sosial, wisata pendidikan, fasilitasi, bernyanyi, pengenalan hadis singkat, pemutaran  film anak-anak. Dapat disimpulkan bahwa pendidikan moral anak usia dini di Taman Kanak-Kanak di wilayah Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta dan Jawa Tengah telah dikembangkan dengan baik. Secara keilmuan, implikasi penelitian ini adalah pendidikan nilai-nilai moral dan agama anak usia dini dilaksanakan secara terintegrasi dengan lima aspek lainnya dari pengembangan anak usia dini.
title: Pendidikan Nilai-Nilai Moral Anak Usia Dini di Taman Kanak-Kanak Berbasis Islam
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood moral values ​​education in Islamic-based kindergartens Moral values ​​are important to be instilled since early childhood to achieve human dignity This study aims to describe moral values ​​and methods of moral values ​​education developed by teachers in kindergartens The approach of this study is qualitative The research setting is Islamic-based kindergartens in the Special Region of Yogyakarta and Central Java The subjects of the study were kindergarten teachers as many as people The data collection technique used was focus group discussions The data analysis technique used interactive analysis of the Miles Huberman model The validity of the data used source triangulation The results of the study concluded that the moral values ​​developed by teachers are religiosity Independence Self-confidence Honesty Discipline Tolerance Social care Respect and patience The methods used were role models Habituation Giving advice Storytelling Dialogue Sociodrama Social visits Educational tours Facilitation Singing Introduction to short hadiths Children's film screenings It can be concluded that early childhood moral education in kindergartens in the Special Region of Yogyakarta and Central Java has been developed well scientifically The implications of this study are that early childhood moral and religious values ​​education is implemented in an integrated manner with five other aspects of early childhood development

desc: The world is full of colors, and the kids love the bright colors. When pre-school age, they also like to use bright colors like red, yellow, blue, or rainbow colors (mejikuhibiniu). Though in this world there are not only these colors, but hundreds or thousands of colors. So when they use crayons that amount to 12 colors, that look only limited to existing colors. They know less or may not even know that from the 12 existing colors they can get other new colors. This study aims to prove that the color game given to Kindergarten students can improve the creativity of children in coloring the image. Early. The benefits of this research is expected to contribute in order to understand the existence of color game activities in improving the creativity of children Early Age. Data collection by check list and observation techniques, and processed in a nonstatistik way or can also be referred to as a simple statistical analysis by finding percentages. The results show that color games are significant to influencing the creativity of young children.
title: Permainan Warna Berpengaruh Terhadap Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: color play influences the creativity of early childhood the world is full of colors and the kids love the bright colors preschool when age they also like to use bright colors like red yellow blue or rainbow colors mejikuhibiniu although in this world there are not only these colors but hundreds or thousands of colors so when they use crayons that amount to colors that look only limited to existing colors they know less or may not even know that from the existing colors they can get other new colors this study aims to prove that the color game given to kindergarten students can improve the creativity of children in coloring the image early the benefits of this research are expected to contribute in order to understand the existence of color game activities in improving the creativity of children early age data collection by check list and observation techniques and processed in a nonstatistical way or can also be referred to as a simple statistical analysis by finding percentages the results show that color games are significant to influence the creativity of young children

desc: Penelitian ini memiliki tujuan untuk menciptakan games edukatif berbasis android dalam rangka meningkatkan kemampuan mengenal angka untuk anak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah riset dan pengembangan. Subjek penelitian merupakan anak usia 5-6 tahun yang berada di TK Pembina 3, TK Pembina 1 dan TK Babussalam di Kota Pekanbaru. Sampel dalam riset  ini merupakan anak usia dini yang dipilih berdasarkan kriteria sesuai dengan kebutuhan penelitian. Data yang dikumpulkan melalui lembar validasi dari ahli materi, media dan guru TK serta pre-test dan post-test mengenai kemampuan mengenal angka setelah menggunakan games edukatif. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan dengan metode observasi. Data yang terkumpul dianalisis secara kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil riset mengungkapkan bahwa games edukatif berbasis android teruji meningkatkan kemampuan mengenal angka. Berdasarkan hasil validasi ditemui bahwa games edukatif ini memiliki kelayakan. Kebaruan yang ditemui dalam riset ini adalah pentingnya meningkatkan kemampuan mengenal angka melalui pemanfaatan kemajuan teknologi informasi dalam bentuk games edukatif
title: Games Edukatif Berbasis Android untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Mengenal Angka  Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Android-based educational games to improve the ability to recognize numbers in early childhood This study aims to create Android-based educational games in order to improve the ability to recognize numbers for children The method used in this study is research and development The subjects of the study were children aged 18-24 years who were in TK Pembina TK Pembina and TK Babussalam in Pekanbaru City The sample in this study was early childhood children who were selected based on criteria according to research needs The data collected through validation sheets from media material experts and TK teachers as well as pretests and posttests regarding the ability to recognize numbers after using educational games The data collection technique used was the observation method The collected data was analyzed qualitatively and quantitatively The results of the study revealed that Android-based educational games were proven to improve the ability to recognize numbers Based on the validation results, it was found that these educational games had the feasibility The novelty found in this research was the importance of improving the ability to recognize numbers through the use of advances in information technology in the form of educational games

desc: Penggunaan gadget berlebihan membuat anak banyak menghabiskan waktunya hanya dengan bermain gadget dan menyebabkan lupa untuk berinteraksi maupun berkomunikasi dengan lingkungan sekitarnya. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui strategi orang tua dalam mengatasi dampak penggunaan gadget terhadap perkembangan sosial anak usia dini. Metode kualitatif deskriptif digunakan dalam penelitian ini. Sumber informasi dalam penelitian ini adalah orang tua dan anak yang berusia 4 sampai 6 tahun. Teknik pengumpulan data meliputi observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data dengan mereduksi, menyajikan dan menarik kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa dampak gadget terhadap perkembangan sosial anak dapat menghilangkan rasa ketertarikan anak terhadap aktivitas lain, tidak mendegarkan saat bermain gadget, memengaruhi interaksi sosial anak, dan strategi orang tua dalam mengatasi dampak penggunaan gadget terhadap perkembangan sosial yaitu dengan mendampingi, membatasi, mengawasi, serta memberikan kesempatan pada anak untuk bermain dengan teman sebayanya supaya anak dapat berinteraksi serta menjadikan perkembangan sosial di usia anak tumbuh dengan baik.
title: Strategi Orang Tua dalam Mengatasi Dampak Penggunaan Gadget terhadap Perkembangan Sosial Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
