data_cleaned: Parental strategies in overcoming the impact of gadget use on the social development of early childhood Excessive use of gadgets makes children spend a lot of time just playing gadgets and causes them to forget to interact or communicate with their surroundings The purpose of this study was to determine parental strategies in overcoming the impact of gadget use on the social development of early childhood The descriptive qualitative method was used in this study The source of information in this study was parents and children aged up to years Data collection techniques include observation, interviews and documentation Data analysis techniques by reducing, presenting and drawing conclusions The results of the study showed that the impact of gadgets on children's social development can eliminate children's interest in other activities Not listening while playing gadgets affects children's social interactions and parental strategies in overcoming the impact of gadget use on social development, namely by accompanying, limiting, supervising and providing opportunities for children to play with their peers so that children can interact and make social development at the age of children grow well

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan kemampuan berbicara, keterkaitan dan efektivitas kegiatan storytelling dapat berperan terhadap pengembangan kemampuan berbicara pada anak usia 4-5 tahun. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif dengan menggunakan metode studi kepustakaan atau literatur. data yang diperoleh peneliti bersumber pada hasil penelitian, buku, maupun data-data yang telah ada yang kemudian hasil dan literatur tersebut dideskripsikan atau ditelaah kembali. Keterkaitan storytelling atau bercerita terhadap kemampuan berbicara pada anak dapat terlihat berdasarkan peningkatan penguasaan jumlah kosa kata, merangsang daya imajinasi dan kreativitas anak, melatih keterampilan belajar bahasa dan ekspresi verbal, meningkatkan komunikasi lisan, mendorong anak untuk lebih ekspresif yang mendukung perkembangan mendengarkan anak berfungsi dengan baik untuk membantu kemampuan berbicara anak yang diwujudkan dalam kosa kata, kemampuan mengucap kata, dan merangkai kalimat yang digunakan anak dalam mengkomunikasikan pikiran atau perasaannya dengan jelas dalam kegiatan berbicara
title: Peranan Storytelling dalam Pengembangan Kemampuan Berbicara pada Anak Usia 4-5 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of storytelling in developing speaking skills in children aged years This study aims to describe speaking skills, the relationship and effectiveness of storytelling activities can play a role in developing speaking skills in children aged years This study uses a qualitative descriptive method using a library study method or literature The data obtained by researchers comes from the results of book research or existing data, which are then described or reviewed again The relationship between storytelling or telling stories and speaking skills in children can be seen based on increased mastery of vocabulary Stimulates children's imagination and creativity Trains language learning skills and verbal expression Improves oral communication Encourages children to be more expressive Supports children's listening development Functions well to help children's speaking skills which are manifested in vocabulary The ability to pronounce words and put together sentences used by children in communicating their thoughts or feelings clearly in speaking activities

desc: Teknologi pada era revolusi industri 4.0 memberi pengaruh pada mainan anak. Anak menyukai mainan modern yang tidak ada nilai kearifan lokal. Padahal kearifan lokal dapat menunjang pembangunan nasional. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui bagaimana mainan susun balok seimbang kearifan lokal diterapkan pada anak usia 5-6 tahun dan ditinjau dari sudut pandang aspek perkembangan anak dan pengenalan nilai budaya Yogyakarta. Penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif tentang penggambaran objek dan subjek penelitian berdasarkan hasil perhitungan data. Metode yang digunakan adalah observasi dan dokumentasi. Sasaran subjek penelitian adalah anak usia 5-6 tahun. Hasil penelitian berdasarkan aspek perkembangan dan aspek kearifan lokal memperoleh data dengan kategori baik sekali. Maka dapat disimpulkan bahwa mainan susun balok seimbang berbasis kearifan lokal Yogyakarta dapat diimplementasikan dalam pembelajaran maupun sebagai alat bermain untuk anak usia 5-6 tahun dengan baik sekali.
title: Implementasi Mainan Susun Balok Seimbang Berbasis Kearifan Lokal Yogyakarta untuk Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of balanced block stacking toys based on local wisdom of Yogyakarta for early childhood technology in the industrial revolution era has an influence on children's toys, children like modern toys that do not have local wisdom values, even though local wisdom can support national development the purpose of this study is to find out how balanced block stacking toys based on local wisdom are applied to children aged years and reviewed from the perspective of child development aspects and introduction of cultural values ​​of Yogyakarta this study uses quantitative descriptive research on the depiction of objects and research subjects based on the results of data calculations the methods used are observation and documentation the target subjects of the study are children aged years the results of the study based on development aspects and local wisdom aspects obtained data with a very good category it can be concluded that balanced block stacking toys based on local wisdom of Yogyakarta can be implemented in learning or as a play tool for children aged years very well

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan proses dan hasil belajar melalui kegiatan menggambar dalam meningkatkan kecerdasan interpersonal. Penelitian ini dilakukan di TK Islam Nusantara, Kota Serang pada bulan Maret 2018. Subjek penelitian adalah kelompok B sebanyak 14 siswa. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian tindakan. Prosedur penelitian terdiri dari: perencanaan, tindakan dan observasi, refleksi. Dilakukan untuk 16 pertemuan dibagi menjadi dua siklus. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui tes, observasi, wawancara dan studi dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah analisis data kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Pra tindakan dilakukan untuk menentukan persentase kecerdasan interpersonal sebesar 50,89%, meningkat menjadi 64,55% setelah siklus pertama, dan meningkat menjadi 85% setelah siklus kedua. Peningkatan 85% pada siklus kedua membuktikan bahwa kegiatan menggambar dapat meningkatkan kecerdasan interpersonal anak usia dini. Kecerdasan interpersonal dapat dikembangkan melalui kegiatan menggambar, di mana melalui menggambar anak-anak dapat berinteraksi selain mengekspresikan emosi. Menggambar adalah kegiatan yang sangat menyenangkan bagi anak-anak
title: Peningkatan Kecerdasan Interpersonal melalui Kegiatan Menggambar pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: increasing interpersonal intelligence through drawing activities in early childhood this study aims to describe the process and results of learning through drawing activities in increasing interpersonal intelligence this study was conducted at TK Islam Nusantara, Serang City in March the research subjects were group B as many as students this study used the action research method the research procedure consisted of action planning and observation reflection conducted for meetings divided into two cycles data collection techniques were conducted through observation tests interviews and documentation studies data analysis techniques used in this study were qualitative and quantitative data analysis pre-action was carried out to determine the percentage of interpersonal intelligence by increasing to after the first cycle and increasing to after the second cycle the increase in the second cycle proves that drawing activities can increase the interpersonal intelligence of early childhood interpersonal intelligence can be developed through drawing activities where through drawing children can interact in addition to expressing emotions drawing is a very fun activity for children

desc: Kesetaraan paket B memerlukan evaluasi untuk mengetahui perkembangan pembelajaran. Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi adanya keingintahuan evaluasi pembelajaran yang dilakukan. Adanya keinginan peserta didik mengikuti pembelajaran untuk mendapatkan ijazah guna mendapatkan pekerjaan. Menggunakan metode kualitatif pendekatan kualitatif deskriptif penelitian ini bertujuan mendeskripsikan penggunaan Model Evaluasi Kirkpatrick  meliputi: (1) reaksi, (2) tahap belajar, (3) perilaku, dan (4) hasil. Pengumpulan data menggunakan teknik observasi, wawancara, dokumentasi, dan menggunakan triangulasi sumber. Informan penelitian adalah Kepala Sanggar, Pendidik, dan Peserta Didik. Hasil penelitian: (1)Evaluasi Reaksi dalam pelayanan pembelajaran, fasilitas serta persiapan sudah memuaskan dan memenuhi kebutuhan pembelajaran, (2) Tahapan Belajar dilihat dari penyampaian dan pelaksanaan mendapatkan keterampilan yang sesuai pembelajaran, teori dikembangkan dan dipraktekan. (3) Evaluasi Perilaku peserta didik positif, mampu menerapkan teori kedalam tugas yang mereka kerjakan, (4) Evaluasi Hasil disimpulkan dari tujuan pembelajaran tercapai, nilai melebihi standar kriteria ketuntasan minimal. Implikasi penelitian ini memberikan hasil akhir pembelajaran mencapai tujuan pembelajaran guna peserta didik mendapatkan ijazah pendidikan.
title: Evaluasi Model Kirkpatrick dalam Pembelajaran Kesetaraan Paket B di SKB Banjarnegara
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Kirkpatrick model evaluation in learning equivalency package b in skb banjarnegara equivalency package b requires evaluation to determine the development of learning this study is motivated by the curiosity of learning evaluation conducted there is a desire of students to follow learning to get a diploma in order to get a job using qualitative methods descriptive qualitative approach this study aims to describe the use of the Kirkpatrick evaluation model including reactions learning stages behavior and data collection results using observation techniques interviews documentation and using triangulation sources of research informants are the head of the teaching studio and students the results of the evaluation of reactions in learning services facilities and preparations are satisfactory and meet learning needs learning stages seen from the delivery and implementation get appropriate skills learning theory is developed and practiced evaluation of positive student behavior able to apply theory to the tasks they do evaluation of results concluded from learning objectives achieved values ​​exceeding the minimum completeness criteria implications of this study provide final learning results achieve learning objectives for students to get an education diploma

desc: Anak-anak bergejala disleksia perlu diidentifikasi sedini mungkin, gejala-gejala yang dimilikinya harus diketahui sejak dini supaya tidak berdampak buruk pada perkembangan sosial dan emosionalnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk melakukan studi eksplorasi bentuk-bentuk gejala disleksia pada anak SD kelas awal. Pendekatan penelitian ini adalah kualitatif. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan di tiga sekolah dasar yang berada di wilayah Kabupaten Karanganyar (Sekolah X), Kabupaten Sukoharjo (Sekolah Y), dan Kota Surakarta (Sekolah Z). Objek dalam penelitian ini sebanyak 120 siswa kelas awal dan 12 guru pendamping beserta kepala sekolah. Berdasarkan objek yang dipilih ditemukan 9 siswa yang bergejala disleksia. Metode pengumpulan data yang digunakan yaitu observasi, wawancara, dan dilanjutkan dengan studi terpumpun.  Instrumen penelitian ini menggunakan pertanyaan yang diadaptasi dari Thompson (2010). Teknik analisis data dalam penelitian ini menggunakan model analisis interaktif. Dari hasil penelitian, ditemukan gejala disleksia terkait perilaku, membaca, mengeja, tulisan tangan, teknik penulisan, dan pemahaman tanda baca yang keseluruhannya siswa bergejala disleksia memiliki hambatan perihal kemampuan membaca, menulis, dan mengeja.
title: Studi Eksplorasi Bentuk-Bentuk Gejala Disleksia pada Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Exploratory study of the forms of dyslexia symptoms in children with dyslexia symptoms need to be identified as early as possible. The symptoms they have must be known early so that they do not have a negative impact on their social and emotional development. This study aims to conduct an exploratory study of the forms of dyslexia symptoms in elementary school children in the early grades. The approach to this research is qualitative. This study was conducted in three elementary schools in Karanganyar Regency, School X, Sukoharjo Regency, School Y and Surakarta City, School Z. The objects in this study were as many as early grade students and accompanying teachers along with the principal. Based on the selected objects, students with dyslexia symptoms were found. The data collection method used was observation, interviews and continued with focused studies. This research instrument used questions adapted from Thompson. The data analysis technique in this study used an interactive analysis model. From the results of the study, dyslexia symptoms were found related to reading behavior, spelling, handwriting, writing techniques and understanding of punctuation. Overall, students with dyslexia symptoms have obstacles regarding reading, writing and spelling abilities.

desc: Pandemi covid - 19 merupakan pandemi global yang telah terjadi mulai akhir tahun 2019 dan telah merubah kehidupan manusia. Berdasarkan pra penelitian di beberapa sekolah di Kota Semarang menunjukan bahwa banyak anak-anak yang mengalami stress akibat pembelajaran yang dilakukan saat pandemi dengan menggunakan daring. Anak-anak TK/PAUD selama hampir 2 tahun melakukan pembelajaran secara daring, ketika anak kembali ke sekolah untuk luring membuat kemampuan resiliensi anak menjadi rendah. Metode pembelajaran berbasis proyek adalah salah satu cara pembelajaran dengan memberikan kesempatan pada siswa atau anak untuk mencari solusi dalam kehidupan sehari-hari baik secara perseorangan maupun secara berkelompok. Penelitian ini mengunakan pembelajaran berbasis proyek untuk meningkatkan resiliensi anak usia dini. Desain penelitian yang digunakan adalah research and development untuk mengetahui pengaruh pembelajaran proyek terhadap peningkatan resiliensi anak. Subjek penelitian adalah siswa TK Harapan Bunda Semarang berjumlah 44 anak. Analisis data menggunakan repeated measured anova menunjukkan peningkatan resiliensi anak. Dengan demikian project based learning efektif untuk meningkatkan resiliensi anak.
title: Peningkatan Resiliensi dengan Project Based Leaning pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Increasing resilience with project-based learning in early childhood The Covid pandemic is a global pandemic that has occurred since the end of the year and has changed human life based on pre-research in several schools in the city of Semarang, it shows that many children experience stress due to learning carried out during the pandemic using online learning. TKPAUD children have been learning online for almost a year when children return to school to go offline, making children's resilience skills low. The project-based learning method is one way of learning by providing opportunities for students or children to find solutions in everyday life, both individually and in groups. This study uses project-based learning to increase the resilience of early childhood. The research design used is research and development to determine the effect of project learning on increasing children's resilience. The research subjects were students of TK Harapan Bunda Semarang, totaling 10 children. Data analysis using repeated measured ANOVA showed an increase in children's resilience. Thus, project-based learning is effective in increasing children's resilience.

desc: Realistic Mathematics Education (RME) is appropriate for basic education. It bridges abstract to concrete and useful Mathematics. RME emphasizes the importance of real contexts familiar to students and the process of constructing them. This study aims to determine the effect of RME on the ability of basic mathematical skills. The method used is Single Subject Research model experiment with two samples in the A-B-A' design. The results of the study: (1) The subjects before the treatment showed low basic mathematical abilities; (2) Learning activities with the RME approach are effective for improving basic math skills; and (3) the condition of the subjects after being given RME approach is in very good category. It can be concluded that RME has contributed to improve student learning outcomes and make learning more meaningful as learning is always associated and relevant with the reality of children's lives through selected themes.
title: Improvement of Basic Math Skills Through Realistic Mathematics Education (RME) in Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: to concrete and useful mathematics rme emphasizes the importance of real contexts familiar to students and the process of constructing them this study aims to determine the effect of rme on the ability of basic mathematical skills the method used is single subject research model experiment with two samples in the aba design the results of the study the subjects before the treatment showed low basic mathematical abilities learning activities with the rme approach are effective for improving basic mathematics skills and the condition of the subjects after being given rme approach is in very good category it can be concluded that rme has contributed to improving students learning outcomes and make learning more meaningful as learning is always associated and relevant to the reality of children's lives through selected themes

desc: Motorik kasar merupakan kemampuan anak menggunakan otot-otot besar dalam melakukan aktivitas. Tujuan penelitian ini yaitu menganalisis perbedaan pengaruh permainan tradisional Selodor dan modifikasi Selodor terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian eksperimen jenis quasi experimental design bentuk nonequivalent control group design. Penelitian ini melibatkan 40 siswa TK di gugus Wanasaba Selatan yang dibagi menjadi dua kelompok yaitu 20 siswa kelompok eksperimen dan 20 siswa kelompok kontrol yang dipilih menggunakan tehnik purposive sampling. Data penelitian diperoleh menggunakan observasi, kemudian dianalisis menggunakan uji N-Gain dan uji Independent Sample T-test. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kelas eksperimen memperoleh N-Gain sebesar 0,44 dengan kategori sedang dan kelas kontrol memperoleh N-Gain sebesar 0,25 dengan kategori rendah. Hasil uji perbedaan rata-rata menggunakan uji Independent Sample T-testmenunjukkan nilai Sig.(2-tailed) sebesar 0,021 kurang dari 0,05, sehingga dapat disimpulkan bahwa  terdapat perbedaan pengaruh antara permainan tradisional Selodor dan modifikasi Selodor terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar siswa
title: Pengaruh Modifikasi Selodor terhadap Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effect of selodor modification on gross motor skills of early childhood gross motor skills are the ability of children to use large muscles in carrying out activities. The purpose of this study is to analyze the differences in the effects of traditional selodor games and selodor modifications on gross motor skills of early childhood. This study is an experimental study, a quasi-experimental design, nonequivalent control group design. This study involved kindergarten students in the southern Wanasaba cluster who were divided into two groups, namely students in the experimental group and students in the control group who were selected using purposive sampling techniques. The research data was obtained using observation and then analyzed using the ngain test and the independent sample t-test. The results of the study showed that the experimental class obtained ngain of the medium category and the control class obtained ngain of the low category. The results of the average difference test using the independent sample t-test showed a sig tailed value of less than so that it can be concluded that there is a difference in the effect between traditional selodor games and selodor modifications on students' gross motor skills.

desc: Kompetensi pengawas yang serumpun atau satu disiplin keahlian di bidang RA di Kementerian Agama Kabupaten Pamekasan hanya memiliki empat (4) orang SDM pengawas, Kekurangan  SDM pengawas ini  mengakibatkan distribusi dan intensitas kunjungan pengawas menjadi minim dan memenuhi kendala pada masing-masing madrasah binaan. Tujuan penelitian ini memperoleh solusi alternatif upaya Kementerian Agama dalam percepatan kesediaan dan distribusi pemerataan SDM Pengawas serta peningkatan kompetensi ketenagaan pengawas di Kementerian Agama Kabupaten Pamekasan. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian lapangan dengan pendekatan kualitatif, metode pengumpulan data berupa observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Subjek penelitian ini meliputi 11 Pengawas RA aktif di Kementerian Agama Pamekasan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa, pertama Tersedianya tenaga SDM Pengawas RA dengan menyesuaikan kebutuhan jumlah lembaga jenjang RA Kabupaten Pamekasan. Kedua, Distribusi dan pemerataan SDM Pengawas RA sesuai jumlah lembaga RA di Kementerian Agama Kabupaten Pamekasan. Ketiga, Peningkatan mutu SDM Pengawas pada jenjang RA melalui e-monev Sistem Informasi Akademik Manajerial (SIAM) RA di Lingkungan Kementerian Agama Kabupaten Pamekasan.
title: Transformasi Ketenagaan melalui E-Monev SIAM pada Pengawas Raudhatul Athfal (RA)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: transformation of human resources through emonev siam on supervisors of raudhatul athfal ra supervisor competence that is related or one discipline of expertise in the field of ra in the ministry of religion of pamekasan district only has four supervisory human resources the shortage of supervisory human resources results in the distribution and intensity of supervisor visits being minimal and meeting constraints in each fostered madrasah the purpose of this study is to obtain alternative solutions to the efforts of the ministry of religion in accelerating the availability and distribution of equal distribution of supervisory human resources and increasing the competence of supervisory personnel in the ministry of religion of pamekasan district this study is a field study with a qualitative approach data collection methods in the form of observation interviews and documentation the subjects of this study include active ra supervisors in the ministry of religion of pamekasan the results of the study show that first the availability of supervisory human resources ra by adjusting the needs of the number of institutions at the pamekasan district ra level second the distribution and equalization of supervisory human resources according to the number of ra institutions in the ministry of religion of pamekasan district third improving the quality of supervisory human resources at the ra level through emonev managerial academic information system siam ra in the ministry of religion of pamekasan district

desc: Gerak relationship terdapat dalam koreografi permainan tradisional anak Sunda, yaitu koreografi yang saling berhubungan atau bersentuhan antara satu pemain dengan pemain lainnya atau pemain dengan kelompok, gerakan ini hampir ada pada semua permainan radisional anak Sunda yang dikenal dengan nama kakawihan dan kaulinan. Tujuan penelitian ini menganalisis koreografi relationship pada permainan anak Sunda dan dijadikan sebagai sumber penciptaan komposisi tari anak. Artikel ini adalah hasil penelitian dengan menggunakan paradigma kualitatif deskriptif analisis dengan pendekatan analisis dasar elemen tari BSTER (Body, Space, Time, Energy, Relationship) melalui teknik pengumpulan data, observasi, pengamatan, dan wawancara yang telah di triangulasi dan diintepretasi. Hasil penelitian ini adalah adanya gerak relationship pada sebagian besar koreografi permaianan tradisional anak di Indonesia dan bisa dijadikan sumber dalam penciptaan komposisi tari anak. Gerak relationship pada permainan tradisional anak mengandung nilai silih asih, silih asah dan silih asuh yang merupakan ciri sosial pada masyarakat di Indonesia.
title: Gerak Relationship Pada Permainan Anak Sunda  Sebagai Sumber Penciptaan Komposisi Tari Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Relationship movement in Sundanese children's games as a source of creating children's dance compositions Relationship movement is found in the choreography of traditional Sundanese children's games, namely choreography that is interconnected or in contact between one player and another or players with groups. This movement is almost present in all traditional Sundanese children's games known as kakawihan and kaulinan. The purpose of this study is to analyze relationship choreography in Sundanese children's games and use it as a source of creating children's dance compositions. This article is the result of research using a qualitative descriptive analysis paradigm with a basic analysis approach of dance elements, body space time energy relationship through observation data collection techniques, observations and interviews that have been triangulated and interpreted. The results of this study are the existence of relationship movement in most traditional children's game choreographies in Indonesia and can be used as a source in creating children's dance compositions. Relationship movement in traditional children's games contains the values ​​of silih asih silih asah and silih asuh which are social characteristics in Indonesian society.

desc: Saat ini kekerasan tidak hanya dilakukan oleh orang tua  ke anak, namun bisa saja sebaliknya. Berbagai fakta mengejutkan sering kali dilaporkan baik oleh institusi pendidikan maupun orang tua  akan hal tersebut. Kondisi yang memprihatinkan ini perlu menjadi perhatian dari berbagai pihak salah satunya dengan pendidikan karakter sejak usia sekolah dasar. Oleh karena itu, artikel ini bertujuan untuk menggambarkan implementasi pendidikan karakter melalui pembelajaran kontekstual. Penelitian yang dilakukan selama bulan Ramadhan ini menggunakan teknik wawancara. Data yang diperoleh kemudian dianalisis menggunakan teknik deskriptif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan ada tiga tema yang muncul. Tema tersebut adalah pandangan orang tua  terhadap pembelajaran daring, cara implementasi pendidikan karakter dengan pembelajaran kontekstual, dan hambatan proses belajar daring. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan sebagai referensi guru dan roangtua untuk mengimplementasikan pendidikan karakter pada anak selama pembelajaran daring dilakukan
title: Pendidikan Karakter di Bulan Ramadhan selama Pandemi Covid-19 Melalui Pembelajaran Kontekstual
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: character education in the month of Ramadan during the Covid pandemic through contextual learning Currently, violence is not only carried out by parents to children but can also be the other way around. Various surprising facts are often reported by both educational institutions and parents regarding this concerning condition. This concerning condition needs to be a concern from various parties, one of which is character education since elementary school age. Therefore, this article aims to describe the implementation of character education through contextual learning. Research conducted during the month of Ramadan using interview techniques. The data obtained were then analyzed using descriptive techniques. The results of the study showed that there were three themes that emerged. These themes are parents' views on online learning. How to implement character education with contextual learning and obstacles to the online learning process. The implications of the results of this study can be used as a reference for teachers and parents to implement character education in children during online learning.

desc: This study describes the stages and development of children's first language using Indonesian. The object of this research is 2 children aged 1.6 years. The purpose of this study was to describe the stages and development of the first language in children. The method used is a qualitative method with a descriptive approach and the techniques used are observation and interviews. The data collected is documentation presented in tabular form. Data analysis using transcription, identification, and classification methods. The finding of this study is that CS is faster in language acquisition development at the phonological, morphological, and syntactic levels compared to MF. This is influenced by several factors such as gender, social, parenting, and environment.
title: The Stages and Development of First Language Acquisition on Children 1,6 Years Old
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Proses pembelajaran yang berlangsung di sekolah, guru menyampaikan pengenalan budaya lokal melalui metode ceramah di depan kelas tanpa adanya bahan dukungan yang konkret. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan buku fisik berupa information book yang praktis, efektif dan bermanfaat bagi anak usia dini dalam mengenal budaya lokal khususnya budaya Pesisir Selatan. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian RD (Research and Development) dengan model ADDIE. Teknik pengumpulan data yaitu menggunakan angket. Hasil validasi pengembangan informational book dapat disimpulkan bahwa informational book untuk pengenalan budaya Minangkabau melalui makanan khas Pesisir Selatan bagi anak usia dini dinyatakan berhasil, valid, praktis dan efektif. Informational book cocok digunakan sebagai media yang dapat membantu meningkatkan pengetahuan tentang budaya pada anak usia dini. Peneliti membuat dan menghasilkan produk yang bermanfaat untuk anak dalam mengenal budaya Minangkabau khususnya Pesisir Selatan melalui makanan khas daerah menggunakan informational book.
title: Pengembangan Informational Book untuk Pengenalan Budaya Minangkabau melalui Makanan Khas Pesisir Selatan
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of informational book for introduction of Minangkabau culture through typical food of south coast learning process that takes place in school teacher delivers introduction of local culture through lecture method in front of class without any concrete supporting materials this research aims to produce physical book in the form of information book that is practical, effective and useful for early age children in getting to know local culture especially culture of south coast this research is rd research and development research with addie model data collection technique that uses questionnaire result validation of informational book development can be concluded that informational book for introduction of Minangkabau culture through typical food of south coast for early age children is declared successful valid practical and effective informational book is suitable for use as media that can help increase knowledge about culture in early age children researcher makes and produces useful product for children in getting to know Minangkabau culture especially south coast through typical food of region using informational book

desc: Menyimak merupakan keterampilan bahasa pertama yang dimiliki oleh manusia dan modal awal seseorang  untuk berkomunikasi. Penelitian bertujuan untuk mengetahui seberapa besar pengaruh permainan blind ball terhadap keterampilan menyimak anak usia dini. Sampel dalam penelitian  berjumlah 24 siswa usia 5-6 tahun. Penentuan pengambilan sampel menggunakan purposive sampling. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif dengan metode eksperimen jenis quashi experimental.. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan tes dan observasi. Berdasarkan hasil analisis data yang dilakukan, diperoleh rata-rata hasil tes kelompok eksperimen menggunakan permainan blind ball adalah 83,33 dan rata-rata hasil tes kelompok kontrol dengan kegiatan konvensional adalah 73,43. Hasil analisis data menunjukkan bahwa terdapat perbedaaan kemampuan menyimak anak sebelum dan sesudah diberikan perlakuan permainan blindball. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dapat disimpulkan bahwa penggunaan permainan blind ball dapat meningkatkan kemampuan menyimak anak usia dini.
title: Mengembangkan Keterampilan Menyimak Anak Usia Dini melalui Permainan Blind Ball
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Developing listening skills of early childhood through blind ball games. Listening is the first language skill possessed by humans and the initial capital for someone to communicate. The study aims to determine how much influence the blind ball game has on the listening skills of early childhood. The sample in the study consisted of students aged years. The determination of sampling using purposive sampling. This study used a quantitative approach with an experimental method, a quasi-experimental type. Data collection techniques used tests and observations. Based on the results of the data analysis carried out, the average test results of the experimental group using the blind ball game were obtained and the average test results of the control group with conventional activities were obtained. The results of the data analysis showed that there was a difference in children's listening skills before and after being given blind ball game treatment. Based on the results of the study, it can be concluded that the use of blind ball games can improve the listening skills of early childhood children.

desc: Menurunnya kemampuan berbahasa reseptif pada anak usia dini telah menimbulkan kekhawatiran karena berimbas pada perkembangan kemampuan bahasa ekspresif anak. Ketrampilan kemampuan bahasa reseptif inilah yang menjadi dasar pada timbulnya kemampuan ekspresif anak usia dini. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui perkembangan berbahasa reseptif pada anak usia dini dengan menggunakan big book sebagai media pembelajaran. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan di PAUD Ibnu Sina dengan jumlah subjek penelitian sebanyak delapan orang anak berusia 5  6 tahun. Jenis penelitian ini adalah Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK) yang dilaksanakan dalam dua siklus. Instrumen yang digunakan berupa lembar observasi kemampuan berbahasa reseptif anak. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan perkembangan kemampuan berbahasa reseptip anak yang cukup signifikan selama dua siklus. Hasil belajar anak dengan media big book berhasil mencapai persentase yang lebih tinggi pada perkembangan kemampuan berbahasa anak sebesar 87, 5 %.
title: Media Belajar Big Book dalam Mengembangkan Kemampuan Berbahasa Reseptif Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Big book learning media in developing receptive language skills in early childhood The decline in receptive language skills in early childhood has raised concerns because it has an impact on the development of children's expressive language skills. These receptive language skills are the basis for the emergence of expressive skills in early childhood. This study aims to determine the development of receptive language in early childhood by using big books as a learning medium. This study was conducted at Ibnu Sina Preschool with eight research subjects aged 18-24 years. This type of research is classroom action research PTK which is carried out in two cycles. The instrument used is an observation sheet for children's receptive language skills. The results of the study showed a significant development in children's receptive language skills during the two cycles. Children's learning outcomes with big book media managed to achieve a higher percentage in the development of children's language skills by

desc: Asesmen dalam pendidikan berfungsi sebagai sumber informasi perkembangan peserta didik dalam pencapaian indikator tertentu yang telah ditetapkan. Dalam hal ini asesmen diperlukan sebagai cara dalam melihat implementasi perkembangan pola pikir (Growth Mindset), untuk selanjutnya dipergunakan orangtua dan pendidik dalam menetapkan program selanjutnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjelaskan konsep dan prinsip asesmen pada jenjang PAUD. Penelitian ini merupakan jenis penelitian lapangan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa berdasar Program Merdeka Belajar-Merdeka Bermain terdapat prinsip asesmen yang didasarkan pada Capaian Pembelajaran (CP) PAUD, yang diarahkan pada 3 (tiga) Capaian Pembelajaran (CP), yaitu: nilai agama dan budi pekerti; jati diri; dasar literasi STEAM (sains, teknologi, rekayasa, seni, matematika). Sementara itu terdapat pula 4 (empat) instrumen atau teknik asesmen pada jenjang PAUD sebagai bagian utama dari konsep asesmen, yaitu: catatan anekdot; ceklis; hasil karya; dan foto berseri. Dalam implementasinya, asesmen peserta didik pada jenjang PAUD dapat dilakukan melalui berbagai cara, tidak serta merta pada penguasaan tertentu.
title: Asesmen PAUD Berdasar Konsep Merdeka Belajar Merdeka Bermain di PAUD Inklusi Saymara
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: assessment of early childhood education based on the concept of independent learning and independent play in inclusive early childhood education saymara assessment in education functions as a source of information on the development of students in achieving certain indicators that have been set in this case assessment is needed as a way to see the implementation of the development of the growth mindset mindset for further use by parents and educators in determining the next program this study aims to explain the concept and principles of assessment at the early childhood education level this study is a type of field research the results of the study show that based on the independent learning and independent play program there are assessment principles based on the achievement of early childhood education cp learning which are directed at three learning achievements cp namely religious values ​​and morals basic identity literacy steam science technology engineering art mathematics meanwhile there are also four assessment instruments or techniques at the early childhood education level as the main part of the assessment concept namely anecdotal notes checklist of work results and series of photos in its implementation student assessment at the early childhood education level can be carried out in various ways not necessarily on certain mastery

desc: The balance between fine and gross motor skills of children is important to be optimally stimulated. The purpose of this study was to determine the effectiveness of nature-based learning models in improving children's motor skills. This study used a quantitative method with a subject of 45 children aged 4-5 years in 3 kindergartens in Sleman Regency. The study design used one group pretest posttest with 3 treatments each. Data collection techniques using observations and interviews were analyzed using descriptive quantitative and the effectiveness was analyzed using the T test. The results showed that nature-based learning effectively increases motor skills because by using the five senses, children have learning experiences through play, according to age needs, using objects concrete, up to challenging activities. Nature-based learning model can be an innovation that can be used as material for further research related to cognitive, language, art, and social emotional in children
title: The Implementation of Nature-based Learning Models to Improve Children's Motor Skills
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk mengkaji tentang penanaman sikap sopan santun anak usia dini dalam budaya Jawa. Metode yang dilakukan menggunkan penelitian kualitatif yang bersifat studi pustaka. Sopan santun saat ini lebih buruk dibandingkan dengan zaman dulu, dilihat dari anak-anak sekarang tidak bisa basa. Sopan santun dalam hal berbahasa saat ini sangat perlu diperhatikan. Bahasa Jawa saat ini hampir punah. Bahasa jawa memiliki ciri khas mengenai tingkatan berbahasa yaitu basa ngoko, basa krama madyo, dan basa krama inggil. Penanaman sikap sopan santun dalam berbahasa dilakukan pada saat anak usia dini melalui pembiasaan dan modeling dari orang dewasa dalam berbahasa jawa yang baik dan benar pada kehidupan sehari-hari di lingkungan keluarga, sekolah maupun masyarakat. Penggunaan bahasa jawa dikatakan baik dan benar yaitu sesuai dengan tata karma (gaya bahasa), andhap-asor (merendahkan diri sembari meninggikan orang lain), dan tanggap ing sasmita (mampu menangkap makna yang tersembunyi). Ketiga konsep budaya tersebut saling keterkaitan dalam hal sikap sopan santun seseorang dalam budaya Jawa.
title: Penanaman Sikap Sopan Santun dalam Budaya Jawa pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: instilling politeness in Javanese culture in early childhood This study was conducted to examine the instilling of politeness in early childhood in Javanese culture The method used was qualitative research that was a literature study. Today's politeness is worse than in the past, seen from today's children who cannot use polite language. Currently, it is very important to pay attention to the Javanese language. Currently, the Javanese language is almost extinct. The Javanese language has characteristics regarding language levels, namely, ngoko, krama madyo and krama inggil. Instilling politeness in language is carried out in early childhood through habituation and modeling from adults in speaking good and correct Javanese in everyday life in the family, school and community environments. The use of the Javanese language is said to be good and correct, namely in accordance with the etiquette of the language style andhapasor, humbling oneself while elevating others and being responsive to ing sasmita, being able to capture the hidden meaning. The three cultural concepts are interrelated in terms of a person's politeness in Javanese culture.

desc: Anak pronunciation difficulties merupakan individu anak yang mengalami kesulitan pengucapan. Di Kelompok Bermain Al-Ma’shum Tempuran Magelang ditemukan 3 anak mengalami pronunciation difficulties. Penelitian bertujuan mengetahui dinamika anak pronunciation difficulties. Pendekatan penelitian yang digunakan yaitu penelitian kualitatif yang lebih diarahkan pada case study (studi kasus). Adapun subyek terdiri 3 anak berusia 4 tahun yang mengalami pronunciation difficulties. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa 1) usia kehamilan premature salah satu penyebab terjadinya pronunciation difficulties; 2) kemampuan pada aspek fisik motorik, sosial emosional, dan kognitif berkembang dengan baik sesuai dengan indikator yang ada dalam Satuan Tingkat Pencapaian Perkembangan (STPPA); 3) anak kesulitan untuk mengucapkan kata yang mengandung huruf “m, k, s, c, l, dan r”; dan 4) aspek moral agama pronunciation difficulties berkembang dengan baik sesuai dengan indikator perkembangannya namun dalam pengucapan doa harian masih membutuhkan stimulasi khusus. Saran untuk peneliti selanjutnya yaitu melakukan penelitian tentang kemampuan pengucapan doa harian pada anak pronunciation difficulties
title: Dinamika Karakteristik Pronunciation Difficulties pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: dynamics of pronunciation difficulties characteristics in early childhood children pronunciation difficulties are individual children who experience pronunciation difficulties in the Almashum Tempuran Magelang playgroup found children experiencing pronunciation difficulties the study aims to determine the dynamics of children with pronunciation difficulties the research approach used is qualitative research which is more directed at case studies case studies the subjects consist of children aged years who experience pronunciation difficulties the results of the study show that premature gestational age is one of the causes of pronunciation difficulties the ability in the physical motor social emotional and cognitive aspects develops well according to the indicators in the stppa development achievement level unit children have difficulty pronouncing words containing the letters m k s c l and r and the moral religious aspect pronunciation difficulties develop well according to the development indicators but in pronouncing daily prayers still need special stimulation suggestions for further researchers are to conduct research on the ability to pronounce daily prayers in children with pronunciation difficulties

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui apakah Media gambar dapat meningkatkan konsentrasi belajar anak di Raudhatul Athfal (RA) Annajmah Kebayoran Lama Jakarta Selatan. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian tindakan kelas (classroom action research), karena dilakukan untuk memecahkan masalah pembelajaran di kelas. Penelitian ini juga termasuk penelitian deskriptif, sebab menggambarkan sesuatu teknik pembelajaran yang diterapkan dan bagaimana hasil yang diinginkan dapat tercapai. Penelitian dilaksanakan dalam dua siklus dengan prosedur tindakan sebagai berikut, (1) perencanaan, (2) pelaksanaan, (3) pengamatan dan evaluasi, (4) analisis dan refleksi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan adanya peningkatan konsentrasi belajar anak setelah mengikuti pelaksanaan kegiatan dengan media gambar pada siklus 1 yang mulanya hanya mencapai 70% mengalami peningkatan yang cukup signifikan yakni mencapai 84%. Hal ini menunjukkan bahwa media gambar dapat digunakan untuk meningkatkan konsentrasi belajar pada anak kelompok B di RA Annajmah Kebayoran Lama
title: Penerapan Media Gambar Sebagai Upaya dalam Peningkatan Konsentrasi Belajar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of image media as an effort to improve the concentration of early childhood learning The purpose of this study was to determine whether image media can improve children's learning concentration at Raudhatul Athfal RA Annajmah Kebayoran Lama South Jakarta This study is a classroom action research because it is carried out to solve learning problems in the classroom This study also includes descriptive research because it describes a learning technique that is applied and how the desired results can be achieved The study was carried out in two cycles with the following action procedures Planning Implementation Observation and Evaluation Analysis and Reflection The results of the study showed an increase in children's learning concentration after participating in the implementation of activities with image media in the cycle which initially only reached experienced a significant increase, namely reaching This shows that image media can be used to improve learning concentration in children in group B at RA Annajmah Kebayoran Lama

desc: Today the level of formal education in Early Childhood Education (ECD) a good many contributed to the preparation of children to basic education. However, the availability of early childhood education for poor children in urban areas is very limited presence, in addition to the difficulty of managing the funds needed for facilitating learning is also a factor in the lack menentuannya learners follow a schedule of learning. Implementation costs perdatang education and the design of integrated learning and involve their parents in the management of self-funding, is an alternative that can be developed. This study uses a methodology deep field surveys in a sample of poor children in the studio playing excelend Pekanbaru and involved 15 respondents parents. Meanwhile, to determine the application of an integrated learning approach used classroom action research which involves a number of teachers and observers. From the research results can be stated that: (1) Background of parents of children studying in general have realistic conditions of structural poverty, that the parents of the workers were uneducated and untrained and entrepreneurs without capital and without the facilities to the economy is very weak (2) the education level of parents is very low. Average not finish elementary school, (3) Revenue parents daily about Rp 20,000, - to 30,000, -rupiah, the financial burden shouldered by family members on average three people, (4) average child getting less nutrition balanced, because several things including; (A) the availability of food that is less due to the purchasing power of low food needs of parents, (b) knowledge of parents on nutritional patterns are also low due to inadequate education, (c) a culture of poor results in irregular eating patterns and food potluck menu.
title: Pembelajaran Terpadu pada Siswa Miskin  Pendidikan Usia Dini di Pekanbaru
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Teams Games Tournament (TGT) adalah tipe pembelajaran kooperatif yang menempatkan siswa dalam kelompok kecil beranggotakan 5 sampai 6 siswa yang memiliki kemampuan, jenis kelamin dan ras berbeda. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengembangkan model pembelajaran kooperatif tipe TGT untuk anak usia 4-5 tahun. Penelitian ini mengadaptasi pendekatan Reseach and Development (RnD) dengan menggunakan model ADDIE, yang mencakup tahap analyze, design dan Develop. Penelitian menggunakan 3 tahap karena kondisi pandemi Covid-19, menjadikan sulitnya mendapatkan izin penelitian di lembaga untuk melanjutkan ke tahap selanjutnya. Penilaian ahli materi menunjukkan koefisien 84,37% yang memiliki arti sangat layak. Selain itu, penilaian ahli media menunjukkan koefisien 87,17% yang memiliki arti sangat layak. Penelitian ini menyimpulkan bahwa produk penelitian berupa model pembelajaran kooperatif tipe TGT untuk anak usia 4-5 tahun memiliki keberterimaan berdasarkan penilaian ahli materi dan media. Hasil penelitian ini merekomendasikan untuk mengidentifikasi secara empiris keefektifan model pembelajaran kooperatif tipe TGT untuk anak usia 4-5 tahun.
title: Teams Games Tournament untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Mengenal Lambang Bilangan pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teams games tournament to improve the ability to recognize number symbols in early childhood teams games tournament tgt is a type of cooperative learning that places students in small groups consisting of students with different gender and race abilities this study aims to develop a tgt type cooperative learning model for children aged years this study adapts the research and development rnd approach using the addie model which includes the analyze design and develop stages the study used the stage because the covid pandemic conditions made it difficult to obtain research permits at institutions to proceed to the next stage the assessment of material experts showed a coefficient that had a very feasible meaning in addition the assessment of media experts showed a coefficient that had a very feasible meaning this study concluded that the research product in the form of a tgt type cooperative learning model for children aged years had acceptance based on the assessment of material and media experts the results of this study recommend empirically identifying the effectiveness of the tgt type cooperative learning model for children aged years

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh terbatasnya penggunaan media pembelajaran berbasis teknologi  dalam pembelajaran  anak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengembangkan model pembelajaran Mobile Seamless Learning (MSL) dalam pembelajaran membaca AUD. Menggunakan metode RnD dengan model ADDIE Dick and Carry : Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, dan Evaluation. Penelitian melibatkan 30 partisipan  Pendidik PAUD di Jabodetabek. Temuan penelitian menunjukkan bahwa model pembelajaran MSL dapat digunakan dalam pembelajaran membaca AUD didasarkan pada tiga aspek yakni fleksibilitas, efektifitas pembelajaran, dan kualitas pembelajaran.  Partisipan  merespon positif penggunaan model belajar MSL. Implikasi pedagogis  selama proses penelitian menunjukkan bahwa penggunaan teknologi dalam model MSL dapat memunculkan potensi peserta didik untuk lebih terlibat dalam proses belajar, meningkatkan motivasi belajar, serta meningkatkan literasi siswa melalui informasi dari berbagai sumber.
title: Mobile Seamless Learning: Model Pengembangan Kemampuan Literasi Membaca AUD dalam Merdeka Belajar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: mobile seamless learning model for developing literacy skills for reading aud in independent learning this research is motivated by the limited use of technology-based learning media in early childhood learning the purpose of this research is to develop a mobile seamless learning model for learning msl in learning to read aud using the rnd method with the addie dick and carry model analysis design development implementation and evaluation the research involved paud educator participants in jabodetabek the research findings show that the msl learning model can be used in learning to read aud based on three aspects namely flexibility effectiveness of learning and quality of learning participants responded positively to the use of the msl learning model pedagogical implications during the research process show that the use of technology in the msl model can bring out the potential for students to be more involved in the learning process increase learning motivation and improve student literacy through information from various sources

desc: Penggunaan smartphone memiliki konsekuensi positif dan negatif, baik itu pada orang dewasa juga anak-anak. Tujuan penelitian ini melihat karakteristik orang tua keluarga nelayan berkaitan dengan pola-pola bimbingan atau gaya pengasuhan khusus pada anak pengguna smartphone melalui penelitian diskriptif kualitatif. Partisipan penelitian adalah sebanyak 6 keluarga nelayan yang memiliki anak usia pra-sekolah (3-7 tahun), telah diadakan wawancara terbuka dan observasi terkait aktivitas digital anak-anak mereka, respon, keyakinan, dan ketertarikan akan penggunaan smartphone sejak dini. Pada pendekatan berbasis data dan analisis data model interaktif Miles dan Huberman yang telah dilakukan, Gaya pengasuhan digital diidentifikasi memiliki kesamaan dengan gaya pengasuhan umum. Temuan penelitian lebih lanjut menunjukkan anak-anak melakukan aktivitas dengan smartphone lebih banyak jika orang tua lebih permisif dan kurang otoriter dalam melakukan pengasuhan. Implikasi pengasuhan orang tua tersebut memiliki respon yang tinggi pada pemenuhan kebutuhan anak terkait penggunaan smartphone sejak dini, namun memiliki tuntutan yang rendah terkait timbal balik atau kemungkinan dampak penggunaan smartphone.
title: Pengasuhan Digital Keluarga Nelayan terhadap Penggunaan Smartphone pada anak usia 3-7 tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: digital parenting of fishermen families towards smartphone use in children aged years smartphone use has positive and negative consequences for both adults and children the purpose of this study to see the characteristics of fishermen family parents related to guidance patterns or special parenting styles in children who use smartphones through qualitative descriptive research the research participants were as many as fishermen families who have preschool children years open interviews and observations have been conducted related to their children's digital activities responses beliefs and interests in using smartphones from an early age on a data-based approach and data analysis interactive model miles and huberman that has been done digital parenting style is identified as having similarities with general parenting style further research findings show that children do more activities with smartphones if parents are more permissive and less authoritarian in carrying out parenting the implications of parenting these parents have a high response to meeting children's needs related to using smartphones from an early age but have low demands regarding reciprocity or possible impacts of using smartphones

desc: Materi binatang laut selama ini dikenalkan oleh guru hanya menggunakan buku, majalah anak, dan gambar. Pada umumnya anak akan cepat merasa bosan dan susah fokus pada materi apabila hanya menggunakan media buku, majalah dan gambar.  Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan media flashcard berbasis augmented reality pada materi mengenal binatang laut. Metode penelitian yang digunakan pada penelitian ini yaitu penelitian pengembangan Research  Development (RD). Prosedur penelitian yang dilakukan dalam pengembangan ini diadaptasi dari langkah-langkah pengembangan yang dikembangkan oleh Borg and Gall dengan pembatasan. Subjek penelitian ini adalah anak usia dini pada kelompok B di RA Perwanida IV. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan wawancara, lembar angket dan lembar observasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini teknik analisis kualitatif dan analisis kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa media flashcard berbasis augmented reality yang dikembangkan sudah memenuhi kriteria valid, praktis dan efektif untuk digunakan pada materi pengenalan binatang laut bagi anak usia dini kelompok B di RA Perwanida IV.
title: Pengembangan Media Flashcard Berbasis Augmented Reality pada Materi Mengenal Binatang Laut
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of augmented reality-based flashcard media on marine animal recognition material marine animal material has so far been introduced by teachers only using children's magazine books and pictures in general children will quickly get bored and have difficulty focusing on the material if they only use magazine books and pictures this study aims to develop augmented reality-based flashcard media on marine animal recognition material the research method used in this study is research development research development rd the research procedure carried out in this development was adapted from the development steps developed by borg and gall with the limitation that the subjects of this study were early childhood in group b at ra perwanida iv data collection was carried out by interview questionnaire sheets and observation sheets data analysis techniques used in this study qualitative analysis techniques and quantitative analysis the results of the study showed that the augmented reality-based flashcard media developed had met the criteria for valid, practical and effective use in marine animal recognition material for early childhood group b at ra perwanida iv

desc: Pendekatan STEAM atau Science, Technology, Engineering, Art dan Mathematic merupakan pendekatan pembelajaran yang dikembangkan pada PAUD. STEAM menajdi pendekatan yang sesuai bagi anak usia dini dikarenakan pendekatan ini mampu mengembangkan kemampuan berpikir kritis, kreatif, dan menumbuhkan kemampuan problem solving. Tujuan penelitian adalah mendeskripsikan pemahaman calon guru profesional terkait pendekatan STEAM. Penelitian dilakukan dengan survey cross-sectional. Populasi dalam penelitian adalah 1183 mahasiswa. Responden dalam penelitian sejumlah 140 mahasiswa dan diambil menggunakan teknik purposive sampling dengan kriteria mahasiswa PPG DALJAB bidang studi PAUD, aktif selama PPG, menggunakan STEAM. Data diperoleh menggunakan kuesioner melalui Gform, disebarkan dengan aplikasi Whats App Group. Hasil penelitian memperlihatkan pemahaman mahasiswa terkait pendekatan STEAM terdiri dari intepretasi, unsur, contoh, pengembangan, pembuktian menunjukkan pemahaman sangat baik dan tepat terutama pada aspek pengembangan dengan pemanfaatan loose part, salah satu media pembelajaran yang dikembangkan. Namun pada unsur STEAM yaitu technology dan mathematic sebagian kecil mahasiswa memiliki pemahaman sesuai dengan konsep STEAM.
title: Pemahaman Science, Technology, Engineering, Art dan Mathematic (STEAM) pada Calon Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: understanding of science technology engineering art and mathematics steam in prospective early childhood education teachers the steam approach or science technology engineering art and mathematics is a learning approach developed in early childhood education steam is an appropriate approach for early childhood because this approach is able to develop critical creative thinking skills and foster problem solving skills the purpose of the study is to describe the understanding of prospective professional teachers related to the steam approach the study was conducted using a cross-sectional survey the population in the study were students respondents in the study a number of students and were taken using a purposive sampling technique with the criteria of active early childhood education ppg students during ppg using steam data was obtained using a questionnaire via gform distributed with the whats app group application the results of the study showed that students' understanding of the steam approach consisted of interpretation of elements examples of development of evidence showed a very good and precise understanding especially in the development aspect by utilizing loose parts one of the learning media developed but in the steam elements, namely technology and mathematics, a small number of students had an understanding in accordance with the steam concept

desc: Wabah virus corona telah membawa dampak terhadap perubahan kebijakan pemerintah dalam bidang pendidikan yang menerapkan pembelajaran jarak jauh tidak terkecuali dengan Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini. Orang tua memegang peran yang sangat sentral untuk mendampingi anak belajar terlebih anak usia dini. Artikel ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui problematika yang dihadapi oleh orang tua dalam menjalankan perannya sebagai guru. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan jenis penelitian studi kasus melalui wawancara pada 10 orang tua anak usia dini yang bersekolah di PAUD Melisa. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa permasalahan utama yang dihadapi oleh orang tua adalah minimnya keahlian mereka dalam mengajar, sulitnya memotivasi anak, lingkungan yang kurang kondusif dan keterbatasan waktu. Namun, latar belakang pendidikan orang tua tidak mempengaruhi kemampuan mereka memahami materi anak usia dini karena bagi mereka materi anak usia dini belum bisa dikategorikan sulit. Demikian halnya dengan masalah waktu, sekalipun menjadi kendala bagi sebagian orang tua akan tetapi pendampingan anak dalam belajar tidak terabaikan.
title: Problematika Orang Tua dalam Menjalankan Perannya sebagai Guru Bagi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the problems of parents in carrying out their role as teachers for early childhood the corona virus outbreak has had an impact on changes in government policy in the field of education which implements distance learning including early childhood education parents play a very central role in accompanying children to learn especially early childhood this article aims to find out the problems faced by parents in carrying out their role as teachers this study uses a qualitative approach with a case study type of research through interviews with parents of early childhood who attend paud melisa the results of this study indicate that the main problems faced by parents are their lack of expertise in teaching the difficulty of motivating children the environment is less conducive and limited time but the educational background of parents does not affect their ability to understand early childhood material because for them early childhood material cannot be categorized as difficult likewise with the problem of time even though it is an obstacle for some parents but accompanying children in learning is not neglected

desc: The purpose of this research is to determine the effect of early child social intelligence based on the dominant mother pattern in the family. This research is very important to know the social development of early childhood as a whole. Social intelligence is enough to determine the ability of early childhood to foster self-concept and control emotions in order to adjust themselves in the social environment. The development of social intelligence is also strongly influenced by the upbringing and encouragement of the mother, the extent to which the success of mother's upbringing is the extent of mother's involvement and role in the lives of her children. Each mother has her own way of helping her children grow. The formulation of the research problem is how the influence of mother care pattern toward social intelligence of early child in Kenanga Kindergarten of West Bandung Regency. The research method used is qualitative research method by using observation and interview instruments, while data analysis using data reduction phase, data model, and conclusion. The results obtained that mother care pattern to educate children in kindergarten Kenanga is democratic and permissive parenting in developing social intelligence early childhood in West Bandung Regency.
title: Pengaruh Pola Asuh Ibu terhadap Kecerdasan Sosial Anak Usia Dini  di TK Kenanga Kabupaten Bandung Barat
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of maternal parenting patterns on early childhood social intelligence in Ylanganga Kindergarten, West Bandung Regency. The purpose of this research is to determine the effect of early child social intelligence based on the dominant maternal pattern in the family. This research is very important to know the social development. of early childhood as a whole social intelligence is enough to determine the ability of early childhood to foster self-concept and control emotions in order to adjust themselves in the social environment the development of social intelligence is also strongly influenced by the upbringing and encouragement of the mother extent to which the success of mothers upbringing is the extent of mothers involvement and role in the lives of her children each mother has her own way of helping her children grow the formulation of the research problem is how the influence of mother care pattern toward social intelligence of early child in cananga kindergarten of west bandung regency the research method used is qualitative research method by using observation and interview instruments while data analysis using data reduction phase data model and conclusion the results obtained that mother care pattern to educate children in kindergarten ylang is democratic and permissive parenting in developing social intelligence early childhood in west bandung regency

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh kurangnya perilaku prososial anak terhadap teman sebayanya ditandai dengan adanya sikap individualisme pada lingkungan sekitar, pada anak usia dini lebih banyak muncul perilaku agresif, kesulitan perhatian, dan perilaku antisosial lainnya. Faktor yang dapat mempengaruhi kurang berkembangnya perilaku prososial anak usia dini diantaranya adalah faktor internal dan faktor eksternal. Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu untuk mengungkap peningkatan perilaku prososial anak usia dini melalui pendekatan problem based learning di TK Aba Thoyibah Surakarta. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan jenis studi kasus. Teknik yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dapat ditarik kesimpulan bahwa peningkatan perilaku prososial anak usia dini dapat berkembang dengan menggunakan pendekatan problem based learning yaitu anak mampu bekerjasama, bermain dengan teman sebaya, dan tolong menolong. Dengan demikian problem based learning memberikan pengaruh yang cukup signifikan  terhadap peningkatan perilaku prososial terhadap anak usia 5-6 tahun di TK Aba Thoyibah Surakarta.
title: Problem Based Learning dalam Meningkatkan Perilaku Prososial Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: problem based learning in improving children's prosocial behavior this study was motivated by the lack of children's prosocial behavior towards their peers marked by an individualistic attitude in the surrounding environment in early childhood more aggressive behavior appears difficulty paying attention and other antisocial behavior factors that can influence the lack of development of prosocial behavior in early childhood include internal factors and external factors the purpose of this study is to reveal the increase in prosocial behavior in early childhood through the problem based learning approach in kindergarten aba thoyibah surakarta this study uses a qualitative approach with a case study type the technique used in this study is observation interviews and documentation based on the results of the study it can be concluded that increasing prosocial behavior in early childhood can develop by using the problem based learning approach, namely children are able to work together to play with peers and help each other thus problem based learning has a significant influence on increasing prosocial behavior in children aged years in kindergarten aba thoyibah surakarta

desc: This research is motivated by the low understanding of students' concepts in science learning in grade 2 State Elementary Schools. Researchers provide solutions by applying the demonstration method, a learning method by demonstrating items, events, rules and sequences of carrying out an activity, either directly or through the use of teaching media that are relevant to the subject or material being presented. This type of research is classroom action research. This research has two cycles. Each cycle consists of two sessions and four phases, namely planning, implementation, observation and reflection. The subjects of this study were 2nd grade elementary school students, totaling 21 people. The results of the study concluded that the use of the demonstration method could improve student learning outcomes in science subjects in Grade 2 of State Elementary Schools.
title: The Implementation of Demonstration Method to Increase Learning Outcome in Natural Science Lessons
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the implementation of demonstration method to increase learning outcomes in natural science lessons this research is motivated by the low understanding of students concepts in science learning in grade state elementary schools researchers provide solutions by applying the demonstration method a learning method by demonstrating items events rules and sequences of carrying out an activity either directly or through the use of teaching media that are relevant to the subject or material being presented this type of research is classroom action research this research has two cycles each cycle consists of two sessions and four phases namely planning implementation observation and reflection the subjects of this study were nd grade elementary school students totaling people the results of the study concluded that the use of the demonstration method could improve student learning outcomes in science subjects in grade of state elementary schools

desc: Usia dini adalah fase krusial dalam perkembangan anak. Guru yang mengajar di usia dini memerlukan keahlian khusus. Oleh karena itu, pelatihan dan pengembangan diri berkelanjutan bagi guru PAUD sangat diperlukan. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengukur efektivitas proses pelatihan implementasi pembelajaran STEAM-loose parts pada guru PAUD. Penelitian ini merupakan studi kasus eksplanatif dengan fokus pada penggunaan instrumen Authentic Assessment Based on Teaching and Learning Trajetory with Student Activity Sheets (AABTLT with SAS).  Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa AABTLT with SAS dapat menunjukkan efektifitas proses pelatihan implementasi pembelajaran STEM-loose parts pada guru PAUD dalam kategori sangat efektif. Profil penguasaan materi peserta pelatihan menempatkan guru yang sedang mengambil program S1 sebagai peserta yang paling mengusai materi. Penelitian ini telah berhasil menunjukkan cara mengukur efektifitas pelatihan guru. Diperlukan penelitian lebih lanjut untuk membandingkan dan atau menghubungkan pengukuran efektivitas proses pelatihan dan hasil pelatihan secara simultan.
title: Mengukur Efektivitas Pelatihan Implementasi Pembelajaran STEAM- Loose Parts pada Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Measuring the effectiveness of training implementation of steam loose parts learning for early childhood teachers is a crucial phase in the development of children. Teachers who teach at an early age require special skills. Therefore, continuous training and self-development for early childhood teachers are very necessary. This study aims to measure the effectiveness of the training process for implementing steam loose parts learning for early childhood teachers. This study is an explanatory case study with a focus on the use of authentic assessment instruments based on teaching and learning trajetory with student activity sheets aabtlt with sas. The results of the study indicate that aabtlt with sas can show the effectiveness of the training process for implementing steam loose parts learning for early childhood teachers in the very effective category. The profile of mastery of the training participants' material places teachers who are taking the s program as participants who have the most mastery of the material. This study has succeeded in showing how to measure the effectiveness of teacher training. Further research is needed to compare and/or connect the measurement of the effectiveness of the training process and training results simultaneously.

desc: Perkembangan literasi merupakan salah satu substansi penting bagi perkembangan bahasa anak karena perkembangan bahasa merupakan kemampuan untuk menggunakan semua keterampilan berbahasa manusia yang mencakup kemampuan berbicara, menulis, membaca, dan menyimak sebagai bentuk ekspresi dan memaknai. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui peran orang tua dalam menyediakan Home Literacy Environment (HLE) pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian dengan pendekatan kualitatif deskriptif. Subjek penelitian adalah 10 orang tua yang memiliki anak usia 3-6 tahun dengan tingkat pendidikan dan sosial ekonomi berbeda di Klaten. Teknik pengumpulan data meliputi observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Analisis data yang digunakan adalah pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Peran orang tua dalam menyediakan HLE pada anak usia dini adalah sebagai sumber literasi (guru atau pendamping literasi bagi anak), fasilitator literasi (menyediakan ruang baca, buku atau bahan bacaan, dan APE literasi untuk anak), dan sebagai pengatur terlaksananya program literasi. Sedangkan, peran anak adalah sebagai sasaran utama orang tua dalam menerapkan HLE.
title: Peran Orang Tua dalam Menyediakan Home Literacy Environment (HLE) pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of parents in providing home literacy environment hle in early childhood literacy development is one of the important substances for children's language development because language development is the ability to use all human language skills that include speaking, writing, reading and listening as a form of expression and meaning this study aims to determine the role of parents in providing home literacy environment hle in early childhood this study is a study with a qualitative descriptive approach the subjects of the study are parents who have children aged years with different levels of education and socio-economic in klaten data collection techniques include observation interviews and documentation data analysis used is data collection data reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions the role of parents in providing hle in early childhood is as a source of literacy teachers or literacy companions for children literacy facilitators provide a reading room for books or reading materials and literacy apps for children and as a regulator of the implementation of literacy programs while the role of children is as the main target of parents in implementing hle

desc: Faktor utama yang mempengaruhi keterlambatan bicara pada anak ialah pola asuh orang tua. Pola asuh orang tua kurang tepat bagi anak usia dini di masa perkembangannya. Tujuan penelitian ini yaitu untuk menganalisis hubungan pola asuh orang tua terhadap keterlambatan bicara anak. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah kajian pustaka. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kebanyakan orang tua menerapkan pola asuh permisif dalam mendidik dan mengasuh anak. Pola asuh permisif menyebabkan keterlambatan bicara anak karena kesibukan orang tua, rendahnya tingkat pendidikan orang tua, kurangnya stimulasi, dukungan positif lingkungan dan interaksi, keinginan orang tua agar anak mampu berbahasa asing.
title: Analisis Pola Asuh Orang Tua terhadap Keterlambatan Bicara pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of parenting patterns on speech delays in early childhood The main factor that influences speech delays in children is parenting patterns Parenting patterns are not appropriate for early childhood during their development The purpose of this study is to analyze the relationship between parenting patterns and speech delays in children The research method used in this study is a literature review The results of the study show that most parents apply permissive parenting patterns in educating and raising children Permissive parenting patterns cause speech delays in children because of the busyness of parents Low level of parental education Lack of stimulation Positive support from the environment and interaction Parents' desire for children to be able to speak a foreign language

desc: Kebudayaan Suku Madura yaitu apabila anak perempuan menikah tidak boleh meninggalkan rumah orang tua. Kondisi ini membuat pengasuhan secara otomatis beralih kepada nenek. Dampak negaitif pengasuhan nenek yaitu mayoritas menggunakan pola pengasuh permisif berdampak kecenderungan anak menarik diri dan tidak mampu untuk berteman dengan teman sebayanya. Tujuan penelitian ini menganalisis hubungan antara pola pengasuhan nenek dengan kemandirian anak usia dini suku Madura. Menggunakan desain penelitian cross sectional. Sampel adalah anak usia dini (4-6 tahun)  sebanyak 41 orang dan nenek yang mengasuhnya berjumlah 41 orang. Menggunakan purposive sampling. Instrumen penelitian yaitu kuesioner. Analisis data univariat dan distribusi frekuensi, analisis bivariate dengan chi kuadrat. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan mayoritas nenek menerapkan pengasuhan permisif kepada cucunya sehingga cucu yang diasuhnya memiliki kemandirian dengan tingkat rendah.
