Keterbatasan dari penelitian ini adalah pada saat penelitian, mayoritas nenek pengasuh kurang memahami bahasa Indonesia dikarenakan bahasa setiap hari yang digunakan adalah bahasa lokal yaitu bahasa Madura
title: Hubungan Pengasuhan Nenek dengan Kemandirian Anak Usia Dini pada Suku Madura
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The relationship between grandmother's care and the independence of early childhood in the Madurese tribe. Madurese culture is that if a girl gets married, she is not allowed to leave her parents' house. This condition automatically shifts care to the grandmother. The negative impact of grandmother's care is that the majority use a permissive caregiving pattern, which has an impact on the tendency for children to withdraw and be unable to make friends with their peers. The purpose of this study was to analyze the relationship between grandmother's care patterns and the independence of early childhood in the Madurese tribe using a cross-sectional research design. The sample was 100 early childhood children and 100 grandmothers who took care of them. Using purposive sampling, the research instrument was a questionnaire. Univariate data analysis and frequency distribution. Bivariate analysis with chi square. The results of the study showed that the majority of grandmothers applied permissive care to their grandchildren so that the grandchildren they took care of had a low level of independence. The limitations of this study were that at the time of the study, the majority of grandmother caregivers did not understand Indonesian because the language used every day was the local language, namely Madurese.

desc: Rokok tidak hanya merusak kesehatan manusia, tetapi memberikan dampak terhadap psikologis termasuk pertumbuhan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengetahui kontribusi Lifestyle Without Tobacco terhadap pertumbuhan anak usia dini. Jenis penelitian ini adalah kuantitatif, partisipan berjumlah 40 orang pada dua desa untuk perbandingan, dan data dianalisis menggunakan uji chi-square. Berdasarkan hasil uji chi-square ditemukan ada hubungan perilaku merokok dengan pertumbuhan anak usia dini, dan dari hasil uji regresi logistik sederhana diperoleh bahwa orang tua yang tidak merokok memiliki peluang 67,7 kali terhadap pertumbuhan anak. Temuan baru penelitian ini merupakan dukungan terhadap penerapan Kawasan Tanpa Rokok (KTR) dengan menerapkan perilaku hidup tanpa tembakau. Anak usia dini yang hidup di lingkungan tersebut memiliki pertumbuhan yang lebih baik. Dampak dari penelitian ini mendorong dapat direplikasi perilaku tanpa asap rokok pada daerah yang memiliki karakteristik yang sama
title: Hubungan Perilaku Lifestyle Without Tobacco dengan Pertumbuhan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Relationship between lifestyle without tobacco and early childhood growth. Smoking not only damages human health but also has an impact on psychology including early childhood growth. This study aims to determine the contribution of lifestyle without tobacco to early childhood growth. This type of research is quantitative. Participants numbered people in two villages for comparison and data were analyzed using the chi-square test. Based on the results of the chi-square test, it was found that there was a relationship between smoking behavior and early childhood growth. And from the results of the simple logistic regression test, it was found that parents who did not smoke had a 100-fold chance of increasing the growth of children. The new findings of this study are support for the implementation of smoke-free areas. By implementing a tobacco-free lifestyle, early childhood living in the environment has better growth. The impact of this study encourages the replication of smoke-free behavior in areas with the same characteristics.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis tentang alat permainan edukatif berbahan limbah dalam meningkatkan kecerdasan kognitif pada anak usia dini di Raudlatul Athfal (RA) Tania, Paiton,  Probolinggo. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah kualitatif jenis studi kasus. Guna mendapatkan gambaran tentang alat permainan edukatif berbahan limbah dalam mencerdaskan kognitif pada anak usia dini, peneliti berbaur langsung dalam pembuatan alatnya dan melakukan observasi dan mendokumentasikan aktivitas pembelajaran di lembaga tersebut. Interview dilakukan terhadap kepala sekolah dan guru di Raudlatul Athfal (RA) Tania. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa strategi guru dalam meningkatkan kecerdasan kognitif anak usia dini melalui alat permainan edukatif berbahan limbah dilakukan melalui; kegiatan persiapan, penyajian materi, menghubungkan, menyimpulkan, dan mengaplikasikan media dalam kegiatan pembelajaran. Penelitian ini memberikan implikasi bahwa guru harus memiliki inovasi dan kreatifitas dalam mengelola pembelajarannya sesuai dengan target yang ditentukannya, agar supaya mampu membangkitkan motivasi dan kecerdasan peserta didik secara totalitas.
title: Pengelolaan Alat Permainan Edukatif Berbahan Limbah Dalam Meningkatkan Kecerdasan Kognitif Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of educational game tools made from waste in improving children's cognitive intelligence This study aims to analyze educational game tools made from waste in improving cognitive intelligence in early childhood at Raudlatul Athfal Ra Tania Paiton Probolinggo The research method used is a qualitative case study type to get an overview of educational game tools made from waste in improving cognitive intelligence in early childhood researchers are directly involved in making the tools and conducting observations and documenting learning activities at the institution interviews were conducted with the principal and teachers at Raudlatul Athfal Ra Tania The results of the study showed that the teacher's strategy in improving the cognitive intelligence of early childhood through educational game tools made from waste was carried out through preparation activities, presenting materials, connecting, concluding and applying media in learning activities This study provides implications that teachers must have innovation and creativity in managing their learning according to the targets they have determined in order to be able to raise the motivation and intelligence of students in totality

desc: As an Early Childhood Education teacher, you are required to be able to understand the world of art and develop interesting art lessons for children. This research was conducted to understand the process of learning art to students at the Institute. By using this type of qualitative descriptive research, the researcher will examine the facts in the field with detailed interpretations. Data collection techniques using observation, documentation, and interviews. The data analysis uses data collection, data reduction, data display, verification, and affirmation of conclusions. The research proves that the results of introducing art learning concepts to students through drawing and coloring activities using gradation techniques using crayon at kindergarten in Jember can be developed well. From the results of this study, it has a positive impact on students and is beneficial for developing their faith, honing their talents, and creativity to be even more enthusiastic in the art learning process.
title: Drawing and Coloring Using Crayon with Gradation Technique at Kindergarten
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: drawing and coloring using crayons with gradation technique at kindergarten as an early childhood education teacher you are required to be able to understand the world of art and develop interesting art lessons for children this research was conducted to understand the process of learning art to students at the institute by using this type of qualitative descriptive research the researcher will examine the facts in the field with detailed interpretations data collection techniques using observation documentation and interviews the data analysis uses data collection data reduction data display verification and affirmation of conclusions the research proves that the results of introducing art learning concepts to students through drawing and coloring activities using gradation techniques using crayons at kindergarten in Jember can be developed well from the results of this study it has a positive impact on students and is beneficial for developing their faith honing their talents and creativity to be even more enthusiastic in the art learning process

desc: Guru mengalami kesulitan dalam mengidentifikasi awal anak berkebutuhan khusus yang ada di sekolah inklusi. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan panduan identifikasi anak berkebutuhan khusus di sekolah inklusi. Metode yang digunakan adalah dengan pendekatan penelitian dan pengembangan. Sampel penelitian ini adalah para guru yang mengajar di lembaga Taman Kanak-kanak yang bertugas di provinsi DKI Jakarta dengan jumlah guru 51 orang. Penelitian ini menghasilkan sebuah produk berupa panduan mengidentifikasi anak berkebutuhan khusus. Kebaruan penelitian ini adalah dihasilkannya panduan yang mengelaborasi model pengembangan Analyze, Design, Development, Implementation, dan Evaluation dengan model Rowentree yang telah teruji. Dampak dihasilkannya panduan ini adalah adanya tahapan perencanaan, persiapan, serta tahapan penulisan dan penyuntingan yang dapat memudahkan para guru dalam mengidentifikasi anak berkebutuhan khusus di sekolah. Pengembangan produk panduan ini perlu terus dilakukan di lapangan dan dikembangkan agar lebih teruji lagi.
title: Panduan Mengidentifikasi Anak Berkebutuhan Khusus di Sekolah Inklusi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Guide to identifying children with special needs in inclusive schools teachers have difficulty in early identification of children with special needs in inclusive schools This study aims to develop a guide to identifying children with special needs in inclusive schools The method used is a research and development approach The sample of this study were teachers who teach in kindergarten institutions that work in the province of DKI Jakarta with a total of 1,000 teachers This study produced a product in the form of a guide to identifying children with special needs The novelty of this study is the production of a guide that elaborates the development model of analyze design development implementation and evaluation with the proven Rowentree model The impact of producing this guide is the existence of stages of preparation planning as well as stages of writing and editing that can make it easier for teachers to identify children with special needs in schools The development of this guide product needs to be continuously carried out in the field and developed so that it can be tested even more

desc: Sistem Penjaminan Mutu Internal (SPMI) belum menjadi prioritas oleh sebagian besar Perguruan Tinggi bila dibandingkan Sistem Penjaminan Mutu Eksternal (SPME). Amanah Undang-Undang Nomor 12 Tahun 2012 tentang Pendidikan Tinggi menyatakan SPMI dan SPME merupakan bagian dari suatu sistem. Diduga SPMI oleh sebagian Perguruan Tinggi tidak memberikan dampak yang signifikan seperti SPME dimana Perguruan Tinggi akan mendapatkan hasil Akreditasi. Penelitian ini dilakukan pada periode Agustus sampai dengan Desember 2019. Tujuan penelitian ini dalam rangka mengevaluasi Program SPMI yang dikembangkan oleh Program Studi Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD) yang terakreditasi C. Metode pengkajian dilakukan menggunakan pendekatan sistem meliputi aspek konteks, input, proses, dan output, dengan mengacu kepada studi literatur pada hasil-hasil penelitian yang relevan. Hasil pelaksanaan SPMI pada prodi PAUD sudah berjalan dengan baik, bila dibandingkan dengan PPEPP seluruh aspek sudah ditahap pelaksanaan. Rekomendasi evaluasi SPMI pada penelitian ini ditujukan kepada tiga pemangku kepentingan yaitu Direktorat Penjaminan Mutu, Lembaga Penjaminan Mutu tingkat Universitas, dan pimpinan Program Studi.
title: Evaluasi Sistem Penjaminan Mutu Internal Program Studi   S1 Pendidikan Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: evaluation of the internal quality assurance system of the study program s early childhood teacher education internal quality assurance system spmi has not been a priority for most universities when compared to the external quality assurance system spme mandate law number of the year concerning higher education states that spmi and spme are part of a system suspected spmi by some universities does not have a significant impact like spme where universities will get accreditation results this study was conducted in the period august to december the purpose of this study was to evaluate the spmi program developed by the early childhood education study program paud accredited c the assessment method was carried out using a systems approach including aspects of the context of input process and output by referring to literature studies on relevant research results the results of the implementation of spmi in the paud study program have been running well when compared to ppepp all aspects have been implemented recommendations for the evaluation of spmi in this study are addressed to three stakeholders, namely the directorate of quality assurance, the university level quality assurance institution and the head of the study program

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh rendahnya kemampuan bekerjasama anak usia 5-6 tahun. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk meningkatkan kemampuan bekerjasama anak melalui permainan bakiak. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian tindakan kelas. Model tindakan yang digunakan adalah model Kemmis dan Mc.Taggart. Subjek penelitian adalah anak usia 5-6 tahun di TK Cenderawati Abepura yang berjumlah 15 anak. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui observasi dan wawancara. Teknik analisis data yang dilakukan secara kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan peningkatan kemampuan bekerjasama anak. Peningkatan tersebut dibuktikan dengan hasil observasi awal yang baru mencapai rata-rata 50,55%, meningkat pada siklus I tindakan 1 menjadi 54,44%, siklus I tindakan 2 mencapai 67,21%, dan pada Siklus I tindakan 3 mencapai 70,90%. Pada siklus II tindakan 1 nilai kemampuan kerjasama mencapai 73,88% dan pada siklus II tindakan 2 telah mencapai 81,10%. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian tersebut diperoleh kesimpulan bahwa permainan bakiak dapat meningkatkan kemampuan bekerjasama anak usia 5-6 tahun di TK Cenderawati Abepura
title: Meningkatkan Kemampuan Bekerjasama Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun melalui Permainan Bakiak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving the ability to cooperate with children aged years through playing clogs this study was motivated by the low ability to cooperate with children aged years the purpose of this study was to improve children's ability to cooperate through playing clogs this study is a classroom action research the action model used is the kemmis and mc taggart models the subjects of the study were children aged years in kindergarten cenderawati abepura totaling children data collection techniques were carried out through observation and interviews data analysis techniques were carried out qualitatively the results of the study showed an increase in children's ability to cooperate the increase was proven by the results of the initial observation which had only reached an average increase in cycle i action to cycle i action reached and in cycle i action reached in cycle ii action the value of cooperation ability reached and in cycle ii action had reached based on the results of the study it was concluded that playing clogs can improve the ability to cooperate with children aged years in kindergarten cenderawati abepura

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini untuk menguji perbedaan status ekonomi orang tua dan child rearing (membesarkan anak) terhadap kesiapan sekolah anak usia dini di daerah pesisir Kecamatan Bantan Kabupaten Bengkalis Provinsi Riau. Penelitian ex post facto dengan desaim faktorial 2x2. Penentuan sampel menggunakan teknik purposive sampling berjumlah 100 orang tua. Penentuan sampel menggunakan rumus indeks kesukaran (rumus Johnson), dilanjutkan menentukan 27% responden yang menjadi kelompok Atas dan 27% menjadi kelompok Bawah (daya pembeda), sehingga diperoleh masing-masing sel menjadi 8 responden dengan total 32 orang tua. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui penyebaran kuesioner yang didesain dalam bentuk skala Likert. Analisis data menggunakan uji F. Penelitian memiliki lima hipotesis. Keseluruhan hipotesis menyimpulkan bahwa kesiapan sekolah dipengaruhi oleh status ekonomi orang tua dengan mempertimbangkan child rearing (membesarkan anak). Orang tua sebagai pendidik pertama dan utama diharapkan mengubah paradigma tentang bagaimana anak belajar dan memperoleh pengetahuan. Koordinasi dan komunikasi perlu terus dibangun dengan guru dalam upaya perbaikan kualitas pendidikan anak usia dini dalam mempersiapkan anak bersekolah.
title: Perbedaan Kesiapan Sekolah Anak Usia Dini di Daerah Pesisir Ditinjau dari Status Ekonomi Orang Tua dan Parenting
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: differences in early childhood school readiness in coastal areas reviewed from the economic status of parents and parenting the purpose of this study was to examine the differences in the economic status of parents and child rearing raising children on the school readiness of early childhood children in coastal areas of Bantan District, Bengkalis Regency, Riau Province, ex post facto research with factorial design x, sample determination using purposive sampling technique, the number of parents, sample determination using the Johnson formula difficulty index formula, continued to determine respondents who were in the upper group and became the lower group, the discriminatory power so that each cell was obtained as a respondent with a total of parents, data collection was carried out through the distribution of questionnaires designed in the form of a Likert scale, data analysis using the f test, the study had five hypotheses, overall the hypothesis concluded that school readiness was influenced by the economic status of parents, considering child rearing raising children, parents as the first and main educators, it is expected to change the paradigm of how children learn and acquire knowledge, coordination and communication need to be continuously built with teachers in an effort to improve the quality of early childhood education in preparing children for school

desc: This article will describe a part of the results of the research that aims to analyze the relationship between literacy skills, domicile and learning outcomes of the Mataram Universitas Terbuka (UT) students. This research was conducted using a correlational survey method. The data were collected with an instrument in the form of a questionnaire. The population is the 2020 Early Childhood Education Teacher (ECET) Program students as many as 982 students. The sample is an ECET Program new students who are in the odd and even semesters of 2020 as many as 213 students. All samples are respondents. The results show that there is no significant relationship between domicile, and student learning achievement and I-literacy with student learning achievement. This is because student learning achievement are based on their ability to read and master the Basic Materials Book. Recommendations that can be conveyed are to prepare new students to study independently, train how to learn to use print and non-print media, including how to understand the content of the Basic Materials Book.
title: Correlation between I-Learning Skills, Domicile and Student Learning Achievement in Distance Education
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: correlation between literacy skills domicile and student learning achievement in distance education this article will describe a part of the results of the research that aims to analyze the relationship between literacy skills domicile and learning outcomes of the mataram opened university ut students this research was conducted using a correlational survey method the data were collected with an instrument in the form of a questionnaire the population is the early childhood education teacher ecet program students as many as students the sample is an ecet program new students who are in the odd and even semesters of as many as students all samples respondents are the results show that there is no significant relationship between domicile and student learning achievement and illiteracy with student learning achievement this is because student learning achievement is based on their ability to read and master the basic materials book recommendations that can be conveyed are to prepare new students to study independently train how to learn to use print and nonprint media including how to understand the content of the basic materials book

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengungkapkan penerapan pola asuh orangtua tentara nasional indonesia terhadap perkembangan anak usia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode deskriptif analisis. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yaitu wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Keabsahan data yang digunakan yaitu dengan teknik triangulasi dan kecukupan referensial. Teknik analisis data yang dilakukan dengan teknik analisis data Model Milles dan Huberman. Langkah-langkah dalam teknik analisis data yaitu reduksi data, penyajian data, simpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan pola asuh yang digunakan oleh orangtua Tentara Nasional Indonesia adalah pola asuh authoritarian. Pola asuh ini menjelaskan bahwa pola asuh menggunakan arahan terhadap anak dan komunikasi dua arah sehingga adanya kehangatan di dalam keluarga. Kehangatan dari pola asuh authoritarian memberikan dampak positif bagi perkembangan anak. Perkembangan anak berkembangan sesuai dengan tahapan usia anak. Hal ini terlihat aspek perkembangan anak yang meliputi aspek fisik motorik, kognitif, sosial, dan emosi.
title: Pola Asuh Orangtua Tentara Nasional Indonesia pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parenting patterns of Indonesian national army parents in early childhood This study aims to reveal the application of parenting patterns of Indonesian national army parents to the development of children aged years This study uses a qualitative approach with a descriptive method of analysis of data collection techniques used in this study, namely interviews, observation and documentation The validity of the data used is the triangulation technique and referential adequacy The data analysis technique used is the Milles and Huberman model data analysis techniques The steps in the data analysis technique are data reduction Data presentation Conclusions The results of the study show that the parenting pattern used by Indonesian national army parents is an authoritarian parenting pattern This parenting pattern explains that parenting uses direction towards children and two-way communication so that there is warmth in the family The warmth of the authoritarian parenting pattern has a positive impact on child development Child development develops according to the stages of the child's age This can be seen in aspects of child development which include physical, motor, cognitive, social and emotional aspects

desc: The purpose of this study was to improve the fine motor skills of 4-5-year-old children through origami games in Kampung Gang Buaya Salatiga. Attractive origami paper folding activities can motivate children to improve their fine motor skills. This type of research is Participatory Action Research (PAR) conducted through 2 cycles. The research subjects were SI 5 girls and 4 boys. Data collection techniques use interviews and documentation. The research object is children's fine motor skills through origami paper games. Data Analysis Techniques using Quantitative Descriptive. Branch stitching can be seen from the average fine motor skills of children with origami paper applications with the criteria of Developing According to Hope that is 76%. The results of this study indicate an increase in children's fine motor skills through playing origami paper in the village of Gang Buaya Salatiga, which is seen from the children's fine motor skills in the pre-action stage, which is an average of 33.3% to 65.38% in cycle I actions, then increased to 79.62% in the transition period II.
title: Origami Game for Improving Fine Motor Skills for Children 4-5 Years Old in Gang Buaya Village in Salatiga
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: origami game for improving fine motor skills for children years old in gang crocodile village in salatiga the purpose of this study was to improve the fine motor skills of year old children through origami games in kampung gang gara salatiga attractive origami paper folding activities can motivate children to improve their fine motor skills this type of research is participatory action research par conducted through cycles the research subjects were girls and boys data collection techniques use interviews and documentation the research object is childrens fine motor skills through origami paper games data analysis techniques using quantitative descriptive branch stitching can be seen from the average fine motor skills of children with origami paper applications with the criteria of developing according to hope that the results of this study indicate an increase in children's fine motor skills through playing origami paper in the village of gang crocodile salatiga which is seen from the children's fine motor skills in the preaction stage which is an average of to in cycle i actions then increased to in the transition period ii

desc: Nilai Agama dan Moral (NAM) perlu ditanamkan sejak usia dini untuk bekal anak di usia tumbuh kembang selanjutnya. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan pelaksanaan pembelajaran NAM melalui metode montessori selama pandemi covid-19. Penelitian ini dianalisis dengan metode kualitiatif deskriptif. Subjek dipilih menggunakan teknik sampel nonprobability sampling yaitu purposive sample. Terdapat 5 subjek penelitian yang terdiri dari 2 orang guru kelas, 2 orang tim kurikulum, dan 1 orang kepala sekolah. Penelitian ini menggunakan wawancara mendalam dan dokumentasi untuk mengumpukan data dengan proses analisis melalui empat tahapan yaitu reduksi data, display data, kesimpulan serta verifikasi data. Berdasarkan hasil wawancara dengan subjek penelitian disimpulkan bahwa pembelajaran NAM selama pandemi covid-19 dilakukan dengan media sosial (zoom dan whatsapp). Pembelajaran NAM dikolaborasikan dengan metode montessori yang berpusat pada anak dan mengajarkan mengenai life skill, sehingga anak mudah memahami dan memiliki keterampilan hidup.
title: Pembelajaran Nilai Agama dan Moral Anak Usia Dini melalui Metode Montessori selama Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood religious and moral values ​​learning through the Montessori method during the Covid pandemic Nam religious and moral values ​​need to be instilled from an early age to provide children with provisions in their subsequent growth and development. The purpose of this study was to describe the implementation of Nam learning through the Montessori method during the Covid pandemic. This study was analyzed using a descriptive qualitative method. Subjects were selected using a nonprobability sampling technique, namely purposive sampling. There were research subjects consisting of class teachers, curriculum team members, and school principals. This study used in-depth interviews and documentation to collect data with an analysis process through four stages, namely data reduction, data display, conclusions, and data verification. Based on the results of interviews with research subjects, it was concluded that Nam learning during the Covid pandemic was carried out using social media Zoom and WhatsApp. Nam learning was collaborated with the Montessori method which is centered on children and teaches about life skills so that children can easily understand and have life skills.

desc: Permasalahan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun dari pembelajaran daring menyebabkan anak lebih banyak beraktifitas dengan duduk di depan laptop atau gawai HP sehingga gerak motorik kasarnya kurang seperti berlari, melempar, menendang bola, senam dimana aktivitas tersebut melatih kemampuan motorik dan sensori sebagai dasar pedoman pengembangan kemampuan melalui bermain bebas yang membutuhkan gerakan syaraf otot-otot besar sangat kurang. Tujuan penelitian ini mengembangkan model permainan  inovasi pembelajaran motorik kasar. Desain menggunakan pendekatan R  D (Reseach and Development) yang menghasilkan produk mengadopsi model Borg  Gall disederhanakan peneliti. Subjek penelitian anak kelompok B TK Perwanida Mrican Kediri. Teknik pengumpuln data lembar observasi ceklist dan wawancara. Analisis data  deskriptif kuantitatif. Tahapan analisis kebutuhan permainan, instrument dan model permainan di validasi dan uji coba kelompok kecil.   Hasil menunjukan efektifitas  pengembangan model permainan aspek motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun valid, praktis dan memiliki potensi dapat digunakan seluruh guru ketika proses pembelajaran motorik kasar.
title: Efektifitas Pengembangan Model Permainan Bola Keranjang  Aspek Motorik Kasar  Anak 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of developing a basketball game model for gross motor aspects of children aged years. Gross motor problems in children aged years from online learning cause children to be more active by sitting in front of a laptop or cellphone so that their gross motor movements are lacking, such as running, throwing, kicking a ball, gymnastics where these activities train motor and sensory skills as a basis for guidelines for developing abilities through free play which requires large muscle nerve movements. The purpose of this study was to develop a gross motor learning innovation game model. Design using the R&D research and development approach which produces products adopting the simplified Borg Gall model. Research subjects were children in group B, Perwanida Mrican Kediri Kindergarten. Data collection techniques, observation sheets, checklists and interviews. Descriptive quantitative data analysis. Stages of game needs analysis. Instruments and game models were validated and tested in small groups. The results showed the effectiveness of developing a game model for gross motor aspects of children aged years. Valid, practical and has the potential to be used by all teachers during the gross motor learning process.

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh adanya temuan banyaknya kasus tindak kekerasan terhadap anak usia dini di masa pandemi Covid-19 dan era new normal. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan fasilitas-fasilitas perlindungan hukum apa saja yang dibutuhkan anak usia dini di Kota Pontianak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa perlu adanya pusat studi gender dan anak untuk mengatasi kekerasan yang dialami anak usia dini. Kebaruan yang didapatkan dalam penelitian ini adalah pentingnya pusat studi gender dan anak usia dini di berbagai daerah. Dampak dari hasil penelitian ini adalah para akademisi yang ada di perguruan tinggi perlu terlibat secara langsung dalam mengatasi berbagai kasus kekerasan yang dialami anak usia dini dengan bekerjasama secara berkelanjutan dengan pihak-pihak terkait untuk menekan terjadinya kekerasan pada anak usia dini yang semakin tinggi setiap bulannya.
title: Feasbylity Study Perlindungan Hukum untuk Anak Usia Dini yang Bercompetitive Advantage
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: feasbylity study of legal protection for early childhood with competitive advantage This study was motivated by the findings of many cases of violence against early childhood during the Covid pandemic and the new normal era The purpose of this study is to describe what legal protection facilities are needed by early childhood in Pontianak City The method used in this study is a qualitative descriptive research method The results of the study indicate that there is a need for a gender and child study center to overcome violence experienced by early childhood The novelty obtained in this study is the importance of gender and early childhood study centers in various regions The impact of the results of this study is that academics in universities need to be directly involved in overcoming various cases of violence experienced by early childhood by collaborating continuously with related parties to reduce the occurrence of violence against early childhood which is increasing every month

desc: Miopia merupakan salah satu gangguan penglihatan dengan prevalensi yang tinggi di Indonesia. Anak penyandang miopia memiliki potensi dalam pendidikan yang terlihat dari tingkat kecerdasan yang lebih tinggi dari anak dengan penglihatan normal. Meskipun demikian, anak penyandang miopia memiliki kesulitan sendiri dalam belajar. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan faktor penyebab miopia pada anak kembar penyandang low vision. Penelitian dilakukan dengan wawancara kepada ibu dari anak kembar penyandang low vision. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa myopia pada anak kembar terjadi karena faktor genetik dan faktor pre natal. Miopia pada anak kembar sendiri mengganggu aktivitas belajar meskipun kedua anak kembar memiliki tingkat intelegensi rata-rata. Peneliti berharap hasil penelitian ini dapat menjadi salah satu acuan untuk pembuatan kurikulum pembelajaran yang cocok bagi anak penyandang low vision. Dengan demikian, sistem pendidikan inklusi di Indonesia berjalan efektif sesuai tujuannya.
title: Miopia pada Anak Kembar Penyandang Low vision
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Myopia in twins with low vision Myopia is one of the visual impairments with a high prevalence in Indonesia Children with myopia have potential in education which can be seen from their higher level of intelligence than children with normal vision However, children with myopia have their own difficulties in learning This study aims to describe the factors that cause myopia in twins with low vision The study was conducted by interviewing the mothers of twins with low vision The results of the study showed that myopia in twins occurs due to genetic factors and prenatal factors Myopia in twins itself interferes with learning activities even though both twins have an average level of intelligence The researcher hopes that the results of this study can be a reference for creating a learning curriculum that is suitable for children with low vision Thus, the inclusive education system in Indonesia runs effectively according to its objectives

desc: There are many ways to prevent corruption, one of them is in education. This study aims to provide training to kindergarten teachers on how to integrate anti-corruption values into teaching and learning activities using storytelling and game methods. This research applied mix method and took the setting in 2 schools in Salatiga, Indonesia. The qualitative data from the interviews were processed by transcribing the answers to the research questions, then sorting out the answers. The pre-test and post-test quantitative data were processed using Wilcoxon technique in SPSS.  From the test it is known Asymp.Sig (2-tailed) is 0.011. Because the value of 0.011 is smaller than 0.05, it can be concluded that the hypothesis is accepted. This means that there is an increase in competence about Anti-Corruption Education before and after training using the module. This research also contributes to expanding literacy source for kindergarten teachers in the form of anti-corruption education training modules
title: Kindergarten Teachers Training in Integrating Anti-Corruption Education through Storytelling and Game
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: kindergarten teachers training in integrating anticorruption education through storytelling and games there are many ways to prevent corruption one of them is in education this study aims to provide training to kindergarten teachers on how to integrate anticorruption values ​​into teaching and learning activities using storytelling and game methods this research applied mix method and took the setting in schools in Salatiga Indonesia the qualitative data from the interviews were processed by transcribing the answers to the research questions then sorting out the answers the pretest and posttest quantitative data were processed using the wilcoxon technique in spss from the test it is known as sig tailed is because the value of is smaller than it can be concluded that the hypothesis is accepted this means that there is an increase in competence about anticorruption education before and after training using the module this research also contributes to expanding literacy source for kindergarten teachers in the form of anticorruption education training modules

desc: The aims of this research are to improve children's learning motivation through the implementaion of Whole Brain Teaching and to describe the improvement of children's learning motivation through the implementation of Whole Brain Teaching. This research is a classroom action research, then research subjects consisted of 18 students at TK Aisyiyah 1 Tanggulangin, especially group A. The location of this research is in TK Aisyiyah 1 Tanggulangin. Data collection technique is done by observation. The results show that the implementation of Whole Brain Teaching method can improve the learning motivation of students at TK Aisyiyah 1 Tanggulangin. It  can be seen from the improvement of children's learning motivation from the state of the 33% grade completeness score in the pre cycle, up to 56% in cycle I, then 83% grade mastery score in cycle II. So in accordance with the level of completeness of the action that the score of 75% -100% is in very good qualifications and the implementation of the action declared successful
title: Penerapan Metode Whole Brain Teaching dalam Meningkatkan Motivasi  Belajar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: application of the whole brain teaching method in increasing the learning motivation of early childhood the aims of this research are to improve children's learning motivation through the implementation of whole brain teaching and to describe the improvement of children's learning motivation through the implementation of whole brain teaching this research is a classroom action research then research subjects consisted of students at tk aisyiyah tanggulangin especially group a the location of this research is in tk aisyiyah tanggulangin data collection technique is done by observing the results show that the implementation of whole brain teaching method can improve the learning motivation of students at TK Aisyiyah Tanggulangin it can be seen from the improvement of children's learning motivation from the state of the grade completeness score in the pre cycle up to in cycle I then grade mastery score in cycle II so in accordance with the level of completeness of the action that the score of is in very good qualifications and the implementation of the action was declared successful

desc: Pendidikan karakter harus dimulai sejak usia dini agar di masa depan dapat tercipta sumber daya kuat yang berkarakter. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah mendeskripsikan cara guru menanamkan karakter, kendala guru dalam menanamkan karakter, dan cara mengatasi kendala dalam menanamkan karakter pada peserta didik. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif dengan pendekatan deskriptif. Teknik yang digunakan yaitu teknik observasi dan wawancara. Subjek dalam penelitian ini yaitu wali kelas I-VI dan Kepala Sekolah SD Negeri Sepandan. Data dianalisis secara deskriptif melalui tiga tindakan yaitu kodifikasi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil dari penelitian ini adalah cara guru dalam menanamkan karakter yaitu dengan cara pembiasaan, keteladanan, kantin serta koperasi kejujuran, kendala yang dialami yaitu faktor dari lingkungan sekitar peserta didik dan keluarga, dan cara guru dalam mengatasi kendala penanaman karakter dengan pemberian nasihat dan home visit. Penanaman karakter akan memberikan dampak positif dalam kegiatan belajar mengajar, peserta didik menjadi lebih taan terhadap peraturan, disiplin berangkat sekolah, dan kreatif dalam pembelajaran
title: Implementasi Pendidikan Karakter pada Peserta Didik Usia 6-8 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of character education for students aged years character education must begin at an early age so that in the future strong human resources with character can be created the purpose of this study is to describe how teachers instill character teacher obstacles in instilling character and how to overcome obstacles in instilling character in students this study uses a qualitative method with a descriptive approach the techniques used are observation and interview techniques the subjects in this study were homeroom teachers IV and the principal of Sepandan state elementary school the data was analyzed descriptively through three actions namely data codification data presentation and drawing conclusions the results of this study are how teachers in instill character is by habituating the role model of the canteen and honesty cooperatives the obstacles experienced are factors from the environment around students and families and how teachers overcome obstacles to instilling character by giving advice and home visits instilling character will have a positive impact on teaching and learning activities students become more obedient to the rules of discipline in going to school and creative in learning

desc: Literasi digital kini menjadi faktor pendukung dalam kesuksesan dalam kegiatan pembelajaran pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD), lebih lanjut tentu memberikan pengaruh baik dalam mendukung optimalisasi tumbuh dan kembang anak usia dini. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui bagaimana literasi digital tenaga pendidik PAUD dalam empat indikator yaitu mengakses, menyeleksi, memahami dan mendistribusikan informasi. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif dengan menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif. Populasi mencakup seluruh guru PAUD pada 8 lembaga di Gugus Mawar Kecamatan Rumbai Pesisir yang berjumlah 30 orang. Adapun teknik sampling menggunakan teknik total sampling yang mencakup seluruh guru PAUD di Gugus Mawar Kecamatan Rumbai Pesisir. Hasil analisis data penelitian menunjukkan bahwa nilai rata-rata literasi digital tenaga pendidik pada PAUD pada kategori cukup baik. Dengan demikian kompetensi literasi digital tenaga pendidik di PAUD harus ditingkatkan agar lebih baik dalam memanfaatkan perangkat digital dalam pembelajaran untuk mengoptimalkan pertumbuhan dan perkembangan anak usia dini
title: Analisis Literasi Digital Tenaga Pendidik pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: digital literacy analysis of educators in early childhood education digital literacy is now a supporting factor in the success of learning activities in early childhood education paud furthermore certainly has a good influence in supporting the optimization of the growth and development of early childhood this study aims to determine how the digital literacy of early childhood educators in four indicators, namely accessing selecting understanding and distributing information this study is a descriptive study using a quantitative approach the population includes all early childhood educators at institutions in the cluster of Mawar, Rumbai Pesisir sub-district, totaling 100 people, the sampling technique uses a total sampling technique that includes all early childhood educators in the cluster of Mawar, Rumbai Pesisir sub-district, the results of the research data analysis show that the average value of digital literacy of early childhood educators is in the fairly good category, thus the digital literacy competency of early childhood educators must be improved in order to be better at utilizing digital devices in learning to optimize the growth and development of early childhood

desc: Kehidupan di era modern saat ini, anak-anak sebagian besar bertempat tinggal kota besar telah dipengaruhi gadget yang membuat lebih sedikit ruang untuk berpartisipasi dalam dunia nyata. Penelitian memiliki tujuan untuk mendeskripsikan peran orang tua dalam mengurangi dampak negatif penggunaan gadget pada anak di Kelompok Bermain (KB) Al Falah Darussalam Tropodo. Pendekatan dalam penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif deskriptif dengan subjek penelitian orang tua KB Al-Falah Darusalam tropodo dengan jumlah 15 orang tua. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan Wawancara tersetruktur observasi ,dan dokumentasi. Penelitian menguji keabsahan data yang menggunakan teknik triangulasi. Pada hasil penelitian ini terdapat peran orang tua dalam mengurangi dampak negatif penggunaan gadget. Cara orang tua dalam mendampingi anak usia dini dalam menggunakan gadget antara lain 1) Batasi waktu anak dalam menggunakan gadget. 2) Pemilihan konten yang aman sesuai usia anak. 3) Imbangi penggunaan gadget dengan aktivitas anak. 4) Tetapkan aturan dalam penggunaan gadget bagi anak. 5) Orang tua perlu beradaptasi dengan perkembangan zaman.
title: Peran Orang Tua dalam Mengurangi Dampak Negatif Penggunaan Gadget
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of parents in reducing the negative impact of gadget use in today's modern era, children mostly live in big cities have been influenced by gadgets that create less space to participate in the real world. The study aims to describe the role of parents in reducing the negative impact of gadget use on children in the Al Falah Darussalam Tropodo playgroup. The approach in this study used a descriptive qualitative approach with the research subjects being parents of Al Falah Darussalam Tropodo with the number of parents. Data collection techniques were carried out using structured interviews, observations and documentation. The study tested the validity of the data using triangulation techniques. The results of this study show the role of parents in reducing the negative impact of gadget use. The way parents accompany early childhood children in using gadgets includes limiting the time children spend using gadgets, selecting content that is safe according to the child's age, balancing the use of gadgets with children's activities, setting rules for using gadgets for children. Parents need to adapt to the times.

desc: Matematika merupakan salah satu fondasi penting dalam perkembangan kemampuan akademik anak. Pembelajaran matematika pada anak tidak hanya berpusat pada angka namun lebih kepada bagaimana membangun pola berfikir anak melalui aktivitas-aktivitas yang memungkinkan anak terpapar pada ide-ide matematika baik secara sederhana maupun komplek. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahuipengimplementasian kegiatan pembelajaran aljabar pada tingkat TK B. Penelitian ini menggunakan jenis penelitian survei dengan menggunakan angket sebagai alat pengumpul data. Angket digunakan untuk mendapatkan data berkaitan dengan konteks materi aljabar yang diajarkan oleh guru. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian yang dilakukan diperoleh data sebagai berikut:  implementasi aljabar pada tingkat TK di kabupaten Magelang dikategorikan cukup, materi Aljabar belum semua dikuasai dan diimplementasikan oleh guru, dan faktor penghambat implementasi materi aljabar diantaranya faktor waktu yang terbatas dalam kegiatan belajar dan minimnya buku panduan materi aljabar pada TK. Dengan demikian, materi pembelajaran aljabar perlu lebih dipahami dan dikuasi oleh guru agar pembelajaran dapat lebih maksimal.
title: Analisis Implementasi Pembelajaran Aljabar pada Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the implementation of algebra learning in children aged 1-3 years Mathematics is one of the important foundations in the development of children's academic abilities Mathematics learning in children is not only centered on numbers but more on how to build children's thinking patterns through activities that allow children to be exposed to mathematical ideas, both simple and complex This study aims to determine the implementation of algebra learning activities at the kindergarten level This study uses a survey research type using a questionnaire as a data collection tool The questionnaire is used to obtain data related to the context of algebra material taught by teachers Based on the results of the study, the following data was obtained: The implementation of algebra at the kindergarten level in Magelang Regency is categorized as sufficient Algebra material has not all been mastered and implemented by teachers and factors inhibiting the implementation of algebra material include limited time factors in learning activities and the lack of algebra material guidebooks in kindergarten Thus, algebra learning material needs to be better understood and mastered by teachers so that learning can be maximized

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mengetahui Pengaruh Permainan Magic Card terhadap Kemampuan Bercerita Anak di PAUD Inklusi Istiqamah Islamic School Bukittinggi. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah metode kuantitatif dengan jenis eksperimen atau penelitian quasi eksperimen dengan menggunakan Permainan Magic Card. Permainan Magic Card berpengaruh terhadap bercerita anak di PAUD Inklusi Istiqamah Islamic School Bukittinggi. Berdasarkan analisis data, diperoleh nilai rata-rata hasil Kemampuan Bercerita anak di kelas eksperimen yang menggunakan Permainan Magic Card lebih tinggi (82) dibandingkan kelas kontrol yang menggunakan kartu gambar (72,6).
title: Pengaruh Permainan Magic Card terhadap Kemampuan Bercerita Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of magic card games on the storytelling ability of early childhood children The purpose of this study was to determine the influence of magic card games on the storytelling ability of children in the inclusive PAUD Istiqamah Islamic School Bukittinggi The type of research used was a quantitative method with an experimental type or quasi-experimental research using magic card games Magic card games have an effect on children's storytelling at the inclusive PAUD Istiqamah Islamic School Bukittinggi Based on data analysis, the average value of children's storytelling ability in the experimental class using magic card games was higher than the control class using picture cards

desc: Matematika merupakan pembelajaran berupa angka dan rumus yang dapat membantu anak memiliki kemampuan berhitung. Masalahnya, banyak anak yang kehilangan minat dan motivasi dalam mempelajari matematika. Hal ini dikarenakan anggapan mereka terhadap pelajaran matematika sebagai materi ajar yang sukar untuk dipelajari. Untuk situasi ini, seorang pendidik harus mampu merancang pembelajaran dengan menarik. Tujuan pada artikel ini yaitu menganalisis dan mengungkapkan keefektifan model Problem Based Learning dengan media Terivestor dalam meningkatkan kemampuan pemecahan masalah dan sikap percaya diri anak. Penggunaan pendekatan kuantitatif dengan metode Experiment membantu jalannya penelitian. Siswa SD Negeri Gandu digunakan sebagai populasi dalam penelitian ini. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pemanfaatan model PBL dengan media Terivestor menunjukkan dampak yang positif terhadap kemampuan pemecahan masalah dan sikap percaya diri anak. Hasil belajar dan minat anak terhadap pembelajaran matematika mengalami peningkatan dari sebelumnya. Penelitian ini memperoleh suatu media interaktif yang dapat meningkatkan kemampuan pemecahan masalah dan sikap percaya diri anak
title: Media Terivestor Karakter Animasi untuk Mengoptimalkan Kemampuan Pemecahan Masalah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Animated character terivestor media to optimize mathematical problem solving skills is learning in the form of numbers and formulas that can help children have the ability to count the problem is that many children lose interest and motivation in learning mathematics this is because they assume that mathematics lessons are difficult to learn teaching materials for this situation an educator must be able to design learning by attracting the purpose of this article is to analyze and reveal the effectiveness of the problem based learning model with terivestor media in improving children's problem solving skills and self-confidence the use of a quantitative approach with the experimental method helps the course of the study students of Gandu State Elementary School were used as the population in this study the results of the study showed that the use of the PBL model with terivestor media showed a positive impact on children's problem solving skills and self-confidence the results of children's learning and interest in learning mathematics increased from before this study obtained an interactive media that can improve children's problem solving skills and self-confidence

desc: Kompetensi berbicara anak usia dini pada masa new normal menuntut perhatian khusus para pendidik. Fondamen kecakapan berbicara anak usia dini merupakan wujud fenomena yang menarik untuk dikaji hingga terjawab persalahan-permasalahan yang urgent sebagai wujud tanggungjawab orang tua, guru, dan pemerintah. Studi ini memperlihatkan kemampuan berbicara TK Islam YLPI Marpoyan selama masa new normal. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif guna menjelaskan persoalan-persoalan yang urgent terkait kompetensi berbicara pada anak usia dini pada masa new normal. Sumber data dokumen dan narasumber, dan teknik pengumpulan data melalui observasi, dokumentasi, dan wawancara. Analasis penelititian dilakukan secara induktif, dilakukan reduksi data hingga ferivikasi, dan pembahasan hingga ditemukan hasil penelitian yang bermakna. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa; kompetensi berbicara anak usia dini masih dalam kategori rendah. Kurangnya komunikasi guru dan anak didik ketika pembelajaran online dan akibatnya anak diam ketika pembelajaran offline, kurang ceria, dan kurang optimis. Sehingga diperlukan usaha lebih dari pendidik untuk meningkatkan kompetensi berbicara anak usia dini dengan memperhatikan kebutuhan anak.
title: Analisis Kompetensi Berbicara Anak Usia Dini pada Masa New Normal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of speaking competence of early childhood during the new normal period, speaking competence of early childhood during the new normal period requires special attention from educators, the foundation of speaking skills of early childhood is an interesting phenomenon to study until urgent problems are answered as a form of responsibility of parents, teachers and the government, this study shows the speaking ability of Islamic kindergarten ylpi marpoyan during the new normal period, this study is a qualitative study to explain urgent problems related to speaking competence in early childhood during the new normal period, data sources are documents and informants and data collection techniques through observation, documentation and interviews, research analysis is carried out inductively, data reduction is carried out until verification and discussion are found until meaningful research results are found, the results of the study indicate that the speaking competence of early childhood is still in the low category, there is a lack of communication between teachers and students during online learning and as a result, children are silent when offline learning is less cheerful and less optimistic, so more effort is needed from educators to improve the speaking competence of early childhood by paying attention to the needs of children

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan tentang: (1) pola pengasuhan yang dilakukan dari pengasuh keluarga Tenaga Kerja Indonesia terhadap anak usia dini. (2) dampak dari pengasuhan yang dilakukan dari pengasuh keluarga Tenaga Kerja Indonesia terhadap aspek perkembangan anak usia dini. (3) peran serta guru terhadap pengasuhan yang dilakukan oleh pengasuh keluarga Tenaga Kerja Indonesia. (4) pengaruh positif peran guru di sekolah terhadap pengasuhan anak dari keluarga Tenaga Kerja Indonesia. (5) pengaruh positif peran guru terhadap aspek perkembangan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian adalah: (1) pola pengasuhan permisif merupakan yang mayoritas diterapkan kepada anak. (2) dampak dari pengasuhan permisif terlihat di aspek sosial emosional, bahasa, dan kognitif anak tersebut. (3) peran serta guru pada pengasuhan adalah dengan memberikan pendekatan dan edukasi terhadap pengasuh dan juga anak. (4) terdapat perubahan secara perlahan terhadap pengasuhan setelah mendapatkan masukan dari guru. (5) terdapat perubahan secara perlahan terhadap perkembangan anak setelah dilakukan pendekatan terhadap individu anak secara intensif.
title: Peran Guru pada Pengasuhan Anak dari Keluarga Tenaga Kerja Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of teachers in child care from Indonesian migrant worker families This study aims to describe the parenting patterns carried out by Indonesian migrant worker family caregivers towards early childhood The impact of parenting carried out by Indonesian migrant worker family caregivers on aspects of early childhood development The role of teachers in parenting carried out by Indonesian migrant worker family caregivers The positive influence of the role of teachers in schools on child care from Indonesian migrant worker families The positive influence of the role of teachers on aspects of early childhood development This study uses a qualitative descriptive approach, data collection techniques through interviews, observations and documentation The results of the study are that permissive parenting patterns are the ones that are mostly applied to children The impact of permissive parenting is seen in the social, emotional, language and cognitive aspects of the child The role of teachers in parenting is to provide an approach and education to caregivers and also children There are gradual changes in parenting after receiving input from teachers There are gradual changes in child development after an intensive approach to individual children

desc: Bukan hanya karena masa pandemi pembelajaran berbasis ICT (Teknologi Informasi dan Komunikasi) dipergunakan oleh guru dalam proses pembelajaran, tetapi sebuah keniscayaan yang harus dilakukan pada masa pembelajaran abad 21. Tujuan penelitian yaitu untuk mendapatkan informasi bagaimana guru profesional dalam proses pembelajaran dapat mengintegrasikan ICT pada komponen langkah-langkah pembelajaran dalam RPP (Rencana Pelaksanaan Pembelajaran). Jenis penelitian yang dipergunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan teknik wawancara dan dokumentasi untuk diobservasi. Wawancara dilakukan pada 10 guru yang sudah tersertifikasi PAUD, menunjukkan bahwa guru profesional mengintegrasikan ICT dalam komponen RPP yang terdapat pada rumusan tujuan pembelajaran, penggunaan media pembelajaran atau sumber belajar.  Walaupun tidak semua guru yang sudah tersertifikasi dapat melakukan kegiatan mengintegrasikan ICT tersebut dalam rencana pelaksanaan pembelajaran dikarenakan faktor usia yang mereka sebutkan gaptek (gagap teknologi).
title: Guru Profesional:  Mengintegrasikan Informations And Communication Technologies (ICT) dalam Pembelajaran PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: professional teachers integrate information and communication technologies ict in early childhood education learning not only because of the pandemic, ICT-based learning, information and communication technologies are used by teachers in the learning process but it is a necessity that must be carried out during the learning period of the 21st century. The purpose of the study is to obtain information on how professional teachers in the learning process can integrate ICT into the components of learning steps in the RPP, the learning implementation plan, the type of research used in this study is descriptive qualitative. Data collection was carried out using interview and documentation techniques to be observed. Interviews were conducted with certified early childhood education teachers, showing that professional teachers integrate ICT into the RPP components contained in the formulation of learning objectives, the use of learning media or learning resources, although not all certified teachers can carry out activities to integrate ICT into the learning implementation plan due to the age factor they mention, gaptek galah teknologi

desc: Permainan Simpai pada dunia internasional dikenal dengan nama Hulahoop. Permainan tersebut mulai tidak dikenal anak-anak pada jaman sekarang karena adanya game online. Namun, guru di Taman Kanak-kanak Citra Indonesia justru menggunakan permainan Simpai dan mengembangkan model atau prosedur penggunaannya dalam proses belajar. Oleh sebab itu, tulisan ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis alasan guru mengembangkan permainan Simpai, model permainan Simpai yang dikembangkan, dan kecerdasan majemuk anak setelah bermain Simpai. Penelitian pada tulisan ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan yaitu: wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Berdasarkan penelitian ini, ditemukan bahwa (1) alasan guru mengembangkan permainan Simpai, yaitu: menyediakan permainan yang sesuai dengan perkembangan anak, dan mengurangi kecanduan permainan online atau handphone pada anak., (2) guru mengembangkan model permainan Simpai dalam tiga level permainan, dan (3) sembilan kecerdasan anak berkembang setelah bermain Simpai, yaitu: linguistik, logis-matematis, visual-spasial, kinestetik, musikal, interpersonal, intrapersonal, naturalis, dan eksistensial
title: Pengembangan Permainan Simpai: Stimulasi Kecerdasan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of hoop games to stimulate early childhood intelligence hoop games in the international world are known as hula hoops, these games are starting to be unknown to children today because of online games, but teachers at Citra Indonesia kindergartens actually use hoop games and develop models or procedures for their use in the learning process, therefore this paper aims to analyze the reasons teachers develop hoop games, the hoop game model that is developed and children's multiple intelligences after playing hoops, the research in this paper uses a qualitative case study approach, the data collection technique used is interviews, observations and documentation, based on this research it was found that the reasons teachers develop hoop games are to provide games that are in accordance with children's development and reduce addiction to online games or cellphones in children, teachers develop hoop game models in three levels of play and nine children's intelligences develop after playing hoops, namely linguistic, logical, mathematical, visual, spatial, kinesthetic, musical, interpersonal, intrapersonal, naturalist and existential

desc: Pendidikan anak usia dini dilakukan melalui pemberian pengalaman, rangsangan, serta menyediakan lingkungan yang kondusif. Salah satu lingkungan belajar adalah Ruang Publik Terpadu Ramah Anak (RPTRA) yang memiliki karakteristik sebagai taman terbuka publik, wahana permainan dan tumbuh kembang anak, ruang terbuka hijau, serta sarana kegiatan sosial dilengkapi berbagai permainan menarik. RPTRA di Kota Denpasar yaitu Taman Lalu Lintas dan Taman Janggan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisa peran RPTRA sebagai lingkungan belajar bagi anak usia dini, pemanfaatan RPTRA bagi nilai perkembangan anak usia dini, serta model pembelajaran di luar kelas. Penelitian ini termasuk penelitian deskriptif menggunakan teknik oberservasi, wawancara, dan studi dokumen. Hasil penelitian ini adalah Taman Lalu Lintas dan Taman Janggan memberikan tempat bermain sambil belajar (edurecreation). Nilai edukasi di kedua taman antara lain perkembangan kognitif, fisik motorik, sosial budaya, emosional, dan intelektual. Sekolah TK/ PAUD memanfaatkan kedua taman untuk kegiatan pembelajaran di luar kelas sebagai salah satu model pembelajaran.
title: Peran Ruang Publik Terpadu Ramah Anak Bagi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of integrated child-friendly public spaces for early childhood education for early childhood is carried out through providing stimulating experiences and providing a conducive environment. One of the learning environments is an integrated child-friendly public space, RPTRA, which has characteristics as a public open park, a place for children to play and develop, a green open space and a means of social activities equipped with various interesting games. RPTRA in Denpasar City, namely the traffic park and janggan park. This study aims to analyze the role of RPTRA as a learning environment for early childhood. The use of RPTRA for early childhood development values ​​and learning models outside the classroom. This study includes descriptive research using observation techniques, interviews and document studies. The results of this study are that the traffic park and janggan park provide a place to play while learning. Edurecreation. Educational values ​​in both parks include cognitive, physical, motor, social, cultural, emotional and intellectual development. Kindergartens and kindergartens use both parks for learning activities outside the classroom as one of the learning models.

desc: Setiap anak mendapatkan pola asuh yang berbeda sesuai dengan posisinya dalam keluarga baik sebagai anak sulung, tengah maupun bungsu. Hal ini akan berpengaruh terhadap karakter anak dimasa yang akan datang. Penelitian yang sebelumnya dilakukan kebanyakan hanya membahas tentang karakter anak berdasarkan urutan kelahiranya. Penelitian ini bertujuan menjelaskan pola asuh yang diterapkan orang tua  kepada anak berdasarkan urutan kelahiran (anak sulung, anak tengah, dan anak bungsu). Metode yang digunakan adalah studi kasus dengan pendekatan kualitatif dengan objek penelitian ibu dan ayah serta 3 orang anak yang berusia di bawah 8 tahun. Data dikumpulkan menggunakan teknik observasi dan wawancara. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan beberapa perbedaan kedekatan dan perlakuan anak dalam proses pengasuhan. Anak sulung cenderung lebih dekat dengan ayahnya, dituntut untuk disiplin dalam melaksanakan tugas di rumah serta memiliki karakter yang lebih dominan dibandingkan adiknya. Anak tengah merupakan anak yang mandiri , periang, serta lebih sering didukung untuk mengerjakan tugasnya sendiri. Sedangkan anak bungsu merupakan anak yang aktif dan manja. Perbedaan pola asuh ini dipengaruhi oleh kebutuhan anak yang berbeda berdasarkan usianya terutama terkait dengan kewajiban belajarnya di sekolah. Sebaiknya diperlukan kerjasama yang baik antara orang tua  dan pihak sekolah dalam proses pengasuhan anak
title: Pola Pengasuhan Bagi Anak Berdasarkan Urutan Kelahiran
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parenting patterns for children based on birth order each child gets a different parenting pattern according to their position in the family, either as the eldest, middle or youngest child, this will affect the child's character in the future, previous research mostly only discusses the character of children based on their birth order, this study aims to explain the parenting patterns applied by parents to children based on the birth order of the eldest child, middle child and youngest child, the method used is a case study with a qualitative approach with the object of research being mothers and fathers and children under the age of 18 years, data was collected using observation and interview techniques, the results of the study showed several differences in the closeness and treatment of children in the parenting process, the eldest child tends to be closer to his father, is required to be disciplined in carrying out tasks at home and has a more dominant character compared to his younger sibling, the middle child is an independent, cheerful child and is more often supported to do his own homework, while the youngest child is an active and spoiled child, these differences in parenting patterns are influenced by the different needs of children based on their age, especially related to their learning obligations at school, good cooperation between parents and the school in the childcare process

desc: This study aims to describe the effects of self-directed learning skills on self-care for organs of the body among five-year-old children in the kindergartens of Kubu Raya District, West Kalimantan. The methods used in this study were qualitative and quantitative research methods. The results of this study showed that the respondents were able to diagnose learning needs with good criteria, had not been able to formulate learning objectives independently, were able to identify learning resources with good criteria, were able to choose and apply appropriate learning strategies, and were happy to evaluate their learning outcomes with the very good criteria. In the aspect of self-care for organs, the students had knowledge about the organs and understood how to maintain with good criteria. The students had used their time to care for organs, had not been able to describe the functions of organs, and were able to analyze knowledge about personal health with very good criteria. The results of the analysis indicates that self-directed learning affected self-care for organs of the body. It is recommended for teachers and parents to teach the human body recognition not only having an accessory but more emphasis on practice in daily life
title: Effect of Students Self-Directed Learning to Self-Care in Organs of Human Body Lesson on Daily Life
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: effect of students self-directed learning to self-care in organs of the human body lesson on daily life this study aims to describe the effects of self-directed learning skills on self-care for organs of the body among five-year-old children in the kindergartens of Kubu Raya district West Kalimantan the methods used in this study were qualitative and quantitative research methods the results of this study showed that the respondents were able to diagnose learning needs with good criteria had not been able to formulate learning objectives independently were able to identify learning resources with good criteria were able to choose and apply appropriate learning strategies and were happy to evaluate their learning outcomes with the very good criteria in the aspect of self care for organs the students had knowledge about the organs and understood how to maintain with good criteria the students had used their time to care for organs had not been able to describe the functions of organs and were able to analyze knowledge about personal health with very good criteria the results of the analysis indicate that self-directed learning affected self-care for organs of the body it is recommended for teachers and parents to teach the human body recognition not only having an accessory but more emphasis on practice in daily life

desc: Strategi pembelajaran adalah hal yang penting dalam melaksanakan kegiatan belajar mengajar. Beberapa sekolah TK di daerah Ngajum Kabupaten Malang, mengalami permasalahan dalam hal pembelajaran fisik motorik. Kemampuan motorik kasar berkembang tidak sesuai dengan pertambahan usianya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui efektivitas permainan bola basket modifikasi terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Jenis penelitian ini adalah Quasi Eksperimental dengan desain penelitian Nonequivalent Control Group Design. Penelitian ini dilakukan di RA Diponegoro dan TK Al-Huda pada anak kelompok B. Pengambilan sampel dalam penelitian ini dilakukan secara acak (random sampling). Data yang diperoleh dikumpulkan dengan menggunakan metode observasi dan dokumentasi, kemudian dianalisis menggunakan analisis statistik dengan uji Anova. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa permainan bola basket modifikasi berpengaruh terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian di atas, dapat disimpulkan bahwa efektivitas permainan bola basket modifikasi berpengaruh secara signifikan terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun
title: Efektivitas Permainan Bola Basket Modifikasi terhadap Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia 5- 6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of modified basketball games on gross motor skills of children aged years learning strategies are important in implementing teaching and learning activities several kindergartens in the Ngajum area of ​​Malang Regency experience problems in terms of physical motor learning gross motor skills do not develop in accordance with their age this study aims to determine the effectiveness of modified basketball games on gross motor skills of children aged years this type of research is quasi experimental with a nonequivalent control group design this study was conducted at RA Diponegoro and TK Alhuda in children in group B sampling in this study was carried out randomly random sampling the data obtained were collected using observation and documentation methods then analyzed using statistical analysis with the ANOVA test the results of the study showed that modified basketball games had an effect on gross motor skills of children aged years based on the results of the study above it can be concluded that the effectiveness of modified basketball games had a significant effect on gross motor skills of children aged years

desc: Dalam masa perkembangannya anak usia dini memiliki aspek perkembangan yang berkaitan antara  satu dengan yang lainnya dimana apabila terdapat salah satu aspek yang bermasalah maka akan mempengaruhi aspek yang lain. Hal ini yang terjadi apabila anak menderita obesitas dalam jangka waktu yang lama maka akan mempengaruhi perkembangan fisik motorik anak tersebut. Tujuan dilakukan studi literature ini untuk mengetahui kemampuan fisik motorik pada anak obesitas. Metode yang digunakan yaitu studi literature dengan dua puluh artikel, berdasarkan dari tinjauan pustaka ini mendapatkan hasil kesimpulan berupa obesitas masih menjadi momok yang menakutkan bagi anak-anak dan obesitas ini dapat terjadi pada siapa saja tanpa memandang umur dengan melihat fakta yang terjadi pada beberapa tahun terakhir yaitu obesitas yang terjadi pada anak-anak menunjukan penyimpangan pada fisik motorik terutama motorik kasar berupa kelainan tonus otot, mudah merasa capek, gerak menjadi tidak fleksibel, terhambat ketika ingin bangun dari duduk.
title: Kemampuan Fisik Motorik Anak Usia Dini dengan Masalah Obesitas
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood physical motor skills with obesity problems in their development, early childhood has developmental aspects that are related to each other where if there is one aspect that is problematic, it will affect other aspects. This is what happens if a child suffers from obesity for a long time, it will affect the child's physical motor development. The purpose of this literature study is to determine the physical motor skills of obese children. The method used is a literature study with twenty articles based on this literature review. The conclusion is that obesity is still a frightening specter for children and obesity can happen to anyone regardless of age. By looking at the facts that have occurred in the last few years, obesity in children shows deviations in physical motor skills, especially gross motor skills, in the form of muscle tone disorders, easy to get tired, movement becomes inflexible, inhibited when wanting to get up from sitting.

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengidentifikasi pola asuh pada anak usia 4-8 tahun di kota Pontianak. Pendekatan penelitian ini adalah pendekatan deskriptif dengan jenis penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif. Sampel yang diteliti adalah 90 responden yang memiliki anak berusa 4-8 tahun yang ada di sekitar kota Pontianak. Data penelitian tersebut dikumpulkan dengan menggunakan angket yang di sebar secara online atau biasa di sebut google form. Hasil penelitian adalah dari 90 responden yang tersebar di kota Pontianak yang menerapkan pola asuh demokratis adalah sebesar 88,80% atau sekitar 80 responden yang menggunakan pola asuh demokratis, sedangkan pola asuh otoriter ada 4,44% atau sebanyak 4 responden dan untuk pola asuh permisif ada 4,44% atau sebanyak 6 responden. Hasil tersebut di dapat dari membandingkan ke tiga jenis pola asuh tersebut mana yang lebih dominan untuk gaya pengasuhannya. Dapat di simpulkan bahwa dari 90 responden 80 orang tua menerapkan pola asuh demokratis dalam pola asuh di Kota Pontianak.
title: Identifikasi Pola Asuh di Kota Pontianak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: identification of parenting patterns in pontianak city the purpose of this study is to identify parenting patterns in children aged years in pontianak city the approach of this study is a descriptive approach with a type of quantitative descriptive research the sample studied were respondents who had children aged years who were around pontianak city the research data was collected using a questionnaire distributed online or commonly called google form the results of the study are from respondents spread across pontianak city who apply democratic parenting patterns are as many as or around respondents who use democratic parenting patterns while authoritarian parenting patterns there are or as many as respondents and for permissive parenting patterns there are or as many as respondents the results are obtained from comparing the three types of parenting patterns which are more dominant for their parenting style it can be concluded that from the respondents parents apply democratic parenting patterns in parenting patterns in pontianak city

desc: Penelitian  ini  bertujuan  untuk  meningkatkan  kemampuan  klasifikasi melalui media benda konkret pada anak kelompok A1 di TK Cahaya Kembar Bangkinang Kabupaten Kampar. Kemampuan klasifikasi pada penelitian ini difokuskan pada kemampuan klasifikasi 1-2 atribut. Jenis penelitian ini adalah penelitian tindakan kelas (Classroom Action Research) yang dilakukan secara kolaborasi.
