Subjek penelitian ini adalah anak kelompok A1 yang berjumlah 19 anak yang terdiri dari sebelas perempuan dan delapan  laki-laki.  Objek  dalam  penelitian  ini  adalah  kemampuan  klasifikasi melalui media benda konkret. Metode pengumpulan data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah observasi dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kemampuan klasifikasi pada anak kelompok A1 meningkat melalui media benda konkret. Benda konkret yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah benda asli yang bukan makhluk hidup. Dengan benda konkret tersebut kemampuan klasifikasi anak dapat meningkat. Data peningkatan ini diperoleh dari lembar observasi (satu atribut  dua atribut) dan dokumentasi (LKA satu atribut dan dua atribut). Hal ini dapat diketahui dari adanya peningkatan kemampuan klasifikasi anak dari pratindakan, siklus I, dan siklus II. Berikut uraian hasil peningkatan kemampuan klasifikasi pada anak kelompok A1, yaitu dengan lembar observasi satu atribut   dari 52% meningkat pada siklus I menjadi 89%, sedangkan lembar observasi dua atribut dari 50% meningkat pada siklus II menjadi 87%. Pada aktivitas hasil, persentase rata-rata kemampuan anak   LKA satu atribut, yaitu dari 48% meningkat pada siklus I menjadi 83%, sedangkan LKA dua atribut menunjukkan peningkatan dari 45% pada siklus II menjadi 83% telah memenuhi target indikator keberhasilan, yaitu ≥ 80%. Hasil penelitian tersebut membuktikan bahwa benda konkret memiliki pengaruh besar dalam pembelajaran klasifikasi pada anak kelompok A1 di TK Cahaya Kembar Bangkinang Kabupaten Kampar
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Klasifikasi Melalui Media  Benda Konkret pada Anak Kelompok A1 di TK Cahaya Kembar Bangkinang Kampar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving classification ability through concrete object media in group a children in cahaya berkembar bangkinang kampar kindergarten this study aims to improve classification ability desc: Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk melihat keadaan perkembangan kemandirian anak usia dini pada masa pandemi covid-19 yang sedang terjadi. Peneliti menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode studi kasus untuk memperoleh pemahaman bagaimana situasi pembiasaan dalam kemandirian anak yang terjadi pada saat pandemi covid-19 terjadi. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan wawancara dan dokumentasi. Keabsahan data pada penelitian menggunakan triangulasi dan kecukupan referensial. Teknik analisis penelitian menggunakan model Milles dan Huberman. Data penelitian yang telah terkumpul dianalisis dengan langkah seperti reduksi data, display data, kesimpulan atau verifikasi. Hasil yang didapatkan pada penelitian menunjukkan bahwa dukungan yang diberikan orang tua, keluarga dan guru dalam memberikan anak stimulasi yang tepat merupakan peran yang sangat penting pada perkembangan kemandirian anak pada masa pandemi covid-19. Melalui kegiatan sehari-hari yang biasa dilakukan anak di rumah merupakan kegiatan yang menstimulasi perkembangan kemandirian anak
title: Kemandirian Anak Usia Dini di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood independence during the covid pandemic This study was conducted to see the state of the development of early childhood independence during the ongoing covid pandemic. The researcher used a qualitative approach with a case study method to gain an understanding of the situation of habituation in children's independence that occurred during the covid pandemic. Data collection techniques used interviews and documentation. The validity of the data in the study used triangulation and referential adequacy. The research analysis technique used the milles and huberman models. The research data that had been collected was analyzed using steps such as data reduction, data display, conclusions or verification. The results obtained in the study showed that the support provided by parents, families and teachers in providing children with the right stimulation is a very important role in the development of children's independence during the covid pandemic through daily activities that children usually do at home are activities that stimulate the development of children's independence.

desc: Tujuan dalam penelitian ini ialah untuk mengetahui sebuah efektivitas metode critical tingking terhadap keterampilan membaca dan menulis bahasa Indonesia awal terhadap siswa sekolah dasar kelas awal. Dalam penelitian ini dipergunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif deksriptif, yakni berfokus terhadap pengumpulan data melalui wawancara langsung dengan informan. Metode perolehan data pada studi ini yakni melalui sebuah observasi, wawancara serta dokumentasi (triangulasi). Analisis yang dilakukan pada studi ini terdiri dari pengumpulan data, reduksi data, triangulasi data, dan penyajian data kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian  bahwa dalam proses pembelajaran yang dilaksanakan dengan menggunakan metode critical tinking dalam kemampuan membaca dan menulis permulaan sekolah dasar kelas awal cukup efektif dengan terlihatnya siswa lebih aktif untuk membaca dan menulis kata yang biasa di ucap dalam kesehariannya
title: Efektifitas Metode Critical Thinking dalam Kemampuan Membaca dan Menulis Permulaan (MMP)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of the critical thinking method in the ability to read and write early mmp The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of the critical thinking method on the skills of reading and writing Indonesian language early on elementary school students in this study used a descriptive qualitative descriptive method that focuses on collecting data through direct interviews with informants The method of obtaining data in this study is through observation, interviews and documentation, triangulation, analysis carried out in this study consists of data collection, data reduction, data triangulation and data presentation. The conclusion of the research results is that in the learning process carried out using the critical thinking method in the ability to read and write early elementary school students in early grades is quite effective with the students being seen to be more active in reading and writing words that are usually spoken in their daily lives

desc: Perkembangan karakter religius anak dipengaruhi berbagai faktor, seperti: perhatian orang tua, budaya sekolah, dan pergaulan teman sebaya. Tujuan penelitian untuk menganalisis pengaruh perhatian orang tua, budaya sekolah, dan pergaulan teman sebaya terhadap karakter religius anak. Pendekatan penelitian menggunakan penelitian kuantitatif. Jumlah sampel penelitian 267 orang tua anak di 28 TK di Kecamatan Ceper Klaten tahun pelajaran 2021/2022. Teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan proportional random sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan angket dan studi pustaka (dokumentasi). Teknik analisis data menggunakan regresi linier berganda. Hasil penelitian menyimpulkan: (1) secara parsial perhatian orang tua, budaya sekolah, dan pergaulan teman sebaya memiliki pengaruh positif dan signifikan terhadap karakter religius anak; (2) secara simultan perhatian orang tua, budaya sekolah, dan pergaulan teman sebaya memiliki kontribusi sebesar 58,2% mempengaruhi karakter religius anak. Oleh karena itu, keberhasilan pembentukan karakter religius anak, perlu dilakukan secara terpadu dengan melibatkan tripusat pendidikan, yaitu: keluarga, sekolah, dan masyarakat.
title: Pengaruh Perhatian Orang tua, Budaya Sekolah, dan Teman Sebaya Terhadap Karakter Religius Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of parental attention, school culture and peers on children's religious character. The development of children's religious character is influenced by various factors such as parental attention, school culture and peer relationships. The purpose of this study was to analyze the influence of parental attention, school culture and peer relationships on children's religious character. The research approach used quantitative research. The number of research samples was parents of children in kindergarten in Ceper District, Klaten, in the academic year. The sampling technique used proportional random sampling. The data collection technique used questionnaires and literature studies. The data analysis technique used multiple linear regression. The results of this study concluded that partially parental attention, school culture and peer relationships have a positive and significant influence on children's religious character. Simultaneously, parental attention, school culture and peer relationships have a contribution of 100% to influencing children's religious character. Therefore, the success of forming children's religious character needs to be carried out in an integrated manner by involving three educational centers, namely the family, school and community.

desc: Tujuan penelitian secara umum adalah untuk memahami secara mendalam dan mendeskripsikan pembentukan karakter dalam pendidikan makan di Lembaga PAUD Istiqlal Jakarta Pusat. Objek penelitian ini adalah anak yang berada pada rentang usia 4-6 tahun. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode penelitian kualitatif studi kasus. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini menggunakan tiga komponen model Miles dan Huberman, yaitu: 1) data condensation, 2) data display and 3) conclusion drawing/verification. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa pendidikan karakter makan ditentukan tidak hanya oleh peran Guru seperti peran guru pada pembentukan karakter dalam kegiatan makan diantaranya: 1) Guru sebagai tauladan atau modelling. 2) guru sebagai pengamat atau observer, 3) guru sebagai pendukung, 4) guru sebagai fasilitator, 5) guru sebagai evaluator, tetapi peran orangtua seperti 1) memberi tauladan kepada anak-anak tentang bagaimana sikap makan yang tepat, seperti mengambil makanan sesuai kebutuhan dan bertanggungjawab menghabiskan makanan yang telah diambil. 2) memberi contoh dalam perilaku sosial saat makan dalam kelompok atau keluarga, sehingga anak-anak memperoleh pembelajaran penting tentang sikap sosial seperti: berkomunikasi efektif dengan setiap anggota keluarga. Dapat disimpulkan bahwa kedua peran tersebut akan dapat membentuk karakter yang sangat baik untuk anak  anak dan proses tersebut akan tertanam dalam jangka panjang
title: Pembentukan Karakter dalam Pendidikan Makan  (Studi Kasus di Raudhatul Athfal Istiqlal Jakarta)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: character formation in eating education case study in raudhatul athfal istiqlal jakarta the general purpose of the study is to understand in depth and describe character formation in eating education at the paud istiqlal central jakarta institution the object of this study is children in the age range of years the method used in this study is a qualitative research method case study the data analysis technique used in this study uses three components of the miles and huberman model, namely data condensation data display and conclusion drawing verification the results of the study show that eating character education is determined not only by the role of teachers such as the role of teachers in character formation in eating activities including teachers as role models or modeling teachers as observers or observers teachers as supporters teachers as facilitators teachers as evaluators but the role of parents such as giving examples to children about how to eat properly such as taking food according to needs and being responsible for finishing the food that has been taken giving examples of social behavior when eating in groups or families so that children get important learning about social attitudes such as communicating effectively with each family member it can be concluded that both roles will be able to form a very good character for children and the process will be embedded in the long term

desc: Keluarga menjadi salah satu wadah terpenting untuk tumbuh kembang anak. Keluarga harus mampu menjalankan perannya secara optimal untuk memberikan lingkungan dan pendidikan yang terbaik untuk anak. Hal tersebut dilakukan agar anak mampu mengaktualkan dirinya dengan baik salah satunya cara berperilaku ataupun akhlaknya. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui bagaimana perkembangan perilaku atau akhlak anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Data dikumpulkan wawancara dan observasi terhadap 20 orang responden. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa anak-anak mengalami perkembangan yang signifikan pada perilaku atau akhlaknya seperti: anak-anak melibatkan diri dalam acara kegamaan dengan senang hati, selalu berperilaku positif sesuai ajaran Islam, mempunyai kepekaan terhadap lingkungan dan sosialnya, dan mengalami perkembangan secara kognitif
title: Peranan Keluarga dalam  Pembinaan Akhlak Anak Usia Prasekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of the family in fostering the morals of preschool children. The family is one of the most important places for the growth and development of children. The family must be able to carry out its role optimally to provide the best environment and education for children. This is done so that children are able to actualize themselves well, one of which is how to behave or their morals. The purpose of this study is to find out how the development of the behavior or morals of early childhood children. The method used in this study is descriptive qualitative. Data was collected through interviews and observations of respondents. The results of the study showed that children experienced significant development in their behavior or morals, such as children happily involving themselves in religious events, always behaving positively according to Islamic teachings, having sensitivity to their environment and society, and experiencing cognitive development.

desc: The purpose of this study is to examine the impact of the academic press and student teacher relations on emotional adjustment in children aged 7-8 years. This study used a survey method with 132 respondents in East Jakarta, selected using stratified multistage cluster random sampling. Data collection uses three research instruments in the form of scales 1-3 which is adapted and developed from research indicators using student academic survey press with reliability values (α = .465), short version Student Teacher Relationship Scale (α = .599), and School Liking and Avoidance Questionnaire (α = .715). The results showed that 1) academic press did not had a direct negative effect on emotional adjustment, 2) teacher-student relations had a direct positive effect on emotional adjustment, and 3) academic press and teacher relations simultaneously had a positive effect on emotional adjustment which explained indirect effect of the academic press on emotional adjustment through student teacher relations as a mediator. This indirect influence illustrates that in a state of high positive relations, the academic press's role that the teacher seeks is understood by students as a way for teachers to improve achievement and emotional adjustment. In addition, the positive effect was increasing greater when academic press related together with the teacher-student relationship compared to the partial effect of student relations on emotional adjustment. This greater effect requires a ranking of the partial correlation of the teacher-student relation which is above or greater than the ranking of the partial academic press only.
title: The Impact of Academic Press and Student Teacher Relationship on Childrens Emotional Adjustment
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the impact of academic press and student teacher relationships on children's emotional adjustment the purpose of this study is to examine the impact of the academic press and student teacher relationships on emotional adjustment in children aged years using stratified multistage cluster random sampling data collection uses three research instruments in the form of scales which is adapted and developed from research indicators using student academic survey press with reliability values ​​α short version student teacher relationship scale α and school liking and avoidance questionnaire α the results showed that academic press did not have a direct negative impact effect on emotional adjustment teacherstudent relations had a direct positive effect on emotional adjustment and academic press and teacher relations simultaneously had a positive effect on emotional adjustment which explained indirect effect of the academic press on emotional adjustment through student teacher relations as a mediator this indirect influence illustrates that in a state of high positive relations the academic press's role that the teacher seeks is understood by students as a way for teachers to improve achievement and emotional adjustment in addition the positive effect was increasing greater when academic press related together with the teacher student relationship compared to the partial effect of student relations on emotional adjustment greater effect requires a ranking of the partial correlation of the teacher student relationship which is above or greater than the ranking of the partial academic press only

desc: Sosial emosional sangat dibutuhkan agar anak mampu berinteraksi dengan lingkungannya. Observasi di TKIT Nurul Ilmi ditemukan bahwa sosial emosional anak usia 5-6 tahun belum berkembang. Untuk mengembangkan sosial emosional anak diperlukan model pembelajaran yang menyenangkan seperti model pembelajaran bank street dan sentra. Oleh karena itu penelitian bertujuan untuk mengetahui: (1) pengaruh model pembelajaran bank street terhadap sosial emosional; (2) pengaruh model pembelajaran sentra terhadap sosial emosioal; dan (3) perbedaan pengaruh model pembelajaran bank street dan sentra terhadap sosial emosional. Metode penelitian yang digunakan yaitu Quasi Experimental Design dengan sampel sebanyak 38 orang. Instrumen yang digunakan yaitu tes gambar. Teknik analisis data menggunakan uji-t. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat perbedaan pengaruh model pembelajaran bank street dan sentra terhadap sosial emosional anak. Dengan menggunakan bank street, anak lebih aktif, kreatif, tercipta interaksi eduakatif, menumbuhkan rasa ingin tahu, dan mendapat respon positif dari anak.
title: Model Pembelajaran Bank Street dan Sentra, serta Pengaruhnya terhadap Sosial Emosional Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Bank Street and Center learning models and their influence on children's social emotions Social emotions are very much needed so that children are able to interact with their environment. Observations at Nurul Ilmi Kindergarten found that children's social emotions aged 18-24 years have not developed. To develop children's social emotions, a fun learning model is needed, such as the Bank Street and Center learning model. Therefore, the study aims to determine the influence of the Bank Street learning model on social emotions. The influence of the Center learning model on social emotions and the difference in the influence of the Bank Street and Center learning models on social emotions. The research method used was a quasi-experimental design with a sample of 1,000 people. The instrument used was a picture test. Data analysis techniques used the t-test. The results of the study showed that there was a difference in the influence of the Bank Street and Center learning models on children's social emotions. By using Bank Street, children were more active and creative. Educational interactions were created, fostering curiosity and getting a positive response from children.

desc: Proses pengembangan diri anak harus mendapat perhatian khusus untuk dikembangkan. Salah satunya perkembangan motorik halus anak. Penelitian ini mendeskripsikan kemampuan motorik halus pada anak usia dini melalui kegiatan mozaik. Melalui metode deskriptif kualitatif peneliti ingin menganalisis secara induktif tentang dilakukan motorik halus pada anak usia dini dilakukan melalui observasi, dokumentasi, dan wawancara untuk menemukan temuan akhir hasil penelitian yang bermakna. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa setelah dilakukan tiga rangkaian kegiatan mozaik, secara bertahap keseluruhan anak usia dini mampu menggunakan jari jemarinya dengan terampil. Intruksi kognitif anak mampu direfleksikan melalui fungsi jari jemari anak, yang menunjukkan peningkatan motorik halus. Peningkatan motorik halus juga ditunjukkan pada kemampuan otot-otot kecil yang mampu menggerak dan mengolah benda-benda kecil. Meskipun, jari jemari yang paling meningkat adalah ibu jari, jari telunjuk dan jari tengah
title: Memfungsikan Jari Jemari melalui Kegiatan Mozaik sebagai Upaya Peningkatan Motorik Halus Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Functioning fingers through mosaic activities as an effort to improve fine motor skills in early childhood. The process of self-development of children must receive special attention to be developed, one of which is the development of children's fine motor skills. This study describes fine motor skills in early childhood through mosaic activities using qualitative descriptive methods. The researcher wants to analyze inductively about the fine motor skills in early childhood. This is done through observation, documentation and interviews to find meaningful final findings. The results of the study show that after three series of mosaic activities were carried out in stages, all early childhood children were able to use their fingers skillfully. Children's cognitive instructions can be reflected through the function of children's fingers which show an increase in fine motor skills. The increase in fine motor skills is also shown in the ability of small muscles that are able to move and process small objects, although the fingers that have increased the most are the thumb, index finger and middle finger.

desc: One of the characteristics of early childhood is to have a strong sense of enthusiasm and curiosity towards many things around it. Curiosity can be raised using the media. Media is a means of learning that can bring the interest of students to learn because the media is everything that can be used to channel the message, stimulate the mind, attention, and willingness of students to be involved in the learning process. The series image media has a sequence of images that can stimulate the child's mind to speak and produce a continuous story. The purpose of the study explains the media of this series can increase the students' interest to speak so that the ability to speak early child is increasing. The research method used in this study is literature review is a series of activities related to the method of collecting data library, reading and recording and managing research materials. Research results obtained by using a series of drawing media can develop the potential for child speech development and increase vocabulary mastery.
title: Penggunaan Media Gambar Seri Untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Berbicara Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the use of picture series media to improve the speaking skills of early childhood one of the characteristics of early childhood is to have a strong sense of enthusiasm and curiosity towards many things around it curiosity can be raised using the media media is a means of learning that can bring the interest of students to learn because the media is everything that can be used to channel the message stimulate the mind attention and willingness of students to be involved in the learning process the series image media has a sequence of images that can stimulate the child's mind to speak and produce a continuous story the purpose of the study explains the media of this series can increase the students' interest in speaking so that the ability to speak early childhood is increasing the research method used in this study is literature review is a series of activities related to the method of collecting data library reading and recording and managing research materials research results obtained by using a series of drawing media can develop the potential for child speech development and increase vocabulary mastery

desc: Terpenuhinya sarana dan prasarana pada lembaga taman penitipan anak (TPA) yang memadai dan berkualitas berpengaruh pada tumbuh kembang anak usia dini. Fokus penelitian ini mengkaji proses manajemen sarana dan prasarana yang meliputi perencanaan (planning), pengoranisasian (organizing), pelaksanaan (actuating) dan pengawasan (controlling) (POAC) di TPA Pinggungan Sebuai dan TPA Cut Muthia. Metode penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan desain penelitian studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan teknik wawancara, observasi dan dokumentasi. Analisis data dengan cara reduksi data, penyajian data dan penarikan kesimpulan sedangkan pengecekkan keabsahan data menggunakan triangulasi. Hasil analisis terkait kegiatan manajemen POAC di TPA Pinggungan Sebuai dan TPA Cut Muthia dilakukan dengan mengikuti setiap prosedur manajemen POAC dan secara umum sudah dilaksanakan dengan baik. Oleh karena itu, dengan meningkatkan kembali manajemen sarana dan prasarana melalui kegiatan manajemen yang tepat pada taman penitipan anak menjadi salah satu sumber daya yang penting dalam menunjang proses tumbuh kembang anak usia dini.
title: Manajemen Sarana dan Prasarana Taman Penitipan Anak di Lampung
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of facilities and infrastructure of child care parks in lampung the fulfillment of adequate and quality facilities and infrastructure at child care park institutions has an impact on the growth and development of early childhood the focus of this study examines the process of facility and infrastructure management which includes planning planning organizing organizing implementation actuating and supervision controlling poac at tpa pinggungan sebuai and tpa cut muthia this research method uses a qualitative approach with a case study research design data collection techniques using interview techniques observation and documentation data analysis by means of data reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions while checking the validity of the data using triangulation of analysis results related to poac management activities at tpa pinggungan sebuai and tpa cut muthia is carried out by following each poac management procedure and in general has been implemented well therefore by improving the management of facilities and infrastructure through appropriate management activities at child care parks is one of the important resources in supporting the growth and development process of early childhood

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan bagaimana fonologi, sintaksis, dan semantik diakuisisi atau diperoleh oleh anak yang berusia antara 3-5 tahun di Rawamangun, Jakarta Timur selama 10 (sepuluh) bulan pada bulan Desember 2018, Maret-Juli 2019 dan Januari-Mei 2020. Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan menggunakan metode kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus pada seorang anak perempuan berusia 3 tahun 5 bulan bernama Nur Amalia Rachmawaty “LIA”. Data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini dikumpulkan melalui observasi langsung dan wawancara yang mendalam. Temuan penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Lia menguasai vokal lengkap, yang terdiri dari huruf (a), I (u), (e), dan (o) yang diucapkan dengan jelas. Lia juga mahir merangkai beberapa kata untuk membentuk sebuah pernyataan. Namun, masih ada beberapa kesalahan di mana arti kata berbeda dari apa yang sebenarnya dimaksudkan, terlepas dari perkembangan semantik yang diperoleh Lia. Contoh untuk fonem konsonan /t/ Lia tidol mandi; /j/ Mbah jajan beli; /c/ tatak Uban macak-macak dulu ayo main? Kata-kata pada kalimat di atas merupakan kata-kata yang diucapkan oleh seorang anak yang belum menguasai bahasa Indonesia sepenuhnya, sehingga menggunakan kata-kata yang salah.
title: Pemerolehan Fonologis, Sintaksis dan Semantik Anak Usia 3-5 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: acquisition of phonological syntax and semantics of children aged years the purpose of this study was to describe how phonological syntax and semantics are acquired or obtained by children aged between years in Rawamangun, East Jakarta for ten months in December, March, July and January, May this study was conducted using a qualitative method with a case study approach on a girl aged years months named Nur Amalia Rachmawaty Lia the data used in this study were collected through direct observation and in-depth interviews the findings of the study showed that Lia mastered complete vowels consisting of the letters a i u e and o which were pronounced clearly Lia was also good at stringing together several words to form a statement but there were still some mistakes where the meaning of the word was different from what was actually intended regardless of the semantic development obtained by Lia for example for the consonant phoneme t lia tidol mandi j mbah jajan beli c tatak uban macakmacak dulu ayo main the words in the sentence above are words spoken by a child who has not fully mastered Indonesian so that he uses the wrong words

desc: Pembentukan karakter anak diawali sejak dini ataupun sejak dalam kandungan. Adanya beberapa faktor yang bisa menciptakan karakter anak, misalnya yaitu orang tua yang seringkali menghabiskan waktunya dengan anak. Penelitian bertujuan memahami peranan orang tua tua sebagai pembimbing, motivator, dan fasilitator dalam mengembangkan karakter kemandirian. Metode yang dipergunakan penulis merupakan kualitatif memakai pendekatan  field research. Teknik yang  dipergunakan pada penelitian merupakan wawancara, dokumentasi, observasi. Teknis analisis data yang digunakan ialah triangulasi model interaktif meliputi reduksi, menyajikan data, menarik kesimpulan. Penelitian dilaksanakan di TK Aba Thoyibah Surakarta. Hasil penelitian membuktikan dalam mengembangkan kemandirian peranan orang tua selaku pembimbing yaitu menjalin komunikasi yang positif dengan anak  salah satunya dengan cara memberikan nasehat. Peran orang tua sebagai motivator yaitu dengan memberikan penghargaan, atas hasil pencapaian anak. Peranan orang tua menjadi fasilitator yakni orang tua memfasilitasi anak dalam melatih kemandirian dan menyediakan sarana alat belajar yang digunakan dalam kegiatan pembelajaran.
title: Keterlibatan  Orang  Tua dalam  Mengembangkan  Karakter  Kemandirian  Anak Usia  Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parental involvement in developing the character of early childhood independence The formation of children's character begins early or since in the womb, there are several factors that can create a child's character, for example, parents who often spend time with their children. The study aims to understand the role of parents as guides, motivators and facilitators in developing the character of independence. The method used by the author is qualitative using a field research approach. The technique used in the study is interviews, documentation, observation, technical data analysis used is triangulation, interactive models include reduction, presenting data, drawing conclusions. The study was conducted at TK Aba Thoyibah Surakarta. The results of the study prove that in developing independence, the role of parents as guides is to establish positive communication with children, one of which is by providing advice. The role of parents as motivators is to give awards for the results of children's achievements. The role of parents as facilitators is that parents facilitate children in training independence and providing learning tools used in learning activities.

desc: The phenomenon of the absence of moral decadence and appropriate behavior such as violence, brawls, exclusivism, and a lack of tolerance and respect for others in all forms involving students is an ineffective model of education and function. The dysfunction is caused by not conveying the message desired by the teacher. Thus, this study aimed to describe the multicultural values-based teacher communication model in early childhood education institutions in rural areas. This research used a case study approach. This study indicates that the multicultural value-based teacher communication model in early childhood education institutions in rural areas is carried out in the form of verbal and non-verbal communication. In verbal communication, messages are conveyed verbally and in writing. Meanwhile, in the non-verbal communication process, the messages conveyed are in the form of persuasive power, coercive and reward power, personal imitation, and educative interactions vertically and horizontally
title: The Model of Teachers Communication Based on Multicultural Values in Rural Early Childhood Education
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the model of teacher communication based on multicultural values ​​in rural early childhood education the phenomenon of the absence of moral decadence and appropriate behavior such as violent brawls exclusivism and a lack of tolerance and respect for others in all forms involving students is an ineffective model of education and function the dysfunction is caused by not conveying the message desired by the teacher thus this study aimed to describe the multicultural values-based teacher communication model in early childhood education institutions in rural areas this research used a case study approach this study indicates that the multicultural values-based teacher communication models in early childhood educational institutions in rural areas is carried out in the form of verbal and nonverbal communication in verbal communication messages are conveyed verbally and in writing whereas in the nonverbal communication process the messages conveyed are in the form of persuasive power coercive and reward power personal imitation and educative interactions vertically and horizontally

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan menganalisis program one week one story berbasis keislaman untuk mengatasi problematika kemampuan bahasa dan sosial AUD di TK Rusyda Medan. Pendekatan yang digunakan ialah pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode deskriptif. Pengumpulan data melalui teknik wawancara mendalam dengan panduan instrumen terstruktur, observasi dan kajian dokumen. Selanjutnya data dianalisa dengan teknik reduksi data, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Uji keabsahan data menggunakan teknik trianggulasi sumber dan metode. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa problematika kemampuan bahasa dan sosial AUD bersumber dari dalam diri anak (internal) dan luar diri anak (eksternal). Untuk mengatasinya diterapkan program one week one story berbasis keislaman. Penerapan program ini dilakukan dengan memberikan kesempatan kepada anak untuk menceritakan pengalaman selama liburan akhir pekan terutama cerita dengan konten keislaman seperti pengalaman Ibadah, silaturrahim, membaca Al-Quran, dan taawun. Dalam penerapan program tersebut kendala yang dihadapi ialah rasio guru dan siswa tidak sebanding dan kurangnya kerjasama guru dan orang tua.
title: Program One Week One Story Berbasis Keislaman sebagai Bekal Keterampilan Abad 21 pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Islamic-based one week one story program as a provision of century skills in early childhood This study aims to analyze the Islamic-based one week one story program to overcome the problems of language and social skills of AUD in TK Rusyda Medan The approach used is a qualitative approach with a descriptive method of data collection through in-depth interview techniques with structured instrument guidance, observation and document review, then the data is analyzed using data reduction techniques, data presentation and drawing conclusions, data validity tests using triangulation techniques, sources and methods, the results of the study indicate that the problems of language and social skills of AUD come from within the child, internal and external to the child, external to overcome this, an Islamic-based one week one story program is applied, the implementation of this program is carried out by providing opportunities for children to tell their experiences during the weekend holidays, especially stories with Islamic content such as experiences of worship, silaturrahim, reading the Koran and taawun in the implementation of the program, the obstacles faced are the ratio of teachers and students is not comparable and the lack of cooperation between teachers and parents

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk melihat perbedaan pengasuhan anak kembar yang diasuh terpisah oleh orang tua dan diasuh oleh nenek terhadap perkembangan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yaitu wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Partisipan penelitian yaitu satu keluarga yang memiliki anak kembar namun berbeda pengasuhan. Teknik analisis data menggunakan model Milles dan Huberman. Langkah-langkah dalam teknik analisis data yaitu reduksi data, pemaparan data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan pengasuhan anak kembar yang diasuh oleh orang tua cenderung pengasuhan otoritatif, sedangkan pengasuhan anak kembar yang diasuh oleh neneknya cenderung pengasuhan permisif. Perbedaan pengasuhan ini berakibat pada capaian perkembangan anak kembar. Anak kembar yang diasuh oleh orang tuanya memiliki capaian perkembangan yang lebih baik dibanding yang diasuh oleh nenek. Aspek perkembangan tersebut meliputi aspek motorik, kognitif, bahasa, dan sosial emosional
title: Perbedaan Pengasuhan iAnak Kembar yang Diasuh Terpisah oleh Orang tua dan Nenek
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: differences in parenting of twins who are raised separately by parents and grandmothers This study aims to see the differences in parenting of twins who are raised separately by parents and raised by grandmothers on the development of early childhood This study uses a qualitative approach with a case study method The data collection technique used in this study is an interview, observation and documentation of research participants, namely a family who has twins but has different parenting The data analysis technique uses the Milles and Huberman model The steps in the data analysis technique are data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions The results of the study show that parenting of twins who are raised by parents tends to be authoritative parenting while parenting of twins who are raised by their grandmothers tends to be permissive parenting This difference in parenting has an impact on the developmental achievements of twins Twins who are raised by their parents have better developmental achievements than those raised by their grandmothers These developmental aspects include motor, cognitive, language and social emotional aspects

desc: Perkembangan kognitif sangat penting agar anak tersebut mampu melakukan eksplorasi terhadap dunia disekitarnya. Permasalahan kognitif anak usia dini di TK Al Hikmah pada penelitian ini adalah terdapat anak dengan kemampuan kognitif yang rendah, anak terlihat kurang semangat dan juga kurang antusias dalam mengikuti pembelajaran. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui dan menganalisis apakah ada pengaruh metode eksperimen terhadap perkembangan kognitif anak, metode yang dicobakan / treatment adalah metode eksperimen sains yaitu gelembung sabun warna dan botol berbunyi. Jenis penelitian ini adalah kuantitatif eksperimen dengan menggunakan clasical eperimental design, dengan acuan cluster sampel dengan jenis total sampling, sampel pada penelitian ini berjumlah dua puluh dua anak yang masing-masing terdiri dari kelas kontrol dan kelas eksperimen. Teknik pengumpulan data pada penelitian ini adalah berupa tes perbuatan, dari hasil penelitian terlihat bahwa kelas eksperimen lebih tinggi dibandingkan kelas kontrol maka dapat disimpulkan bahwa terdapat pengaruh metode eksperimen terhadap perkembangan kognitif anak
title: Pengaruh Metode Eksperimen Sains Terhadap Perkembangan Kognitif Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the experimental method of science on the cognitive development of children aged years cognitive development is very important so that children are able to explore the world around them cognitive problems of early childhood in TK Al Hikmah in this study were children with low cognitive abilities children seemed less enthusiastic and also less enthusiastic in participating in learning the purpose of this study was to find out and analyze whether there was an influence of the experimental method on the cognitive development of children the method that was tried treatment was the experimental method of science namely colored soap bubbles and sounding bottles this type of research is quantitative experiment using classical experimental design with reference to cluster samples with total sampling type the sample in this study amounted to twenty-two children each consisting of a control class and an experimental class the data collection technique in this study was in the form of a test of behavior from the results of the study it was seen that the experimental class was higher than the control class so it can be concluded that there is an influence of the experimental method on the cognitive development of children

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk menguji pengaruh keterlibatan orangtua dan regulasi diri terhadap perilaku bullying pada anak usia 5-6 tahun TK Kelompok B di Kota Kupang. Metode ex post facto dengan treatment by level 2x2. Penarikan sampel menggunakan teknik pengambilan sampel acak kelompok, sehingga terpilihlah dua kelurahan yaitu Kelurahan Oetete dan Fatululi. Teknik analisis data menggunakan uji normalitas dan homogenitas. Hasil ditemukan bahwa terdapat perbedaan perilaku bullying antar anak yang memiliki keterlibatan orangtua tinggi dan anak yang memiliki keterlibatan orangtua rendah, perbedaan perilaku bullying antara anak yang memiliki regulasi diri tinggi dengan anak yang memiliki regulasi diri rendah. Disimpulkan bahwa adanya pengaruh signifikan antara keterlibatan orangtua dan regulasi diri terhadap perilaku bullying anak. Implikasi hasil penelitian menunjukkan antar variabel memberikan kontribusi bagi perkembangan sosial dan diri anak di lingkungan. Oleh karena itu, keterlibatan orangtua tinggi merupakan standar bagi pengaturan diri anak dalam menampilkan perilaku yang diharapkan sesuai tumbuh kembang anak.
title: Pengaruh Keterlibatan Orangtua dan Regulasi Diri terhadap Perilaku Bullying Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of parental involvement and self-regulation on bullying behavior in early childhood The purpose of this study was to examine the influence of parental involvement and self-regulation on bullying behavior in children aged 1-3 years in kindergarten group B in Kupang City. The ex post facto method with treatment by level x was used to draw samples using random group sampling techniques so that two sub-districts were selected, namely Oetete and Fatululi sub-districts. Data analysis techniques used normality and homogeneity tests. The results found that there were differences in bullying behavior between children who had high parental involvement and children who had low parental involvement. Differences in bullying behavior between children who had high self-regulation and children who had low self-regulation. It was concluded that there was a significant influence between parental involvement and self-regulation on children's bullying behavior. The implications of the research results indicate that between variables contribute to children's social and self-development in the environment. Therefore, high parental involvement is a standard for children's self-regulation in displaying expected behavior according to child development.

desc: Fenomena anak butuh kasih merupakan salah satu masalah di daerah yang memerlukan perhatian. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan perlindungan hak anak butuh kasih untuk mendapatkan pendidikan dengan memberikan pemahaman tentang hak dan kewajiban Anak Jalanan sebagian dari warga Negara, membekali Anak Butuh Kasih dengan pendidikan karakter dalam rangka membangun masa depan melalui pendekatan belajar sambil bermain melalui permainan dan membekali anak kalanan dengan keterampilan tentang kreativitas seni dalam membangun sikap kerja keras dan kreatif. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Hasil penelitian yaitu eksistensi anak-anak butuh kasih adalah anak jalanan, anak korban penelantaran rumah tangga akibat perkawinan diluar nikah dan anak broken home, serta anak pekerja. Perlindungan preventif anak butuh kasih di Gorontalo adalah dengan menggunakan metode pendekatan yang tepat untuk anak, prosedur kerja yang meliputi pendidikan hukum bagi anak jalanan melalui metode sosialisasi, pendidikan karakter anak butuh kasih, dan kegiatan kreativitas seni anak butuh kasih
title: Refleksi Perlindungan Hak Anak Butuh Kasih di Kota Gorontalo
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Reflection of the protection of children's rights in need of love in the city of Gorontalo The phenomenon of children in need of love is one of the problems in the region that requires attention The purpose of this study is to describe the protection of children's rights in need of love to get an education by providing an understanding of the rights and obligations of street children, some of the citizens provide children in need of love with character education in order to build the future through a learning approach while playing through games and provide street children with skills about artistic creativity in building a hard and creative work attitude The type of research used is descriptive qualitative The results of the study are that the existence of children in need of love are street children, children who are victims of household neglect due to extramarital marriage and children of broken homes and children of workers Preventive protection of children in need of love in Gorontalo is by using the right approach method for children, work procedures that include legal education for street children through the method of socialization of character education for children in need of love and artistic creativity activities for children in need of love

desc: Keterlambatan perkembangan kognitif pada anak juga berhubungan dengan angka kejadian stunting yang dapat mengakibatkan terhambatnya perkembangan yang abnormal.Magic Book merupakan Alat Permainan Edukatif (APE) yang peneliti rancang sendiri untuk membantu melatih pola pikir anak sehingga dapat membantu perkembangan kognitif anak usia pra sekolah. Tujuan penelitian iniuntuk mengetahui pengaruh APE Magic book terhadap perkembangan kognitif anak pra sekolah. Metode penelitian ini adalah Pre Experimental dengan desain One Group Pretest-Posttest. Sampel pada penelitian ini adalah anak usia 3-5 tahun yang bersekolah di PAUD Kumara Asih Kelurahan Pagesangan Kota Mataramdengan pengambilan sampel menggunkan tehnik total sampling sebanyak 40 responden.Adapun tehnik pengumpulan data dengan observasi langsung menggunkan kuesioner Pra Skrining Perkembangan (KPSP). Analisis data yang digunakan dalampenelitian ini menggunakan analisis non parametrik wilcoxon.Hasil nilai rata-rata dari skor KPSP sebelum diberikan stimulasi Magic Book adalah 1,28 dan setelah diberikan stimulasi Magic Book nilai rata-rata menjadi 2,95 dengan nilai p value 0,0000,05.Penelitian ini membuktikan bahwa pemberian stimulasi dengan APE menggunkan Magic Book dapat mempengaruhi perkembangan kognitif pada anak usia pra sekolah.
title: Pengaruh Stimulasi APE Magic Book Terhadap Perkembangan Kognitif Anak Pra Sekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effect of ape magic book stimulation on the cognitive development of preschool children. Delays in cognitive development in children are also related to the incidence of stunting which can result in abnormal developmental delays. Magic book is an educational game tool that researchers designed themselves to help train children's thinking patterns so that it can help the cognitive development of preschool children. The purpose of this study was to determine the effect of ape magic book on the cognitive development of preschool children. This research method is pre-experimental with a one group pretest-posttest design. The sample in this study was children aged years who attended paud kumara asih, pagesangan village, mataram city. The sample was taken using a total sampling technique of 10 respondents. The data collection technique was by direct observation using a pre-screening questionnaire for the development of kpsp. The data analysis used in this study used non-parametric wilcoxon analysis. The results of the average value of the kpsp score before being given magic book stimulation were and after being given magic book stimulation, the average value became with a p value. This study proves that providing stimulation with ape using magic book can affect cognitive development in preschool children.

desc: Penelitian ini akan membahas tentang efektivitas program sekolah ramah anak dalam meningkatkan karakter anak usia dini. Tujuan Penelitian ini adalah analisis program sekolah ramah anak, peningkatan karakter anak setelah diterapkannya program sekolah ramah anak, analisis efektivitas sekolah ramah anak dalam meningkatkan karakter anak. Manfaat yang dapat diambil dari kegiatan penelitian ini adalah dapat memberikan kontribusi bagi beberapa pihak yang terkait. Penelitian ini menggunakan dua metode statistik untuk menganalisa data yaitu statistik deskriptif untuk mengukur nilai rata-rata simpangan baku serta statistik inferensial yaitu dalam bentuk analisis regresi dan analisis korelasi. Analisis regresi digunakan untuk mengungkapkan hubungan fungsional antara variabel-variabel penelitian, sedangkan analisis korelasi digunakan untuk mengukur derajat keeratan atau hubungan variabel penelitian. Teknik pengumpulan data yang dipergunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah angket, wawancara, studi dokumentasi dan studi literatur. Hasil Uji Empiris menyatakan bahwa pengaruh yang dihasilkan oleh Program Sekolah Ramah Anak terhadap karakter anak usia dini bersifat positif. Hasil ini ditunjukan koefisien regresi yang positif. Hal ini memberikan arti bahwa perubahan atau kenaikan yang terjadi pada variabel Program Sekolah Ramah Anak dapat meningkatkan karakter Anak Usia Dini. Hubungan antara kedua variabel bersifat dependent dan signifikan. Artinya peningkatan karakter anak usia dini secara nyata dipengaruhi oleh adanya program Sekolah Ramah Anak.
title: Efektivitas Program Sekolah Ramah Anak dalam Meningkatkan Karakter Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of child-friendly school programs in improving the character of early childhood This study will discuss the effectiveness of child-friendly school programs in improving the character of early childhood The purpose of this study is to analyze the child-friendly school program to improve children's character after the implementation of the child-friendly school program Analysis of the effectiveness of child-friendly schools in improving children's character The benefits that can be taken from this research activity are that it can contribute to several related parties This study uses two statistical methods to analyze data, namely descriptive statistics to measure the average value of standard deviations and inferential statistics, namely in the form of regression analysis and correlation analysis Regression analysis is used to reveal the functional relationship between research variables while correlation analysis is used to measure the degree of closeness or relationship of research variables The data collection techniques used in this study are questionnaires, interviews, documentation studies and literature studies The results of empirical tests state that the influence produced by the child-friendly school program on the character of early childhood is positive This result is indicated by a positive regression coefficient This means that changes or increases that occur in the child-friendly school program variable can improve the character of early childhood The relationship between the two variables is dependent and significant, meaning that the increase in the character of early childhood is significantly influenced by the existence of the child-friendly school program

desc: Banyaknya pembelajaran yang ditemui berbentuk worksheet yang dikerjakan dirumah, menjadikan anak bosan. Anak lebih memilih bermain gadgetnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengembangkan buku literasi berbasis augmented reality sebagai media pendukung pembelajaran aspek keaksaraan anak usia dini khususnya pada Bahasa Indonesia dan Bahasa Inggris dasar dalam pembelajaran di masa pandemi COVID-19. Menggunakan jenis Research and Development. Produk yang dikembangkan adalah media Augmented Reality yang di dalamnya berisikan media pembelajaran kosakata yang berbasis games bagi anak, berbentuk animasi 3D. Subjek penelitian adalah siswa TK yang ada di Salatiga. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan observasi, wawancara dan kuesioner yang dibagikan diberbagai sekolah. Hasil penelitian didapatkan dengan adanya teknologi akan menjadikan pembelajaran lebih optimal dan juga kreatif sehingga dapat merangsang berkembangnya daya pikir, kreativitas dan bahasa dalam rangka menumbuhkan sikap, mentalitas dan moral yang baik.
title: Buku Literasi Augmented Reality sebagai Media Pendukung Pembelajaran Aspek Keaksaraan AUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Augmented reality literacy books as a supporting media for learning aspects of literacy aud the many learning encountered in the form of worksheets that are done at home make children bored children prefer to play with their gadgets this study aims to develop literacy books based on augmented reality as a supporting media for learning aspects of literacy for early childhood especially in basic Indonesian and English in learning during the covid pandemic using the type of research and development the product developed is augmented reality media which contains vocabulary learning media based on games for children in the form of animation d the research subjects are kindergarten students in salatiga data collection techniques are carried out by observation interviews and questionnaires distributed in various schools the results of the study were obtained with the presence of technology will make learning more optimal and also creative so that it can stimulate the development of creative thinking and language in order to foster good mentality and moral attitudes

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah melakukan preliminary research dengan cara menguji validitas dan reliabilitas instrument motorik kasar dan perangkat permainan karpet engkle agar layak digunakan dalam mengukur keseimbangan statis dan keseimbangan dinamis. Metode penelitian menggunakan kuantitatif deskriptif dengan subjek uji coba terdiri dari satu orang anak usia 4-5 tahun yang diamati kinerja motoriknya oleh dua orang rater, serta dua orang ahli meliputi ahli materi dan ahli desain. Analisis data pendahuluan diperoleh dari hasil uji validitas menggunakan teknik peer review oleh ahli dan uji reliabilitas menggunakan inter-rater reliability dengan rumus cohen kappa. Hasil uji validitas terhadap instrumen kemampuan keseimbangan diperoleh nilai 91,45%, lembar RPPH dengan nilai 86%, alat permainan karpet engkle sebesar 91,42%, dan buku panduan permainan 85,45%. Hasil uji reliabilitas diperoleh nilai sebesar 0,75 menunjukkan kesepakatan kuat. Berdasarkan hasil analisis data uji validitas dan reliabilitas dapat disimpulkan bahwa permainan karpet engkle layak digunakan untuk anak usia 4-5 tahun dan reliabel untuk mengukur kemampuan keseimbangan statis dan dinamis sehingga dapat diterapkan dalam penelitian lanjutan berupa penelitian eksperimen.
title: Permainan Karpet Engkle: Aktivitas Motorik untuk Meningkatkan Keseimbangan Tubuh Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Carpet games, motor activities to improve the balance of early childhood bodies. The purpose of this study was to conduct preliminary research by testing the validity and reliability of gross motor instruments and carpet game devices so that they are suitable for use in measuring static balance and dynamic balance. The research method used quantitative descriptive with test subjects consisting of one child aged years whose motor performance was observed by two raters and two experts including material experts and design experts. Preliminary data analysis was obtained from the results of the validity test using peer review techniques by experts and reliability tests using interrater reliability with the Cohen Kappa formula. The results of the validity test on the balance ability instrument obtained the value of the RPPH sheet with the value of the carpet game tool and the game guide book. The results of the reliability test obtained a value of indicating strong agreement based on the results of the validity and reliability test data analysis, it can be concluded that the carpet game is suitable for use for children aged years and is reliable for measuring static and dynamic balance abilities so that it can be applied in further research in the form of experimental research.

desc: Penelitian ini dilatar belakangi olehadanya kekhasan pada kurikulum yaitu program Al-islam, yang menarik peneliti untuk menganalisis kurikulum Al-islam di Taman Kanak-kanak Aisyiyah Bustanul Athfal. Tujuan penelitian ini menganalisis kurikulum pendidikan yang terkait dengan tujuan, strategi pelaksanaan dan teknik evaluasinya. Jenis penelitian kualitatif metode deskriptif. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan menelaah hasil observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi dengan objek penelitian. Analisis dilakukan dengan teknik trianggulasi data. Hasil dari penelitian, kurikulumnya bertujuan mengembangkan keimanan dan ketaqwaan kepada Allah SWT, menumbuhkan dan meningkatkan kesadaran anak-anak untuk mengamalkan ajaran islam. Materi kurikulum yaitu aqidah, ibadah, akhlaq, muamalah, Al-Quran dan doa-doa. Dalam pelaksanaan pembelajaran guru menggunakan beragam metode, khusus untuk pengembangan nilai-nilai islami dilaksanakan melalui kegiatan pembiasaan yang dilakukan setiap hari. Dan adanya materi tentang ke Aisyiyahan di kegiatan awal setiap harinya.Teknik evaluasi pendidikan islam menggunakan unjuk kerja, penugasan, dan observasi (penilaian kegiatan khusus al-islam).
title: Analisis Kurikulum Pendidikan Islam di Taman Kanak-Kanak Aisyiyah Bustanul Athfal Padang
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of islamic education curriculum in aisyiyah bustanul athfal padang kindergarten this research is motivated by the existence of uniqueness in the curriculum, namely the alislam program which attracts researchers to analyze the alislam curriculum in aisyiyah bustanul athfal kindergarten the purpose of this research is to analyze the education curriculum related to the objectives of the implementation strategy and evaluation techniques the type of qualitative research descriptive method data collection techniques are carried out by examining the results of observation interviews and documentation with the object of research analysis is carried out using data triangulation techniques the results of the curriculum research aim to develop faith and piety to Allah SWT to foster and increase children's awareness to practice Islamic teachings curriculum materials namely aqidah worship morals muamalah the Qur'an and prayers in the implementation of learning teachers use various special methods for the development of Islamic values ​​carried out through habituation activities carried out every day and the existence of material about aisyiyah in the initial activities every day the evaluation technique for Islamic education uses performance assignments and observations assessment of special alislam activities

desc: Tujuan penelitian: (a) mengukur Strategi pembelajaran pada anak usia dini apa saja yang efektif digunakan selama masa pandemi Covid-19? dan (b) Faktor pendukung dan penghambat efektivitas pembelajaran selama masa pandemi Covid-19. Penelitian ini menggunakan telaah literatur secara sistematis menggunakan proses Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Review and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) dengan menetapkan kriteria inklusi yakni artikel yang dipublikasikan mulai tahun 2019-2020 karena mulai tahun 2019 pandemi covid 19 timbul, dan menerapkan strategi pembelajaran selama masa pandemi COVID-19. Kriteria eksklusinya adalah ketika literatur bukan merupakan peer-reviewed. Hasil peneltian menunjukkan bahwa pada penerapan strategi pembelajaran di masing-masing negara, kesemuanya menggunakan strategi pembelajaran online. Namun yang banyak digunakan dalam pembelajaran online adalah penggunaan apalikasi Zoom disertai dengan bantuan video. Faktor pendukung strategi pembelajaran diantaranya bersumber dari guru, orang tua dan rasio guru dan anak sedangkan faktor penghambatnya bersumber dari keterbatasan waktu, kemampuan orang tua dalam menggunakan teknologi yang terbatas.
title: Strategi Pembelajaran yang Efektif pada Anak Usia Dini  di Masa Pandemi Covid-19 dari berbagai Negara
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: effective learning strategies for early childhood during the covid pandemic from various countries research objectives a measure what learning strategies for early childhood are effective during the covid pandemic and b supporting and inhibiting factors for the effectiveness of learning during the covid pandemic this study uses a systematic literature review using the preferred reporting items for systematic review and meta-analyses prism process by setting inclusion criteria, namely articles published starting in the year because starting in the year the covid pandemic emerged and implementing learning strategies during the covid pandemic the exclusion criteria are when the literature is not peer-reviewed the results of the study show that in the implementation of learning strategies in each country all use online learning strategies but the most widely used in online learning is the use of the zoom application accompanied by video assistance supporting factors for learning strategies include those sourced from teachers parents and the ratio of teachers and children while the inhibiting factors come from limited time parents' ability to use limited technology

desc: Bahasa merupakan aspek perkembangan yang penting, bahasa mencerminkan pemikiran seseorang. Kosakata merupakan bagian dari bahasa yang digunakan manusia untuk berbahasa, berkomunikasi, dan berinteraksi dengan orang lain. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui keefektifan media fuzzy felt dalam meningkatkan perkembangan kosakata bahasa anak usia 3–4 tahun di KB Muslimat NU Gembong. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif yaitu jenis penelitian eksperimen dengan desain one group pretest posttest design. Populasi terdiri dari 52 anak dan sampelnya berjumlah 34 anak. Pengumpulan data menggunakan kuesioner dan dokumentasi. Pengujian hipotesis menggunakan Paired Sample T-Test. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan Haditerima, artinya terdapat peningkatan pada kosakata bahasa anak secara signifikan sebesar 19,27%. Terdapat perbedaan rata-rata pada kemampuan kosakata bahasa anak sebelum dan sesudah diberikan perlakuan. Hasil uji N-gain menunjukkan keefektifan media fuzzy felt untuk meningkatkan kosakata bahasa anak berada pada kriteria tingkat keefektifan sedang. Hal ini menunjukkan bahwa media fuzzy felt efektif meningkatkan kemampuan kosakata bahasa anak.
title: Efektivitas Media Fuzzy Felt untuk Meningkatkan Kosakata Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of fuzzy felt media to improve the vocabulary of early childhood children is an important aspect of development. Language reflects a person's thinking. Vocabulary is part of the language used by humans to communicate and interact with others. The purpose of this study was to determine the effectiveness of fuzzy felt media in improving the development of children's vocabulary in the age of years in KB Muslimat Nu Gembong. This study used a quantitative approach, namely the type of experimental research with a one group pretest posttest design. The population consisted of children and the sample was children. Data collection used questionnaires and documentation. Hypothesis testing used paired sample t-test. The results of the study showed that there was an increase in children's vocabulary significantly by 1. There was an average difference in children's vocabulary skills before and after being given treatment. The results of the Ngain test showed that the effectiveness of fuzzy felt media to improve children's vocabulary was at the moderate level of effectiveness criteria. This shows that fuzzy felt media is effective in improving children's vocabulary skills.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan mengembangkan media grafis untuk pengenalan life scence Kupu-kupu pada anak usia 5-6 tahun dengan metode penelitian Research  Development/ RD. Studi ini menggunakan metode model ADDIE (Analyze, Design, Development, Implementation, and Evaluation). Data dikumpulkan melalui analisis kebutuhan (studi literatur, analisis komparatif, wawancara  observasi), angket untuk pakar. Hasil penelitian uji draft media grafis menunjukkan bahwa dalam pembelajaran life science kehidupan Kupu-kupu dinilai cukup berhasil setelah menggunakan media grafis dibanding dengan metode konvensional hal ini di lihat dari catatan pelaksannan melalui tiga tahapan, yaitu perencanaan pembelajaran, pelaksaan pembelajaran dan evaluasi. Kesimpulan yang diperoleh adalah bahwa media grafis layak digunakan untuk meningkatkan pengenalan kehidupan Kupu-kupu pada anak usia 5-6 tahun di Kabupaten Musi Banyuasin provinsi Selatan.
title: Pengembangan Media Grafis untuk Pengenalan Life Science pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of graphic media for introduction of life science to early childhood this study aims to develop graphic media for introduction of butterfly life scene to children aged years with research development rd research method this study uses addie model method analyze design development implementation and evaluation data collected through needs analysis literature study comparative analysis interview observation questionnaire for experts research results test draft graphic media shows that in learning life science butterfly life is considered quite successful after using graphic media compared to conventional methods this can be seen from the implementation records through three stages namely learning planning learning implementation and evaluation the conclusion obtained is that graphic media is suitable for use to improve introduction of butterfly life to children aged years in musi banyuasin district south province

desc: Masalah penelitian ini adalah bagaimanakah keefektivan rumusan kebijakan e-learning, keefektivan implementasi kebijakan e-learning, dan apa kendala-impelementasi e-learning di PAUD. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan keefektivan rumusan kebijakan e-learning, keefektivan implementasi kebijakan e-learning, dan kendala implementasi e-learning di PAUD. Penelitian ini adalah penelitian kebijakan dengan metode kombinasi concurrent embedded strategy. Penelitian dilakukan di Provinsi Jawa Tengah pada 35 kabupaten/kota, April 2020, responden 1.899 orang dengan standard error 5%. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan angket, dokumen kebijakan, dan wawancara. Data kuantitatif diolah dengan Pivoting Program MS Excel. Data kualitatif diolah dengan software Nvivo 12+. Pengujian keabsahan data menggunakan triangulasi sumber dan metode. Pengujian kredibilitas dokumen dengan korelasi Pearson dan word frequency. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa rumusan kebijakan e-learning di PAUD sangat efektif, implementasi kebijakan e-learning di PAUD kurang efektif, dan terdapat tiga kendala implementasi e-learning di PAUD yaitu kendala pedagogi, teknologi, dan ekonomi.
title: Keefektivan Kebijakan E-Learning berbasis Sosial Media pada PAUD di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of social media-based e-learning policies in early childhood education during the Covid pandemic. The problem of this research is how effective is the formulation of e-learning policies, the effectiveness of the implementation of e-learning policies and what are the obstacles to the implementation of e-learning in early childhood education. The purpose of this study is to describe the effectiveness of the formulation of e-learning policies, the effectiveness of the implementation of e-learning policies and the obstacles to the implementation of e-learning in early childhood education. This research is a policy research with a combination of concurrent embedded strategy methods. The research was conducted in Central Java Province in April City, the respondents were people with standard error. Data collection techniques using policy document questionnaires and interviews. Quantitative data is processed using the MS Excel pivoting program. Qualitative data is processed using nvivo software + data validity testing using source triangulation and document credibility testing methods with Pearson correlation and word frequency. The results of the study indicate that the formulation of e-learning policies in early childhood education is very effective. The implementation of e-learning policies in early childhood education is less effective and there are three obstacles to the implementation of e-learning in early childhood education, namely pedagogical, technological and economic obstacles.

desc: Perkembangan fisik motorik menjadi faktor penting dalam perkembangan individu secara keselurahan, untuk itu guru mampu meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak dengan melakukan berbagai aktivitas yang bisa menstimulus dan mengembangkan kemampuan motorik kasar. Studi ini bertujuan guna mengungkap bagaimana peran permainan tradisional untuk meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak. Penelitian dilakukan dengan metode studi kasus secara kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan datanya meliputi wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Proses analisis data meliputi beberapa tahapan yakni reduksi dan penyajian data, serta pengambilan kesimpulan. Hasil studi ini menyimpulkan ketarampilan motorik kasar anak usia dini bisa dikembangkan melalui permainan tradisional Engklek dengan terpenuhinya beberapa indikator yaitu anak mampu menjaga keseimbangan tubuh, dapat menjaga kekuatan tubuh saat bermain, dan dapat bermain dengan lincah.
title: Permainan Tradisional Engklek dalam Meningkatkan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Traditional hopscotch games in improving gross motor skills of early childhood physical motor development is an important factor in the overall development of an individual for that teachers are able to improve children's gross motor skills by doing various activities that can stimulate and develop gross motor skills this study aims to reveal how the role of traditional games to improve children's gross motor skills the research was conducted using a qualitative case study method data collection techniques include interviews observation and documentation the data analysis process includes several stages namely data reduction and presentation and drawing conclusions the results of this study conclude that gross motor skills of early childhood can be developed through traditional hopscotch games by fulfilling several indicators namely children are able to maintain body balance can maintain body strength while playing and can play agilely

desc: Kreativitas adalah kemampuan untuk memikirkan sesuatu dengan cara yang baru dan tidak biasa serta melahirkan solusi yang unik terhadap masalah yang dihadapi. Peran kreativitas semakin terasa ketika memasuki abad 21 dengan ditandai oleh perubahan yang sangat cepat dan tantangan yang semakin kompleks. Sehingga kreativitas harus dikembangkan sejak dini melalui pembelajaran yang dilakukan secara terintegrasi. Metode penelitian ini adalah kualitatif deskriptif dengan sumber data guru kelas dan Kepala Sekolah di TK Kanisius Sorowajan Yogyakarta pada 08 September 2018. Teknik pengumpulan data yang penulis lakukan adalah dengan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Aktivitas dalam analisis data meliputi data reduction, data display, dan conclusion drawing/ verification. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pengembangan kreativitas yang dilakukan di TK Kanisius Sorowajan bervariasi dengan memadukan pembelajaran sains, seni, bahasa, agama dan IT dalam mengembangkan kreativitas anak yang dilakukan secara terintegratif
title: Integrasi Pengembangan Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini di TK Kanisius Sorowajan Yogyakarta
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: integration of early childhood creativity development in tk kanisius sorowajan yogyakarta creativity is the ability to think about something in a new and unusual way and produce unique solutions to problems faced the role of creativity is increasingly felt when entering a century marked by very rapid changes and increasingly complex challenges so that creativity must be developed early on through integrated learning This research method is qualitative descriptive with data sources of class teachers and principals at tk kanisius sorowajan yogyakarta in september the data collection technique used by the author is by observation interviews and documentation of activities in data analysis including data reduction data display and conclusion drawing verification the results of the study show that the development of creativity carried out in tk kanisius sorowajan varies by combining science, art, language, religion and IT learning in developing children's creativity which is carried out in an integrated manner

desc: Anak terkadang hidup boros karena orang tua terlalu banyak memberi uang dan barang sehingga membuat anak tidak berpikir dewasa dan kurang menghargai nilai uang dan barang tersebut. Artikel ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan peran orang tua dalam mendidik anak sejak dini untuk mengenalkan anak tentang mengelola keuangan secara bijaksana dan cerdas yaitu dengan cara menabung dan berhemat. Penelitian menggunakan metode literatur reviu. Hasil penelitian ini adalah pentingnya mengedukasi anak tentang nilai uang, menjelaskan nilai menabung, memberikan saran tentang manfaat menabung untuk masa depan dan melakukan praktek langsung menabung melalui celengan
title: Teaching Children to Save  in Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teaching children to save in early childhood children sometimes live wastefully because parents give them too much money and goods, making children not think maturely and not appreciate the value of money and goods. This article aims to increase the role of parents in educating children from an early age to introduce children to managing finances wisely and intelligently, namely by saving and being frugal. Research using the literature review method, the results of this study are the importance of educating children about the value of money. Explaining the value of saving. Providing advice on the benefits of saving for the future and practicing saving directly through piggy banks.

desc: Orang tua merupakan pendidik pertama dan utama dalam proses perkembangan anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan peran sentral orang tua dalam pendidikan anak usia dini mengenai pelaksanaan tugas yang diberikan oleh guru pada masa pandemic coronavirus disease atau dikenal dengan virus covid-19. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode deskriptif guna memperoleh informasi berkaitan dengan pendidikan anak usia dini pada era covid-19, bagaimana pendidikan yang diterapkan oleh keluarga pada era covid-19. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Data yang sudah terkumpul dianalisis dengan langkah reduksi data, penyajian data, penarikan kesimpulan dan verifikasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa orang tua memberikan pendampingan kepada anak dengan cara membantu anak mengerjakan tugas, belajar dari lingkungan sekitar dan memberikan pengetahuan mengenai covid-19. Orang tua telah berhasil menciptakan suasana belajar yang nyaman yaitu dengan memberikan fasilitas belajar yang memadai, melakukan pendampingan dalam penyelesaian tugas, dan memberikan rewards.
title: Pendidikan Anak dalam Keluarga Era Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Children's education in the family in the Covid era Parents are the first and foremost educators in the child's development process This study aims to describe the central role of parents in early childhood education regarding the implementation of tasks given by teachers during the coronavirus disease pandemic or known as the Covid virus This study uses a qualitative approach with a descriptive method to obtain information related to early childhood education in the Covid era how education is implemented by families in the Covid era Data collection techniques use observation interviews and documentation The collected data is analyzed with data reduction steps Data presentation Drawing conclusions and verification The results of the study show that parents provide assistance to children by helping children do learning assignments from the surrounding environment and providing knowledge about Covid Parents have succeeded in creating a comfortable learning atmosphere, namely by providing adequate learning facilities, providing assistance in completing assignments and providing rewards

desc: The purpose of research to improve student learning outcomes using Demonstration in physics class IX SMAN 14 Pekanabru 2014/2015. The research was conducted from October to December 2014 with a class IX student research subjects totaling 30 people. The results of this study were obtained by the procedure of collecting and processing the data as needed in order to improve student learning outcomes, in prasiklus obtained average value of 50.0 with 50% mastery, in cycle 1 learning outcome was obtained with an average value of 67.7 with the thoroughness 80%, and in the second cycle in the improvement of learning the average value of 78.0 with 90% mastery. It can be concluded that the "use of the demonstration method can improve learning outcomes subjects sisiwa Physics class IX SMAN 14 Pekanabru"
