title: Penerapan Metode Authentic Teaching Untuk Meningkatkan Hasil Belajar Fisika  Siswa Kelas IX SMAN 14 Pekanabaru
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: application of authentic teaching methods to improve physics learning outcomes for class ix sman Pekanabaru students the purpose of research to improve student learning outcomes using demonstration in physics class ix sman Pekanabru the research was conducted from october to december with a class ix student research subjects totaling people the results of this study were obtained by the procedure of collecting and processing the data as needed in order to improve student learning outcomes in pre-cycle obtained average value of with mastery in cycle learning outcome was obtained with an average value of with the thoroughness and in the second cycle in the improvement of learning the average value of with mastery it can be concluded that the use of the demonstration method can improve learning outcomes subjects students physics class ix sman Pekanabru

desc: PAUD Karuna Dipa Palu merupakan satuan pendidikan anak usia dini yang mengintegrasikan nilai multikultural dalam kegiatan pembelajaran. Perencanaan pembelajaran di PAUD Karuna Dipa Palu didesain untuk menginternalisasikan nilai multikulturalisme. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menemukan dan mendeskripsikan perencanaan pembelajaran nilai multukultural yang dilakukan PAUD Karuna Dipa Palu. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah deskriptif-kualitatif, yaitu penelitian yang mengkaji fenomena perencanaan pembelajaran nilai multikultural dengan fokus mengekspos fenomena tersebut. Hasil penelitiannya adalah perencanaan pembelajaran multikultural di disusun berdasarkan Kurikulum 2013 yang perencanaan dan bahan pembelajaran multikulturalnya disusun dalam bentuk RPPM yang berbasis nilai multikultural dan dikembangkan melalui RPPH. RPPM dan RPPH menjadi dasar perencanaan pembelajaran yang memuat kompetensi inti dan kompetensi dasar dengan menggunakan model pembelajaran tematik terpadu. Penyusunannya dilakukan dengan menetapkan RPPH dengan mengacu pada RPPM yang berisi waktu kegiatan belajar, materi belajar, materi pembiasaan, alat, media, sumber belajar, dan kegiatan yang menginternalisasikan nilai multikultural
title: Perencanaan Pembelajaran Nilai Multikultural  Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood multicultural value learning planning at Paud Karuna Dipa Palu is an early childhood education unit that integrates multicultural values ​​in learning activities. Learning planning at Paud Karuna Dipa Palu is designed to internalize multiculturalism values. This study aims to find and describe the planning of multicultural value learning carried out by Paud Karuna Dipa Palu. The research method used is descriptive qualitative, namely research that examines the phenomenon of multicultural value learning planning with a focus on exposing the phenomenon. The results of the study are that multicultural learning planning is compiled based on a curriculum whose planning and multicultural learning materials are compiled in the form of RPPM based on multicultural values ​​and developed through RPPH. RPPM and RPPH are the basis for learning planning that contains core competencies and basic competencies using an integrated thematic learning model. The compilation is carried out by determining RPPH with reference to RPPM which contains learning activity time, learning materials, habituation materials, media tools, learning resources and activities that internalize multicultural values.

desc: This study aims to analyze age and understand online learning in early childhood with the help of Whatsapp video calls to improve motor intelligence. This research uses a case study type approach to get an idea of Whatsapp video call-assisted learning in improving motor intelligence in early childhood, observing and documenting learning activities at the institution. Interviews were conducted with principals, teachers, and guardians of students. This research was conducted at RA Mambaul Irfan, Asembakor, Kraksaan, Probolinggo. The results showed that the strategy for the teacher to improve motor intelligence at an early age through Whatsapp video calls was carried out through; Planning, Program Implementation, and Evaluation. This study appreciates that teacher innovation with various media can be carried out even in pandemic conditions, such as WhatsApp video call media
title: Strengthening Children's Motor Intelligence through The Learning Management System
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strengthening children's motor intelligence through the learning management system this study aims to analyze age and understand online learning in early childhood with the help of whatsapp video calls to improve motor intelligence this research uses a case study type approach to get an idea of ​​whatsapp video calls assisted learning in improving motor intelligence in early childhood observing and documenting learning activities at the institution interviews were conducted with principals teachers and guardians of students this research was conducted at ra mambaul irfan asembakor kraksaan probolinggo the results showed that the strategy for the teacher to improve motor intelligence at an early age through whatsapp video calls was carried out through planning program implementation and evaluation this study appreciates that teacher innovation with various media can be carried out even in pandemic conditions such as whatsapp video call media

desc: Tujuan penelitian adalah mengembangkan dan menganalisis efektivitas materi senam Si Buyung yang sesuai dengan karakteristik anak TK kelompok B. Jenis penelitian ini adalah Research and Developtment (RD). Subjek penelitian adalah anak TK kelompok B di wilayah Kecamatan Trucuk Kabupaten Klaten Provinsi Jawa Tengah, dengan rentang usia anak 5-6 tahun. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakaan adalah:   wawancara mendalam (indepth interview), dokumentasi, dan tes. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah analisis kualitatif, dan  statistik deskriptif. Hasil penelitian adalah materi senam Si Buyung yang sesuai dengan karakteristik anak TK kelompok B adalah senam si Buyung dengan menirukan gerakan binatang seperti menirukan gerakan binatang kucing berlari, monyet melempar bola, ayam berjalan di atas balok, ular berlari, dan katak melompat. Model senam Si Buyung secara efektif dapat meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak TK kelompok B. Hasil pengembangan model senam Si Buyung ini dapat digunakan oleh guru TK untuk meningkatkan motivasi dan hasil belajar anak dalam pembelajaran motorik kasar.
title: Pengembangan Model Senam Si Buyung Untuk Peningkatan Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of the si buyung gymnastics model to improve children's gross motor skills the purpose of the study is to develop and analyze the effectiveness of si buyung gymnastics material that is in accordance with the characteristics of group b kindergarten children this type of research is research and development rd the subjects of the study were group b kindergarten children in the trucuk sub-district, klaten district, central java province with an age range of 15-20 years the data collection technique used was in-depth interviews documentation and tests the data analysis technique used was qualitative analysis and descriptive statistics the results of the study are si buyung gymnastics material that is in accordance with the characteristics of group b kindergarten children is si buyung gymnastics by imitating animal movements such as imitating animal movements cats running monkeys throwing balls chickens walking on blocks snakes running and frogs jumping the si buyung gymnastics model can effectively improve the gross motor skills of group b kindergarten children the results of the development of this si buyung gymnastics model can be used by kindergarten teachers to improve children's motivation and learning outcomes in gross motor learning

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui hubungan antara game online dengan perkembangan emosional usia 5  6 tahun. Metode yang digunakan yaitu metode penelitian kuantitatif korelasional, dengan teknik pengambilan sampel purposif sampling. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan pada TK Pendawa di kelurahan Pondok Cabe, Kecamatan Pamulang, kabupaten Tangerang Selatan, Propinsi Banten. Sampel berjumlah 40 anak, malalui instrumen berupa angket kepada orangtua siswa. Dari hasil penelitian pada taraf signifikan 5% didapatkan bahwa nilai r hitung (0,416), lebih besar dari pada r table (0,320). Nilai r hitung 0,416 berada pada rentang 0,40  0,70 yang bearti berada pada kategori korelasi yang cukup kuat. Sedangkan nilai Koefisien Determinasi didapat sebesar 17%, yang artinya game online mempunyai hubungan dengan perkembangan emosional anak usia 5  6 tahun sebesar 17%, sedangkan sisanya berhubungan dengan faktor lain yang pada penelitian ini tidak diteliti. Berdasarkan hasil tersebut dapat disimpulkan bahwa terdapat hubungan yang cukup kuat dan signifikan antara game online dengan perkembangan emosional anak usia 5-6 tahun di TK Pendawa dikelurahan Pondok Cabe, kecamatan Tangerang Selatan, Banten.
title: Hubungan Game Online dengan Perkembangan Emosional Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The relationship between online games and emotional development of children aged years The purpose of this study was to determine the relationship between online games and emotional development of children aged years The method used is a quantitative correlational research method with a purposive sampling technique This study was conducted at TK Pendawa in Pondok Cabe Village, Pamulang District, South Tangerang Regency, Banten Province The sample was children through an instrument in the form of a questionnaire to parents of students From the results of the study at a significant level, it was found that the calculated r value was greater than the r table The calculated r value was in a range that meant it was in a fairly strong correlation category while the coefficient of determination was obtained as large as which means that online games have a relationship with the emotional development of children aged years as large as while the rest is related to other factors that were not examined in this study Based on these results, it can be concluded that there is a fairly strong and significant relationship between online games and the emotional development of children aged years at TK Pendawa in Pondok Cabe Village, South Tangerang District, Banten

desc: Program literasi seiring perkembangan zaman di Abad 21 telah berkembang menjadi multiliterasi. Menumbuhkan pribadi literat dimulai sejak dini dari ruang-ruang keluarga. Mengingat sosok anak yang unik maka perlu pendekatan dan model yang cocok bermakna dan menyenangkan. Dalam kesempatan ini ditawarkan salah satu model multiliterasi ibu dan anak Candaria - bercerita sambil berkarya. Pendekatan penelitian ini menggunakan kuantitatif dengan metode penelitian kuasi eksperimen melalui pendekatan pre-post test with control group design. Pada tahap awal, dilakukan studi Pustaka dan studi pendahuluan. Berikutnya analisis kebutuhan inovasi dan merancang model. Selanjutnya, penentuan sampel penelitian dan penerapan model. Evaluasi dilaksanakan setelah keseluruhan kegiatan berakhir. Hasil penelitian terlihat bahwa tidak  terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan dalam kemampuan kreativitas orangtua dalam kegiatan multiliterasi melalui Candaria pada taraf kepercayaan 95 persen. Dengan demikian Candaria dapat dipergunakan sebagai model menumbuhkan multiliterasi ibu dan anak  di masa usia dini.
title: Bercerita Seraya Berkarya untuk Menumbuhkan Literasi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: storytelling while creating to foster early childhood literacy literacy program along with the development of the times in the century has developed into multiliteracy fostering literate individuals starting early from family rooms considering the unique figure of the child, it is necessary to have a suitable approach and model that is meaningful and enjoyable on this occasion one of the multiliteracy models is offered, mother and child candaria storytelling while creating this research approach uses quantitative with a quasi-experimental research method through a prepost test with control group design approach in the early stages a literature study and preliminary study were carried out, then an analysis of innovation needs and designing a model, then determining research samples and implementing the evaluation model was carried out after all activities ended the results of the study showed that there was no significant difference in the creativity of parents in multiliteracy activities through candaria at the level of confidence percent thus candaria can be used as a model for fostering multiliteracy of mothers and children in early childhood

desc: Golden age is an investment for the future that is at the age of 2-7 years. This study, trains child development at the pre-operational stage of early childhood because children are still thinking realistic. To train early childhood development, this study uses insect-resistant media, which serves to introduce early childhood to surrounding insects. The research method used is the Pre Test Post Test Group Design. The subjects of this study were children of group B of Rafa PAUD in Bengkulu City. Data collection in this study is the initial test (pretest) and final test (posttest). From the results of the pretest of children's ability, there are still undeveloped children and the results of the post-test there are 7 well-developed children. The conclusion of this study is the use of insect-resistant media (insectarium) influences the preoperational thinking abilities of early childhood group B PAUD Bengkulu City
title: Preoperational Development of Eearly Childhood with Insectarium Media
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: preoperational development of early childhood with insectarium media golden age is an investment for the future that is at the age of years this study trains child development at the preoperational stage of early childhood because children are still thinking realistically to train early childhood development this study uses insect resistant media which serves to introduce early childhood to surrounding insects the research method used is the pre test post test group design the subjects of this study were children of group b of rafa paud in bengkulu city data collection in this study is the initial test pretest and final posttest from the results of the pretest of children's abilities there are still undeveloped children and the results of the posttest there are well developed children the conclusion of this study is the use of insect resistant media insectarium influences the preoperational thinking abilities of early childhood group b paud bengkulu city

desc: Pada saat anak memasuki usia pra sekolah atau 3-6 tahun, anak siap mengikuti kegiatan belajar di pendidikan anak usia dini. Kegiatan belajar di pendidikan anak usia dini tujuan memberikan fondasi bagi seluruh aspek perkembangan yang dimiliki anak, salah satunya yakni perkembangan bahasa. Perkembangan bahasa merupakan hal yang sangat dinantikan, seperti kemampuan baca tulis. Sebelum anak mampu memproduksi bahasa berupa baca tulis, anak perlu untuk mengembangkan kemampuan dalam bahasa reseptif. Bahasa reseptif adalah kemampuan untuk memahami kata dan bahasa yang melibatkan perolehan informasi dan makna. Bahasa reseptif pada anak usia 3-6 tahun menjadi dasar baginya untuk mengungkapkan emosi, pesan, bersosialisasi, dan belajar ketahap perkembangan berikutnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui bahasa reseptif pada anak usia 3-6 tahun di Indonesia. Penelitian ini berjenis kajian literatur. Menggunakan teknik analisis deskriptif dengan menggunakan data berdasarkan jurnal, buku, ebook, dan literatur yang berkaitan dengan bahasa reseptif pada anak usia 3-6 tahun di Indonesia
title: Bahasa Reseptif Anak Usia 3-6 Tahun di Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: receptive language of children aged years in Indonesia when children enter preschool age or years children are ready to participate in learning activities in early childhood education learning activities in early childhood education aim to provide a foundation for all aspects of development that children have, one of which is language development language development is something that is highly anticipated such as reading and writing skills before children are able to produce language in the form of reading and writing children need to develop their receptive language skills receptive language is the ability to understand words and language that involves obtaining information and meaning receptive language in children aged years is the basis for them to express emotions messages socialize and learn to the next stage of development this study aims to determine receptive language in children aged years in Indonesia this study is a type of literature review using descriptive analysis techniques using data based on journals books ebooks and literature related to receptive language in children aged years in Indonesia

desc: Pesatnya perkembangan teknologi menimbulkan kekhwatiran dalam pembentukan karakter anak usia dini yang lahir sebagai generasi “digital native”. Hal  tersebut menjadi tantangan para orang tua dan guru dalam membimbing kepribadian anak yang beradab. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengambarkan upaya yang dilakukan oleh lembaga TK Islam Assakinah dalam penguatan karakter Islam moderat di tengah ancaman kondisi intoleransi yang banyak berkembang di kalangan umat beragama. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif melalui pendekatan kualitatif naturalistik dengan wawancara bersama kepala sekolah, guru dan orang tua siswa selama proses pembelajaran serta dilengkapi dokumen pendukung. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa penguatan nilai-nilai karakter yang mendukung penanaman moderasi beragama sejak dini dapat dilakukan dengan berbagai upaya seperti: penyeleksian awal (screening) calon guru, pemilihan bahan ajar, penanaman sikap moderat dalam pembelajaran, mengadakan parenting education. Berbagai upaya tersebut dapat mewujudkan generasi yang memiliki karakter islam moderat sejak dini dan membawa dampak positif saat anak berada pada tingkat pendidikan yang lebih lanjut
title: Upaya Penguatan Nilai-Nilai Karakter Islam Moderat pada Satuan Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts to strengthen moderate Islamic character values ​​in early childhood education units The rapid development of technology has raised concerns in the formation of the character of early childhood children who are born as a digital native generation. This is a challenge for parents and teachers in guiding the personality of civilized children. This study aims to describe the efforts made by the Assakinah Islamic Kindergarten institution in strengthening moderate Islamic character amidst the threat of intolerance that is developing among religious communities. This study uses a descriptive method through a naturalistic qualitative approach with interviews with the principal, teachers and parents of students during the learning process and is equipped with supporting documents. The results of the study indicate that strengthening character values ​​that support the instilling of religious moderation from an early age can be done through various efforts such as initial selection, screening of prospective teachers, selection of teaching materials, instilling a moderate attitude in learning, holding parenting education. These various efforts can create a generation that has a moderate Islamic character from an early age and has a positive impact when children are at a more advanced level of education.

desc: This study aims for understand mothers experience with dual role to establish of independence child. Mother with dual role interpreted as a mother become housewife and work. The existence of dual role make the role as a mother divided by the role as a career woman. Especially if the child has entered pre-school age, the role of mother is needed because at this stage the child get in golden periode, window of opportunity, and critical period (Depker, 2010). One of the skills that should be developed is independence that became one of the goals of character education. Especially for working mothers, establishing independence of children from an early age can help children to perform simple daily activities when the mother at work. The study participants were four mothers with dual roles and have children with 3-6 year olds attending Play Group/Kindergarten Program. Data collection using in-depth interview then analyzed by Interpretative Phenomenological Analysis (IPA) method. The result of the research shows that the mother experience with dual role in forming the independence of the children use of parenting, giving examples and mentoring to doing activities independently, and familiarize the children to perform simple daily activities to supply needs self.
title: Strategi Ibu dengan Peran Ganda  dalam Membentuk Kemandirian Anak Usia Pra Sekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strategies for mothers with dual roles in establishing the independence of pre-school children this study aims to understand mothers experience with dual roles to establish independence divided by the role as a career woman especially if the child has entered preschool age the role of mother is needed because at this stage the child gets in the golden period window of opportunity and critical period department one of the skills that should be developed is independence that became one of the goals of character education, especially for working mothers establishing independence of children from an early age can help children to perform simple daily activities when the mother at work the study participants were four mothers with dual roles and had children with year olds attending play group kindergarten program data collection using in-depth interviews then analyzed by interpretative phenomenological analysis ipa method the result of the research shows that the mother experiences with dual roles in forming the independence of the children use of parenting giving examples and mentoring to do activities independently and familiarize the children to perform simple daily activities to supply self needs

desc: Program tahfidz semakin marak dilakukan secara implisit atau eksplisit pada kurikulum TK. Penelitian dilaksanakan dengan tujuan menguji pengaruh kemampuan tahfidz metode talaqqi online (x) terhadap pengenalan huruf hijaiyah (y) pada anak TK program tahfidz. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kuantitatif expost facto untuk mengungkap kondisi lapangan. Penelitian memperoleh hasil, diketahui pengaruh yang bermakna antara kemampuan tahfidz terhadap mengenal huruf hijaiyah. Teknik pengambilan data yang digunakan yaitu lembar tes dan observasi oleh guru. Teknik analisis pada penelitian ini memakai analisis SEM-PLS. Analisis dipilih disebabkan jenis data bersifat ordinal. Pengisian lembar tes dan observasi diwakili oleh guru berdasarkan jawaban anak, dikarenakan pengambilan data dilakukan secara online terdampak covid-19. Kebaruan penelitian ini yaitu metode tahfidz menggunakan talaqqi online. Metode talaqqi online mendukung pelaksanaan kegiatan tahfidz dan pengenalan huruf hijaiyah anak.
title: Pengaruh Tahfidz  Metode Talaqqi Online terhadap Pengenalan Hijaiyah TK Program Tahfidz Sleman
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the online talaqqi method of tahfidz on the introduction of the hijaiyah in kindergarten, the Sleman tahfidz program, the tahfidz program is increasingly being carried out implicitly or explicitly in the kindergarten curriculum. The study was conducted with the aim of testing the influence of the ability to memorize the online talaqqi method x on the introduction of the hijaiyah letter y in kindergarten children. The tahfidz program used an ex post facto quantitative method to reveal the conditions in the field. The research obtained results showing a significant influence between the ability to memorize the hijaiyah letter. The data collection technique used was a test sheet and observation by the teacher. The analysis technique in this study used a sample analysis. The analysis was chosen because the type of data was ordinal. The filling in of the test sheet and observation was represented by the teacher based on the child's answers. Because the data collection was carried out online, the impact of Covid was the novelty of this study, namely the tahfidz method using online talaqqi. The online talaqqi method supports the implementation of tahfidz activities and the introduction of children's hijaiyah letters.

desc: Kemampuan membaca anak adalah sesuatu yang sifatnya penting, sehingga hal ini perlu untuk diteliti. Kemampuan membaca yang lemah tentunya dapat berdampak negatif, baik dari sisi prestasi akademik ataupun mental. Kelemahan yang dimiliki anak dalam kaitannya dengan membaca bisa menjadikan anak tidak memiliki rasa percaya diri, berkecil hati, serta menurunkan motivasi belajar. Tujuan penelitian guna mengetahui peningkatan kemampuan membaca anak usia dini dengan melalui metode glenn doman. Metode studi kasus dipergunakan pada penelitian ini, yaitu memanfaatkan pendekatan kualitatif. Data penelitian dikumpulkan melalui teknik dokumentasi, observasi, dan wawancara. Data penelitian dianalisis melalui langkah mereduksi dan menyajikan data, serta menyimpulkan. Penelitian ini didapatkan hasil yaitu, metode glenn doman bisa dipergunakan untuk mengembangkan peningkatan kemampuan membaca anak usia dini, yajni anak dapat menghubungkan gambar dengan kartu kata, melafalkan kata secara jelas, serta dapat mengucapkan bunyi huruf secara benar. Sehingga, adanya pengaruh cukup signifikan dari metode glenn doman terhadap peningkatan kemampuan membaca pada anak usia dini.
title: Metode Glenn Doman untuk Menumbuhkan Kemampuan Membaca Permulaan pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Glenn Doman method to develop early reading skills in early childhood children's reading ability is something that is important so it needs to be studied weak reading ability can certainly have a negative impact both in terms of academic achievement or mental weaknesses that children have in relation to reading can make children not have self-confidence discouraged and reduce learning motivation the purpose of the study was to determine the improvement of early childhood reading skills through the Glenn Doman method the case study method used in this study, namely utilizing a qualitative approach research data was collected through documentation techniques observation and interviews research data was analyzed through the steps of reducing and presenting data and concluding this study obtained results, namely the Glenn Doman method can be used to develop an increase in early childhood reading skills, namely children can connect pictures with word cards pronounce words clearly and can pronounce letter sounds correctly so that there is a significant influence of the Glenn Doman method on improving reading skills in early childhood

desc: Konsep budaya digital mengungkapkan bahwa buta aksara tidak lagi diartikan sebagai keadaan tidak mengetahui cara membaca dan menulis. Buta aksara di era digital diartikan sebagai keadaan tidak dapat menggunakan komputer dan teknologi. Oleh karena itu, pembelajaran berbasis teknologi digital harus dimulai sejak anak usia dini. Tujuan penulisan artikel ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan dampak pembelajaran berbasis scratchJr terhadap ketrampilan problem solving anak usia ini. Metode yang digunakan dalam penulisan artikel ini adalah systematic literatur review dengan melakukan analisis 19 artikel jurnal. Hasil analisis studi teoritis menunjukkan bahwa scratchJr memungkinkan anak usia dini untuk terlibat dalam pembuatan cerita interaktif, permainan, serta kesenangan digital secara mandiri atau hanya memerlukan sedikit bimbingan di sepanjang jalan proses pembuatannya. Anak usia dini dengan cepat dapat mengakses serta memahami kemampuan pemrograman dengan menggunakan pemikiran matematis dalam pendekatan untuk pemecahan masalah atau problem solving.
title: Dampak Aplikasi ScratchJr terhadap Ketrampilan Problem-Solving Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the impact of the scratchjr application on the problem-solving skills of early childhood the concept of digital culture reveals that illiteracy is no longer interpreted as a state of not knowing how to read and write illiteracy in the digital era is interpreted as a state of not being able to use computers and technology therefore digital technology-based learning must be started from early childhood the purpose of writing this article is to describe the impact of scratchjr-based learning on the problem-solving skills of children of this age the method used in writing this article is a systematic literature review by analyzing journal articles the results of the analysis of theoretical studies show that scratchjr allows early childhood to be involved in creating interactive stories games and digital fun independently or only need a little guidance along the way the process of making it early childhood can quickly access and understand programming skills by using mathematical thinking in the approach to problem solving or problem solving

desc: Salah satu usaha membatasi penyebaran Covid-19 yaitu dengan melaksanakan proses belajar mengajar secara daring melalui aplikasi whatsapp, zoom dan lain-lain. Tujuan penelitian ini menganalisa pola komunikasi guru dan anak dalam proses belajar mengajar di masa pandemi Covid-19. Penelitian ini berupa penelitian studi kasus dengan metode kualitatif. Proses mengumpulkan data dilakukan dengan mengamati RPPH dan RPPM, mewawancarai guru, kepala sekolah, dan orang tua serta mengobservasi proses pembelajaran. Pengolahan dan analisis data yaitu mereduksi data dengan menyeleksi, menyederhanakan dan membuat abstraksi data tulis dan lisan dari hasil observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi mengenai pola komunikasi dalam proses pembelajran. Kemudian data disajikan agar memperoleh kesimpulan akhir dari penelitian. Adapun hasilnya yaitu pola komunikasi yang dilaksanakan di TK Negeri 6 Pekanbaru adalah pola komunikasi searah, dua arah dan multi arah. Namun komunikasi guru dan anak didik dalam proses ini tidak cukup mampu membangun proses pembelajaran yang berkualitas di TK Negeri 6 Pekanbaru
title: Pola Komunikasi dalam Proses Pembelajaran di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The written and oral data from the results of observation, interviews and documentation regarding communication patterns in the learning process are then presented to obtain the final conclusion of the research. The results are that the communication patterns implemented in Pekanbaru State Kindergarten are one-way, two-way and multi-way communication patterns, but communication between teachers and students in this process is not sufficient to build a quality learning process in Pekanbaru State Kindergarten.

desc: Pendidik  di TK  memiliki peranan penting untuk meningkatkan berbagai kemampuan anak terutama pada masa keemasan anak. Guru sendiri memaksimalkan fase golden age yang mana jatuh pada usia taman kanak-kanak menggunakan berbagai metode mengajar dan turut melibatkan pihak orang tua untuk merancang pembelajaran anak usia dini.  Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan  peran guru dalam merancang pembelajaran berbasis kearifan lokal di PAUD Al-Fath. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif deskriptif. Informan penelitian ini berjumlah  3 orang guru kelas, 2 orang tua siswa dan 1 kepala sekolah. Data penelitian dikumpulkan melalui observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi  kemudian dianalisis menggunakan reduksi data, penyajian data, penarikan kesimpulan dan verifikasi. Hasil penelitian ini menyimpulkan bahwa penyusunan pembelajaran berbasis kearifan  lokal dilakukan  dengan mencatat potensi yang ada dilingkungan  sekitar diantaranya adalah kondisi lingkungan masyarakat, adat kebiasaan yang berlaku dimasyarakat, bahasa yang digunakan, lagu daerah, makanan khas,  hasil kerajinan daearah dan permainan tradisional. Selain itu, dilakukan  berdasarkan pengalaman yang dilakukan di PAUD Al-Fath dan disusun berdasarkan unsur-unsur yang dibutuhkan dalam sebuah pengelolaan pembelajaran, kemudian diintegrasikan dengan kebutuhan terhadap pengenalan budaya lokal kepada anak usia dini dan kecintaan terhadap budaya lokal.
title: Peran Guru dalam Merancang Pembelajaran Berbasis Kearifan Lokal di Masa Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of teachers in designing local wisdom-based learning during the pandemic educators in kindergarten have an important role in improving various children's abilities, especially during the golden age of children, teachers themselves maximize the golden age phase which falls at kindergarten age using various teaching methods and involving parents to design early childhood learning the purpose of this study is to describe the role of teachers in designing local wisdom-based learning in paud alfath this study uses a descriptive qualitative method the informants of this study were class teachers, parents of students and principals research data was collected through observation interviews and documentation then analyzed using data reduction data presentation drawing conclusions and verification of the results of this study concluded that the preparation of local wisdom-based learning was carried out by recording the potential that exists in the surrounding environment including the condition of the indigenous community environment, customs that apply in the community, the language used, regional songs, typical foods, regional crafts and traditional games in addition, it was carried out based on the experience carried out at paud alfath and compiled based on the elements needed in a learning management then integrated with the need for introducing local culture to early childhood and love for local culture

desc: Nilai persatuan merupakan salah satu nilai penting yang harus diterapkan oleh seluruh masyarakat agar terciptanya kemakmuran bangsa dan negara Indonesia. Oleh sebab itu, orang tua memiliki peran penting dalam menanamkan nilai persatuan pada anak sejak dini, agar implementasi nilai persatuan dapat diwujudkan dengan minimnya konflik antar kelompok masyarakat. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan bagaimana peran orang tua dalam menanamkan nilai persatuan pada anak usia dini di daerah transmigran, Dsn. Sri Mulyo, Ds. Pematang Kolim, Kec. Pelawan, Kab. Sarolangun, Jambi. Menggunakan jenis penelitian kualitatif dengan pendekatan deskriptif. Selanjutnya teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan diantaranya observasi, wawancara dengan orang tua, anak, dan tokoh masyarakat yang ada, serta dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan yaitu triangulasi teknik dan triangulasi sumber. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan, masih kurang sesuainya peran orang tua dalam menanamkan nilai persatuan pada anak terutama di daerah transmigran, seperti halnya peran sebagai pendidik, pengasuh, motivator, dan model bagi anak.
title: Urgensi Peran Orang Tua dalam Penanaman Nilai Persatuan pada Anak di Daerah Transmigran
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The urgency of the role of parents in instilling the value of unity in children in transmigration areas The value of unity is one of the important values ​​that must be applied by the entire community in order to create prosperity for the Indonesian nation and state. Therefore, parents have an important role in instilling the value of unity in children from an early age so that the implementation of the value of unity can be realized with minimal conflict between community groups. The purpose of this study is to describe how the role of parents in instilling the value of unity in early childhood in the transmigration area of ​​Sri Mulyo Hamlet, Pematang Kolim Village, Pelawan District, Sarolangun Regency, Jambi, using a qualitative research type with a descriptive approach. Furthermore, the data collection techniques used include observation, interviews with parents of children and community leaders and documentation. The data analysis techniques used are triangulation techniques and triangulation of sources. The results of the study indicate that the role of parents in instilling the value of unity in children, especially in transmigration areas, such as the role as educators, caregivers, motivators and models for children.

desc: Parental involvement in childrens learning activities is important for the optimal of their growth and development. The aims of writing this article is to provide advices that can be applied in early childhood education institutions in terms of involving parents in children's learning activities at home. This article used the literature review method by reviewing recent literature such as books and research journals that provide an explanation of the topic of parental involvement in children's learning. In this research, several topics related to parental involvement are explained, including factors that influence and the type of parental involvement, forms of parental involvement in children's learning and advices for involving parents in children's learning activities. In short, this article is expected to help educators find strategies for involving parents to continue children's learning activities from school to home. Then, it is recommended for educators to use the results of this study, which is advices for involving parent in children's learning activities. Every parent must accompany the child's learning activities so that learning activities run effectively and can optimize the child's growth and development.
title: Advices for Involving Parents in Childrens Learning Activities from School to Home
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: advices for involving parents in children's learning activities from school to home parental involvement in children's learning activities is important for the optimum of their growth and development the aims of writing this article is to provide advice that can be applied in early childhood education institutions in terms of involving parents in children's learning activities at home this article used the literature review method by reviewing recent literature such as books and research journals that provide an explanation of the topic of parental involvement in children's learning in this research several topics related to parental involvement are explained including factors that influence and the type of parental involvement forms of parental involvement in children's learning and advices for involving parents in children's learning activities in short this article is expected to help educators find strategies for involving parents to continue children's learning activities from school to home then it is recommended for educators to use the results of this study which is advices for involving parents in children's learning activities every parent must accompany the child's learning activities so that learning activities run effectively and can optimize the child's growth and development

desc: Penelitian ini diawali dengan sebuah temuan di KBIT Insan Mulia terdapat 17 dari 22 siswa belum mampu melakukan gerakan berlari sambil membawa benda ringan. Berdasarkan STPPA idealnya anak usia 3-4 tahun sudah mampu melakukan gerakan tersebut. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah melakukan upaya peningkatan keterampilan motorik kasar melalui aktivitas permainan estafet bola modifikasi. Tindakan dilaksanakan dalam dua siklus yang terdiri dari perencanaan, pelaksanaan tindakan, evaluasi, dan refleksi. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi dengan instrumen lembar observasi. Kriteria keberhasilan adalah 70% BSH (Berkembang Sesuai Harapan). Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa terjadi peningkatan keterampilan motorik kasar sebesar 50% pada siklus I. Sedangkan pada siklus II diperoleh peningkatan dengan hasil 72,72% dalam kriteria BSH dan 18,18% berada pada kriteria BSB (Berkembang Sangat Baik). Kolaborator memperbaiki cara berkomunikasi, menjelaskan, memberikan motivasi, serta memberikan reward kepada subjek. Dengan demikian, penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa permainan estafet bola modifikasi dapat meningkatkan keterampilan motorik kasar anak usia 3-4 tahun
title: Aktivitas Permainan Estafet Bola Modifikasi untuk Meningkatkan Keterampilan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia 3-4 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Modified ball relay game activity to improve gross motor skills of children aged years this study began with a finding in kbit insan mulia there were students who were not yet able to do running movements while carrying light objects based on stppa ideally children aged years are able to do the movement the purpose of this study is to make efforts to improve gross motor skills through modified ball relay game activities the action was carried out in two cycles consisting of planning the implementation of the action evaluation and reflection data collection techniques using observation with observation sheet instruments the success criteria are bsh developing according to expectations the results of this study indicate that there was an increase in gross motor skills of in cycle i while in cycle ii an increase was obtained with results in the bsh criteria and were in the bsb criteria developing very well collaborators improved the way they communicated explaining providing motivation and giving rewards to subjects thus this study shows that modified ball relay games can improve the gross motor skills of children aged years

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pola komunikasi guru dan orang tua dalam mewujudkan kemandirian siswa KB Kristen Terang Bangsa tahun ajaran 2021/2022. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif berupa fenomenologi. Subjek penelitian di KB Kristen Terang Bangsa dengan jumlah lima anak. Pengumpulan data melalui observasi dan wawancara. Data yang diolah dari reduksi, penyajian data dan penarikan kesimpulan disusun menjadi sebuah deskripsi penelitian. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukan bahwa pola asuh yang berbeda menjadi kunci untuk meningkatkan kemandirian anak. Adanya komunikasi yang dilakukan oleh orang tua dengan guru membuat kemandirian anak sudah berkembang lebih baik dan anak mengalami perkembangan yang sangat signifikan setelah dilakukan observasi yang pertama hingga ketiga. Komunikasi yang lebih intens antara guru dan orang tua dilakukan agar perkembangan anak bisa lebih dioptimalkan.
title: Pola Komunikasi Guru dan Orang Tua dalam Mewujudkan Kemandirian
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: communication patterns of teachers and parents in realizing independence This study aims to determine the communication patterns of teachers and parents in realizing the independence of students of the Bright Nation Christian KB. This academic year of research uses a qualitative method in the form of phenomenology of research subjects in the Bright Nation Christian KB with a total of five children. Data collection through observation and interviews. Data processed from data reduction, presentation and conclusion drawing are arranged into a research description. The results of this study indicate that different parenting patterns are the key to increasing children's independence. Communication between parents and teachers makes children's independence develop better and children experience very significant development after the first to third observations. More intense communication between teachers and parents is carried out so that children's development can be optimized.

desc: Seiring dengan perkembangan teknologi, laporan perkembangan anak disusun dengan menggunakan aplikasi komputer. Namun, kesiapan guru PAUD dalam hal literasi komputer terbatas pada penggunaan Ms. Office (Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, dan Ms. Power Point) secara sederhana. Oleh karena itu, penelitian ini dilakukan untuk merancang prototype laporan perkembangan anak menggunakan Ms.Excel untuk menunjang pekerjaan guru PAUD. Penelitian dilakukan dengan metode RD modifikasi model Borg  Gall sampai pada tahap validasi ahli  uji coba terbatas terhadap pengguna. Sebanyak 24 guru PAUD Aisyiyah terlibat dalam uji coba terbatas. Data dikumpulkan menggunakan kuesioner respon pengguna dan dianalisis secara deskriptif. Hasil penelitian ini adalah prototype produk e-Report PAUD Aisyiyah Versi 1.0 berbasis Ms. Excel memiliki kelayakan segi materi 0,833-1,000 dan 0,5 – 1,000 dari segi teknologi komputer berdasarkan penilaian validasi ahli, sedangkan hasil ujicoba terbatas menunjukkan bahwa produk ini diterima dengan baik, mudah, pratis, dan efisien. Namun, beberapa perbaikan teknis masih terus dilakukan untuk menyempurnakannya
title: Prototype e-Report PAUD 1.0 untuk Menyusun Laporan Perkembangan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: prototype of early childhood education report to compile early childhood development report along with the development of technology, child development report is compiled using computer application but the readiness of early childhood education teacher in terms of computer literacy is limited to the use of ms office ms word ms excel and ms power point simply therefore this study was conducted to design a prototype of child development report using ms excel to support the work of early childhood education teacher the study was conducted using the modified rd method of the borg gall model until the expert validation stage limited trial to users as many as aisyiyah early childhood education teachers were involved in the limited trial data was collected using a user response questionnaire and analyzed descriptively the results of this study are the prototype of the aisyiyah early childhood education report product version based on ms excel has feasibility in terms of material and in terms of computer technology based on expert validation assessment while the results of the limited trial show that this product is well received easy practical and efficient but some technical improvements are still being made to perfect it

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan mengembangkan multimedia interaktif berbentuk video senam animasi berbasis budaya khas Kalimantan Barat dalam pembelajaran di PAUD. Model pengembangan dalam penelitian ini mengacu pada model penelitian dan pengembangan 4D (four-D) yaitu define, design, develop, dan disseminate dapat diadaptasikan menjadi 4P yaitu pendefinisian, perancangan, pengembangan, dan penyebaran. Subjek dalam penelitian ini guru-guru di PAUD Anggrek Kabupaten Kubu Raya. Dilakukan uji coba produk kepada para anak PAUD usia 4-5 tahun dan usia 5-6 tahun di PAUD Anggrek yang berjumlah 40 orang anak. Sumber data dalam penelitian ini juga melibatkan dosen-dosen prodi PG-PAUD FKIP UNTAN, Psikolog Perkembangan Anak untuk mendapatkan data validasi ahli media dan ahli materi. Alat pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah wawancara, observasi dan angket. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini teknik analisis kualitatif dan analisis kuantitatif. Hasil dari penelitian ini adalah perancangan multimedia interaktif berbentuk video senam animasi berbasis budaya khas Kalimantan Barat, dinilai sangat layak untuk digunakan dan dapat menarik minat anak untuk melakukan gerakan senam
title: Pengembangan Multimedia Interaktif  Video Senam Animasi Berbasis Budaya Khas Kalimantan Barat
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of interactive multimedia animated gymnastics videos based on typical West Kalimantan culture This study aims to develop interactive multimedia in the form of animated gymnastics videos based on typical West Kalimantan culture in learning at PAUD The development model in this study refers to the research and development model d fourd namely define design develop and disseminate can be adapted into p namely defining design development and dissemination of subjects in this study teachers at PAUD Anggrek Kubu Raya Regency conducted product trials on PAUD children aged 15-20 years and 18-20 years at PAUD Anggrek totaling 1,000 children The data source in this study also involved lecturers from the PGPAUD study program, FKIP UNTAN, child development psychologists to obtain validation data, media experts and material experts, data collection tools used were interviews, observations and questionnaires, data analysis techniques used in this study, qualitative analysis techniques and quantitative analysis, the results of this study were the design of interactive multimedia in the form of animated gymnastics videos based on typical West Kalimantan culture, considered very feasible to use and can attract children's interest in doing gymnastics movements

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk memberi evaluasi pada program parenting pada KB-TK Bethany School Salatiga. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian evaluatif kualitatif menggunakan model Discrepancy Evaluation Method oleh Provus (1971) melalui 5 tahapan desain, instalasi, proses, produk, analisis biaya manfaat. Data dikumpulkan dengan menggunakan wawancara kepala sekolah, empat guru dan tiga orang tua, observasi dan dokumentasi. Analisis data menggunakan pengumpulan data, reduksi data, penyajian data dan verifikasi. Berdasarkan penelitian, tujuan program tercapai. Hasil penelitian menemukan bahwa program parenting di KB-TK Bethany School Salatiga dinilai baik dengan deskripsi tahap desain, tahap instalasi, tahap di sekolah memenuhi delapan puluh persen aspek milik pemerintah, tahap empat tujuan tercapai sehingga bernilai baik. Dalam tahap perbandingan dengan program lain, masing-masing program bermanfaat tetapi saling mendukung. Ditemukan empat kesenjangan dalam program yaitu belum terlaksananya keterlibatan orang tua di dalam kelas, terhentinya kegiatan parents to parents Belum adanya gabungan berita dan bacaan pendamping, pengasuh ikut dalam program. Peneliti menyarankan untuk melanjutkan program ini dengan perbaikan.
title: Evaluasi Discrepancy Program Parenting Class dalam Rangka Meningkatkan Hubungan Masyarakat
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Discrepancy evaluation of parenting class program in order to improve public relations This study aims to provide an evaluation of the parenting program at KBTK Bethany School Salatiga This study is a qualitative evaluative study using the discrepancy evaluation method model by Provus through the stages of design, installation, product process, cost-benefit analysis, data was collected using interviews with the principal, four teachers and three parents, observation and documentation, data analysis using data collection, data reduction, data presentation and verification based on research, program objectives were achieved. The results of the study found that the parenting program at KBTK Bethany School Salatiga was assessed as good with a description of the design stage, installation stage, stage at school, meeting eighty percent of government-owned aspects, stage four, objectives were achieved so that it had a good value in the comparison stage with other programs, each program is useful but supports each other, four gaps were found in the program, namely the lack of parental involvement in the classroom, the cessation of parent-to-parent activities, the absence of a combination of news and reading materials, companion caregivers participating in the program, the researcher suggests continuing this program with improvements

desc: Pendidikan inklusi penting untuk anak usia dini, karena memberikan pendidikan yang sesuai dengan usia perkembangan tanpa memandang derajat, kondisi ekonomi ataupun kelainannya. Penelitian ini bertujuan menghasilkan buku saku panduan layanan inklusi untuk anak usia dini yang valid, praktis dan efektif, menggunakan modelpenelitian dan pengembangan 4D dan mengunakan teknik analisis deskriptif dengan statistik deskriptif. Subyek penelitiannya adalah orang tua dan terapis di layanan pendidikan inklusi. Data validasi ahli materi diperoleh dari psikologyang memberikan jasa pelayanan inklusi dan data validasi ahli media diperoleh dari dosen di prodi PG-PAUD FKIP Universitas Tanjungpura maupun Institut Agama Islam Negeri (IAIN) Pontianak. Metode pengumpulan data berbentuk wawancara dan kuesioner dengan teknik analisis deskriptif kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa buku dikategorikan sangat layak, yaitu memenuhi unsur valid, efektif dan praktis dengan skor 3,6 (skor maksimal 4) dalam hal kesesuaian media dan dikategorikan layak dengan skor 3 (skor maksimal 4) dalam hal kesesuaian materi
title: Pengembangan Buku Saku Panduan Layanan Inklusi untuk Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of a pocket guide book for inclusive services for early childhood inclusive education is important for early childhood because it provides education that is appropriate to the age of development regardless of the degree of economic condition or disorder this study aims to produce a pocket guide book for inclusive services for early childhood that is valid, practical and effective using the research and development model d and using descriptive analysis techniques with descriptive statistics the subjects of the study were parents and therapists in inclusive education services expert validation data was obtained from psychologists who provide inclusive services and media expert validation data was obtained from lecturers in the pgpaud study program, fkip, tanjungpura university and the state islamic institute, iain pontianak the data collection method was in the form of interviews and questionnaires with qualitative descriptive analysis techniques the results of the study showed that the book was categorized as very feasible, namely meeting the elements of valid, effective and practical with maximum scores in terms of media suitability and categorized as feasible with maximum scores in terms of material suitability

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjelaskan upaya yang dilakukan dalam memfasilitasi keterlibatan orang tua dalam pendidikan anak usia dini di TK Masyithoh 1 Purworejo. Metode pengambilan data menggunakan wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi dengan analisis data deskriptif. Teknik analisis data terdiri dari reduksi data, sajian data, dan penarikan simpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa (1) faktor yang mempengaruhi keterlibatan orang tua TK Masyithoh 1 Purworejo dalam mendidik anak meliputi faktor status sosial, faktor bentuk keluarga, faktor tahap perkembangan keluarga, dan faktor model perandan (2) upaya yang telah dilakukan dalam memfasilitasi keterlibatan orang tua dalam pendidikan anak usia dini di TK Masyithoh 1 Purworejo, yaitu:parenting education,informasi tentang pendidikan, perkembangan, dan kesehatan anak, pembelajaran di rumah, pertunjukan penampilan anak,rekreasi,bekerjasamadengan komunitas masyarakat (puncak tema), kunjungan ke rumah oleh guru, dan partisipasi pada kegiatan sekolah
title: Keterlibatan Orang Tua dalam Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini di TK Masyithoh 1 Purworejo
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parental involvement in early childhood education at TK Masyithoh Purworejo This study aims to explain the efforts made in facilitating parental involvement in early childhood education at TK Masyithoh Purworejo. The data collection method uses interviews, observation and documentation with descriptive data analysis. Data analysis techniques consist of data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions. The results of the study indicate that the factors that influence parental involvement at TK Masyithoh Purworejo in educating children include social status factors, family form factors, family development stage factors and role model factors. Efforts that have been made in facilitating parental involvement in early childhood education at TK Masyithoh Purworejo are parenting education, information about children's development and health education, home learning, children's performances, recreation, collaboration with the community, Puncak Tema, home visits by teachers and participation in school activities.

desc: Tujuan dalam penelitian ini untuk mengetahui implementasi scientific approach dalam kegiatan bermain anak serta bagaimana scientific approach mampu mengembangkan multiple intelligences anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yaitu metode survey. Penelitian ini menggunakan angket dan lembar observasi sebagai alat penelitian yang dilakukan pada 9 lembaga Pendidikan Anak usia Dini (PAUD) yang berada di Kabupaten Temanggung, Wonosobo, dan Kebumen. Pengumpulan data dengan menggunakan wawancara, angket, dan pengamatan. Analisis data menggunakan deskriptif kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan implementasikan kegiatan pembelajaran dengan menggunakan Scientific Approach baru mencapai 44,44 %. Hal ini didasarkan pada hasil penelitian dilapangan, guru di lembaga PAUD se Karisidenan Kedu belum semua mampu memberikan kesempatan kepada anak untuk memberikan kesempatan anak mulai dari mengamati, menanya, mengumpulkan informasi, menalar sampai pada mengkomunikasikan. Meskipun demikian, pembelajaran dengan menggunakan Scientific Approach dapat menstimulasi multiple intelligences anak usia dini
title: Implementasi Scientific Approach dalam Mengembangkan Multiple Intelligences Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of scientific approach in developing multiple intelligences of early childhood The purpose of this study was to determine the implementation of scientific approach in children's play activities and how scientific approach is able to develop multiple intelligences of early childhood The research method used in this study is the survey method This study uses questionnaires and observation sheets as research tools conducted at early childhood education institutions in Temanggung Wonosobo and Kebumen districts Data collection using interviews, questionnaires and observations Data analysis using quantitative descriptive The results of the study showed that the implementation of learning activities using scientific approach has only achieved this based on the results of research in the field, teachers at early childhood education institutions in the Kedu residency have not all been able to provide opportunities for children to provide opportunities for children starting from observing, asking, collecting information, reasoning, to communicating, however, learning using scientific approach can stimulate multiple intelligences of early childhood

desc: Keterampilan berbicara merupakan hal yang perlu dilatih pada usia dini agar anak mampu mengungkapkan pengetahuan, ide dan perasaaannya sehingga dapat diterima pada lingkungannya. Karakter adalah nilai-nilai positif yang dibentuk pengetahuan, perasaan dan perilaku moral yang ditumbuhkembangkan dalam kepribadian. Al Islam Kemuhammadiyahan (AIK) sebagai karakteristik dari lembaga pendidikan Muhammadiyah/Aisyiyah memerlukan media yang tepat untuk menyampaikan pembelajaran yang terintegrasi dengan kurikulum 2013 PAUD.  Tujuan penelitian untuk mengembangkan video pembelajaran AIK yang valid, praktis dan efektif untuk meningkatkan keterampilan berbicara dan karakter anak usia dini di TK Aisyiyah. Jenis penelitian ialah penelitian dan pengembangan (RD) dengan model ADDIE. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan video pembelajaran AIK dapat meningkatkan keterampilan berbicara dan karakter anak sesuai hasil penilaian oleh ahli materi pada persentase 93%, ahli media 93% dan ahli bahasa  96% dengan kategori sangat valid. Selanjutnya hasil praktikalitas  video AIK mendapatkan nilai rata-rata 94% dengan kategori sangat praktis dan hasil efektifitas pada nilai rata-rata 92% dengan kategori sangat efektif digunakan dalam pembelajaran anak usia dini
title: Video Pembelajaran Al-Islam Kemuhammadiyahan untuk Meningkatkan Keterampilan Berbicara dan Karakter Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: learning videos of aislam muhammadiyah to improve speaking skills and character of early childhood speaking skills are something that needs to be trained at an early age so that children are able to express their knowledge ideas and feelings so that they can be accepted in their environment character is positive values ​​that are formed knowledge feelings and moral behavior that are developed in the personality of al islam kemuhammadiyah aik as a characteristic of the educational institution of muhammadiyahhaisyiyah requires the right media to deliver learning that is integrated with the early childhood curriculum the purpose of the study was to develop a valid, practical and effective aik learning video to improve speaking skills and character of early childhood in tk aisyiyah the type of research is research and development rd with the addie model the results of the study showed that aik learning videos can improve children's speaking skills and character according to the results of the assessment by material experts on the percentage of media experts and language experts with a very valid category then the results of the practicality of the aik video get an average value with a very practical category and the results of the effectiveness at an average value with a very effective category used in early childhood learning

desc: Koordinasi mata, tangan, dan jari-jemari membutuhkan kecermatan dan ketelitian dalam pembiasaaan dan pengendalian gerak motorik halus anak usia dini.Salah satu kegiatan motorik halus dapat distimulus dengan kegiatan menganyam menggunakan bahan alam. Penelitian ini bertujuaan untuk mengetahui pengaruh kegiatan menganyam terhadap perkembangan motorik halus anak usia dini. Quasi Eksperimen menjadi metode dalam penelitian ini dengan desain nonequivalent control group design. Subjek penelitian ini anak usia 5-6 tahun, yaitu kelompok B1 kelas eksperimen dan B2 kelas kontrol. Untuk uji hipotesis pada penelitian ini menggunakan uji-t berbantu program SPSS V.21. Berdasarkan hasil uji t dengan uji Independent sample t test, nilai signifikansi  0,05 artinya H1 diterima dan H0 ditolak, dengan demikian dapat disimpulkan bahwa kegiatan menganyam berpengaruh terhadap pekembangan motorik halus anak kelompok B usia 5-6 tahun. Hasil tersebut dapat digunakan menjadi salah satu alternatif pembelajaran dalam mengembangkan motorik halus anak usia dini.
title: Kegiatan Menganyam dengan Bahan Alam untuk Mengembangkan Kemampuan Motorik Halus Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: weaving activities with natural materials to develop children's fine motor skills, hand-eye and finger coordination require precision and accuracy in the habituation and control of fine motor movements in early childhood, one of the fine motor activities can be stimulated by weaving activities using natural materials, this study aims to determine the effect of weaving activities on the development of fine motor skills in early childhood, quasi-experimental is the method in this study with a nonequivalent control group design, the subjects of this study were children aged years, namely group b, experimental class and b, control class, for hypothesis testing in this study using the t-test assisted by the spss v program based on the results of the t-test with the independent sample t-test, the significance value means h is accepted and h is rejected, thus it can be concluded that weaving activities have an effect on the development of fine motor skills in children in group b, aged years, these results can be used as an alternative learning method in developing fine motor skills in early childhood

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah meningkatkan kemampuan kerja sama anak melalui kegiatan kerja kelompok pada anak Kelompok A Taman Kanak-kanak (TK) Kartika Salo Kabupaten Kampar. Kegiatan kerja kelompok dipilih karena kegiatan ini dapat menggerakan anak melakukan kerjasama dengan baik. Jenis penelitian ini adalah penelitian tindakan kelas kolaboratif  yang menggunakan model Kemmis dan Mc Taggart. Subjek pada penelitian ini adalah 16 anak Kelompok A TK Kartika Salo Kampar yang terdiri dari 6 anak laki-laki dan 10 anak perempuan. Objek penelitian ini yaitu kemampuan kerja sama anak yang meliputi kemampuan berinteraksi, tanggung jawab, dan saling membantu. Metode pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah observasi dan dokumentasi. Instrumen yang digunakan adalah lembar observasi. Teknik analisis data dilakukan secara deskriptif kuantitatif. Indikator keberhasilan dalam penelitian ini adalah apabila perhitungan persentase seluruh aspek menunjukkan nilai 80%. Hasil  penelitian ini menunjukkan  bahwa  kemampuan  kerja  sama  anak  meningkat setelah adanya tindakan melalui kegiatan kerja kelompok. Dari data Siklus I persentase kemampuan kerja sama anak 65%. Pada Siklus II kemampuan kerja sama anak mengalami peningkatan menjadi 93%. Dapat dikatakan bahwa penelitian ini berhasil karena persentase sudah melebihi angka yang ditentukan, yakni 80%.
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Kerja Sama melalui Kegiatan Kerja Kelompok Pada Anak Kelompok A TK  Kartika Salo  Kabupaten Kampar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving cooperation skills through group work activities in children in group A of Kartika Salo Kindergarten, Kampar Regency. The purpose of this study was to improve children's cooperation skills through group work activities in children in group A of Kartika Salo Kindergarten, Kampar Regency. Group work activities were chosen because these activities can motivate children to cooperate well. The type of this research is collaborative classroom action research using the Kemmis and Mc Taggart models. The subjects in this study were children in group A of Kartika Salo Kindergarten, Kampar, consisting of boys and girls. The object of this study was children's cooperation skills which included the ability to interact, be responsible and help each other. The data collection method used was observation and documentation. The instrument used was an observation sheet. Data analysis techniques were carried out descriptively and quantitatively. The indicator of success in this study is if the percentage calculation of all aspects shows a value. The results of this study indicate that children's cooperation skills increased after the action through group work activities. From the data in cycle I, the percentage of children's cooperation skills in cycle II, children's cooperation skills increased. It can be said that this study was successful because the percentage had exceeded the specified number, namely

desc: Artikel ini merupakan hasil penelitian dalam rangka mengembangkan Model Kurikulum PAUD 2013 Berbasis Kearifan Lokal Suku Ngalum Ok dengan metode Research  Development (RD) model ADDIE melalui tahapan penelitian Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation and Evaluations. Secara teknis, penelitian ini dilakukan dalam tiga tahap yaitu Tahap Analisis, Tahap Desain dan Tahap Pengembangan. Subjek penelitian adalah Suku Ngalum Ok. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa, model pengembangan Kurikulum PAUD 2013 perlu dikembangkan berbasis Kearifan Lokal dengan memasukkan unsur-unsur kearifan lokal, seperti: Nik Yepki Nik Talaki, Tena Mangoptepki, Bauk Wal dan Mapolki Miki; Permainan Tradisional seperti Womnong, Taungek, Dakbit, Atuk, Okhit; Bolibong; dan Diihong dan Nilai-Nilai kehidupan universal seperti kejujuran, sopan santun, saling menghormati, gotong-royong, keadilan dan lain sebagainya. Harapannya, model pengembangan kurikulum PAUD 2013 berbasis kearifan lokal Suku Ngalum Ok dapat menjadi model pembelajaran kontekstual pada anak usia dini; sekaligus merupakan upaya untuk mempertahankan eksistensi kearifan lokal sebagai identitas bangsa.
title: Pengembangan Model Kurikulum PAUD 2013 Berbasis Kearifan Lokal Suku Ngalum Ok
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of early childhood education curriculum model based on local wisdom of the Ngalum Ok tribe This article is the result of research in order to develop a model of early childhood education curriculum based on local wisdom of the Ngalum Ok tribe with the research development rd model addie method through the stages of research analysis design development implementation and evaluations technically this research was conducted in three stages, namely the analysis stage, the design stage and the development stage, the subject of the research is the Ngalum Ok tribe, the results of this study indicate that the early childhood education curriculum development model needs to be developed based on local wisdom by including elements of local wisdom such as nik yepki nik talaki tena mangoptepki bauk wal and mapolki miki traditional games such as womnong taungek dakbit atuk okhit bolibong and diihong and universal life values ​​such as honesty, politeness, mutual respect, mutual cooperation, justice and so on, it is hoped that the early childhood education curriculum development model based on local wisdom of the Ngalum Ok tribe can be a contextual learning model for early childhood as well as an effort to maintain the existence of local wisdom as a national identity

desc: This study aims to find out the problems faced by child nurture and learning assistance for children in the family during the covid -19 pandemic. This research is a descriptive qualitative study with a survey method. This research was conducted in Yogyakarta Province. The respondents of this study were parents, totaling 78 people.This study used a closed questionnaire. The results of the study are that the Covid 19 pandemic has made parents experience various obstacles related to parenting and assisting children in learning, ranging from the inability of parents to explain school material, disciplining children, spending too much time with gadgets and technical obstacles faced by 50% of families. These technical constraints are related to signal, wifi, quota and the ability to own gadgets. So that in providing assistance such as quotas, it would be better if support was also given to students who do not have gadgets and assistance for areas that are still having problems with signals because there are no transmitters.
title: Child Nurture and Learning Assistance for Children in The Family During the Covid -19 Pandemic
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: child care and learning assistance for children in the family during the covid pandemic this study aims to find out the problems faced by child care and learning assistance for children in the family during the covid pandemic this research is a descriptive qualitative study with a survey method research was conducted in yogyakarta province the respondents of this study were parents totaling people this study used a closed questionnaire the results of the study are that the covid pandemic has made parents experience various obstacles related to parenting and assisting children in learning ranging from the inability of parents to explain school material disciplining children spending too much time with gadgets and technical obstacles faced by of families these technical constraints are related to signal wifi quota and the ability to own gadgets so that in providing assistance such as quotas it would be better if support was also given to students who do not have gadgets and assistance for areas that are still having problems with signals because there are no transmitters

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui pengaruh penggunaan media video tutorial dan gambar pada motivasi dan kemandirian belajar anak. Jenis penelitian ini ialah eksperimen semu atau quasi experimental design. Proses penelitian ini dilaksanakan pengamatan 2 grup pembelajaran. Jumlah sampel 80 anak berusia 5 sampai 6 tahun, ditentukan berdasarkan dengan teknik purposive cluster random sampling. Berdasar pada hasil analisisnya, didapatkan hasilnya yakni: (1) media video tutorial (X₁) ada pengaruh signifikan terhadap motivasi belajar anak; (2) media gambar (X₂) ada pengaruh signifikan terhadap motivasi belajar anak (Y₁); (3) perbedaan motivasi belajar anak (Y₁) antara kelompok anak yang diajar dengan menggunakan media video tutorial (X₁) dan gambar (X₂) terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan; (4) media video tutorial (X₁) berpengaruh signifikan terhadap kemandirian belajar anak (Y₂); (5) media gambar (X₂) ada pengaruh signifikan terhadap kemandirian belajar anak (Y₁); (6) perbedaan kemandirian belajar anak (Y₂) antara kelompok anak yang diajar dengan menggunakan media video tutorial (X₁) dan gambar (X₂) terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan
title: Pengaruh Pemanfaatan Media Video Tutorial dan Gambar Terhadap Motivasi dan Kemandirian Belajar Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effect of using video tutorial and image media on children's learning motivation and independence The purpose of this study was to determine the effect of using video tutorial and image media on children's learning motivation and independence The type of research is a quasi-experimental design The research process was carried out by observing learning groups The number of samples of children aged up to years was determined based on the purposive cluster random sampling technique Based on the results of the analysis, the results were obtained, namely video tutorial media x₁ has a significant effect on children's learning motivation Image media x₂ has a significant effect on children's learning motivation y₁ The difference in children's learning motivation y₁ between groups of children taught using video tutorial media x₁ and images x₂ There is a significant difference Video tutorial media x₁ has a significant effect on children's learning independence y₂ Image media x₂ has a significant effect on children's learning independence y₁ The difference in children's learning independence y₂ between groups of children taught using video tutorial media x₁ and images x₂ There is a significant difference

desc: This study aims to improve children's social-emotional abilities through project-based drawing activities. The study was conducted on children of PAUD Pelita Kasih, Dalung group B semester 2 academic year 2017/2018. This type of research is action research with a four-stage procedure, namely: 1) Planning phase, 2) Action taking phase, 3) Development phase, 4) Reflection phase. The research was carried out in two cycles. Data collection methods used in this study are through observation. The process of collecting data through this observation technique uses a rubric guide to record data about the social-emotional abilities shown by early childhood in project-based drawing activities. The results of the study showed an increase in children's social-emotional abilities in project-based drawing activities. Completeness of children's social-emotional abilities in the initial observation of 17 children (68%), the cycle I as many as 19 children (76%), and cycle II 23 children (92%). So it can be said that the project method as an alternative method of learning that is creative, innovative and effective in drawing activities that can improve the social-emotional abilities of early childhood
title: Project-Based Drawing Activities in Improving Social-Emotional Skills of Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
