desc: Karakter adalah nilai yang khas, watak, ataupun kepribadian yang terbentuk dan menjadi jati diri pada orang tersebut. Disiplin adalah bagian dari karakter yang harus dimiliki oleh setiap individu sebagai bekal baginya untuk masa yang akan datang. Perkembangan karakter dipengaruhi pola pengasuhan yang diterima oleh anak dari orang tua. Tujuan dilakukannya penelitian ini adalah untuk menganalisis pengasuhan keluarga terhadap perkembangan karakter disiplin anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah dengan metode kajian pustaka, menelaah dan mengumpulkan berbagai sumber-sumber ilmiah yang kemudian dihubungkan dengan penelitian untuk memecahkan masalah. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kultur pengasuhan dari keluarga khususnya orang tua memiliki keterkaitan dengan perkembangan karakter disiplin anak. Perkembangan karakter disiplin anak dipengaruhi oleh pola pengasuhan, masing-masing gaya pengasuhan otoriter, pengasuhan demokratis, dan pengasuhan permisif yang diterapkan dalam keluarga yang  mempengaruhi perkembangan anak dimasa depan.
title: Pengasuhan Keluarga terhadap Perkembangan Karakter Disiplin Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Family care for the development of early childhood discipline character character is a distinctive value of character or personality that is formed and becomes the identity of the person discipline is part of the character that must be possessed by each individual as a provision for him for the future character development is influenced by the parenting pattern received by the child from the parents the purpose of this study is to analyze family care for the development of early childhood discipline character the research method used is the literature review method examining and collecting various scientific sources which are then linked to research to solve the problem the results of the study indicate that the parenting culture of the family, especially parents, is related to the development of children's discipline character the development of children's discipline character is influenced by the parenting pattern of each authoritarian parenting style democratic parenting and permissive parenting applied in the family which influences the development of children in the future

desc: Kemampuan penyesuaian diri anak sejak usia dini perlu dikembangkan agar anak memiliki kemandirian. Oleh karena itu, orang tua diharapkan tidak berperilaku over protective kepada anak. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahuan dan menganalisis pengaruh perilaku over perotective orang tua terhadap kemampuan penyesuaian diri anak. Metode penelitian menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif. Jumlah sampel penelitian sebanyak 72 orang tua siswa kelompok B TK ABA Kebondalem Lor Prambanan Klaten. Teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan total sampling, sehingga semua siswa dijadikan sampel penelitian Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan kuesioner. Teknik analisis data menggunakan analisis deskriptif dan analisis regresi linier sederhana. Hasil penelitian menyimpulkan bahwa perilaku over protective orang tua berpengaruh signifikan terhadap kemampuan penyesuaian diri anak, yang dibuktikan oleh hasil uji t sebesar -6,481 dengan signifikansi 0,000  0,05 (tingkat kesalahan 5%).
title: Pengaruh Perilaku Over Protective Orang Tua Terhadap Kemampuan Penyesuaian Diri Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of overprotective parental behavior on children's ability to adjust children's ability to adjust from an early age needs to be developed so that children have independence, therefore parents are expected not to behave overprotectively towards children. The purpose of this study was to find out and analyze the influence of overprotective parental behavior on children's ability to adjust. The research method used a quantitative approach. The number of research samples was 1,000 parents of group B students at TK Aba Kebondalem Lor Prambanan Klaten. The sampling technique used total sampling so that all students were used as research samples. The data collection technique used a questionnaire. The data analysis technique used descriptive analysis and simple linear regression analysis. The results of the study concluded that overprotective parental behavior had a significant effect on children's ability to adjust, as evidenced by the results of the t-test of 100 with a significant error rate.

desc: Pandemi Covid-19 membuat cara belajar di sekolah berubah. Setelah sempat kurang lebih selama satu tahun pembelajaran dilakukan jarak jauh, saat ini terbit kebijakan dari empat Menteri untuk membuka sekolah dan melaksanakan pembelajaran tatap muka terbatas di Indonesia. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui kesiapan hingga pelaksanaan pembelajaran tatap muka terbatas di Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini. Subjek penelitian dipilih menggunakan Teknik pusposive sampling yaitu empat sekolah di Kota Malang yang telah menerapkan pembelajaran tatap muka terbatas namun memiliki karakteristik lingkungan dan jumlah siswa yang berbeda. Teknik pengumpulan data akan dilakukan melalui studi dokumentasi dan wawancara dengan pihak sekolah. Teknik analisis menggunakan teknik analisis domain. Hasil menggambarkan bahwa persiapan yang matang dan pelaksanaan yang tertib serta Kerjasama Lembaga PAUD dan orang tua dalam melaksanakan Pembelajaran tatap Muka Terbatas menjadikan pembelajaran berjalan dengan baik dan lancar.
title: Eksplorasi Penerapan Pembelajaran Tatap Muka Terbatas pada Jenjang PAUD di Masa Kebiasaan Baru
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: exploration of the application of limited face-to-face learning at the early childhood education level during the new normal era of the Covid pandemic has changed the way of learning in schools after approximately one year of distance learning, currently a policy has been issued by four ministers to open schools and implement limited face-to-face learning in Indonesia. The purpose of this study is to determine the readiness for the implementation of limited face-to-face learning in early childhood education. The research subjects were selected using purposive sampling techniques, namely four schools in the city of Malang that have implemented limited face-to-face learning but have different environmental characteristics and number of students. Data collection techniques will be carried out through documentation studies and interviews with the school. Analysis techniques using domain analysis techniques. The results illustrate that thorough preparation and orderly implementation as well as cooperation between early childhood institutions and parents in implementing limited face-to-face learning make learning run well and smoothly.

desc: The purpose of this study were (1) to know the perception of PGPAUD students toward early childhood education in Ponorogo District. (2) to know the obstacles of early childhood education in Ponorogo Regency based on perception of PG-PAUD students Muhammadiyah University of Ponorogo. The method used in this research is qualitative descriptive involving 30 students. Data collection was done by interview technique. The interview was conducted directly to the students of PGPAUD Muhammadiyah University of Ponorogo. The results of this study are 1) PGPAUD student perception on the implementation of early childhood education in Ponorogo regency in general has not run well according to national standards of early childhood education. 2) the obstacles of early childhood education in Ponorogo District are a) there are some teachers of PAUD who have not S1 PGPAUD, the welfare of early childhood teachers are still low, facilities and infrastructure is not adequate, and mininya assistance from the government, both central and local.
title: Persepsi Mahasiswa PG-PAUD Universitas Muhammadiyah Ponorogo terhadap PAUD di Kabupaten Ponorogo,
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Muhammadiyah University of Ponorogo pgpaud students' perceptions of early childhood education in Ponorogo district of ponorogo the method used in this research is qualitative descriptive involving students data collection was done by interview technique the interview was conducted directly to the students of pgpaud muhammadiyah university of ponorogo the results of this study are pgpaud student perception on the implementation of early childhood education in ponorogo regency in general has not run well according to national standards of early childhood education the obstacles of early childhood education in ponorogo district are some teachers of early childhood who have not s pgpaud the welfare of early childhood teachers are still low facilities and infrastructure are not adequate and minimal assistance from the government both central and local

desc: Hasil Observasi menunjukkan bahwa hanya 40 persen saja Guru menggunakan media pembelajaran berbasis IT. Karena itu peneliti tertarik untuk mengembangkan media pembelajaran berbasis Sparkol VideoScribe dalam keberagaman Makhluk Hidup di Lingkunganku ditinjau dari aspek pembelajaran, aspek materi, dan aspek media. Metode penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian pegembangan model ADDIE (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation and Evaluation). Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dan analisis data bahwa dari 30 anak yang mengikuti tes, secara klasikal sebanyak 26 orang anak atau sebesar 86,7 persen yang tuntas dan sebanyak 4 orang atau 13,3 persen yang tidak tuntas. Selanjutnya, dilihat dari kualitas media pembelajaran berbasis sparkol videoscribe hasil pengembangan ini secara keseluruhan termasuk pada kategori Baik, yang meliputi aspek pembelajaran, aspek materi, dan aspek media. Jadi, penelitian ini telah dapat menunjukkan bahwa perangkat yang telah dikembangkan telah mampu meningkatkan hasil belajar anak pada pada kegiatan IPA pada materi Keberagaman Makhluk Hidup Lingkunganku
title: Media Pembelajaran Berbasis Sparkol Video Scribe dalam Meningkatkan Hasil Belajar IPA Siswa SD Kelas Awal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Sparkol video scribe based learning media in improving science learning outcomes of elementary school students in early grades, observation results show that only 50% of teachers use IT-based learning media, therefore researchers are interested in developing sparkol videoscribe-based learning media in the diversity of living things in my environment, reviewed from the learning aspects of the material aspects and media aspects, this research method uses the Addie analysis design development model, implementation and evaluation research based on the results of research and data analysis that from children who took the classical test, as many as 100 children or 100 percent completed and as many as 100 people or 100 percent did not complete, then seen from the quality of sparkol videoscribe-based learning media, the results of this development as a whole are included in the good category which includes learning aspects, material aspects and media aspects, so this study has been able to show that the device that has been developed has been able to improve children's learning outcomes in science activities on the diversity of living things in my environment

desc: This study aimed to describe children's listening skills in lesson study-based learning activities at Telkom preschool group B1 in Ternate City. The students involved were 24 early students. The lesson study process included preparing, observing, and reflecting lessons in the context of listening skills. In data analysis, Miles and Huberman interaction model was employed to describe the data qualitatively and quantitative data analyzed using descriptive statistics. The results showed that children listening skill on lesson study-based learning activity on the ‘market day’ topic implemented at Telkom Preschool Group B1 in Ternate City  was categorized as good (81.8) and sufficient (68.2). Furthermore, the data the development of a non-cognitive assessment instrument for listening ability in early childhood based on lesson study is feasible to be implemented .The result can be used as a basis for improvement and strengthening a lesson study activities dealing with listening skills in preschool that lesson study-based activities can improve children early listening skills in understanding subjects on the theme ‘market day’.
title: Early Listening Skill on Lesson Study-Based Activities
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: early listening skills on lesson study based activities this study aimed to describe childrens listening skills in lesson study based learning activities at telkom preschool group b in ternate city the students involved were early students the lesson study process included preparing observing and reflecting lessons in the context of listening skills in data analysis miles and huberman interaction model was employed to describe the data qualitatively and quantitatively data analyzed using descriptive statistics the results showed that children listening skills on lesson study based learning activity on the market day topic implemented at telkom preschool group b in ternate city was categorized as good and sufficient furthermore the data the development of a noncognitive assessment instrument for listening abilities in early childhood based on lesson study is feasible to be implemented the results can be used as a basis for improving and strengthening a lesson study activities dealing with listening skills in preschool that lesson study based activities can improve children's early listening skills in understanding subjects on the theme market day

desc: Kecerdasan interpersonal memiliki peran penting bagi anak usia dini dalam rangka tumbuhkembangnya. Oleh karena itu, guru memiliki peran yang sangat vital untuk mengembangkan kecerdasan tersebut. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengkaji upaya guru PAUD dalam membangun kecerdasan intrapersonal anak yang penting bagi tumbuh kembang kemampuan bersosialisasi anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif jenis studi kasus. Tujuan penelitian ini ialah untuk menganalisa upaya guru PAUD dalam mengasah kecerdasan intrapersonal anak usia dini. Adapun upaya guru PAUD antara lain melibatkan anak dalam memilih judul buku; memberi kesempatan kepada anak untuk melanjutkan cerita yang sudah dilakukan oleh gurunya sebelumnya; serta melibatkan orang tua. Dengan mengembangkan dan mengenali kecerdasan intrapersonalnya seorang anak dapat mengenali dirinya sendiri dan mengelola emosinya dengan baik.
title: Upaya Guru dalam Membangun Kecerdasan Intrapersonal pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teachers' efforts in building intrapersonal intelligence in early childhood Interpersonal intelligence has an important role for early childhood in the context of their growth and development Therefore, teachers have a very vital role in developing this intelligence This study aims to examine the efforts of early childhood education teachers in building intrapersonal intelligence in children which is important for the growth and development of children's social skills This study uses a qualitative approach, case study type The purpose of this study is to analyze the efforts of early childhood education teachers in honing the intrapersonal intelligence of early childhood The efforts of early childhood education teachers include involving children in choosing book titles Giving children the opportunity to continue the story that their teacher has done before And involving parents by developing and recognizing their intrapersonal intelligence A child can recognize themselves and manage their emotions well

desc: Penting bagi guru pendidikan anak usia dini untuk memilih, menemukan dan mencari mitra yang sesuai agar anak usia golden age dapat tumbuh kembang dengan sempurna, mendapatkan pelayanan pendidikan, pembelajaran dan asuhan yang berkarakter baik. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk memperoleh gambaran tentang strategi guru dalam pembelajaran holistik pada pendidikan anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan kuantitatif deskriptif dengan survei. Teknik analisis data dari penelitian ini menggunakan analisis deskriptif dalam bentuk tabel frekuensi dengan formula yang di persentasikan (%). Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa analisisi strategi guru dalam pembelajaran holistik pada pendidikan anak usia dini kota gorontalo dengan nilai 79.52% berada pada kategori baik. Guru dapat menggunakan strategi-strategi ini untuk mengimplementasikan PAUD HI yang berkualitas
title: Strategi Guru dalam Pembelajaran Holistik pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teacher strategies in holistic learning in early childhood education are important for early childhood education teachers to choose to find and seek appropriate partners so that children in the golden age can grow and develop perfectly and receive educational services, learning and care with good character. This study aims to obtain an overview of teacher strategies in holistic learning in early childhood education. This study uses quantitative descriptive with a survey. Data analysis techniques from this study use descriptive analysis in the form of a frequency table with a formula that is presented. The results of the study indicate that the analysis of teacher strategies in holistic learning in early childhood education in Gorontalo City with values ​​​​in the good category. Teachers can use these strategies to implement quality PAUD HI.

desc: Pembelajaran moral sejak dini penting dilakukan sebagai fondasi pembentukan perilaku yang akan menentukan bagaimana anak akan berinteraksi dengan orang lain. Banyak studi yang menyampaikan adanya penurunan perilaku moral positif seperti kebaikan, kepercayaan, tanggungjawab, kebenaran, dan rasa hormat antar sesama manusia. Salah satu metode yang menyenangkan untuk anak usia dini (AUD) dalam pembelajaran moral adalah melalui lagu. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menggambarkan isi pesan moral lirik lagu dolanan khas Jawa. Jenis penelitian hermeunetika milik Gadamer digunakan untuk mengungkap makna dari setiap lirik lagu dolanan. Analisis data dilakukan dengan cara menggali makna dari setiap lirik lagu. Hasilnya bahwa lagu dolanan memiliki nilai karakter seperti tidak serakah, sabar, berempati terhadap orang lain, tidak mudah putus asa, dan mampu membedakan perilaku baik dan buru. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat menjadi referensi bagi guru untuk memberikan pendidikan moral yang menyenangkan pada anak usia dini melalui lagu.
title: Studi Deskriptif Isi Pesan Moral Pada Lirik Lagu Dolanan Khas Jawa
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Descriptive study of the content of moral messages in the lyrics of typical Javanese dolanan songs Early moral learning is important as a foundation for the formation of behavior that will determine how children will interact with others Many studies have shown a decline in positive moral behavior such as kindness, trust, responsibility, truth and respect between fellow human beings One fun method for early childhood in moral learning is through songs This study aims to describe the content of the moral messages in the lyrics of typical Javanese dolanan songs Gadamer's hermeneutical research type is used to reveal the meaning of each dolanan song lyric Data analysis was carried out by exploring the meaning of each song lyric The results are that dolanan songs have character values ​​such as not being greedy, patient, empathetic towards others, not easily discouraged and able to distinguish between good and bad behavior The implications of the results of this study can be a reference for teachers to provide fun moral education to early childhood through songs

desc: Kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini memiliki peran penting bagi perkembangan pribadi secara keseluruhan. Kemampuan motorik kasar ini dapat dikembangkan melalui beberapa cara, salah satunya menggunakan gerakan senam Si Buyung dan senam Irama Ceria. Tujuan penelitian adalah untuk menganalisis pengaruh senam Si Buyung dan Senam Irama Ceria terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar pada anak TK kelompok B. Jenis penelitian adalah penelitian eksperimen dengan desain one group-pretest-posttest design. Teknik sampling menggunakan purposive sampling. Penelitian dilakukan pada enam TK dengan jumlah sampel penelitian sebanyak 153 anak. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan lembar observasi dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data menggunakan Wilcoxon Test. Hasil penelitian menyimpulkan bahwa latihan senam Si Buyung dan senam Irama Ceria dapat meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak TK. Hal ini berimplikasi bahwa guru TK kelompok B dapat menggunakan senam Si Buyung dan senam Irama Ceria untuk meningkatkan kemampuan motorik anak.
title: Pengaruh Senam Si Buyung dan  Senam Irama Ceria Terhadap Kemampuan Motorik Kasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of si buyung gymnastics and cheerful rhythmic gymnastics on gross motor skills. Gross motor skills of early childhood have an important role in overall personal development. These gross motor skills can be developed in several ways, one of which is using si buyung gymnastics and cheerful rhythmic gymnastics movements. The purpose of this study was to analyze the influence of si buyung gymnastics and cheerful rhythmic gymnastics on gross motor skills in kindergarten children in group B. The type of research is experimental research with a one group pretest posttest design. The sampling technique used purposive sampling. The study was conducted in six kindergartens with a total of 1,000 children. The data collection technique used observation and documentation sheets. The data analysis technique used the Wilcoxon test. The results of the study concluded that si buyung gymnastics and cheerful rhythmic gymnastics exercises can improve the gross motor skills of kindergarten children. This implies that kindergarten teachers in group B can use si buyung gymnastics and cheerful rhythmic gymnastics to improve children's motor skills.

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan manajemen kepemimpinan inovatif pada pendidikan anak usia dini dalam perspektif merdeka belajar era new normal di Kota Gorontalo Provinsi Gorontalo. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif. Sumber data terdiri dari 38 orang kepala sekolah. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kepemimpinan inovatif kepala sekolah di Kota Gorontalo berada pada kategori baik dengan tingkat persentase 79,53%. Kebaruan yang didapatkan dalam penelitian ini adalah kepala-kepala sekolah di masa datang harus lebih memiliki jiwa revolusioner yang mampu menerima dan mengimplementasikan perubahan melalui visi, misi, dan tujuan untuk mengembangkan sekolah. Dampak dari hasil penelitian ini adalah kepala sekolah perlu bekerjasama bersama tim melalui kreativitas tim dan inovasi organisasi serta cara kerja tersistem dalam inovasi organisasi melalui kreativitas individu secara visual paham akan informasi aktual secara digital untuk mewujudkan merdeka belajar untuk saat ini dan masa depan.
title: Manajemen Kepemimpinan Inovatif pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini dalam Perspektif Merdeka Belajar Era New Normal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: innovative leadership management in early childhood education in the perspective of independent learning in the new normal era The purpose of this study is to describe innovative leadership management in early childhood education in the perspective of independent learning in the new normal era in Gorontalo City, Gorontalo Province The method used in this study is a quantitative descriptive research method The data source consists of school principals The results of the study show that the innovative leadership of school principals in Gorontalo City is in the good category with a percentage level of novelty obtained in this study is that future school principals must have a more revolutionary spirit that is able to accept and implement change through a vision, mission and goals to develop schools The impact of the results of this study is that school principals need to work together with their teams through team creativity and organizational innovation as well as systematic work methods in organizational innovation through individual creativity visually understand actual information digitally to realize independent learning for now and the future

desc: Tujuan penelitian adalah untuk mengetahui efektivitas program pembelajaran membaca permulaan dengan metode Sight Words dalam meningkatkan lingkungan keluarga yang mendukung literasi membaca dan meningkatkan minat baca anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif kuasi eksperimental dengan desain penelitian one group pre-test post-test. Sampel dalam penelitian  berjumlah 30 orang Ibu dengan anak usia 4-6 tahun yang diambil dengan teknik purposive sampling. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan kuesioner. Teknik analisis data menggunakan uji t-test. Hasil analisis data menunjukkan bahwa terdapat perbedaan minat baca anak sebelum dan sesudah diberikan kegiatan belajar membaca dengan pendampingan lewat metode Sight Words namun tidak terdapat perubahan yang signifikan terhadap HLE setelah dilakukan intervensi.
title: Mengoptimalkan Dukungan Ibu dalam Meningkatkan Minat Baca Anak di Situasi Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: optimizing maternal support in increasing children's interest in reading in a pandemic situation, the purpose of the study was to determine the effectiveness of the early reading learning program with the sight words method in improving the family environment that supports reading literacy and increasing children's interest in reading. This study used a quasi-experimental quantitative approach with a one-group pretest-posttest research design. The sample in the study consisted of mothers with children aged years who were taken using the purposive sampling technique. The data collection technique used a questionnaire. The data analysis technique used the t-test. The results of the data analysis showed that there was a difference in children's interest in reading before and after being given reading learning activities with assistance through the sight words method, but there was no significant change in HLE after the intervention.

desc: Dalam kompetensi pedagogis dan profesional Guru PAUD terdapat indikator menguasai media pembelajaran dan mampu menciptakan materi pembelajaran yang menarik. Indikator tersebut mencakup kemampuan dalam menentukan materi, menyusun strategi dan metode, membuat media dan bahan belajar secara kreatif. Big book merupakan salah satu media dan bahan belajar yang sering digunakan guru PAUD dalam pembelajarannya, namun sebagian besar Guru menggunakan Big book yang sudah tersedia atau bukan hasil karyanya sendiri. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menemukan Model Pengembangan Big book yang sistematis, mudah dan sederhana dalam pengaplikasiannya. Metode penelitian menggunakan RD dengan paradigma kualitatif deskriptif. Desain penelitian mengadaptasi model yang dikembangkan oleh Borg and Gall yang dikonstruk menjadi empat tahapan, yaitu analisis kebutuhan, pengembangan model, uji coba model dan revisi model.  Penelitian dilaksanakan selama dua tahun, yaitu tahun 2019 dan 2020. Hasil penelitian berupa “Model pengembangan big book” yang mencakup materi, material (bahan dasar dan bahan pendukung) serta strategi pelaksanaan model.
title: Model Pengembangan Big Book untuk Meningkatkan Kompetensi Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Big book development model to improve the competence of early childhood education teachers in pedagogical and professional competence of early childhood education teachers there are indicators of mastering learning media and being able to create interesting learning materials, these indicators include the ability to determine materials, develop strategies and methods for making media and learning materials creatively, big books are one of the media and learning materials that are often used by early childhood education teachers in their learning, but most teachers use big books that are already available or are not their own work, this study aims to find a systematic big book development model that is easy and simple to apply, the research method uses rd with a qualitative descriptive paradigm, the research design adapts the model developed by borg and gall which is constructed into four stages, namely analysis of needs, model development, model trials and model revisions, the research was carried out for two years, namely years and the results of the study in the form of a big book development model that includes basic material and supporting materials and model implementation strategies

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan mendeskripsikan dan menganalisis peningkatan mutu pendidikan di Kelompok Kerja (POKJA) RA Poncol Magetan melalui program sedekah sampah. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan pesrpektif ethnoscience, dengan berusaha memahami perspektif lokal tentang pengelolaan sampah dengan menerapkan interview etnografi untuk memperoleh sejumlah taksonomi pengetahuan lokal. Sedekah sampah telah menjadi salah satu solusi persoalan sumber pembiayaan dan lemahnya literasi keuangan, sehingga RA yang tergabung dalam POKJA RA Poncol Magetan memiliki kesiapan yang optimal dalam pelaksanaan program-program pendidikannya pada aspek perencanaan, pelaksanaan, dan evaluasi pembelajaran. Selain itu POKJA RA Poncol Magetan memiliki keberdayaan yang baik melalui keterampilan dalam menyusun arus kas yang benar dalam merencanakan, melaksanakan, dan mengevaluasi pembelajarnnya melalui sedekah sampah, dimana sedekah sampah merupakan alternatif pemecahan masalah sampah yang memadukan unsur edukasi dan pemberdayaan yang berkelanjutan
title: Konstruksi Mutu Pendidikan melalui Literasi Keuangan pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini di Magetan
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Construction of educational quality through financial literacy in early childhood education in Magetan This study aims to describe and analyze the improvement of educational quality in the Pokja RA Poncol Magetan working group through the waste charity program This study uses a qualitative approach with an ethnoscience perspective by trying to understand local perspectives on waste management by applying ethnographic interviews to obtain a number of local knowledge taxonomies Waste charity has become one of the solutions to the problem of funding sources and weak financial literacy so that RA who are members of the Pokja RA Poncol Magetan have optimal readiness in implementing their education programs in terms of planning, implementation and evaluation of learning In addition, the Pokja RA Poncol Magetan has good empowerment through skills in compiling correct cash flow in planning, implementing and evaluating their learning through waste charity where waste charity is an alternative solution to the waste problem that combines elements of education and sustainable empowerment

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui kesiapan ibu untuk bermain bersama anaknya sejak diberlakukannya aturan dirumah saja. Metode penelitian dilakukan dengan metode survey, menggunakan angket dengan aplikasi google form. Teknik pengambilan sampling dengan metode purposive sampling, yaitu ibu yang mempunyai anak berusia 2 sampai 8 tahun. Penyebaran angket dilakukan secara on line melalui broadcast whatsapp, FB, dan IG, sejak 9 sampai 20 April 2020. Dari 545 ibu didapatkan bahwa dampak positif masa PSBB dirumah saja adalah membuat ibu mempunyai waktu yang lebih berkualitas bersama anak, dan dapat melakukan kegiatan bersama-sama. Disisi lain anak-anak menjadi rewel karena bosan dirumah saja, merasa kangen dengan teman, guru dan sekolahnya. Menghadapi situasi ini ibu merasa bingung untuk bermain bersama anaknya. Ibu juga merasakan lelah, bosan, dan kurang sabar, karena banyaknya pekerjaan lain yang harus dilakukan ibu selain mengurus anak. Kurangnya kesiapan ibu untuk bermain bersama anak sepanjang hari dan setiap hari selama masa PSBB.
title: Kesiapan Ibu Bermain Bersama Anak Selama Pandemi Covid-19, Dirumah Saja
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Mother's readiness to play with children during the Covid pandemic at home This study aims to determine the readiness of mothers to play with their children since the implementation of the stay-at-home rule The research method was carried out using a survey method using a questionnaire with the Google Form application The sampling technique was carried out using the purposive sampling method, namely mothers who have children aged up to years The distribution of questionnaires was carried out online via WhatsApp FB and IG broadcasts since April From mothers it was found that the positive impact of the PSBB period at home was that mothers had more quality time with their children and could do activities together On the other hand, children become cranky because they are bored at home They miss their friends, teachers and school In facing this situation, mothers feel confused about playing with their children Mothers also feel tired, bored and impatient because of the many other jobs that mothers have to do besides taking care of children The lack of readiness of mothers to play with children all day and every day during the PSBB period

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menggagas konsep penanaman sistem imunitas anti-radikalisme pada anak usia dini melalui habituasi dan pendekatan proses pembelajaran berbasis nilai-nilai kepesantrenan. Wacana radikalisme, maupun intoleransi beragama dipandang sebagai suatu bentuk pemikiran yang sangat berbahaya bagi keutuhan negara serta bertentangan dengan nilai-nilai ajaran agama. Lembaga pesantren diharapkan dapat memberikan warna bagi terwujudnya upaya internalisasi nilai-nilai akhlakul karimah bagi anak usia dini. Melalui pendekatan kualitatif, pengambilan data dilakukan berbasis wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Objek penelitian dilakukan kepada Kepala Sekolah dan lima guru di sekolah Raudatul Atfal Nurul Ansor di Kabupaten Bandung. Analisis data menggunakan kerangka Miles dan Huberman. Hasil menunjukkan bahwa membangun imunitas anti-radikalisme dibangun atas empat pilar fundamental: 1) Membumikan Nilai-nilai kepesantrenan seperti menghargai pendapat, menjaga ukhuwwah, toleransi, 2) Penguatan Muatan Kurikulum Program Kegiatan Anak Berbasis Agama, 3) Metode Pembelajaran Berbasis Pendekatan Anak, 4) Habituasi dan Kultur. Implikasi riset sebagai salah satu upaya preventif pencegahan radikalisme berbasis nilai kepesantrenan
title: Membangun Imunitas Anti Radikalisme pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Pembelajaran Berbasis Nilai-Nilai Pesantren
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Building anti-radicalism immunity in early childhood through learning based on Islamic boarding school values ​​This study aims to initiate the concept of instilling an anti-radicalism immunity system in early childhood through habituation and a learning process approach based on Islamic boarding school values ​​The discourse of radicalism and religious intolerance is seen as a form of thinking that is very dangerous for the integrity of the state and is contrary to the values ​​of religious teachings Islamic boarding school institutions are expected to provide color for the realization of efforts to internalize the values ​​of akhlakul karimah for early childhood through a qualitative approach Data collection is carried out based on interviews, observation and documentation of research objects are carried out with the principal and five teachers at the Raudatul Atfal Nurul Ansor school in Bandung Regency Data analysis uses the Miles and Huberman framework The results show that building anti-radicalism immunity is built on four fundamental pillars, grounding Islamic boarding school values ​​such as respecting opinions, maintaining brotherhood, tolerance, strengthening the curriculum content of children's activity programs based on religion, learning methods based on children's approaches, habituation and culture, research implications as one of the preventive efforts, prevention of radicalism based on Islamic boarding school values

desc: Banyak orang tua yang belum terbiasa atau belum memahami bagaimana memberikan pendidikan seksual sejak dini. Padahal perkembangan seksual telah dimulai sejak anak lahir. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengembangkan sebuah produk berupa buku pendidikan seksual bagi anak usia 1-3 tahun. Buku dikembangkan menggunakan tahap pengembangan produk Derek Rowntree dan disusun berdasarkan perkembangan seksual anak usia 1-3 tahun serta materi-materi pendidikan seksual yang sesuai dengan usia anak. Penelitian dilakukan selama enam bulan sejak Januari 2019. Uji efektivitas buku dilakukan dengan metode eksperimen one-group pretest-posttest. Responden dalam penelitian sebanyak 27 orang. Terdapat prosentasi peningkatan setelah diberikan perlakuan sebesar 34.7%. Diperoleh nilai sebesar 7,407 dengan uji satu sisi pada taraf signifikan 0.05 dengan n-1=26 adalah 2.05. Maka dapat disimpulkan bahwa  yaitu 7.407  2.05 yang berarti terdapat perubahan yang signifikan antara skor pretest dengan posttest. Dapat disimpulkan bahwa terdapat peningkatan pengetahuan, sikap dan keterampilan orang tua tentang pendidikan seksual anak usia 1-3 tahun melalui buku pendidikan seksual anak usia 1-3 tahun. Buku masih perlu diuji cobakan kepada lebih banyak responden dengan waktu yang lebih lama untuk memeriksa peningkatan keterampilan orang tua dalam memberikan pendidikan seksual lebih dalam
title: Pengembangan Buku Pendidikan Seksual Anak Usia 1-3 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of sexual education books for children aged years many parents are not yet accustomed or do not understand how to provide sexual education from an early age even though sexual development has begun since the child was born this study aims to develop a product in the form of a sexual education book for children aged years the book was developed using the Derek Rowntree product development stage and is compiled based on the sexual development of children aged years and sexual education materials that are appropriate for the child's age the study was conducted for six months since January the effectiveness test of the book was carried out using the one-group pretest-posttest experimental method respondents in the study as many as people there was a percentage increase after being given treatment of obtained a value of with a one-sided test at a significant level with n is then it can be concluded that namely which means there is a significant change between the pretest and posttest scores it can be concluded that there is an increase in knowledge attitudes and skills of parents about sexual education for children aged years through sexual education books for children aged years the book still needs to be tested on more respondents with a longer time to examine the increase in parental skills in providing sexual education in more depth

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan pemerolehan bahasa anak usia 3 tahun. Pemerolehan bahasa anak usia 3 tahun ini dikaji pada tataran fonologi, sintaksis, dan semantik. Data dalam penelitian ini adalah tuturan anak usai 3 tahun. Penelitian ini menggunakan rancangan deskriptif kualitatif. Tahap analisis data dalam penelitian ini ada tiga, yaitu reduksi, penyajian, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa pada tataran fonologi, subjek penelitian belum bisa mengujarkan fonem /r/ dan /s/ dengan benar. Pada tataran sintaksis, subjek penelitian sudah mampu mengujarkan empat jenis kalimat, yaitu kalimat deklaratif, imperatif, interogatif, dan eksklamatif. Kata yang dikuasi anak adalah kata-kata yang dekat dengan lingkungan anak. Pada tataran semantik, semua ujaran anak mengandung makna denotatif.
title: Pemerolehan Bahasa pada Anak Usia 3 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: language acquisition in children aged years this study aims to describe the language acquisition of children aged years this study is studied at the level of phonology, syntax and semantics the data in this study are children's speech after years this study uses a qualitative descriptive design the stages of data analysis in this study there are three namely reduction presentation and drawing conclusions the results of this study indicate that at the phonology level the research subjects have not been able to pronounce the phonemes r and s correctly at the syntax level the research subjects have been able to pronounce four types of sentences namely declarative imperative interrogative and exclamatory sentences the words that children master are words that are close to the child's environment at the semantic level all children's speech contains denotative meaning

desc: Attitude of caring for the environment can be improved since early age and influenced by the impact from environment. This research is purposely to Increase the attitude of caring for the environment Through recycle. This research was classroom action research, with subjects aged 5 to 6 years old in class B who totaling 10 children, 5 boys and 5 girls. The dependent variable from this research is attitude of caring for the environment intelligence whereas the independent variable is the use of used goods. The data collection was gathered by observation to some child on early childhood education institutions. The technique of data analysis was done through descriptive. The result showed that the attitude of caring for the childs environment intelligence could improve after getting an action. The action given was through recycling. The result showed that in pre cycle, the average percentage reached 39,53% with low criteria. And the result of the study, it can be ignored that the proportion of increasing environmental awareness among children aged 5-6 years, the average number after data analysis of pre-cycle activities is in the Low category. Then in cycle one the average number is in the Medium category, and in cycle II the figure has reached the High category
title: Improving Environmental Care Attitudes of Early Childhood By Utilizing Recycled Materials
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: The adaptation of teachers to face-to-face learning after online has become an urgent matter. Research shows the urgency of teacher adaptation to face-to-face learning after online, as happened at TK-IT Ibu Harapan Bengkalis. The research method used is a descriptive qualitative approach, with sources of document data and credible sources. Data was collected through observation, documentation, and in-depth interviews, and analyzed inductively. The results of the study show that Teachers who are able to adapt in teaching and learning activities will have a positive impact on students. The post-online learning system set by the government with a shift/sharing system is favored by teachers because it makes the process easier and achieves learning outcomes. The ability possessed by the teacher is growing for the better. So that teachers who are able to adjust or adapt become one of the components to create a better and more effective teaching and learning process.
title: The Urgency of Teacher Adaptation to Post-Online Face-to-Face Learning
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Kemampuan yang perlu dimiliki generasi milenial saat ini adalah  problem solving. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah menghasilkan produk permainan berupa “petualangan gobak sodor” untuk meningkatkan kemampuan pemecahan masalah ‘mengelompokkan, membandingkan dan menghubungkan’ pada anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan yaitu penelitian dan pengembangan (Research and Development) dengan desain model Borg and Gall.  Teknik pengumpulan data dipeoleh dari hasil uji validasi ahli dan data uji coba lapangan melalui eksperimen One Group Pretest-Posttest Design. Analisis data dihitung menggunakan uji t (t-test) . Penelitian ini dilakukan pada anak TK B usia 5-6 tahun di Bandar Lampung. Hasil temuan menunjukkan bahwa desain produk permainan tradisional petualangan gobak sodor layak untuk meningkatkan pemahaman anak tentang kemampuan pemecahan masalah. Serta, keefektifan produk terlihat dari data uji coba lapangan pada anak mendapatkan nilai signifikansi  0,05. Artinya produk dianggap efektif dalam meningkatkan kemampuan pemecahan masalah pada anak
title: Permainan Tradisional Petualangan Gobak Sodor dan Kemampuan Pemecahan Masalah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Traditional Gobak Sodor Adventure Game and Problem Solving Skills The skills that today's millennial generation needs to have are problem solving. The purpose of this study is to produce a game product in the form of Gobak Sodor Adventure to improve problem solving skills, grouping, comparing and connecting in early childhood. The method used is research and development with the Borg and Gall model design. Data collection techniques are obtained from the results of expert validation tests and field trial data through one group pretest-posttest design experiments. Data analysis is calculated using the t-test. This study was conducted on children aged 18-24 years in Bandar Lampung. The findings show that the design of the traditional Gobak Sodor Adventure game product is suitable for improving children's understanding of problem solving skills. The effectiveness of the product can be seen from the field trial data on children who get a significant value, meaning that the product is considered effective in improving children's problem solving skills.

desc: This study aimed to investigate the effect of beam numbers game against the ability to know the numbers emblem. This research is a quantitative research, the sample is early childhood, which amounted to 38 children. These samples were selected by purposive area has been chosen based on objective and specific considerations, namely the ability to know the numbers are still minimal emblem. The technique of collecting data through observation, interviews, and documentation. In analyzing this data, as the independent variable (variable x) is playing blocks of numbers, while the dependent variable (variable y) is the ability to know the numbers emblem, used its product moment correlation when the influence of beam numbers game against the ability to know the extent emblem bilangan. Use significant 5%, then the price of table r = 0.320. Whereas, its product moment correlation was 0.487. Furthermore, comparing the count r with r table. It turned out that after the count is greater than r of the r table, then the consequences Ho rejected and Ha diterima. Thus can be seen that the working hypothesis is accepted that There Effect Tile Games Score Against Know Your Ability Symbol Numbers.
title: Pengaruh Permainan Balok Angka Terhadap Kemampuan  Mengenal Lambang Bilangan Pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Kemampuan membaca permulaan adalah tahap awal anak belajar membaca yang berkaitan dengan upaya pertamanya memahami bahasa tulis. Lingkungan literasi adalah salah satu faktor yang mempengaruhi kemampuan membaca permulaan. Selain lingkungan rumah, anak juga mendapatkan stimulasi dari sekolah, sehingga perlu untuk melihat pengaruh kualitas lingkungan literasi di kelas terhadap kemampuan membaca permulaan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan lingkungan literasi di kelas dalam mempengaruhi kemampuan membaca permulaan. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan teknik kajian pustaka yang bersumber dari buku dan literatur terdahulu sesuai dengan topik penelitian. Teknik analisis data dalam penelitian ini terdiri dari reduksi data, penyajian data dan menarik kesimpulan. Hasil menunjukkan bahwa lingkungan literasi di kelas mempengaruhi kemampuan membaca permulaan. Ruang kelas dengan sumber literasi yang kaya dan penataan yang sesuai mendukung perkembangan kemampuan membaca permulaan. Hal ini perlu diketahui agar pihak sekolah memahami pentingnya membangun lingkungan literasi yang baik di kelas untuk mendukung perkembangan kemampuan membaca permulaan anak
title: Pengaruh Lingkungan Literasi di Kelas terhadap Kemampuan Membaca Permulaan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the literacy environment in the classroom on children's early reading skills Early reading skills are the initial stage of children learning to read which is related to their first efforts to understand written language. The literacy environment is one of the factors that influences early reading skills. In addition to the home environment, children also receive stimulation from school, so it is necessary to see the influence of the quality of the literacy environment in the classroom on early reading skills. This study aims to describe the literacy environment in the classroom in influencing early reading skills. This study uses a qualitative approach with a literature review technique sourced from books and previous literature in accordance with the research topic. Data analysis techniques in this study consist of data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions. The results show that the literacy environment in the classroom influences early reading skills. Classrooms with rich literacy sources and appropriate arrangements support the development of early reading skills. This needs to be known so that schools understand the importance of building a good literacy environment in the classroom to support the development of children's early reading skills.

desc: Perkembangan motorik merupakan kegiatan merangsang perkembangan otak peserta didik. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui perbedaan kemampuan motorik kasar anak antara kelompok anak yang diajar dengan permainan tradisional kucing dan tikus dan permainan tradisional menjala ikan. Penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian eksperimen semu (Quasi Experiment). Teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan purposive cluster random sampling. Sampel dalam penelitian ini untuk kelompok eksperimen berjumlah 35 dan kelompok kontrol 32. Teknik pengumpulan data metode observasi dan metode dokumentasi.Teknik Analisis menggunakan uji paired t-test dan uji independent t-test. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan  Terdapat Perbedaan kemampuan motorik kasar anak antara kelompok anak yang diajar  dengan permainan tradisional kucing dan tikus dan menjala ikan. Simpulan menyatakan terdapat perbedaan kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun Saran menunjukkan permainan tradisional dapat menjadi media untuk membentuk karakter yang baik Maka disarankan anak dapat selalu mengikuti permainan tradisional dengan kesungguhan agar tujuan pembelajaran tercapai secara bersama-sama.
title: Perbedaan Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Permainan Tradisional Kucing dan Tikus dengan Permainan Tradisional Menjala Ikan
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: differences in gross motor skills of traditional cat and mouse games with traditional fishing net games motor development is an activity that stimulates the development of the brain of students this study aims to determine the differences in gross motor skills of children between groups of children who are taught with traditional cat and mouse games and traditional fishing net games this study uses quasi-experimental research quasi-experimental research the sampling technique uses purposive cluster random sampling the sample in this study for the experimental group is large and the control group the data collection technique is the observation method and documentation method the analysis technique uses the paired t-test and independent t-test the results of the study show that there are differences in gross motor skills of children between groups of children who are taught with traditional cat and mouse games and fishing nets the conclusion states that there are differences in gross motor skills of children aged years suggestions indicate that traditional games can be a medium for forming good character it is recommended that children can always follow traditional games with sincerity so that learning objectives are achieved together

desc: Negara Indonesia merupakan negara kaya akan keragaman budaya sehingga menuntut warga Indonesia untuk saling menghargai. Lingkungan sekolah merupakan tempat yang tidak peka terhadap budaya, sehingga guru PAUD harus memiliki kemampuan untuk memahami dan mengajarkan pendidikan multikultural kepada peserta didik. Tujuan dari penelitian ini untuk mengetahui persepsi guru PAUD terhadap pendidikan multikultural. Metode kualitatif dan desain studi kasus dengan wawancara sebagai teknik pengambilan datanya. Selanjutnya akan dianalisis menggunakan grounded theory dengan tiga tahapan coding, mulai dari initial coding, focus coding, dan axial coding. Hasil dari analisis tersebut kemudian menghasilkan tema yaitu narasi guru tentang pendidikan multikultural, konstruksi keadilan dalam keragaman budaya di Indonesia, dan kendala para guru dalam mengajarkan keberagaman. Sesuai dengan tujuan penelitian ini, maka saling menghargai keberagaman menjadi temuan pada pendidikan multicultural
title: Persepsi Guru terhadap Pendidikan Multikultural di Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teachers' perceptions of multicultural education in early childhood education Indonesia is a country rich in cultural diversity, so it demands Indonesian citizens to respect each other. The school environment is a place that is not sensitive to culture, so early childhood education teachers must have the ability to understand and teach multicultural education to students. The purpose of this study was to determine the perceptions of early childhood education teachers on multicultural education. Qualitative methods and case study designs with interviews as data collection techniques will then be analyzed using grounded theory with three stages of coding starting from initial coding, focus coding and axial coding. The results of the analysis then produced a theme, namely teacher narratives about multicultural education, the construction of justice in cultural diversity in Indonesia and the obstacles for teachers in teaching diversity. According to the purpose of this study, mutual respect for diversity is a finding in multicultural education.

desc: Disiplin pada anak dapat ditingkatkan dengan bantuan permainan, yaitu permainan tradisional. Tujuan riset ini ialah untuk mengkaji dampak penerapan permainan tradisional pada kedisiplinan anak. Penelitian ini merupakan quasi experiment menggunakan desain kelompok kontrol non-equivalent. Subjek pada riset yaitu siswa kelas B di Nusa Dua. Adapun kelompok kontrol dan eksperimen ditentukan secara acak. Data dikumpulan dengan menggunakan lembaran observasi. Untuk menganalisis data penelitian ini digunakan one way analysis of variance (ANOVA). Hasil yang ditemukan ada perbedaan pada disiplin siswa yang diajarkan dengan permainan tradisional dan siswa yang mengikuti metode belajar biasa. Dengan demikian dapat diperoleh gambaran pembelajaran sesuai dalam meningkatkan disiplin siswa. Bermain permainan tradisional pada masa kanak-kanak dapat merangsang aspek perkembangan anak.
title: Pengaruh Implementasi Permainan Tradisional Terhadap Disiplin Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effect of implementing traditional games on early childhood discipline. Discipline in children can be improved with the help of games, namely traditional games. The purpose of this research is to examine the impact of implementing traditional games on children's discipline. This research is a quasi-experiment using a nonequivalent control group design. The subjects in the research are class B students in Nusa Dua. The control and experimental groups are determined randomly. Data is collected using observation sheets. To analyze the data, this research uses one way analysis of variance ANOVA. The results found that there are differences in the discipline of students who are taught with traditional games and students who follow the usual learning method. Thus, a picture of learning can be obtained according to improving student discipline. Playing traditional games during childhood can stimulate aspects of child development.

desc: Perilaku bullying merupakan salah satu permasalahan sosial yang sering terjadi. Tujuan dari dilakukannya penelitian ini yaitu untuk dapat memberikan sebuah gambaran secara faktual tentang prilaku-prilaku bullying yang dilakukan pada anak prasekolah. Menggunakan metode kuantitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Subjek penelitian ini adalah seluruh anak-anak di Raudhatul Athfal Al-Islam usia 5-6 tahun. Kemudian pengambilan sampel menggunakan teknik purposive random sampling, diperoleh partisipan sebanyak 10 anak,  5 partisipan mewakili korban bully dan 5 lainnya mewakili pelaku bullying. Kemudian teknik pengumpulan data yaitu melalui observasi dan dikperkuat dengan wawancara. Berdasarkan data yang diperoleh dilakukan lah uji keabsahan dengan menggunakan triangulasi waktu untuk memperoleh data yang akurat dalam penelitian ini. Selanjutnya dianalisis menggunakan teknik analisis tematik. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa ada tiga jenis perilaku bullying yaitu perilaku bullying fisik, verbal, dan psikologis. Dari penelitian yang telah diteliti bahwa pelaku merupakan anak yang sama dan korban juga anak yang sama dan lemah.
title: Perilaku Bullying pada Anak di Taman Kanak-kanak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Bullying behavior in children in kindergarten Bullying behavior is one of the social problems that often occur The purpose of this study is to provide a factual description of bullying behaviors carried out in preschool children using quantitative methods with a case study approach The subjects of this study were all children at Raudhatul Athfal Alislam aged years Then sampling using purposive random sampling technique obtained participants as many as children Participants represent victims of bullying and others represent perpetrators of bullying Then the data collection technique is through observation and strengthened by interviews Based on the data obtained, a validity test was carried out using time triangulation to obtain accurate data in this study, then analyzed using thematic analysis techniques The results of the study showed that there are three types of bullying behavior, namely physical, verbal and psychological bullying behavior from the research that has been studied that the perpetrators are the same children and the victims are also the same children and weak

desc: Permasalahan yang ditangkap ialah kebanyakan orang tua hanya mengedepankan kognitif anak dijadikan sebagai acuan dalam proses belajar mengajar sehingga psikomotorik seperti pengembangan kecerdasan kinestetik, dan afektif seperti aspek rasa percaya diri,  anak terlihat sangat kurang. Tujuan penelitian ini ialah untuk menghasilkan karya tari kreasi baru dalam menumbuhkan kecerdasan kinestetik dan kecerdasan interpersonal di TK ABA 2 Kota Malang. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan ialah kualitatif deskriptif. Dari sumber primer seperti kepala sekolah dan guru ekstrakurikuler dan sumber data sekunder berupa dokumen serta arsip sekolah dengan teknik pengumpulan data dengan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data menggunakan miles, hubarman dan saldana. Hasil penelitian yang ditemukan Guru menggunakan model pembelajaran langsung disertai motivasi, dukungan, pujian dari usaha siswa, dan membgun hubungan kedekatan. Kecerdasan kinestetik yang memunculkan beberapa indikatornya seperti: koordinasi tubuh, kelincahan, kekuatan, keseimbangan dan koordinasi mata tangan dan kaki. Kemudian rasa percaya diri anak yang terlihat dari beberapa indikator seperti: percaya dengan kemampuan diri sendiri, mengutamakan usaha sendiri tidak bergantung pada orang lain, berani tampil didepan umum, dan tanggung jawab dengan tugas dari proses pelaksanaan tari tersebut.
title: Ekstrakurikuler Tari Kreasi Baru untuk Menumbuhkan Kecerdasan Kinestetik dan Kecerdasan Interpersonal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: new creative dance extracurricular to foster kinesthetic intelligence and interpersonal intelligence the problem that is captured is that most parents only prioritize children's cognitive as a reference in the teaching and learning process so that psychomotor such as the development of kinesthetic and affective intelligence such as aspects of children's self-confidence seem very lacking the purpose of this study is to produce new creative dance works in fostering kinesthetic intelligence and interpersonal intelligence in kindergarten ABA Malang City the type of research used is qualitative descriptive from primary sources such as the principal and extracurricular teachers and secondary data sources in the form of documents and school archives with data collection techniques with observation interviews and documentation data analysis techniques using miles hubarman and saldana the results of the study found teachers use direct learning models accompanied by motivation support praise from student efforts and build close relationships kinesthetic intelligence which brings up several indicators such as body coordination agility strength balance and eye hand and foot coordination then children's self-confidence which can be seen from several indicators such as believing in one's own abilities prioritizing one's own efforts not depending on others daring to appear in public and responsibility with the tasks of the dance implementation process

desc: Prinsip pembelajaran merupakan panduan bagi guru dalam memberikan layanan pendidikan untuk anak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian adalah untuk menggambarkan pelaksanaan prinsip pembelajaran tersebut pada lembaga dengan model pembelajaran sentra terutama di masa belajar dari rumah. Subjek penelitian berjumlah 4 orang guru pada sentra Bahan Alam, Bermain Peran, Balok, dan Kreasi dan Olah Tubuh. Penelitian dilakukan menggunakan metode kualitatif deskriptif dengan pengumpulan data melalui oberservasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi dengan model Miles and Hubberman sebagai teknik analisis data. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa selama masa pandemi, seluruh prinsip pembelajaran yang berjumlah 12 prinsip tetap dilaksanakan, namun 4 diantaranya tidak dapat dilaksanakan secara maksimal, yaitu prinsip bermain sambil belajar, berorientasi pada perkembangan anak, berorientasi pada kebutuhan anak, serta berpusat pada anak. Demikian pula dengan model pembelajaran sentra yang tidak dapat diterapkan optimal karena bentuk pembelajaran daring yang mengharuskan anak melakukan kegiatan yang sama pada waktu yang sama dengan instruksi dari seorang guru.
title: Pelaksanaan Prinsip Pembelajaran di Masa Belajar dari Rumah: Studi Kasus pada Model Sentra
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of learning principles during home learning period case study on the center model learning principles are a guide for teachers in providing educational services for early childhood the purpose of the study is to describe the implementation of these learning principles in institutions with a center learning model, especially during home learning the research subjects were teachers at the natural material center role-playing blocks and creation and body exercise the study was conducted using a descriptive qualitative method with data collection through observation interviews and documentation with the miles and hubberman model as a data analysis technique the results of the study showed that during the pandemic all learning principles that amounted to principles were still implemented but some of them could not be implemented optimally, namely the principle of playing while learning oriented towards child development oriented towards child needs and centered on children as well as the center learning model which cannot be implemented optimally because the form of online learning requires children to do the same activities at the same time with instructions from a teacher

desc: The purpose of this study was to determine the teacher's leadership model in an effort to develop early childhood cognitive abilities in RA Hidmatul Hikam, Alassumur Lor. This research uses a qualitative approach with a case study type. The technique of collecting data from the process of observation and interviews with the principal, Deputy Head of Curriculum, homeroom teacher for grades A and B. Data analysis techniques using the Miles and Huberman Interactive Model with data reduction activities, data presentation, and drawing conclusions. Data validity with source and technique triangulation process. The leadership model of the teachers at RA Hidmatul Hikam, Alassumur Lor refers to the participatory-democratic leadership model. This leadership model includes two main characteristics, namely the concept of aspirational management, and broad-minded personal. The teacher leadership model shown in this study describes a teacher figure who emphasizes communication, equalizes subordinates (students), synchronizes learning interests and goals in terms of personal interests and goals, and makes decisions systematically according to the opinions, complaints, and problems of subordinates (students). . So that in learning, these two characteristics become an effort to develop students' cognitive development collaboratively without any pressure.
title: Teacher Leadership Models in Developing Cognitive Ability in Early Children
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teacher leadership models in developing cognitive abilities in early children the purpose of this study was to determine the teachers leadership model in an effort to develop early childhood cognitive abilities in ra hidmatul hikam alassumur lor this research uses a qualitative approach with a case study type the technique of collecting data from the process of observation and interviews with the principal deputy head of curriculum homeroom teacher for grades a and b data analysis techniques using the miles and huberman interactive model with data reduction activities data presentation and drawing conclusions data validity with source and technique triangulation process the leadership model of the teachers at ra hidmatul hikam alassumur lor refers to the participatory democratic leadership model this leadership model includes two main characteristics namely the concept of aspirational management and broad-minded personal the teacher leadership model shown in this study describes a teacher figure who emphasizes communication equalizes subordinates students synchronizes learning interests and goals in terms of personal interests and goals and makes decisions systematically according to the opinions complaints and problems of subordinates students so that in learning these two characteristics becomes an effort to develop students cognitive development collaboratively without any pressure

desc:
Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan pembelajaran yang berlangsung di RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren selama masa pandemic covid-19 yaitu Wisata Barokah. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian studi kasus di RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren, Magetan, Jawa Timur, Indonesia. Teknik pengumpulan data yang dilakukan adalah wawancara dan observasi. Wawancara dilakukan melalui google meeting dan whatsapp. Subjek dalam penelitian ini adalah Kepala Sekolah, Guru pengajar, siswa, dan orang tua siswa RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren sebanyak 15 orang. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa wisata barokah merupakan kegiatan yang dirasa cukup efektif sebagai alternatif pembelajaran di masa pandemi covid-19. Banyak keuntungan bagi guru, siswa, dan orang tua siswa. Kendala yang dihadapi pun cukup sedikit dan tidak ada kendala akademis yang berarti selama berlangsungnya kegiatan wisata barokah.


This study aims to describe the learning in RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren during the Covid-19 pandemic, namely "Wisata Barokah". This research is a case study research at RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren, Magetan, East Java, Indonesia. Data collection techniques used were interviews and observation. Interviews were conducted via google meeting and WhatsApp. The subjects in this study were the principal, teaching teachers, students, and parents of 15 students of RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren. The results showed that Barokah tourism was an activity that was considered relatively effective as an alternative to learning during the Covid-19 pandemic. Many advantages for teachers, students, and parents of students. The obstacles faced are relatively few, and there are no significant academic obstacles during wisata barokah activities.
title: Wisata Barokah : Alternatif Pembelajaran di Masa Pandemi Covid-19 di RA Al-Ikhlas Mantren
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Barokah tourism is an alternative learning during the Covid pandemic at Ra Alikhlas Mantren. This study aims to describe the learning that takes place at Ra Alikhlas Mantren during the Covid pandemic, namely Barokah tourism. This research is a case study research at Ra Alikhlas Mantren Magetan, East Java, Indonesia. Data collection techniques used were interviews and observations. Interviews were conducted via Google Meeting and WhatsApp. The subjects in this study were the principal, teachers, students and parents of students of Ra Alikhlas Mantren. The results showed that Barokah tourism is an activity that is considered quite effective as an alternative learning during the Covid pandemic. There are many benefits for teachers, students and parents of students. The obstacles faced are also quite few and there are no significant academic obstacles during the Barokah tourism activity.
