desc: Penurunan fungsi kefasihan matematika dikalangan anak-anak menjadi permasalahan utama dalam penelitian ini. Maka dari itu, penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menguji efek brain jooging terhadap peningkatan variabel kefasihan matematika dan bagaimana peran dari fungsi eksekutif. Metode dalam penelitian ini adalah true eksperimen dengan menggunakan design random pretest and posttest group. Adapun teknik pengambilan sampel yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini menggunakan purpossive sampling. Sampel dalam penelitian ini adalah siswa Kelas II dan III yang berjumlah 46 anak yang memiliki usia maksimal 8 tahun.  Tiga Instrumen digunakan untuk mengukur fungsi eksekutif di antaranya Go or No Go Test untuk mengukur inhibition, Corsi Block Test untuk mengukur working memory, Wisconsin Card Sorting Test untuk mengukur cognitive flexibility, sedangkan untuk mengukur Kefasihan Matematika pada anak menggunakan  Woodcock-Munoz Battery III. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa program aktivitas fisik efektif meningkatkan kefasihan matematika. Kesimpulan bahwa  fungsi eksekutif berhasil memediasi hubungan antara program aktivitas fisik brain jogging dengan kefasihan matematika.
title: Program Brain Jogging: Dampak pada Perkembangan Kefasihan Matematika dan Fungsi Eksekutif pada Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: brain jogging program impact on the development of mathematical fluency and executive function in children the decline in mathematical fluency function among children is the main problem in this study therefore this study aims to test the effect of brain jogging on increasing mathematical fluency variables and how the role of executive function the method in this study is true experiment using random pretest and posttest group design the sampling technique used in this study using purposive sampling the sample in this study were students in grades II and III who were children with a maximum age of three years the instruments used to measure executive function include the go or no go test to measure inhibition corsi block test to measure working memory wisconsin card sorting test to measure cognitive flexibility while to measure mathematical fluency in children using the woodcockmunoz battery iii the results of the study showed that the physical activity program was effective in increasing mathematical fluency the conclusion that executive function successfully mediated the relationship between the brain jogging physical activity program and mathematical fluency

desc: Kemampuan reading bahasa inggris awal anak usia dini membutuhkan kreatifitas orang tua dan pendidik dalam mengembangkan media pembelajaran berbasis daur ulang (recycle system). Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian eksperimen dengan model One-Group Pretest-Posttest Design. Penelitian ini menggunakan satu kelompok dan melakukan pretest sebelum diberikan perlakuan, dilanjutkan dengan posttest. Adapun teknik sampling menggunakan teknik total sampling yang mencakup seluruh anak kelompok B di PAUD Baitul Amal dengan jumlah 27 anak. Hasil analisis data penelitian menunjukkan adanya tingkat determinasi sebesar 40,6% yang berarti bahwa terdapat pengaruh signifikan pada media pembelajaran berbasis recycle system terhadap kemampuan reading bahasa inggris awal anak usia dini di Paud Baitul Amal. Dengan demikian pendidik dapat memanfaatkan recycle system untuk memenuhi media pembelajaran reading bahasa inggris awal di pendidikan anak usia dini.
title: Media Daur Ulang (Recycle System) dalam Kemampuan Membaca Bahasa Inggris Awal Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: recycled media recycle system in early childhood English reading skills early childhood English reading skills require creativity of parents and educators in developing learning media based on recycling recycle system This research is an experimental research with a one-group pretest-posttest design model. This research uses one group and conducts a pretest before being given treatment followed by a posttest. The sampling technique uses a total sampling technique that includes all children in group B at the Baitul Amal PAUD with the number of children. The results of the research data analysis show a level of determination of which means that there is a significant influence on learning media based on the recycle system on early childhood English reading skills at the Baitul Amal PAUD. Thus, educators can utilize the recycle system to meet the learning media for early English reading in early childhood education.

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mengetahui Pengaruh Permainan Puppet Fun terhadap Kemampuan Membaca Anak di Taman Kanak-kanak Islam Excellent Bukittinggi. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah metode kuantitatif dengan jenis eksperimen atau penelitian quasi eksperimen dengan menggunakan Permainan Puppet Fun. Permainan Puppet Fun berpengaruh terhadap kemampuan membaca anak di Taman Kanak-kanak Islam Excellent Bukittinggi. Berdasarkan analisis data, diperoleh nilai rata-rata hasil Kemampuan Membaca anak di kelas eksperimen yang menggunakan Permainan Puppet Fun lebih tinggi (82,6) dibandingkan kelas kontrol yang menggunakan Majalah (72,3) karena pembelajaran menggunakan permainan Puppet Fun memberikan gambaran konkrit berupa buku menjadi 3 dimensi untuk pembelajaran membaca anak membantu anak mengenal huruf dan memahami maknanya.
title: Pengaruh Permainan Puppet Fun terhadap Kemampuan Membaca Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of puppet fun games on the reading ability of early childhood children The purpose of this study was to determine the influence of puppet fun games on the reading ability of children in the excellent Islamic kindergarten Bukittinggi The type of research used was a quantitative method with an experimental type or quasi-experimental research using puppet fun games Puppet fun games have an effect on children's reading ability in the excellent Islamic kindergarten Bukittinggi Based on data analysis, the average value of children's reading ability in the experimental class using puppet fun games was higher than the control class using magazines because learning using puppet fun games provides a concrete picture in the form of books as a dimension for children's reading learning, helping children recognize letters and understand their meaning

desc: Penelitian ini dilakukan berangkat dari rendahnya keterlibatan dan interaksi anak pada proses pembelajaran dimana telah teridentifikasi bahwa penggunaan bahasa pengantar pembelajaran yang tidak dipahami oleh anak menyulitkan anak pada kegiatan pembelajaran. Penelitian bertujuan untuk menganalisis implementasi bahasa ibu sebagai bahasa pembelajaran untuk menciptakan kelas ramah anak di Taman Kanak-kanak Olaewa. Jenis penelitian adalah kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Subjek penelitian adalah 27 anak. Pengumpulan data dan instrumentasi menggunakan metode observasi (lembar observasi), wawancara (panduan wawancara) dan dokumentasi (panduan dokumentasi). Analisis data menggunakan model Miles dan Huberman yaitu pengumpulan, reduksi, penyajian dan analisis data. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa implementasi bahasa ibu sebagai bahasa pembelajaran telah dijalankan dengan baik sehingga menciptakan kelas ramah anak. Hal ini dapat dilihat dari keaktifan dan interaksi anak pada kegiatan pembelajaran saat menggunakan bahasa ibu. Proses pembelajaran yang dinamis menjadi bukti bahwa penggunaan bahasa ibu sebagai bahasa pengantar pembelajaran yang dikuasai anak berdampak pada hasil belajar anak.
title: Analisis Implementasi Bahasa Ibu sebagai Bahasa Pembelajaran untuk Menciptakan Kelas Ramah Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of the implementation of the mother tongue as a language of learning to create a child-friendly class this study was conducted based on the low involvement and interaction of children in the learning process where it has been identified that the use of a language of instruction that is not understood by children makes it difficult for children in learning activities the study aims to analyze the implementation of the mother tongue as a language of instruction to create a child-friendly class in olaewa kindergarten the type of research is qualitative with a case study approach the research subjects are children data collection and instrumentation using the observation method observation sheets interviews interview guides and documentation documentation guides data analysis using the miles and huberman model, namely data collection reduction presentation and analysis the results of the study show that the implementation of the mother tongue as a language of instruction has been carried out well so as to create a child-friendly class this can be seen from the activeness and interaction of children in learning activities when using the mother tongue the dynamic learning process is evidence that the use of the mother tongue as a language of instruction mastered by children has an impact on children's learning outcomes

desc: Penggunaan buku teks yang monoton memberikan kesulitan bagi siswa dalam memahami materi pembelajaran. Pemanfaatan multimedia cenderung akan memudahkan siswa dalam memahami pembelajaran materi bagi siswa, khususnya bagi siswa sekolah dasar. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan multimedia interaktif dalam pembelajaran tematik di kelas II sekolah dasar. Penelitian yang dilaksanakan di SDN 011 Pekanbaru ini menggunakan design R dan D dengan model ADDIE dengan tahapan sampai menghasilkan smart multimedia interaktif. Analisis data dilakukan dengan teknik kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa dari multimedia interaktif yang dihasilkan telah sesuai dengan penilaian yang dilakukan oleh ahli materi, ahli media dan ahli bahasa dengan kemampuan yang umumnya sangat baik. Studi ini mengungkapkan hasil bahwa pembuat animasi dapat digunakan dengan hasil dari ahli bahasa delapan puluh dua persen ahli materi delapan puluh enam persen, dan ahli media delapan puluh lima persen. Multimedia interaktif ini dapat digunakan dalam pembelajaran tematik khususnya bagi siswa di kelas II sekolah dasar
title: Pengembangan Multimedia Interaktif Pembelajaran Tematik Siswa Sekolah Dasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of interactive multimedia for thematic learning for elementary school students the use of monotonous textbooks makes it difficult for students to understand learning materials the use of multimedia tends to make it easier for students to understand learning materials for students, especially for elementary school students this study aims to produce interactive multimedia in thematic learning in grade II of elementary school the study conducted at SDN Pekanbaru uses design r and d with the addie model with stages to produce smart interactive multimedia data analysis is carried out using quantitative and qualitative techniques the results of the study show that the interactive multimedia produced is in accordance with the assessment carried out by material experts, media experts and language experts with generally very good abilities this study reveals the results that animation makers can be used with the results of language experts eighty-two percent material experts eighty-six percent and media experts eighty-five percent this interactive multimedia can be used in thematic learning especially for students in grade II of elementary school

desc: Religious tolerance supports social peace and brings a better life to the country. Teaching tolerance in early childhood is a challenge for educators. The purpose of this study was to describe changes in the values of religious tolerance in elementary school students. This type of research is a type of qualitative research using a case study design where the researcher participates as an observer. The investigation begins with a documentary analysis of the research material. The next step is to conduct a focus group (FGD). This research resulted in findings that (a) changes in the values of inter-religious tolerance among elementary school (SD) children, especially children aged 6-8 years or grade two, on the basis of all students having the same religion, (2) changes in the values of tolerance between high-value children are taught through integrated learning, (3) while the values of tolerance between children are not specifically taught, values of togetherness such as greeting each other, sharing and supporting the needs of fellow children. taught through group practice. The conclusion of this study is that children quickly become comfortable with each other and form friendships with those who have the same characteristics, such as skin color, face shape, hair type, and even height.
title: Spiritual Moderation for Early Childhood in   Encouraging Tolerance Values
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: spiritual moderation for early childhood in encouraging tolerance values ​​religious tolerance supports social peace and brings a better life to the country teaching tolerance in early childhood is a challenge for educators the purpose of this study was to describe changes in the values ​​of religious tolerance in elementary school students this type of research is a type of qualitative research using a case study design where the researcher participates as an observer the investigation begins with a documentary analysis of the research material the next step is to conduct a focus group fgd this research resulted in findings that a change in the values ​​of interreligious tolerance among elementary school elementary school children especially children aged years or grade two on the basis of all students having the same religion changes in the values ​​of tolerance between high value children are taught through integrated learning while the values ​​of tolerance between children are not specifically taught values ​​of togetherness such as greeting each other sharing and supporting the needs of fellow children taught through group practice the conclusion of this study is that children quickly become comfortable with each other and form friendships with those who have the same characteristics such as skin color face shape hair type and even height

desc: Anak usia dini dalam mengajukan permintaan bisa verbal maupun non verbal, Kenyataannya orang dewasa kurang memahami, orang dewasa memenuhi permintaan anak tetapi tidak mendukung. Permintaan anak tidak hanya mencapai tujuan pribadi melainkan juga tujuan sosial.  Penelitian ini bertujuan memperoleh informasi dan mendalami strategi meminta dalam bentuk verbal. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif. Pengumpulan data digunakan teknik rekam dan catat. Rekaman dilakukan dari anak bangun tidur pagi hari sampai malam. Instrumen penelitian berupa kartu data yang memuat tuturan anak usia 6 tahun. Berdasarkan hasil analisis strategi anak yaitu;  1. anak usia 6 tahun mengajukan permintaan, bila yang diminta merupakan kebiasaan dilakukan berulang.  Permintaan menggunakan kata imperative seperti, minta, belikan, ambilkan, 2. anak mengajukan permintaan langsung ada dua cara; langsung ke target dan permintaan dengan alasan/ argumentasi. Sesuatu yang diminta merupakan hak yang sudah seharusnya 3. anak melakukan permintaan bila ada dunkungan moral, anak lebih berani dengan alasan dan argumentasi.
title: Strategi Meminta Secara Verbal Anak Usia Dini Usia 6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: verbal request strategy for early childhood children aged years early childhood in making requests can be verbal or non-verbal in reality adults do not understand adults fulfill children's requests but do not support children's requests not only achieve personal goals but also social goals this study aims to obtain information and explore the strategy of requesting in verbal form this study uses a descriptive method of data collection used recording and note-taking techniques recordings were made from children waking up in the morning until night the research instrument in the form of data cards containing the speech of children aged years based on the results of the analysis of children's strategies, namely children aged years make requests if what is requested is a habit that is done repeatedly requests using imperative words such as asking to buy get children make direct requests there are two ways directly to the target and requests with reasons for arguments something requested is a right that should be the child makes a request if there is moral support children are braver with reasons and arguments

desc: Manjujai merupakan bentuk stimulasi berupa nyanyian, syair, atau kata dengan nilai-nilai kebaikan. Pemberian stimulasi menjadi faktor penting dalam mencapai perkembangan anak usia dini secara optimal sesuai dengan tahapan usia. Penelitian ini merupakan salah satu stimulasi perkembangan yang dapat diberikan kepada anak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui pengaruh tradisi kearifan budaya lokal Minangkabau manjujai terhadap perkembangan anak usia dini. Penelitian menggunakan Library research melalui 6 langkah yaitu penentuan topik penelitian, tinjauan literatur terkini, reduksi literatur, pengorganisasian literatur, review literatur, dan pengambilan kesimpulan. Teknik analisis data berupa kualitatif deskriptif dengan menelaah beberapa literatur sekunder antara lain yaitu e-book, jurnal ilmiah Nasional dan Internasional, dan artikel yang berkaitan dengan manjujai pada anak. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa tradisi manjujai bukan hanya digunakan untuk menstimulasi satu aspek perkembangan saja namun dapat digunakan dibeberapa aspek perkembangan anak usia dini seperti kognitif, bahasa, motorik, sosial-emosional dan moral spiritual.
title: Tradisi Kearifan Lokal Minangkabau Manjujai untuk Stimulasi Perkembangan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: local wisdom tradition of minangkabau manjujai for early childhood development stimulation manjujai is a form of stimulation in the form of singing poems or words with good values ​​giving stimulation is an important factor in achieving optimal early childhood development according to the age stage this study is one of the development stimulations that can be given to early childhood the purpose of this study is to determine the effect of local wisdom tradition of minangkabau manjujai on early childhood development the study uses library research through the following steps: determining research topics reviewing the latest literature literature reduction organizing literature reviewing literature and drawing conclusions data analysis techniques in the form of descriptive qualitative by examining several secondary literatures including ebooks national and international scientific journals and articles related to manjujai in children the results of the study show that the manjujai tradition is not only used to stimulate one aspect of development but can be used in several aspects of early childhood development such as cognitive language motor social emotional and moral spiritual

desc: Peraturan Mendiknas Nomor 70 Tahun 2009 mengenai pendidikan inklusi memiliki peranan penting dalam penyelenggaraan program sekolah ramah anak pada jenjang PAUD. Pelaksanaan program ini tidaklah semudah yang diinginkan karena tidak semua stakeholder memahami dan mau bekerjasama untuk mensukseskan program tersebut. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui bagaimana prinsip-prinsip mendidik anak dalam pelaksanaan program sekolah ramah anak  yang di kritisi dari pemikiran  progresivisme John Dewey, anak merupakan individu yang andal serta seberapa besar peran guru dalam melaksanakan tugasnya sesuai standar program sekolah ramah anak. Dilihat pada hasil tinjauan pustaka yang dikaji maka dapat disimpulkan bahwa konsep pelaksanaan SRA berkaitan erat dengan filsafat Dewey yaitu pendidikan adalah proses di mana keterampilan intelektual dan emosional dasar anak dibentuk dimulai usia anak-anak yang akan digunakan untuk memenuhi kebutuhan hidupnya ketika berinteraksi dengan orang lain.
title: Child-Friendly Schools for PAUD: Telaah Filsafat Progresivisme John Dewey
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: childfriendly schools for early childhood education review of john dewey's progressivism philosophy regulation of the minister of education number year concerning inclusive education has an important role in the implementation of the child-friendly school program at the early childhood level the implementation of this program is not as easy as desired because not all stakeholders understand and are willing to work together to make the program a success the purpose of this study is to find out how the principles of educating children in the implementation of the child-friendly school program are criticized from john dewey's progressivism thinking children are reliable individuals and how big the role of teachers is in carrying out their duties according to the standards of the child-friendly school program seen from the results of the literature review that was studied, it can be concluded that the concept of implementing sra is closely related to dewey's philosophy, namely education is a process in which children's basic intellectual and emotional skills are formed starting from childhood which will be used to meet their needs when interacting with others

desc: Studi pendahuluan terhadap subjek penelitian, bahwa sebagian besar anak belum memiliki kemampuan visual spasial yang baik, yang ditunjukkan dari kesulitan-kesulitan anak dalam hal visual spasial pada saat belajar. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kecerdasan visual spasial anak melalui kegiatan montase. Metodologi penelitian yang dilakukan adalah Action research dengan model Kemmis dan Mc Taggart, melalui dua siklus yang terdiri dari delapan pertemuan pada siklus I dan enam kali pertemuan pada siklus II yang meliputi tahap perencanaan, tindakan, observasi dan refleksi. Subjek penelitian adalah anak kelompok B TK FKIP UNRI Kota Pekanbaru provinsi Riau. Analisis data menggunakan analisis kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan adanya peningkatan kecerdasan visual spasial anak melalui kegiatan montase. Rata-rata skor kecerdasan visual spasial pra siklus sebesar 30,06, kemudian mengalami peningkatan menjadi 38,46 pada akhir siklus I dan mengalami peningkatan kembali menjadi 47,53 pada akhir siklus II.
title: Kegiatan Montase dalam Meningkatkan Kecerdasan Visual Spasial Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: montage activities in improving visual spatial intelligence of early childhood preliminary study of research subjects that most children do not have good visual spatial abilities as indicated by children's difficulties in terms of visual spatial when learning this study aims to improve children's visual spatial intelligence through montage activities the research methodology used is action research with the kemmis and mc taggart models through two cycles consisting of eight meetings in cycle i and six meetings in cycle ii which include the planning stage action observation and reflection the research subjects are children in group b tk fkip unri pekanbaru city riau province data analysis using quantitative and qualitative analysis the results of this study indicate an increase in children's visual spatial intelligence through montage activities the average score of visual spatial intelligence pre-cycle was then increased to at the end of cycle i and increased again to at the end of cycle ii

desc: Dampak langsung bagi tunarungu mengalami hambatan komunikasi dan hambatan proses pembelajaran. Untuk melatih kemampuan komunikasi dan mendengar tunarungu, diperlukan latihan PKPBI. Kajian ini bermaksud guna menganalisa kebutuhan pengembangan media PKPBI dengan basis android bagi anak tunarungu yang menunjang pembelajaran di kelas. Penelitian dilaksanakan di SLB Cendana Duri dalam jangka waktu 6 minggu berturut-turut. Subjek penelitian seorang guru PKPBI dan 7 anak tunarungu SDLB. Penelitian menggunakan pengembangan model ADDIE, tahapan dipakai terbatas pada tahap analisis. Instrumen penelitian adalah pedoman observasi dan wawancara analisis kebutuhan anak tunarungu dan media. Teknik analisa data memakai model Miles dan Huberman, yaitu (1) reduksi data, (2) penyajian data, dan (3) penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian diperoleh bahwa 1) anak mengalami gangguan pendengaran alhasil mengalami hambatan dalam berkomunikasi dan persepsi bunyi dan irama, 2) dibutuhkan media pembelajaran praktis, dan 3) peneliti bertujuan guna mengembangkan media pembelajaran berbasis android sesuai analisis kebutuhan.
title: Analisis Pengembangan Komunikasi, Persepsi, Bunyi, dan Irama (PKPBI) Anak Tunarungu dan Kebutuhan Media Pembelajarannya
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of the development of communication perception of sound and rhythm pkpbi deaf children and the need for learning media direct impact for deaf people experiencing communication barriers and learning process barriers to train communication and hearing skills deaf people need pkpbi training this study intends to analyze the need for developing pkpbi media based on android for deaf children that supports learning in class the research was conducted at slb cendana duri for a period of consecutive weeks the research subjects were a pkpbi teacher and a deaf child sdlb the research used the addie model development the stages used were limited to the analysis stage the research instrument was an observation and interview guideline analysis of the needs of deaf children and media data analysis techniques used the miles and huberman models, namely data reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions the results of the study obtained that children with hearing disorders as a result experienced obstacles in communicating and perception of sound and rhythm practical learning media were needed and the researcher aimed to develop android-based learning media according to the needs analysis

desc: Salah satu program pengembangan yang sangat penting dalam pendidikan anak usia dini adalah pengembangan bahasa. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengembangkan kegiatan literasi denngan menggunakan Kegiatan Literasi Berbasis Teks Multimodal untuk anak usia dini di salah satu sekolah TK di Pematangsiantar. Metode deskriptif kualitatif diterapkan dalam penelitian ini. Sumber data penelitian ini adalah anak usia dini sebanyak 26 siswa. Observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi digunakan untuk memperoleh data. Triangulasi teknik dan triangulasi sumber digunakan dalam analisis data. Proses interpretasi data yang terkumpul menggunakan analisis deskriptif kualitatif. Penelitian ini mengalami peningkatan kenyamanan lingkungan belajar peserta didik dengan persentase peningkatan rata-rata sebesar 15,8% sehingga kegiatan literasi berbasis multimodal ini layak untuk dikembangkan dan dilaksanakan pada anak usia dini. Para peneliti juga menyarankan agar pihak sekolah memahami pentingnya membangun lingkungan literasi yang baik di dalam kelas dalam mendukung penerapan literasi berbasis multimodal untuk perkembangan kemampuan literasi anak
title: An Application of Multimodal Text-Based Literacy Activities in Enhancing Early Children’s Literacy
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: an application of multimodal text-based literacy activities in enhancing early children's literacy one of the most important development programs in early childhood education is language development the purpose of this study is to develop literacy activities using multimodal text-based literacy activities for early childhood in one of the kindergartens in Pematangsiantar qualitative descriptive methods are applied in this study the data sources for this study are early childhood as many as students observation interviews and documentation are used to obtain data triangulation techniques and source triangulation are used in data analysis the process of interpreting the collected data using qualitative descriptive analysis this study experienced an increase in the comfort of the learning environment for students with an average increase percentage of so that this multimodal-based literacy activity is feasible to be developed and implemented in early childhood the researchers also suggest that schools understand the importance of building a good literacy environment in the classroom in supporting the application of multimodal-based literacy for the development of children's literacy skills

desc: Penyisipan nilai-nilai keprajuritan tersebut diambil dari sumpah prajurit. Adapun dari jumlah sumpah prajurit yang diambil hanya 4. Salah satu unsur dalam sumpah prajurit tidak sesuai dengan karakteristik anak yaitu memegang rahasia sekeras-kerasnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis keefektifan pembelajaran dengan menerapkan nilai-nilai keprajuritan untuk mengembangkan karakter nasionalis. Jenis penelitian yaitu quasi experimental design bentuk nonequivalent control group design. Sampel penelitian ini sebanyak 17 siswa sebagai kelas eksperimen dan sebanyak 16 siswa sebagai kelas kontrol. Pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, kemudian dianaslisi menggunakan uji Paired Sample T-test, uji N-Gain, dan Independent Sample T-test. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan terdapat peningkatan karakter nasionalis dari pretest meningkat pada posttest. Nilai-nilai keprajuritan efektif dalam meningkatkan karakter nasionalis anak usia dini. Implikasi dari penelitian ini yaitu bagi PAUD dalam lingkungan TNI dan PAUD lainnya dapat menerapkan nilai keprajuritan untuk mengembang karakter nasionalis anak
title: Penerapan Nilai-Nilai Keprajuritan untuk Meningkatkan Karakter Nasionalis Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of military values ​​to improve the nationalist character of early childhood children The insertion of these military values ​​is taken from the soldier's oath. From the number of soldier's oaths taken, only one element in the soldier's oath does not match the characteristics of children, namely holding secrets as hard as possible. This study aims to analyze the effectiveness of learning by applying military values ​​to develop nationalist character. The type of research is quasi-experimental design in the form of nonequivalent control group design. The sample of this study was 1,000 students as an experimental class and 1,000 students as a control class. Data collection used observation and was then analyzed using the paired sample t-test, the Ngain test and the independent sample t-test. The results of the study showed that there was an increase in nationalist character from the pretest to an increase in the posttest. Military values ​​are effective in improving the nationalist character of early childhood children. The implications of this study are that for early childhood education in the TNI environment and other early childhood education, they can apply military values ​​to develop children's nationalist character.

desc: Pemindahan pembelajaran ke rumah secara daring sebagai upaya mencegah penularan Covid-19 menyebabkan perubahan pada sistem pendidikan baik dari segi pembelajaran, penilaian, media dan lainnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis pelaksanaan penilaian perkembangan anak selama belajar dari rumah. Subjek penelitian 23 guru Taman Kanak-Kanak dari 10 sekolah yang melaksanakan pembelajaran jarak jauh di Sumatra Utara dengan risiko sedang penyebaran COVID-19 yaitu, Kota Medan, Deli Serdang, Serdang Berdagai, Asahan, dan Labuhan Batu. Menggunakan pendekatan deskriptif kuantitaif dengan menggunakan kuesioner sebagai teknik pengumpulan data. Kuesioner disusun menggunakan Google Form, selanjutnya tautannya disebarkan guru melalui media whatsapp. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pelaksanaan penilaian perkembangan anak tetap dilaksanakan meski pembelajaran dilakukan dari rumah. Penilaian dilakukan dengan mengumpulkan informasi melalui laporan orang tua. Laporan orang tua berupa dokumentasi terkait proses kegiatan dan hasil kerja anak. Dikumpulkan menjadi  portofolio yang berisi dokumentasi elektronik  yaitu foto hasil lembar kerja, hasil karya anak, dan video unjuk kerja anak yang disatukan dalam bentuk file untuk dilakukan penilaian.
title: Penilaian Perkembangan Anak Selama Belajar dari Rumah di Era Pandemic Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: child development assessment during home learning in the era of the covid pandemic, the transfer of online learning to home as an effort to prevent the transmission of covid has caused changes in the education system both in terms of learning, media assessment and others. This study aims to analyze the implementation of child development assessment during home learning, the subject of the study is kindergarten teachers from schools that implement distance learning in North Sumatra with a moderate risk of spreading covid, namely the cities of Medan, Deli Serdang, Serdang, Berdagai, Asahan and Labuhan Batu using a quantitative descriptive approach using a questionnaire as a data collection technique. The questionnaire was compiled using Google Form, then the link was distributed by the teacher via WhatsApp media. The results of the study show that the implementation of child development assessments is still carried out even though learning is carried out from home. The assessment is carried out by collecting information through parent reports. Parent reports in the form of documentation related to the process of activities and the results of children's work are collected into a portfolio containing electronic documentation, namely photos of worksheets, children's work and videos of children's work performances which are combined in the form of files for assessment.

desc: Hikayat Indraputra (HI) adalah salah satu karya sastra Melayu yang sangat populer. Jumlah naskahnya yang banyak dan telah diterjemahkan ke dalam tiga bahasa lain menunjukkan pentingnya naskah itu untuk dikaji dengan mendalam. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengungkap model pengasuhan anak usia dini dalam naskah HI, dengan menggunakan metode penelitian lingkaran fungsi Braginsky dengan beberapa indikator tertentu sebagai pedoman operasional. Fungsi yang dimaksud di sini adalah apa yang dituju oleh pengarang dan signifikansi teks-teks tertentu dalam keseluruhannya. Penelitian ini berusaha menemukan bentuk pengasuhan anak pada keluarga kerajaan yang hidup pada masa lampau, yang tentu terdapat banyak perbedaan lingkungan sosial budaya dengan bentuk pengasuhan pada masa sekarang. Penelitian ini menemukan bahwa, isi cerita yang mempunyai konteks pengasuhan anak usia dini yaitu bentuk pengasuhan yang diterapkan oleh Maharaja Bikrama Bispa kepada anaknya antara lain adalah ketika Maharaja Bikrama Bispa bersyukur dan bersukacita atas kelahiran, memberi nama yang baik, memberi perlindungan, mengenalkan agama, menjaga kebersihan, membahagiakan, dan mendoakan anak. Temuan atas indikator-indikator pengasuhan anak tersebut direduksi dari data inti aspek-aspek pengasuhan yaitu asuh, asih, dan asah.
title: Pengasuhan Anak Usia Dini dalam Hikayat Indraputra
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early Childhood Care in the Hikayat Indraputra The Hikayat Indraputra Hi is one of the most popular Malay literary works. The large number of manuscripts and has been translated into three other languages ​​shows the importance of the manuscript to be studied in depth. This study aims to reveal the model of early childhood care in the Hikayat manuscript using the Braginsky function circle research method with several specific indicators as operational guidelines. The function referred to here is what the author is aiming for and the significance of certain texts as a whole. This study attempts to find the form of child care in royal families who lived in the past, which of course had many differences in the socio-cultural environment with the form of care today. This study found that the content of the story that has the context of early childhood care, namely the form of care applied by Maharaja Bikrama Bispa to his child, including when Maharaja Bikrama Bispa was grateful and rejoiced at the birth, gave a good name, gave protection, introduced religion, maintained cleanliness, made the child happy and prayed for. The findings of the indicators of child care were reduced from the core data of the aspects of care, namely caring and sharpening.

desc: Kewirausahaan menjadi bahasan penting manakala ingin berbicara tentang kemajuan ekonomi bangsa. Beberapa aspek perlu disiapkan, termasuk pengenalan kewirusahaan berbasis budaya terhadap anak usia dini dalam pendidikan anak usia dini (PAUD). Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui proses pembelajaran kewirausahaan berbasis budaya di PAUD dan mengetahui bagaimana budaya dapat diperkenalkan kepada siswa di PAUD. Metode penelitian menggunakan metode kualitatif. Responden terdiri dari kepala sekolah, guru dan orang tua murid. Pengambilan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Instrumen digunakan adalah instrument wawancara. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa proses pembelajaran pengenalan kewirausahaan tidak dapat dipaksa, melainkan menggunakan metode bermain beserta metode dan program yang terfokus pada kewirusahaan. Pengenalan budaya dapat dilakukan dengan memberikan berbagai macam produk yang dapat dijual, seperti makanan tradisional Indonesia. Budaya tidak hanya berkaitan dengan makanan tradisional, namun mencakup, tradisi,adat istiadat, baju daerah , lagu daerah serta cerita rakyat. Implikasi dari penelitian ini adalah perlu pembuatan kurikulum yang baku dan adaptif bagi pembelajaran anak usia dini.
title: Bagaimana Proses Belajar Berwirausaha dan Budaya pada Anak Usia Dini?
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: how the process of learning entrepreneurship and culture in early childhood entrepreneurship becomes an important topic when we want to talk about the progress of the nation's economy several aspects need to be prepared including the introduction of culture-based entrepreneurship to early childhood in early childhood education paud the purpose of this study is to determine the process of learning entrepreneurship based on culture in paud and to find out how culture can be introduced to students in paud the research method uses a qualitative method respondents consist of school principals teachers and parents of students data collection using observation interviews and documentation the instrument used is an interview instrument the results of the study show that the process of learning to introduce entrepreneurship cannot be forced but uses a play method along with methods and programs that focus on entrepreneurship cultural introduction can be done by providing various kinds of products that can be sold such as traditional Indonesian food culture is not only related to traditional food but includes traditions customs regional clothes regional songs and folk tales the implication of this study is the need to create a standard and adaptive curriculum for early childhood learning

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan cara membiasakan pola hidup sehat dan bersih pada anak usia dini selama pandemi covid-19. Penelitian ini dianalisis dengan metode kualitiatif deskriptif. Subjek dipilih menggunakan teknik sampel nonprobability sampling yaitu purposive sample (pemilihan sampel dengan pertimbangan tertentu). Penelitian menggunakan 12 subjek yang terdiri dari 4 orang guru dan 4 orang wali murid beserta anaknya. Penelitian ini menggunakan wawancara untuk mengumpukan data dengan proses analisis melalui tiga tahapan yaitu reduksi data, display data, dan kesimpulkan serta verifikasi data. Berdasarkan hasil wawancara dengan subjek penelitian disimpulkan bahwa membiasakan pola hidup sehat dan bersih pada anak pada masa pandemi covid-19 dapat dilakukan dengan cara mengingatkan anak untuk memakan-makanan yang bergizi seperti sayur dan buah, berolahraga teratur dan istirahat yang cukup serta melakukan berjemur setiap pagi sekitar 10-15 menit, mencuci tangan dengan sabun, dan menjaga kebersihan diri sendiri.
title: Membiasakan Pola Hidup Sehat dan Bersih pada Anak Usia Dini Selama Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Accustoming a healthy and clean lifestyle to early childhood during the covid pandemic The purpose of this study is to describe how to accustom a healthy and clean lifestyle to early childhood during the covid pandemic This study was analyzed using a descriptive qualitative method. Subjects were selected using a nonprobability sampling technique, namely purposive sample. Sample selection with certain considerations. The study used subjects consisting of teachers and guardians of students and their children. This study used interviews to collect data with an analysis process through three stages, namely data reduction, data display and conclusions, and data verification. Based on the results of interviews with research subjects, it was concluded that accustoming a healthy and clean lifestyle to children during the covid pandemic can be done by reminding children to eat nutritious foods such as vegetables and fruits, exercising regularly and getting enough rest, and sunbathing every morning for about minutes, washing hands with soap and maintaining personal hygiene.

desc: Video dari platform Youtube, seperti video bullying, kekerasan antar perbedaan dan lain sebagainya, berdampak pada perkembangan karakter anak didik, seperti individualis atau anti sosial sehingga hal tersebut agar segera diantisipasi dengan membangun karakter toleransi. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui strategi pembangunan Karakter toleransi pada anak usia dini dan implikasi dari terbangunnya karakter toleransi pada anak usia dini terhadap ketahanan pribadi. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dan jenis penelitian kepustakaan. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan dokumentasi dan Teknik analisis data menggunakan analisis data isi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa karakter toleransi dapat dibangun melalui berbagai metode pembelajaran, namun kunci utama dalam mambangun karakter tersebut adalah adanya sinergi antara orang tua dengan guru dan berimplikasi pada ketahanan pribadi anak usia dini karena mampu menghormati dan menghargai antar perbedaan dan mampu bersikap serta berperilaku mengutamakan kepentingan bersama daripada kepentingan pribadi. Seorang guru dalam membangun karakter toleransi dan ketahanan pribadi harus memiliki kompetensi sebagai seorang pendidik dan juga harus dapat beradaptasi dengan perkembangan zaman yang selalu dinamis, dengan mengimplementasikan metode dan media pembelajaran yang bervariatif
title: Pembangunan Karakter Toleransi pada Anak Usia Dini dan Implikasinya terhadap Ketahanan Pribadi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: character building tolerance in early childhood and its implications for personal resilience videos from the youtube platform such as bullying videos violence between differences and so on have an impact on the development of students' characters such as individualistic or anti-social so that this should be anticipated immediately by building a character of tolerance the purpose of this study is to determine the strategy for building character tolerance in early childhood and the implications of building a character of tolerance in early childhood on personal resilience this study uses a qualitative approach and type of library research data collection techniques with documentation and data analysis techniques using content data analysis the results of the study show that the character of tolerance can be built through various learning methods but the main key in building this character is the synergy between parents and teachers and has implications for the personal resilience of early childhood because they are able to respect and appreciate differences and are able to act and behave prioritizing common interests rather than personal interests a teacher in building character tolerance and personal resilience must have competence as an educator and must also be able to adapt to the development of the era which is always dynamic by implementing various learning methods and media

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan berfikir kritis anak kelas B2 di TK Pertiwi 3 Palembang. Metode penelitian yang digunakan yaitu penelitian tindakan kelas yang dilakukan secara kolaboratif antara peneliti dan guru kelas. Subjek dalam penelitian ini adalah anak kelompok B2 TK Pertiwi 3 kota Palembang yang berjumlah tujuh belas orang anak. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui observasi dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data dilakukan dengan deskriftif kualitatif. Berdasarkan data yang diperoleh presentase keampuan berfikir kritis anak pada pra siklus sebesar lima puluh persen. Pada Pra siklus kemampuan berfikir kritis anak berada pada kategori mulai berkembang (MB). Pada siklus I (TCP) kemampuan berfikir kritis anak berada pada kategori berkembang sesuai harapan (BSH). Pada siklus II tingkat capaian anak rata-rata berada pada kategori berkembang sangat baik (BSB). Terlihat adanya peningkatan kemampuan berfkir kritis anak meningkat mulai dari pra siklus, siklu I, dan siklus II.
title: Meningkatkan Kemampuan Berpikir Kritis melalui Pendekatan Saintifik
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving critical thinking skills through a scientific approach this study aims to improve the critical thinking skills of class B children at Pertiwi Kindergarten in Palembang the research method used is classroom action research which is carried out collaboratively between researchers and class teachers the subjects in this study are group B children at Pertiwi Kindergarten in Palembang city totaling seventeen children the data collection technique is through observation and documentation the data analysis technique is carried out with descriptive qualitative based on the data obtained the percentage of children's critical thinking skills in the pre-cycle is fifty percent in the pre-cycle the children's critical thinking skills are in the category of starting to develop mb in cycle i tcp the children's critical thinking skills are in the category of developing according to expectations bsh in cycle ii the average child's achievement level is in the category of developing very well bsb there is an increase in children's critical thinking skills increasing starting from pre-cycle cycle i and cycle ii

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mendapatkan informasi terkait kendala dalam pembelajaran secara daring pada layanan PAUD akibat adanya pandemic COVID-19. Penelitian menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode studi kasus eksplorasi untuk mendapatkan informasi bagaimana proses pembelajaran daring berlangsung dan kendala yang dihadapi dalam pembelajaran. Dalam penelitian ini, responden sebanyak 8 orang tua murid di lembaga PAUD di Sleman Yogyakarta. Untuk tujuan kerahasiaan, responden diberi inisial R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7 dan R8. Hasil dari penelitian ini terdapat kendala yang dialami oleh murid, guru, dan orang tua dalam pembelajaran daring yaitu keterbatasan penguasaan teknologi, jaringan internet yang tidak stabil, variasi materi bahan ajar yang masih sangat minim, serta jam kerja yang menjadi tidak terbatas bagi guru. Dampak dari penelitian ini dapat memberikan masukan bagi pemangku kebijakan tentang bagaimana menyelenggrakan model pendidikan daring yang sesuai dengan kondisi warga belajarnya terlebih pada masa pandemi
title: Persepsi Orang Tua Siswa terhadap Pembelajaran Daring pada Masa Pandemi Covid 19 di Yogyakarta
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parents' perceptions of online learning during the Covid pandemic in Yogyakarta The purpose of this study was to obtain information related to obstacles in online learning in early childhood education services due to the Covid pandemic. The study used a qualitative approach with an exploratory case study method to obtain information on how the online learning process takes place and the obstacles faced in learning. In this study, respondents were parents of students at early childhood education institutions in Sleman, Yogyakarta. For the purpose of confidentiality, respondents were given the initials r r r r r r r and r. The results of this study found obstacles experienced by students, teachers and parents in online learning, namely limited mastery of technology, unstable internet networks, variations in teaching materials that are still very minimal, and working hours that are unlimited for teachers. The impact of this study can provide input for policy makers on how to organize an online education model that is in accordance with the conditions of its students, especially during the pandemic.

desc: Pembelajaran nasionalisme pada anak usia dini dalam studi pendahuluan di lembaga-lembaga paud berbasis Islam belum terinternalisasi dengan baik. Pembelajaran nasionalisme pada anak usia ini mengajarkan anak tentang rasa bangga terhadap identitas nasional, memupuk sikap inklusif, toleransi,  kerjasama, tolong-menolong, sejak usia dini. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan proses pembelajaran Nasionalisme anak usia dini pada lembaga-lembaga paud di Kota Baubau. Penelitian ini menggunakan jenis penelitian kualitatif dengan pendekatan participatory. Data-data dikumpulkan dengan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Data yang telah dikumpulkan selanjutnya dianalisis melalui teknik reduksi, display dan verifikasi untuk mendapatkan kesimpulan yang baik. Hasil penelitian dapat dideskripsikan bahwa internalisasi nilai-nilai nasionalisme dalam proses pembelajaran di Lembaga PAUD berbasis Islam dilakukan dengan kegiatan variatif seperti mewarnai, menggunting, menempel, main peran, bercerita, kolase, mencap, finger painting dan kegiatan bernyanyi gerak lagu. Penelitian ini dapat menjadi acuan teoritis dan praktis lembaga PAUD berbasis Islam dalam mengembangkan metode pembelajarannya dalam menginternalisasi nilai-nilai nasionalisme sejak usia dini.
title: Internalisasi Nilai-Nilai Nasionalisme Anak Usia Dini pada Lembaga PAUD Berbasis Islam
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: internalization of nationalism values ​​for early childhood in Islamic-based early childhood education institutions nationalism learning for early childhood in preliminary studies in Islamic-based early childhood education institutions has not been internalized well nationalism learning for children of this age teaches children about pride in national identity fosters an inclusive attitude of tolerance cooperation helping each other from an early age this study aims to describe the process of nationalism learning for early childhood in early childhood education institutions in Baubau City this study uses a qualitative research type with a participatory approach data collected through observation interviews and documentation the data that has been collected is then analyzed through reduction display and verification techniques to obtain good conclusions the results of the study can be described that the internalization of nationalism values ​​in the learning process in Islamic-based early childhood education institutions is carried out with varied activities such as coloring cutting sticking role playing storytelling collage stamping finger painting and singing activities moving songs this study can be a theoretical and practical reference for Islamic-based early childhood education institutions in developing their learning methods in internalizing nationalism values ​​from an early age

desc: Having a strategy to increase the institution's competitiveness provides positive energy for an institution to develop the institution. This study analyzes and examines strategies to increase competitiveness through public demand intermediaries at RA Masyitoh III Sumberanyar Paiton Probolinggo. This research uses a qualitative approach. Technical analysis of the data through interviews, observation, and documentation is then carried out reduction which is processed on the display of the last data drawing conclusions. Research shows results; the strategy of increasing the competitiveness of public demand in RA Masyitoh III is carried out by creating school branding, public engagement, and continuous improvement through evaluation of the implementation of school branding and public engagement that has been running. From the study results, the public demand strategy carried out by RA Masyithoh III became a breakthrough for institutions at the level in the Paiton region that do not have a marketing strategy. The implications for the institution are that the institution is increasingly recognized by the broader community with increasingly highlighted characteristics. The implications for teachers are that teachers will further increase their competence in their respective fields to keep up with the institution's development.
title: Intercultural Communication: Strategy to Improve School Competitiveness Based on Public Demand
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: intercultural communication strategy to improve school competitiveness based on public demand having a strategy to increase the institutions competitiveness provides positive energy for an institution to develop the institution this study analyzes and examines strategies to increase competitiveness through public demand intermediaries at ra masyitoh iii Sumberanyar Paiton Probolinggo this research uses a qualitative approach technical analysis of the data through interviews observation and documentation is then carried out reduction which is processed on the display of the last data drawing conclusions research shows the results of the strategy of increasing the competitiveness of public demand in ra masyitoh iii is carried out by creating school branding public engagement and continuous improvement through evaluation of the implementation of school branding and public engagement that has been running from the study results of the public demand strategy carried out by ra masyitoh iii became a breakthrough for institutions at the level in the paiton region that do not have a marketing strategy the implications for the institution are that the institution is increasingly recognized by the broader community with increasingly highlighted characteristics the implications for teachers are that teachers will further increase their competence in their respective fields to keep up with the institutions development

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan media pembelajaran CSK (CT-Sheet for Kids) untuk mengenalkan Computational Thinking (CT) pada anak Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD). Penelitian dilakukan pada anak PAUD Himmatul Hidayah Desa Pojok Kecamatan Kwadungan Kabupaten Ngawi, Jawa Timur sejumlah 21 anak. Pengembangan media mengacu pada model pengembangan Plomp yang terbagi dalam lima tahap yaitu tahap investigasi awal, tahap desain, tahap realisasi, tahap tes, evaluasi dan revisi, dan tahap implementasi. Namun pada penelitian ini hanya sampai tahap tes, evaluasi dan revisi. Instrumen yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah lembar validasi media, angket respon anak dan soal tes hasil belajar. Hasil dari penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa media CSK untuk mengenalkan CT pada anak PAUD yang dikembangkan memenuhi kriteria valid, efektif, dan praktid. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dapat disimpulkan bahwa media CSK layak digunakan dalam pembelajaran, khususnya dalam mengenalkan CT kepada anak usia dini. Media CSK ini merupakan media yang baru dan belum pernah ada sebelumnya. Rekomendasi untuk penelitian selanjutnya adalah perluasan subjek penelitian meliputi materi dan pengembangan media pembelajaran yang lebih baik lagi.
title: Computational Thinking : Media Pembelajaran CSK (CT-Sheet for Kids) dalam Matematika PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Computational thinking learning media csk ctsheet for kids in early childhood mathematics This study aims to develop learning media csk ctsheet for kids to introduce computational thinking ct to children of early childhood education paud The study was conducted on children of paud himmatul hidayah, pojok village, kwadungan district, ngawi regency, east java A number of children media development refers to the plomp development model which is divided into five stages, namely the initial investigation stage, design stage, realization stage, test evaluation and revision stage and implementation stage However, in this study only up to the test evaluation and revision stage The instruments used in this study were media validation sheets, child response questionnaires and learning outcome test questions The results of this study indicate that the csk media to introduce ct to paud children that was developed met the criteria of valid, effective and practical Based on the results of the study, it can be concluded that the csk media is suitable for use in learning, especially in introducing ct to early childhood children This csk media is a new media and has never existed before Recommendations for further research are to expand the research subject including material and development of better learning media

desc: Pada tahun 2022 pemerintah menerapkan program merdeka belajar di sekolah-sekolah yang ada di Indonesia. Program ini ternyata tidak mampu diterima oleh semua guru dikarenakan beberapa faktor intrinsic dan ekstrinsik. Untuk melaksanakan program ini dibutuhkan perilaku inovatif dari setiap guru. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui pengaruh knowledge sharing behavior terhadap innovative bahvior pada guru PAUD. Metode yang digunakan adalah pendekatan kuantitatif dengan jumlah sampel yang dilibatkan sebanyak 166 guru PAUD. Hasil penelitian ini menemukan bahwa terdapat pengaruh knowledge sharing behavior terhadap innovative bahvior pada guru PAUD. Artinya semakin tinggi knowledge sharing behavior maka akan meningkatkan innovative bahvior pada guru PAUD.
title: Pengaruh Knowledge Sharing Behavior terhadap Innovative Behavior pada Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of knowledge sharing behavior on innovative behavior in early childhood education teachers in the year the government implemented the independent learning program in schools in Indonesia. This program was not accepted by all teachers due to several intrinsic and extrinsic factors. To implement this program, innovative behavior is needed from each teacher. The purpose of this study was to determine the influence of knowledge sharing behavior on innovative behavior in early childhood education teachers. The method used was a quantitative approach with a sample size of 1,000 early childhood education teachers. The results of this study found that there was an influence of knowledge sharing behavior on innovative behavior in early childhood education teachers. This means that the higher the knowledge sharing behavior, the more innovative behavior in early childhood education teachers will be.

desc: Literasi sains perlu dikenalkan sejak dini karena penting untuk melatih perkembangan konsep dan perilaku ilmiah. Hasil PISA Indonesia tahun 2018 menyebutkan penurunan literasi paling banyak ditunjukkan pada literasi membaca 371, literasi matematika 379, dan disusul literasi sains 396. Studi tersebut melaporkan bahwa media yang digunakan masih sangat minim sehingga pembelajaran literasi sains tidak optimal. Oleh karena itu, penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan e-modul untuk meningkatkan kemampuan literasi sains anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan adalah pengembangan yang diadopsi dari Borg  Gall. Instrumen yang digunakan berupa angket dan pedoman observasi. Subyek yang terlibat adalah tiga guru dan anak usia dini berusia 5-6 tahun yang berjumlah 15 orang. Analisis data dilakukan dengan metode persentase. Hasil analisis data ini dalam penelitian ini dapat dijabarkan berdasarkan perumusan dan pengelolaan pada pengumpulan data, perencanaan, pengembangan draft produk, dan uji coba dan revisi hasil uji coba. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan oleh guru untuk memberikan kegiatan yang beragam dan menantang terutama berkaitan dengan sains
title: Pengembangan E-Modul Literasi Sains Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of early childhood science literacy e-module science literacy needs to be introduced early because it is important to train the development of scientific concepts and behavior the results of the Indonesian PISA in 2014 stated that the decline in literacy was mostly shown in reading literacy, mathematics literacy and followed by science literacy the study reported that the media used was still very minimal so that science literacy learning was not optimal therefore this study aims to produce an e-module to improve the science literacy skills of early childhood the method used is a development adopted from Borg Gall the instruments used are questionnaires and observation guidelines the subjects involved are three teachers and early childhood children aged years totaling 10 people data analysis was carried out using the percentage method the results of this data analysis in this study can be described based on the formulation and management of data collection planning product draft development and trials and revisions of trial results the implications of the results of this study can be used by teachers to provide diverse and challenging activities especially related to science

desc: Laporan dari World Drug Report menyatakan bahwa pada saat ini terdapat sekitar 208 juta orang atau sekitar 5% dari pada penduduk dunia, yang menggunakan narkotika dan zat adiktif lain. Penguna narkoba berusia 15 hingga 64 tahun dan diperkirakan pada tahun 2025 meningkat menjadi 15% dari penduduk dunia. Narkotika adalah zat atau obat yang berasal dari tanaman atau bukan tanaman baik sintetis maupun semi sintetis yang dapat menyebabkan penurunan atau perubahan kesadaran, hilangnya rasa, mengurangi sampai menghilangkan rasa nyeri, dan dapat menimbulkan adiksi atau ketergantungan Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui pengetahuan siswa kelas x dan xi tentang narkoba di smkn 1 bangkinang tahun 2015. Penelitian ini adalah penelitian deskriptif, pengambilan sampel yang digunakan adalah simple random sampling sebanyak 87 orang, menggunakan kuesioner kemudian diolah secara manual. Analisa yang digunakan adalah univariat. Hasil penelitian didapatkan bahwa pengetahuan siswa kelas X dan XI tentang narkoba di smkn 1 bangkinang tahun 2015 adalah kurang yaitu sebanyak 55 orang (63,2%) yang disebabkan oleh faktor usia, tempat tinggal di kontrakan dan uang saku. Diharapkan bagi siswa perlu lebih selektif dalam memilih teman bergaul dan dan perilaku yang ditiru dari teman tersebut, baik di lingkungan sekolah, keluarga maupun teman sebaya.
title: Pengetahuan Siswa Kelas X dan XI Tentang Narkoba  di SMKN 1 Bangkinang Tahun 2015
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: knowledge of class X and XI students about drugs at SMKN Bangkinang in the year the report from the world drug report states that currently there are around million people or around ¾ of the world's population who use narcotics and other addictive substances drug users aged up to years and it is estimated that in the year it will increase to ¾ of the world's population narcotics are substances or drugs that come from plants or non-plants, both synthetic and semi-synthetic, which can cause a decrease or change in consciousness, loss of feeling, reduce to eliminate pain and can cause addiction or dependence the purpose of this study is to determine the knowledge of class X and XI students about drugs at SMKN Bangkinang in the year this study is a descriptive study the sampling used is simple random sampling as many as people using a questionnaire then processed manually the analysis used is univariate the results of the study showed that the knowledge of class X and XI students about drugs at SMKN Bangkinang in the year is less, namely as many as people caused by age factors, rented residence and pocket money, it is expected that students need to be more selective in choosing friends to hang out with and the behavior that is imitated from these friends both in the school environment, family and peers

desc: Hasil belajar merupakan tolak ukur keberhasilan proses pembelajaran yang dilakukan. Hasil belajar di sekolah dasar khususnya pengetahuan masih rendah. Penelitian ini mengukur pengaruh penerapan model discovery learning terhadap hasil belajar pengetahuan siswa pada pembelajaran tematik di sekolah dasar. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian eksperimen dengan   dalam bentuk quasy eksperimental design.  Desain quasy eksperimen yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yaitu nonequivalent control group design. Satu kelas menggunakan model pembelajaran saintific dan kelas percobaan menggunakan discovery learning. Subjek penelitian adalah keseluruhan siswa kelas II SD N 26 Jati Utara Kota Padang. Instrumen pengumpulan data dengan menggunakan tes.  Berdasarkan hasil uji hipotesis dengan menggunakan uji-t diperoleh data sebagai berikut.  Terdapat perbedan hasil belajar antara siswa siswa yang menggunakan model discovery learning dengan siswa yang memperoleh pembelajaran dengan pendekatan saintific. Dengan demikian model discovery learning dapat digunakan pada pembelajaran tematik guna meningkatkan hasil belajar pengetahuan siswa.
title: Efektifitas Model Discovery Learning Terhadap Hasil Belajar siswa pada Pembelajaran Tematik Terpadu Usia 7-8 tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effectiveness of the discovery learning model on student learning outcomes in integrated thematic learning age years learning outcomes are a measure of the success of the learning process carried out learning outcomes in elementary schools, especially knowledge is still low this study measures the effect of the application of the discovery learning model on student learning outcomes in thematic learning in elementary schools this study is an experimental study in the form of a quasi-experimental design the quasi-experimental design used in this study is nonequivalent control group design one class using a scientific learning model and an experimental class using discovery learning the subjects of the study were all students in class II of SDN Jati Utara, Padang City data collection instruments using tests based on the results of hypothesis testing using the t-test the following data is obtained there is a difference in learning outcomes between students who use the discovery learning model and students who receive learning with a scientific approach thus the discovery learning model can be used in thematic learning to improve students' knowledge learning outcomes

desc: Miskonsepsi tentang transisi PAUD ke SD masih sering dijumpai. Miskonsepsi tersebut dapat berupa tes calistung sebagai alat penerimaan SD sehingga pada masa pendidikan usia dini, anak mendapatkan pengalaman yang tidak menyenangkan. Tujuan penelitian untuk menggambarkan penerapan transisi PAUD ke SD yang menyenangkan, dengan menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara, dokumentasi, FGD. Hasil penelitian ini diketahui bahwa adanya upaya dalam melakukan transisi PAUD-SD yang menyenangkan, dibuktikan dengan (1) PPDB tidak menggunakan tes calistung tetapi menggunakan asesmen. (2) Telah diterapkannya kegiatan MPLS selama 1 minggu. (3) Proses pembelajaran dalam mengembangkan kemampuan fondasi anak telah dilakukan dengan cara yang menyenangkan. Hal tersebut dibuktikan dengan setting ruang belajar pada SD yang menyenangkan, lingkungan PAUD dan SD kelas awal berada satu tempat,  menempatkan lulusan PG-PAUD menjadi guru pada SD kelas awal. Selain itu, proses pembelajaran di  SD Lab School FIP UMJ masih menerapkan tes tulis dan lisan dalam mengukur capaian belajar siswa.
title: Upaya Penerapan Transisi PAUD Ke SD yang Menyenangkan: Ditinjau dari PPDB, MPLS dan Proses Pembelajaran
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts to implement a fun transition from early childhood education to elementary school reviewed from the PPDB MPLS and the learning process Misconceptions about the transition from early childhood education to elementary school are still often found, these misconceptions can be in the form of reading, writing and arithmetic tests as a tool for accepting elementary school so that during early childhood education children get unpleasant experiences The purpose of the study was to describe the implementation of a fun transition from early childhood education to elementary school using qualitative descriptive methods Data collection techniques using observation, interviews, documentation, FGD The results of this study showed that there were efforts to make a fun transition from early childhood education as evidenced by the PPDB not using a reading, writing and arithmetic test but using an assessment The implementation of MPLS activities during the week The learning process in developing children's foundational abilities has been carried out in a fun way This is evidenced by the setting of a fun learning space in elementary school The early childhood education and elementary school environments are in one place, placing PGPAUD graduates as teachers in early elementary school In addition, the learning process at the elementary school lab school FIP UMJ still applies written and oral tests to measure student learning outcomes

desc: Intelligence does not only lie in cognitive, but interpersonal is a form of multiple intelligences. This research is based on learning centers in several kindergarten in Bengkulu whose implementation is still very varied. This research was conducted on children at Kindergarten IT Auladuna Bengkulu by applying edutainment-based learning centers. This school was chosen because the implementation of the learning center was in accordance with the guidelines approved by the Ministry of Education and Culture. The research design used was a one group pretest-posttest design. Data were taken by pretest and posttest in the experimental class and the control class. The results showed that the application of edutainment-based learning centers had a significant N-Gain effectiveness. The result is an average of 78.99% which is high when compared to the control class learning (mean 23.03%) carried out in that school. So it can be concluded that the application of edutainment-based learning centers has been effective in improving children's interpersonal intelligence.
title: Implementation of Edutainment-Based Learning Centers to Improve Children's Interpersonal Intelligence
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
