title: Implemenatsi Kegiatan Bermain Cak Bur terhadap  Peningkatan Sosial Emosional pada Anak Usia Dini Selama Masa Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of cak bur play activities on improving social emotional in early childhood during the pandemic The Covid pandemic has changed people's lifestyles in the field of education which requires every child to use gadgets to get their rights in the learning process which has undergone very drastic changes so that aspects of social emotional development are not stimulated properly this is because children cannot play with their peers for about a year therefore it is necessary to have fun games with their peers such as the traditional cak bur game the purpose of this study is to analyze the implementation of the cak bur game on improving children's social emotional methods the method taken in this study is to use literature from accredited journals with descriptive data analysis the results of the study were found from the journals that were collected there were relevant journals it can be concluded that the traditional cak bur game can improve children's social skills from an early age including cooperation getting children used to being honest getting used to discipline the growth of a sense of tolerance being responsible and getting children used to being open-minded

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan matematika anak usia dini. Jenis penelitian ini adalah penelitian tindakan (action research) dengan prosedur empat-tahap, yaitu: 1) Tahap perencanaan, 2) Tahap pengambilan tindakan, 3) Tahap pengembangan, 4) Tahap refleksi. Penelitian dilaksanakan dalam dua siklus. Metode pengumpulan data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yakni melalui observasi. Proses pengumpulan data melalui teknik observasi ini menggunakan panduan rubrik untuk merekam data mengenai kemampuan matematika anak selama mengikuti proses pembelajaran. Data yang terkumpul selanjutnya dianalisis secara deskriptif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan peningkatan kemampuan matematika anak selama penerapan model pembelajaran kooperatif tipe jigsaw II berbantuan benda konkret. Ketuntasan kemampuan matematika anak pada observasi awal 7 anak (29,17%), siklus I sebanyak 17 anak (70,83%), dan siklus II 22 anak (91,67%). Maka dapat dikatakan bahwa model pembelajaran kooperatif tipe jigsaw II berbantuan benda konkret merupakan salah satu alternatif metode pembelajaran yang kreatif, inovatif dan efektif dalam meningkatkan kemampuan matematika anak usia dini
title: Model Pembelajaran Kooperatif Tipe Jigsaw II dalam Meningkatkan Kemampuan Matematika Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Jigsaw II cooperative learning model in improving children's mathematical abilities This study aims to improve the mathematical abilities of early childhood This type of research is action research with a four-stage procedure, namely the planning stage, the action-taking stage, the development stage, the reflection stage The research was carried out in two cycles The data collection method used in this study was through observation The data collection process through this observation technique uses a rubric guide to record data on children's mathematical abilities during the learning process The collected data is then analyzed descriptively The results of the study showed an increase in children's mathematical abilities during the application of the jigsaw II cooperative learning model assisted by concrete objects The completeness of children's mathematical abilities in the initial observation of children in cycle I as many as 1,000 children and cycle II children It can be said that the jigsaw II cooperative learning model assisted by concrete objects is one alternative learning method that is creative, innovative and effective in improving the mathematical abilities of early childhood

desc: Masa pandemi covid-19 menjadi masa yang cukup berat bagi dunia pendidikan. Hal ini karena ditetapkannya sejumlah aturan yang mengharuskan seluruh siswa melakukan kegiatan belajar daring. Dengan demikian anak akan selalu dihadapkan dengan gadget dalam pelaksanaan kegiatan belajar sehingga mempengaruhi motorik kasarnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui dan membandingankan kemampuan motorik kasar anak di masa pandemi covid-19, baik daring maupun luring.  Penelitian ini termasuk penelitian eksperimen semu (quasi eksperimental) menggunakan desain penelitian berupa nonequivalent control group design dengan pengujian statistik mann whitney. Objek penelitian ini yakni siswa RA Sholihin Kecamatan Ngaglik Sleman Yogyakarta yang berjumlah 35 anak dan siswa RA Sunan Pandanaran Kecamatan Ngaglik Sleman Yogyakarta dengan jumlah 35 anak. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa diperoleh hasil bahwa pembelajaran luring memperoleh hasil yang lebih baik terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak dibandingkan dengan  pembelajaran luring. Dengan demikian pembelajaran luring pada anak TK memberikan dampak positif terhadap motorik kasar anak TK.
title: Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak di Masa Pandemi Covid-19: Pembelajaran Daring dan Luring
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: children's gross motor skills during the covid pandemic online and offline learning during the covid pandemic has become quite a difficult time for the world of education, this is because a number of rules have been set that require all students to carry out online learning activities, thus children will always be faced with gadgets in carrying out learning activities, thus affecting their gross motor skills. This study aims to determine and compare children's gross motor skills during the covid pandemic, both online and offline. This study includes quasi-experimental research using a nonequivalent control group design with mann-whitney statistical testing. The objects of this study were students of RA Sholihin, Ngaglik District, Sleman, Yogyakarta, totaling 1,000 children and students of RA Sunan Pandanaran, Ngaglik District, Sleman, Yogyakarta, totaling 1,000 children. The results of the study showed that offline learning obtained better results for children's gross motor skills compared to offline learning. Thus, offline learning in kindergarten children has a positive impact on kindergarten children's gross motor skills.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengevaluasi program layanan Holistik Integratif dengan menggunakan analisis CIPP di Taman Kanak-Kanak Islam Khaira Ummah dengan menggunakan metode analisis model CIPP. Hasil penelitian diketahui bahwa TK Khaira Ummah telah menggunakan Kurikulum 2013, bekerjasama dengan dinas pendidikan, memiliki Standar Operasional Prosedur (SOP) pada tiap layanan, bekerjasama dengan puskesmas untuk layanan kesehatan dan penyediaan makan siang 4 sehat 5 sempurna bagi anak didik, serta larangan bagi anak didik membeli dan membawa jajanan dari luar
title: Penerapan Model Evaluasi CIPP dalam Mengevaluasi Program Layanan PAUD Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of the CIPP evaluation model in evaluating the holistic integrative early childhood education service program This study aims to evaluate the holistic integrative service program using CIPP analysis at the Khaira Ummah Islamic Kindergarten using the CIPP model analysis method. The results of the study show that Khaira Ummah Kindergarten has used a curriculum in collaboration with the education office, has standard operating procedures, SOPs for each service, collaborates with the health center for health services and the provision of perfect healthy lunches for students, and prohibits students from buying and bringing snacks from outside.

desc: Guru merupakan instrumen vital dalam pembelajaran. Baik buruk hasil dari didikan guru bergantung dari kompetensi guru itu sendiri. Dalam pendidikan anak usia dini ada enam aspek perkembangan yang harus diasah oleh guru. Salah satunya ialah perkembangan bahasa. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui seberapa besar tingkat pemahaman guru PAUD di Pulau Lombok dalam pengembangan kemampuan bahasa anak usia dini di TK. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif dengan pendekatan kuantitatif deskriptif dimana penelitian data yang telah diolah tanpa menarik kesimpulan. Penelitian ini melibatkan guru-guru di Pulau Lombok sebagai gambaran pengetahuan guru dalam mengasah kemampuan bahasa anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan skala likert dengan empat titik; Sangat Tinggi, Tinggi, Sedang, Rendah. Hasil penelitian ini menyatakan bahwa guru-guru TK di Pulau Lombok memiliki pemahaman dan terlibat dalam menstimulasi pengembangan bahasa anak.
title: Tingkat Pemahaman Guru Taman Kanak-kanak di Lombok dalam Stimulasi Pengembangan Bahasa Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: level of understanding of kindergarten teachers in lombok in stimulating early childhood language development teachers are vital instruments in learning good or bad the results of teacher education depend on the competence of the teacher himself in early childhood education there are six aspects of development that must be honed by teachers one of which is language development this study aims to determine the level of understanding of early childhood teachers on lombok island in developing early childhood language skills in kindergarten this study uses a descriptive method with a quantitative descriptive approach where the research data that has been processed without drawing conclusions this study involves teachers on lombok island as a description of teacher knowledge in honing children's language skills this study uses a likert scale with four points very high high medium low the results of this study state that kindergarten teachers on lombok island have an understanding and are involved in stimulating children's language development

desc: In learning, interest from every child is needed so that they can absorb and understand every material presented by the teacher. However, in reality, children's interest in learning is often erratic, so their concentration is not focused. The purpose of this study was to determine the implementation of the Adiwiyata school concept for early childhood to increase the learning interests in 10 kindergartens throughout North Tapanuli Regency, with similar problems. The implementation of Adiwiyata was predicted incresing interest of early childhood in learning. This research was conducted in all kindergarten schools in North Tapanuli Regency which was carried out from April to October 2022 and used a mixed method approach, which is a mixture of qualitative and quantitative. Based on research that has been carried out in the field, the implementation of the adiwiyata school concept in North Tapanuli Regency Kindergarten is relatively good. This is based on the average value (mean) of the implementation of the adiwiyata school concept in the high category. Meanwhile, all students have a high interest in learning. Through this research, it is hoped that ECCE educators and education staff will make new innovations in the environment so that they can get the concept of adiwiyata to be achieved optimally
title: Increasing Interest in Early Childhood Learning in North Tapanuli through the Implementation of the Adiwiyata School Concept
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: increasing interest in early childhood learning in north tapanuli through the implementation of the adiwiyata school concept in learning interest from every child is needed so that they can absorb and understand every material presented by the teacher however in reality children's interest in learning is often erratic so their concentration is not focused the purpose of this study was to determine the implementation of the adiwiyata school concept for early childhood to increase the learning interests in kindergartens throughout north tapanuli regency with similar problems the implementation of adiwiyata was predicted increasing interest of early childhood in learning this research was conducted in all kindergarten schools in north tapanuli regency which was carried out from april to october and used a mixed method approach which is a mixture of qualitative and quantitative based on research that has been carried out in the field the implementation of the adiwiyata school concept in north tapanuli regency kindergarten is relatively good this is based on the average value mean of the implementation of the adiwiyata school concept in the high category meanwhile all students have a high interest in learning through this research it is hoped that ecce educators and education staff will make new innovations in the environment so that they can get the concept of adiwiyata to be achieved optimally

desc: Pembelajaran Seni yang diberikan pada tingkat Taman kanak-kanak, dimana anak dimana kita sebagai guru dituntut untuk mengembangkan seni anak dengan didukung media pembelajaran yang menarik dan menyenangkan. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengetahui bagaimana proses pembelajaran Seni kepada anak. Penelitian ini menggunakan jenis penelitian deskriptif kualitatif yaitu yaitu meneliti sebuah objek dan pencarian fakta dengan interpretasi yang tepat. Dengan teknik pengumpulan data observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Analisis data yang digunakan yaitu pengumpulan data (data collection), reduksi data (data reduction), display data (data display), verifikasi dan penegasan kesimpulan (conclution drawing and verivication). Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa mengenalkan konsep Seni pada anak dengan memadukan media Finger painting dapat mengembangkan seni anak usia dini di TK Harapan Kami. Dampak hasil penelitian adalah finger painting bermanfaat dalam mengembangkan kreativitas pribadi anak yang mandiri, penuh imajinasi dan mengasah bakat dalam pembelajaran Seni.
title: Analisis Pembelajaran Seni melalui Finger painting pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: art learning analysis through finger painting in early childhood art learning given at kindergarten level where children where we as teachers are required to develop children's art supported by interesting and fun learning media this study aims to find out how the process of art learning to children this study uses a type of qualitative descriptive research, namely examining an object and finding facts with the right interpretation with data collection techniques observation interviews and documentation data analysis used is data collection data collection data reduction data reduction display data data display verification and confirmation of conclusions conclusion drawing and verification the results of the study show that introducing the concept of art to children by combining finger painting media can develop early childhood art in kindergarten our hope is that the impact of the research results is that finger painting is useful in developing children's personal creativity who are independent, full of imagination and hone talents in art learning

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh pemberian bermain vegetable eating motivation (VEM) terhadap perilaku makan sayur pada anak prasekolah di TK Asma Jaya Kecamatan Lasolo Kabupaten Konawe Utara. Jenis penelitian ini adalah eksperimental dengan pendekatan pre and post test without control. Populasi penelitian adalah seluruh anak prasekolah TK Asma Jaya Kecamatan Lasolo Kabupaten Konawe Utara yang berjumlah 16 anak. Teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan total sampling, metode analisis menggunakan Uji Wilcoxon. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan pada bulan Juli-Agustus 2018. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa ada pengaruh pemberian bermain VEM terhadap perilaku makan sayur pada anak prasekolah di TK Asma Jaya Kabupaten Konawe Utara. Diharapkan kepada orang tua agar dapat memberikan gambaran tentang cara pemberian motivasi dan edukasi pada anak dengan pendekatan bermain VEM agar anak memiliki perilaku makan sayur yang baik.
title: Bermain Vegetable Eating Motivation (Vem) terhadap Perilaku Makan Sayuran pada Anak  Prasekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Playing vegetable eating motivation vem on vegetable eating behavior in preschool children This study aims to determine the effect of giving vegetable eating motivation vem on vegetable eating behavior in preschool children at TK Asma Jaya, Lasolo District, North Konawe Regency. This type of research is experimental with a pre and post test approach without control. The population of the study was all preschool children at TK Asma Jaya, Lasolo District, North Konawe Regency, totaling 10 children. The sampling technique used total sampling. The analysis method used the Wilcoxon test. This study was conducted in July-August. The results of the study showed that there was an effect of giving VEM on vegetable eating behavior in preschool children at TK Asma Jaya, North Konawe Regency. It is hoped that parents can provide an overview of how to provide motivation and education to children with a VEM play approach so that children have good vegetable eating behavior.

desc: Pemerolehan bahasa pertama khususnya kosa kata dan kalimat anak usia dini sangat kompleks karena ada beberapa bahasa daerah yang memengaruhinya. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mengeksplorasi penguasaan kosa kata dan kalimat anak. Jenis penelitian ini adalah kualitatif. Metode yang digunakan dalam pengumpulan data dalam penelitian ini adalah metode simak libat cakap. Teknik pengumpulan data yaitu teknik rekam. Sumber data adalah informan seorang anak laki-laki usia 4 tahun 3 bulan. Data berupa jenis kata dan kalimat yang dituturkan anak. Data yang terkumpul ditabulasi ke node, dianalisis, dan dieksplor dengan software nvivo. Analisis data yaitu: reduksi, penyajian, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Temuan penelitian: Anak menggunakan adjektiva, adverbial, kata tugas, nomina, dan verba. Anak lebih sering mengucapkan kata nomina karena sering berinteraksi dengan benda-benda yang ada di sekitarnya dan kata tugas paling sedikit diucapkannya. Pemerolehan kalimat terdiri atas kalimat deklaratif, imperatif, interjektif, dan interogatif. Anak umumnya mengucapkan kalimat deklaratif, paling kurang kalimat interjektif. Anak telah menggunakan kalimat yang bervariasi dengan berbagai kosa kata. Hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan oleh orang tua, pengasuh anak usia dini, dan guru PAUD untuk mempercepat pemerolehan bahasa anak dengan lebih banyak menggunakan kosakata adjektiva, kata tugas dan kalimat interjektif.
title: Pemerolehan Bahasa Pertama Anak Usia 4 Tahun 3 Bulan di Makassar Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: first language acquisition of children aged years months in makassar indonesia first language acquisition especially vocabulary and sentences of early childhood is very complex because there are several regional languages ​​that influence it the purpose of this study is to explore children's vocabulary and sentence mastery this type of research is qualitative the method used in collecting data in this study is the method of listening to the conversation data collection technique is the recording technique the source of the data is an informant a boy aged years months data in the form of types of words and sentences spoken by children the collected data is tabulated into nodes analyzed and explored with nvivo software data analysis is reduction presentation and drawing conclusions research findings children use adjectives adverbials task words nouns and verbs children say nouns more often because they often interact with objects around them and the task words are spoken the least sentence acquisition consists of declarative sentences imperative interjectives and interrogatives children generally say declarative sentences at least interjective sentences children have used sentences that vary with various vocabularies the results of this study can be used by parents of early childhood caregivers and pre-school teachers to accelerate children's language acquisition by using more adjective vocabulary, task words and interjective sentences

desc: Pendidikan merupakan faktor penting dalam membentuk individu yang berkualitas. Anak-anak indonesia tidak boleh tertinggal dengan bangsa lainnya di dunia. Salah satu kebijakan pemerintah di sektor pendidikan yang mendukung pendidikan sepanjang hayat adalah diakuinya pendidikan anak usia dini (PAUD). Pada pendidikan Anak Usia Dini inilah kepribadian seorang anak dibentuk, oleh karena itu pendidikan yang diberikan kepada Anak Usia Dini sebenarnya harus mendapatkan perhatian khusus dari pemerintah, baik penyelenggaraannya, pendidiknya, ataupun fasilitas yang mendukung pendidikan tersebut agar tercipta generasi-generasai yang memiliki kepribadian baik. Berbahasa Indonesia yang baik dan benar mempunyai beberapa konsekuensi yang terkait dengan pemakaiannya sesuai dengan situasi dan kondisi. Pada kondisi tertentu, yaitu pada situasi formal penggunaan bahasa Indonesia yang benar menjadi prioritas utama. Metode adalah teknik-teknik yang digeneralisasikan dengan baik agar dapat diterima atau digunakan secara sama dalam satu disiplin, praktek, atau bidang disiplin dan praktek (Hebert Bisno, 1969). Penelitian ini menerapkan pendekatan kualitatif, yaitu suatu prosedur penelitian yang menghasilkan data deskriptif berupa ucapan atau tulisan dan prilaku yang dapat diamati dari subjek itu sendiri. Dari hasil penelitian yang dilakukan, maka dapat diambil kesimpulan bahwa penerapan Bahasa Indonesia yang Baik mampu mengembangkan kepribadian peserta didik di PAUD KUALU CERIA Kisaran Barat bisa dikatakan sudah cukup baik. Terbukti dari hasil riset yang menunjukkan hasil positif disetiap pertanyaan maupun pengamatan yang dilakukan penulis. Dari hasil penelitian ini dapat juga disimpulkan bahwa, bahasa Indonesia mampu sebagai pengembang kepribadian seorang peserta didik. Terbukti dari hasil pengamatan patokan khusus peneliti yang menunjukkan rata-rata yang cukup baik. Saya mengharapkan setelah dilakukannya riset mini ini, pembaca dapat mencontoh dan meningkatkan penerapan penggunaan bahasa Indonesia yang baik guna meningkatkan hasil belajar seperti di PAUD Kualu Ceria.
title: Hubungan Penerapan Bahasa Indonesia dengan Pengembangan Kepribadian  Peserta Didik PAUD Kualu Ceria
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The relationship between the application of Indonesian language and the development of the personality of students at PAUD Kualu Ceria education is an important factor in forming quality individuals Indonesian children should not be left behind by other nations in the world One of the government policies in the education sector that supports lifelong education is the recognition of early childhood education in early childhood education is that a child's personality is formed therefore education given to early childhood should actually receive special attention from the government both in terms of its implementation, educators and facilities that support the education in order to create generations who have good personalities Good and correct Indonesian language has several consequences related to its use according to the situation and conditions in certain conditions, namely in formal situations the use of correct Indonesian language is the main priority method is a technique that is generalized well so that it can be accepted or used equally in one discipline of practice or field of discipline and practice Hebert Bisno This study applies a qualitative approach, namely a research procedure that produces descriptive data in the form of speech or writing and behavior that can be observed from the subject itself from the results of the research conducted, it can be concluded that the application of good Indonesian language is able to develop the personality of students at PAUD Kualu Ceria West Kisaran, it can be said to be quite good, as evidenced by the results of research that shows positive results In every question or observation made by the author from the results of this study, it can also be concluded that Indonesian is capable of developing a student's personality, as proven by the results of observations of the researcher's special benchmarks which show a fairly good average. I hope that after conducting this mini research, readers can follow suit and improve the application of good Indonesian language use in order to improve learning outcomes such as at PAUD Kualu Ceria.

desc: Penelitian untuk menganalisis guru dalam menjaga tata kelola pembelajaran pendidikan Anak Usia Dini Selama Pandemi Covid-19. Metode penelitian digunakan dalam penelitian adalah metode kualitatif deskriptif menggunakan pendekatan studi kasus. Subjek yang digunakan pada penelitian guru tiap dari lembaga sekolah yang berjumlah 18 guru di Kota Surabaya penentuan subjek berdasarkan pemilihan sekolah Taman Kanak-kanak yang hanya terakreditasi A. Teknik pengumpulan data berupa wawancara melalui whatsapp. Analisis data coding dan dideskripsikan secara narasi menggunakan koleksi data, reduksi data, penyajian data, penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa tata kelola perencanaan pada masa Pandemi Covid-19 rencana pembelajaran dinyatakan bahwa perencanaan pembelajaran anak usia dini meliputi perencanaan semester, rencana kegiatan mingguan (RKM), dan rencana kegiatan harian (RKH) dengan menggunakan kurikulum darurat. Tata kelola pelaksanaan pembelajaran menggunakan variasi blended learning dengan memadukan pembelajaran daring dan luring (home visit). Sedangkan untuk tata kelola evaluasi pembelajaran selama covid-19 dengan menggunakan penilaian fortopolio dan berbasis praktik secara online di rumah
title: Analisis Guru dalam Menjaga Tata Kelola Pembelajaran Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini Selama Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teacher analysis in maintaining early childhood education learning governance during the covid pandemic research to analyze teachers in maintaining early childhood education learning governance during the covid pandemic the research method used in the study is a descriptive qualitative method using a case study approach the subjects used in the study each teacher from a school institution totaling teachers in the city of Surabaya the determination of subjects based on the selection of kindergarten schools that are only accredited a data collection techniques in the form of interviews via whatsapp data analysis coding and described narratively using data collection data reduction data presentation drawing conclusions the results of the study indicate that the governance of planning during the covid pandemic learning plans stated that early childhood learning planning includes semester planning weekly activity plans rkm and daily activity plans rkh using an emergency curriculum the governance of learning implementation uses a variation of blended learning by combining online and offline learning home visits while for the governance of learning evaluation during covid using portfolio assessments and based on online practice at home

desc: Menstimulasi Pendidikan karakter bagi anak usia dini dapat dilakukan dengan berbagai macam metode pembelajaran salah satunya adalah menggunakan project based learning. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui apakah dengan penggunaan project based learning dapat meningkatkan  nilai-nilai Pendidikan karakter pada anak usia dini. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan  dalam penelitian ini adalah penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Tahap penelitian yang dilakukan yaitu tahap pra-pendahuluan, tahap lapangan, dan  tahap pengolahan data. Pengambilan data menggunakan Teknik observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Tahap pengolahan data yaitu reduksi data, display data, analisis data, deskripsi hasil penelitian, dan penyimpulan. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan di TK Al Khoir Surakarta dikarenakan TK tersebut merupakan salah satu sekolah penggerak di Surakarta dan telah melaksanakan Kurikulum Merdeka yang kegiatan pembelajarannya berbasis metode proyek serta memiliki kurikulum karakter. Subjek penelitian adalah Guru dan Kepala Sekolah. Hasil dari penelitian ini yaitu bahwa project based learning yang dilaksanakan di TK Al Khoir Surakarta melalui kegiatan Project Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila (P5) dapat meningkatkan nilai Pendidikan karakter pada siswa antara lain pada nilai toleransi, disiplin, kerja keras, kreatif, mandiri, rasa ingin tahu, menghargai prestasi, komunikatif, dan tanggungjawab. Oleh karena itu Lembaga-lembaga Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini perlu memperbanyak kegiatan pembelajaran yang menggunakan Project Based Learning.
title: Mengembangkan Pendidikan Karakter melalui Pembelajaran Berbasis Proyek di PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Developing character education through project-based learning in early childhood education Stimulating character education for early childhood can be done with various learning methods, one of which is using project-based learning This study aims to determine whether the use of project-based learning can improve the values ​​of character education in early childhood The type of research used in this study is qualitative descriptive research The stages of research carried out are the preliminary stage, the field stage and the data processing stage Data collection using observation techniques, interviews and documentation The data processing stage is data reduction, data display, data analysis, description of research results and conclusions This study was carried out at TK Al Khoir Surakarta because the kindergarten is one of the driving schools in Surakarta and has implemented the Merdeka curriculum whose learning activities are based on the project method and has a character curriculum The subjects of the study were teachers and principals The results of this study are that project-based learning implemented at TK Al Khoir Surakarta through project activities to strengthen the profile of Pancasila students can improve the value of character education in students, including the values ​​of tolerance, discipline, hard work, creativity, independence, curiosity, appreciation, achievement, communication and responsibility Therefore, early childhood education institutions need to increase learning activities that use projects based learning

desc: Salah satu permainan yang dapat diintegasikan untuk meningkatkan kecerdasan dan kreativitas anak adalah yoga. Dengan demikian, penelitian ini bertujuan menganalisis peran yoga dalam meningkatkan kecerdasan kinestetik bagi anak usia dini. Penelitian ini diuraikan dengan metode studi literatur. Pemanfaatan search engine untuk kepustakaan digital membantu peneliti mendeskripsikan masalah penelitian. Adapun jumlah literatur yang dimanfaatkan berjumlah 33 literatur; terdiri dari jurnal dan buku. Hasil penelitian mendeskripsikan bahwa praktik yoga bagi anak usia dini mampu mengembangkan keterampilan motorik, kelenturan badan, meningkatkan konsentrasi, keseimbangan tubuh, dan kekuatan tubuh. Bagi anak yang memiliki kecerdasan kinestetik ini merupakan kesempatan mereka lebih eksplorasi diri dan anggota badannya (my self and my body). Anak dengan senang mendapatkan penugasan karena menguasai olah tubuh, sehingga dapat meningkatkan kemampuan psikomotorik, membangun rasa percaya diri, meningkatkan kemampuan sosial, meningkatkan sportivitas, dan meningkatkan kesehatan tubuh. Adapun metode pembelajaran yoga yang sesuai untuk anak usia adalah dengan metode demonstrasi dan bermain sehingga anak merasa nyaman, fokus, dan rileks.
title: Peran Yoga dalam Meningkatkan Kecerdasan Kinestetik Bagi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of yoga in improving kinesthetic intelligence for early childhood one of the games that can be integrated to improve children's intelligence and creativity is yoga thus this study aims to analyze the role of yoga in improving kinesthetic intelligence for early childhood this study is described by the method of literature study the use of search engines for digital libraries helps researchers describe research problems the amount of literature utilized is literature consisting of journals and books the results of the study describe that yoga practices for early childhood can develop motor skills flexibility of the body increases concentration body balance and body strength for children who have kinesthetic intelligence this is an opportunity for them to explore themselves and their limbs more my self and my body children are happy to get assignments because they master body movements so that they can improve psychomotor skills build self-confidence improve social skills improve sportsmanship and improve body health the appropriate yoga learning method for children is by demonstration and play methods so that children feel comfortable focused and relaxed

desc: Penelitian ini membahas implementasi nilai-nilai moderasi beragama pada anak usia dini  di RA Darul Da’wah wal-Irsyad (DDI) Lonja Kab. Sigi Prov. Sulawesi Tengah. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif deskriptif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Implementasi nilai-nilai moderasi beragama pada anak usia dini di RA DDI Lonja Kabupaten Sigi Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah yakni pertama, melalui kebijakan kepala sekolah, kedua, penerapan kurikulum 2013 dan ketiga, pembiasaan dan keteladanan. Adapun Faktor pendukung Implementasi nilai-nilai moderasi beragama pada anak usia dini di RA DDI Lonja Kabupaten Sigi Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah yakni pertama, adanya kebijakan kepala sekolah, kedua, kerjasana seluruh guru di Sekolah, ketiga, sarana dan prasarana di Sekolah. Sedangkan Faktor penghambat Implementasi nilai-nilai moderasi beragama pada anak usia dini di RA DDI Lonja Kabupaten Sigi Provinsi Sulawesi Tengah yakni tidak adanya peserta didik beragama non Muslim di Sekolah.
title: Implementasi Metode Pembiasaan dalam Menanamkan Nilai-Nilai Moderasi Beragama pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of habituation method in instilling religious moderation values ​​in early childhood This study discusses the implementation of religious moderation values ​​in early childhood at ra darul dawah walirsyad ddi lonja, sigi district, central sulawesi province This study uses a descriptive qualitative approach The results of the study indicate that the implementation of religious moderation values ​​in early childhood at ra darul dawah walirsyad ddi lonja, sigi district, central sulawesi province, namely first through the principal's policy, second the implementation of the curriculum and third habituation and role models. The supporting factors for the implementation of religious moderation values ​​in early childhood at ra darul dawah walirsyad ddi lonja, sigi district, central sulawesi province are first the existence of the principal's policy, second the cooperation of all teachers in the school, third the facilities and infrastructure in the school, while the inhibiting factors for the implementation of religious moderation values ​​in early childhood at ra darul dawah walirsyad ddi lonja, sigi district, central sulawesi province, namely the absence of non-Muslim students in the school

desc: This research is a collaborative classroom action research using the Kemmis and McTaggart models. The research subjects were children aged 4-5 years, totaling 6 children. The object of this research social skills. The data collection method used was observation. The instrument used is an observation guide. Data analysis techniques were carried out descriptively, qualitatively and quantitatively. The success indicator set is that at least 80% of 6 children have social skills with the criteria for developing as expected. At the time of pre-action observation, the initial condition of early childhood social skills in the Buaran area before the action research was still very low where children who could carry out, namely twenty two point five percent. In the first cycle with the achievement of the percentage of fourty seven point five percent until fifty five point five percent.
title: Increasing Social Skill Children Aged 4-5 With the Chaterpillar Game
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: increasing social skills children aged with the chaterpillar game this research is a collaborative classroom action research using the kemmis and mctaggart models the research subjects were children aged years totaling children the object of this research social skills the data collection method used was observation the instrument used is an observation guide data analysis techniques were carried out descriptively qualitatively and quantitatively the success indicator set is that at least of children have social skills with the criteria for developing as expected at the time of preaction observation the initial condition of early childhood social skills in the buaran area before the action research was still very low where children who could carry out namely twenty two point five percent in the first cycle with the achievement of the percentage of forty seven point five percent until fifty five point five percent

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan kognitif melalui pembelajaran sains. Sampel penelitian adalah siswa kelas B PAUD Cikal Harapan 4 Depok Jawa Barat. Teknik pengambilan data dengan menggunakan lembar pengamatan. Teknik analisis data menggunakan deskriptif analitik. Peningkatan kemampuan kognitif pada anak usia dini penting dilakukan karena berdampak pada cara berpikir di kemudian hari. Pembelajaran sains memberi dampak kepada siswa untuk berpikir logis, sistematis. Berdasarkan hasl tersebut maka penelitian ini dilakukan melalui pembelajaran sains. Adapun hasil penelitian selama dua siklus terdapat peningkatan kemampuan kognitif. Disarankan pembelajaran sains dapat digunakan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan lain seperti kemampuan berbahasa
title: Meningkatkan Kemampuan Kognitif Anak Usia Dini melalui Pembelajaran Sains
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving cognitive abilities of early childhood through science learning This study aims to improve cognitive abilities through science learning The research sample is grade B students of PAUD Cikal Harapan Depok, West Java. The data collection technique uses observation sheets. The data analysis technique uses descriptive analytic. Improving cognitive abilities in early childhood is important because it has an impact on the way of thinking in the future. Science learning has an impact on students to think logically and systematically. Based on these results, this study was conducted through science learning. The results of the study during the two cycles showed an increase in cognitive abilities. It is suggested that science learning can be used to improve other abilities such as language skills.

desc: Penerapan pendidikan multikultural masih dilakukan secara terbatas, terdapat kesenjangan dalam pemahaman, dan guru memiliki keterbatasan dalam variasi pembelajaran seni pada anak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengkaji program multicultural party sebagai media apresiasi pendidikan seni anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif deskriptif. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan yaitu metode wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi yang dilakukan selama bulan Maret 2023 di TK Pelangi Indonesia. Sumber data yaitu anak-anak, guru kelas, dan kepala sekolah serta dokumen KOSP, proposal, dan video kegiatan multicultural party pada YouTube sekolah. Teknis analisis model interaktif Miles  Huberman. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa ada pemanfaatan pendidikan seni dalam kegiatan multicultural party sebagai media apresiasi seni anak usia dini di TK Pelangi Indonesia. Multicultural party telah dilaksanakan 18 kali dengan konsep menarik seperti drama musikal, pasar budaya, dan menonton video yang diikuti semua siswa dan didukung orang tua. Anak dikenalkan kegiatan seni nasional dan luar negeri yaitu tari, musik, baju adat, alat musik, suku dan etnis. Multicultural party menciptakan lingkungan inklusif, pemahaman, dan penghargaan perbedaan budaya. Anak memiliki kecintaan budaya dalam negeri serta wawasan yang luas budaya luar negeri.
title: Multicultural Party sebagai Media Apresiasi Pendidikan Seni Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: multicultural party as a medium for early childhood art education appreciation the implementation of multicultural education is still carried out in a limited way there is a gap in understanding and teachers have limitations in the variation of art learning in early childhood the purpose of this study is to examine the multicultural party program as a medium for early childhood art education appreciation this study uses a qualitative descriptive approach the data collection technique used is the interview method observation and documentation conducted during March at TK Pelangi Indonesia the data source is the children class teachers and principals as well as documents kosp proposals and videos of multicultural party activities on the school's YouTube technical analysis interactive model miles huberman the results of the study show that there is the use of art education in multicultural party activities as a medium for early childhood art appreciation at TK Pelangi Indonesia multicultural party has been implemented several times with interesting concepts such as musical drama cultural markets and watching videos followed by all students and supported by parents children are introduced to national and foreign art activities namely dance music traditional clothes musical instruments tribes and ethnicities multicultural party creates an inclusive environment understanding and appreciation of cultural differences children have a love of domestic culture and broad insight into foreign culture

desc: Masih banyak anak yang mengalami kesulitan toilet training, yaitu saat mereka berkata ingin buang air kecil akan tetapi masih belum bisa membuka pakaiannya sendiri, kejadian tersebut merupakan salah satu permasalah yang terjadi pada toilet training anak. Maka tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untukmengetahui keefektifan buku cerita bergambar yang disesuaikan untuk pemahaman pendidikan toilet training bagi anak usia 3-4 tahun. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode pre-experimental design. Subjek dalam penelitian ini yaitu anak usia 3-4 tahun di salah satu TK ABA Yogyakarta yang berjumlah 16 anak. Teknik analisis data dalam penelitian ini mengggunakan uji t dengan taraf signifikan 5 %. Berdasarkan hasil uji t pada perilaku toilet training (observasi siswa) diperoleh kesimpulan buku cerita bergambar yuk ke toilet sendiri efektif terhadap keberhasilan perilaku toilet training pada kelompok anak usia 3-4 tahun.
title: Efektivitas Buku Cerita Bergambar pada Keberhasilan Toilet Training Anak Usia 3-4 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effectiveness of picture story books on the success of toilet training for children aged years there are still many children who have difficulty in toilet training, namely when they say they want to urinate but still cannot take off their own clothes, this incident is one of the problems that occurs in children's toilet training, so the purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of picture story books that are adapted for understanding toilet training education for children aged years the research method used in this study is the preexperimental design method, the subjects in this study were children aged years in one of the ABA kindergartens in Yogyakarta, totaling 10 children, the data analysis technique in this study used the t-test with a significant level based on the results of the t-test on student observation toilet training behavior, it was concluded that the picture story book let's go to the toilet ourselves is effective in the success of toilet training behavior in the group of children aged years

desc: Permasalahan dalam penelitian ini yaitu adanya perbedaan perkembangan kognitif, motorik, bahasa, dan kreativitas seni anak dengan tahapan perkembangan anak karena kurangnya pemberian stimulasi baik dari guru maupun orang tua  untuk merangsang minat anak dalam belajar. Sehubungan dengan masalah tersebut, penelitian ini bertujuan mengimplementasikan metode STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, dan Mathematics) melalui kegiatan fun cooking sebagai metode pembelajaran abad 21. Jenis penelitian ini yaitu kualitatif deskriptif dengan menggunakan metode analisis data dari Miles dan Huberman. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Sampel dalam penelitian ini yaitu kelompok B TK Samporoa DWP yang berjumlah 15 anak  yang kurang mendapatkan stimulasi dari guru maupun orang tua . Hasil penelitian dari kegiatan fun cooking menggunakan metode STEAM menunjukkan adanya ketertarikan 14 dari 15 anak dalam proses belajar yang dapat merangsang perkembangan kognitif, motorik, bahasa, dan kreatifitas seni anak sehingga kesimpulan dari penelitian ini adalah metode STEAM dapat diaplikasikan sebagai alternatif metode pembelajaran abad 21.
title: Implementasi Pembelajaran STEAM melalui Kegiatan Fun Cooking Sebagai Pembelajaran Abad 21
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of steam learning through fun cooking activities as learning in the 21st century. The problem in this study is the difference in the development of cognitive motor language and artistic creativity of children with the stages of child development due to the lack of stimulation from both teachers and parents to stimulate children's interest in learning. In connection with this problem, this study aims to implement the steam science technology engineering art and mathematics method through fun cooking activities as a learning method in the 21st century. This type of research is qualitative descriptive using data analysis methods from miles and huberman. Data collection techniques through observation, interviews and documentation. The sample in this study was group b of Samporoa DWP Kindergarten, which consisted of children who received less stimulation from teachers and parents. The results of the study from the fun cooking activity using the steam method showed that there was interest from children in the learning process which could stimulate the development of cognitive motor language and artistic creativity of children. So the conclusion of this study is that the steam method can be applied as an alternative learning method in the 21st century.

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mengeksplorasi nilai-nilai karakter dalam fabel media daring di Indonesia. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Sumber data berasal dari web http://repositori.kemdikbud.go.id. kumpulan fabel Sulawesi Selatan. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan teknik noninteraktif dengan melakukan pembacaan intensif pada fabel dan melakukan pencatatan secara aktif dengan metode analisis isi. Validitas data untuk menguji validitas penelitian ini menggunakan teknik triangulasi data dan triangulasi metode. Teknik analisis data menggunakan model analisis interaktif. Analisis data dilakukan dengan mengikuti model Miles dan Huberman (1994), yaitu: (1) melakukan identifikasi fable sebagai objek penelitian, (2) melakukan reduksi data, (3) menyajikan data, (4) menginterpretasikan data yang diperoleh sesuai teori, dan (5) menyusun simpulan. Pendidikan karakter yang ditemukan ada empat belas yaitu: peduli, hormat, kerja sama, penolong, demokrasi, berbakti, rendah hati, kreatif, pemaaf, pemberani, disiplin, kerja keras, jujur, dan religius. Pendidikan karakter dalam fabel dapat diterapkan pada pembentukan karakter anak usia dini dengan pengasuhan anak usia dini (sejak bayi) dan pendidikan dini anak-anak dengan cara yang sejalan dengan orientasi perspektif anak, yaitu:1.Melihat anak itu sebagai pribadi; 2.Keikutsertaan yang empati dengan anak; 3.Sikap interpretatif menghormati anak ungkapan-ungkapan dan arti kehidupan dunia; 4.Membimbing anak dengan cara yang sensitif 5.Perawatan dini dan pendidikan adalah proses dialogis antara anak dan pengasuh/guru
title: Pendidikan Karakter Anak Usia Dini melalui Sastra Klasik Fabel  Versi Daring
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood character education through online version of classic fable literature The purpose of this study is to explore character values ​​in online media fables in Indonesia This study is a qualitative descriptive study The source of data comes from the web httprepositori kemdikbud go id collection of south sulawesi fables The data collection technique uses a non-interactive technique by conducting intensive reading of the fables and actively recording with the content analysis method The validity of the data to test the validity of this study uses data triangulation techniques and method triangulation The data analysis technique uses an interactive analysis model The data analysis was carried out by following the miles and huberman model, namely identifying fables as research objects Conducting data reduction Presenting data Interpreting the data obtained according to theory and compiling conclusions The character education found was fourteen, namely caring Respect Cooperation Helping Democracy Devoted Humble Creative Forgiving Brave Discipline Hard Work Honest and Religious Character education in fables can be applied to the formation of early childhood character with early childhood care since infancy and early childhood education in a way that is in line with the orientation of the child's perspective, namely seeing the child as an individual Empathetic participation with the child Interpretive attitude Respecting children Expressions and meanings of life in the world Guiding children in a sensitive way early care and education is a dialogic process between the child and the caregiver/teacher

desc: Kebersyukuran remaja bisa dipengaruhi oleh berbagai faktor salah satunya adalah budaya. Keterkaitan kebersyukuran dengan budaya berhubungan dengan filososfi hidup yang ada pada masyarakat tersebut. Masyarakat Minangkabau menganut sistem kekerabatan matrilineal dimana perempuan lebih dihargai dari laki-laki. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk menguji efektivitas layanan informasi dalam meningkatkan kebersyukuran siswa yang berlatar belakang etnis Minangkabau. Jenis penelitian eksperimen yang digunakan yaitu quasi eksperimen dengan rancangan penelitian one group design. Teknik pemilihan subjek menggunakan stratified random sampling, dengan jumlah subjek sebanyak 93 orang terdiri dari 35 pria dan 58 wanita.  Instrumen yang digunakan berupa  Daftar Isian Kebersyukuran dengan model likert. Penelitian ini menggunakan uji statistik t-test (independent sample t-test dan paired sampel t-test). Menemukan hasil bahwa terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan tingkat kebersyukuran pria dan wanita sebelum dan sesudah diberikan perlakukan menggunakan layanan informasi yang telah dikembangkan sebelumnya. Oleh karena itu, layanan informasi yang telah dikembangkan efektif digunakan oleh guru BK/Konselor untuk meningkatkatkan kebersyukuran siswa Minangkabau.
title: Efektivitas Layanan Informasi untuk Meningkatkan Kebersyukuran Siswa Etnis Minangkabau
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of information services to increase the gratitude of Minangkabau ethnic students, adolescent gratitude can be influenced by various factors, one of which is the culture of the relationship between gratitude and culture related to the philosophy of life in the community. The Minangkabau community adheres to a matrilineal kinship system where women are more valued than men. The purpose of this study was to test the effectiveness of information services in increasing the gratitude of students with a Minangkabau ethnic background. The type of experimental research used was a quasi-experimental study with a one-group design. The subject selection technique used stratified random sampling with a total of 100 subjects consisting of men and women. The instrument used was a gratitude questionnaire with a Likert model. This study used statistical tests t-test, independent sample t-test and paired sample t-test. It found that there was a significant difference in the level of gratitude of men and women before and after being given treatment using previously developed information services. Therefore, the information services that have been developed are effectively used by counselors to increase the gratitude of Minangkabau students.

desc: Lisik adalah singkatan dari lima pilar kebijakan internal RA Al Hijrah Badrul Ulum, yakni Leadership, Ikhlas, Solid, Integritas dan Komunikatif. Penamaan lisik, didasarkan pada ungkapan bahasa Gayo yang berarti rajin. Tulisan ini bertujuan untuk menganalisa program lisik dan aspek harmonisasi sivitas lembaga dalam menciptakan iklim belajar kondusif di RA Al Hijrah Badrul Ulum. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode studi kasus. Data diperoleh menggunakan teknik wawancara secara langsung dan melalui WhatsApp, serta observasi dan dokumentasi. Selanjutnya, data dianalisis menggunakan teknik reduksi data, display data dan menarik simpulan. Keabsahan data diperoleh dari teknik triangulasi. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa kebijakan internal Kepala RA Al Hijrah Badrul Ulum dengan konsep lisik mampu menciptakan iklim belajar kondusif, hal ini ditandai melalui keselarasan temuan dan teori belajar efektif (kondusif) Gilbert H. Hunt, (1) harmonisasi antar warga RA, (2) kesadaran dalam mendidik anak sebagai amanah Allah swt.; dan (3) pengelolaan pendidikan yang efektif
title: Lisik: Lima Pilar Kebijakan Internal Kepala RA Al Hijrah Badrul Ulum dalam Menciptakan Iklim Belajar Kondusif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: lisik five pillars of internal policy of the head of ra al hijrah badrul ulum in creating a conducive learning climate lisik is an abbreviation of the five pillars of internal policy of ra al hijrah badrul ulum, namely leadership, sincerity, solidity, integrity and communication. The name lisik is based on a Gayo language expression which means diligent. This article aims to analyze the lisik program and aspects of the harmonization of the institution's community in creating a conducive learning climate at ra al hijrah badrul ulum. This study uses a qualitative approach with a case study method. Data was obtained using direct interview techniques and via WhatsApp as well as observation and documentation. Furthermore, the data was analyzed using data reduction techniques. Data display and draw conclusions. The validity of the data was obtained from the triangulation technique. The results of this study indicate that the internal policy of the head of ra al hijrah badrul ulum with the lisik concept is able to create a conducive learning climate. This is indicated by the alignment of findings and Gilbert H Hunt's conducive effective learning theory. Harmonization between residents of ra. Awareness in educating children as a mandate from Allah SWT and effective education management.

desc: Edukasi tentang seks penting diberikan untuk anak sejak dini. Pendidikan seks diberikan sebagai pemahaman dasar untuk anak mengenai seks sejak awal mereka mengenal orang lain, hingga mengenal karakteristik laki-laki dan perempuan secara baik untuk melindungi dirinya secara prefentif. Penelitian ini ialah penelitian kulaitatif dengan tujuan untuk mendiskripsikan persoalan-persoalan yang penting yang berkaitan dengan edukasi seks untuk anak berusia dini. Wawancara, observasi dan dokumentasi merupakan teknik pengumpulan data dalam penelitian ini. Analisis dilakukan dengan mereduksi dan memferivikasi. Hasil penelitian memperlihatkan bahwa; (1) kemampuan anak  mengenal pendidikan seks masih dalam kategori rendah; (2) pemahaman orang tua tentang cara pemberian edukasi seks pada anak masih kurang; (3) Minimnya metode dan media pembelajaran mengakibatkan kurangnya pemahaman anak tentang pendidikan seks. Oleh karenanya diperlukan strategi, metode dan inovasi media baru dalam mengenalkan pendidikan seks dengan memperhatikan tahapan perkembangan anak di TK Tirmi Ara Aceh Tengah
title: Analisis Pengenalan Edukasi Seks pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the introduction of sex education to early childhood education about sex is important to be given to children from an early age sex education is given as a basic understanding for children about sex from the beginning when they get to know other people until they get to know the characteristics of men and women well to protect themselves preventively this research is a qualitative research with the aim of describing important issues related to sex education for early childhood interviews, observation and documentation are data collection techniques in this study the analysis was carried out by reducing and verifying the results of the study showed that children's ability to recognize sex education is still in the low category parents' understanding of how to provide sex education to children is still lacking the lack of learning methods and media results in a lack of children's understanding of sex education therefore a strategy is needed, new methods and media innovations in introducing sex education by paying attention to the stages of child development in TK Tirmi Ara Central Aceh

desc: Keterampilan berbicara anak usia dini perlu dilatih untuk mengemukakan ide dan pikirannya agar dapat terlatih dengan baik. Tujuan dari penelitian untuk mengetahui terdapat pengaruh contextual teaching and learning terhadap keterampilan berbicara anak usia 5-6 tahun yang dilakukan agar guru mendapatkan gambaran tentang model-model pembelajaran dimana baik dan tepat dalam mengoptimalkan aspek kterampilan berbicara pada anak usia TK Kelompok B. Pengumpulan data pada penelitian ini menggunakan teknik observasi dengan subjek penelitian adalah (n=37) kelompok TK-B. Teknik analisis data ialah analisis deskriptif dengan paired sample t-test untuk menguji suatu perbedaan pretest dan posttest menggunakan model pembelajaran CTL Hasil penelitian menunjukkan adanya pengaruh contextual teaching and learning terhadap keterampilan berbicara anak pada aspek pengucapan, pengembangan kosa kata dan pembentukan kalimat.
title: Pengaruh Model Contextual Teaching and Learning Terhadap Keterampilan Berbicara Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the influence of contextual teaching and learning models on early childhood speaking skills early childhood speaking skills need to be trained to express ideas and thoughts so that they can be trained properly the purpose of the study was to determine whether there was an influence of contextual teaching and learning on the speaking skills of children aged years which was carried out so that teachers get an idea of ​​learning models which are good and appropriate in optimizing aspects of speaking skills in children aged kindergarten group b data collection in this study used observation techniques with research subjects being n groups of kindergarten data analysis techniques were descriptive analysis with paired sample t-tests to test a difference in pretest and posttest using the ctl learning model the results of the study showed that there was an influence of contextual teaching and learning on children's speaking skills in the aspects of pronunciation, vocabulary development and sentence formation

desc: Down syndrome children are able to speak well, but in delivering the vocabulary is still lacking, they generally have difficulty thinking abstract. Learning process, especially cognitive, thinking aspects such as remembering, understanding, evoking, differentiating, finding and applying the meanings contained in a learning is very difficult to be done by the child's Down syndrome. One of the media that can be used in learning that is the method of puzzle, which makes them interested, so they feel no coercion, accept the material easily, not bored, with these methods can improve cognitive abilities. The purpose of this study is to describe Cognitive Handling of Down Syndrome Children Through Puzzle Method. The research method used in this study is a literature review that links research with existing literature and fill the gap in previous research. The results obtained in this study the use of puzzle methods can improve the cognitive child.Keywords: Cognitive, Down syndrome , puzzle
title: Penanganan Kognitif Down Syndrome melalui Metode Puzzle pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: learning process especially cognitive thinking aspects such as remembering understanding evoking differentiating finding and applying the meanings contained in a learning is very difficult to be done by the child's down syndrome one of the media that can be used in learning that is the method of puzzle which makes they are interested so they feel no coercion accept the material easily not bored with these methods can improve cognitive abilities the purpose of this study is to describe cognitive handling of Down syndrome children through puzzle method the research method used in this study is a literature review that links research with existing literature and fill in the gap in previous research the results obtained in this study the use of puzzle methods can improve the child's cognitive keywords cognitive down syndrome puzzle

desc: Pengasuhan oleh kakek nenek banyak terjadi di Indonesia. Hal ini dapat terjadi disebabkan oleh banyak faktor yakni perceraian orang tua, depresi yang dialami ibu, kematian orangtua, dan kesulitan ekonomi yang menyebabkan orangtua menjadi TKI diluat negeri. Studi ini menggunakan metode kajian literatur untuk mengetahui peranan pengasuhan kakek dan nenek terhadap perilaku prososial anak usia dini. Pada pelaksanaannya pengasuhan kakek dan nenek ini banyak dipengaruhi oleh pola pengasuhan yang diterapkan kepada anak usia dini (cucu) yang dapat memberi dampak psikologis bagi anak usia dini. Dampak dari pola pengasuhan permisif menyebabkan anak cenderung menarik diri dan kesulitan bergaul dengan teman sebayanya. Hal yang dilakukan dalam mengatasi hal ini dengan mengajak kakek dan nenek untuk lebih mempelajari pengasuhan terbaik dalam mengasuh anak usia dini (cucu) yakni dengan mengajak mereka menghadiri kegiatan parenting , agar hubungan kakek dan nenek dengan anak usia dini (cucu) menjadi lebih baik dan anak dapat berkembang dengan optimal.
title: Peranan Pengasuhan Kakek dan Nenek terhadap Perilaku Prososial Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of grandparent care for early childhood prosocial behavior Grandparent care is common in Indonesia. This can occur due to many factors, namely parental divorce, depression experienced by the mother, death of a parent, and economic difficulties that cause parents to become migrant workers abroad. This study uses a literature review method to determine the role of grandparent care for early childhood prosocial behavior. In its implementation, grandparent care is greatly influenced by the parenting patterns applied to early childhood grandchildren which can have a psychological impact on early childhood. The impact of permissive parenting patterns causes children to tend to withdraw and have difficulty socializing with their peers. What is done to overcome this is by inviting grandparents to learn more about the best parenting in raising early childhood grandchildren, namely by inviting them to attend parenting activities so that the relationship between grandparents and early childhood grandchildren becomes better and children can develop optimally.

desc: Pembelajaran di masa pandemi COVID19 melalui pembelajaran online dan belajar dari rumah menghadirkan beberapa tantangan dan risiko learning loss yang berdampak jangka panjang.  Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui strategi Kepala TK dalam upaya mitigasi learning loss pada siswanya. Pendekatan yang digunakan adalah kualitatif dengan desain studi kasus terhadap tiga partisipan penelitian, yaitu kepala sekolah dengan latar belakang kondisi geografis yang berbeda-beda. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan teknik wawancara. Data yang diperoleh, dianalisa menggunakan analisis tematik. Temuan penelitian menunjukkan berbagai upaya mtigasi yang dilakukan kepala sekolah dalam mengatasi learning loss yaitu mendaftarkan sebagai sekolah penggerak, home visit dan dan menjalin sinergi aktif warga sekolah. Sekolah melaksanakan pembelajaran intrakulikuler yang beragam, serta memberikan waktu pembelajaran yang cukup guna menguatkan konsep dan capaian perkembangan tiap anak. Home visit dilakukan untuk  memberikan pembelajaran tambahan pada anak serta mengadakan rapat bulanan. Pertemuan antar warga sekolah dimaksudkan untuk menjalin sinergitas pembelajaran dan mengkomunikasikan setiap permasalahan anak
title: Strategi Kepala TK dalam Upaya Mitigasi Potensi Learning Loss pada Anak Usia Dini selama Pandemi COVID-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: kindergarten principal's strategy in mitigating potential learning loss in early childhood during the covid pandemic learning during the covid pandemic through online learning and learning from home presents several challenges and risks of learning loss that have long-term impacts this study aims to determine the strategy of kindergarten principals in mitigating learning loss in their students the approach used is qualitative with a case study design on three research participants, namely school principals with different geographical backgrounds data collection was carried out using interview techniques the data obtained was analyzed using thematic analysis research findings show various mitigation efforts made by school principals in overcoming learning loss, namely registering as a home visit driving school and establishing active synergy with school residents the school carries out diverse intracurricular learning and provides sufficient learning time to strengthen the concept and development achievements of each child home visits are carried out to provide additional learning to children and hold monthly meetings meetings between school residents are intended to establish learning synergy and communicate any child problems

desc: Perkembangan kognitif anak usia dini membutuhkan memori yang bisa diakses oleh otak sehingga memudahkan dalam membuat satu keputusan. Memori akan tertata dengan adanya pembiasaan hidup yang baik pada seorang anak, salah satu satunya adalah pada pola tidur berkualitas. Penelitian terdahulu telah berkembang dengan menggunakan polysomnografi, sebuah alat khusus mendeteksi pola tidur. Peneliti memilih bentuk kuesioner untuk penyebaran yang lebih luas agar diperoleh kesempatan pada semua anak mendapatkan profil kualitas tidur yang dihubungkan dengan pengukuran perkembangan memori. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kuantitatif formatif reflektif konstruk orde kedua (second order) untuk membangun variable pengukuran dari dimensi pada teori yang mendukung, dalam hal ini variabel kualitas tidur sesuai teori dibangun dari dimensi pola kebiasaan sebelum tidur, selama tidur, dan saat bangun tidur. Hasil penelitian ditemukan konsistensi pada koefisien Cronbach’s Alpha dan validitas diskriminan yang memiliki nilai hasil valid dan reliabel. Dari peneiltian ini menunjukan bahwa kualitas tidur memiliki hubungan positif dan signifikan terhadap perkembangan memori anak pada pola kebiasaan sebelum tidur, selama tidur, dan kebiasaan bangun
title: Hubungan Kualitas Tidur dan Memori pada Anak Usia Dini: Pendekatan Formatif Orde Kedua
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the relationship between sleep quality and memory in early childhood the second-order formative approach the cognitive development of early childhood requires memory that can be accessed by the brain so that it is easy to make a decision memory will be organized with the existence of good living habits in a child one of which is in quality sleep patterns previous research has developed using polysomnography a special tool to detect sleep patterns researchers choose a questionnaire form for wider distribution so that all children have the opportunity to get a sleep quality profile that is linked to memory development measurements this study uses a quantitative formative reflective construct second order method to build measurement variables from dimensions in supporting theories in this case the sleep quality variable according to theory is built from dimensions of habit patterns before going to bed during sleep and when waking up the results of the study found consistency in the cronbachs alpha coefficient and discriminant validity which have valid and reliable results from this study indicate that sleep quality has a positive and significant relationship to children's memory development in habit patterns before going to bed during sleep and waking up habits

desc: Pendidikan seks prasekolah TK dan RA untuk memfasilitasi perkembangan anak termasuk pemahaman seks yang komprehensif. RA memiliki jenjang seperti TK namun berbasis islam dengan pendekatan yang memadukan iman sekaligus amal saleh. Tujuan penelitian untuk mengetahui perbandingan pemahaman seks pada aspek kognitif dan sosem di TK dan RA. Desain penelitian ini kuantitatif komparasi. Sampel penelitian 30 anak usia 4-5 tahun di TK Garuda dan RA Al-Kautsar, Surakarta. Teknik pengumpulan data melalui kuesioner tingkat pemahaman seks anak dengan. Temuan baru penelitian dari hasil rekapitulasi kuesioner menunjukan perbedaan nilai yang signifikan.  Hipotesis mengenai perbedaan pemahaman seks anak usia 4-5 tahun aspek kognitif dan sosial emosi diterima. Pemahaman seks di Ra lebih unggul karena penerapan pendidikan seks secara islami dimana aspek sosial emosi diperhatikan detil dalam kegiatan belajar. Anak tidak hanya paham kognitifnya saja seperti perbedaan laki-laki dan perempuan, tetapi dapat menghormati dirinya dengan diajari bagaimana melindungi diri dengan menutup aurat, dan merawat diri
title: Perbandingan Pemahaman Seks Anak Usia 4-5 Tahun Ditinjau dari Penerapan Pendidikan Seks
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: comparison of children's understanding of sex aged years reviewed from the application of sex education preschool sex education tk and ra to facilitate child development including comprehensive understanding of sex ra has a level like tk but is based on Islam with an approach that combines faith and good deeds the purpose of the study to determine the comparison of understanding of sex in cognitive and social aspects in tk and ra the design of this study is quantitative comparative research sample children aged years in tk garuda and ra alkautsar surakarta data collection technique through questionnaires the level of understanding of children's sex with new findings research from the results of the questionnaire recapitulation shows a significant difference in value the hypothesis regarding the difference in understanding of sex children aged years cognitive and social emotional aspects is accepted understanding of sex in ra is superior because the application of Islamic sex education where the social emotional aspect is considered in detail in children's learning activities not only understand cognitively such as the differences between men and women but can respect themselves by being taught how to protect themselves by covering their genitals and taking care of themselves

desc: Orang tua  yang pada dasarnya menginginkan yang terbaik bagi anak-anak, namun tanpa sadar juga melakukan kesalahan dalam penerapan pola asuh terhadap anak usia dini sehingga tidak mampu menanamkan karakter yang baik apada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk mengetahui bentuk pengasuhan orang tua sebagai fondasi pembentukan karakter anak usia dini. Penelitian yang dilakukan adalah menggunakan penelitian lapangan (field research), hasil atau data yang bersifat deskriptif analitis. Adapun data dalam penelitian ini diperoleh melalui kegiatan observasi dan wawancara yang dilakukan secara langsung kepada para ibu di Desa Sangadeto. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pola pengasuhan anak yang ada di desa Sangadeto terutama di dusun Zepe masih banyak kekurangan dimana masih adanya paradigma orang tua ibu sebagai penanggungjawab pengasuhan, dan ayah sebagai pencari nafakah. Selanjutnya hasil penelitian juga menemukan kebiasaan orang tua yang menyerahkan pendidikan anak usia dini pada Lembaga Pendidikan. Sehingga Peran keluarga sebagai madrasah utama untuk anak sangat minim. Hal ini tentunya menghambat terbentuknya karakter yang baik pada anak usia dini. Sebagai tindak lanjut, kegiatan parenting secara khusus bagi orang tua tentang pola pengasuhan yang baik perlu diberikan agar dapat mengoptimalisasikan pembentukan karakter anak sejak usia dini.
title: Optimasi Pola Pengasuhan Orang Tua: Fondasi Pembentukan Karakter Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Optimization of parenting patterns as the foundation for character formation in early childhood Parents who basically want the best for their children but unknowingly also make mistakes in implementing parenting patterns for early childhood so that they are unable to instill good character in early childhood This study was conducted to determine the form of parenting as the foundation for character formation in early childhood The study used field research, the results or data were descriptive analytical The data in this study were obtained through observation and interviews conducted directly with mothers in Sangadeto village The results of the study showed that the childcare patterns in Sangadeto village, especially in Zepe hamlet, still had many shortcomings where there was still a paradigm of parents, mothers as the ones responsible for care and fathers as breadwinners Furthermore, the results of the study also found the habit of parents who handed over early childhood education to educational institutions so that the role of the family as the main madrasah for children was very minimal This certainly hinders the formation of good character in early childhood As a follow-up to parenting activities specifically for parents about good parenting patterns, it is necessary to provide them in order to optimize the formation of children's character from an early age

desc: Era digitalisasi mempercepat kehadiran gadget sebagai teknologi komunikasi yang mengepung seluruh lini kehidupan masyarakat. Bagi keluarga yang memiliki anak usia dini persoalan literasi kritis menyikapi gadget menjadi kebutuhan penting, sehingga dibutuhkan pemahaman tentang: (1) Hubungan antara kecanduan gadget dengan gangguan emosional dan perilaku sosial pada anak usia dini, (2) Upaya merancang sistem belajar bagi anak usia dini, sehingga dapat mengurangi ketergantungan pada gadget. Pendekatan penelitian menggunakan deskriptif kuantitatif dan tehnik deskriptif sebagai tehnik analisa data. Hasil penelitian menjelaskan bahwa gadget memberikan kontribusi terhadap munculnya kecanduan dan berdampak pada gangguan emosional dan perilaku sosial pada anak usia dini. Gadget melahirkan praktik manipulatif dan melemahkan kekuatan keluarga sebagai pendidik utama dan pertama bagi anak-anaknya. Kondisi ini mendorong pentingnya kehadiran sekolah alternatif sebagai counter-hegemony yang memegang peranan penting untuk membangun pusat legitimasi baru. Sekolah alternatif bisa menyebar dan datang dari mana saja sehingga tidak terpusat pada satu sentral otoritas tertentu.
title: Dilema Keluarga di Era Digitalisasi: Antara Kecanduan Gadget, Gangguan Emosional, Perilaku Sosial pada Anak Usia Dini dan Tawaran Sekolah Alternatif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Family dilemma in the digital era between gadget addiction, emotional and social behavioral disorders in early childhood and alternative school offers The digital era accelerates the presence of gadgets as communication technology that surrounds all lines of community life for families with early childhood children, the issue of critical literacy in responding to gadgets is an important need so that an understanding is needed about the relationship between gadget addiction and emotional and social behavioral disorders in early childhood, efforts to design a learning system for early childhood so that it can reduce dependence on gadgets, the research approach uses quantitative descriptive and descriptive techniques as data analysis techniques, the results of the study explain that gadgets contribute to the emergence of addiction and have an impact on emotional and social behavioral disorders in early childhood, gadgets give rise to manipulative practices and weaken the power of the family as the primary and first educator for their children, this condition encourages the importance of the presence of alternative schools as a counterhegemony that plays an important role in building a new center of legitimacy, alternative schools can spread and come from anywhere so that they are not centered on a particular central authority

desc: Memiliki kecerdasan intrapersonal dan sosial pada anak usia dini sangatlah penting. Salah satu aktivitas yang bisa dilakukan adalah dengan menggunakan metode pembelajaran sentra peran. Melalui aktivitas tersebut, anak diharapkan mampu mengenali dirinya, berkomunikasi serta mengontrol emosional dan sosialnya; akan tetapi, tidak jarang banyak guru atau pengajar yang cenderung mengabaikan aspek-aspek penting dalam melakukan asesmen dan tidak mengetahui bagaimana upaya meningkatkan kecerdasan tersebut. Studi ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis bagaimana asesmen dan pengembangan kecerdasan intrapersonal dan sosial melalui pembelajaran sentra peran yang dilakukan oleh para pendidik di Tarbiyatul Athfal (TA) Al-Manaar Al-Islamiyah, Ponorogo. Penelitian ini adalah metode kualitatif deskriptif dengan menggunakan pendekatan studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan observasi dan wawancara. Langkah analisis data yaitu reduksi, penyajian, verifikasi data dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil studi ini menunjukkan bahwa guru mampu menilai dengan beberapa teknik asesmen dan keterlibatan orang tua dan guru sangat penting dalam mengembangkan kecerdasan intrapersonal dan sosial anak. Hasil pembelajaran melalui sentra peran tersebut adalah anak mampu menumbuhkan kepercayaan diri, emosi serta karakter yang kuat
title: Asesmen dan Pengembangan Kecerdasan Intrapersonal dan Sosial Anak melalui Pembelajaran Sentra Peran
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
