Hasil dari penelitian menjunjukkan bahwa penggunaan metode berbasis proyek dapat meningkatkan kemandirian anak usia dini secara signifikan, dan memberikan manfaat untuk anak agar dapat bekerja secara mandiri maupun berkelompok.
title: Implementasi Pembelajaran Berbasis Proyek untuk Meningkatkan Kemandirian Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of project-based learning to improve early childhood independence various attitudes that children must have, one of which is early childhood independence requires an independent attitude as a basis for children to be able to control themselves independence in early childhood can be stimulated with various learning methods project-based learning methods are able to convey exciting knowledge to children project methods create children to become curious individuals and can work alone or in groups this study was conducted to describe the implementation of project-based learning methods to improve independence in early childhood using a descriptive qualitative approach as a research method observation interviews and documentation as data collection techniques involving teachers and principals of TK Great Rastera School, Sunggal District, Deli Serdang Regency data were analyzed descriptively qualitatively with reduced data presented and conclusions drawn the results of the study showed that the use of project-based methods can significantly improve early childhood independence and provide benefits for children to be able to work independently or in groups

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan bagaimana penerapan penilaian otentik yang diterapkan dalam pembelajaran di Taman Kanak-kanak Negeri II Padang. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah deskriptif dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Kenyataannya, ada beberapa fakta penerapan penilaian otentik khususnya guru-guru TK belum sepenuhnya memahami konsep penilaian otentik. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui penerapan penilaian otentik di Taman Kanak-kanak Negeri II Padang. Pengumpulan dengan format observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Data dianalisis dengan menggunakan teknik analisis data Miles dan Huberman.Hasil penelitian dapat disimpulkan bahwa: (1) Perencanaan yang dibuat oleh guru sudah ada penilaian sesuai dengan KD dan indikator, tetapi belum semua aspek perkembangan; (2) Proses pelaksanaan penilaian otentik sebagian sudah dilaksanakan oleh guru; (3) Hasil penilaian otentik yang dilakukan setiap hari sesuai dengan intrumen, catatan anekdot, dan hasil karya anak ,tetapi belum direkap oleh guru.
title: Fakta-Fakta Penerapan Penilaian Otentik di Taman Kanak-Kanak Negeri 2 Padang
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Facts about the application of authentic assessment in Padang State Kindergarten This study aims to describe how the application of authentic assessment is applied in learning in Padang State Kindergarten II. The type of research used is descriptive with a qualitative approach. In reality, there are several facts about the application of authentic assessment, especially kindergarten teachers who do not fully understand the concept of authentic assessment. This study aims to determine the application of authentic assessment in Padang State Kindergarten II. Data collection using observation, interview and documentation formats is analyzed using Miles and Huberman data analysis techniques. The results of the study can be concluded that the planning made by the teacher already has an assessment in accordance with the KD and indicators, but not all aspects of the development of the authentic assessment implementation process have been partially implemented by the teacher. The results of the authentic assessment carried out every day are in accordance with the anecdotal record instrument and the results of the children's work but have not been summarized by the teacher.

desc: Artikel ini membahas pentingnya suara pendidik dalam gerakan kesetaraan dan keberagaman, khususnya terkait pendidikan inklusi anak usia dini. Meskipun pendidikan inklusi semakin diterima secara luas, kontribusi dan pengalaman pendidik mengenai praktik terbaik dan tantangan yang dihadapi seringkali diabaikan. Melalui pendekatan fenomenologi dan metode kualitatif,  tujuan penelitian berskala kecil ini mengeksplorasi pemahaman dan pengalaman lima pendidik anak usia dini tentang pendidikan inklusi di lima taman kanak-kanak di Jawa Timur. Analisis tematik data penelitian menggarisbawahi inklusi sebagai hak untuk diterima dan berpartisipasi penuh; kebutuhan untuk modifikasi guna mewujudkan budaya penerimaan, keberagaman, dan inklusi; kurangnya dukungan dan pengembangan profesional yang tidak memadai; serta pentingnya dukungan praktik yang efektif melalui hubungan dengan keluarga, para ahli, dan anak-anak. Temuan penelitian ini menyoroti implikasi pentingnya pengembangan profesional berbasis bukti yang lebih berfokus pada kebutuhan sehari-hari pendidik anak usia dini.
title: Pengalaman Pendidik TK Reguler Mengajar Anak Berkebutuhan Khusus
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: regular kindergarten educators' experiences teaching children with special needs this article discusses the importance of educators' voices in the equity and diversity movement especially related to early childhood inclusive education although inclusive education is increasingly widely accepted educators' contributions and experiences regarding best practices and challenges faced are often overlooked through a phenomenological approach and qualitative methods the purpose of this small-scale study explored the understandings and experiences of five early childhood educators about inclusive education in five kindergartens in East Java thematic analysis of the research data highlighted inclusion as a right to be accepted and participate fully the need for modification to realize a culture of acceptance of diversity and inclusion lack of support and inadequate professional development and the importance of supporting effective practice through relationships with families experts and children the findings of this study highlight the implications of the importance of evidence-based professional development that focuses more on the daily needs of early childhood educators

desc: Taraf kecerdasan menentukan kapasitas anak dalam menyesuaikan diri di lingkungan. Namun, tidak semua anak memiliki potensi intelektual yang cukup. Hal ini menimbulkan berbagai kesulitan dalam memenuhi tugas-tugas perkembangannya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui dan mendeskripsikan intervensi pada anak disabilitas intelektual sedang yang berada pada usia 7 tahun dalam proses adaptasi dan perkembangan kognitif. Penelitian ini dilakukan kepada satu orang anak laki-laki dengan IQ 50 dan usia mental 3 tahun 10 bulan. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan berdasarkan hasil observasi dan wawancara. Berdasarkan hasil pengumpulan data diperoleh bahwa intervensi yang dilakukan pada subjek dalam meningkatkan proses belajar, kemandirian dan penyesuaian diri di lingkungan menggunakan pendekatan behavioristik dengan cara: modelling, terapi bermain, reinforcment positif dan remedial teaching. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa anak usia sekolah dasar dengan disabilitas intelektual membutuhkan intervensi khusus dalam proses perkembangannya. Dengan intervensi yang tepat, anak dapat mengalami kemajuan yang mendukung penyesuaian akademiknya.
title: Pendekatan Behavioristik untuk Anak Disabilitas Intelektual Sedang
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Behaviorist approach for children with moderate intellectual disabilities, the level of intelligence determines the child's capacity to adapt to the environment, but not all children have sufficient intellectual potential, this causes various difficulties in fulfilling their developmental tasks. This study aims to determine and describe interventions for children with moderate intellectual disabilities who are at the age of years in the process of adaptation and cognitive development. This study was conducted on one boy with an IQ and mental age of years and months. The research method used in this study is a qualitative method with a case study approach. Data collection techniques are carried out based on the results of observations and interviews. Based on the results of data collection, it was obtained that the intervention carried out on the subject in improving the learning process of independence and adjustment in the environment used a behaviorist approach by modeling positive reinforcement play therapy and remedial teaching. The results of this study indicate that elementary school children with intellectual disabilities need special interventions in their development process. With the right intervention, children can experience progress that supports their academic adjustment.

desc: Based on these circumstances, this study aims to develop an appropriate game to improve readiness of the initial ability of reading, and writing on early childhood called "Smart Adventure". This game can help children to learn the ability of the initial reading and writing with a fun method (play) and in accordance with the characteristics and stages of early childhood development. This study used a qualitative and quantitative approach (mix method) with "Borg and Gall" research and development model. The procedures used include: research and information collecting, planning, develop preliminary form of product, preliminary field testing, main product revision, main field testing, operational product revision, operational field testing, final product revision, and dissemination and implementation.The results of this study indicate the effectiveness and usefulness of the Smart Adventure game product on the ability to reading and writing early childhood
title: Development of Smart Adventure Games to Improve the Readiness of the Initial Ability of Reading, and Writing (CALIS) on Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of smart adventure games to improve the readiness of the initial ability of reading and writing calis in early childhood based on these circumstances this study aims to develop an appropriate game to improve the readiness of the initial ability of reading and writing in early childhood called smart adventure this game can help children to learn the ability of the initial reading and writing with a fun method play and in accordance with the characteristics and stages of early childhood development this study used a qualitative and quantitative approach mix method with borg and gall research and development model the procedures used include research and information collecting planning develop preliminary form of product preliminary field testing main product revision main field testing operational product revision operational field testing final product revision and dissemination and implementation the results of this study indicate the effectiveness and usefulness of the smart adventure game product on the ability to read and write early childhood

desc: Pengenalan budaya di sekolah sangat penting, dimana anak usia dini dapat mengenal dan melestarikan budaya di Indonesia, khususnya budaya lokal dimana mereka tinggal. Lembaga ini mengembangkan tema budaya lokal sesuai dengan karakteristik dan kebutuhan, khususnya pada pembelajaran di sentra seni. Sentra ini berfokus memberikan kesempatan dalam mengembangkan berbagai keterampilan, seperti menempel, melipat menggunting, melukis, serta membuat karya seni. Tujuan penelitian adalah untuk mengetahui bagaimana pengenalan budaya lokal dalam pembelajaran di sekolah melalui sentra seni. Pendekatan penelitian yang digunakan adalah kualitatif deskriptif dengan studi kasus. Penelitian dilakukan di TK Islam Hidayatullah pada anak usia 4-6 tahun. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan wawancara, observasi dan analisis data dengan Miles and Huberman. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pengenalan budaya lokal Semarang melalui media seperti video, buku, cerita, media apersepsi, miniatur, wayang, serta kegiatan yang dapat mengembangkan kegiatan di sentra seni. Guru berperan menyediakan berbagai alat dan bahan yang bervariasi, serta menyusun perangkat pembelajaran
title: Implementasi Pengenalan Budaya Lokal di Sentra Seni pada Anak Usia 4-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of local cultural introduction in art centers for children aged years introduction of culture in schools is very important where early childhood can get to know and preserve culture in Indonesia, especially local culture where they live this institution develops local cultural themes according to the characteristics and needs especially in learning in art centers this center focuses on providing opportunities to develop various skills such as sticking folding cutting painting and making artwork the purpose of the study is to find out how the introduction of local culture in learning in schools through art centers the research approach used is qualitative descriptive with case studies the study was conducted at TK Islam Hidayatullah for children aged years data collection techniques using interviews observation and data analysis with miles and huberman the results of the study showed that the introduction of local culture in Semarang through media such as video story books apperception media miniature puppets and activities that can develop activities in art centers teachers play a role in providing various tools and materials that vary and compiling learning devices

desc: Minat terhadap pendidikan karakter meningkat, namun belum cukup untuk membuktikan efektivitas dari upaya pendidikan karakter di berbagai jenis dan budaya sekolah dalam membangun peradaban yang berkarakter dan menjunjung nilai moral Pancasila di Indonesia. Artikel ini menguraikan sebuah studi di beberapa Sekolah Dasar dan Madrasah Ibtidaiyah khususnya di kelas rendah yakni kelas 1 dan 2 di Bandung dan Kendari. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian deskriptif kualitatif yang mencoba menjelaskan dan menguji konsep keteladanan Aristotelian melalui  pendekatan teori pembelajaran sosial Albert Bandura melalui observasi dan wawancara mendalam pada 15 orang partisipan guru.  Artikel ini diharapkan memberikan kontribusi pada pengembangan pendidikan karakter di Indonesia dengan mengadopsi pendekatan kebajikan nilai moral anak sesuai karakter moral Pancasila melalui keteladanan sesuai konsep childreen see, childreen do.
title: Children See, Children Do: Pendidikan Karakter Berbasis Nilai Moral Pancasila
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: children see children do character education based on moral values ​​of pancasila interest in character education is increasing but not enough to prove the effectiveness of character education efforts in various types and cultures of schools in building a civilization that is characterful and upholds the moral values ​​of pancasila in indonesia this article describes a study in several elementary schools and madrasah ibtidaiyah especially in the lower classes namely class and in bandung and kendari this study uses a qualitative descriptive research method that tries to explain and test the concept of aristotelian exemplars through the approach of albert bandura's social learning theory through observation and in-depth interviews with teacher participants this article is expected to contribute to the development of character education in indonesia by adopting the approach of virtue moral values ​​of children according to the moral character of pancasila through exemplars according to the concept childreen see children do

desc: Doodle adalah gambar sederhana yang dapat memiliki makna representasi konkret atau yang terdiri dari garis acak dan abstrak, dalam hal ini biasanya disebut "coretan". Teknik Menggambar Doodle dilakukan dengan tujuan untuk mengasah kemampuan seni anak sehingga mampu meransang perkembangan dan kreativitas anak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode deskriptif kualitatif dengan teknik pengumpulan data melalui wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil dari penelitian ini dapat dilihat dari kemampuan menggambar anak, selain itu juga terlihat dari semangat, minat, dan anak idik dalam melakukan kegiatan menggambar. Kreativitas anak juga terlihat dari adanya ide-ide baru dalam menggambar yang di lakukan anak. Sehingga dapat dikatakan bahwa menggambar doodle dapat meningkatkan kreatifitas kemampuan menggambar anak.
title: Analisis Menggambar Doodle Terhadap Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: In this case, it is usually called a doodle drawing technique, which is done with the aim of honing children's artistic abilities so that they can stimulate children's development and creativity. The method used in this study is a qualitative descriptive method with data collection techniques through interviews and documentation. The results of this study can be seen from children's drawing abilities. In addition, it can also be seen from the enthusiasm, interest and children in carrying out drawing activities. Children's creativity can also be seen from the existence of new ideas in drawing that children do, so it can be said that drawing doodles can increase children's creativity in drawing abilities.

desc: Ekoliterasi menjadi salah satu upaya untuk mewujudkan pembangunan yang berkelanjutan. Keterlaksanaan pembelajaran ekoliterasi harus didukung dengan adanya media pembelajaran. Ketersediaan media pembelajaran yang relevan akan memberikan kemudahan dalam memahami materi dan motivasi belajar yang tidak hanya sekedar  berorientasi pada teks seperti media-media sebelumnya. Tujuan penelitian ini sebagai upaya untuk mengembangkan media pembelajaran yang inovatif dan menarik. Metode yang digunakan dalam mengembangkan media pembelajaran yakni pengembangan RD dengan model 4D, yaitu a) Define (Pendefinisian) berupa analisis awal untuk mengetahui kebutuhan; b) Design (Perancangan) berupa kesiapan naskah dan konten pembelajaran; c) Development (Pengembangan) berupa pengembangan media; c) Disseminate (Penyebaran) berupa mempublikasikan hasil pengembangan. Hasil penelitian berupa media pembelajaran yang digunakan tentunya terdapat relevansi dengan ekoliterasi siswa yakni media pembelajaran berbasis wawasan lingkungan untuk mendorong siswa menjadi individu yang peduli dan berbudaya terhadap lingkungan sehingga mampu meningkatkan ekoliterasi sekaligus memberikan penguatan profil pelajar pancasila sebagaimana yang terdapat dalam kurikulum merdeka.
title: Buku Digital Berwawasan Lingkungan Sebagai Upaya Menumbuhkan Ekoliterasi Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Environmentally-oriented digital books as an effort to foster children's ecoliteracy Ecoliteracy is one of the efforts to realize sustainable development The implementation of ecoliteracy learning must be supported by the availability of learning media The availability of relevant learning media will make it easier to understand the material and motivation to learn that is not only text-oriented like previous media The purpose of this study is to develop innovative and interesting learning media The method used in developing learning media is the development of rd with model d, namely a define Definition in the form of initial analysis to determine needs b design Design in the form of readiness of scripts and learning content c development Development in the form of media development c disseminate Dissemination in the form of publishing the results of the development of research results in the form of learning media used Of course there is relevance to student ecoliteracy, namely learning media based on environmental insight to encourage students to become individuals who care and are cultured about the environment so that they are able to increase ecoliteracy while strengthening the profile of Pancasila students as contained in the Merdeka curriculum

desc: Pentingnya pembelajaran nilai Pancasila menjadi hal yang dibutuhkan saat ini, karena muncul permasalahan yang di hadapi  oleh satuan pendidikan jenjang Taman Kanak-kanak ketika harus mengimplementasikan aspek nilai-nilai Pancasila dalam pembelajaran masih kurang terutama ketersediaan buku panduan pembelajaran yang dimiliki guru secara praktis dapat membantu merancang stimulasi sesuai dengan capaian pembelajaran fase fondasi dalam kurikulum merdeka. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mengembangan buku panduan pembelajaran berbasis nilai Pancasila untuk anak usia dini khususnya usia 5-6 tahun. Metode yang digunakan adalah desain pengembangan 4-D (Four D Models). Hasil penelitian yang dilakukan sampai tahap perancangan design yaitu rancangan buku panduan dalam pengkajian materi ahli agar nanti dalam uji coba dapat dilakukan dengan masukan dan hasil validasi materi yang tepat. Harapan penulis akan melanjutkan tahap uji coba selanjutnya untuk memperoleh hasil yang nantinya memiliki kebermaknaan mendalam dalam peningkatan kualitas pembelajaran anak usia dini berbasis nilai Pancasila.
title: Pengembangan Buku Panduan Pembelajaran Berbasis Nilai Pancasila pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of a learning guidebook based on Pancasila values ​​for early childhood the importance of learning Pancasila values ​​is currently needed because problems arise that are faced by kindergarten level educational units when they have to implement aspects of Pancasila values ​​in learning are still lacking, especially the availability of learning guidebooks owned by teachers can practically help design stimulation according to the learning achievements of the foundation phase in the independent curriculum the purpose of this study is to develop a learning guidebook based on Pancasila values ​​for early childhood, especially those aged years the method used is the development design d four d models the results of the research carried out up to the design stage, namely the design of the guidebook in the assessment of expert material so that later in the trial it can be carried out with input and results of the validation of the right material the author hopes to continue the next trial stage to obtain results that will have deep meaning in improving the quality of early childhood learning based on Pancasila values

desc: Supervisi dilakukan untuk mengembangkan mutu pendidikan yang lebih baik. Meskipun demikian, pelaksanaan supervisi masih mengalami berbagai kendala. Oleh karena itu, artikel bertujuan untuk memberikan gambaran komparasi pelaksanaan supervisi di dua negara maju yakni Finlandia dan Cina. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode studi literatur yang dilakukan melalui beberapa proses. Pendekatan ini dipilih karena ingin memberikan gambaran mengenai strategi yang tepat untuk guru. teknik analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini menggunakan analisis tematik yang berusaha untuk memunculkan tema dari data yang diperoleh. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa tujuan supervisi, supervisor, strategi pelaksanaan, dan hasil akhir supervisi di negara Finlandia dan Cina memiliki perbedaan. Perbedaan yang paling mendasar adalah pada tujuan dan strategi pelaksanaan. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat digunakan oleh pemangku kebijakan pendidikan untuk melakukan supervisi guru dengan mempertimbangkan setiap hasil penelitian ini.
title: Studi Komparasi Pelaksanaan Supervisi Guru di Finlandia dan Cina sebagai Negara Maju
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: comparative study of the implementation of teacher supervision in Finland and China as developed countries supervision is carried out to develop better education quality, however the implementation of supervision still experiences various obstacles therefore the article aims to provide a comparative overview of the implementation of supervision in two developed countries, namely Finland and China this study uses a literature study method which is carried out through several processes this approach was chosen because it wants to provide an overview of the right strategy for teachers the data analysis technique used in this study uses thematic analysis which attempts to bring up themes from the data obtained the results of this study indicate that the objectives of supervisor supervision the implementation strategy and the final results of supervision in Finland and China have differences the most fundamental differences are in the objectives and implementation strategies the implications of the results of this study can be used by education policy makers to supervise teachers by considering each of the results of this study

desc: Without realizing it, the development of the child's character does not appear spontaneously. There is a process that is experienced and passed, one of which is the development phase. The earliest character development period is for early childhood. How important are parents to notice the formation of the character of the early childhood they have. When talking about the formation of early childhood characters, we become reminded of the environmental and family factors that are close to the child. In this article, the author wants to discuss about the process of character building early childhood in three elements; family, school, and community. Based on the results of the study conducted, the authors found that the process of forming the character of early childhood, beginning from the family, then followed by the school, and the community followed by these early childhood. This community includes the play community, the tutoring community or the talent development course institution that the early childhood participates in. But, the main determining factor is the family as the smallest and first community for the children.
title: Pembentukan Karakter Anak Usia Dini: Keluarga, Sekolah, Dan Komunitas? (Studi Kualitatif tentang Pembentukan Karakter Anak Usia Dini Melalui Keluarga, Sekolah,  dan Komunitas)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Kemampuan membaca permulaan sangat penting dimiliki oleh peserta didik sekolah dasar untuk memahami dan menguasai materi pembelajaran di tahap selanjutnya, serta meyuarakan teks tulisan dengan aksen yang tepat. Namun, kemampuan tersebut masih rendah. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk menjelaskan kesulitan yang dihadapi guru saat mengajar membaca permulaan anak-anak di sekolah dasar. Penelitian ini penting dilakukan karena untuk mengetahui masalah membaca permulaan dan kebutuhan model pembelajaran case method berbasis kontekstual lingkungan yang digunakan untuk mengoptimalkan kecakapan membaca permulaan Metode kualitatif fenomologi merupakan pendekatan penelitian yang digunakan. Partisipan penelitian ini adalah guru kelas I dan II sekolah dasar. Teknik pengambilan data yang dilakukan menggunakan wawancara. Model analisis model jalinan atau mengalir merupakan teknik analisis yang digunakan. Hasil penelitian ini adalah kesulitan peserta didik dalam membaca permulaan berupa kesulitan dalam mengidentifikasi huruf, mengeja, dan melafalkan fonem. Penelitian ini dapat berkontribusi dalam peningkatan kemampuan membaca permulaan, pengembangan kemampuan literasi, dan kemampuan abad 21.
title: Model Pembelajaran Case Method Berbasis Kontekstual Lingkungan untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Membaca Permulaan
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: case method learning model based on contextual environment to improve early reading skills early reading skills are very important for elementary school students to understand and master learning materials in the next stage and to voice written texts with the right accent but this ability is still low the purpose of this study is to explain the difficulties faced by teachers when teaching early reading to children in elementary schools this study is important to do because to find out the problems of early reading and the need for a case method learning model based on contextual environment used to optimize early reading skills the qualitative phenomenological method is the research approach used the participants in this study were elementary school grade I and II teachers the data collection technique used was an interview analysis model the interwoven or flowing model is the analysis technique used the results of this study are the difficulties of students in early reading in the form of difficulties in identifying letters spelling and pronouncing phonemes this study can contribute to improving early reading skills the development of literacy skills and the ability of the 21st century

desc: Perlindungan diri merupakan kemampuan yang harus dimiliki setiap individu untuk menghindari berbagai bentuk kejahatan termasuk kekerasan seksual. Penelitian sebelumnya banyak membahas pencegahan dari sisi orang dewasa, namun jarang menyoroti langsung kemampuan perlindungan diri anak. Penelitian ini merupakan intervensi pre-post-test design dengan pendekatan kuantitatif yang bertujuan melihat efektivitas Program Pelatihan Perlindungan Diri (P3D) dalam meningkatkan pengetahuan perlindungan diri sebagai upaya pencegahan kekerasan seksual. Sampel penelitian ini adalah 45 orang anak perempuan usia 7-8 tahun yang dipilih menggunakan teknik accidental sampling. Data dikumpulkan melalui instrumen penelitian dan dianalisis menggunakan Wilcoxon signed-rank test. Hasilnya menunjukan adanya peningkatan rata-rata pengetahuan yang signifikan sebelum dan setelah memperoleh pelatihan. Pengetahuan tersebut bersifat menetap pada follow up test yang dilakukan setelah jeda waktu dua minggu. Pada penelitian selanjutnya dapat dilakukan follow up test berulang untuk mengukur konsistensi pengetahuan anak. Hasil penelitian dan modul yang digunakan dapat dimanfaatkan oleh lembaga perlindungan anak, orang tua dan guru di sekolah dalam mencegah kekerasan seksual pada anak usia dini.
title: Upaya Pencegahan Kekerasan Seksual pada Anak 7-8 Tahun melalui Program Pelatihan Perlindungan Diri (P3D)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts to prevent sexual violence in children through self-protection training programs in self-protection is an ability that must be possessed by every individual to avoid various forms of crime including sexual violence. Previous studies have discussed prevention from the adult perspective but rarely directly highlighted children's self-protection abilities. This study is a pre-posttest design intervention with a quantitative approach that aims to see the effectiveness of the self-protection training program in increasing self-protection knowledge as an effort to prevent sexual violence. The sample of this study was a girl aged 18-24 years who was selected using the accidental sampling technique. Data was collected through research instruments and analyzed using the Wilcoxon signed-rank test. The results showed a significant increase in average knowledge before and after receiving training. This knowledge is permanent in the follow-up test conducted after a two-week gap. In further research, repeated follow-up tests can be carried out to measure the consistency of children's knowledge. The results of the study and the modules used can be utilized by child protection institutions, parents and teachers at school in preventing sexual violence in early childhood.

desc: Status gizi dapat menggambarkan status kesehatan dari seseorang yang dihasilkan oleh keseimbangan antara pemasukan zat gizi dan kebutuhan tubuh terkait dengan zat gizi tertentu. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan status gizi Balita pada masa pandemi covid-19 di Kota Ternate, serta partisipasi orang tua dalam kesehatan dan gizi anak. Tipe penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif dengan metode survey pada 3 titik kecamatan di Kota Ternate yakni Ternate Barat, Tengah dan Selatan, dengan sampel Balita yang berjumlah 2798. Analisis data dengan bantuan aplikasi pencatatan dan pelaporan gizi berbasis masyarakat (e-PPGBM), wawancara serta dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa: 1)  Rata-rata status gizi Balita pada masa pandemi covid-19 di kota Ternate masih tergolong berada pada status normal, dengan 884 Balita. Yang mengalami gizi buruk sebesar 4 Balita, gizi kurang 12 Balita, Resiko gizi lebih 21 Balita, gizi lebih 6 Balita dan Obesitas sebanyak 4 Balita, dan 2) Masih belum adanya kesadaran Sebagian Orang tua dalam berpartisipasi untuk membawa anak di puskesmas atau posyandu setempat. Oleh sebab itu diperlukan edukasi pada orangtua agar mewujudkan keluarga yang sadar gizi.
title: Deskripsi Status Gizi Balita, Serta Partisipasi Orang Tua pada Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Description of toddler nutritional status and parental participation during the covid pandemic nutritional status can describe the health status of a person resulting from the balance between nutrient intake and body needs related to certain nutrients this study aims to describe the nutritional status of toddlers during the covid pandemic in the city of ternate and parental participation in children's health and nutrition quantitative descriptive research type with survey method at sub-district points in the city of ternate, namely western, central and southern ternate with a sample of toddlers amounting to data analysis with the help of community-based nutritional recording and reporting applications eppgbm interviews and documentation research results show that the average nutritional status of toddlers during the covid pandemic in the city of ternate is still classified as normal with toddlers experiencing malnutrition as many as toddlers underweight toddlers at risk of overweight toddlers overweight toddlers and obesity as many as toddlers and there is still no awareness of some parents in participating in taking their children to the local health center or posyandu therefore education is needed for parents in order to create a family that is aware of nutrition

desc: Guru PAUD tentunya diharuskan memahami kemampuan koordinasi mata dan tangan pada anak, karena akan memudahkan dalam mengembangkan program-program pembelajaran yang tepat. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui seberapa esensial kemampuan koordinasi mata dan tangan anak menurut persepsi guru PAUD. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif deskriptif dengan teknik pengumpulan data observasi, wawancara, dan kuesioner kepada 10 orang guru di Depok Sleman. Hasil penelitian diperoleh data bahwa adanya koordinasi mata dan tangan yang esensial terlebih pada kesiapan sekolah anak seperti menyusun; menangkap; melempar; melipat; dan menulis. Namun faktanya masih terdapat anak terhambat kemampuan koordinasi mata dan tangannya, untuk itu 60% anak dapat sekolah dengan ditambah guru pendamping, dan untuk mengidealkan kemampuan koordinasi mata dan tangan 30% guru menyarankan untuk dapat mengikuti pembelajaran disekolah selama 2 tahun (bagi nol besar). Dari hasil tersebut dapat memberikan manfaat kepada guru-guru lainnya dan pehaman kepada orang tua atau wali murid.
title: Analisis Persepsi Guru PAUD terhadap Koordinasi Mata dan Tangan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of perceptions of early childhood education teachers on eye-hand coordination of children Early childhood education teachers are certainly required to understand the ability of eye-hand coordination in children because it will make it easier to develop appropriate learning programs This study aims to determine how essential the ability of eye-hand coordination of children is according to the perception of early childhood education teachers This study uses a descriptive qualitative method with data collection techniques, observation, interviews and questionnaires to teachers in Depok, Sleman. The results of the study obtained data that there is essential eye-hand coordination, especially in children's school readiness such as arranging, catching, throwing, folding and writing, but in fact there are still children whose eye-hand coordination abilities are hampered. For that, children can go to school with the addition of a companion teacher and to idealize the ability of eye-hand coordination, teachers suggest that they can follow learning at school for years. For the big zero, these results can provide benefits to other teachers and understanding to parents or guardians of students.

desc: Dihadapkan dengan perkembangan zaman yang sudah maju, guru dan orang tua perlu memanfaatkan teknologi sebagai media pengembangan karakter untuk anak usia dini salah satunya melalui film animasi. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis konten serial animasi untuk dapat digunakan sebagai media pengembangan karakter cinta tanah air bagi anak usia dini. Pendekatan yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah kualitatif dengan metode analisis isi. Pengumpulan data dalam penelitian ini menggunakan teknik observasi, studi dokumentasi dan wawancara. Hasil yang didapatkan dari penelitian ini bahwa unsur intrinsik dan ekstrinsik dalam serial animasi Diva mengandung konten karakter cinta tanah air sehingga berpotensi dimanfaatkan sebagai media pengembangan karakter cinta tanah air anak. Adapun fitur dan pemanfatan serial animasi Diva sebagai media pengembangan karakter cinta tanah air dapat dilihat melalui fungsi media pembelajaran yang diantaranya fungsi media sebagai sumber belajar, fungsi psikologis, serta fungsi semantik. Pemanfaatan teknologi seperti animasi sebagai media pengembangan karakter dapat menjadi alternatif media pengembangan karakter cinta tanah air untuk anak usia dini. Implikasi praktis dari hasil ini diharapkan menjadi dasar bagi guru dan orang tua memanfaatkan film animasi dengan muatan karakter dalam proses pembelajaran baik di sekolah dan di luar sekolah.
title: Analisis Serial Diva sebagai Media Pengembangan Karakter Cinta Tanah Air untuk Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the Diva series as a medium for developing the character of love for the homeland for early childhood faced with the development of an advanced era, teachers and parents need to utilize technology as a medium for developing character for early childhood, one of which is through animated films. This study aims to analyze the content of animated series to be used as a medium for developing the character of love for the homeland for early childhood. The approach used in this study is qualitative with the content analysis method. Data collection in this study uses observation techniques, documentation studies and interviews. The results obtained from this study are that the intrinsic and extrinsic elements in the Diva animated series contain content of the character of love for the homeland so that it has the potential to be used as a medium for developing the character of love for the homeland for children. The features and utilization of the Diva animated series as a medium for developing the character of love for the homeland can be seen through the function of learning media, including the function of the media as a source of learning, psychological functions and semantic functions. The use of technology such as animation as a medium for developing character can be an alternative medium for developing the character of love for the homeland for early childhood. The practical implications of these results are expected to be the basis for teachers and parents to utilize animated films with character content in the learning process both at school and outside of school.

desc: Kemampuan berhitung merupakan kemampuan dasar anak dalam mempelajari matematika terkait pemahaman mengenal bilangan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan sebuah media permainan dan mengetahui efektivitasnya untuk meningkatkan kemampuan berhitung anak usia 5-6 tahun. Media permainan ini disebut Mipons Daily yang dirancang melalui aplikasi powerpoint yang disesuaikan dengan tingkat perkembangan anak. Penelitian ini dilakukan di Kabupaten Lima Puluh Kota, Sumatera Barat. Uji efektivitas media permainan Mipons Daily menggunakan uji t-berpasangan. Responden dalam penelitian sebanyak dua puluh orang anak di TK Restu Ibu Ketinggian. Berdasarkan hasil perhitungan, terdapat peningkatan rata-rata sebelum diberikan perlakuan dengan setelah diberikan perlakuan. Diketahui hasil t hitung juga lebih besar dibandingkan dengan nilai t tabel sehingga H0 ditolak, berarti dapat disimpulkan bahwa terdapat perubahan yang signifikan antara sebelum menggunakan media permainan Mipons Daily (pretest) dengan setelah menggunakan media permainan Mipons Daily (posttest). Jadi, produk yang dikembangkan efektif digunakan dalam meningkatkan kemampuan berhitung anak usia 5-6 tahun.
title: Pengembangan Media Permainan Mipons Daily  untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Berhitung Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of mipons daily game media to improve children's numeracy skills numeracy skills are children's basic abilities in learning mathematics related to understanding numbers this study aims to develop a game media and determine its effectiveness in improving children's numeracy skills aged years this game media is called mipons daily which is designed through a powerpoint application that is adjusted to the child's development level this study was conducted in the district of lima Puluh Kota, West Sumatra the effectiveness test of the mipons daily game media using paired t-test respondents in the study were twenty children at Restu Ibu Tinggi Kindergarten based on the calculation results there was an increase in the average before being given treatment with after being given treatment it is known that the t count results are also greater than the t table value so that h is rejected meaning it can be concluded that there is a significant change between before using the mipons daily pretest game media and after using the mipons daily posttest game media so the product developed is effective in improving children's numeracy skills aged years

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan Implementasi Metode Pembelajaran STEAM pada Kurikulum Merdeka PAUD. Adapun latar belakang penelitian ini yaitu masih banyak guru yang kebingungan untuk menerapkan STEAM dalam kuriukulum Merdeka, kegiatan proyek yang dilaksanakan belum mengintegrasikan STEAM. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan yaitu kualitatif-deskriptif dengan  metode penelitian systematic literature review meliputi menelaah atrikel, jurnal, dan buku yang relevan dengan mencatat hal-hal penting dan diakhiri dengan implementasi dalam bentuk tulisan secara runtut. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan berupa analisis isi (content analysis). Membiasakan anak mengintegrasikan STEAM dalam proses berpikir akan membantu mereka memahami bagaimana dunia bekerja terutama lingkungan sekitar anak. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa dengan pendekatan STEAM, anak akan mengembangkan ide-ide berbasis sains dan teknologi dengan terlibat dalam aktivitas pemecahan masalah yang berasal dari lima disiplin ilmu yang saling berhubungan. Implikasi dari penelitian ini adalah menambah pengetahuan guru mengenai langkah-langkah implementasi metode STEAM dalam kurikulum merdeka
title: Implementasi Metode Pembelajaran STEAM pada Kurikulum Merdeka pada PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of the steam learning method in the independent curriculum in early childhood education This study aims to describe the implementation of the steam learning method in the independent curriculum in early childhood education. The background of this study is that many teachers are still confused about implementing steam in the independent curriculum. The project activities carried out have not integrated steam. The type of research used is qualitative descriptive with a systematic literature review research method including reviewing relevant journal articles and books by noting important things and ending with implementation in the form of writing in a coherent manner. The data analysis technique used is content analysis. Getting children used to integrating steam in the thinking process will help them understand how the world works, especially the environment around children. The results of this study indicate that with the steam approach, children will develop science and technology-based ideas by engaging in problem-solving activities that come from five interrelated disciplines. The implication of this study is to increase teacher knowledge regarding the steps for implementing the steam method in the independent curriculum.

desc: Bermain berbasis buku merupakan sebuah cara dalam Kurikulum Merdeka Belajar direkomendasikan dalam mengajarkan matematika kepada anak usia dini. Akan tetapi  banyak guru mengalami kesulitan mengembangkan cara belajar dan bermain berbasis buku. Penelitian bertujuan mengungkap ketertarikan anak belajar matematika melalui bermain berbasis buku dalam proses pembelajaran di sekolah yang menggunakan metode pembelajaran Cahaya Indonesia selama satu semester melalui pendekatan pre-experimental dengan one-group pretest-posttest design. Data penelitian diperoleh dari hasil pengamatan orang tua terhadap anak mereka selama berada di rumah menggunakan ceklis observasi dan dianalisis dengan statistik deskriptif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan pembelajaran menggunakan metode Cahaya Indonesia melalui bermain berbasis buku dapat meningkatkan  ketertarikan belajar matematika, yaitu (i) meningkatnya inisiatif belajar matematika secara mandiri; (ii) meningkatnya intensitas belajar matematika di waktu luang; (iii) lebih aktif bertanya cara menghitung. Penelitian berimplikasi kepada guru bahwa strategi bermain berbasis buku dalam pembelajaran metode Cahaya Indonesia dapat menjadi salah satu pendekatan membelajarkan matematika kepada anak usia dini.
title: Ketertarikan Anak Usia Dini Belajar Matematika melalui Metode Pembelajaran Cahaya Indonesia; Bermain Berbasis Buku-Merdeka Belajar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood interest in learning mathematics through the Indonesian light learning method book-based play Independent learning book-based play is a method in the independent learning curriculum recommended in teaching mathematics to early childhood, but many teachers have difficulty developing book-based learning and play methods The study aims to reveal children's interest in learning mathematics through book-based play in the learning process at school that uses the Indonesian light learning method for one semester through a pre-experimental approach with one-group pretest-posttest design The research data was obtained from the results of parents' observations of their children while at home using an observation checklist and analyzed with descriptive statistics The results of the study show that learning using the Indonesian light method through book-based play can increase interest in learning mathematics, namely: i. increasing the initiative to learn mathematics independently ii. increasing the intensity of learning mathematics in free time iii. more active in asking how to calculate The study has implications for teachers that the book-based play strategy in learning the Indonesian light method can be one approach to teaching mathematics to early childhood

desc: Tujuan penelitian dari artikel ini adalah untuk mendeskripsikan pengenalan makna dan simbol perangkat tanaman adat dalam ritual modutu antaran bagi anak usia dini di Gorontalo. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah metode penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Peneliti melakukan tahapan implementasi pengenalan makna dan simbol perangkat tanaman adat dalam ritual modutu antaran bagi anak usia dini. Analisis data yang digunakan adalah analisis data menggunakan persentase dan kriteria. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa implementasi pengenalan makna dan simbol tersebut tidak menemui kendala yang berarti, respon orang tua dan anak-anak usia dini sangat antusias meskipun beberapa anak tampak kebingunan terhadap makna dan simbol yang diberikan. Kebaruan penelitian didapatkan bahwa orang tua saat ini tidak terlalu paham dan dapat mempertahankan ritual tersebut secara utuh. Dampak dan impak dari hasil penelitian ini adalah perlunya dilestarikan kembali ritual Modutu agar anak-anak sebagai penerus tidak punah digilas zaman.
title: Pengenalan Makna dan Simbol Perangkat Tanaman Adat dalam Ritual Modutu Antaran Gorontalo bagi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Introduction to the meaning and symbols of traditional plant devices in the Modutu Antaran Gorontalo ritual for early childhood The purpose of this article is to describe the introduction of the meaning and symbols of traditional plant devices in the Modutu Antaran ritual for early childhood in Gorontalo The research method used is a qualitative descriptive research method The researcher carried out the stages of implementing the introduction of the meaning and symbols of traditional plant devices in the Modutu Antaran ritual for early childhood The data analysis used is data analysis using percentages and criteria The results of the study showed that the implementation of the introduction of the meaning and symbols did not encounter significant obstacles The response of parents and early childhood children was very enthusiastic even though some children seemed confused about the meaning and symbols given The novelty of the study was that parents currently do not really understand and can maintain the ritual intact The impact and impact of the results of this study is the need to preserve the Modutu ritual again so that children as successors do not become extinct and are crushed by time

desc: This study aims to determine the significant influence of the role of technical guidance and training on the performance of educators in improving the quality of student learning. This study uses quantitative methods, with the object of this research being teachers and students of elementary school. Data collection techniques using questionnaires, interviews, and direct observation of schools. The results of hypothesis testing indicate that the first hypothesis (H1), namely technical guidance has an effect on teacher performance, is accepted because it has a p-value of 0.000 or  0.05 which is significant. The second hypothesis test (H2), namely the training variable that affects teacher performance, has a p-value of 0.000 which is significant because the value is  0.05. Technical guidance and training activities can improve teacher competence so that the teaching performance of teachers is getting better and ultimately student learning achievement can be improved.
title: The Role of Technical Guidance And Training on the Performance of Educators in Improving Student Learning Achievement
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of technical guidance and training on the performance of educators in improving the quality of student learning this study aims to determine the significant influence of the role of technical guidance and training on the performance of educators in improving the quality of student learning this study uses quantitative methods with the object of this research being teachers and students of elementary school data collection techniques using questionnaires interviews and direct observation of schools the results of hypothesis testing indicate that the first hypothesis h namely technical guidance has an effect on teacher performance is accepted because it has a pvalue of or which is significant the second hypothesis test h namely the training variable that affects teacher performance has a value of which is significant because the value is technical guidance and training activities can improve teacher competence so that the teaching performance of teachers is getting better and ultimately student learning achievement can be improved

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan menganalisis dan mengembangkan Model Pendidikan Multikultural berbasis Digital Literasi untuk Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila Siswa. Pendekatan penelitian menggunakan Research and Development (RD). Ada tiga tahapan dalam penelitian ini: Tahapan pertama, pra pengembangan meliputi: 1) tinjauan literatur mencakup analisis kebutuhan, 2) perencanaan produk. Tahapan kedua, pengembangan draft dengan melakukan uji coba produk, dan perbaikan melalui: (a) uji validasi pakar, (b) uji uji terbatas dan (c) uji lapangan.  Tahapan ketiga implementasi uji Model multilidi sebagai penguatan profil pelajar pancasila. Pada proses pengembangan model, peneitian ini menghasilkan model multilidi dengan sintaks lesson instruction, organize learning, eksploration, closure dan evaluation.
title: Model Multilidi sebagai Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: multilidi model as a strengthening of the profile of Pancasila students This study aims to analyze and develop a multicultural education model based on digital literacy to strengthen the profile of Pancasila students The research approach uses research and development rd There are three stages in this study The first stage pre-development includes a literature review including analysis of product planning needs The second stage is draft development by conducting product trials and improvements through a. expert validation tests b. limited tests and c. field tests The third stage is implementation of the multilidi model test as a strengthening of the profile of Pancasila students In the process of developing this research model, a multilidi model with the syntax lesson instruction organize learning exploration closure and evaluation

desc: Diare merupakan penyakit kedua terbanyak pada anak. Sebagian besar pengobatan diare hanya berfokus pada mengatasi dehidrasi, namun untuk mengurangi frekuensi diare belum jelas. Maka salah satu terapi komplementer adalah dengan menggunakan probiotik yoghurt. Tujuan review ini mengevaluasi efektivitas yoghurt probiotik pada anak dengan diare akut. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode systematic review, menggunakan 4 database: PubMed, CINAHL, EBSCO dan ScienceDirect. Sampel penelitian adalah pasien anak usia di bawah 12 tahun mengalami diare akut, intervensi yang diberikan berupa Pemberian strain bakteri probiotik dan pemberian yogurt serta artikel ditulis dalam Bahasa Inggris dan full text. Hasil pencarian literatur ditentukan 10 artikel. Ditemukan 8 artikel yang menyatakan bahwa pemberian bakteri probiotik dan yoghurt yang mengandung probiotik dan yoghurt plain (non-probiotik) mampu menurunkan frekuensi, durasi dan pencegahan diare pada anak. Kesimpulan penelitian ini menemukan penggunaan probiotik dengan jenis kombinasi multi strain probiotik, maupun single probiotik dengan dosis tertentu terutama bakteri Saccharomyces boulardii dan Lactobaclus rhamnosus dapat membantu mengurangi frekuensi dan durasi diare.
title: Efektifitas Probiotik Yogurt terhadap Kejadian Diare pada Anak Usia Pra-Sekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: effectiveness of probiotic yogurt on diarrhea in preschool children diarrhea is the second most common disease in children most diarrhea treatments only focus on overcoming dehydration but to reduce the frequency of diarrhea is not clear then one of the complementary therapies is to use probiotic yogurt the purpose of this review is to evaluate the effectiveness of probiotic yogurt in children with acute diarrhea this study used a systematic review method using the pubmed cinahl ebsco and sciencedirect databases the study sample was child patients under the age of one year experiencing acute diarrhea the intervention given was in the form of giving probiotic bacterial strains and giving yogurt and articles were written in English and full text the results of the literature search determined the article found an article stating that giving probiotic bacteria and yogurt containing probiotics and plain nonprobiotic yogurt can reduce the frequency duration and prevention of diarrhea in children the conclusion of this study found the use of probiotics with a combination of multi strain probiotics or single probiotics with certain doses especially saccharomyces boulardii and lactobaclus rhamnosus bacteria can help reduce the frequency and duration of diarrhea

desc: Aktivitas fisik bagi anak menjadi penting karena melalui aktivitas fisik anak dapat berlatih untuk mengembangkan kemampuan motorik kasarnya. Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu untuk mengetahui efektivitas permainan outbound sebagai aktivitas fisik untuk mengembangkan motorik kasar pada anak. Anak-anak berpartisipasi dalam pelaksanaan permainan outbound yang didalamnya terdapat lima jenis permainan untuk mengembangkan kemampuan motorik kasar pada anak. Penelitian ini melibatkan 30 anak yang berusia 5-6tahun. Efektivitas permainan outbound dievaluasi dengan metode quasi-experiment dengan one group pretest-postest design. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat pengaruh penggunaan permainan outbound untuk anak usia 5-6 tahun.Implikasi dari penelitian yang dilakukan dengan melaksanakan aktivitas fisik pada anak dapat meningkatkan motivasi anak dalam pembelajaran danmeningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar dalam pendidikan anak usia dini, serta perlunya dilaksanakan aktivitas fisik untuk anak di sekolah.
title: Permainan Outbound untuk Perkembangan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: outbound games for the development of gross motor skills in early childhood physical activity for children is important because through physical activity children can practice to develop their gross motor skills the purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of outbound games as a physical activity to develop gross motor skills in children children participate in the implementation of outbound games which contain five types of games to develop gross motor skills in children this study involved children aged years the effectiveness of outbound games was evaluated using the quasi-experimental method with one group pretest-posttest design the results of the study showed that there was an effect of the use of outbound games for children aged years the implications of the study conducted by implementing physical activities in children can increase children's motivation in learning and improve gross motor skills in early childhood education and the need to implement physical activities for children in schools

desc: Pembelajaran digital yang menawarkan fleksibilitas pembelajaran direspon baik oleh bidang pendidikan salah satunya pembelajaran bahasa Inggris. Praktisi pembelajaran bahasa Inggris yang masih dinilai sukar untuk dipelajari mengintegrasikan teknologi untuk menambah peluang kemudahan dipelajarinya subyek tersebut. Penelitian kualitatif deskriptif ini menggunakan refleksi hasil pengajaran di kelas bahasa Inggris virtual di PHMS School jenjang TK yang melibatkkan 5 siswa dalam sekali pertamuan yang terancang untuk 4 kali pertemuan. Responden yang terlibat sejumlah 9 orang pengajar pada 4 pertemuan belajar bahasa Inggris virtual. Adanya persiapan dan pelaksanaan yang baik pada sisi kolaborasi pengajar, kelengkapan rencana pembelajaran dan antisipasi penggunaan bahasa Inggris mendukung pembelajaran bahasa Inggris virtual. Tersaji pula berbagai komponen bahasa Inggris yang dinilai mudah hingga sukar diajarkan secara virtual legkap dengan strategi penuntasan aktivitas pembelajaran saat itu. Akhirnya, pembelajaran bahasa Inggris virtual untuk anak-anak TK pada rentang usia 4 – 6 tahun di TK tersebut dinilai berjalan dengan baik.
title: Digital English-mediated Instruction: Kajian Reflektif Implementasi Pembelajaran Bahasa Inggris Virtual bagi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: digital englishmediated instruction reflective study of the implementation of virtual English learning for early childhood digital learning that offers learning flexibility is well responded by the education sector, one of which is English learning, English learning practitioners who are still considered difficult to learn, integrating technology to increase opportunities for ease of learning, this descriptive qualitative study uses reflections on the results of teaching in virtual English classes at PHMs School at the kindergarten level which involves students in one meeting that is designed for the time of the meeting, respondents involved a number of teachers at virtual English learning meetings, there is good preparation and implementation on the side of teacher collaboration, completeness of the learning plan and anticipation of the use of English, support virtual English learning, various English components are also presented, which are considered easy to difficult to teach virtually, complete with strategies for completing learning activities at that time, finally virtual English learning for kindergarten children in the age range of years in the kindergarten is considered to be running well

desc: Pandemi covid 19 menjadikan semua jenjang pendidikan termasuk PAUD menghentikan kegiatan pembelajaran secara tatap muka dan berganti dengan sistem daring. Hal ini menimbulkan kekagetan budaya dan kendala dalam proses pembelajaran. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengungkap tipikal kendala mengajar guru PAUD saat pandemi covid 19 dan implikasinya pada kegiatan pembelajaran berbasis konsep normal baru. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode survey. Data penelitian diperoleh secara online menggunakan media google form. Sampel dalam penelitian ini adalah 645 guru yang berada di wilayah Jawa Barat. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa kendala mengajar yang dialami guru PAUD pada masa pandemi covid 19 berada pada empat indikator yaitu kendala komunikasi, metode pembelajaran,materi dan biaya serta penggunaan teknologi dengan kecenderungan prosentase yang tinggi berada pada kategori sering dan kadang-kadang. Tentunya perlu solusi untuk mengatasi masalah ini supaya tidak berdampak secara sistemik serta supaya guru PAUD lebih siap menerapkan kegiatan pembelajaran berbasis konsep normal baru.
title: Tipikal Kendala Guru PAUD dalam Mengajar pada Masa Pandemi Covid 19 dan Implikasinya
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Typical obstacles for early childhood education teachers in teaching during the Covid pandemic and its implications The Covid pandemic has caused all levels of education including early childhood education to stop face-to-face learning activities and switch to an online system. This has caused cultural shock and obstacles in the learning process. The purpose of this study is to reveal the typical obstacles to teaching early childhood education teachers during the Covid pandemic and its implications for learning activities based on the new normal concept. The method used in this study is the survey method. Research data was obtained online using Google Form media. The sample in this study were teachers in the West Java region. The results of the study show that the obstacles to teaching experienced by early childhood education teachers during the Covid pandemic are in four indicators, namely communication obstacles, learning methods, materials and costs, and the use of technology with a tendency for a high percentage to be in the category of often and sometimes. Of course, a solution is needed to overcome this problem so that it does not have a systemic impact and so that early childhood education teachers are more prepared to implement learning activities based on the new normal concept.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan konsep matematika awal pada aspek bilangan dan geometri anak usia 4-5 tahun melalui media papan semat. Penelitian tindakan ini menggunakan prosedur kerja yang dikembangkan oleh Kemmis dan Taggard. Teknik analisis data adalah analisis data kualitatif dan analisis data kuantitatif.Guru kelas sebagai kolaborator bersama peneliti melakukan kegiatan dari proses perencanaan, tindakan, observasi hingga proses evaluasi. Hasil penelitian tidak dapat mengeneralisasi pada setiap permasalahan. Hasil Penelitian ini dapat menyumbangkan pemikiran untuk membantu menjawab permasalahan di PAUD Permata Ibu Ceria Jakarta Timur. Dari penelitian yang dilakukan ada peningkatan yang signifikan terhadap kemampuan matematika awal pada anak usia 4-5 tahun . yaitu ada peningkatan dari pra siklus yang hanya mencapai 26,67 meningkat menjadi 48,53 persen dan meningkat lagi pada siklus II mencapai 72,53 % hingga dapat dinyatakan bahwa penggunaan papan semat dapat memberikan solusi untuk meningkatkan kemampuan konsep matemtika awal anak usia 4-5 di PAUD Permata Ibu Ceria
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Konsep Matematika Awal Anak Usia 4-5 Tahun melalui Media Papan Semat
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving the ability of early mathematical concepts of children aged years through pinboard media this study aims to improve the ability of early mathematical concepts in the aspects of numbers and geometry of children aged years through pinboard media this action research uses work procedures developed by kemmis and taggard data analysis techniques are qualitative data analysis and quantitative data analysis class teachers as collaborators together with researchers carry out activities from the action planning process observation to the evaluation process the results of the study cannot be generalized on every problem the results of this study can contribute ideas to help answer problems in paud permata ibu ceria east jakarta from the research conducted there was a significant increase in early mathematical abilities in children aged years, namely there was an increase from the pre-cycle which only reached an increase to percent and increased again in cycle ii reaching up to it can be stated that the use of pinboards can provide a solution to improve the ability of early mathematical concepts of children aged in paud permata ibu ceria

desc: The diversity of tribes and nations is a necessity of creation, because God Almighty sent his people to learn to live in harmony. The diversity of world culture is shown through the educational process so that it is able to meet the needs of students who do not eliminate local cultural values which is called glocalization. The importance of glocalization is to observe the rise of internal and external intolerance in the name of religion on a local and global scale which has caused divisions from various parties. This research is to find out the criteria and objectives of glocalization of international early childhood Islamic education. This paper aims to explain glocalization in the world of International Early Childhood Islamic Education. This study uses a qualitative phenomenological approach. Data collection techniques using observation, interviews, and documentation. Determination of the source sample by purposive sampling with certain criteria that meet the data needs. Data analysis uses the Miles and Huberman model with data collection, data reduction, data presentation as well as conclusion and verification. These findings indicate that the criteria for glocalization of international Islamic education at the Islamic International School PSM Magetan Indonesia are bi'ah Islamiyah, the language of instruction is English, using international branding. The goal of glocalization of international standard PAUD at the Islamic International School PSM Magetan is to improve spiritual, emotional, intellectual, foster an international spirit without eliminating the spirit of nationalism.
title: Glocalization in International Early Childhood Islamic Education
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Strategi guru merupakan unsur penting dalam proses pembelajaran. Mengenalkan konsep dasar literasi kepada anak usia dini sebagai bekal memasuki jenjang pendidikan selanjutnya, selain itu, anak juga dituntut paham tentang konsep literasi. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui strategi guru untuk mengenalkan konsep dasar literasi di PAUD sebagai persiapan memasuki SD/MI, untuk mengetahui faktor yang mempengaruhi penggunaan strategi dalam mengenalkan konsep dasar literasi di PAUD. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif dengan pendekatan deskriptif, adapun tehnik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi, analisis data menggunakan trianggulasi tehnik dan trianggulasi sumber. Hasil Penelitian menunjukan bahwa guru menggunakan beberapa strategi untuk mengenalkan konsep dasar literasi diantaranya strategi belajar langsung atau melalui bermain, melibatkan anak dalam kegiatan pembelajaran, bermain peran, bercerita, atau mendongeng. adapun faktor yang mempengaruhui guru untuk menggunakan staregi dalam mengenalkan konsep dasar literasi ialah karateristik peserta didik yang berbeda, kemampuan anak masih rendah, tuntutan orang tua dan adanya prasyarat untuk masuk SD/MI.
title: Strategi Guru Mengenalkan Konsep Dasar Literasi di PAUD Sebagai Persiapan Masuk SD/MI
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teacher strategies to introduce basic literacy concepts in early childhood education as preparation for entering SDMI Teacher strategies are an important element in the learning process to introduce basic literacy concepts to early childhood as preparation for entering the next level of education In addition, children are also required to understand the concept of literacy The purpose of this study was to determine teacher strategies to introduce basic literacy concepts in early childhood education as preparation for entering SDMI To determine the factors that influence the use of strategies in introducing basic literacy concepts in early childhood education This study used a qualitative method with a descriptive approach The data collection technique used observation, interviews and documentation Data analysis used triangulation techniques and source triangulation The results of the study showed that teachers used several strategies to introduce basic literacy concepts including direct learning strategies or through play involving children in learning activities Role playing, storytelling or storytelling The factors that influence teachers to use strategies in introducing basic literacy concepts are the characteristics of different students The child's abilities are still low The demands of parents and the existence of prerequisites for entering SDMI

desc: The increase in sexual violence against children makes sex education for early childhood an increasingly serious and urgent subject. It is caused by the lack of educational media for sex education. Puppets are the right media for learning because they can further develop imagination and absorption, and teach children to empathize. This study aimed to find out whether the puppets “Lalu Lintas Pakaianku” were suitable to be used to help parents or teachers provide sex education in early childhood. The Development Research was applied in this study. The results showed that the media of "Lalu Lintas Pakaianku” hand puppet were valid  and the manual book indicated a valid category so that the media could be used as the learning media of sex education in early childhood
title: "Lalu Lintas Pakaianku": Learning Media for Sex Education for Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
