desc: Berdasarkan observasi di TK Melati Indah Pekanbaru, anak kelompok A yang berjumlah 12 orang, diperoleh hasil belajar dalam pembelajaran mengelompokan benda dengan berbagai cara ternyata yang berhasil mengelompokan benda dengan berbagai cara hanya 3 orang anak  (25%) dan yang belum mampu 9 orang anak (75%), hal ini terjadi karena strategi pembalajaran yang diberikan guru kurang bervariasi dan kurang menarik minat anak. Berdasarkan hal tersebut maka perlu diatasi dengan melakukan penelitian tindakan kelas. Lokasi penelitiian tindakan kelas ini dilaksanakan di TK Melati Indah Pekanbaru, subjek yang diteliti adalah siswa TK kelompok A dengan jumlah 12 orang, 7 orang laki-laki, dan 5 orang perempuan, dengan karakteristik kemampuan yang heterogen. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dapat diketahui bahwa ketuntasan belajar anak dalam kegiatan mengelompokan benda menurut bentuk, jenis, warna dan ukuran mengalami peningkatan yaitu pada prasiklus yang mencapai batas ketuntasan 0% dari 12  anak, pada siklus I naik menjadi (8,3%) 1 anak, siklus II naik menjadi (7%) 9 anak yang mencapai batas ketuntasan. Jadi secara keseluruhan penerapan strategi melalui bermain dapat meningkatkan kemampuan anak dalam mengelompokan benda menurut bentuk, jenis warna dan ukuran dalam pengembangan kognitif anak kelompok A di TK N Melati Indah Pekanbaru
title: Upaya Meningkatkan Pemahamann Konsep Mengelompokan  Benda Menurut Bentuk Jenis Ukuran dan Warna Melalui Penerapan Strategi Bermain dalam Pengembangan Koginitif  Siswa Kelompok A  TK Melati Indah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts to improve understanding of the concept of grouping objects according to shape, type, size and color through the application of play strategies in the cognitive development of group A students at Melati Indah Kindergarten based on observations at Melati Indah Kindergarten Pekanbaru, group A children totaling 1,000 people obtained learning outcomes in learning to group objects in various ways, it turned out that only children were successful in grouping objects in various ways and those who were not able to were children. This happened because the learning strategies provided by the teacher were less varied and less interesting for children. Based on this, it was necessary to overcome this by conducting classroom action research. The location of this classroom action research was carried out at Melati Indah Kindergarten Pekanbaru. The subjects studied were group A students with a number of male and female students with heterogeneous ability characteristics. Based on the results of the study, it can be seen that the completeness of children's learning in the activity of grouping objects according to shape, type, color and size increased, namely in the pre-cycle that reached the limit of completeness from children in cycle I to children in cycle II to children who reached the limit of completeness. So overall, the application of strategies through play can improve children's ability to group objects according to shape, type, color and size in the cognitive development of group A children in TK n Jasmine beautiful Pekanbaru

desc: Rentannya bencana alam seperti gunung meletus di Indonesia menjadikan pentingnya edukasi bagi masyarakat khususnya anak sedari dini mungkin. Pperlunya edukasi anak usia dini yang memanfaatkan materi yang menarik serta disesuaikan dengan tahap perkembangannya. Tujuan penelitian ini ialah menyesuaikan kebutuhan pengembangan flashcard mitigasi bencana gunung meletus teruntuk anak usia 5-6 tahun. Jenis penelitian Research and Development (RD) mengaplikasikan model ADDIE melewati dua tahap uji coba, yaitu skala kecil 15 anak TK Islam Tunas Bangsa Yogyakarta dan skala besar 42 anak TK Al Fatah Sedan. Data dikumpulkan melalui berbagai metode, termasuk pengamatan, mewawancarai, penggunaan kuesioner, dan melalui proses validasi ahli, seperti ahli media, materi, instrumen, serta pengevaluasian respons dan deteksi. Selanjutnya, analisis efektivitas data dilaksanakan melalui metode uji Paired T dengan tingkat sig sebesar 0.05. Hasil menunjukkan produk pengembangan media flashcard memiliki keefektifan yang meningkatkan pemahaman anak terkait mitigasi bencana alam gunung meletus teruntuk anak
title: Pengembangan Media Flashcard Mitigasi Bencana Alam Gunung Meletus untuk Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of flashcard media for mitigating natural disasters of volcanic eruptions for children aged years the vulnerability of natural disasters such as volcanic eruptions in Indonesia makes it important to educate the community, especially children, from an early age. The need for early childhood education that utilizes interesting materials and is adjusted to their developmental stage. The purpose of this study is to adjust the needs of developing flashcards for mitigating natural disasters of volcanic eruptions for children aged years. The type of research and development rd applied the addie model through two stages of trials, namely a small scale for children of Islamic kindergarten Tunas Bangsa Yogyakarta and a large scale for children of Al Fatah kindergarten. Data was collected through various methods including observation, interviewing, using questionnaires and through expert validation processes such as media experts, material instruments, and evaluating responses and detection. Furthermore, data effectiveness analysis was carried out using the paired t test method with a sig level of 10. The results showed that the flashcard media development product had an effectiveness that increased children's understanding of mitigating natural disasters of volcanic eruptions for children.

desc: Ketimpangan rasio gender profesi guru mengarah kepada tidak proporsionalnya jumlah guru perempuan dan guru laki – laki. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui tren gender pada guru di tingkat pendidikan TK dan SD di Indonesia. Penulis menggunakan data sekunder mengenai data pokok guru TK dan SD dari semester ganjil tahun ajaran 2020/2021 sampai dengan semester genap tahun ajaran 2022/2023 yang diperoleh dari data Dapodikdasmen (Data Pokok Pendidikan Direktorat Jenderal Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini, Pendidikan Dasar dan Pendidikan Menengah) (Kemendikbud, 2023).  Data diolah dengan menggunakan IBM SPSS software versi 24. Penulis menggunakan presentase dan grafik plot  untuk mengetahui perbandingan jumlah guru dan bagaimana tren data guru TK dan SD di Indonesia berdasarkan gender selama 3 tahun terakhir. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat ketimpangan gender dalam profesi guru yaitu minimnya guru laki-laki pada TK dan SD di Indonesia dan tren menurun untuk guru laki-laki TK dan SD dalam 3 tahun terakhir.
title: Ketimpangan Gender Guru di Taman Kanak-Kanak dan Sekolah Dasar di Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Gender inequality of teachers in kindergartens and elementary schools in Indonesia The gender ratio inequality of the teaching profession leads to a disproportionate number of female and male teachers. This study aims to determine gender trends in teachers at the kindergarten and elementary school levels in Indonesia. The author uses secondary data on basic data for kindergarten and elementary school teachers from the odd semester of the academic year to the even semester of the academic year obtained from Dapodikdasmen data, basic education data, Directorate General of Early Childhood Education, Elementary Education and Secondary Education, Ministry of Education and Culture. The data is processed using IBM SPSS software version. The author uses percentages and plot graphs to determine the comparison of the number of teachers and how the trend of kindergarten and elementary school teacher data in Indonesia is based on gender during the last year. The results of the study indicate that there is gender inequality in the teaching profession, namely the lack of male teachers in kindergartens and elementary schools in Indonesia and a downward trend for male kindergarten and elementary school teachers in the last year.

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini yaitu menentukan perbedaan hasil pencapaian gerak dan lagu neurokinestetik untuk menumbuhkan kreativitas seni anak usia dini menggunakan video gelatik dan video konvensional. Desain penelitian eksperimen yang digunakan adalah nonequevalen control group design. Simpulan penelitian ini adalah: 1) video gelatik terbukti menumbuhkan kreativitas seni anak usia dini, karena adanya perbedaan rata-rata sebelum dan sesudah dilaksanakan penelitian pada kelompok 1; 2) video konvensional terbukti menumbuhkan kreativitas seni anak usia dini, karena ada perbedaan rata-rata hasil pretes dan postes kelompok 2; 3) Hasil pencapaian gerak dan lagu neurokinestetik untuk menumbuhkan kreativitas anak usia dini menggunakan video gelatik lebih besar dari pada Hasil pencapaian gerak dan lagu neuroinestetik untuk menumbuhkan kreativitas anak usia dini menggunakan video konvensional. Saran dalam penelitian ini yaitu dilakukannya penelitian lanjutan tentang video gelatik dengan menggunakan tema yang lain.
title: Gerak dan Lagu Neurokinestetik (GELATIK) untuk Menumbuhkan Kreativitas Seni Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Neurokinesthetic Gelatik Movement and Songs to Foster Early Childhood Artistic Creativity The purpose of this study was to determine the differences in the results of neurokinesthetic movement and song achievements to foster early childhood artistic creativity using Gelatik videos and conventional videos The experimental research design used was nonequivalent control group design The conclusion of this study is that Gelatik videos have been proven to foster early childhood artistic creativity because there is a difference in the average before and after the study was carried out in the conventional video group. It has been proven to foster early childhood artistic creativity because there is a difference in the average pretest and posttest results of the group. The results of neurokinesthetic movement and song achievements to foster early childhood creativity using Gelatik videos are greater than the results of neurokinesthetic movement and song achievements to foster early childhood creativity using conventional videos. The suggestion in this study is to conduct further research on Gelatik videos using other themes.

desc: Kurangnya pemanfaatan media video animasi dalam pembelajaran di kelas sehingga mengurangi ketertarikan anak pada kegiatan, media yang digunakan sifatnya hanya LKA semata. Adapun tujuannya Penelitian ini untuk mengembangkan video animasi yang mana isi video tersebut berkaitan dengan literasi awal pada anak di kelompok B TK Mekar Wangi Kecamatan Kabila Bone Kabupaten Bone Bolango. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah penelitian pengembangan atau Research and Development (R  D). Dengan menggunakan model ADDIE (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, and Evaluation) Watson (1981). Hasil penelitian ditunjukan dengan hasil kelayakan video animasi dalam mengenalkan literasi awal pada uji validasi ahli materi memperoleh hasil 89,6% (Sangat Layak) dan uji validasi media memperoleh hasil 89% (Sangat Layak). Selanjutnya pilot test respon guru mendapatkan persentase 88% (Sangat Layak), sedangkan pada anak mendapatkan skor 4 (Sangat Layak). Terakhir uji coba pemakaian pada guru mendapatkan persentase 95%  (Sangat Layak). Adanya pengembangan media video animasi dengan kategori layak, maka penelitian ini bisa dijadikan acuan dalam pengenalan literasi pada anak usia dini.
title: Pengembangan Video Animasi dalam Mengenalkan Literasi Awal pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of animated videos in introducing early literacy to early childhood lack of utilization of animated video media in classroom learning so that it reduces children's interest in media activities used are only for the purpose of this study to develop animated videos where the content of the video is related to early literacy in children in group b tk mekar wangi, kabila bone district, bone bolango regency the type of research used is development research or research and development r d using the addie analysis design development implementation and evaluation watson model the results of the study are shown by the results of the feasibility of animated videos in introducing early literacy in the expert validation test the material obtained very feasible results and the media validation test obtained very feasible results then the pilot test teacher response got a very feasible percentage while in children got a very feasible score last trial use on teachers got a very feasible percentage the development of animated video media with a feasible category then this study can be used as a reference in introducing literacy to early childhood

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui lebih jauh mengenai pemahaman warga sekolah tentang Manajemen Berbasis Sekolah (MBS), dinamika implementasi MBS, karakteristik MBS dan tindak lanjut program MBS untuk anak usia 6-8 Tahun. Jenis penelitian kualitatif dengan pendekatan studi kasus. Pengumpulan data menggunakan wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian yaitu MIT Al-Ishlah sudah memahami konsep MBS dari adanya keterbukaan dan kemampuan sekolah dalam merumuskan program-program sekolah yaitu program puncak tema belajar konstekstual, program madrasah guru, program gerakan untuk orang tua, program gemayur. Sekolah melakukan tindak lanjut dimulai dari evaluasi program yang memberatkan anak, ketertiban anak, efektivitas pembelajaran, dan program lainnya yang tidak berjalan dengan baik.
title: Implementasi Manajemen Berbasis Sekolah (MBS) pada Kelas Awal di Kota Gorontalo
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Implementation of school-based management mbs in early grades in the city of gorontalo This study aims to find out more about the understanding of school residents about school-based management mbs, the dynamics of mbs implementation, characteristics of mbs and follow-up of mbs programs for children aged 18-24 years, the type of qualitative research with a case study approach, data collection using interviews, observation and documentation, the results of the study are that mit alishlah already understands the concept of mbs from the openness and ability of schools to formulate school programs, namely the peak program, contextual learning themes, madrasah teacher programs, movement programs for parents, gemay programs, schools carry out follow-ups starting from evaluating programs that burden children, child order, effectiveness of learning and other programs that are not running well

desc: This study aimed to determine the implementation of the Balinese congklak game (maciwa) in improving the development of early childhood symbolic thinking. This research was carried out in B1 TK Alit Kirana children in the academic year 2018/2019. This research design was Classroom Action Research using the observation method. The subjects of this classroom action research were 18 students of Group B1 TK Alit Kirana consisting of 10 males and 8 females. The objective of this research was the implementation of the Balinese congklak (maciwa) game to improve the development of symbolic thinking in early childhood. The results obtained in Cycle I showed that, 66.67% had achieved mastery learning, in Cycle II showed that 88.89% had achieved learning completeness. There was an improvement in the development of child symbolic thinking by 22.22% from Cycle I to Cycle II. This means that the implementation of the Balinese congklak game (maciwa) could improve the development of children's symbolic thinking. The Balinese congklak game can be piloted in other areas of development skill in early childhood education
title: Balinese Congklak Games, Maciwa, to Improve the Development of Symbolic Thinking in Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: balinese congklak games maciwa to improve the development of symbolic thinking in early childhood this study aimed to determine the implementation of the balinese congklak game maciwa in improving the development of early childhood symbolic thinking this research was carried out in b tk alit kirana children in the academic year this research design was classroom action research using the observation method the subjects of this classroom action research were students of group b tk alit kirana consisting of males and females the objective of this research was the implementation of the balinese congklak maciwa game to improve the development of symbolic thinking in early childhood the results obtained in cycle i showed that had achieved mastery learning in cycle ii showed that had achieved learning completeness there was an improvement in the development of child symbolic thinking by from cycle i to cycle ii this means that the implementation of the balinese congklak game maciwa could improve the development of children's symbolic thinking the balinese congklak game can be piloted in other areas of development skills in early childhood education

desc: Pendidikan literasi keuangan sejak dini dapat mengembangkan keterampilan yang baik dalam mengelola keuangan di masa dewasa, sehingga penting untuk menanamkan nilai-nilai literasi keuangan syariah pada anak PAUD. Penelitian ini dimaksudkan dengan tujuan menciptakan kerangka pembelajaran literasi keuangan syariah bagi anak berusia 5-6 tahun di Taman Kanak-kanak. Model pengembangannya ialah ADDIE dengan dua tahap uji coba skala terbatas 2 guru dan 15 anak dan skala besar dan uji efektivitas kepada 55 anak dan 6 guru. Teknik pengumpulan dengan wawancara, angket validasi dari ahli materi, ahli media, ahli instrumen, angket respon pengguna, dan daftar cek penilaian. Teknik analisis data dan uji efektivitas dengan uji Paired T Test dengan taraf sig 0,05. Temuan dari penelitian ini mengindikasikan bahwasannya pengembangan model pembelajaran literasi keuangan syariah dengan pendekatan inkuiri terbimbing efektif dalam meningkatkan pemahaman literasi keuangan syariah anak usia 5-6 tahun mengalami perubahan signifikan terhadap pemahaman literasi keuangan syariah anak pada setiap series.
title: Pengembangan Model Pembelajaran Literasi Keuangan Syariah pada Anak Usia Dini di Taman Kanak-kanak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of a sharia financial literacy learning model for early childhood in kindergarten early financial literacy education can develop good skills in managing finances in adulthood so it is important to instill the values ​​of sharia financial literacy in preschool children this study is intended to create a framework for learning sharia financial literacy for children aged years in kindergarten the development model is addie with two stages of limited scale trials of teachers and children and large scale and effectiveness tests for children and teachers collection techniques with interviews questionnaires validation from material experts media experts questionnaire instruments user responses and assessment checklists data analysis techniques and effectiveness tests with paired t-tests with a significant level the findings of this study indicate that the development of a sharia financial literacy learning model with a guided inquiry approach is effective in improving the understanding of sharia financial literacy of children aged years has experienced significant changes in the understanding of children's sharia financial literacy in each series

desc: Permasalahan yang muncul adalah rendahnya kemampuan anak dalam mengenal literasi. Tujuan dari penelitian ini yaitu untuk menghasilkan sebuah produk baru dengan mengembangkan produk yang sudah ada sebelumnya menjadi bentuk kalender meja dan dapat digunakan untuk meningkatkan kemampuan literasi anak usia dini yang menyenangkan. Penelitian ini merupakan jenis penelitian dan pengembangan (Research and Development) dengan melibatkan validator yaitu 2 ahli materi, 1 ahli media, dan menguji kepraktisan penggunaan produk pada 7 guru PAUD. Uji coba produk dilakukan pada 10 anak kelompok A di TK Tunas Bangsa. Teknik analisis data menggunakan uji wilcoxon. Hasil penelitian diperoleh dari validasi kedua ahli materi sebesar 86%, validasi ahli media 92% serta dari 7 responden guru sebesar 92%. Dari uji coba produk memperoleh nilai Asymp (2-tailed) sebesar 0,004  0,05 yang menunjukkan buku cerita big book kalender meja dapat berpengaruh secara signifikan serta efektif dalam meningkatkan kemampuan literasi anak kelompok A di TK Tunas Bangsa
title: Pengembangan Buku Cerita Big Book Kalender Meja dalam Meningkatkan Kemampuan Literasi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of big book desk calendar story books in improving early childhood literacy skills the problem that arises is the low ability of children to recognize literacy the purpose of this study is to produce a new product by developing existing products into a desk calendar form and can be used to improve early childhood literacy skills that are fun this study is a type of research and development research and development involving validators, namely material experts, media experts and testing the practicality of using the product on early childhood education teachers product trials were carried out on group a children at the Tunas Bangsa Kindergarten data analysis technique using the Wilcoxon test the results of the study were obtained from the validation of the two material experts by media expert validation and from teacher respondents by from the product trial obtained an asymp tailed value of which indicates that the big book desk calendar story book can have a significant and effective effect in improving the literacy skills of group a children at the Tunas Bangsa Kindergarten

desc: A very important factor for the child in expressing his emotions is through language. In addition, moral planting should also be implanted in children from an early age. Language for children can be obtained through experience in everyday life. In this phase, the child experiences a stage of language development that can be said to grow rapidly if the method chosen in the learning process is also appropriate. One method that can be an alternative in developing the language for early childhood is to use the method of storytelling. Indirectly through listening activities children can absorb the information that is on the story. Listening to fairy tales involves adding new vocabulary in story elements as well as moral messages, so by this method the child easily accepts the addition of new vocabulary as well as the moral message contained in a story. Through storytelling it will automatically happen value transformation through the behavior and character of the characters in the story. From the exposure that has been described that the method of storytelling in addition to developing language skills of children, this method can also be used as an alternative in instilling moral in children.
title: Analisis Kemampuan Berbahasa dan Penanaman Moral pada Anak Usia Dini  melalui Metode Mendongeng
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of language skills and moral planting in early childhood through the storytelling method a very important factor for the child in expressing his emotions is through language in addition moral planting should also be implanted in children from an early age language for children can be obtained through experience in everyday life in this phase the child experiences a stage of language development that can be said to grow rapidly if the method chosen in the learning process is also appropriate one method that can be an alternative in developing the language for early childhood is to use the method of storytelling indirectly through listening activities children can absorb the information that is on the story listening to fairy tales involves adding new vocabulary in story elements as well as moral so by this method the child easily accepts the addition of new vocabulary as well as the moral message contained in a story through storytelling it will automatically happen value transformation through messages the behavior and character of the characters in the story from the exposure that has been described that the method of storytelling in addition to developing language skills of children this method can also be used as an alternative in instilling morals in children

desc: Berdasarkan observasi awal, guru kelas rendah di sekolah dasar menyusun perangkat pembelajaran ATP (Alur Tujan Pembelajaran), modul ajar dan penliaian untuk menunjang   proses pembelajaran. fungsi Perangkat pembelajaran untuk menjadikan proses mbelajaran terencana dan terarah.  Penelitian ini  bertujuan untuk mengetahui kemampuan guru  alam   menyusun perangkat pembelajaran di ekolah dasar. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini yaitu penelitian kualitatif dengan menggunakan pendekatan naturalistic inqury. Teknik dan instrument pengumpulan data yaitu  wawancara,  observasi  dan  dokumentasi.   Pengujian keabsahan data menggunakan triangulasi sumber dan triangulasi teknik. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan yaitu reduksi data, penyajian data dan penarikan  kesimpulan. Kesimpulan penelitian ini adalah kemampuan guru di kelas rendah dalam menyusun  perangkat pembelajaran yang berupa ATP, modul ajar dan penliaian. dengan mengikuti secara keseluruhan tahapan dan komponen perangkat pembelajaran.
title: Kamampuan Guru dalam Menyusun Perangkat Pembelajaran pada Kurikulum Merdeka Belajar di Kelas Rendah Sekolah Dasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Teachers' ability to compile learning devices in the independent learning curriculum in lower elementary school classes based on initial observations of lower elementary school teachers compiling learning devices atp learning objectives flow teaching modules and assessments to support the learning process the function of learning devices to make the learning process planned and directed this study aims to determine the ability of teachers in compiling learning devices in elementary schools the method used in this study is qualitative research using a naturalistic inquiry approach data collection techniques and instruments, namely interviews, observations and documentation, testing the validity of data using source triangulation and technique triangulation, data analysis techniques used are data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions, the conclusion of this study is the ability of teachers in lower grades to compile learning devices in the form of atp teaching modules and assessments by following all the stages and components of learning devices

desc: In today's era of digital-based learning management, educators must have knowledge and skills in the use of digital technology in teaching and learning activities. This study aims to analyze data on the competence of digital-based portfolio assessment of Early Childhood Care and Education (ECCE) teachers who teach at Kindergarten and Playgroup in the city of Bandung. The research method used was descriptive with a qualitative approach. The research informants included 14 teachers, 3 principals, and 1 vice principal. Data collection techniques used in this study include in-depth interviews, non-participatory observations, documentation studies, and relevant literature. Data analysis techniques used triangulation. The results of the study include: the ECCE educators’ competence of digital-based assessment in Lengkong District, Bandung City, are categorized as low and still needs to be improved. Especially related to the knowledge and skills mastery of digital media assessment tools such as Canva and the like, to support the assessment of students' portfolio in schools. This research recommends the digital-based portfolio assessment of ECCE educators competence improvement both through continuous training and also through the establishment of a joint learning forum.
title: Digital-Based Portfolio Assessment Competence of Early Childhood Educators
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: digitalbased portfolio assessment competence of early childhood educators in today's era of digitalbased learning management educators must have knowledge and skills in the use of digital technology in teaching and learning activities this study aims to analyze data on the competence of digitalbased portfolio assessment of early childhood care and education ecce teachers who teach at kindergarten and playgroup in the city of Bandung the research method used was descriptive with a qualitative approach the research informants included teachers principals and vice principals data collection techniques used in this study include in-depth interviews nonparticipatory observations documentation studies and relevant literature data analysis techniques used triangulation the results of the study include the ecce educators competence of digital-based assessment in lengkong district bandung city are categorized as low and still needs to be improved especially related to the knowledge and skills mastery of digital media assessment tools such as canva and the like to support the assessment of students portfolio in schools this research recommends the digital-based portfolio assessment of educational competence improvement both through continuous training and also through the establishment of a joint learning forum

desc: Anak usia dini memerlukan aktivitas  bergerak untuk mendukung tumbuh kembang. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk menciotakan suatu produk permainan yang menstimulasi kecerdasan kinestetik anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian pengembangan atau Research and Development. Hasil yang dipeoleh dalam penelitian ini adalah menghasilkan produk berupa permainan jump hap. Permainan jump hap terdiri atas tiga zona. Setiap zona memiliki rintangan yang berbeda-beda. Zona petama merupakan zona berlari zig-zag, zona kedua merupakan zona jump hap yakni zona lompatan, dan zona ketiga merupakan zona berjalan meniti di atas papan sederhana. Permainan jump hap dengan serangkaian validasi dinyatakan sangat layak. Validasi dilakukan dengan dua tahapan. Tahap pertama ahli materi memperoleh 80%, ahli media 76%. Tahap kedua ahli materi memperoleh 95,6%, ahli media 92,5 %. Berdasarkan temuan dalam penelitian ini diharapkan menjadi referensi bagi pendidik  berupa kegiatan permainan jump hap untuk menstimulasi kecerdasan kinestetik anak.
title: Permainan Jump Hap sebagai media untuk Menstimulasi Kecerdasan Kinestetik Anak Usia 3-4 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: jump hap game as a medium to stimulate the kinesthetic intelligence of children aged 1-3 years old early childhood requires moving activities to support growth and development the purpose of this study is to create a game product that stimulates the kinesthetic intelligence of early childhood this study uses the research and development method or research and development the results obtained in this study are to produce a product in the form of a jump hap game the jump hap game consists of three zones each zone has different obstacles the first zone is a zigzag running zone the second zone is a jump hap zone, namely the jump zone and the third zone is a walking zone on a simple board jump hap game with a series of validations is declared very feasible validation is carried out in two stages the first stage material experts obtain media experts the second stage material experts obtain media experts based on the findings in this study is expected to be a reference for educators in the form of jump hap game activities to stimulate children's kinesthetic intelligence

desc: This research was motivated by that LKPD in schools is still in the form of handouts that are printed by teachers and distributed to students. The purpose of this research is to produce E-LKPD products using the RADEC-based Nearpod application. This type of research is development research with the ADDIE development model. Research instruments in the form of interviews, questionnaires, tests, and documentation. The research results obtained were Integrated thematic E-LKPD assisted by the RADEC-based Nearpod application in the elementary school stated in the very valid category. In the practicality questionnaire for the teacher's response score and the score for the student's practicality questionnaire in the very practical category. On the effectiveness used the N-Gain score percent test  with the effective category. So, it can be concluded that the developed ELKPD has fulfilled the categories of valid, practical, and effective to improve student learning outcomes.
title: Development of Integrated Thematic Electronic Worksheets With RADEC Learning Model Using Nearpod
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of integrated thematic electronic worksheets with radec learning model using nearpod this research was motivated by that lkpd in schools is still in the form of handouts that are printed by teachers and distributed to students the purpose of this research is to produce elkpd products using the radecbased nearpod application this type of research is development research with the addie development model research instruments in the form of interviews questionnaires tests and documentation the research results obtained were integrated thematic elkpd assisted by the radecbased nearpod application in the elementary school stated in the very valid category in the practicality questionnaire for the teachers response score and the score for the students practicality questionnaire in the very practical category on the effectiveness used the ngain score percent test with the effective category so it can be concluded that the developed elkpd has been fulfilled the categories of valid practical and effective to improve student learning outcomes

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh pembelajaran ICT dan minat belajar terhadap kesiapan membaca, menggunakan pendekatan kuantitatif dengan metode eksperimen. Populasi penelitian seluruh anak TK B usia 5-6 tahun di Kabupaten Pasaman Barat. Teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan multistage random sampling. Teknik analisis data menggunakan ANAVA. Hasil penelitian menemukan bahwa 1) Terdapat perbedaan kesiapan membaca anak yang menggunakan pembelajaran ICT berbasis interaktif dan berbasis non interaktif. Hasil perhitungan ?= 0,05 di peroleh Fhitung untuk pembelajaran ICT sebesar 5,849 sedangkan Ftabel 4,11. 2) Terdapat perbedaan kesiapan membaca antara anak yang memiliki minat belajar tinggi dan minat belajar rendah. Hasil perhitungan ?= 0,05 diperoleh Fhitung untuk minat belajar sebesar 4,588 sedangkan Ftabel 4,11. 3) Pengaruh interaksi pembelajaran ICT dan minat belajar terhadap kesiapan membaca anak. Hasil perhitungan ?= 0,05 diperoleh Fhitung  Ftabel (74,602  4,11). Dampak dari penelitian ini adalah guru lebih memahami cara penggunaan pembelajaran ICT pada anak usia dini.
title: Pengaruh Pembelajaran ICT dan Minat Belajar terhadap Kesiapan Membaca Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of ICT learning and learning interest on the reading readiness of early childhood children This study aims to determine the influence of ICT learning and learning interest on reading readiness using a quantitative approach with an experimental method The population of the study was all children of kindergarten B aged 18-24 years in West Pasaman Regency The sampling technique used multistage random sampling The data analysis technique used ANOVA The results of the study found that there was a difference in the reading readiness of children who used interactive and non-interactive ICT-based learning The calculation results obtained fcount for ICT learning of while ftable There is a difference in reading readiness between children who have high learning interest and low learning interest The calculation results obtained fcount for learning interest of while ftable The effect of the interaction of ICT learning and learning interest on children's reading readiness The calculation results obtained fcount ftable The impact of this study is that teachers better understand how to use ICT learning in early childhood

desc: Perkembangan empati dan kreativitas pada anak usia dini perlu mendapat perhatian. Hal ini memerlukan kerjasama antara sekolah, orangtua dan anak didik. Tujuan penelitian adalah untuk menggambarkan bentuk dan upaya KB Salam mewujudkan interkonektivitas tiga elemen tersebut dan berdampak positif terhadap tumbuhnya kreativitas dan empati pada anak usia dini. Metode penelitian menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif etnografi untuk mengungkap fakta tentang pembelajaran di KB Salam dan berdampak pada perkembangan empati dan kreaitivitas anak usia dini. Subjek penelitian adalah pendiri, pengelola, fasilitator, dan orangtua di KB Salam. Tehnik pengumpulan adalah wawancara, observasi dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa KB Salam mengembangkan kurikulum pembelajaran berdimensi lokal berdasarkan filosofi dan konteks sosial budaya. Pembelajaran di KB Salam menciptakan habitus komunitas belajar dengan cara pendayagunaan metode pembelajaran yang bersinergi dengan interaksi sosial keseharian antara guru, anak didik dan orangtua. Keterlibatan orangtua dalam proses pembelajaran di sekolah untuk mengembangkan empati dan kreativitas pada anak usia dini dilahirkan oleh lingkungan sosial yang disebut sekolah keluarga.
title: Sekolah Keluarga: Menciptakan Lingkungan Sosial untuk Membangun Empati dan Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Family school creates a social environment to build empathy and creativity in early childhood The development of empathy and creativity in early childhood needs attention This requires cooperation between the school, parents and students The purpose of the study is to describe the form and efforts of KB Salam to realize the interconnectivity of the three elements and have a positive impact on the growth of creativity and empathy in early childhood The research method uses a qualitative ethnographic approach to reveal facts about learning in KB Salam and its impact on the development of empathy and creativity in early childhood The research subjects are the founders, managers, facilitators and parents in KB Salam The collection technique is interviews, observations and documentation The results of the study show that KB Salam develops a local-dimensional learning curriculum based on the philosophy and socio-cultural context of learning in KB Salam creates a habitus of a learning community by utilizing learning methods that synergize with daily social interactions between teachers, students and parents The involvement of parents in the learning process at school to develop empathy and creativity in early childhood is born from a social environment called family school

desc: Perkembangan globalisasi memberikan dampak kurang baik terhadap kehidupan keluarga suku Sasak, karena terjadi maraknya eksploitasi anak dan minimnya perhatian orangtua terhadap pendidikan anak, terutama pada aspek pengasuhan orangtua dalam lingkungan keluarga. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan sistem sosial dan pengasuhan anak pada keluarga suku Sasak dalam perspektif kebudayaan lokal. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode etnografi untuk memperoleh informasi tujuan penelitian. Informan dalam penelitian ini melibatkan tokoh adat, tokoh masyarakat, dan anggota keluarga. Analisis data menggunakan analisis domain, taksonomik, komponen, dan tema budaya. Hasil penelitian menemukan bahwa keluarga suku Sasak menggunakan sistem patrilineal, namun pelaksanaan peran dan fungsi keluarga lebih didominasi oleh peran seorang ibu. Pengasuhan anak diaplikasikan mulai dari bedede sebagai cara untuk mencurahkan perhatian, kasih sayang, dan cinta orangtua kepada anak. Bedêngah sebagai tindakan melepaskan anak untuk belajar dari segala sesuatu. Kemudian memautang dilaksanakan sebagai upaya orangtua mengajarkan dan mengenalkan anak lingkungan dan peran sosialnya.
title: Sistem Sosial dan Pengasuhan Anak pada Keluarga Suku Sasak dalam Perspektif Kebudayaan Lokal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Social system and childcare in Sasak family from local cultural perspective Globalization development has negative impact on Sasak family life because there is rampant exploitation of children and minimal attention from parents to children's education, especially in the aspect of parenting in the family environment This study aims to describe the social system and childcare in Sasak family from local cultural perspective This study uses a qualitative approach with ethnographic methods to obtain information on research objectives The informants in this study involved traditional figures, community figures and family members Data analysis used taxonomic domain analysis of cultural components and themes The results of the study found that Sasak family uses a patrilineal system, but the implementation of family roles and functions is more dominated by the role of a mother Childcare is applied starting from bedede as a way to pour out parental attention, affection and love for children Bedêngah as an act of releasing children to learn from everything Then memutang is implemented as an effort by parents to teach and introduce children to their environment and social roles

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengevaluasi implementasi peraturan menteri No. 137 tahun 2014 tentang dan No. 146 tahun 2014 tentang kurikulum pendidikan anak usia dini di Kelurahan Air Tawar Barat Kota Padang. Subjek penelitian adalah lembaga PAUD di Kelurahan Air Tawar Barat Kota Padang. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini menggunakan evaluasi CIPPO dan tipe penelitian deskriptif. Informan penelitian yakni kepala sekolah sebagai informan utama, serta bagian tenaga administrasi sebagai informan triangulasi. Teknik pengumpulan data penelitian adalah wawancara, observasi, dan analisis dokumen. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa, implementasi Permendikbud No. 146 Tahun 2014 telah terlaksana dan Permendikbud No.137 Tahun 2014 secara keseluruhan belum terpenuhi secara optimal, seperti terdapat pada pengadaan sarana prasarana sekolah yang tidak terpenuhi, tidak memadai, dan tidak aman di digunakan oleh anak usia ini. Evaluasi CIPPO digunakan sebagai pengoptimalan kelemahan dari penerapan permendikbud No. 137 tahun 2014 pada beberapa lembaga PAUD di Kelurahan Air Tawar Barat Kota Padang.
title: Penerapan Model Evaluasi CIPPO dalam Mengevaluasi Penyelenggaraan Lembaga PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of the Cippo evaluation model in evaluating the implementation of early childhood education institutions This study aims to evaluate the implementation of Ministerial Regulation No. 2009 concerning and No. 2009 concerning the curriculum for early childhood education in the Air Tawar Barat sub-district, Padang City. The subject of the study was the early childhood education institution in the Air Tawar Barat sub-district, Padang City. The method used in this study used the Cippo evaluation and descriptive research type. The research informants were the principal as the main informant and the administrative staff as the triangulation informant. The research data collection technique was interviews, observations and document analysis. The results of the study showed that the implementation of the Permendikbud No. 2009 had been carried out and the Permendikbud No. 2009 as a whole had not been optimally fulfilled, such as in the procurement of school facilities and infrastructure that were not met, inadequate and unsafe for use by children of this age. The Cippo evaluation was used to optimize the weaknesses of the implementation of the Permendikbud No. 2009 in several early childhood education institutions in the Air Tawar Barat sub-district, Padang City.

desc: Salah satu upaya pencegahan infeksi STH ini adalah dengan penggunaan obat cacing secara rutin.Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui gambaran pengetahuan ibu tentang penggunaan obat cacing pada anak usia 1-4 tahun di desa narawita Kecamatan Cicalengka. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah studi deskriptif. Populasi dari penelitian ini adalah semua ibu yang memiliki anak usia 1-4 tahun sebanyak 379 ibu. Sementara sampel penelitian ini berjumlah 84 orang. Teknik penarikan sampel menggunakan simple random sampling. Analisa data menggunakan analisa univariate. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pengetahuan ibu dengan balita berusia 1-4 tahun di Desa Narawita Kecamatan Cicalengka tentang penggunaan obat cacing pada anak hampir setengahnya termasuk dalam kategori baik, ibu yang memiliki pengetahuan cukup dan pengetahuan kurang, hanya sebagian Kecil,. Peran perawat dalam hal ini sebagai edukator, serta promotor pencegahan dan pengendalian infeksi STH dengan peningkatan pengetahuan dan kesadaran masyarakat ataupun pemberi asuhan keperawatan.
title: Pengetahuan Ibu Tentang Penggunaan Obat Cacing pada Anak Usia 1-4 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Mother's knowledge about the use of deworming drugs in children aged years one of the efforts to prevent this sth infection is by using deworming drugs routinely the purpose of this study was to determine the description of mother's knowledge about the use of deworming drugs in children aged years in narawita village, cicalengka sub-district the research method used was a descriptive study the population of this study were all mothers who had children aged years as many as mothers while the sample of this study was people the sampling technique used simple random sampling data analysis used univariate analysis the results of the study showed that the knowledge of mothers with toddlers aged years in narawita village, cicalengka sub-district about the use of deworming drugs in children almost half were included in the category of mothers who had sufficient knowledge and knowledge lacking only a small part the role of nurses in this case as educators and promoters of prevention and control of sth infections by increasing public knowledge and awareness or nursing care providers

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah menghasilkan suatu model pembelajaran bercerita tematik perkembangan bahasa (BTPB) yang dapat peningkatkan keterampilan bahasa anak. Khususnya keterampilan menyimak dan berbicara. Pengembangan ini menggunakan model ADDIE (analysis, desaign, development, implementation dan evaluation) dengan empat  tahapan penelitian yaitu 1) Tahap Need Analyze; 2) tahap perancangan;  3) tahap pengembangan 4) tahap implimentasi. Validasi prodak dilakukan oleh ahli bahasa, pakar AUD dengan mengunak angket, lembar instrument observasi dan dokumentasi. Sampel penelitian yaitu TK Adabiah dan TK Adzkia. Responden penelitian terdiri dari 8 orang guru.  Berdasarkan hasil validasi ahli diperoleh penilaian dari aspek kelayakan, kebahasaan, kegrafikan  dan azas manfaat  dengan kriteria sangat valid. Hasil uji coba penelitian penggunaan model BTPB terdapat peningkatan keterampilan menyimak dan berbicara pada kelas eksperimen dari pada anak kelas control, dengan demikian model PTPB dinyatakan layak untuk digunakan dalam pembelajaran di AUD
title: Model Bercerita  untuk Peningkatan Keterampilan Menyimak dan Berbicara Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Storytelling model to improve listening and speaking skills of children aged years The purpose of this study is to produce a thematic storytelling learning model for language development btpb which can improve children's language skills, especially listening and speaking skills This development uses the addie analysis design development implementation and evaluation model with four stages of research, namely the need analysis stage, the design stage, the development stage, the implementation stage, product validation is carried out by language experts, auditory experts using a questionnaire, observation instrument sheets and documentation, the research sample is TK Adabiah and TK Adzkia, the research respondents consist of teachers based on the results of expert validation, an assessment is obtained from the aspects of linguistic feasibility, graphics and the principle of benefit with very valid criteria, the results of the trial of the research using the btpb model, there is an increase in listening and speaking skills in the experimental class compared to children in the control class, thus the ptpb model is declared suitable for use in learning in auditory

desc: Pandemi Covid-19 mengharuskan anak Belajar Dari Rumah (BDR). Situasi ini memberikan pengaruh terhadap aktivitas pembelajaran anak, termasuk pembelajaran sains. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui bentuk dari kegiatan sains apa saja yang diterapkan guru pada kegiatan pembelajaran pasca pandemi serta kendala yang dihadapinya. Pada penelitian ini juga ingin melihat sinkronisasi atas kegiatan yang telah anak lakukan di rumah dengan kegiatan nanti saat pertemuan tatap muka dilaksanakan. Penelitian ini dilakukan menggunakan metode survey dengan pendekatan kuantitatif yang melibatkan 462 guru PAUD di Jawa Barat. Perolehan data penelitian didapatkan menggunakan instrumet berupa soal kuisioner mengenai pembelajaran sains di PAUD yang dikumpulkan secara online melalui media googleform. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pembelajaran sains dilaksanakan pada seluruh tema pembelajaran PAUD. Kegiatan sains yang paling banyak digunakan yaitu kegiatan mencampur warna dan merawat tanaman. Manfaat dari kegiatan sains yang paling tinggi adalah meningkatkan rasa ingin tahu. Selanjutnya, kendala yang paling banyak dirasakan yaitu operasional yang kurang mendukung. Maka, upaya sinkronisasi pembelajaran pasca pandemi dapat dilakukan dengan tetap menggunakan hal-hal yang mampu memunculkan keunggulan-keunggulan dari pembelajaran online pada pembelajaran offline seperti penggunaan teknologi dalam pembelajaran.
title: Penguatan Pembelajaran Sains di PAUD Saat dan Pasca Belajar dari Rumah (BDR)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Strengthening science learning in early childhood education during and after learning from home bdr the covid pandemic requires children to learn from home bdr this situation has an impact on children's learning activities including science learning the purpose of this study is to find out what forms of science activities are applied by teachers in post-pandemic learning activities and the obstacles they face in this study also want to see the synchronization of activities that children have done at home with activities later when face-to-face meetings are carried out this study was conducted using a survey method with a quantitative approach involving early childhood education teachers in West Java the acquisition of research data was obtained using an instrument in the form of a questionnaire regarding science learning in early childhood education which was collected online through the googleform media the results of the study show that science learning is carried out on all early childhood education learning themes the most widely used science activities are mixing colors and caring for plants the benefits of the highest science activities are increasing curiosity then the most widely felt obstacle is the operational that is less supportive so efforts to synchronize post-pandemic learning can be done by continuing to use things that can bring out the advantages of online learning in offline learning such as the use of technology in learning

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pelaksanaan kegiatan membatik ecoprint pada anak usia dini dengan rentang usia 4-6 tahun. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Observasi dilakukan dengan melakukan pengamatan secara langsung terhadap peserta didik mulai dari sosialisasi hingga pelaksanaan. Teknik pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan melalui observasi, dokumentasi dan wawancara. Hasil penelitian dari kegiatan ecoprint ini adalah mengenalkan kepada peserta didik teknik dalam membatik dengan memanfaatkan bahan-bahan alam. Kegiatan ini merupakan bagian dari struktur kurikulum kokuler yaitu Proyek Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila sebagai upaya penghayatan nilai-nilai Pancasila dengan menghargai dan melestarikan kebudayaan Indonesia salah satunya melalui pengenalan teknik membatik ecoporint. Melalui kegiatan membatik ecoprint nilai-nilai pada elemen berkebhinekaan global muncul karakter Mengenali identitas diri dan kebiasaan-kebiasaan budaya dalam keluarga, Mengenal identitas orang lain dan kebiasaan-kebiasaannya, Membiasakan untuk menghormati budaya-budaya yang berbeda dari dirinya.
title: Implementasi Proyek Penguatan Profil Pelajar Pancasila melalui Kegiatan Membatik Ecoprint
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of the project to strengthen the profile of Pancasila students through ecoprint batik activities This study aims to determine the implementation of ecoprint batik activities in early childhood with an age range of years The research method used is descriptive qualitative observation is carried out by conducting direct observation of students starting from socialization to implementation Data collection techniques are carried out through observation, documentation and interviews The results of the study from this ecoprint activity are to introduce students to batik techniques by utilizing natural materials This activity is part of the co-curricular curriculum structure, namely the Pancasila student profile strengthening project as an effort to appreciate the values ​​of Pancasila by respecting and preserving Indonesian culture, one of which is through the introduction of ecoprint batik techniques through ecoprint batik activities The values ​​in the elements of global diversity emerge, the character recognizes self-identity and cultural habits in the family, recognizes the identity of others and their habits, gets used to respecting cultures that are different from themselves

desc: Anak merupakan pewaris peradaban. Mereka perlu dipersiapkan guna melanjutkan nilai-nilai luhur menjadi penerus. Untuk itu anak-anak perlu mengenal lingkungan dirinya, memahami sosial dan budaya sebagai jari dirinya. Pengenalan budaya dalam bingkai literasi budaya perlu dilakukan kepada anak-anak agar mereka mamahami budaya leluhurnya yang penuh dengan nilai kearifan. Desa Jatisura memiliki karifan lokal salah satunya memuliakan tanah sehingga menjadi sumber kehidupan dan penghidupan masyarakatnya. Hal ini perlu diwariskan kepada anak-anak di Jatisura. Proses literasi budaya ini penting untuk diteliti dengan tujuan untuk mengungkap pengembangan literasi budaya lokal di desa Jatisura. Informasi digali dari sejumlah informan yaitu kepala Desa, tokoh masyarakat, JAF, Guru dan masyarakat.  Metode penelitian deskriptif analitik dengan pendekatan fenomenologi untuk mengungkap proses literasi budaya lokal di desa Jatisura. Hasil penelitian mengungkap bahwa upaya literasi budaya lokal di Desa Jatisura dilakukan dengan inisiasi JAF (Jatiwangi Art Factori) yang mengajarkan nilai-nilai kearifan lokal dalam rangka literasi budaya melalui : (1) Program Edukasi; (2) Wahana Ekspresi; (3) Apresiasi Karya; (4) Identifikasi nilai-nilai kearifan lokal; dan (5) Implementasi nilai-nilai kearifan lokal.
title: Literasi Budaya Lokal bagi Anak di Desa Jatisura
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: local cultural literacy for children in jatisura village children are the heirs of their civilization they need to be prepared to continue the noble values ​​to become successors for that children need to know their environment understand social and culture as their fingers introduction of culture in the framework of cultural literacy needs to be done to children so that they understand the culture of their ancestors which is full of values ​​of wisdom jatisura village has local wisdom one of which is honoring the land so that it becomes a source of life and livelihood of its people this needs to be passed on to children in jatisura this cultural literacy process is important to study with the aim of revealing the development of local cultural literacy in jatisura village information was obtained from a number of informants, namely the village head community leaders jaf teachers and the community descriptive analytical research method with a phenomenological approach to reveal the process of local cultural literacy in jatisura village the results of the study revealed that efforts to local cultural literacy in jatisura village were carried out with the initiation of jaf jatiwangi art factory which teaches local wisdom values ​​in the context of cultural literacy through educational programs a vehicle for expressing appreciation of works identification of local wisdom values ​​and implementation of local wisdom values

desc: Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui pelaksanaan pendidikan al-Islam dan Kemuhammadiyahan pada anak usia dini, serta hambatan-hambatan yang dialami guru dalam pembelajaran. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif. Partisipan terdiri dari kepala, guru, dan siswa Bustanul Athfal Aisyiyah Kabupaten Ponorogo. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan wawancara mendalam, observasi dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pendidikan al-Islam dan Kemuhammadiyah di Bustanul Athfal Aisyiyah Kabupaten Ponorogo dilakukan melalui program pembiasaan, meliputi: 1) membaca iqra; 2) mengucapkan janji Bustanul Athfal; 3) menyanyikan lagu Aisyiyah dan Kemuhammadiyah; 4) mengerjakan shalat dhuha berjamaah; 5) berdzikir bersama; dan 6) menghafal surat-surat pendek, hadits dan doa sehari-hari. Adapun hambatan-hambatan guru dalam pembelajarannya, yaitu: 1) pengucapan anak masih pelan dan kurang jelas; 2) kurang fashih bacaan; 3) suka bercanda sendiri dan sulit dikendalikan; dan 4) masih suka mainan. Singkatnya, penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa program-program pembiasaan sangat penting dan menjadi salah satu kunci keberhasilan pendidikan al-Islam dan Kemuhammadiyahan pada anak usia dini.
title: Pendidikan Al-Islam dan Kemuhammadiyahan pada Anak Usia Dini  di Bustanul Athfal Aisyiyah Ponorogo
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Islamic and Muhammadiyah education for early childhood in Bustanul Athfal Aisyiyah Ponorogo The purpose of this study was to determine the implementation of Islamic and Muhammadiyah education for early childhood and the obstacles experienced by teachers in learning. This study used a qualitative method. Participants consisted of the head teacher and students of Bustanul Athfal Aisyiyah, Ponorogo Regency. Data collection was carried out through in-depth interviews, observation and documentation. The results of the study showed that Islamic and Muhammadiyah education in Bustanul Athfal Aisyiyah, Ponorogo Regency was carried out through a habituation program including reading Iqra, saying the Bustanul Athfal promise, singing Aisyiyah and Muhammadiyah songs, performing Dhuha prayers in congregation, dhikr together, and memorizing short letters, hadiths and daily prayers. The obstacles for teachers in their learning were that children's pronunciation was still slow and unclear, not fluent in reading, liked to joke around and were difficult to control, and still liked to play. In short, the study revealed that habituation programs were very important and were one of the keys to the success of Islamic and Muhammadiyah education for early childhood.

desc: Berdasarkan hasil studi pendahuluan yang penulis lakukan ditemukan beberapa hal yang melatarbelakangi penelitian ini yaitu masih terbatasnya penggunaan multimedia pembelajaran nilai agama dan moral, metode pembelajaran kurang bervariasi, dan pembelajaran masih menggunakan lembar kerja siswa sehingga perlu inovasi multimedia pembelajaran yang menarik dan menyenangkan. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah menghasilkan multimedia pembelajaran permainan edukatif yang teruji validitasnya, kepraktisannya, keefektifannya. Metode penelitian menggunakan kombinasi pengembangan model Alessi  Trollip dan evaluasi formatif dari Tessmer. Produk multimedia pembelajaran divalidasi oleh ahli para ahli yaitu ahli materi dan media kemudian diujicobakan penggunaannya dalam uji coba individu, kelompok kecil, dan lapangan untuk menguji kepraktisan dan keefektifan penggunaannya. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa multimedia pembelajaran yang dikembangkan teruji validitas, praktikalitas, dan efektifitasnya dibuktikan dengan hasil 93,57% kategori baik sekali. Dengan demikian pengembangan multimedia pembelajaran permaianan edukatif yang dikembangkan  dinyatakan valid, praktis, dan efektif.
title: Multimedia Pembelajaran  Permainan Edukatif untuk Mengembangkan Aspek Nilai Agama dan Moral Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: multimedia learning educational games to develop aspects of religious and moral values ​​in early childhood based on the results of the preliminary study conducted by the author, several things were found that underlie this research, namely the limited use of multimedia learning religious and moral values, learning methods are less varied and learning still uses student worksheets so that interesting and enjoyable multimedia learning innovations are needed, the purpose of this study is to produce multimedia learning educational games that have been tested for their validity, practicality, and effectiveness, the research method uses a combination of the development of the Alessi Trolip model and formative evaluation of Tessmer, multimedia learning products are validated by experts, namely material and media experts, then their use is tested in individual trials, small groups and in the field to test their practicality and effectiveness, the results of the study show that the developed multimedia learning has been tested for its validity, practicality and effectiveness, as evidenced by the results of the very good category, thus the development of multimedia learning educational games that are developed is declared valid, practical and effective

desc: Komunikasi merupakan hal yang sangat penting dalam kegiatan belajar mengajar. Beberapa peserta didik di PAUD PKBM Mentari mengalami permasalahan dalam belajar yang berakibat pada prestasi belajar mereka yang semakin menurun. Penelitian ini bertujuan mendeskripsikan pengaruh efektivitas komunikasi guru terhadap motivasi belajar anak usia dini di PAUD PKBM Mentari Kayaarta, Klaten, Jawa Tengah. Metode yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kuantitaif, sampel berjumlah 30 orang warga belajar PAUD PKBM Mentari, pengumpulan data menggunakan angket. Teknik analisis data menggunakan regresi linier sederhana dengan uji t. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan ? = 1,36 + 0,99X. Hasil uji hipotesis dengan uji t diperoleh nilai  yaitu 12,935  1,697. Artinya Efektivitas komunikasi tutor berdampak terhadap Motivasi Belajar anak usia dini di PAUD PKBM Mentari Kayaarta. Hasil temuan dalam penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa Semakin efektif komunikasi tutor kepada anak usia dini, semakin meningkat motivasi mereka untuk mengikuti semua proses pembelajaran.
title: Efektivitas Komunikasi Guru terhadap Motivasi Belajar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The effectiveness of teacher communication on early childhood learning motivation. Communication is a very important thing in teaching and learning activities. Several students at PAUD PKBM Mentari experience problems in learning which result in their decreasing learning achievement. This study aims to describe the effect of teacher communication effectiveness on early childhood learning motivation at PAUD PKBM Mentari Kayaarta Klaten Central Java. The method used is descriptive quantitative. The sample size is 1,000 people. PAUD PKBM Mentari students. Data collection uses a questionnaire. Data analysis techniques use simple linear regression with the t test. The results of the study show + x. The results of the hypothesis test with the t test obtained a value of 0, which means that the effectiveness of tutor communication has an impact on early childhood learning motivation at PAUD PKBM Mentari Kayaarta. The findings in this study indicate that the more effective the tutor's communication is to early childhood children, the more their motivation to follow all learning processes increases.

desc: Creativity is the ability to think of something in a new and unusual way then give a unique solution to the problem around us. The role of creativity is increasingly considered very important in the 21st century marked by very fast changes and increasingly complex challenges. So that creativity must be developed early through learning conducted in an integrated manner. This research method is descriptive qualitative with the data source from a classroom teachers and the principal of TK Kanisius Sorowajan on 8th of September 2018. The data collecting procedures are observation, interview and documentation. The data analysis activity included of data reduction, data display, and verification. The results showed that basically, every child was born creative. However, if given stimulus and treatement, the creativity would develop more and more. Creativity development carried out in Kanisius Sorowajan Kindergarten varies by integrating science, art, language, religion and IT learning in developing children's creativity integrally.
title: Story Telling Using Madihin: Learning Methods for Early Childhood Listening Skills
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: The Implementation of online thematic learning during the Covid-19 pandemic created significant obstacles for teachers, students and parents. This research is focused on the implementation of thematic learning in elementary schools. This research is focused on the implementation of thematic learning in elementary schools in the DKI Jakarta, Depok, and Tangerang areas, with research sub-focus: 1) Teachers' understanding of implementing thematic learning in elementary schools, 2) Teacher obstacles in implementing thematic during a pandemic. Research using descriptive qualitative research. The survey was conducted on 48 teacher respondents, namely class I and II teachers in five schools in the Jakarta, Depok and Tangerang areas. Data collection was carried out through focus group discussions between researchers, teachers and school principals. The results showed that the teacher's constraints in carrying out thematic learning were teaching materials, time constraints, and when online learning was not optimal so that when offline they had to repeat lessons given online. The implication of this research is that it can provide information and knowledge for education practitioners in implementing ideal online learning and obstacles during the Covid-19 pandemic, so that it can be a way out if similar obstacles occur in the future.
title: Map of Thematic Learning at Elementary School in the Pandemic Period (Study at Jakarta, Depok, dan Tangerang Areas)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: map of thematic learning at elementary school in the pandemic period study at jakarta depok and tangerang areas the implementation of online thematic learning during the covid pandemic created significant obstacles for teachers students and parents this research is focused on the implementation of thematic learning in elementary schools this research is focused on the implementation of thematic learning in elementary schools in the DKI Jakarta Depok and Tangerang areas with research subfocus teachers understanding of implementing thematic learning in elementary schools teacher obstacles in implementing thematic during a pandemic research using descriptive qualitative research the survey was conducted on teacher respondents namely class i and ii teachers in five schools in the jakarta depok and tangerang areas data collection was carried out through focus group discussions between researchers teachers and school principals the results showed that the teachers constraints in carrying out thematic learning were teaching materials time constraints and when online learning was not optimal so that when offline they had to repeat lessons given online the implication of this research is that it can provide information and knowledge for education practitioners in implementing ideal online learning and obstacles during the covid pandemic so that it can be a way out if similar obstacles occur in the future

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui proses implementasi pembelajaran gerak dan lagu untuk meningkatkan kreativitas anak usia 5-6 tahun. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah penelitian tindakan model Kemmis dan Mc. Taggart. Subjek penelitian anak usia 5-6 tahun di TK Islam Tasya Cibinong. Analisis data pada penelitian ini menggunakan deskriptif kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan pra siklus yang dilakukan mendapat nilai 36,036%, setelah siklus I terjadi peningkatan 45,85% dan siklus II sebesar 71,058%. Hal ini menunjukkan bahwa kreativitas anak meningkat dengan baik melalui pembelajaran gerak dan lagu. Pembelajaran gerak dan lagu memiliki pengaruh yang sangat penting untuk perkembangan anak, salah satunya kreativitas.
title: Meningkatkan Kreativitas Anak Usia Dini melalui Pembelajaran Gerak dan Lagu
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Increasing the creativity of early childhood through movement and song learning The purpose of this study was to determine the process of implementing movement and song learning to increase the creativity of children aged years The research method used was the Kemmis and MC Taggart model action research The research subjects were children aged years in Tasya Cibinong Islamic Kindergarten Data analysis in this study used qualitative and quantitative descriptive The results of the study showed that the pre-cycle carried out received a value after cycle I there was an increase and cycle II by this shows that children's creativity increases well through movement and song learning Movement and song learning has a very important influence on children's development, one of which is creativity

desc: Penggunaan Smartphone pada anak usia dini memiliki dampak positif dan negatif. Maka dari itu orang tua perlu memiliki kemampuan meregulasi penggunaan smartphone yang baik untuk meminimalisir terjadinya dampak negatif. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengkategorisasi tingkat kemampuan orang tua dalam meregulasi penggunaan smartphone pada anak usia dini serta mengidentifikasi item pengukuran kemampuan orang tua yang teridentifikasi belum optimal dalam meregulasi penggunaan smartphone pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kuantitatif deskriptif dengan subjek penelitian sebanyak 56 orang tua anak usia dini. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah kuantitatif deskriptif kategori. Hasil analisis menunjukan bahwa terdapat 70% orang tua memiliki kemampuan meregulasi penggunaan smartphone sangat tinggi, 23% dengan kemampuan tinggi, sedangkan sisanya 7% memiliki kemampuan sedang. Berdasarkan hasil analisis pada capaian skor terhadap 45 item pengukuran, terdapat 67% yang teridentifikasi sangat tinggi, 22% item masuk dalam kategori tinggi, dan 11% item masuk dalam kategori sedang
title: Tingkat Kemampuan Orang Tua dalam Meregulasi Penggunaan Smartphone pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: level of parental ability in regulating smartphone use in early childhood smartphone use in early childhood has positive and negative impacts therefore parents need to have good smartphone use regulation skills to minimize negative impacts this study aims to categorize the level of parental ability in regulating smartphone use in early childhood and identify items for measuring parental ability that are identified as not optimal in regulating smartphone use in early childhood this study is a descriptive quantitative study with research subjects as many as parents of early childhood the data analysis technique used is descriptive quantitative the category of analysis results shows that there are parents who have very high smartphone use regulation skills with high skills while the rest have moderate skills based on the results of the analysis on the achievement of scores on measurement items there are those identified as very high items fall into the high category and items fall into the moderate category

desc: Penilaian dan evaluasi wajib dalam Pembelajaran Menulis semester ini di lingkungan Jurusan Bahasa Inggris Tuanku Tambusai Riau. Penelitian ini untuk mengevaluasi dan menilai kompetensi siswa dalam keterampilan menulis pada tingkat semester kedua dalam bahasa Inggris yang memfokuskan lima bidang konten utama: Tanggapan kritis terhadap teks; penjelasan dan dukungan dari ide-ide; organisasi respon yang memiliki awal yang jelas, tengah, dan dua elemen penggunaan bahasa: konstruksi kalimat dan pilihan kata, dan tata bahasa, penggunaan, dan mekanik. Model penilaian adalah penilaian CUNY secara tertulis yang merupakan langkah kemampuan siswa untuk melakukan penulisan tingkat perguruan tinggi. Model ini untuk menentukan penempatan mereka ke dalam komposisi bahasa Inggris, atau perkembangan menulis bahasa inggris. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengambarkan penilaian dalam menulis bahasa inggris dan hasil penelitian diberharapkan memberikan model baru dalam pembelajaran keterampilan menulis
title: A Study Of Students Assessment In Writing Skills  Of The English Language
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: a study of students assessment in writing skills of the english language mandatory assessment and evaluation in writing learning this semester in the english department tuanku tambusai riau this study to evaluate and assess students' competence in writing skills at the second semester level in english that focuses on five main content areas critical response to explanatory text and support from ideas response organization that has a clear beginning middle and two elements of language use sentence construction and word choice and grammar use and mechanics the assessment model is a cuny assessment in writing which is a measure of students' ability to do college level writing this model is to determine their placement into english composition or english writing development the purpose of this study is to describe the assessment in english writing and the results of the study are expected to provide a new model in learning writing skills

desc: Guru merupakan profesi yang rentan terhadap stress, maka perlu adanya perhatian akan kebahagiaan guru. Kebahagiaan guru dipengaruhi oleh berbagai faktor salah satunya faktor pekerjaan. Penelitian ini akan melakukan analisi psikometri untuk menentukan validitas dan reliabilitas pada faktor kebahagiaan kerja guru PAUD. Hasil penelitian ini akan menentukan apakah faktor tersebut layak untuk dijadikan alat untuk mengukur faktor kebahagiaan guru PAUD. Variabel dikembangkan dari teori kesejahteraan kerja yang dikuatkan dengan teori lain. Penelitian ini dilakukan pada 32 guru TK. Analisis data menggunakan validitas ahli dan validitas item, sedangkan reliabilitas menggunakan crombach’s alpha yang dianalisis menggunakan aplikasi SPSS. Hasil penelitian ini yaitu pada item dengan indikator yaitu sumber daya kerja, kontrol dan otonomi, worklife balance, kemanan dan perubahan pekerjaan, hubungan kerja, serta kondisi kerja yang telah di validasi ahli dan di ujikan pada responden, terdapat 22 Item yang valid dan nilai reliabilitas yang sangat tinggi. Maka, instrumen faktor kebahagiaan kerja pada guru ini telah valid dan reliabel. Sehinga intrumen ini dapat digunakan untuk penelitian.
title: Instrumen Faktor Kebahagiaan Kerja pada Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: instrument of work happiness factor in early childhood education teachers teachers are a profession that is vulnerable to stress so there needs to be attention to teacher happiness teacher happiness is influenced by various factors one of which is the work factor this study will conduct a psychometric analysis to determine the validity and reliability of the work happiness factor of early childhood education teachers the results of this study will determine whether the factor is worthy to be used as a tool to measure the happiness factor of early childhood education teachers variables are developed from the theory of work welfare which is strengthened by other theories this study was conducted on kindergarten teachers data analysis using expert validity and item validity while reliability using crombachs alpha which was analyzed using the spss application the results of this study are on items with indicators namely work resources control and autonomy work life balance security and change work relationships and working conditions that have been validated by experts and tested on respondents there are valid items and very high reliability values ​​then the work happiness factor instrument in this teacher is valid and reliable so that this instrument can be used for research

desc: Peneliti mengkaji banyak ayah ibu yang masih tidak memahami pentingnya untuk menjaga kebugaran serta kebersihan sehingga peneliti melakukan riset sejauh mana kesadaran ayah ibu membentuk pola hidup bersih, sehat dengan pelayanan holistik integratif maupun pendidik memiliki tantangan untuk mampu menerapkan dalam kehidupan sehari-hari anak. Membentuk anak untuk mengubah kebiasaannya sejak kecil memang sulit, meski ada hubungan kerjasama antar pendidik dengan ayah ibu sehingga dapat mengkaji, dan membentuk kesadaran anak diberi makan bergizi, hidup sehat, 5 pelayanan holistik integratif, dan pentingnya dilaksanakan di lembaga PAUD. Metode kualitatif deskriptif dipakai riset ini. Teknik pengumpulan data adalah menggunakan; analisa perencanaan, menerapkan pada saat anak disekolah dan dirumah anak mampu menjaga kebersihan, asupan nutrisi yang terkecupi dengan baik untuk menjaga imun anak, dan menunjang tumbuh kembang anak sejak dini. Menggunakan hasil penelitian, menerapkannya sehingga dapat menjaga kebersihan, penerimaan yang sehat untuk mengimbangi kekebalan anak, dan mendukung perkembangan dan kemajuan anak sejak awal.
title: Penanaman Perilaku Hidup Bersih dan Sehat Berbasis Layanan Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
