Mempelajari karakter toleransi dapat dilakukan melalui berbagai metode salah satunya dengan bercerita menggunakan media big book. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui efektivitas big book berbasis cerita rakyat dalam meningkatkan karakter toleransi pada anak usia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini adalah eksperimen semu dengan pretes-tposttest control group design. Populasi dalam penelitian ini adalah anak-anak berusia 5-6 tahun di Taman kanak-kanak Manonjaya dengan sampel 15 anak dalam kelompok eksperimen dan 15 anak dalam kelompok kontrol. Sampel diambil dengan teknik purposive sampling non-acak. Data dikumpulkan melalui observasi karakter toleransi. Analisis data menggunakan uji homogenitas, uji normalitas, t-test dengan signifikansi tingkat 0,05. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa media big book berbasis cerita rakyat efektif untuk meningkatkan toleransi karakter anak-anak berusia 5-6 tahun
title: Media Pembelajaran Big Book Berbasis Cerita Rakyat untuk Meningkatkan Karakter Toleransi pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Big book learning media based on folklore to improve tolerance character in early childhood tolerance character is needed for every individual to create peace in a country therefore tolerance character needs to be instilled early on so that children can understand and accept every difference from others learning tolerance character can be done through various methods one of which is by telling stories using big book media the purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of big book based on folklore in improving tolerance character in children aged years this study is a quasi-experimental with pretestposttest control group design the population in this study were children aged years in Manonjaya Kindergarten with a sample of children in the experimental group and children in the control group the sample was taken using non-random purposive sampling technique data was collected through observation of tolerance character data analysis using homogeneity test normality test t-test with significance level the results of the study indicate that big book media based on folklore is effective in improving tolerance character in children aged years

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui Pengaruh Profil Guru PAUD yang ditinjau dari Jenjang Pendidikan, Masa Kerja dan Status Kepegawaian Guru PAUD terhadap Penguasaan Standar Tingkat Pencapaian Perkembangan Anak (STPPA). Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian deskriptif kuantitatif dengan simple random sampling, 42 sample. Data latar belakang jenjang pendidikan, status kepegawaian guru dan masa kerja guru dikumpulkan melalui dokumen. Data penguasaan STPPA dikumpulkan menggunakan angket. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah regresi linier berganda. Hasil penelitian didapat secara simultan terdapat pengaruh yang signifikan antara jenjang pendidikan,  status kepegawaian guru dan masa kerja guru terhadap penguasaan STPPA, tetapi secara parsial hanya jenjang pendidikan prodi paud yang memberi pengaruh signifikan terhadap penguasaan STPPA. Hasil penelitian ini dapat menjadi dasar bagi pengambilan kebijakan pendidikan yang lebih baik dan tepat sasaran. Peningkatan penguasaan STPPA di kalangan guru akan berdampak positif pada kualitas pembelajaran dan prestasi anak.
title: Pengaruh Profil Guru PAUD terhadap Penguasaan STPPA
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the profile of early childhood education teachers on the mastery of STPP This study aims to determine the influence of the profile of early childhood education teachers reviewed from the level of education, length of service and employment status of early childhood education teachers on the mastery of the standard level of achievement of child development STPP This study is a quantitative descriptive study with simple random sampling Sample data on the background of the level of education, employment status of teachers and length of service of teachers were collected through documents Data on mastery of STPP was collected using a questionnaire The data analysis technique used was multiple linear regression The results of the study were obtained simultaneously, there was a significant influence between the level of education, employment status of teachers and length of service of teachers on the mastery of STPP, but partially only the level of education of the early childhood education study program had a significant influence on the mastery of STPP The results of this study can be the basis for making better and more targeted educational policies Increasing mastery of STPP among teachers will have a positive impact on the quality of learning and children's achievements

desc: This study attempts to examine and describe how parents' social position and surroundings can affect their children's vocabulary competence when learning Indonesian. Based on behaviorism theory's tenets, which are also backed by cognitivism theory. According to this hypothesis, a child's (exogenous) environment has a significant impact on their ability to acquire a language, particularly when it comes to developing their vocabulary. Both of these strands categorically rejected Nativism, which maintained that the ability to speak a language is an innate and biological gift (LAD). The mastery of children's linguistic vocabulary is thought to be unaffected by the surroundings. This study analyzes, but it also demonstrates how the environment affects young children's language and vocabulary development 3;0-5;0 at the Bustanul Athafal Early Childhood Education, Singgaran Pati District, Bengkulu City, TA. 2020/2021. The results showed that the influence of environmental intake on children's Indonesian vocabulary mastery was calculated by product-moment correlation and then used the formula: d = r². 100% obtained value = 0.49%. This means that the magnitude of the influence of environmental (exogenous) intake on children's mastery of Indonesian vocabulary is 49% and 51% is influenced by endogenous factors.
title: Early Children (3;0–5;0) are Affected by Their Mastery of Indonesian Vocabulary the Environment's Intake
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: early children are affected by their mastery of Indonesian vocabulary the environments intake this study attempts to examine and describe how parents' social position and surroundings can affect their children's vocabulary competence when learning Indonesian based on behaviorism theories tenets which are also supported by cognitivism theory according to this hypothesis a child's exogenous environment has a significant impact on their ability to acquire a language particularly when it comes to developing their vocabulary both of these strands categorically rejected nativism which maintained that the ability to speak a language is an innate and biological gift lad the mastery of children's linguistic vocabulary is thought to be unaffected by the surroundings this study analyzes but it also demonstrates how the environment affects young children's language and vocabulary development at the bustanul athafal early childhood education singgaran pati district bengkulu city ta the results showed that the influence of environmental intake on childrens Indonesian vocabulary mastery was calculated by product moment correlation and then used the formula d r² obtained value this means that the magnitude of the influence of environmental exogenous intake on childrens mastery of Indonesian vocabulary is and is influenced by endogenous factors

desc: Menghadapi pertumbuhan jumlah lembaga pendidikan yang semakin besar, penyelenggara pendidikan harus menghadapi tantangan yang semakin kompetitif, diperlukan suatu strategi daya saing yang unggul. Penelitian ini menggambarkan strategi peningkatan daya saing melalui program pembelajaran berbasis pendidikan Islam dalam konteks persaingan yang semakin kompetitif di lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini. Penelitian deskriptif kualitatif dengan melibatkan 3 orang guru, 2 orangtua peserta didik, 1 staf administrasi, dan 1 kepala sekolah sebagai informan. Data dianalisis melalui display data, penyajian data, dan verifikasi atau penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa daya saing melalui program pembelajaran berbasis pendidikan Islam meliputi penguatan kurikulum, peningkatan kualitas pendidik, dan pemberdayaan masyarakat. Dalam persaingan yang semakin kompetitif di lembaga pendidikan anak usia dini, harus berusaha meningkatkan daya saingnya melalui program unggulan berbasis pendidikan Islam. Temuan ini berkontribusi pada inovasi program pembelajaran berbasis pendidikan Islam yang membedakan lembaga ini dari pesaingnya. Implikasi penelitian ini adalah memberikan keunggulan kompetitif dalam mempertahankan dan menarik minat pelanggan pada pendidikan anak usia dini.
title: Strategi Peningkatan Daya Saing melalui Program Pembelajaran Berbasis Pendidikan Islam
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strategy to increase competitiveness through Islamic education-based learning programs facing the increasing number of educational institutions education providers must face increasingly competitive challenges a superior competitiveness strategy is needed this study describes the strategy to increase competitiveness through Islamic education-based learning programs in the context of increasingly competitive competition in early childhood education institutions qualitative descriptive research involving teachers, parents of students, administrative staff and principals as informants data is analyzed through data display data presentation and verification or drawing conclusions the results of the study indicate that competitiveness through Islamic education-based learning programs includes strengthening the curriculum improving the quality of educators and empowering the community in increasingly competitive competition in early childhood education institutions must strive to increase their competitiveness through superior programs based on Islamic education these findings contribute to the innovation of Islamic education-based learning programs that distinguish this institution from its competitors the implications of this study are to provide a competitive advantage in maintaining and attracting customer interest in early childhood education

desc: Quantum learning merupakan suatu model pembelajaran yang memberikan kesempatan pada anak untuk membangun dan mengembangkan pemahamannya. Tujuan penelitian yakni untuk mengetahui pengaruh penerapan model pembelajaran Quantum Learning berbasis STEAM terhadap kemampuan pemecahan masalah anak usia dini. Jenis penelitian ini adalah quasi eksperiment, dengan rancangan posttest only control group design. Populasi yang digunakan adalah anak usia dini TK Widya Kumara, dengan jumlah sampel 34 anak. Penentuan kelas kontrol dan kelas eksperimen digunakan group random sampling. Teknik analisa yang digunakan yakni analisis varians (anava) satu jalur. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa terdapat pengaruh penerapan Model Pembelajaran Quantum Learning berbasis STEAM terhadap kemampuan pemecahan masalah anak usia dini yang dilihat dari nilai Fhitung lebih besar dari Ftabel (10,074   4,149). Hasil penelitian ini diharapkan dapat memberikan sumbangan informasi penting di bidang pendidikan, terutama pengembangan pendekatan pembelajaran untuk anak usia dini
title: Implementasi Model Pembelajaran Quantum Learning Berbasis Steam terhadap Kemampuan Pemecahan Masalah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of steam-based quantum learning model on problem solving ability quantum learning is a learning model that provides opportunities for children to build and develop their understanding the purpose of the study is to determine the effect of the application of steam-based quantum learning model on the problem solving ability of early childhood this type of research is a quasi-experimental with a posttest only control group design the population used is early childhood TK Widya Kumara with the number of child samples the determination of the control class and experimental class used group random sampling the analysis technique used is one-way ANOVA variance analysis the results of the study show that there is an effect of the application of steam-based quantum learning model on the problem solving ability of early childhood as seen from the value of f count is greater than f table the results of this study are expected to provide important information in the field of education especially the development of learning approaches for early childhood

desc: Stunting also occurs in urban areas, i.e., DKI Jakarta. East Jakarta is the second-highest (25.7%) location where stunting occurred. Since this activity was conducted in Duren Sawit Subdistrict, where numerous people still received Healthy Jakarta Cards, special efforts were needed to reduce the high stunting rate. The method used is qualitative descriptive. The form of training is the participant observation method and demonstration, include cooking demonstrations and Focus Group Discussion (FGD). This efforts made to decrease the number of Stunting in Duren Sawit Subdistrict. The training was given to  35 ECE tutors and parents of students from various ECE in Duren Sawit Subdistrict. Tutors and parents seemed enthusiastic and active during the activities, especially when they were given the task to create a one-week healthy menu in groups and then closed with a demo of making a cake with purple sweet potato as ingredients.
title: Strategy for Decreasing the Rate of Stunting Through Early Childhood Health and Nutrition Training for Tutors/Parents of Early Childhood Education
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strategy for reducing the rate of stunting through early childhood health and nutrition training for tutorsparents of early childhood education stunting also occurs in urban areas i e dki jakarta east jakarta is the second highest location where stunting occurred since this activity was conducted in duren sawit subdistrict where numerous people still received healthy jakarta cards special efforts were needed to reduce the high stunting rate the method used is qualitative descriptive the form of training is the participant observation method and demonstration including cooking demonstrations and focus group discussion fgd these efforts made to decrease the number of stunting in duren sawit subdistrict the training was given to ece tutors and parents of students from various ece in duren sawit subdistrict tutors and parents seemed enthusiastic and active during the activities especially when they were given the task to create a healthy one week menu in groups and then closed with a demo of making a cake with purple sweet potato as ingredient

desc: Pembelajaran matematika sering kali dianggap menakutkan bagi semua kalangan termasuk anak usia dini. Untuk itu perlu nya media dalam menunjang pembelajaran agar optimal dan mudah dalam menyampaikan materi kepada peserta didik. Namun, guru sering kali kesulitan dalam menjumpai dan memvariasikan media untuk pembelajaran matematika. Untuk itu penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menciptakan sebuah inovasi media pembelajaran berupa media pembelajaran berbasis buku cerita materi geometri untuk anak usia dini yang valid dan praktis. Metode yang digunakan dalam melakukan penelitian yaitu penelitian RD dengan model Rowntree. Model Rowntree memiliki 3 tahap yaitu perencanaan, pengembangan dan Evaluasi. Evaluasi peneliti mengadopsi tahap dari model evaluasi formatif Tessmer yang terdiri dari tahap self evaluation, expert review, one-to-one evaluation, dan small group evaluation. Hasil penelitian menyatakan produk berupa media pembelajaran berbasis buku cerita materi geometri dinyatakan valid secara ahli dan juga dan praktis secara pengguna yaitu guru dan anak.
title: Inovasi Media Pembelajaran Berbasis Cerita Materi Geometri untuk Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Innovation of learning media based on story material geometry for children aged years Mathematics learning is often considered scary for all groups including early childhood for that reason media is needed to support learning so that it is optimal and easy to convey material to students but teachers often have difficulty in finding and varying media for learning mathematics for that reason this study aims to create an innovation of learning media in the form of learning media based on story books geometry material for early childhood that is valid and practical the method used in conducting the research is rd research with the rowntree model the rowntree model has stages namely planning development and evaluation evaluation the researcher adopted the stages of the tessmer formative evaluation model which consists of the self evaluation expert review onetoone evaluation and small group evaluation stages the results of the study stated that the product in the form of learning media based on story books geometry material was declared valid by experts and also practical by users namely teachers and children

desc: This study aims to determine the correlation between parental income levels with the role of parents. The sample is 370 parents of affected by Covid-19 pandemic in Indonesia. The method used is a quantitative correlational approach to the type of survey analysis. The results showed the frequency of parents playing with children before and during the pandemic increased from 38.6% to 62.0%. The results of the bivariate correlation analysis are significance values of 9,956 (Sig 0.05) with Pearson correlation coefficient numbers showing a result of -0.003 which means that the correlation only 0.003. The correlation coefficient is negative then correlation is inversely proportional, if the income level is moderate then the role of parents is high and vice versa which means that Ha is rejected and Ho is accepted there is no correlation between the level of parental income with the role of parents in early childhood learning during Covid-19.
title: Learning During the Covid-19 Pandemic: Correlation Between Income Levels And Parental Roles
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: learning during the covid pandemic correlation between income levels and parental roles this study aims to determine the correlation between parental income levels with the role of parents the sample is parents of affected by covid pandemic in indonesia the method used is a quantitative correlational approach to the type of survey analysis the results showed the frequency of parents playing with children before and during the pandemic increased from to the results of the bivariate correlation analysis are significance values ​​of sig with pearson correlation coefficient numbers showing a result of which means that the correlation only the correlation coefficient is negative then correlation is inversely proportional if the income level is moderate then the role of parents is high and vice versa which means that ha is rejected and ho is accepted there is no correlation between the level of parental income and the role of parents in early childhood learning during covid

desc: Pendidikan dan latihan Pengembangan Keprofesian Berkelanjutan (PKB) merupakan salah satu upaya Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan melalui Direktorat Jenderal guru dan tenaga kependidikan dalam peningkatan kompetensinya. Tujuan penelitian ini yaitu mengetahui bagaimana pelaksanaan program PKB dalam meningatkan profesionalisme guru khususnya pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD). Hasil penelitian bahwa melalui program PKB, guru dapat memperbaiki nilai uji kompetensi guru (UKG) yang belum memenuhi kompetensi capaian minimal serta sebagai wadah pengembangan diri seorang pendidik agar menjadi lebih baik.
title: Pengembangan Keprofesian Berkelanjutan dalam Meningkatkan Profesionalisme Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: continuous professional development in improving the professionalism of early childhood education teachers education and training continuous professional development pkb is one of the efforts of the ministry of education and culture through the directorate general of teachers and education personnel in improving their competence the purpose of this study is to find out how the implementation of the pkb program in improving teacher professionalism especially in early childhood education paud the results of the study that through the pkb program teachers can improve the value of the teacher competency test ukg that has not met the minimum achievement competency and as a forum for self-development of an educator to become better

desc: Strategi pembelajaran menjadi tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengevaluasi dampak dari metode kupu-kupu kepada kemampuan siswa dalam memecahkan masalah matematika termasuk materi pecahan saat mereka duduk di bangku sekolah dasar. Menggunakan metode kuasi eksperimen dengan desain untuk kelompok kontrol nonequivalent. Subyek penelitian siswa kelas 2. Pendekatan penelitian ini memanfaatkan banyak pendekatan pengumpulan data, diantaranya. Statistik non parametrik digunakan sebagai metode analisis data dalam penelitian ini. yaitu uji Wilcoxon dan Mann Whitney yang dilakukan dengan IBM SPSS Statistics versi 18. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa hasil uji Wilcoxon dan uji Mann Whitney menunjukkan nilai signifikansi Ha: diterima dan Ho: ditolak artinya terdapat pengaruh strategi kupu-kupu terhadap pemecahan masalah matematika siswa. Dengan demikian, strategi kupu-kupu dapat dijadikan sebagai alternative strategi pembelajaran bagi guru matematika dalam meningkatkan kemampuan siswa.
title: Strategi Butterfly dan Pemecahan Masalah Matematika Siswa
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: butterfly strategy and students' mathematical problem solving learning strategy is the purpose of this study is to evaluate the impact of the butterfly method on students' ability to solve mathematical problems including fraction material when they are in elementary school using a quasi-experimental method with a design for the nonequivalent control group of research subjects, class students, this research approach utilizes many data collection approaches, including non-parametric statistics used as data analysis methods in this study, namely the Wilcoxon and Mann Whitney tests carried out with IBM SPSS Statistics version, the results of the study indicate that the results of the Wilcoxon test and the Mann Whitney test show a significant value of ha accepted and ho rejected, meaning that there is an influence of the butterfly strategy on students' mathematical problem solving, thus the butterfly strategy can be used as an alternative learning strategy for mathematics teachers in improving students' abilities

desc: Di tengah berbagai persoalan maraknya tindakan intoleran yang menyebabkan membudayanya tindak kekerasan, anarkisme, radikalisme di masyarakat Indonesia, tanggung jawab untuk merawat keharmonisan relasi persaudaraan antar umat beragama maka solusi dengan cara menanamkan dan membentuk karakter toleran pada anak sejak usia dini di dalam keluarga. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengeksplorasi kontribusi keluarga Kristen dalam upaya menanamkan dan membentuk atau internalisasi karakter toleran pada anak sejak usia dini.  Metode penelitian ini adalah metode kualitatif secara deskriptif. Sumber data diperoleh melalui kajian literatur dengan cara menyeleksi dan menganalisis beberapa hasil penelitian tentang pembentukan karakter toleran pada anak sejak usia dini di dalam keluarga. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa penanaman karakter toleran di dalam keluarga merupakan sarana efektif untuk menumbuhkembangkan karakter peduli, bela rasa dan empati pada anak sejak usia dini.  Karakter toleran menjadi kunci untuk membangun relasi sosial yang harmonis antar umat beragama di Indonesia. Peran keluarga sangat signifikan untuk melahirkan generasi yang toleran sehingga dapat hidup berdampingan harmoni dengan yang berbeda agama.
title: Penanaman Karakter Toleran di dalam Keluarga Kristen pada Anak Sejak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: instilling tolerant character in Christian families in children from an early age in the midst of various problems of rampant intolerant actions that have led to the cultivation of violent acts of anarchism and radicalism in Indonesian society, the responsibility to maintain harmonious relations of brotherhood between religious communities, the solution is to instill and form tolerant character in children from an early age in the family, this study aims to explore the contribution of Christian families in efforts to instill and form or internalize tolerant character in children from an early age, this research method is a descriptive qualitative method, data sources are obtained through literature reviews by selecting and analyzing several research results on the formation of tolerant character in children from an early age in the family, the results of the study show that instilling tolerant character in the family is an effective means to develop caring, compassion and empathy characters in children from an early age, tolerant character is the key to building harmonious social relations between religious communities in Indonesia, the role of the family is very significant in producing a tolerant generation so that they can live side by side in harmony with those of different religions

desc: Following a rigorous, carefully concerns and considered review of the article published in Jurnal Obsesi to article entitled “Upaya Meningkatkan Kemampuan Fisik Motorik Kasar Anak melalui Kegiatan Melambungkan dan Menangkap dengan Berbagai Media Anak Usia Dini di TK Al- Fajar Pekanbaru” Vol 2, No 2, pp. 79-89, December 2016,  This paper has been found to be in violation of the Jurnal PAUD Tambusai Publication principles and has been retracted.  The article contained redundant material, the editor investigated and found that the paper published in Jurnal Obsesi, Vol. 1, No. 2, pp. 1-11, december 2015.  The document and its content has been removed from Jurnal PAUD Tambusai, and reasonable effort should be made to remove all references to this article.
title: RETRACTED: Upaya Meningkatkan Kemampuan Fisik Motorik Kasar Anak melalui Kegiatan Melambungkan dan Menangkap dengan Berbagai Media Anak Usia Dini di TK Al- Fajar Pekanbaru
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: retracted efforts to improve children's gross motor skills through tossing and catching activities with various early childhood media at TK Al Fajar Pekanbaru following a rigorously carefully concerns and considered review of the article published in Jurnal Obsession to article entitled efforts to improve children's gross motor skills through tossing and catching activities with various early childhood media at TK Al Fajar Pekanbaru Vol No. PP December this paper has been found to be in violation of the Jurnal Paud Tambusai publication principles and has been retracted the article contained redundant material the editor investigated and found that the paper published in Jurnal Obsession Vol No. PP December the document and its content have been removed from Jurnal Paud Tambusai and reasonable effort should be made to remove all references to this article

desc: Proses kreativitas bentuk huruf dan angka dalam seni lukis anak usia dini menjadi sarana pembelajaran dengan didesain menarik dan menyenangkan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis dan mendeskripsikan kreativitas bentuk huruf dan angka dalam pembelajaran seni lukis pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik analisis data; observasi, tinjauan pustaka, pengumpulan data, analisis data dan penarikan kesimpualan. Teknik pengumpulan data; wawancara, observasi dan dokumentasi. Subjek penelitian adalah guru dan anak kelompok B. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa; pertama, kreativitas bentuk huruf dan angka dalam pembelajaran seni lukis terbukti dapat membantu menumbuhkan kreativitas pada anak. Kedua, kreativitas bentuk huruf dan angka dalam pembelajaran seni lukis dapat menajadi alternatif pada anak dalam memahami konsep huruf dan angka dalam imajinasi anak. Ketiga, kreativitas bentuk huruf dan angka dalam pembelajaran seni lukis efektif dan baik  karena memberi kemudahan pada pendidik dan peserta didik saat mengaplikasikan menjadi sebuah karya. Keempat, kreativitas bentuk huruf dan angka dalam pembelajaran seni lukis memberi warna baru yang membuat anak antusias dan semangat dalam pembelajaran di lingkungan kelas.
title: Proses Kreativitas Bentuk Huruf dan Angka Dalam Pembelajaran Seni Lukis
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The process of creativity of letter and number shapes in painting learning The process of creativity of letter and number shapes in early childhood painting becomes a learning tool with an interesting and fun design. This study aims to analyze and describe the creativity of letter and number shapes in painting learning in early childhood. This study uses a qualitative descriptive method, observation data analysis techniques, literature review, data collection, data analysis and drawing conclusions, interview data collection techniques, observation and documentation. The subjects of the study were teachers and children in group B. The results of the study showed that first, the creativity of letter and number shapes in painting learning has been proven to help foster creativity in children. Second, the creativity of letter and number shapes in painting learning can be an alternative for children in understanding the concept of letters and numbers in children's imagination. Third, the creativity of letter and number shapes in painting learning is effective and good because it makes it easier for educators and students when applying it to a work. Fourth, the creativity of letter and number shapes in painting learning provides new colors that make children enthusiastic and excited about learning in the classroom environment.

desc: Model pembelajaran akan mempengaruhi kualitas pembelajaran, model PAIKEM adalah pembelajaran aktif, inovatif, kreatif, efektif dan menyenangkan. Penelitian ini bertujuan mengetahui bagaimana penerapan model PAIKEM dalam pembelajaran seni di TK Pertiwi 49 Canden Bantul. Penelitian ini menggunkanan jenis penelitian deskriptif kualitatif yaitu mengobservasi sebuah objek dan pencarian fakta dengan interpretasi. Analisis data yang digunakan yaitu melalui data reduction (reduksi data), data display (penyajian data) dan concolusion drawing/verification (penarikan kesimpulan dan verifikasi). Hasil observasi dilapangan menunjukkan bahwa pembelajaran seni pada TK Pertiwi 49 Canden Bantul menggunakan model PAIKEM dengan pembelajaran seni yang dikemas dengan memilih tema yang dekat dengan anak, mengajak anak terlibat langsung dan pemilihan metode pembelajaran yang tepat seperti bercerita atau bernyanyi agar anak tertarik melakukan kegiatan seni tersebut.
title: Penerapan Model PAIKEM dalam Pembelajaran Seni
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Application of the Paikem model in art learning The learning model will affect the quality of learning The Paikem model is active, innovative, creative, effective and fun learning This study aims to determine how the application of the Paikem model in art learning at TK Pertiwi Canden Bantul This study uses a qualitative descriptive research type, namely observing an object and finding facts with interpretation of data analysis used, namely through data reduction, data reduction, data display, data presentation and conclusion drawing verification, drawing conclusions and verifying the results of observations in the field shows that art learning at TK Pertiwi Canden Bantul uses the Paikem model with art learning packaged by choosing a theme that is close to children, inviting children to be directly involved and choosing the right learning methods such as telling stories or singing so that children are interested in doing these art activities

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk untuk mengembangkan produk berupa buku ajar matematika anak usia dini untuk mahasiswa Pendidikan Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PG-PAUD). Penelitian ini menggunaka metode penelitian dan pengembangan atau Research and Development (R  D) dari Borg and Gall. Subjek penelitian adalah mahasiswa PG-PAUD yang sedang menempuh mata kuliah matematika anak usia dini di dua perguruan tinggi yakni PG-PAUD Universitas Sriwijaya dan PG-PAUD Universitas Jambi. Pengumpuan data dilakukan melalui observasi, angket, dan tes. Berdasarkan hasil pengembangan buku ajar menunjukan rata-rata hasil validasi dan uji coba lapangan, buku ajar yang dihasilkan telah memenuhi kriteria kevalidan dan keefektifan. Jadi, dapat disimpulkan bahwa buku ajar matematika anak usia dini efektif untuk digunakan dimata kuliah matematika anak usia dini di program studi PG-PAUD. Buku ajar yang dikembangkan ini memiliki kebaruan dari aspek substansi dan penyajian. Substansi buku ajar yang dikembangkan berlandasarkan pada teori-teori matematika anak usia yang sesuai dengan kurikulum 2013.
title: Pengembangan Buku Ajar Mata Kuliah Matematika pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of mathematics course textbooks for early childhood This study aims to develop a product in the form of a mathematics textbook for early childhood education students pgpaud This study uses the research and development method or research and development r d from borg and gall The subjects of the study were pgpaud students who were taking early childhood mathematics courses at two universities, namely pgpaud sriwijaya university and pgpaud jambi university Data collection was carried out through observation, questionnaires and tests based on the results of the development of textbooks showing that the average results of the validation and field trials of the resulting textbooks have met the criteria for validity and effectiveness so it can be concluded that early childhood mathematics textbooks are effective for use in early childhood mathematics courses in the pgpaud study program The textbooks developed have novelty in terms of substance and presentation of the substance of the textbooks developed based on theories of children's mathematics that are in accordance with the curriculum

desc: Tari Wonderland Indonesia adalah tari kreasi baru yang mengandung berbagai konsep, teori dan prinsip koreografi. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis koreografi tari Wonderland Indonesia dan dampaknya terhadap peningkatan kemampuan motorik kasar anak. Dalam penelitian ini, metode yang diterapkan adalah pendekatan kualitatif dengan menggunakan referensi literatur serta penelitian lapangan. Untuk mengumpulkan data, digunakan Teknik seperti observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa tari Wonderland Indonesia memiliki koreografi yang kompleks dan bervariasi, melibatkan gerakan tubuh secara keseluruhan dan ditemukan bahwa anak-anak mengalami peningkatan kemampuan motorik kasar, seperti keseimbangan, koordinasi, kekuatan, dan ketangkasan. Penelitian ini memberikan kontribusi penting dalam pemahaman tentang kemampuan motorik kasar anak. Dalam konteks tari Wonderland Indonesia, koreografi yang kompleks dan variasi gerakan yang terlibat dalam tarian ini dapat meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak kelompok B di TK Insan Merdeka Yogyakarta.
title: Analisis Koreografi Tari Wonderland Indonesia Terhadap Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: choreography analysis of Indonesian wonderland dance on gross motor skills of early childhood Indonesian wonderland dance is a new creative dance that contains various concepts of theory and principles of choreography This study aims to analyze the choreography of Indonesian wonderland dance and its impact on improving children's gross motor skills In this study, the method applied is a qualitative approach using literature references and field research to collect data, techniques such as observation, interviews and documentation are used. The results of the study indicate that Indonesian wonderland dance has complex and varied choreography involving overall body movements and it was found that children experienced an increase in gross motor skills such as balance, coordination, strength and agility. This study provides an important contribution to the understanding of children's gross motor skills in the context of Indonesian wonderland dance. Complex choreography and variations of movements involved in this dance can improve the gross motor skills of group B children at TK Insan Merdeka Yogyakarta.

desc: Pengembangan kinerja pendidik merupakan faktor yang sangat menentukan pada keberhasilan proses pendidikan dan pembelajaran dalam era perkembangan pengetahuan yang sangat cepat ini. Salah satu faktor yang mempengaruhi kinerja pendidik PAUD yaitu manajemen kepala sekolah untuk melakukan penilaian kinerja meliputi kemampuan merencanakan pembelajaran, melaksanakan pembelajaran, melakukan penilaian, membimbing dan melatih peserta didik, serta kemampuan melaksanakan tugas tambahan. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif untuk menggambarkan secara apa adanya tentang analisis evaluasi kinerja guru. Jumlah responden dalam penelitian ini yaitu sebanyak 19 orang yang terdiri dari pendidik TK A, TK B dan KB di PAUD Al azhar Bukittinggi. Analisis yang digunakan pada penelitian ini yaitu deskriptif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa sebagian besar pendidik sudah memiliki kemampuan merencakan pembelajaran, melaksanakan pembelajaran dan kemampuan membimbing dan melatih peserta didik dalam kategori baik. Namun untuk indikator menilai hasil pembelajaran dan melaksanakan tugas tambahan, sebagian besar pendidik masih berada dalam kategori cukup. Sehingga disarankan agar kepala sekolah dapat melakukan manajemen lembaga dengan lebih baik sehingga mampu meningkatkan kinerja guru.
title: Analisis Evaluasi Kinerja Pendidik Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini di PAUD Al Azhar Bukittinggi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the performance evaluation of early childhood education educators at PAUD Al Azhar Bukittinggi, the development of educator performance is a very determining factor in the success of the education and learning process in this era of very rapid development of knowledge, one of the factors that influences the performance of PAUD educators is the management of the principal to conduct performance assessments including the ability to plan learning, carry out learning, carry out assessments, guide and train students, and the ability to carry out additional tasks. This study uses a descriptive method to describe the analysis of teacher performance evaluations. The number of respondents in this study was as many as people consisting of kindergarten A, kindergarten B and KB educators at PAUD Al Azhar Bukittinggi. The analysis used in this study is descriptive. The results of the study show that most educators already have the ability to plan learning, carry out learning and the ability to guide and train students in the good category, but for indicators to assess learning outcomes and carry out additional tasks, most educators are still in the sufficient category, so it is recommended that the principal can carry out better institutional management so as to improve teacher performance.

desc: Jakarta adalah salah satu daerah di Indonesia yang sering terjadi bencana banjir sehingga adanya pengurangan resiko bencana. Salah satu upayayang dapat dilakukan adalah memberikan bekal pengetahuan siaga bencana banjir melalui pemberian fasilitas berupa media yang dapat digunakan guru untuk mempermudah pembelajaran siaga bencana banjir kepada peserta didik di sekolah. Penelitian ini dilakukan terkait dengan pengembangkan media grafis untuk meningkatkan siaga bencana banjir. Adapun populasi dalam penelitian ini adalah anak- anak usia 5-6 tahun di wilayah Jakarta Selatan. Studi ini menggunakan metode model ADDIE (Analyze, Design, Development, Implementation, and Evaluation) dengan teknik pengumpulan data melalui wawancara, observasi, Pretest dan post-test. Hasil uji efektifitas sig.(2-tailed) menunjukkan adanya perbedaan kesiagaan pada anak sebelum dan sesudah penggunaan media grafis. Kesimpulan yang diperoleh adalah bahwa penggunaan media grafis efektif digunakan untuk meningkatkan siaga bencana banjir pada anak usia 5-6 tahun di Jakarta Selatan.
title: Pengembangan Media Grafis untuk Meningkatkan Siaga Bencana Banjir
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of graphic media to increase flood disaster preparedness Jakarta is one of the areas in Indonesia that often experiences floods so that there is a reduction in disaster risk one of the efforts that can be done is to provide knowledge of flood disaster preparedness through the provision of facilities in the form of media that can be used by teachers to facilitate flood disaster preparedness learning to students in schools this research was conducted related to the development of graphic media to increase flood disaster preparedness the population in this study were children aged years in the south jakarta area this study used the addie analyze design development implementation and evaluation model method with data collection techniques through interviews observation pretest and posttest the results of the sig tailed effectiveness test showed a difference in preparedness in children before and after the use of graphic media the conclusion obtained is that the use of graphic media is effective for increasing flood disaster preparedness in children aged years in south jakarta

desc: Orang tua dan guru belum mampu memanfaatkan media digital secara maksimal untuk mengembangkan literasi emergen anak karena banyak faktor salah satunya terkait media digital yang digunakan. Penelitian ini berupaya untuk menganalisis data bentuk cerita rakyat dalam media digital dan data kesesuaian media digital tersebut dengan kebutuhan literasi emergen. Untuk mendapatkan data tersebut, penelitian ini menggunakan mix method research (MMR) dengan tipe Exploratory. Data dalam penelitian ini berupa media digital berbasis Android. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa mayoritas cerita rakyat sudah sesuai dengan kebutuhan literasi emergen, namun aspek mendasar dari literasi emergen mengenai penyajian kalimat dalam cerita masih perlu perbaikan. Selain itu, penggolongan level membaca dan usia penting dimunculkan dalam media digital untuk memberikan pesan kepada pengguna agar dapat memilih media digital sesuai dengan level dan usianya. Hasil penelitian ini merekomendasikan pentingnya penyajian cerita rakyat dalam bentuk media digital agar dapat dimanfaatkan secara maksimal oleh guru dan orang tua dalam membacakan cerita rakyat.
title: Analisis Kesesuaian Media Cerita Rakyat Digital dengan Kebutuhan Literasi Emergen
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the suitability of digital folklore media with emergent literacy needs Parents and teachers have not been able to utilize digital media optimally to develop children's emergent literacy because of many factors, one of which is related to the digital media used. This study attempts to analyze data on the form of folklore in digital media and data on the suitability of the digital media with emergent literacy needs. To obtain this data, this study uses a mix method research mmr with an exploratory type. Data in this study is in the form of Android-based digital media. The results of this study indicate that the majority of folklore is in accordance with emergent literacy needs. However, the basic aspects of emergent literacy regarding the presentation of sentences in the story still need improvement. In addition, the classification of reading levels and ages is important to be presented in digital media to provide a message to users so that they can choose digital media according to their level and age. The results of this study recommend the importance of presenting folklore in the form of digital media so that it can be utilized optimally by teachers and parents in reading folklore.

desc: There are many problems faced by teachers in stimulating children's development. One of them is the 4C skills. Teachers give more assignments contained in the Children's Worksheets, even though in the surrounding environment there are many materials that can be used as learning media. This study aims to develop a learning model by utilizing loose parts media to stimulate children's 4C skills. The type of research used is research and development adapted from Borg  Gall, Dick, Carey,  Carey, and Hannafin  Pack. The research uses material expert validation, language, media, and learning design. Data collection techniques through observation, interviews, and documentation. The results of the study show that learning models using loose parts media can stimulate children's 4C skills. Aspects of critical thinking, when finding a problem, children can solve it by continuing to try. Creativity, children have the skills to think outside the box, try to assemble from various loose parts, develop ideas, and find new innovations. Collaboration, children can work together and quickly adapt to others. Communication, children can share thoughts, questions, ideas, and play experiences.
title: Loose Parts: Stimulation of 21st Century Learning Skills (4C Elements)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: loose parts stimulation of st century learning skills c elements there are many problems faced by teachers in stimulating children's development one of them is the c skills teachers give more assignments contained in the children's worksheets even though in the surrounding environment there are many materials that can be used as learning media this study aims to develop a learning model by using loose parts media to stimulate children's c skills the type of research used is research and development adapted from borg gall dick carey carey and hannafin pack the research uses material expert validation language media and learning design data collection techniques through observation interviews and documentation the results of the study show that learning models using loose parts media can stimulate children's c skills aspects of critical thinking when finding a problem children can solve it by continuing to try creativity children have the skills to think outside the box try to assemble from various loose parts develop ideas and find new innovations collaboration children can work together and quickly adapt to others communication children can share thoughts questions ideas and play experiences

desc: The aim of this research is to know the improvement of children's language ability through the activity of retelling the story content in children aged 4-5 years in Aisyiyah Gobah Tambang Bermain (KB). The problem faced was still low ability of early childhood language. The method of this research was classroom action research. The instrument of this research consists of observation sheet of improvement of language ability of children. Research subjects are children aged 4-5 years amounted to 18 people. The result of the research was found, before the action, the ability of the children's language in the activity of retelling the children's story content was the BB (44%) of the MB (38%) BSH (18%) and the BSB only (5.5%). After the first cycle of 1 child meeting the BB (25%) the MB (30%) BSH (16%) and the BSB only (8%). Cycle I meeting 2 children who were BB (22%) who MB (44%) BSH (22%) and the BSB only (11%). Cycle II meetings 1 cycle II children who are BB (11%) are MB (36%) BSH (38%) and B only (13%). Cycle II The 2nd meeting of the children who were BB (8%) were MB (16%) BSH (55%) and the BSB (16%). Thus it can be concluded that the child's language skills can be improved through the activities of retelling the contents of the story of children aged 4-5 years in Aisyiyah Gobah group sub-district Tambang.
title: Upaya Peningkatan Kemampuan Bahasa Anak Usia 4-5 Tahun melalui Kegiatan Menceritakan Kembali Isi Cerita  di Kelompok Bermain Aisyiyah Gobah Kecamatan Tambang
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts to improve the language abilities of children aged years through the activity of retelling the story content in the Aisyiyah Gobah play group, Mining District. The aim of this research is to know the improvement of children's language abilities through the activity of retelling the story content in children aged years in Aisyiyah Gobah Mining playing kb the problem faced was still low ability of early childhood language the method of this research was classroom action research the instrument of this research consists of observation sheet of improvement of language ability of children research subjects are children aged years amounted to people the result of the research was found before the action the ability of the children's language in the activity of retelling the children's story content was the bb of the mb bsh and the bsb only after the first cycle of child meeting the bb the mb bsh and the bsb only cycle i meeting children who were bb who mb bsh and the bsb only cycle ii meetings cycle ii children who were bb were mb bsh and b only cycle ii the nd meeting of the children who were bb were mb bsh and the bsb thus it can be concluded that the children's language skills can be improved through the activities of retelling the contents of the story of children aged years in aisyiyah gobah group mining subdistrict

desc: Urgensi pengenalan nilai moral pada anak usia dini didasarkan pada berbagai peristiwa yang menunjukkan perilaku generasi muda yang kurang bermoral.  Pengenalan nilai moral perlu disesuaikan dengan kondisi dunia yang selalu dinamis. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan metode pembelajaran moral yang diterima oleh orang tua semasa menjadi anak-anak dan ketika mereka sudah menjadi orang tua yang sesungguhnya. Pendeketan kuantitatif deskriptif dipilih sebagai pendekatan dalam penelitian ini. Metode pengumpulan menggunakan survey. Sebanyak 534 responden orang tua yang memiliki anak usia dini terlibat menjadi partisipan dalam penelitian ini. Hasil analisis data menunjukkan bahwa sebagain besar orang tua menilai pengenalan nilai moral merupakan hal yang penting. Lima metode terbanyak mengalami pergeseran antara yang orang tua terima pad amasa dulu dan denagn yang mereka lakukan sekarang. Mereka juga mengungkapkan terdapat beberapa hambatan dalam pengenalan moral. Implikasi hasil penelitian ini dapat menjadi rujukan bagi penelitian selanjutnya yang akan meneliti lebih dalam mengenai pengenalan nilai moral pada anak
title: Metode Pengenalan Nilai Moral pada Anak Usia Dini dalam Kurun Waktu 20 Tahun di Keluarga Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Method of introducing moral values ​​to early childhood within a period of years in Indonesian families The urgency of introducing moral values ​​to early childhood is based on various events that show the behavior of the younger generation who are less moral The introduction of moral values ​​needs to be adjusted to the conditions of the world that are always dynamic This study aims to describe the moral learning methods received by parents when they were children and when they had become real parents The quantitative descriptive approach was chosen as the approach in this study The collection method used a survey as many respondents as parents who had early childhood children were involved as participants in this study The results of data analysis showed that most parents considered the introduction of moral values ​​to be important The five most common methods experienced a shift between what parents received in the past and what they do now They also revealed that there were several obstacles in the introduction of morals The implications of the results of this study can be a reference for further research that will examine more deeply the introduction of moral values ​​to children

desc: Financial Literacy merupakan literasi yang penting untuk diperkenalkan dan ditanamkan kepada anak sejak dini. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk melihat dan meningkatkan kemampuan Financial Literacy anak usia dini dengan menggunakan media pembelajaran berbasis Augmented Reality (AR). Untuk mengembangkan media pembelajaran ini penelitian ini menggunakan penelitian Research  Development (RD) dari Sivasailam Thiagarajan yang disebut 4-D yaitu Define, Design, Develop dan Dissemination. Subjek penelitian siswa TK Aisyiyah Bustanul Athfal (ABA) Pekanbaru. Hasil penelitian adalah tersusunnya media pembelajaran berbasis AR. Media AR ini dapat digunakan dengan mudah dan tidak membutuhkan biaya yang besar bagi guru untuk membuatnya. Adanya penggunaan QR juga memudahkan guru dan siswa dalam memanfaatkan media AR dalam pengenalan Financial Literacy. Penggunaan media juga berpengaruh terhadap peningkatan Financial Literacy anak usia dini, hal ini terlihat dari hasil eksperimen One Group Pretest-Posttest dari hasil uji Uji Wilcoxon yang menunjukkan nilai Asymp. Sig 0.000  0.05 artinya terdapat peningkatan kemampuan literasi finansial siswa dengan menggunakan media AR.
title: Media Interaktif Augmented Reality untuk Peningkatan Kemampuan Financial Literacy Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Interactive augmented reality media to improve financial literacy skills of early childhood financial literacy is an important literacy to be introduced and instilled in children from an early age this study was conducted to see and improve financial literacy skills of early childhood using augmented reality-based learning media ar to develop this learning media this study uses research development rd research from sivasailam thiagarajan called d namely define design develop and dissemination research subjects students of tk aisyiyah bustanul athfal aba pekanbaru the results of the study are the compilation of ar-based learning media this ar media can be used easily and does not require a lot of money for teachers to make it the use of qr also makes it easier for teachers and students to utilize ar media in introducing financial literacy the use of media also affects the improvement of financial literacy of early childhood this can be seen from the results of the one group pretest posttest experiment from the results of the wilcoxon test which shows the asymp sig value meaning there is an increase in students' financial literacy skills by using ar media

desc: Pengalaman negara Indonesia saat terjadinya pandemi covid-19 menjadikan seluruh sektor mengalami dampak tersebut, yang termasuk ke dalamnya sektor pendidikan. Hal ini menjadikan perubahan juga terhadap karakter anak. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan dengan menggunakan pendekatan deskriptif kualitatif. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mendeskripsikan tindakan orang tua dalam mendidik karakter anak karena sekolah menerapkan pembelajaran daring, mengetahui dan mendeskripsikan tindakan guru dalam mendidik karakter anak pada masa pandemi dengan pembelajaran daring. Hasil penelitian dalam penelitian ini mendeskripsikan bahwa pendidikan karakter anak tidak hanya dilaksanakan oleh guru, tetapi orang tua juga memiliki tugas utama untuk melaksanakan pendidikan karakter anak di rumah. Dalam pelaksanaan pendidikan karakter, orang tua dan guru adalah model yang akan ditiru dan diteladani. Anak akan meniru tingkah laku maupun ucapan model tersebut. Penanaman sikap terpuji tidak bisa dilaksanakan dalam waktu singkat, dibutuhkan adanya kontinuitas melalui pembiasaan, keteladanan, pemberian nasihat, dan penguatan pada anak sejak dini setiap kali menunjukkan perilaku atau sikap-sikap terpuji.
title: Pendidikan Karakter di Masa Pandemi Covid 19: Tindakan Orang Tua dan Guru PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: character education during the covid pandemic actions of parents and teachers of early childhood education Indonesia's experience during the covid pandemic has affected all sectors, including the education sector, this has also changed the character of children. This study was conducted using a qualitative descriptive approach. The purpose of this study is to describe the actions of parents in educating children's character because schools implement online learning. To find out and describe the actions of teachers in educating children's character during the pandemic with online learning. The results of this study describe that children's character education is not only carried out by teachers, but parents also have the main task of implementing children's character education at home. In implementing character education, parents and teachers are models that will be imitated and emulated. Children will imitate the behavior and words of the model. Instilling commendable attitudes cannot be carried out in a short time. Continuity is needed through the habit of exemplary giving of advice and reinforcement to children from an early age every time they show commendable behavior or attitudes.

desc: Metode bermain peran ialah sebuah strategi yang dipakai untuk memberikan dorongan terhadap rasa percaya diri terhadap anak usia pra sekolah supaya mampu meningkat. Kepercayaan diri pada anak masih rendah, maka dari itu perlu dilakukannya metode bermain peran yang mampu mengoptimalkan kepercayaan diri siswa. Riset berikut bertujuan guna memahami efektifitas bermain peran pada kepercayaan diri pada anak usia dini. Peneliti memakai jenis riset kuantitatif serta rancangan Quasi Eksperimental. Sampel yang dipakai pada riset sejumlah 37 siswa. Teknik pengambilan sampel nonprobelitiy sampling dengan sampling jenuh. Instrumen dalam mengumpulkan data mempergunakan test. Dan teknik analisa data menggunakan pengujian statistik. Hasil riset memaparkan bahwasanya terdapat dampak metode bermain peran pada kepercayaan diri anak, tidak terdapat dampak metode bercerita pada kepercayaan diri anak. Maka bisa dibuat simpulan bahwasanya pemakaian metode bermain peran cukup efektif mengoptimalkan kepercayaan diri pada siswa.
title: Efektifitas Bermain Peran terhadap Kepercayaan Diri Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effectiveness of role play on the self-confidence of early childhood role play method is a strategy used to provide encouragement for self-confidence in preschool children so that they can increase self-confidence in children is still low therefore it is necessary to carry out a role play method that can optimize student self-confidence the following research aims to understand the effectiveness of role play on self-confidence in early childhood researchers use quantitative research types and quasi-experimental designs the samples used in the research are a number of students nonprobability sampling technique with saturated sampling the instrument in collecting data uses tests and data analysis techniques using statistical testing the results of the research show that there is an impact of the role play method on children's self-confidence there is no impact of the storytelling method on children's self-confidence then it can be concluded that the use of the role play method is quite effective in optimizing self-confidence in students

desc: Pembelajaran berbasis media digital di era revolusi industrial 4.0 menjadi hal yang mungkin diterapkan pada semua jenjang pendidikan, termasuk Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini. Penelitian bertujuan membuat aplikasi android tangram geometri Lets Be Healthy untuk meningkatkan kemampuan berpikir geometri bagi anak usia dini dan menganalisis keefektifan media tangram geometri tersebut. Menggunakan metode penelitian eksperimen. Dengan desain Quasi Eksperimental Design tipe Nonequivalen Control Group Design. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa aplikasi tangram geometri Lets Be Healthy dapat meningkatkan kemampuan berpikir geometri. Hal ini terbukti dari perbedaan rata-rata postes kelompok eksperimen terhadap kelompok kontrol. Dampak penelitian ini adalah bahwa pendidik PAUD seharusnya melakukan pembelajaran yang sesuai dengan tahapan perkembangan anak serta memberikan bentuk-bentuk pembelajaran yang memungkinkan anak memahami geometri agar pengembangan kognitif anak lebih optimal
title: Media Tangram Geometri Lets Be Healthy Berbasis Android untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Berpikir Geometri Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: android-based tangram geometry media lets be healthy to improve geometric thinking skills of early childhood digital media-based learning in the industrial revolution era is something that can be applied to all levels of education including early childhood education the study aims to create an android application tangram geometry lets be healthy to improve geometric thinking skills for early childhood and analyze the effectiveness of the tangram geometry media using an experimental research method with a quasi-experimental design type nonequivalent control group design the results of the study indicate that the tangram geometry lets be healthy application can improve geometric thinking skills this is evident from the difference in the average post-test of the experimental group to the control group the impact of this study is that early childhood educators should carry out learning that is in accordance with the stages of child development and provide forms of learning that allow children to understand geometry so that children's cognitive development is more optimal

desc: Pentingnya pembelajaran matematika bagi anak usia dini membuat orang tua ikut mengambil peran dalam menanamkan konsep matematika kepada anak disamping pengajaran di sekolah. Namun, sejak pandemi Covid-19 semua kegiatan belajar mengajar harus dilakukan sepenuhnya dari rumah. Oleh karena itu, tulisan ini mengkaji tentang bagaimana pembelajaran matematika bagi anak usia dini yang dilakukan di rumah yang tentunya dibawah pengawasan dan arahan dari orang tua. Melalui Literature review, penelitian ini dapat menjadi salah satu referensi bagi orang tua untuk dapat terus memotivasi anak mereka dalam belajar matematika secara sederhana dan menyenangkan dari rumah di tengah masa pandemi Covid-19. Hasil kajian literatur menunjukkan bahwa pembelajaran matematika bagi anak usia dini dimasa pandemi Covid-19 hendaknya pembelajaran yang menyenangkan dan objek pembelajaran adalah dari hal sederhana yang dekat dengan anak atau hal yang digemari anak. Sesuai dengan hakikat anak usia dini bermain sambil belajar, belajar seraya bermain sehingga anak tidak sadar bahwa permainan yang mereka lakukan atau hal sederhana yang disampaikan orang tua kepada anak adalah pembelajaran matematika.
title: Pembelajaran Matematika Anak Usia Dini di Masa Pandemi COVID-19 Tahun 2020
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood mathematics learning during the covid pandemic the importance of mathematics learning for early childhood makes parents take part in instilling mathematical concepts in children in addition to teaching at school but since the covid pandemic all teaching and learning activities must be carried out entirely from home therefore this article examines how mathematics learning for early childhood is carried out at home which of course is under the supervision and direction of parents through literature review this study can be one of the references for parents to be able to continue to motivate their children to learn mathematics simply and enjoyably from home in the midst of the covid pandemic the results of the literature review show that mathematics learning for early childhood during the covid pandemic should be fun learning and the object of learning is from simple things that are close to children or things that children like in accordance with the nature of early childhood playing while learning learning while playing so that children are not aware that the games they do or simple things that parents tell their children are mathematics learning

desc: Mendidik seorang anak melibatkan banyak pihak di sekitarnya. Mulai dari orang tua, keluarga, guru, teman hingga pemerintah. Dalam mendidik anak agen sosialisasi mewariskan budaya kepada anak melalui kegiatan sehari-hari mereka. Pada masa usia dini, anak-anak berperilaku sesuai apa yang mereka lihat dari orang sekitar dan belum bisa membedakan mana yang baik atau buruk. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengkaji proses sosialisasi nilai dan norma oleh guru kepada anak usia dini di TK Aulia Surakarta. Metode yang digunakan yaitu penelitian kualitatif dengan pendekatan fenomenologi. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan wawancara kepada pihak yang telah dipilih yaitu empat orang guru pendidik PAUD TK Aulia Surakarta. Teori yang digunakan untuk menganalisis penelitian ini yaitu teori perkembangan kognitif anak oleh Jean Piaget. Hasil penelitian menyimpulkan bahwa dalam proses sosialisasi norma, seorang guru memberikan contoh dalam perilaku keseharian di sekolah supaya anak bisa mengikuti perilaku baik sesuai dengan budaya yang berlaku di lingkungan. Hambatan dalam menanamkan norma yang dihadapi oleh guru yaitu ketika kebiasaan baik yang sudah diajarkan di sekolah tidak dilakukan anak di rumah karena lingkungan yang kurang mendukung.
title: Sosialisasi Nilai dan Norma kepada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: socialization of values ​​and norms to early childhood educating a child involves many parties around him starting from parents, family, teachers, friends, to the government in educating children, socialization agents pass on culture to children through their daily activities at an early age, children behave according to what they see from the people around them and cannot yet distinguish between good and bad, this study aims to examine the process of socialization of values ​​and norms by teachers to early childhood children at TK Aulia Surakarta, the method used is qualitative research with a phenomenological approach, data collection is carried out by interviewing the selected parties, namely four early childhood education teachers at TK Aulia Surakarta, the theory used to analyze this study is the theory of cognitive development of children by Jean Piaget, the results of the study concluded that in the process of socialization of norms, a teacher provides examples of daily behavior at school so that children can follow good behavior according to the culture that applies in the environment, obstacles in instilling norms faced by teachers, namely when good habits that have been taught at school are not carried out by children at home because the environment is less supportive

desc: This development research was aimed to produce multicultural education-based Pop-Up storybooks for early childhood students. This development research referred to the development design procedures developed by Thiagarajan et al. The development design was grouped into four development procedures, which include: (a) define, (b) design, (c) develop, and (d) disseminate. The product trial was carried out through 2 stages: the limited trial done with only 6 students of Grade B in TK Vanda Perta Rini Kalasan and the main trial done with 22 students of Grade B in TK Vanda Perta Rini Kalasan. The results of the product feasibility assessment score through product validation from media expert were 3.8 (very feasible) and from material expert were 4 (very feasible). Based on the result, it can be concluded that the pop-up book is effective to be used for introducing the understanding of multicultural education for early childhood students.
title: Developing A Pop-Up Storybook Based on Multicultural Education for Early Childhood Students
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: developing a popup storybook based on multicultural education for early childhood students this development research was aimed at producing multicultural education based popup storybooks for early childhood students this development research referred to the development design procedures developed by thiagarajan et al the development design was grouped into four development procedures which includes a define b design c develop and d disseminate the product trial was carried out through stages the limited trial carried out with only students of grade b in tk vanda perta rini kalasan and the main trial carried out with students of grade b in tk vanda perta rini kalasan the results of the product feasibility assessment score through product validation from media expert were very feasible and from material expert were very feasible based on the results it can be concluded that the popup book is effective to be used for introducing the understanding of multicultural education for early childhood students

desc: Masa anak usia dini merupakan saat yang kritis dalam menanamkan dan mengembangkan nilai karakter. Maka penelitian diangkat berdasarkan permasalahan perilaku anak usia dini yang masih banyak meniru perbuatan, dan kebiasaan yang tidak baik dari teman, lingkungan, dan media teknologi. Metode pendidik dalam pembelajaran untuk pengembangan nilai karakter kurang bervariatif, lebih banyak menerapkan metode pembiasaan, praktek, dan keteladanan. Tujuan  penelitian yaitu   menganalisis berkisah untuk mengembangkan nilai karakter anak usia dini menuju era society 5.0 . Jenis penelitian deskriptif kualitatif, dengan subyek penelitian 17 anak usia 4-5 tahun.  Metode pengumpulan data dan instrumen melalui wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Analisis data dengan Milles and Huberman. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa berkisah dapat mengembangkan nilai karakter anak usia dini menuju era society 5.0. Nilai karakter yang dikembangkan yaitu berilmu, bersatu, bekerjasama, percaya diri, tidak sombong, tidak serakah, tidak mengambil milik orang lain, bertanggung jawab, teguh pendirian, taat beribadah, meminta pertolongan Allah, dan yakin doanya dikabulkan.
title: Berkisah untuk Mengembangkan Nilai Karakter Anak Usia Dini Menuju Era Sosiety 5.0
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: storytelling to develop character values ​​of early childhood towards the era of society Early childhood is a critical time in instilling and developing character values, so the study was raised based on the problem of early childhood behavior who still imitate bad behavior and habits from friends, the environment and media technology, the educator's method in learning to develop character values ​​is less varied, more applying the method of habituation, practice and exemplary behavior, the purpose of the study is to analyze storytelling to develop character values ​​of early childhood towards the era of society, the type of qualitative descriptive research with research subjects aged children years, data collection methods and instruments through interviews, observation and documentation, data analysis with Milles and Huberman, the results of the study show that storytelling can develop character values ​​of early childhood towards the era of society, the character values ​​developed are knowledgeable, united, cooperative, self-confident, not arrogant, not greedy, not taking other people's property, responsible, firm in stance, obedient, worship, ask for God's help and believe that his prayers will be answered

desc: Kematangan emosi adalah kematangan kemampuan seseorang untuk mengatur dan memproses perasaannya agar dapat merespons secara efektif situasi yang menimbulkan perasaan tersebut. Pertumbuhan emosi dan sosial anak dapat dibantu dengan penggunaan cerita. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk menentukan apakah penggunaan narasi untuk membantu anak-anak tumbuh secara emosional dan sosial adalah efektif. Penelitian tindakan kelas digunakan dalam penelitian ini sebanyak dua siklus. Sembilan belas anak dalam rentang usia 6-7 tahun berpartisipasi dalam penelitian ini. Observasi dan dokumentasi yang cermat sangat penting dalam metode pengumpulan data penelitian. Pada siklus pertama, rata-rata 66,4% anak memenuhi harapan perkembangan sosial dan emosional, berdasarkan penelitian yang menunjukkan bahwa teknik narasi meningkatkan perkembangan sosial dan emosional anak. Rata-rata pertumbuhan anak pada siklus II sesuai dengan prediksi sebesar 94,03% kasus. Penelitian ini menyimpulkan bahwa mengajarkan keterampilan sosial dan emosional kepada anak-anak melalui cerita adalah cara yang efektif untuk melakukannya. Temuan penelitian ini mempunyai konsekuensi terhadap desain teknik narasi, khususnya yang ditujukan untuk anak-anak.
title: Meningkatkan Perkembangan Sosial Emosional Anak melalui Metode Cerita
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improve children's social emotional development through story method emotional maturity is the maturity of a person's ability to regulate and process their feelings in order to respond effectively to situations that cause these feelings emotional and social growth of children can be helped by the use of stories the purpose of this study was to determine whether the use of narratives to help children grow emotionally and socially is effective classroom action research was used in this study as many as two cycles nineteen children in the age range of years participated in this study careful observation and documentation are very important in the method of collecting research data in the first cycle the average child met the expectations of social and emotional development based on research showing that narrative techniques improve children's social and emotional development the average child growth in cycle ii was in accordance with predictions of the case this study concluded that teaching social and emotional skills to children through stories is an effective way to do so the findings of this study have consequences for the design of narrative techniques especially those intended for children

desc: Zahrawain merupakan salah satu metode menghafal al-Qur’an anak usia dini. Metode ini menekankan pentingnya mengoptimalkan indera audio dan visual anak saat menghafalkan al-Qur’an. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk melakukan eksperimen penerapan program hafalan al-Qur’an anak usia dini menggunakan strategi Zahrawain. Metode yang digunakan adalah eksperimen model Single Subject Research dengan satu sampel dalam desain A-B-A’. Pengumpulan data menggunakan teknik observasi, wawancara, tes dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian adalah subjek sebelum adanya perlakuan menunjukkan belum sama sekali menghafal ayat yang akan diberikan, kegiatan menghafal al-Qur’an dengan strategi Zahrawain efektif untuk meningkatkan program hafalan al-Qur’an anak usia dini; dan kondisi subjek setelah diberikan perlakuan menunjukkan pada kategori baik. Secara umum dapat disimpulkan bahwa Zahrawain dalam program hafalan al-Qur’an untuk anak usia dini cukup efektif diterapkan.
title: Zahrawain: Strategi Program Hafalan Al-Qur’an Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: zahrawain strategy for early childhood Quran memorization program zahrawain is one of the methods for memorizing the Quran for early childhood. This method emphasizes the importance of optimizing children's audio and visual senses when memorizing the Quran. This study aims to conduct an experiment on the application of an early childhood Quran memorization program using the zahrawain strategy. The method used is a single subject research model experiment with one sample in the aba design. Data collection uses observation techniques, interviews, tests and documentation. The results of the study are that subjects before the treatment showed that they had not memorized the verses that would be given. Quran memorization activities with the zahrawain strategy are effective in improving early childhood Quran memorization programs and the condition of the subjects after being given treatment showed that they were in the good category. In general, it can be concluded that zahrawain in the Quran memorization program for early childhood is quite effective in being implemented.

desc: Perkembangan motorik halus sangat penting bagi perkembangan anak secara keseluruhan . Anak usia taman kanak-kanak masih sering mengalami kesulitan dalam menggerakkan jari-jarinya untuk kegiatan seperti menggunting, menggambar, merobek, melipat, menyusun dan mengisi pola dengan menempelkan benda-benda kecil. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan kemampuan motorik halus dan kreativitas pada anak usia dini melalui kegiatan kolase. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah kajian pustaka yang dilakukan dengan mengumpulkan data-data atau berdasarkan karya tulis ilmiah yang menghubungkan penelitian dengan literatur yang ada untuk memecahkan suatu masalah. Metode pengumpulan data pustaka dengan membaca dan mencatat serta mengelola bahan penelitian lalu menyimpulkan bahan penelitian. Hasil penelitian yang didapat bahwa perkembangan kemampuan motorik halus dan kreativitas pada anak usia dini memerlukan koordinasi mata dan tangan, seperti menyusun, merobek dan menempel yang dilakukan melalui kegiatan kolase.
title: Analisis Kemampuan Motorik Halus dan Kreativitas pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Kegiatan Kolase
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of fine motor skills and creativity in early childhood through collage activities Fine motor development is very important for the overall development of children kindergarten age children still often have difficulty in moving their fingers for activities such as cutting drawing tearing folding arranging and filling patterns by sticking small objects This study aims to describe fine motor skills and creativity in early childhood through collage activities The research method used is a literature review which is carried out by collecting data or based on scientific papers that connect research with existing literature to solve a problem The method of collecting library data by reading and recording and managing research materials then concluding research materials The results of the study obtained that the development of fine motor skills and creativity in early childhood requires eye and hand coordination such as arranging tearing and sticking which is done through collage activities

desc: Karakter yang harus dimiliki oleh pendidik PAUD sangat berbeda dengan karakter pendidik pada jenjang diatasnya. Pondasi yang dibangun dalam PAUD memerlukan struktur yang kuat, baik aspek pembelajaran dalam kegiatan bermain maupun pengembangan potensi anak, sehingga diperlukan tenaga pendidik yang juga mempunyai karakter kuat dan berbeda. Penelitian ini dilakukan untuk mengetahui seperti apa karakter pendidik PAUD yang diperlukan dalam proses pembelajaran pada anak usia dini.
