desc: Kolaborasi strategis antara lembaga PAUD dan orang tua sangat penting untuk menjembatani atau mensinkroniksasikan materi kurikulum PAUD dengan materi pengasuhan dan pendidikan anak usia dini oleh orang tua di rumah. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk menganalisis implementasi koborasi strategi antara lembaga PAUD dan orang tua di era digital melalui program parenting di PAUD Ibnu Hasan yang diselenggarakan setiap bulan dengan mengacu pada rencana tahunan dan semester satuan PAUD.  Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah studi kasus dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan mencakup observasi, wawancara mendalam, dan studi dokumentasi. Data kemudian dianalisis dengan menggunakan triangulasi. Temuan penelitian mencakup: pokok materi parenting meliputi:  tata cara pengasuhan dan mengatasi masalah anak usia dini;  kurikulum anak usia dini, penyiapan makanan sehat dan penataan lingkungan bersih dan sehat, sanitasi dan pola hidup sehat;  pembinaan moral dan keagamaan. Semua kegiatan dalam program parenting dibiayai oleh pihak yayasan ibnu Hasan.
title: Kolaborasi Strategis Lembaga PAUD dan Orang Tua di Era Digital melalui Program Parenting
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: strategic collaboration between early childhood education institutions and parents in the digital era through parenting programs strategic collaboration between early childhood education institutions and parents is very important to bridge or synchronize early childhood education curriculum materials with early childhood care and education materials by parents at home the purpose of this study is to analyze the implementation of strategic collaboration between early childhood education institutions and parents in the digital era through parenting programs at Ibnu Hasan early childhood education which is held every month with reference to the annual and semester plans of the early childhood education unit the method used in this study is a case study with a qualitative approach data collection techniques used include observation in-depth interviews and documentation studies data is then analyzed using triangulation research findings include parenting material including procedures for caring for and overcoming early childhood problems early childhood curriculum preparation of healthy food and arrangement of a clean and healthy environment sanitation and healthy lifestyle moral and religious guidance all activities in the parenting program are funded by the Ibnu Hasan Foundation

desc: Tingginya kasus kekerasan pada anak menjadi masalah yang perlu dianalisis lebih mendalam. Jenis kekerasan pada anak sangat beragam mulai dari eksploitasi; trackfiking; kekerasan fisik, spikis, seksual, penelatantaran, dan sebagainya. Tujuan penelitian untuk menganalisis pelaksanaan kurikulum ramah anak di PAUD Kabupaten Sukoharjo. Penelitian menggunakan kualitatif dengan teknik pengumpulan data observasi, studi literatur, wawancara dengan FGD. Analisis data menggunakan model interaktif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa: kurikulum merdeka menekankan kebebasan memilih kegiatan bermain sesuai minat dan bakat anak; perangkat pembelajaran secara adminidtratif belum memunculkan nilai ramah anak; pelaksanaan pembelajaran ramah anak atas peran guru sebagai fasilitator; media dan APE yang aman, mudah digunakan anak; materi pembelajaran sesuai perkembangan anak; ragam kegiatan sudah tidak bias gender dan nondiskriminasi belum sepenuhnya terpenuhi; Penilaian dilakukan dengan teknik observasi, wawancara, unjukerja secara objektif dan deskriptif terhadap setiap capaian perkembangan anak. Hasil penelitian dapat menjadi panduan guru dalam membuat perencanaan, melakasanakan, dan menilai pembelajaran ramah anak di kurikulum merdeka.
title: Analisis Ketercapaian Pelaksanaan Kurikulum Ramah Anak di Lembaga PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of the achievement of the implementation of child-friendly curriculum in early childhood education institutions, the high number of cases of violence against children is a problem that needs to be analyzed in more depth. The types of violence against children are very diverse, ranging from exploitation, tracking, physical violence, psychological violence, sexual neglect, and so on. The purpose of the study was to analyze the implementation of the child-friendly curriculum in early childhood education institutions in Sukoharjo Regency. The study used qualitative methods with observation data collection techniques, literature studies, interviews with FGDs, data analysis using interactive models. The results of the study showed that the independent curriculum emphasizes the freedom to choose play activities according to children's interests and talents. Administrative learning devices have not yet brought up child-friendly values. The implementation of child-friendly learning on the role of teachers as facilitators. Safe media and apps are easy for children to use. Learning materials are in accordance with children's development. The variety of activities is no longer gender biased and non-discriminatory. The assessment was carried out using observation techniques, interviews, and performance objectively and descriptively on each achievement of child development. The results of the study can be a guide for teachers in making plans, implementing and assessing child-friendly learning in the independent curriculum.

desc: Pelnellitian ini belrtujuan untuk melnganalisa pelran guru selbagai pelmbimbing, moltivatolr selrta fasilitatolr untuk pelngelmbangan karaktelr mandiri. Meltoldel pelnellitian yang dipakai adalah kualitatif. Telknik yang digunakan dalam pelnellitian adalah olbselrvasi, wawancara dan dolkumelntasi. Pelnellitian ini dilakukan di klolmpolk A TK Colndolngcatur, delngan jumlah subjelk 10 anak dan 3 guru. Hasil dari pelnellitian ini melngungkapkan bahwa pelran guru dalam pelrannya selbagai pelmbimbing dan moltivatolr tellah dijalankan delngan elfelktif, selpelrti melmbelrikan arahan dan melnunjukkan colntolh kolnkrelt. Melskipun belgitu, belbelrapa anak masih bellum selpelnuhnya melndapatkan rangsangan dari lingkungan rumah, selhingga ada belbelrapa di antara melrelka yang masih melmelrlukan bantuan baik dari guru maupun telman selbaya. Ollelh karelna itu, dalam upaya untuk melmbantu anak-anak melngelmbangkan kelmandirian, pelnting bagi guru dan olrang tua untuk melmbelrikan dukungan yang kolkolh, telrmasuk melmbelrikan pelluang kelpada anak-anak untuk melnelmukan dan melnjellajahi hal-hal baru.Top of Form
title: Peran Guru dalam Mengembangkan Karakter Mandiri pada Anak Usia 4-5 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The role of teachers in developing independent character in children aged 18 years This study aims to analyze the role of teachers as guides, educators and facilitators for the development of independent character The study used is qualitative The technique used in the study is observation, interviews and documentation This study was conducted in groups of TK Colndolngcatur with a number of children and teachers The results of this study reveal that the role of teachers in their role as guides and educators has been carried out effectively such as providing direction and showing cooperative cooperation Even though some children have not yet fully received stimulation from the home environment, there are some of them who still need help from both teachers and friends are equally important because in an effort to help children develop independence it is important for teachers and parents to provide collaborative support including providing opportunities for children to discover and explore new things top of form

desc: Adalah fitrah manusia untuk selalu dapat menjalin hubungan intim dengan orang-orang terdekat di lingkungannya, dan yang paling utama ialah menjalin kedekatan dengan kedua orang tua. Pola asuh orang tua akan berdampak terhadap kelekatan anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis lebih mendalam bagaimana bentuk pola asuh ayah tunggal terhadap kelekatan anak. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kualitatif.  Partisipan dalam penelitian ini berjumlah 5 orang ayah tunggal. Teknik analisis data berupa triangulasi model interaktif menggunakan teknik analisis data berupa triangulasi model interaktif yang meliputi pengumpulan data, tahap pereduksian data, tahap penyajian data, dan tahap pengambilan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pola asuh orang tua dengan status ayah tunggal lebih cenderung menggunakan pola asuh otoritatif dan permisif. Sedangkan kelekatan yang diberikan ayah tungga kepada anak cenderung menggunakan pola secure attachment. Meskipun anak telah memasuki perkembangan usia menuju dewasa, mereka tetap membutuhkan kasih sayang dan perhatian dari orang tua.
title: Analisis Pola Asuh Ayah Tunggal terhadap  Kelekatan Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of single father parenting patterns on child attachment is human nature to always be able to establish intimate relationships with the closest people in their environment and the most important thing is to establish closeness with both parents parenting patterns will have an impact on child attachment this study aims to analyze in more depth how the form of single father parenting patterns on child attachment the research method used is descriptive qualitative participants in this study amounted to single fathers data analysis techniques in the form of interactive model triangulation using data analysis techniques in the form of interactive model triangulation which includes data collection data reduction stage data presentation stage and conclusion drawing stage the results of the study show that parenting patterns with single father status tend to use authoritative and permissive parenting patterns while the attachment given by single fathers to children tends to use a secure attachment pattern even though children have entered the developmental age towards adulthood they still need affection and attention from their parents

desc: The purpose of this research is to know the influence of early childhood science experiments on child cognitive development in Kartika Siwi Pusdikpal Kindergarten Cimahi. Learning early childhood science experiments at Kartika Siwi Kindergarten can help early childhood knowledge and understanding of science concepts, and help put aspects related to science skills to improve children's cognition. The research problem is whether early childhood science experiments have an effect on the cognitive development of children in Kartika Siwi Kindergarten. The research method used is experimental research method. The population of this research is all children in Kartika Siwi Kindergarten which amounted to 26 children. Sampling research using total sampling technique. Data collection using pretest and postest, documentation, as well as observation and data processing using t-test statistical formula. Based on the results of hypothesis testing that t arithmetic  t table, is 8.20  2.05 so the hypothesis in this study accepted. The results showed that early childhood science experiments can affect children's cognitive development of 4.50 (good category). It is suggested to teachers to be able to improve cognitive abilities of children by using variations and innovative methods in different games so that the cognitive abilities of children can be further improved.
title: Pengaruh Percobaan Sains Anak Usia Dini terhadap Perkembangan Kognitif Anak di TK Kartika Siwi Pusdikpal Kota Cimahi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The purpose of this research is to know the influence of early childhood science experiments on child cognitive development in Kartika Siwi Pusdikpal Kindergarten Cimahi learning early childhood science experiments at Kartika Siwi kindergarten can help early childhood knowledge and understanding of science concepts and help put aspects related to science skills to improve children's cognition the research problem is whether early childhood science experiments have an effect on the cognitive development of children in kartika siwi kindergarten the research method used is experimental research method the population of this research is all children in kartika siwi kindergarten which amounted to children sampling research using total sampling technique data collection using pretest and posttest documentation as well as observation and data processing using ttest statistical formula based on the results of hypothesis testing that t arithmetic t table is so the hypothesis in this study accepted the results showed that early childhood science experiments can affect children's cognitive development of good categories it is suggested to teachers to be able to improve the cognitive abilities of children by using variations and innovative methods in different games so that's cognitive abilities of children can be further improved

desc: Penelitian ini bermaksud untuk menghasilkan instrumen evaluasi program PAUD HI. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian pengembangan instrumen Instrumen penilaian Evaluasi Program PAUD HI  yaitu instrumen yang digunakan untuk  mengukur efektivitas Program PAUD HI. Sebelum data dikumpulkan, instrumen sebagai pengumpul data perlu dipastikan memiliki legitimasi/validitas/inference quality. Pada penelitian mixed methods karena tidak terlalu menekankan pada pengujian konsep dari suatu teori, pembuktian legitimasi instrumen dapat dilakukan dengan review eksternal salah satunya adalah meminta “pakar/teman sejawat” untuk membantu menilai sejauh mana instrumen pengumpulan data yang digunakan benar-benar mengukur apa yang ingin nilai. Hasil penghitungan nilai reliabilitas seluruh butir instrumen menunjukkan bahwa rata-rata nilai koefisien  dalam kategori tinggi (0,71) dan nilai reliabilitas untuk ceklis dokumen juga dalam kategori tinggi (0,73) yang artinya seluruh butir instrumen memiliki tingkat reliabilitas yang tinggi sehingga layak melakukan evaluasi program PAUD HI
title: Pentingnya Modifikasi Instrumen Pengembangan Anak Usia Dini Holistik Integratif
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the importance of modifying holistic integrative early childhood development instruments this study intends to produce an evaluation instrument for the PAUD HI program this study is a research on the development of an evaluation assessment instrument for the PAUD HI program, namely an instrument used to measure the effectiveness of the PAUD HI program before data is collected the instrument as a data collector needs to be ensured to have legitimacy validity inference quality in mixed methods research because it does not emphasize too much on testing the concept of a theory proof of the legitimacy of the instrument can be done with an external review one of which is asking peer experts to help assess the extent to which the data collection instrument used really measures what is desired the results of the calculation of the reliability value of all instrument items show that the average coefficient value is in the high category and the reliability value for the document checklist is also in the high category which means that all instrument items have a high level of reliability so that it is worthy of evaluating the PAUD HI program

desc: Meningkatnya penggunaan gadget di kalangan anak usia dini menimbulkan keresahan orang tua. Banyaknya pengaruh negatif bagi anak akibat penggunaan gadget yang berlebihan, menyebabkan orang tua membutuhkan panduan mengenai bagaimana penggunaan gadget yang sesuai untuk anak usia dini. Oleh karena itu tujuan dalam penelitian ini adalah mengembangkan saku panduan penggunaan gadget untuk optimalisasi perkembangan anak usia dini bagi orang tua dengan menggunakan model pengembangan 4D. Pengambilan data dilakukan dengan wawancara dan angket. Subjek penelitiannya adalah guru PAUD di kota Pontianak dengan validator ahli materi dari praktisi Magister Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini dan validator ahli media dari praktisi lembaga PAUD. Teknik analisis yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kualitatif dan kuantitatif. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan buku saku ini layak digunakan karena berisi materi yang bermanfaat dan dapat dipahami oleh orang tua serta memiliki tampilan yang menarik, ringkas disertai dengan gambar yang jelas sehingga mudah dipahami oleh orang tua.
title: Pengembangan Buku Saku Panduan Penggunaan Gadget untuk Optimalisasi Perkembangan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of a pocket guidebook for using gadgets to optimize early childhood development the increasing use of gadgets among early childhood children has caused parental anxiety the many negative effects on children due to excessive use of gadgets has caused parents to need guidance on how to use gadgets appropriately for early childhood children therefore the purpose of this study is to develop a pocket guidebook for using gadgets to optimize early childhood development for parents using the d development model data collection was carried out through interviews and questionnaires the research subjects were early childhood education teachers in Pontianak city with expert validators from practitioners of early childhood education masters and media expert validators from practitioners of early childhood education institutions the analysis techniques used were descriptive qualitative and quantitative the results of the study showed that this pocketbook is suitable for use because it contains useful material that can be understood by parents and has an attractive, concise appearance accompanied by clear pictures so that it is easy for parents to understand

desc: Memperkenalkan pendidikan sastra untuk anak usia dini masih menjadi pendidikan yang langka, padahal pendidikan sastra mempunyai tujuan agar anak mampu beradaptasi ditengah-tengah keberagaman budaya dan tradisi yang berkembang di Indonesia. Tujuan  penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan bagaimana menanamkan tradisi Gawai Dayak sebagai warisan budaya kepada anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan adalah metode kualitatif deskriptif. Penanaman pembelajaran tradisi lisan pada anak usia dini dapat dilakukan dengan cara, menyaksikan tradisi secara langsung dan didampingi oleh para guru dan orang tua, serta ikut langsung berpartisipasi pada berbagai program seperti pawai budaya. Pembelajaran tradisi Gawai Dayak pada anak dapat berfokus pada rangkaian kegiatan tradisi, tarian tradisi dan benda-benda asesoris perlengkapan tradisi Gawai Dayak seperti sajian tradisi, dan gendang. Fokus tersebut dapat diperkenalkan dengan metode bercerita dan metode bermain yang dapat dikembangan dengan permainan tradisional. Pembelajaran sastra hendaknya dapat masuk kedalam kurikulum pembelajaran dan disesuaikan dengan pembelajaran modern sepeti membuat pembelajaran aplikasi daring bergambar kartun.
title: Pengenalan Sastra untuk Siswa Taman Kanak-kanak (Studi Kasus pada Tradisi Gawai Dayak)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Introduction to literature for kindergarten students Case study on the Dayak Gawai tradition Introducing literary education for early childhood is still a rare education, even though literary education aims to enable children to adapt amidst the diversity of cultures and traditions that develop in Indonesia The purpose of this study is to describe how to instill the Dayak Gawai tradition as a cultural heritage to early childhood The method used is a descriptive qualitative method Instilling oral tradition learning in early childhood can be done by witnessing the tradition directly and accompanied by teachers and parents and directly participating in various programs such as cultural parades Learning the Dayak Gawai tradition in children can focus on a series of traditional activities, traditional dances and objects of Dayak Gawai tradition equipment accessories such as traditional offerings and drums The focus can be introduced with storytelling methods and play methods that can be developed with traditional games Literature learning should be included in the learning curriculum and adapted to modern learning such as making online learning applications with cartoon images

desc: Deteksi dini tumbuh kembang sangat penting, namun penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pelayanan deteksi dini pada suatu wilayah masih rendah. Berdasarkan data TK Pertiwi, deteksi dini oleh pihak Puskesmas yang dilakukan ke sekolah hanya sebatas deteksi dini pertumbuhan saja. Oleh karena itu, penulis mengamati deteksi dini di empat area meliputi; pertumbuhan dan perkembangan, penyimpangan perilaku emosional (KMPE) dan gangguan pemusatan perhatian dan hiperaktifitas (GPPH). Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk mendeteksi penyimpangan tumbuh kembang pada anak. Penelitian ini mengguanakan deskriptif kualitatif dengan informan penelitian guru. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui  cara observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi dengan subjek penelitian adalah sebanyak sepuluh anak hasil rujukan dari guru. Hasil deteksi dini pertumbuhan menunjukkan status gizi dua anak kurus, tujuh anak normal, dan satu anak gemuk. Satu anak kemungkinan mengalami penyimpangan pada area perkembangan, KMPE  enam anak, dan  GPPH tiga anak. Penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa rujukan guru terkait permasalahan perkembangan anak mempunyai akurasi yang tinggi dan memerlukan skrining lebih lanjut sebagai awal upaya intervensi.
title: Deteksi Dini Tumbuh Kembang pada Anak Usia Pra Sekolah
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early detection of growth and development in preschool children Early detection of growth and development is very important, but research shows that early detection services in a region are still low based on data from TK Pertiwi Early detection by the health center carried out at schools is only limited to early detection of growth, therefore the author observed early detection in four areas including growth and development, emotional behavioral deviations, kmpe and attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, gpph The purpose of this study was to detect growth and development deviations in children This study used qualitative descriptive with teacher research informants Data collection was carried out through observation, interviews and documentation with research subjects being ten children referred by teachers The results of early detection of growth showed the nutritional status of two thin children, seven normal children and one obese child, one child likely to experience deviations in the development area, kmpe, six children and gpph, three children This study shows that teacher referrals related to child development problems have high accuracy and require further screening as an initial intervention effort

desc: Alphabetic skills were one of the early literacy skills.  Several studies on alphabetic skills have been conducted in Indonesia. Meta-analysis was used to describe the children's alphabet skills aged 3 to 6 years as an aggregate. The maximum likelihood estimation method and random effect design were performed to aggregate children's alphabetic skills that can be generalized in Indonesia. The articles were obtained from research published between 2014 and 2021. Those were accessed and collected through a collection of bachelor's thesis on Google Scholar and university digital libraries. The meta-analysis was carried out with JASP. The results showed that the ability to recognize letters among children aged 3 to 6 years in Indonesia was 50.16 (scale 0-100). Despite the fact that mastering letters has an impact on children’s growth in early literacy, the study’s findings show that youngsters in Indonesia still have a low level of letter recognition. These results encourage to improve the quality of kindergartens literacy instruction in Indonesia
title: Predictors of Children’s Literacy: A Meta-Analysis Study Alphabet of Knowledge
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: predictors of children's literacy a metaanalysis study alphabet of knowledge alphabetic skills were one of the early literacy skills several studies on alphabetic skills have been conducted in Indonesia metaanalysis was used to describe the children's alphabet skills aged to years as an aggregate the maximum likelihood estimation method and random effect design were performed to aggregate children's alphabetic skills that can be generalized in Indonesia the articles were obtained from research published among and those were accessed and collected through a collection of bachelors theses on google scholar and university digital libraries the metaanalysis was carried out with jasp the results showed that the ability to recognize letters among children aged to years in Indonesia was scaled despite the fact that mastering letters has an impact on children's growth in early literacy the studies findings show that young people in Indonesia still have a low level of letters recognition of these results encourages to improve the quality of kindergartens literacy instruction in Indonesia

desc: Pendidikan kecakapan literasi keuangan masih memerlukan penguatan dan kerjasama antar pemerintah dan masyarakat. Hal ini perlu dilakukan, agar siswa taman kanak-kanak akan lebih sadar akan kecakapan keuangan, jika sejak dini diperkenalkan di bangku sekolah serta dibantu oleh orang tua di rumah. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk   mengetahui bagaimana cara memperkenalkan literasi keuangan melalui buku literasi pada siswa TK dan untuk mengetahui tahapan belajar literasi keuangan  pada siswa TK. Metode yang digunakan adalah metode penelitian tindakan kelas. Sampel yang digunakan adalah siswa TK B TK sebanyak 32 siswa. Tahapan penelitian menggunakan tahapan prasiklus, siklus 1 dan siklus 2. Peneliti menggunakan buku cerita gambar yang diterbitkan oleh OJK ( Otoritas Jasa Keuangan). Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa siswa mempunyai nilai rata-rata yang lebih baik sebelum digunakan buku bergambar literasi keuangan. Para guru dan orang tua dapat memberikan pengalaman nyata dalam kecakapan literasi keuangan, seperti gemar menabung dan memilah kebutuhan dan keinginan.
title: Pengembangkan Kecakapan Finansial melalui Buku Literasi OJK pada Siswa TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: financial literacy skills development through ojk literacy books for kindergarten students financial literacy skills education still requires strengthening and cooperation between the government and the community this needs to be done so that kindergarten students will be more aware of financial skills if introduced early on in school and assisted by parents at home this study aims to find out how to introduce financial literacy through literacy books for kindergarten students and to find out the stages of learning financial literacy for kindergarten students the method used is the classroom action research method the sample used is kindergarten b tk students as many as students the research stages use the pre-cycle cycle and cycle stages the researcher uses picture story books published by the ojk financial services authority the results of the study show that students have better average scores before using picture books financial literacy teachers and parents can provide real experiences in financial literacy skills such as being fond of saving and sorting needs and wants

desc: Anak-anak akan lebih mandiri jika kelak dapat menjalankan bisnis sendiri secara alamiah. Siswa tidak diajari secara langsung, namun siswa mempelajari sendiri dengan bimbingan secara berkesinambungan. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan kemampuan kewirausahaan apa saja yang harus diberikan kepada anak sejak dini dan untuk mengetahui bagaimana cara anak mempelajari kewirausahaan. Metode penelitian ini adalah metode kualitatif deskriptif, dengan menggunakan instrumen wawancara. Teknik analisis data dengan menggunakan reduksi data, display dan kesimpulan. Responden sebanyak 7 orang tua murid yang berprofesi sebagai wirausahawan. Hasil penelitian adalah kemampuan kewirausahaan yang dapat diperkenalkan sejak dini adalah kemampuan berbisnis berdasarkan minat dan hobi yang mereka miliki, dan kemampuan lain seperti literasi keuangan, dasar-dasar digital dan mental tidak mudah menyerah. Anak mampu mempelajari bisnis jika orang tua, membimbing anak untuk berfikir bagaimana mengelola usaha/bisnis dengan terencana. Guru sebagai fasilitator dapat mencatat minat dan bakat siswa. Guru sebaiknya mengembangkan metode belajar yang menggunakan perangkat digital walaupun dalam bentuk sederhana
title: Bagaimana Anak Mempelajari Kemampuan Kewirausahaan Sejak Dini?
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: how children learn entrepreneurial skills from an early age children will be more independent if they can run their own business naturally students are not taught directly but students learn on their own with continuous guidance the purpose of this study is to describe what entrepreneurial skills should be given to children from an early age and to find out how children learn entrepreneurship this research method is a descriptive qualitative method using interview instruments data analysis techniques using data reduction display and conclusion respondents as many as parents of students who work as entrepreneurs the results of the study are entrepreneurial skills that can be introduced from an early age are business skills based on their interests and hobbies and other skills such as financial literacy digital basics and a mentality that does not give up easily children are able to learn business if parents guide children to think about how to manage a planned business teachers as facilitators can record students' interests and talents teachers should develop learning methods that use digital devices even in simple forms

desc: Pemilihan media yang tepat dan sesuai sasaran pengguna menjadi dasar dan pertimbangan bagi para guru. Untuk itu, guru hendaknya dapat memahami prinsip dan jenis media bagi anak. Penelitian dengan tujuan untuk mengetahui aspek penilaian media pembelajaran pembelajaran berbasis TIK terintegrasi dan menganalisis hasil uji kelayakan produk menjadi perhatian tersendiri bagi para guru dan pengembang. Penelitian ini adalah menggunakan desain penelitian dan pengembangan pendidikan. Hasil penelitian berupa model media pembelajaran berbasis TIK terintegrasi berupa aplikasi portal Jateng Belajar dan modul pemanfaatannya dinyatakan sangat layak. Kebaruan model ini diantaranya; kelengkapan layanan, terintegrasi, komprehensif, kompatibel baik diakses melalui komputer maupun smartphone, konten yang variatif, dan memuat Learning Management System (LMS) yang mudah dimanfaatkan
title: Studi Kelayakan Pengembangan Layanan Media Pembelajaran Berbasis TIK Terintegrasi untuk PAUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Feasibility study of the development of integrated ICT-based learning media services for early childhood education The selection of appropriate media and in accordance with user targets is the basis and consideration for teachers, therefore teachers should be able to understand the principles and types of media for children. Research with the aim of determining aspects of the assessment of integrated ICT-based learning media and analyzing the results of product feasibility tests is a special concern for teachers and developers. This research uses educational research and development design. The results of the research are in the form of an integrated ICT-based learning media model in the form of a Jateng Belajar portal application and its utilization module. The novelty of this model includes completeness of comprehensive integrated services, compatible with both computer and smartphone access. Varied content and contains an easy-to-use learning management system LMS.

desc: Pelajaran PAI sering menjadi pelajaran yang dianggap membosankan karena model metode konvensioal yang telah menjadi budaya di dalamnya. Penelitian ini berfokus untuk menguraikan konsep pendidikan di Finalndia berdasarkan kacamata Timothy D. Walker dan menerapkannya pada pelajaran PAI bagi anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kepustakaan dengan data-data primer dapat ditemukan melalui buku, majalah, dan jurnal yang tersedia secara online ataupun offline. Data yang didapatkan kemudian diolah dengan teori Milles dan Huberman dalam tahap mengumpulkan, menyajikan, dan menarik kesimpulan dari penelitian. hasil dari penelitian ini didapati bahwa dalam asas kesejahteraan peserta didik, inovasi dilakukan dalam aspek tempat duduk di kelas, menyederhanakan tempelan di dinding-dinding kelas, mengkreasikan bentuk PR, melakukan kegiatan brain breaks, dan memperluas makna ruang kelas. pada asas hubungan seorang guru dengan murid, inovasi dalam hal formasi guru PAI dan hubungan guru dan murid. Adapun asas terakhir adalah inovasi pembelajaran berdasar prinsip kecerdasan majemuk.
title: Inovasi Pembelajaran PAI bagi Anak Usia Dini berdasarkan Nilai Pendidikan Finlandia menurut Timothy D. Walker
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: innovation of early childhood education based on Finnish educational values ​​according to Timothy D Walker, early childhood education lessons are often considered boring because of the conventional method model that has become a culture in it. This study focuses on describing the concept of education in Finland based on Timothy D Walker's perspective and applying it to early childhood education lessons. This study uses a library approach with primary data that can be found through books, magazines and journals available online or offline. The data obtained is then processed with Milles and Huberman's theory in the stage of collecting, presenting and drawing conclusions from the research. The results of this study found that in the principle of student welfare, innovation was carried out in the aspect of seating in the classroom, simplifying stickers on the walls of the classroom, creating forms of pr, carrying out brain breaks activities and expanding the meaning of the classroom on the principle of the relationship between a teacher and students. Innovation in terms of the formation of early childhood education teachers and the relationship between teachers and students. The last principle is learning innovation based on the principle of multiple intelligences.

desc: Kemandirian seorang anak dipengaruhi oleh peran keluarga, terutama ibu yang berperan sebagai madrasah pertama mereka. Karena keterikatan yang terbentuk memberi anak rasa nyaman dan perlindungan serta menawarkan landasan yang aman untuk menjelajahi dunia, hal itu berfungsi sebagai standar untuk mencapai pertumbuhan yang diharapkan, termasuk perkembangan kemandirian. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengkaji secara teoritis bagaimana kemandirian anak usia dini dipengaruhi oleh secure attachment seorang ibu. Metode penelitian ini adalah literature riview, untuk melakukan tinjauan literatur, peneliti membaca, menganalisis, dan mengembangkan kesimpulan. Hasil dari kajian literatur yaitu secure attachment ibu berpengaruh positif terhadap kemandirian anak karena anak yang memiliki secure attachment akan memiliki kemampuan sosial yang baik sehingga mampu menjalin interaksi dengan lingkungannya, hal ini membuat anak menyelesaikan tugas dan tidak mudah berputus asa karena secara otomatis mendapatkan dukungan dari lingkungannya, oleh karena itu dibutuhkanlah perasan ibu untuk memberikan secure attachment dengan bersikap lebih responsif dan memberi dukungan agar anak bisa lebih mandiri.
title: Pengaruh Secure Attachment Ibu terhadap Kemandirian Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of secure attachment of mother on the independence of early childhood children The independence of a child is influenced by the role of the family, especially the mother who acts as their first madrasah because the attachment that is formed gives the child a sense of comfort and protection and offers a safe foundation to explore the world. It functions as a standard for achieving the expected growth including the development of independence. The purpose of this study is to examine theoretically how the independence of early childhood children is influenced by a mother's secure attachment. The research method is a literature review. To conduct a literature review, researchers read, analyze and develop conclusions from the results of the literature review, namely that secure attachment of the mother has a positive effect on the independence of children because children who have secure attachment will have good social skills so that they are able to interact with their environment. This makes children complete tasks and not easily give up because they automatically get support from their environment. Therefore, the mother's feelings are needed to provide secure attachment by being more responsive and providing support so that children can be more independent.

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh media pembelajaran digital animasi dan kepercayaan diri terhadap hasil belajar Pendidikan Agama Islam. Populasi dalam penelitian ini adalah siswa kelas 2 SD di kota Medan dengan sampel 32 anak dalam kelompok eksperimen dan 32 anak dalam kelompok kontrol. Sampel diambil dengan teknik cluster sampling. Data dikumpulkan melalui tes yang telah divalidasi. Teknik analisis data menggunakan uji varians (ANAVA) dua jalur serta pengujian tukey. Sebelum uji hipotesis dilakukan terlebih dahulu dilakukan uji normalitas dan uji homogenitas. Hasil analisis data menunjukkan bahwa terdapat interaksi media pembelajaran digital dan kepercayaan diri terhadap hasil belajar Pendidikan Agama Islam dengan hasil analisis varians nilai F hitung = 4,97  F tabel = 3,99 pada taraf signifikan = 0,05.
title: Pengaruh Media Pembelajaran Digital Animasi dan Kepercayaan Diri terhadap Hasil Belajar Pendidikan Agama Islam Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of animated digital learning media and self-confidence on the learning outcomes of Islamic religious education in children This study aims to determine the influence of animated digital learning media and self-confidence on the learning outcomes of Islamic religious education The population in this study were elementary school students in Medan City with samples of children in the experimental group and children in the control group The sample was taken using the cluster sampling technique Data was collected through validated tests Data analysis techniques used two-way ANOVA variance tests and Tukey tests Before the hypothesis test was carried out, normality tests and homogeneity tests were first carried out The results of the data analysis showed that there was an interaction between digital learning media and self-confidence on the learning outcomes of Islamic religious education with the results of the variance analysis of the calculated f value f table at a significant level

desc: Keterampilan mengajar yang belum optimal pada mahasiswa semester ganjil terkhusus pada Semester V menyebabkan menurunnya kualitas pelaksanaan praktek mengajar pada Mahasiswa Program Studi S1 Pendidikan Guru Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PGPAUD) Tahun Ajaran 2019/2020 FKIP Universitas Bengkulu. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk meningkatkan keterampilan mengajar pada mahasiswa Semester V menggunakan metode drill. Jenis penelitian menggunakan Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK). Subjek penelitian sebanyak 75 orang. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan observasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan melalui penggunaan metode drill tidak meningkatkan keterampilan dasar mengajar dengan nilai rata-rata 73 siklus 1 dan nilai rata-rata 75 pada siklus 2. Bagi penelitian berikutnya disarankan agar penerapan praktek latihan mengajar hendaknya menerapkan semua keterampilan dasar mengajar dengan beberapa kali latihan dengan estimasi waktu yang cukup, serta penilaian dilakukan oleh ahli pembelajaran
title: Peningkatan Keterampilan Mengajar Mahasiswa pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Metode Drill
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: improving students' teaching skills in early childhood through the drill method, teaching skills that are not yet optimal in odd semester students, especially in semester V, have caused a decrease in the quality of teaching practice implementation in students of the Early Childhood Education Teacher Education Study Program, PGPPAUD, academic year, FKIP, University of Bengkulu, the purpose of this study is to improve teaching skills in semester V students using the drill method, the type of research uses classroom action research, PTK, the research subjects are as many as people, data collection techniques use observation, the results of the study indicate that through the use of the drill method, basic teaching skills do not improve with an average value of the cycle and an average value in the cycle for the next study, it is recommended that the implementation of teaching practice practices should apply all basic teaching skills with several exercises with sufficient time estimates and assessments carried out by learning experts.

desc: Management issues in early childhood education institutions can be a complex challenge for administrators and teaching staff. Therefore, understanding topics of interest and expanding shared networks are necessary to advance development research toward a unified effort. In this bibliometric study, our aim was to disseminate global research trends in the field of Early Childhood Education Management based on publication results, co-authorship between authors and country affiliations, and co-occurrence of author keywords. Using the Scopus database, a total of 181 journal articles were taken which were published between 2013 – 2023. The research results show that since 2016, the number of publications has continued to increase so that the accumulated number of articles published to date continues to increase. About 20% of total global publications are contributed by researchers from the United States, leading 30 other countries/regions. The dominant keywords are PAUD and teacher training. Research trends in early childhood education management over the last 10 years show a focus on initial teacher development and training, as well as improving the quality of education through classroom management, professional development, and human resource management.
title: Bibliometric Analysis: Management in Early Childhood Education
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: bibliometric analysis management in early childhood education management issues in early childhood education institutions can be a complex challenge for administrators and teaching staff therefore understanding topics of interest and expanding shared networks are necessary to advance development research toward a unified effort in this bibliometric study our aim was to disseminate global research trends in the field of early childhood education management based on publication results coauthorship between authors and country affiliations and cooccurrence of author keywords using the Scopus database a total of journal articles were taken which were published between the research results show that since the number of publications have continued to increase so that the accumulated number of articles published to date continues to increase about of total global publications are contributed by researchers from the united states leading other countriesregions the dominant keywords are early childhood and teacher training research trends in early childhood education management over the last years show a focus on initial teacher development and training as well as improving the quality of education through classroom management professional development and human resource management

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh antara keterlibatan orang tua dan motivasi intrinsik dengan kepercayaan diri. Metode yang digunakan adalah survei dengan studi korelasional dengan melibatkan 100 orang sampel. Ada tiga instrumen yang mengukur keperayaan diri anak (rel..875), keterlibatan orang tua (rel .962), dan motivasi intrinsik (rel .82). Data telah dianalisis oleh ANOVA dua arah. Hasil penelitian mengungkapkan bahwa ada korelasi positif dan signifikan antara variabel-variabel tersebut, meskipun sudah dikontrol oleh korelasi orde kedua, masih signifikan di antara mereka. Karena itu dapat disimpulkan bahwa jika kepercayaan diri anak akan ditingkatkan, maka keterlibatan orang tua dan motivasi intrinsik harus dipertimbangkan.
title: Pengaruh Keterlibatan Orang Tua dan Motivasi Intrinsik dengan Kepercayaan Diri Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of parental involvement and intrinsic motivation on the self-confidence of early childhood children. This study aims to determine the influence between parental involvement and intrinsic motivation on self-confidence. The method used is a survey with a correlational study involving sample people. There are three instruments that measure children's self-confidence. Parental involvement and intrinsic motivation. The data has been analyzed by two-way ANOVA. The results of the study revealed that there is a positive and significant correlation between these variables, although it has been controlled by a second-order correlation, it is still significant between them. Therefore, it can be concluded that if children's self-confidence is to be improved, parental involvement and intrinsic motivation must be considered.

desc: The purpose of this study was to find out how the form of applying mnemonic learning in increasing Arabic vocabulary in early childhood at RA Darussalam, Prasi, Gading. This research used a qualitative approach with a type of field research. The data sources were obtained through 2 research instruments, namely observation, interviews, and documentation with 5 informants (principals, homeroom teachers for classes A and B, and 2 student guardians). The data analysis technique used the Miles and Huberman Interactive Model with data reduction activities, data presentation, and drawing conclusions. Data validity with source and technique triangulation process. Learning Arabic using the mnemonic method as an effort to increase students' Arabic vocabulary was accomplished by several activities. Among them were the introduction of hijaiyah letters and their punctuation, choosing material sources according to student needs, recognizing and repeating the rhythm of the song, providing learning concepts with mind maps, and reflecting on learning experiences into new knowledge for students. This mnemonic learning becomed a remembering strategy for students by involving the right brain so that information will be stored longer and easier to recall when needed because it is stored in long-term memory.
title: Mnemonic Learning in Increasing Early Children's Arabic Vocabulary
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Berdasarkan pengamatam peneliti secara empiris bahwa pelayanan Sekolah Minggu di lingkungan gereja memiliki peran sangat penting dalam mengoptimalkan pendidikan Kristen bagi anak usia dini. Namun, terdapat kesenjangan antara harapan dan kenyataan dalam pelaksanaannya. Artikel ini bertujuan untuk mengeksplorasi dan menganalisis kondisi serta kebutuhan aktual pelayanan Sekolah Minggu di gereja untuk anak-anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah kualitatif deskriptif dengan pendekatan kajian literatur. Data diperoleh dari penelitian sebelumnya, artikel jurnal ilmiah, buku, dan sumber internet yang relevan dengan topik ini. Melalui reduksi data, klasifikasi, verifikasi, dan validasi, ditemukan bahwa transformasi dalam pelaksanaan pelayanan Sekolah Minggu diperlukan untuk meningkatkan kualitas pendidikan Kristen bagi anak usia dini melalui pengembangan Kurikulum Berbasis Kehidupan Anak, penggunaan teknologi dalam pembelajaran, pelatihan guru Sekolah Minggu, dan penyediaan prasarana yang memadai. Dengan upaya tersebut maka signifikan dalam mengembangkan pelayanan Sekolah Minggu akan membantu gereja memenuhi tanggung jawabnya dalam membentuk karakter dan iman anak-anak secara efektif.
title: Optimalisasi Pendidikan Kristen Anak Usia Dini: Transformasi Pelaksanaan Pelayanan Sekolah Minggu di Lingkungan Gereja
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: optimization of early childhood christian education transformation of the implementation of sunday school services in the church environment based on empirical observations of researchers that sunday school services in the church environment have a very important role in optimizing christian education for early childhood but there is a gap between expectations and reality in its implementation this article aims to explore and analyze the conditions and actual needs of sunday school services in the church for early childhood the research method used is qualitative descriptive with a literature review approach data obtained from previous research scientific journal articles books and internet sources relevant to this topic through data reduction classification verification and validation it was found that transformation in the implementation of sunday school services is needed to improve the quality of christian education for early childhood through the development of a curriculum based on children's lives the use of technology in learning sunday school teacher training and the provision of adequate infrastructure with these efforts it is significant in developing sunday school services will help the church fulfill its responsibility in forming the character and faith of children effectively

desc: Evaluation of an education program is a process of systematic activity to see how successful the planned education program is and to provide information to stakeholders in order to make a decision. The problem that often occurs is that the object of evaluation in education is still focused on the learning process, even though the evaluation includes all educational components and programs in a comprehensive manner. The purpose of this research is to describe program evaluation models and their urgency in evaluating educational programs. The novelty of this study is the implementation of various evaluation models in elementary education. The results of this study indicate that there are more than 50 program evaluation models, of which there are five program evaluation models that can be applied in evaluating educational programs, namely the Context, Input, Process, Product (CIPP), outcomes (CIPPO), Provus, Countenance (Stake), and Kirkpatrick evaluation models. The contribution is that with this evaluation information will be obtained about the achievements of the educational program, including its quality, effectiveness, efficiency and productivity, so that a decision can be made whether the program is worth continuing, revising, stopping or reformulating so that goals, objectives, processes can be found from the previous one
title: Evaluation Model and Its Urgency on Elementary Education Programs
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Pembangunan di dalam keluarga terdiri dari pola pengasuhan dan pendidikan karakter sebagai perwujudan generasi yang berkualitas dan berkarakter. Pembangunan karakter ini menentukan perilaku anak, seperti keluarga di daerah pesisir. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui bagaimana “pola pengasuhan dan pendidikan karakter anak pada keluarga nelayan di Desa Kuala Lama Kecamatan Pantai Cermin Kabupaten Serdang Bedagai”. Metode yang digunakan adalah metode deskriptif kualitatif. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui observasi, wawancara kepada 15 orang informan (nelayan buruh, perorangan, dan toke) dan penyebaran kuesioner kepada 53 responden. Hasil penelitian menujukkan bahwa pola pengasuhan otoriter ditemukan pada nelayan perorangan dan beberapa nelayan toke. Pola pengasuhan demokratis diterapkan pada keluarga nelayan buruh dan nelayan toke. Pendidikan karakter seperti menumbuhkan nilai gotong-royong, integritas, nasionalisme, dan religius, telah berjalan dengan baik. Orang tua telah mampu berperan menjadi guru, pendamping, penasehat, kepada sang anak. Hanya saja, beberapa orang tua, tidak mengarahkan secara khusus bakat atau keterampilan diri anak
title: Pola Pengasuhan dan Pendidikan Karakter Anak pada Keluarga Nelayan di Indonesia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parenting patterns and character education of children in fishing families in Indonesia Family development consists of parenting patterns and character education as the embodiment of a quality and character generation. This character development determines children's behavior, such as families in coastal areas. This study aims to determine how the parenting patterns and character education of children in fishing families in Kuala Lama Village, Pantai Cermin District, Serdang Bedagai Regency. The method used is a qualitative descriptive method. Data collection was carried out through observation, interviews with informants, individual fishermen and bosses, and distributing questionnaires to respondents. The results of the study showed that authoritarian parenting patterns were found in individual fishermen and several bosses. Democratic parenting patterns were applied to families of fishermen, laborers and bosses. Character education such as fostering the values ​​of mutual cooperation, integrity, nationalism and religiosity has been going well. Parents have been able to play a role as accompanying teachers and advisors to their children. It's just that some parents do not specifically direct their children's talents or skills.

desc: An important period in the development of the child is a toddler years. leanguage ability  is an indicator of the whole development of the child. Lack of stimulation will cause speech and language disorders even these disorders can be settled. Long-term observation stated that 42.5% children who have speech and language delays at risk of difficulty learning, difficulty reading and writing and will cause less academic achievement overall, in some cases have a low IQ. The purpose of this study was to determine the factors associated with infant language development at Health UPTD 2016. Base quantitative research methods, this kind of research is analytic with study case control design.The population in this study are all mothers who have children in UPTD Health Baserah 2015 are 1248 people, with the samples using a ratio of 1: 1,  43 with a sample of cases and 43 with a control sample, sampling technique using systematic random sampling and data analysis using Chi-Square.The results showed correlation between knowledge with toddler language development, there is a connection with the development of language parenting a toddler, and no socio-economic relations dengann toddler language development. For health workers is expected to provide information to mothers who have children in the prevention and early detection of developmental language  delays.
title: Faktor-Faktor yang Berhubungan dengan Perkembangan Bahasa Balita  di UPTD Kesehatan Baserah Tahun 2016
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Keteladanan orang tua dalam kehiduapan sehari-hari memiliki pengaruh yang sangat besar delam pengembangan moralitas anak. Sikap dan perilaku baik dan benar yang dinampakan oleh orang tua akan terekam dalam diri anak dan kemudian akan dicerminkan oleh anak. Sebaliknya, sikap dan perilaku yang tidak benar yang dilakukan oleh orang tua akan terkam dalam diri anak sehingga anak mencerminkan perilaku yang tidak benar. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk menganalisis, ketelanan orang tua dalam kehidupan sehari-hari dan perilaku yang dicerminkan oleh anak melalui perilakunya sebagai pengembangkan moralitas anak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah kajian pustaka yakni merujuk pada jurnal internasional dan nasional. Objek dan subyek dalam penelitian ini adalah orang tua dan anak namun akan di kaji secara literatu bukan studi lapangan. Perolehan data dalam penelitian dilakukan secara literatur. Analisis data dalam penelitian adalah menganalisis sumber secara literatur dengan menarik kesimpulan dan implikasi.  Hasil penelitian menujukkan bahwa keteladanan orang tua memiliki pengaruh yang tinggi dalam mengembangkan moralitas anak melalui kehidupan sehari-hari. Selain itu, keladanan orang tua merupakan role model yang ampuh untuk mengembangkan moral anak sejak dini
title: Keteladanan Orang Tua dalam Mengembangkan Moralitas Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parental exemplary in developing early childhood morality Parental exemplary in everyday life has a very big influence in the development of children's morality, good and correct attitudes and behaviors shown by parents will be recorded in the child and then reflected by the child, conversely, incorrect attitudes and behaviors carried out by parents will be captured in the child so that the child reflects incorrect behavior. The purpose of this study is to analyze parental neglect in everyday life and behavior reflected by children through their behavior as a development of children's morality. The method used in this study is a literature review, namely referring to international and national journals. The objects and subjects in this study are parents and children, but they will be studied in literature, not field studies. Data acquisition in the study was carried out in literature. Data analysis in the study was analyzing sources in literature by drawing conclusions and implications. The results of the study show that parental exemplary has a high influence in developing children's morality through everyday life. In addition, parental exemplary is a powerful role model for developing children's morals from an early age.

desc: Tahap perkembangan terbaik anak untuk belajar bahasa Arab ada pada fase usia dini. Pengenalan pembelajaran bahasa Arab di satuan penidikan harus dilakukan sejak anak usia dini. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjelaskan implementasi belajar bahasa Arab dengan metode langsung di satuan pendidikan anak usia dini. Penelitian yang digunakan adalah dengan paradigma kualitatif-deskriptif-tekstual. Adapun dokumen teks yang dikaji adalah fenomena pembahasan terkait dengan pembelajaran langsung bahasa Arab dan perkembangan berbahasa pada anak usia dini. Kedua fenomena ini dikategorisasikan dalam wacana pembelajaran langsung bahasa Arab untuk anak usia dini yang deskripsi wacananya bersumber dari artikel-artikel yang sudah dipublikasikan di jurnal ilmiah dan buku-buku referensi. Sumber data berupa dokumen teks ini kemudian dikumpulkan melalui teknik membaca dan mencatat. Teknik analisis data dilakukan dengan mengkaji data berdasarkan pada sudut pandang keilmuan yang digunakan, menganalisis dan mengkritis data yang telah dikaji dengan komprehensif, dan menyejikan hasil dalam temuan-temuannya. Hasil penelitiannya adalah usia terbaik untuk belajar bahasa Arab adalah anak usia dini. Lingkungan satuan pendidikan anak usia dini bisa menjadi tempat pendidikan dalam mengenalkan bahasa Arab dengan menggunakan metode langsung.
title: Implementasi Metode Langsung dalam Pembelajaran Bahasa Arab untuk Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: implementation of direct methods in Arabic language learning for early childhood the best development stage for children to learn Arabic is at an early age the introduction of Arabic language learning in educational units must be carried out since early childhood this study aims to explain the implementation of Arabic language learning with direct methods in early childhood education units the research used is a qualitative descriptive textual paradigm the text documents studied are phenomena of discussion related to direct Arabic language learning and language development in early childhood both of these phenomena are categorized in the discourse of direct Arabic language learning for early childhood the description of the discourse is sourced from articles that have been published in scientific journals and reference books the source of data in the form of text documents is then collected through reading and recording techniques data analysis techniques are carried out by reviewing data based on the scientific perspective used analyzing and criticizing data that has been studied comprehensively and presenting the results in its findings the results of the study are the best age to learn Arabic is early childhood the environment of early childhood education units can be a place of education in introducing Arabic using direct methods

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk meningkatkan perkembangan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun di lingkungan Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD) melalui penerapan tari kreasi. Penelitian ini didorong oleh temuan kondisi perkembangan motorik kasar yang belum optimal pada anak usia dini. Teknik pengumpulan data melibatkan pencatatan dan observasi kejadian melalui pendekatan kualitatif dengan menggunakan metode Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK) dalam dua siklus, dengan 15 anak dari kelompok B sebagai subjek penelitian. Hasil observasi awal menunjukkan adanya ketidakoptimalan perkembangan motorik kasar. Siklus pertama, yang mencakup perencanaan, pelaksanaan, observasi, dan refleksi, belum mencapai target peningkatan yang diharapkan. Siklus kedua melibatkan penyesuaian pendekatan dan kegiatan, menghasilkan peningkatan signifikan dengan persentase rata-rata mencapai 73,2%. Implikasi penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa tari kreasi efektif dalam meningkatkan motorik kasar anak usia dini, memberikan kontribusi pada literatur pengembangan motorik kasar.
title: Tarian Kreasi sebagai Sarana Efektif Pengembangan Motorik Kasar pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: creative dance as an effective means of developing gross motor skills in early childhood This study aims to improve the development of gross motor skills in children aged 18-24 years in early childhood education environments through the application of creative dance This study was driven by the finding of suboptimal gross motor development conditions in early childhood Data collection techniques involve recording and observing events through a qualitative approach using the classroom action research method PTK in two cycles with children from group B as research subjects The results of initial observations showed that gross motor development was not optimal The first cycle which included planning, implementation, observation and reflection had not reached the expected target increase The second cycle involved adjusting the approach and activities resulting in a significant increase with an average percentage reaching The implications of this study indicate that creative dance is effective in improving gross motor skills in early childhood Contributes to the literature on gross motor development

desc: Pendidik harus mempunyai kemampuan untuk memberikan pengetahuan kepada anak didiknya, diantaranya adalah pengetahuan mengenai bahasa dan karakter. Pendidik dan orangtua memiliki peran penting untuk menstimulasi tumbuh kembang anak dengan baik. Kemampuan anak dalam berkomunikasi dan keterampilannya dapat didukung melalui adanya buku ajar yang dipilih sebagai sumber belajar. Maka penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menelaah secara mendalam dan rinci mengenai unsur linguistik berupa kosakata dan mengidentifikasi nilai karakter yang terkandung dalam setiap cerita yang terdapat pada buku cerita bergambar bilingual dengan judul Kumpulan Dongeng Karakter Baik Untuk Anak yang memiliki 10 cerita dongeng. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Dengan teknik pengumpulan data berupa content analysis. Dari penelitian ini memberikan simpulan bahwa buku cerita bergambar bilingual ini layak serta dapat digunakan dalam pembelajaran bahasa sebagai sumber belajar bahasa Inggris bagi anak usia dini karena mampu meningkatkan keterampilan linguistik pada anak berupa penambahan kosakata baru serta dapat menambah pengetahuan tentang nilai-nilai karakter yang harus ditanamkan sejak dini.
title: Analisis Buku Cerita Bergambar Bilingual Kumpulan Dongeng Karakter Baik untuk Anak sebagai Sumber Belajar Bahasa Inggris
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of bilingual picture story books, a collection of good character fairy tales for children as a source of learning English. Educators must have the ability to provide knowledge to their students, including knowledge about language and character. Educators and parents have an important role to stimulate children's growth and development. Children's ability to communicate and their skills can be supported through the existence of textbooks that are selected as learning resources. This study aims to examine in depth and in detail the linguistic elements in the form of vocabulary and identify the character values ​​contained in each story in the bilingual picture story book with the title collection of good character fairy tales for children who have fairy tales. The research method used is descriptive qualitative with data collection techniques in the form of content analysis. This study concludes that this bilingual picture story book is feasible and can be used in language learning as a source of learning English for early childhood because it is able to improve children's linguistic skills in the form of adding new vocabulary and can increase knowledge about character values ​​that must be instilled from an early age.

desc: Positive psychology, which has been widely developed in the last twenty-three years, raises the topic of individual positive character strengths. The purpose of this study was to see a positive relationship between the existing characters, according to the constructs tested, including life satisfaction, resilience, personality and gratitude for the subjects after the earthquake, tsunami and liquefaction. The sampling technique used was a two-stage random sampling conducted on students. The BF 10 psychological instrument related to personality was used to reveal personality, the SWLS instrument was used to express life satisfaction, QR-6 was used to identify gratitude and RYDM was used to measure resilience. The SPSS 21 license authorized wizard regression analysis program was used as a data analysis technique. The results show that the level of relationship between personality factors, gratitude, and resilience to life satisfaction is in the strong category with a value of R = 0.677. The magnitude of the simultaneous contribution is R square = 0.458, indicating that there is a role in the predictor variables of personality, gratitude, and resilience to life satisfaction of 45.8%.
title: Students’ Life Satisfaction, Personality, Gratitude and Resilience of Students
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: students life satisfaction personality gratitude and resilience of students positive psychology which has been widely developed in the last twenty-three years raises the topic of individual positive character strengths the purpose of this study was to see a positive relationship between the existing characters according to the constructs tested including life satisfaction resilience personality and gratitude for the subjects after the earthquake tsunami and liquefaction the sampling technique used was a two-stage random sampling conducted on students the bf psychological instrument related to personality was used to reveal personality the swls instrument was used to express life satisfaction qr was used to acknowledge gratitude and rydm was used to measure resilience the spss license authorized wizard regression analysis program was used as a data analysis technique the results show that the level of relationship between personality factors gratitude and resilience to life satisfaction is in the strong category with a value of r the magnitude of the simultaneous contribution is r square indicating that there is a role in the predictor variables of personality gratitude and resilience to life satisfaction of

desc: Aspects of language is one aspect that is owned by early childhood that must be stimulated. At this time, children's language skills have not been optimally stimulated and have not been designed through interesting activities. The aim of this research is to describe the need to implement early childhood language development through Outdoor Learning Activity. This study uses a survey method. The subjects were educators at Early Childhood Education institutions under the auspices of Himpaudi Magelang Regency, the Bustanul Athfal Teachers' Association, the Raudhatul Athfal Teachers' Association totaling 40 educators. The data collection tool used a questionnaire at the FGD event to identify the implementation of OLA in developing early childhood language. The analysis technique uses descriptive analysis, namely describing facts with the right interpretation to recognize phenomena and to describe accurately some of the phenomena, groups or individuals that are happening. The results showed that 27.03% of educators had implemented OLA every day and had not optimally developed children's language skills. Stimulation of children's language is still carried out monotonously in the classroom by using conversation method by 24%, storytelling 22%, and question and answer 11%. So that it has not fulfilled the BAN PAUD and PNF accreditation instruments, namely education units that apply interesting learning activities outdoors to get at least 30 minutes of sunlight every day. This supports the need for OLA learning designs to take advantage of the potential of the child's environment.
title: Implementation Outdoor Learning Activities (OLA) to Develop Early Childhood Language Skills
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: This research begins with the finding that children in the Tuanku Tambusai Play Group tend to experience obstacles in their emotional-social development. On observations made do not look like children are willing to play with peers in one group, the child still shows ego or self-winding attitude, the child can not cooperate with members of his group, still shows the attitude of competing in the play, and the child is not responsible for doing According to the findings, the researcher intends to develop children's emotional social abilities with the application of collaborative games. The research method used is action research. Methods were performed using Kemmis and Taggart's model cycles consisting of 4 stages (planning, action, observation, and reflection). The child's emotional social developmental data in learning was obtained from observations and documentation analyzed by percentage. Research conducted two cycles, each cycle is implemented in three meetings. The results show through collaborative games can improve emotional-social development in children Tuanku Tambusai Play Group
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Sosial Emosional Melalui Permainan Kolaboratif  pada Anak KB
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Sebagian lembaga PAUD tidak siap mengikuti akrediasi nasional dan karenanya membutuhkan persiapan dan pendampingan. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis keberhasilan pendampingan akreditasi terhadap SPS dalam rangka memenuhi dan mengunggah kelengkapan dokumen PPA di Sispena 3.1. tahap demi tahap. Metodologi penelitiannya adalah penelitian kasus tunggal tipe descriptive time-series experiment. Pengumpulan datanya dilakukan dengan mengambil data sekunder single time series dari BAN PAUD dan PNF Provinsi dan wawancara dengan pendamping dan SPS tentang apa saja yang terjadi sebelum kemunculan single time series. Analisis data dilakukan dengan mengurai data single time series dan data tentang apa saja yang terjadi sebelum kemunculan single time series sehingga teridentifikasi komponen-komponen dan tren pendampingan akreditasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa keberhasilan pendampingan dikarenakan kerja sama, perencanaan dan kesungguhan dari Dinas Pendidikan Kabupaten, organisasi mitra, pendamping, BAN PAUD dan PNF Provinsi, dan lembaga PAUD. Keberhasilan ini juga didukung oleh materi pendampingan yang mencakup pemberian motivasi kepada lembaga PAUD, penjelasan yang tepat tentang akreditasi, dan pengajaran keterampilan scan dan mengunggah dokumen ke internet.
title: Keberhasilan Pendampingan Akreditasi Satuan PAUD Sejenis: Penelitian Kasus Tunggal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The success of accreditation assistance for early childhood education units is a type of single case study. Some early childhood education institutions are not ready to participate in national accreditation and therefore require preparation and assistance. This study aims to analyze the success of accreditation assistance for SPS in order to fulfill and upload complete PPA documents in Sispena step by step. The research methodology is a single case study of the descriptive time series experiment type. Data collection is carried out by taking secondary data from single time series from the provincial PAUD and PNF and interviews with assistants and SPS about what happened before the emergence of the single time series. Data analysis is carried out by analyzing single time series data and data about what happened before the emergence of the single time series so that components and trends in accreditation assistance are identified. The results of the study indicate that the success of assistance is due to cooperation in planning and sincerity from the district education office, partner organizations for assistants for the provincial PAUD and PNF and early childhood education institutions. This success is also supported by assistance materials that include providing motivation to early childhood education institutions, proper explanations about accreditation and teaching scanning skills and uploading documents to the internet.

desc: Bahasa inggris sebagai alat untuk mempermudah berkomunikasi dengan orang lain. Tetapi terlebih dahulu memahami penggunaan kosa kata. Kebanyakan peserta didik kurang memahami penggunaan kosa kata dengan maksimal. Maka peneliti mempunyai ketertarikan untuk melaksanakan riset dengan tujuan menganalisis tingkat keefektifan pengimplementasian buku ajar happy thinking dalam meningkatkan kemampuan kosa kata pada anak-anak usia dini. Pelaksanaan riset ini mengimplementasikan metode eksperimen, dimana untuk mengetahui tingkat kemampuan anak-anak terkait kosa kata bahasa Inggris akan menerapkan pre-test dan post-test untuk mengetahui tingkat kemampuan kosa kata anak-anak setelah penggunaan buku ajar happy thinking. Kemudian metode pengujian data menerapkan N-Gain Score dan Paired Sample T-Test. Populasi terdiri dari 25 anak dan sampel yang berjumlah 15. Berdasarkan hasil pengujian N-Gain Score diperoleh nilai persentase 3,7387% untuk kelas eksperimen yang berada dalam kategori efektif. Sedangkan menurut pengujian Paired Sample T-Test, diperoleh nilai post-test-nya sebesar 3,93 dan 0,20 untuk nilai pre-test-nya. Sehingga pengimplementasian buku ajar happy thinking, dalam kategori efektif dalam meningkatkan kemampuan kosa kata anak-anak di TK Aisyiyah 31 Sidodadi.
title: Buku Ajar Happy Thinking: Alternatif untuk Meningkatkan Kosa Kata Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: happy thinking alternative textbook to improve early childhood vocabulary English as a tool to facilitate communication with others but first understand the use of vocabulary most students do not understand the use of vocabulary to the maximum then researchers have an interest in conducting research with the aim of analyzing the level of effectiveness of the implementation of happy thinking textbooks in improving vocabulary skills in early childhood the implementation of this research implements an experimental method where to find out the level of children's abilities related to English vocabulary will apply a pretest and posttest to find out the level of children's vocabulary skills after using the happy thinking textbook then the data testing method applies ngain score and paired sample ttest the population consists of children and samples that are based on the results of the ngain score test, the percentage value for the experimental class is in the effective category while according to the paired sample ttest test, the posttest value is obtained and for the pretest value so that the implementation of the happy thinking textbook in the effective category in improving children's vocabulary skills in kindergarten aisyiyah sidodadi

desc: Loleba adalah salah satu jenis bambu yang digunakan oleh masyarakat Maluku sebagai salah satu bahan dalam pembuatan atap rumah berbahan daun sagu. Loleba memiliki banyak manfaat, baik bagi pembuat kerajinan, rumah tangga bahkan untuk bahan alat musik. Dalam penelitian ini, loleba sebagai bahan utama yang digunakan untuk meningkatkan   motorik halus pada anak usia dini melalui teknik kolase. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK) yang dilakukan sebanyak 3 siklus pada siswa PAUD Usali Malaka tahun ajaran 2020/2021 yang berjumlah 16 orang. Pengumpulan data meliputi, observasi, catatan lapangan dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukan adanya peningkatan motorik halus pada anak secara signifikan pada setiap siklus. Peningkatan tersebut terlihat pada siklus 1, siklus 2 dan siklus 3. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa teknik kolase berbahan loleba dapat meningkatkan motorik halus anak kelas B di PAUD Usali Malaka Negeri Maneo Ratu. Hasil ini berdampak pada peningkatan kemandirian anak dalam belajar dan kecermatan dalam mengerjakan tugas yang diberikan oleh guru.
title: Meningkatkan Motorik Halus Anak Usia Dini melalui Teknik Kolase Berbahan Loleba
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
