data_cleaned: literacy skills of children aged years in the application of the spalding method in quantum indonesia kindergarten literacy skills in early childhood are the initial skills and basic foundations needed by children to be able to learn to write, read and count this study aims to explain the pattern of literacy skills of children aged years who experience the application of the spalding method in quantum indonesia kindergarten the research method uses a qualitative method with a case study approach descriptive data in the form of written notes from informants, namely one teacher and five group b students aged years data analysis in this study uses the campbell pattern matching model which contains three activity flows carried out, namely general statements, selection of questions and development of concept maps the results of the study indicate that children's literacy skills that emerge in the application of the spalding method are children's ability to master knowledge of letters and words basic writing skills and interest in writing based on the study it is stated that the literacy skills of children aged years in quantum indonesia kindergarten can develop in the application of the spalding method

desc: Kajian tentang pola pengasuhan orang tua terhadap anak merupakan isu yang sangat penting untuk diangkat kembali, karena kesalahan dalam mengasuh anak akan berakibat fatal terhadap perkembangan anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengidentifikasi pola pengasuhan di Indonesia dan Finlandia serta mengkomparasikan bentuk pola pengasuhan diantara kedua negera tersebut. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian adalah kajian Systematic Literature Review yang dimulai dari proses pencarian literatur, scrining dan uji kelayakan. Hasil penelitian menemukan adanya perbedaan pola pengasuhan anak di Indonesia dan Finlandia. Diantaranya; (1) Ditemukan tiga pola pengasuhan anak di Indonesia yaitu, otoritatif, otoriter dan permisif, sedangkan di Finlandia ditemukan enam pola pengasuhan anak, yaitu otoritatif, mengendalikan dengan psikologis, permisif, tidak terlibat, otoriter dan pola pengendalian, (2) Ditemukan perbedaan pola pengasuhan di Indonesia dan Finlandia, baik dari segi pelaksanaan pengasuhan dan faktor-faktor yang mempengaruhinya. Mengkomparasikan bentuk pola pengasuhan dari Indonesia dan Finlandia merupakan bentuk kebaruan dari penelitian ini. Temuan ini diharapkan dapat menjadi perhatian bagi orang tua, khususnya di Indonesia agar dapat memilih pola asuh yang tepat bagi anak dalam rangka mendukung tumbuh kembang anak itu sendiri.
title: Analisis Komparasi Pola Pengasuhan Anak di Indonesia dan Finlandia
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: comparative analysis of parenting patterns in Indonesia and Finland a study of parenting patterns of parents towards children is a very important issue to be raised again because mistakes in parenting will have fatal consequences for child development this study aims to identify parenting patterns in Indonesia and Finland and compare the forms of parenting patterns between the two countries the method used in the study is a systematic literature review study which starts from the process of searching for literature screening and feasibility testing the results of the study found differences in parenting patterns in Indonesia and Finland including three parenting patterns in Indonesia, namely authoritative authoritarian and permissive while in Finland six parenting patterns were found, namely authoritative controlling with psychological permissive uninvolved authoritarian and controlling patterns differences in parenting patterns were found in Indonesia and Finland both in terms of the implementation of parenting and the factors that influence it comparing the forms of parenting patterns from Indonesia and Finland is a form of novelty from this study these findings are expected to be of concern to parents, especially in Indonesia, so that they can choose the right parenting pattern for their children in order to support the growth and development of the child itself

desc: Pembelajaran sebaiknya menggunakaan berbagai pendekatan, dengan menggunakan  olahraga sebagai cara efektif. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode penelitian tindakan kelas (PTK). Responden dari siswa kelas A TK Ekasanti Bekasi sebanyak 60 siswa. PTK menggunakan 2 siklus. Pada siklus 1 dan 2 peneliti menggunakan olahraga ditengah-tengah pembelajaran berbahasa. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pembelajaran berbahasa dilakukan dalam kelas setelah itu siswa mengikuti kegiatan lari zig-zag di luar kelas, siswa melakukan kegiatan olahraga berikutnya dengan menerobos lubang segitiga. Setelah melaksanakan kegiatan olahraga fisik selama 15 menit, para siswa kembali belajar didalam kelas. Nilai pretest sebelum digunakan pengenalan olahraga pada pembelajaran bahasa sebesar 50.2  Hasil siklus pertama sebesar 57.85 siklus kedua sebesar 68.50. Kemampuan berbahasa siswa meningkat sebesar 7.65 pada siklus pertama  dan 10.65 pada siklus kedua. Kendala yang ditemui ,masih ada siswa  belum terbiasa berolahraga karena faktor obesitas, selain itu faktor pola hidup sehat pada orang tua yang mempengaruhi anak.
title: Pengenalan Olahraga untuk Meningkatkan Kemampuan Berbahasa Bagi Siswa TK
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Introduction to sports to improve language skills for kindergarten students learning should use various approaches using sports as an effective way this study uses the classroom action research method ptk respondents from class a kindergarten students ekasanti bekasi as many as students ptk using cycles in cycles and researchers use sports in the middle of language learning the results of the study show that language learning is carried out in the classroom after that students take part in zigzag running activities outside the classroom students do the next sports activity by breaking through a triangular hole after carrying out physical sports activities for minutes the students return to study in the classroom the pretest score before using the introduction of sports in language learning is the result of the first cycle is the second cycle is the students' language skills increased by in the first cycle and in the second cycle the obstacles encountered are still students are not used to exercising because of obesity factors besides the healthy lifestyle factor in parents that affects children

desc: Di era globalisasi strategi pemasaran jasa pendidikan memiliki posisi yang sangat penting, era dimana iklim persaingan telah memasuki semua lini kehidupan. Manajemen strategi pemasaran sangat penting untuk dilakukan paca pandemic covid 19. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah menganalisis manajemen pemasaran yang meliputi strategi pemasaran di lembaga Pendidikan anak usia dini dan media yang digunakan dalam promosi di lembaga Pendidikan anak usia dini. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah dengan menggunakan metode deskriptif kualitatif. sedangkan teknik pengumpulan data dengan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa strategi pemasaran menggunakan 2 cara yaitu offline dan online. Pemasaran dengan metode strategi offline yang digunakan adalah sosialisasi langsung kepada orang tua siswa baik dalam agenda pertemuan wali murid maupun dalam kegiatan parenting, serta sosialisasi kepada masyarakat sekitar melalui kegiatan rutin seperti pertemuan pembinaan kesejahteraan keluarga, pengajian mingguan. Pemasaran menggunakan metode strategi online yang digunakan melalui media sosial antara lain Whatsapp, Instagram dan Facebook, tik tok, video. Media pemasaran yang digunakan adalah brosur, poster dan spanduk.
title: Manajemen Strategi Pemasaran Pasca Covid-19 di Lembaga Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Post-covid marketing strategy management in early childhood education institutions in the era of globalization, educational service marketing strategies have a very important position in an era where the competitive climate has entered all lines of life, marketing strategy management is very important to do after the covid pandemic, the purpose of this study is to analyze marketing management which includes marketing strategies in early childhood education institutions and the media used in promotions in early childhood education institutions, the method used in this study is to use a qualitative descriptive method, while the data collection technique is by observation, interviews and documentation, the results of this study indicate that the marketing strategy uses offline and online methods, marketing with the offline strategy method used is direct socialization to parents of students, both in the agenda of parent-teacher meetings and in parenting activities, as well as socialization to the surrounding community through routine activities such as family welfare coaching meetings, weekly religious studies, marketing using online strategy methods used through social media including WhatsApp, Instagram and Facebook, TikTok, videos, marketing media used are brochures, posters and banners

desc: The internalization of Pancasila is carried out from an early age. This is related to the problems in the community of the fading of the noble values of the Indonesian state's guidelines for life. The final goal of this study was to find the methods used by Teachers in instilling Pancasila values in early childhood in kindergarten. Qualitative research methods are used to achieve this goal by making kindergarten teachers as informants determined through purposive techniques and Snowball sampling. Data was collected by placing researchers as the primary "tool" supported by interviewing, observation, and documentation techniques. The netted data was analyzed with miles and Huberman's qualitative data analysis techniques. The results concluded that kindergarten teachers' level of knowledge and understanding about the types of learning methods in early childhood is quite good. Methods of planting Pancasila values used in some kindergartens in West Gunungsitoli Subdistrict include playing, telling stories, singing, conversing, demonstrations, role-playing, habituation methods, and tourism.
title: Management of Learning Based on Pancasila Values in Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of learning based on pancasila values ​​in early childhood the internalization of pancasila is carried out from an early age this is related to the problems in the community of the fading of the noble values ​​of the indonesian states guidelines for life the final goal of this study was to find the methods used by teachers in instilling Pancasila values ​​in early childhood in kindergarten qualitative research methods were used to achieve this goal by making kindergarten teachers as informants determined through purposive techniques and snowball sampling data was collected by placing researchers as the primary tool supported by interviewing observation and documentation techniques the netted data was analyzed with miles and hubermans qualitative data analysis techniques the results concluded that kindergarten teachers level of knowledge and understanding about the types of learning methods in early childhood are quite good methods of planting Pancasila values ​​used in some kindergartens in west Gunungsitoli subdistrict includes playing telling stories singing conversing demonstrations roleplaying habituation methods and tourism

desc: The problem is that there are still many teachers who have difficulty implementing religious and moral value development activities, and teachers have not been able to change IT-based learning. The purpose of this research is to equip teachers in making teaching materials using smart app creator applications, which can be accessed by everyone. The research method is Research  Development (RD) Borg  Gall design with 8 stages of research, 1) need assessment 2) planning 3) product development 4) initial field trial 5) product revision 6) main field trial 7) product revision 8) field test, 10) final product revision. The results of this study were obtained from media expert validation, namely very feasible, material expert validation very feasible, and learning expert validation very feasible). The results of the learning media assessment trial in the small group trial were 82.09% (very feasible) and in the large field trial, it was 88.89% (very worth it). Based on these results, the product is said to be suitable for use
title: Using Smart Apps Creator to Internalize Religious and Moral Values of Children
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: using smart apps creator to internalize religious and moral values ​​of children the problem is that there are still many teachers who have difficulty implementing religious and moral values ​​development activities and teachers have not been able to change it based learning the purpose of this research is to equip teachers in making teaching materials using smart app creator applications which can be accessed by everyone the research method is research development rd borg gall design with stages of research need assessment planning product development initial field trial product revision main field trial product revision field test final product revision the results of this study were obtained from media expert validation namely very feasible material expert validation very feasible and learning expert validation very feasible the results of the learning media assessment trial in the small group trial were very feasible and in the large field trial it was very feasible based on these results the product is said to be suitable for use

desc: Penelitian yang dilatarbelakangi dengan kondisi pembelajaran di tengah pandemi Covid-19 yang harus tetap berjalan, serta guru dituntut untuk tetap memberikan pembelajaran yang membuat siswanya mengerti dan paham sesuai dengan capaian yang diharapkan. Tujuan penelitian mengetahui efektivitas pembelajaran online yang dilakukan oleh guru PAUD di tengah pandemi Covid-19. Menggunakan metode kuantitatif deskriptif. Dengan sampel Guru PAUD Gugus Mawar Kecamatan Rumbai Pesisir yang terdiri dari 8 lembaga. Menggunakan teknik total sampling dengan jumlah responden pada penelitian ini sebanyak 30 guru dengan mengisi lembar angket (kuesioner). Teknik analisis data menggunakan teknik analisis statistik deskriptif dimana data diolah berdasarkan jawaban yang diberikan kepada responden terhadap pernyataan dari setiap angket. Hasil penelitian menunjukan bahwa efektivitas pembelajaran online selama masa pandemi Covid-19 yang dilakukan oleh guru dan anak di TK sudah efektif
title: Efektivitas Pembelajaran Online pada Masa Pandemi Covid-19 di Taman Kanak-Kanak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the effectiveness of online learning during the covid pandemic in kindergartens research that is based on learning conditions in the midst of the covid pandemic that must continue and teachers are required to continue to provide learning that makes their students understand and understand according to the expected achievements the purpose of the study is to determine the effectiveness of online learning carried out by early childhood education teachers in the midst of the covid pandemic using a descriptive quantitative method with a sample of early childhood education teachers in the cluster of Mawar, Rumbai Pesisir sub-district consisting of institutions using total sampling techniques with the number of respondents in this study as many as teachers by filling out the questionnaire questionnaire data analysis techniques using descriptive statistical analysis techniques where the data is processed based on the answers given to respondents to statements from each questionnaire the results of the study show that the effectiveness of online learning during the covid pandemic carried out by teachers and children in kindergartens has been effective

desc: Sebagian besar anak yang diasuh oleh orang tua tunggal korban perceraian mengalami penyimpangan perilaku sosial-emosional pada indikator rendahnya pemahaman peratiran disiplin, sikap toleransi, dan penggunaan pikiran kritis untuk memecahkan masalah.  Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan secara kualitatif tentang penyimpangan perilaku sosial-emosional anak usia 4-6 tahun di Kota Mataram. Penelitian menerapkan metode deskriptif kualitatif dengan 10 subjek yang diasuh oleh orang tua tunggal bapak/ibu korban perceraian. Instrumen pengumpulan data memakai teknik observasi dengan menggunakan check list berskala ordinal. Isi instrumen disusun berdasarkan indikator perilaku sosial-emosional. Data dianalisis menggunakan teknik analisis kualitataif dari Haberman. Ditemukan 60% subjek mengalami penyimpangan perilaku sosial-emosional pada indikator memahami peraturan dan disiplin, sikap toleran, dan penggunaan pikiran kritis untuk menyelesaikan masalah. 40% - 50% anak menunjukkan menyimpang sosial-emosional pada indikator: bertanggungjawab, pengendalian perasaan, kehati-hatian, menjaga diri, mengakui keunggulan orang lain, menaati aturan yang berlaku dan menghargai orang lain. 20% - 30% anak berperilaku menyimpang sosial-emosionalnya pada indikator: rasa empati, pengendalian diri, sikap mandiri, berbagi dan tolong menolong, antusias dalam kompetitif, penghargaan pendapat dan karya orang lain dan bersikap kooperatif dengan teman.
title: Penyimpangan Perilaku Sosial-Emosional Anak pada Pengasuhan Orang Tua Tunggal Korban Perceraian
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Social emotional behavioral deviations in children in the care of single parents who are victims of divorce most children who are raised by single parents who are victims of divorce experience social emotional behavioral deviations in the indicators of low understanding of discipline regulations, attitudes, tolerance and use of critical thinking to solve problems this study aims to qualitatively describe the social emotional behavioral deviations of children aged 18-24 years in the city of Mataram the study applied a qualitative descriptive method with subjects who were raised by single parents, fathers and mothers who were victims of divorce the data collection instrument used observation techniques using an ordinal scale checklist the contents of the instrument were arranged based on indicators of social emotional behavior the data were analyzed using qualitative analysis techniques from Haberman it was found that the subjects experienced social emotional behavioral deviations in the indicators of understanding regulations and discipline, attitudes of tolerance and use of critical thinking to solve problems children showed social emotional deviations in the indicators of being responsible, controlling feelings, being careful, protecting oneself, recognizing the superiority of others, obeying applicable rules and respecting others children behaved in a social emotional deviation in the indicators of empathy, self-control, independent attitude, sharing and helping each other, enthusiastic in competition, appreciation of opinions and work of others and being cooperative with friends

desc: Keberagaman budaya dan agama selalu dikaitkan dengan konflik yang disebabkan oleh masih lemahnya peran lembaga pendidikan dan orang tua. Perlu cara mengatasi konflik tersebut, yaitu peran orang tua menanamkan nilai multikultural. Penelitian kualitatif dengan metode case study ini bertujuan menganalisis secara mendalam dan mendeskripsikan peran orang tua dalam menanamkan nilai multikultural di lingkungan keluarga siswa kelas II Sekolah Dasar 152993 Tapian Nauli 3A dengan 3 orang tua siswa sebagai responden penelitian yang ditetapkan dengan teknik purposif sampling. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa orang tua memegang peran penting dalam menanamkan nilai multikultural kepada anak-anaknya. Peran orang tua dapat di lihat dari bagaimana orang tua membagi waktunya terhadap anak-anaknya. Pentingnya membangun komunikasi baik antara orang tua dan guru agar sama-sama mengetahui dan terbuka terhadap anak, bersosialisasi dengan lingkungan serta lebih memahami dan perduli bahwa pentingnya menanamkan nilai-nilai multikultural untuk mendidik sikap simpati, menghormati, menghargai serta menjadikan anak-anak yang mencintai keberagaman setiap budaya sejak dini.
title: Peran Orang Tua dalam Menanamkan Nilai Multikultural di Lingkungan Keluarga Siswa sekolah Dasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of parents in instilling multicultural values ​​in the family environment of elementary school students cultural and religious diversity is always associated with conflicts caused by the weak role of educational institutions and parents need a way to overcome these conflicts, namely the role of parents in instilling multicultural values ​​qualitative research with the case study method aims to analyze in depth and describe the role of parents in instilling multicultural values ​​in the family environment of grade II elementary school students tapian nauli a with parents of students as research respondents determined by purposive sampling techniques the results of this study indicate that parents play an important role in instilling multicultural values ​​in their children the role of parents can be seen from how parents divide their time with their children the importance of building good communication between parents and teachers so that both know and are open to children socializing with the environment and understanding and caring more that the importance of instilling multicultural values ​​to educate attitudes of sympathy respect and appreciation and make children who love the diversity of each culture from an early age

desc: Perkembangan motorik atau kemampuan gerak merupakan hal yang sangat penting pada kehidupan manusia. Sejak lahir hingga dewasa manusia beraktivitas melalui gerak. Aspek gerak motorik merupakan salah satu dari aspek perkembangan yang penting untuk mendapat stimulasi, terutama dalam masa awal perkembangan yaitu masa kanak-kanak.  Transfer of Learning adalah salah satu prinsip yang digunakan dalam pembelajaran. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa transfer dalam pembelajaran merupakan salah satu faktor yang mempengaruhi keberhasilan pembelajaran atau stimulasi motoric pada anak usia dini. Penyusunan tahap pembelajaran dan pelatihan motorik yang menerapkan prinsip transfer dalam pembelajaran diharapkan akan membuat proses pembelajaran menjadi lebih efektif. Penerapan prinsip ini  dilakukan dalam tahap penyusunan dan pengembangan kurikulum sekolah. Keterampilan  diajarkan kepada peserta didik melalui tahapan  latihan yang disusun menggunakan prinsip Transfer dalam Pembelajaran (Transfer of Learning).
title: Peran Transfer dalam Pembelajaran pada Pembelajaran Motorik Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of transfer in learning in early childhood motor learning motor development or motor skills are very important in human life from birth to adulthood humans are active through movement the motor movement aspect is one of the important aspects of development to get stimulation especially in the early stages of development, namely childhood transfer of learning is one of the principles used in learning the results of this study indicate that transfer in learning is one of the factors that influences the success of learning or motor stimulation in early childhood the preparation of learning stages and motor training that apply the principle of transfer in learning is expected to make the learning process more effective the application of this principle is carried out in the preparation and development stage of the school curriculum skills are taught to students through training stages that are arranged using the principle of transfer in learning transfer of learning

desc: Penilitian ini bertujuan untuk untuk mengatahui kontribusi pola asuh orang tua pada penanaman arakter cinta tanah anak usia dini di lembaga PAUD Budi Mulya Adiwarno Buayan Kebumen yang dianggap sangat penting dalam membangun karakter cinta tanah air sejak usia dini. Penilitian menggunakan jenis penelitian kualitataif dengan melalui pendekatan deskriptif kualitatif. Pengumpulan data pada penelitian ini secara observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Pada proses pengumpulan data peneliti menggunakan instrument berupa lembar observasi, pedoman wawancara dan dokumentasi. Penilitian ini menggunaan uji keabsahan yang sesuai dengan pendapat sugiono yaitu : uji (credibility, transferability, depenbility dan comfirmability). Analisis data yang digunakan pada penelitian ini mengacu analisis Miles  Huberman dalam Denzin  Lincon (2009: 591) yang menyatakan tentang alur analisis interaktif diantaranya adalah : (1) Pengoleksian Data (Data Collection), (2) Penyajian data (Data Display), (3) Reduksi Data  (Data Reduction), dan (4) Penggambaran Hasil (Conclusion Drawing). Dari berbagai pernyataan diatas menyatakan penanaman karakter cinta tanah air di PAUD Budi Mulya secara gambaran kondisi nyata menjadi tanggung jawab guru serta perlu adanya kontribusi dari orang tua dalam bentuk pola asuh. Kontribusi orang tua peserta didik memberikan hasil signifikan pada penanaman karakter cinta tanah air.
title: Kontribusi Pola Asuh Orang Tua pada Penanaman Karakter Cinta Tanah Air Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Contribution of parenting patterns to the instillation of patriotism in early childhood children This study aims to determine the contribution of parenting patterns to the instillation of patriotism in early childhood children at the Budi Mulya Adiwarno Buian Kebumen PAUD institution which is considered very important in building patriotism from an early age The study used a qualitative research type through a qualitative descriptive approach. Data collection in this study was carried out through observation, interviews and documentation. In the data collection process, researchers used instruments in the form of observation sheets, interview guidelines and documentation. This study used a validity test in accordance with Sugiono's opinion, namely the credibility test, transferability, dependability and confirmation of the data analysis used in this study refers to Miles Huberman's analysis in Denzin Lincoln, which states that the interactive analysis flow includes data collection, data presentation, data display, data reduction, data reduction and depiction of the results. Conclusion drawing from the various statements above states that the instillation of patriotism in Budi Mulya PAUD in terms of real conditions is the responsibility of teachers and there needs to be a contribution from parents in the form of parenting patterns. The contribution of students' parents provides significant results in the instillation of patriotism characters. homeland

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan kelekatan anak usia dini di suku laut yaitu desa Mola Selatan Kabupaten Wakatobi. Peneliti menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif untuk mendapatkan data yang komprehensif. Teknik pengumpulan data yang digunakan adalah wawancara, observasi dan studi dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data dalam penelitian ini menggunakan interaktif model dengan langkah-langkah analisis data yaitu reduksi data, penyajian data, penarikan kesimpulan dan verifikasi. Teknik pemeriksaan keabsahan data yang digunakan adalah teknik kredibilitas (derajat kepercayaan) yakni, triangulasi sumber. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa pertama, kelekatan anak usia dini di suku laut tergolong pada kelekatan yang kuat. kedua, kelekatan anak usia dini di suku laut desa Mola Selatan memiliki perbedaan antara di rumah dan di sekolah, yaitu di sekolah anak begitu lekat dengan figur dekatnya yaitu ibu, sedangkan di rumah kelekatan anak dengan ibunya bersifat tidak kuat
title: Kelekatan (Attachment) Anak Usia Dini di Suku Laut Kabupaten Wakatobi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: attachment of early childhood in the sea tribe of Wakatobi Regency This study aims to describe the attachment of early childhood in the sea tribe, namely the village of South Mola, Wakatobi Regency. The researcher used a qualitative approach to obtain comprehensive data. The data collection techniques used were interviews, observations and documentation studies. The data analysis technique in this study used an interactive model with data analysis steps, namely data reduction, data presentation, drawing conclusions and verification. The data validity examination technique used was the credibility technique, the degree of trust, namely source triangulation. The results of the study showed that first, the attachment of early childhood in the sea tribe was classified as a strong attachment. Second, the attachment of early childhood in the sea tribe of South Mola Village had differences between at home and at school, namely at school children were very attached to their close figure, namely their mother, while at home the child's attachment to their mother was not strong.

desc: Secara umum penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengidentifikasi berbagai macam keterampilan dasar proses membaca siswa kelas VI SDN 29 Pekanbaru. Proses membaca selama ini di kelas kurang menekankan pada keterampilan dasar membaca, sehingga pemahaman   membaca   sangat   lemah.   Padahal   pemahaman   membaca   siswa   sangat ditentukan oleh kemampuan dasar membaca siswa. Metode yang digunakan guru tidak bervariasi dan masih konvensional, sehingga metode SQ3R (survey, question, read, recite, review) digunakan untuk meningkatkan pemahaman membaca teks eksplanasi. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data utama dalam penelitian ini adalah observasi partisipatif dan wawancara mendalam terhadap siswa dan guru serta dokumentasi. Secara keseluruhan, dengan menggunakan metode SQ3R, siswa dominan diidentifikasi memiliki rata-rata 4-5 keterampilan membaca dasar. Hal ini menunjukkan bahwa siswa mempunyai daya dalam memahami teks bacaan.
title: Identifikasi Kemampuan Dasar dalam Proses Membaca Teks Eksplanasi Menggunakan Metode SQ3R di Sekolah Dasar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Identification of basic skills in the process of reading explanatory texts using the SQR method in elementary schools in general this study aims to identify various basic skills in the reading process of grade VI students of SDN Pekanbaru the reading process so far in class has not emphasized basic reading skills so that reading comprehension is very weak even though students' reading comprehension is very much determined by students' basic reading skills the methods used by teachers are not varied and are still conventional so that the SQR survey question read recite review method is used to improve reading comprehension of explanatory texts the research method used is qualitative descriptive research the main data collection technique in this study is participatory observation and in-depth interviews with students and teachers as well as overall documentation using the SQR method dominant students are identified as having an average of basic reading skills this shows that students have the power to understand reading texts

desc: Artikel ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui peran apa saja yang dirasakan orang tua selama mendampingi anak di masa pandemi Covid-19. Metode yang digunakan studi kasus melalui wawancara dengan analisis tematik pada 3 Ayah dan 6 Ibu. Hasil menunjukkan bahwa secara umum peran yang muncul adalah sebagai pembimbing, pendidik, penjaga, pengembang dan pengawas. Secara khusus peran yang muncul yaitu: menjaga dan memastikan anak untuk menerapkan hidup bersih dan sehat, mendampingi anak dalam mengerjakan tugas sekolah, melakukan kegiatan bersama selama di rumah, menciptakan lingkungan yang nyaman untuk anak, menjalin komunikasi yang intens dengan anak, bermain bersama anak, menjadi role model bagi anak, memberikan pengawasan pada anggota keluarga, menafkahi dan memenuhi kebutuhan keluarga, dan membimbing dan memotivasi anak, memberikan edukasi, memelihara nilai keagamaan, melakukan variasi dan inovasi kegiatan di rumah. Diperlukan panduan bagi orang tua dalam membantu mendampingi kegiatan anak yang berbasis pada kebutuhan anak selama pandemi dan BDR.
title: Analisis Peran Orang Tua dalam Mendampingi Anak di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of the role of parents in accompanying children during the covid pandemic this article aims to find out what roles parents feel while accompanying children during the covid pandemic the method used is a case study through interviews with thematic analysis of fathers and mothers the results show that in general the roles that emerge are as guides educators guards developers and supervisors specifically the roles that emerge are guarding and ensuring children to implement a clean and healthy life accompanying children in doing schoolwork doing activities together while at home creating a comfortable environment for children establishing intense communication with children playing with children being a role model for children providing supervision to family members supporting and meeting family needs and guiding and motivating children providing education maintaining religious values ​​carrying out variations and innovations in activities at home a guide is needed for parents in helping to accompany children's activities based on children's needs during the pandemic and bdr

desc: Kompetensi kewirausahaan dan kepemimpinan kepala sekolah merupakan faktor penting dalam mewujudkan sekolah yang bermutu. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh kompetensi kewirausahaan dan kepemimpinan visioner kepala sekolah terhadap mutu. Penelitian menggunakan metode kuantitatif, dengan sampel sebanyak 51 orang kepala sekolah, data diambil melalui penyebaran kuesioner. Pengujian hipotesis dengan regresi linear berganda menunjukan hasil sebagai berikut: adanya pengaruh kompetensi kewirausahaan (X1) terhadap mutu, begitu juga dengan variable kepemimpinan visioner (X2) terhadap mutu (Y). Berdasarkan uji f simultan menunjukan adanya pengaruh kompetensi kewirausahaan dan kepemimpinan visioner terhadap mutu. Secara empirik hasil penelitian ini dapat diartikan terdapat pengaruh positif kompetensi kewirausahaan dan kepemimpinan visioner terhadap mutu. Hasil penelitian mengindikasikan semakin tinggi kompetensi kewirausahaan dan kepemimpinan visioner, maka akan berpengaruh positif terhadap mutu. Hasil penelitian ini bisa menjadi referensi bagi kepala sekolah dan dinas pendidikan dalam meningkatkan mutu melalui peningkatan kompetensi kewirausahaan dan kepemimpinan visioner.
title: Pengaruh Kompetensi Kewirausahaan dan Kepemimpinan Visioner Kepala Taman Kanak-Kanak(TK) Terhadap Mutu
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of entrepreneurial competence and visionary leadership of kindergarten principals on the quality of entrepreneurial competence and principal leadership is an important factor in realizing a quality school. This study aims to determine the influence of entrepreneurial competence and visionary leadership of principals on the quality of research using quantitative methods with a sample of 1,000 principals. Data was taken through the distribution of questionnaires. Hypothesis testing with multiple linear regression showed the following results. There is an influence of entrepreneurial competence x on quality, as well as the variable visionary leadership x on quality y. Based on the simultaneous f test, there is an influence of entrepreneurial competence and visionary leadership on quality. Empirically, the results of this study can be interpreted as having a positive influence of entrepreneurial competence and visionary leadership on quality. The results of the study indicate that the higher the entrepreneurial competence and visionary leadership, the more positive the influence on quality. The results of this study can be a reference for principals and education offices in improving quality through increasing entrepreneurial competence and visionary leadership.

desc: Perkembangan perilaku prososial anak terancam seiring dengan perkembangan teknologi informasi. Media audio visual yang mengandung konten kekerasan justru mengarahkan anak kepada perilaku agresif. Kompetensi sosial yang penting dimiliki oleh anak salah satunya adalah perilaku prososial.  Selain berdampak negatif, konten media audio visual seharusnya dapat memunculkan dampak positif bagi perkembangan anak khususnya perkembangan perilaku prososial. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui apakah terdapat peningkatan perilaku prososial pada anak melalui pemberian video yang bermuatan perilaku prososial. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah metode kuantitatif dengan desain kuasi eksperimen one grup Pretest-Postest Design. Populasi dalam Penelitian ini adalah siswa Sekolah Dasar Muhammadiah 09. Teknik pengambilan sampel adalah purposive sampling. Jumlah subjek sebanyak 10 orang. Alat pengumpul data yang digunakan adalah Prosocial Behaviour Questionairre (PBQ). Pemberian perlakuan dilakukan sebanyak 4 kali setiap dua minggu. Durasi video selama 30 menit. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa terdapat perbedaan perilaku prososial sebelum dan sesudah pemberian video perilaku prososial.
title: Peningkatan Perilaku Prososial melalui Media : Studi Eksperimental
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: increasing prosocial behavior through media experimental study the development of children's prosocial behavior is threatened along with the development of information technology audio visual media containing violent content actually leads children to aggressive behavior important social competencies that children must have, one of which is prosocial behavior besides having a negative impact audio visual media content should be able to create a positive impact on children's development, especially the development of prosocial behavior this study aims to determine whether there is an increase in prosocial behavior in children through the provision of videos containing prosocial behavior the research method used is a quantitative method with a quasi-experimental design one group pretest posttest design the population in this study were elementary school students of Muhammadiyah the sampling technique was purposive sampling the number of subjects was 100 people the data collection tool used was the prosocial behavior questionnaire pbq the treatment was given as many times every two weeks the duration of the video was 100 minutes the results of the study showed that there was a difference in prosocial behavior before and after the provision of prosocial behavior videos

desc: Pendidikan anak usia dini bertujuan agar seorang anak usia dini memiliki kesiapan untuk melanjutkan pendidikan selanjutnya dimasa yang akan datang. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengumpulkan data atau informasi, pendapat, sikap dan membuat deskripsi komprehensif mengenai komponen kesiapan bersekolah di wilayah Banten. Permasalahan dalam penelitian ini Adanya kebijakan pemerintah melalui syarat usia dan kesiapan psikis anak dalam memasuki SD merupakan bentuk upaya pemerintah dalam menunjang kesiapan bersekolah anak. Teknik survey yang digunakan dalam mengkaji tentang kesiapan bersekolah ini menggunakan incidental sampling, yaitu teknik penentuan sampel berdasarkan kebetulan atau dengan kata lain bahwa survey ini memberikan kebebasan kepada siapa saja yang tersedia di suatu tempat yang sesuai dengan konteks penelitian diperkenankan untuk mengisi instrumen. Dalam hal ini, responden yakni guru, kepala sekolah, orang tua, penilik dan pengawas, baik di satuan PAUD dan SD di wilayah  provinsi Banten diperbolehkan untuk mengisi instrument kesiapan bersekolah. Dari analisis data masih terdapat ketidak pahaman guru terhadap transisi PAUD -SD.
title: Survei Kesiapan Bersekolah Anak Usia Dini di Provinsi Banten Tahun 2022
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Early childhood school readiness survey in Banten province early childhood education year aims for an early childhood to have readiness to continue further education in the future this study aims to collect data or information opinions attitudes and create a comprehensive description of the components of school readiness in the Banten region the problem in this study the existence of government policies through age requirements and children's psychological readiness in entering elementary school is a form of government effort in supporting children's school readiness the survey technique used in studying this school readiness uses incidental sampling, namely a sample determination technique based on chance or in other words that this survey gives freedom to anyone who is available in a place that is in accordance with the context of the study is allowed to fill out the instrument in this case the respondents are teachers principals parents supervisors and supervisors both in early childhood education and elementary school units in the Banten province are allowed to fill out the school readiness instrument from the data analysis there is still a lack of understanding of teachers regarding the transition of early childhood education to elementary school

desc: PAKEM approach can be applied in teaching science. Preliminary observations on Pembina Bangkinang kindergarten children learning science is rarely done, especially activities to measure and classify the size of the objects have never been implemented. This gap into the background of this research. Research the type of pre-experimental design with one group pre-test post-test design. collecting data through observation with the observation assessment tool sheet. The subjects of the study all children amounted to 22 children. Data were analyzed using non-parametric statistical test level Wilcoxon signed by the formula tcount t table, where if thitung smaller than ttabel the significant results of this study the influence of two variables. title: Pengaruh Pendekatan Pakem Terhadap Keterampilan Mengukur Dan Mengklasifikasikan Ukuran Benda Dalam Pembelajaran Sains Anak Kelompok B
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengembangkan busy book dalam rangka pengenalan pendidikan seks untuk anak usia dini di Taman Kanak-kanak. Busy book berdasarkan neurosains berisi berbagai macam gambar yang menarik, hal ini sesuai dengan sistem kerja otak, dimana otak akan lebih mudah menangkap informasi dalam bentuk gambar daripada tulisan. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah model pengembangan dalam penelitian yang mengacu pada model penelitian dan pengembangan 4D (four-D), yang diadaptasikan menjadi 4P yaitu pendefinisian, perancangan, pengembangan, dan penyebaran. Hasil penelitian ini menunjukkan busy book dalam rangka pengenalan pendidikan seks untuk anak usia dini yang dikembangkan oleh peneliti masuk dalam kategori sangat layak yaitu memperoleh skor rata-rata 3,9 dengan skor maksimal 4 dalam hal kesesuaian materi dan memperoleh skor rata-rata 3,5 dengan skor maksimal 4 dalam hal kesesuaian media
title: Pengembangan Busy Book Berbasis Neurosains dalam Rangka Pengenalan Seks untuk Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of neuroscience-based busy books in the context of introducing sex for early childhood This study aims to develop busy books in the context of introducing sex education for early childhood in kindergartens. Neuroscience-based busy books contain various interesting images. This is in accordance with the brain's working system where the brain will more easily capture information in the form of images than writing. The method used in this study is a development model in research that refers to the d-fourd research and development model which is adapted into p, namely defining the design, development and dissemination of the results of this study shows that busy books in the context of introducing sex education for early childhood developed by researchers are included in the very feasible category, namely obtaining an average score with a maximum score in terms of material suitability and obtaining an average score with a maximum score in terms of media suitability.

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh beberapa hal yang ditemukan peneliti yaitu kondisi dan perubahan yang terjadi di masyarakat selalu memberikan makna yang berbeda pada tempat tumbuh dan berkembangnya anak. Adanya kondisi sebelumnya seperti orang tua yang sibuk dengan pekerjaannya sehingga tidak bisa mendampingi anak bermain. Kasus lainnya ketika orang tua bekerja di rumah, akan memunculkan dampak terhadap anak. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui pengaruh dari kemitraan PAUD dan keluarga terhadap praktik playful parenting. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian menggunakan pendekatan penelitian kuantitatif korelasional dengan bantuan SPSS.25.0. Teknik pengumpulan data dalam penelitian ini menggunakan kuesioner atau angket, sebagai alat untuk mengumpulkan data yang sebelumnya diuji validitas dan reliabilitas. Berdasarkan penelitian hasil yang ditemukan dengan perhitungan menggunakan uji regresi linier sederhana diperoleh nilai R square pada tabel sejumlah 0,290 atau 29%, dengan demikian menunjukkan bahwa pengaruh kemitraan PAUD dan keluarga sebesar 29% terhadap praktik playful parenting.
title: Pengaruh Kemitraan PAUD dan Keluarga dalam Mendukung Praktik Playful Parenting
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of early childhood education and family partnerships in supporting playful parenting practices This study was motivated by several things found by researchers, namely the conditions and changes that occur in society always give different meanings to the place where children grow and develop, the existence of previous conditions such as parents who are busy with their work so they cannot accompany their children to play, other cases when parents work at home will have an impact on children This study aims to determine the influence of early childhood education and family partnerships on playful parenting practices, the method used in the study used a quantitative correlational research approach with the help of SPSS, the data collection technique in this study used a questionnaire or questionnaire as a tool to collect data that was previously tested for validity and reliability based on research, the results found by calculating using a simple linear regression test obtained the r square value in the table of a number or thus indicating that the influence of early childhood education and family partnerships on playful parenting practices

desc: Keluarga merupakan kunci utama dalam pendidikan karakter, keluarga juga  dapat dijadikan sebagai wadah belajar dalam hal mengajarkan nilai toleransi yang merupakan bagian dari kegiatan belajar TK mereka sejak dini . Oleh karenanya perlu adanya model pembelajaran karakter berbasis keluarga yang terintegrasi dengan pembelajaran di sekolah sebagai upaya dalam menanamkan nilai-nilai toleransi pada anak Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk memberikan rekomendasi model pembentukan karakter berbasis keluarga untuk mengajarkan nilai toleransi pada anak. Metode yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah deskriptif analisis  dengan menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dan sumber data kepustakaan. Bagaimanapun juga, penelitian ini akan menjadi pedoman atau acuan bagi guru dalam melaksanakan pembentukan karakter untuk mengajar pada tingkatan yang dapat diterima sejak usia dini. Langkah penelitian yang dilakukan dengan cara melakukan wawancara kepada guru dan orang tua untuk mendapatkan informasi yang dibutuhkan. Hasil penelitian ini berupa model pendidikan karakter berbasis keluarga yang terintegrasi dalam pembelajaran dilihat dari tujuan pendidikan karakter, program, proses dan evaluasi yang disiapkan oleh guru namun penerapanya dalam keluarga.
title: Pendidikan Karakter Berbasis Keluarga Terintegrasi Pembelajaran untuk Menanamkan Nilai-nilai Toleransi Sejak Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Family-based character education integrated learning to instill tolerance values ​​from an early age family is the main key in character education family can also be used as a place of learning in terms of teaching tolerance values ​​which are part of their kindergarten learning activities from an early age therefore there needs to be a family-based character learning model that is integrated with learning in schools as an effort to instill tolerance values ​​in children this study aims to provide recommendations for a family-based character formation model to teach tolerance values ​​to children the method used in this study is descriptive analysis using a qualitative approach and library data sources however this study will be a guideline or reference for teachers in implementing character formation to teach at an acceptable level from an early age the research steps carried out by conducting interviews with teachers and parents to obtain the information needed the results of this study are in the form of a family-based character education model that is integrated in learning seen from the objectives of character education program process and evaluation prepared by teachers but its application in the family

desc: Penelitian ini dilatar belakangi pentingnya anak usia dini untuk mengenal dan melestarikan permainan tradisional khusunya permainan gobak sodor, serta meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian ini ialah mengembangkan media permainan tradisional gobak sodor untuk meningkatkan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Metode penelitian menggunakan Research and Development (RD) dengan model ADDIE: Analyze, Design, Development, Implementation, dan Evaluation. Penelitian ini diawali dengan uji coba terbatas dan uji coba lapangan sesungguhnya, penilaian kelayakan instrument produk yang dilaukan oleh para ahli (validator). Berdasarkan hasil penilaian kelayakan media dari para ahli meperoleh kategori sangat layak, dan hasil uji efektivitas memperoleh hasil N-Gain dalam kategori tinggi dan terdapat perbedaan yang signifikan antara hasil pretest dan posttest. Dengan demikian penggunaan playmat gobak sodor terbukti efektif dalam meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun.
title: Pengembangan Media Permainan Tradisional Gobak Sodor untuk Meningkatkan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of traditional gobak sodor game media to improve gross motor skills of children aged years this study is motivated by the importance of early childhood to know and preserve traditional games especially gobak sodor games and improve the gross motor skills of early childhood children the purpose of this study is to develop traditional gobak sodor game media to improve gross motor skills of children aged years the research method uses research and development rd with the addie analyze design development implementation and evaluation model this study began with a limited trial and a real field trial the assessment of the feasibility of the product instrument carried out by validator experts based on the results of the media feasibility assessment from the experts obtained a very feasible category and the results of the effectiveness test obtained results in the high category and there was a significant difference between the pretest and posttest results thus the use of gobak sodor playmats has proven effective in improving the gross motor skills of children aged years

desc: Latar Belakang ini bertujuan untuk melihat sejauh mana sekolah dapat mandiri dan memberdayakan sekolah melalui manajemen berbasis sekolah untuk melakukan pengambilan keputusan secara partisipatif. Tujuan penelitian ini 1) untuk mengkaji proses penerapan manajemen berbasis sekolah di Taman Kanak Kanak Al Faidah Cianjur; 2) mempelajari bagaimana Taman Kanak Kanak Al Faidah Cianjur dalam menghasilkan siswa yang berkualitas; dan 3) mengkaji faktor pendukung dan penghambat dalam penerapan manajemen berbasis sekolah di Taman Kanak Kanak Al Faidah Cianjur dan cara meminimalisir faktor penghambat tersebut. Metode penelitian ini adalah metode deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data dalam penelitian ini meliputi 1) observasi; 2) wawancara; dan 3) dokumentasi. Analisis data kualitatif yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini 1) reduksi data, 2) penyajian atau penyajian data dan 3) penarikan kesimpulan dan verifikasi data. Dapat dikatakan bahwa penerapan manajemen berbasis sekolah di Taman Kanak Kanak Al – Faidah Cianjur sudah berjalan dengan baik. Melihat pelaksanaan manajemen berbasis sekolah di TK Al-Faidah, berbeda dengan sekolah lain pada umumnya yang belum menggunakan manajemen peningkatan kualitas berbasis sekolah
title: School-Based Quality Improvement Management System
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: schoolbased quality improvement management system This background aims to see the extent to which schools can be independent and empower schools through school-based management to make participatory decision-making. The purpose of this study is to examine the process of implementing school-based management in Al Faidah Kindergarten, Cianjur. To study how Al Faidah Kindergarten, Cianjur produces quality students and examines the supporting and inhibiting factors in the implementation of school-based management in Al Faidah Kindergarten, Cianjur and how to minimize these inhibiting factors. This research method is a qualitative descriptive method. Data collection techniques in this study include observation, interviews and documentation. Qualitative data analysis used in this study is data reduction, presentation or presentation of data and drawing conclusions and verification of data. It can be said that the implementation of school-based management in Al Faidah Kindergarten, Cianjur has been running well. Seeing the implementation of school-based management in Alfaidah Kindergarten is different from other schools in general that have not used school-based quality improvement management.

desc: Gaya kepemimpinan Kepala TK memengaruhi motivasi dan kinerja guru. Studi ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis gaya kepemimpinan Kepala TK yang terletak di lingkungan pesantren. Desain studi kasus dan pendekatan kualitatif digunakan pada studi ini. Data dikumpulkan melalui teknik wawancara mendalam kepada kepala sekolah dan guru, observasi, dan analisis dokumen. Analisis data kualitatif melibatkan tiga proses, yaitu mengorganisir data, mereduksi data, dan menafsirkan data. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan Kepala TK di lingkungan pesantren mengadopsi tiga gaya kepemimpinan: transformasional (mengedepankan nilai, peningkatan kualitas guru melalui pelatihan), partisipatif (melibatkan guru dalam pengambilan keputusan, meningkatkan motivasi), dan transaksional (mengelola tugas, memberikan penghargaan, dan meningkatkan loyalitas guru). Studi ini memberikan potensi pengembangan pelatihan dan kebijakan untuk meningkatkan kinerja guru di pesantren.
title: Analisis Gaya Kepemimpinan Kepala TK di Lingkungan Pesantren: Suatu Kajian Kasus
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of kindergarten principal leadership style in Islamic boarding school environment a case study of kindergarten principal leadership style affecting teacher motivation and performance this study aims to analyze the leadership style of kindergarten principals located in Islamic boarding school environments case study design and qualitative approach are used in this study data were collected through in-depth interview techniques with principals and teachers observation and document analysis qualitative data analysis involves three processes namely organizing data reducing data and interpreting data the results of the study show that kindergarten principals in Islamic boarding school environments adopt three transformational leadership styles prioritizing the value of improving teacher quality through participatory training involving teachers in decision making increasing motivation and transactional managing tasks giving rewards and increasing teacher loyalty this study provides potential for developing training and policies to improve teacher performance in Islamic boarding schools

desc: Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk menggambarkan hubungan teman sebaya dan permainan tradisional dengan kemampuan sosial dan emosional anak usia dini. Sampel penelitian dari 30 anak yang terdiri dari 10 laki-laki dan 20 perempuan. Sampel penelitian adalah anak-anak berusia 5-6 tahun di wilayah pesisir selatan Kulon Progo. Pengumpulan data dikumpulkan dengan wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Analisis validitas data dilakukan dengan triangulasi sumber dan teknik. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa keterampilan sosial dan emosional anak usia dini di pantai selatan Kulon Progo menunjukkan tingkat pencapaian perkembangan yang cukup baik. Hubungan teman sebaya yang positif akan meningkatkan prestasi perkembangan sosial dan emosional anak-anak. Peran orang tua dan guru penting dalam perkembangan sosial anak-anak dan perlu direalisasikan dan dipelajari secara mendalam.
title: Hubungan Sebaya dan Permainan Tradisional pada Keterampilan Sosial dan Emosional Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Peer relationships and traditional games on social and emotional skills of early childhood The purpose of this study was to describe peer relationships and traditional games with social and emotional skills of early childhood The research sample consisted of children consisting of boys and girls The research sample was children aged years in the southern coastal area of ​​Kulon Progo Data collection was collected through interviews, observation and documentation Data validity analysis was carried out using triangulation of sources and techniques The results of the study showed that the social and emotional skills of early childhood in the southern coastal area of ​​Kulon Progo showed a fairly good level of development achievement Positive peer relationships will improve children's social and emotional development achievements The role of parents and teachers is important in children's social development and needs to be realized and studied in depth

desc: Pembelajaran jarak jauh melalui pembelajaran online memungkinkan anak-anak menjadi banyak berkegiatan dirumah. Gadget merupakan media yang digunakan untuk pembelajaran online. Agar anak-anak dapat menggunakan perangkat ini secara efektif, diperlukan bantuan orang tua. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah untuk mengetahui dukungan orang tua dalam bermain gadget pada anak dibandingkan dengan indikator teoritis. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode deskriptif, sampel penelitian adalah 136 orang tua anak di Kabupaten Klaten. Prosedur pengambilan sampel dilakukan dengan random sampling, statistik deskriptif menggunakan frekuensi dan persentase validitas diukur dengan korelasi produk dan reliabilitas diukur dengan alpha cronbach. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa dukungan orang tua dalam bermainperangkat PAUD di Kabupaten Klaten mencapai persentase 80,32% dari 8 ukuran penelitian atau masuk dalam kategori tinggi/tinggi. Artinya, orang tua sadar akan pentingnya mendampingi anak untuk mengurangi dampak negatif gawai.
title: Dukungan Orang Tua dalam Bermain Gadget pada Anak Usia Dini di Masa Pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Parental support in playing gadgets for early childhood during the covid pandemic distance learning through online learning allows children to be more active at home gadgets are a medium used for online learning so that children can use this device effectively parental assistance is needed the purpose of this study is to determine parental support in playing gadgets for children compared to theoretical indicators this study uses a descriptive method the research sample is parents of children in klaten district the sampling procedure is carried out by random sampling descriptive statistics using frequency and percentage validity is measured by product correlation and reliability is measured by alpha cronbach the results of the study show that parental support in playing early childhood education devices in klaten district reaches a percentage of the research size or is included in the high category meaning that parents are aware of the importance of accompanying children to reduce the negative impacts of gadgets

desc: Kekerasan yang terjadi pada anak dapat mempengaruhi perkembangan anak, baik pada aspek akademik maupun non akademik. Berdasar permasalahan tersebut, maka penting untuk dilakukan upaya pencegahan terjadinya kekerasan pada anak usia dini. Upaya pencegahan dapat diupayakan melalui pendekatan yang tepat dan juga memperhatikan aspek religi. Pada penelitian ini, peneliti menggunakan metode Prompts berbasis nilai religi untuk mencegah terjadinya kekerasan pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan desain ekperimen. Rancangan penelitian ini menggunakan metode quasi eksperimen dengan desain one group pre-test dan post-test design. Hasil penelitian menjukan nilai signifikansi sebesar 0,001 yang berarti terdapat perbedaan antara nilai pre-test dan post-test atau menunjukan adanya peningkatan pemahaman siswa tentang kekerasan yang berdampak pada kemampuan siswa untuk menghindari tindakan kekerasan pada dirinya yang Berkembang Sesuai Harapan. Hasil penelitian ini diharapkan dapat dijadikan pertimbangan pada sekolah lain terutama intervensi untuk mencegah terjadinya kekerasan pada anak maupun penelitian selanjutnya terkait kekerasan pada anak sesuai kebutuhan siswa dan memperhatikan nilai religius.
title: Pencegahan Kekerasan pada Anak Usia Dini melalui Metode Prompts berbasis nilai Religius
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: prevention of violence in early childhood through the method of prompts based on religious values ​​violence that occurs in children can affect the development of children both in academic and non-academic aspects based on these problems it is important to make efforts to prevent violence in early childhood prevention efforts can be attempted through the right approach and also pay attention to religious aspects in this study the researcher used the method of prompts based on religious values ​​to prevent violence in early childhood this study used an experimental design this research design used a quasi-experimental method with a one group pretest and posttest design the results of the study showed a significant value of which means there is a difference between the pretest and posttest values ​​or shows an increase in students' understanding of violence which has an impact on students' ability to avoid acts of violence against themselves which develops according to expectations the results of this study are expected to be used as considerations in other schools especially interventions to prevent violence against children or further research related to violence against children according to student needs and paying attention to religious values

desc: Kepala sekolah bertanggung jawab secara penuh dalam perannya sebagai pemimpin pada upaya meningkatkan kualitas pendidikan. Tujuan penelitian ini adalah mendeskripsikan tantangan dan upaya kepala sekolah pendidikan anak usia dini dalam memotivasi para guru menjadi guru penggerak menuju sekolah penggerak yang berkualitas. Metode yang digunakan adalah pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode deskriptif. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui wawancara mendalam serta observasi pada 15 kepala sekolah pendidikan anak usia dini di Jawa Barat, diperkuat dengan studi literatur dan dokumentasi. Temuan penelitian mencakup 12 Upaya yang telah dilakukan kepala sekolah PAUD dalam mengembangkan lembaga menuju sekolah penggerak. Tantangan dalam mengembangkan lembaga PAUD menuju Sekolah Penggerak mencakup 12 hal yang saling terkait dan perlu diatasi bersama dengan seluruh pihak yang terkait, dan Kepala Sekolah selama ini telah melakukan 7 upaya penting dalam rangka memupuk Semangat Guru PAUD untuk mengikuti Program Sekolah Penggerak
title: Upaya dan Tantangan Kepala Sekolah PAUD dalam Mengembangkan Lembaga dan Memotivasi Guru untuk Mengikuti Program Sekolah Penggerak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Efforts and challenges of early childhood education principals in developing institutions and motivating teachers to participate in the school driving program. The principal is fully responsible for his role as a leader in efforts to improve the quality of education. The purpose of this study is to describe the challenges and efforts of early childhood education principals in motivating teachers to become driving teachers towards quality driving schools. The method used is a qualitative approach with a descriptive method. Data collection was carried out through in-depth interviews and observations of early childhood education principals in West Java, reinforced by literature studies and documentation. Research findings include efforts that have been made by early childhood education principals in developing institutions towards driving schools. Challenges in developing early childhood education institutions towards driving schools include interrelated matters that need to be addressed together with all related parties. The principal has made important efforts to foster the enthusiasm of early childhood teachers to participate in the driving school program.

desc: Aktivitas di dunia pendidikan berangsur-angsur kembali normal. Kesiapan lembaga PAUD untuk pembelajaran tatap muka mensyaratkan kepatuhan pada protokol Kesehatan. Peran kepemimpinan kepala sekolah sebagai cara dalam membimbing, memotivasi dan membimbing semua elemen pada suatu kelompok untuk memperoleh tujuan yang diharapkan serta memungkinkan kinerja guru dapat berjalan secara maksimum. Tujuan riset ini untuk mengetahui pengaruh peran kepemimpinan kepala sekolah terhadap kinerja guru masa era new normal di PAUD Kabupaten Kudus. Riset ini menggunakan penelitian kuantitatif non-eksperimental, dengan jenis penelitian korelasional. Populasi pada riset ini guru PAUD Kabupaten Kudus sebanyak 254 orang. Hasil riset menunjukkan kinerja guru masa era new normal dipengaruhi oleh kepemimpinan kepala sekolah dapat diterima kebenarannya dengan model hubungan linier. Sehingga hasil riset ini diharapkan dapat menjadi referensi bagi kepala sekolah, guru, dan dinas pendidikan untuk dapat meningkatkan kinerja guru melalui kepemimpinan kepala sekolah.
title: Peran Kepemimpinan Kepala Sekolah Terhadap Kinerja Guru Masa Era New Normal di PAUD Kabupaten Kudus
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of principal leadership on teacher performance during the new normal era in early childhood education in Kudus Regency activities in the world of education are gradually returning to normal the readiness of early childhood education institutions for face-to-face learning requires compliance with health protocols the role of principal leadership as a way to guide, motivate and guide all elements in a group to achieve the expected goals and enable teacher performance to run optimally the purpose of this research is to determine the effect of the role of principal leadership on teacher performance during the new normal era in early childhood education in Kudus Regency this research uses non-experimental quantitative research with a correlational research type the population in this research is that there are as many as 100,000 early childhood education teachers in Kudus Regency the results of the research show that teacher performance during the new normal era is influenced by the leadership of the principal can be accepted as true with a linear relationship model so that the results of this research are expected to be a reference for principals, teachers and the education office to be able to improve teacher performance through principal leadership

desc: Technological developments increasingly sophisticated and growing. This leads to various influences of human lifestyle both mindset and behavior. One of the technological developments that affect the human mind is the gadget. Gadgets are media used as a means of modern communication. Gadgets not only affect the mindset or behavior of adults, but also affect the behavior of young children. In essence, early childhood tend to be happy with new things that he got through the activity by playing. Playing is fun for the kids, with children's play can explore all the potential. The majority of children in Indonesia spend time playing with gadgets. Surely this affects the development of children, especially in the development of social interaction. Social interactions can be interpreted as relationships that occur within induvidu groups are interconnected both in communication and social action. The purpose of this study to describe the use of gadgets to the ability of social interaction of early childhood. The research method used in this study is literature review is by connecting research with existing literature and fill the gap in previous research. The results obtained in this study is the use of gadgets most children use it to play. From these small things, children who initially love to play with their friends can change with the usual given a gadget as a substitute for playmates.
title: Analisis Penggunaan Gadget terhadap Kemampuan Interaksi Sosial  pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: analysis of gadget use on social interaction abilities in early childhood technological developments increasingly sophisticated and growing this leads to various influences of human lifestyle both mindset and behavior one of the technological developments that affect the human mind is the gadget gadgets are media used as a means of modern communication gadgets not only affect the mindset or behavior of adults but also affect the behavior of young children in essence early childhood tends to be happy with new things that he got through the activity by playing playing is fun for the kids with childrens play can explore all the potential the majority of children in Indonesia spend time playing with gadgets surely this affects the development of children especially in the development of social interaction social interactions can be interpreted as relationships that occur within individual groups are interconnected both in communication and social action the purpose of this study to describe the use of gadgets to the ability of social interaction of early childhood the research method used in this study is literature review is by connecting research with existing literature and fill the gap in previous research the results obtained in this study is the use of gadgets most children use it to play from these small things children who initially love to play with their friends can change with the usual given a gadget as a substitute for playmates

desc: Penelitian ini dilatarbelakangi oleh kondisi pandemik dan kemajuan teknologi yang berkembang pesat di era rovolusi 4.0 yang menuntut pendidik memiliki kemampuan beradaptasi dengan teknologi baru dan tantangan global. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menghasilkan e-module tematik berbasis kesantunan berbahasa anak usia dini di taman kanak-kanak yang valid, praktis dan efektif. Jenis penelitian ini adalah Research and Development (RD) menggunakan model ADDIE. Teknik analisis data menggunakan analisis statistik deskriptif dengan validasi Aikenns V. Hasil uji validasi materi e-module oleh ahli materi dan oleh ahli media dinyatakan valid dan layak digunakan. Hasil uji praktikalitas e-module dinyatakan praktis. Hasil persentase efektifitas e-module dinyatakan efektif. Dapat disimpulkan desain e-module tematik berbasis kesantunan berbahasa anak usia dini di taman kanak-kanak dinyatakan valid, praktis dan efektif
title: Desain E-Module Tematik Berbasis Kesantunan Berbahasa Anak Usia Dini di Taman Kanak-Kanak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Thematic e-module design based on politeness of language of early childhood in kindergarten This study was motivated by the pandemic conditions and rapid technological advances in the era of revolution that require educators to have the ability to adapt to new technologies and global challenges This study aims to produce a thematic e-module based on politeness of language of early childhood in kindergarten which is valid, practical and effective This type of research is research and development rd using the addie model Data analysis techniques using descriptive statistical analysis with Aikenns validation V The results of the e-module material validation test by material experts and media experts were declared valid and suitable for use The results of the e-module practicality test were declared practical The results of the percentage of e-module effectiveness were declared effective It can be concluded that the thematic e-module design based on politeness of language of early childhood in kindergarten is declared valid, practical and effective

desc: Pendekatan yang inovatif dan menarik pada era digital diperlukan untuk membantu anak-anak memahami pentingnya toleransi, penghormatan terhadap perbedaan, dan kemampuan berinteraksi positif dalam masyarakat yang beragam. Penelitian ini menggabungkan teknologi digital dan pendidikan untuk menciptakan media yang dapat membantu guru dalam menyampaikan konten toleransi dengan cara yang menarik bagi anak-anak. Model pengembangannya memanfaatkan pendekatan ADDIE. Kepala sekolah dan guru menjadi subjek penelitian ini. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui angket kebutuhan guru dan uji validasi ahli. Temuan yang dihasilkan dari penelitian ini mengindikasikan bahwa pengembangan E-Story Book untuk mengenalkan toleransi pada anak usia dini dianggap sangat layak oleh ahli materi dan ahli media sehingga berpotensi untuk diimplementasikan pada anak usia dini.
title: Pengembangan E-Story Book untuk mengenalkan Toleransi pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of estory books to introduce tolerance to early childhood an innovative and interesting approach in the digital era is needed to help children understand the importance of tolerance, respect for differences and the ability to interact positively in a diverse society this study combines digital technology and education to create media that can help teachers convey tolerance content in a way that is interesting to children the development model utilizes the addie approach the principal and teacher are the subjects of this study data collection was carried out through a teacher needs questionnaire and expert validation test the findings resulting from this study indicate that the development of estory books to introduce tolerance to early childhood is considered very feasible by material experts and media experts so that it has the potential to be implemented in early childhood

desc: In terms of language acquisition, preschoolers are associated with the golden age. This led to the awareness of the importance of mastering English as early as possible. Vocabulary learning is an important aspect of learning a language because the basis of language is vocabulary. However, a lack of strategy in introducing English vocabulary is the problem faced by preschool teachers. This study is a literature review that aims to review the use of songs in vocabulary learning for preschoolers.  In addition, the success of using songs in English vocabulary learning for preschoolers, which was reported by a lot of studies, is thought to be paramount to discuss. This study refers to 49 references which are books or articles from journals related to the use of songs as a medium in vocabulary learning for early childhood. Therefore, this article is intended to review the use of songs in English vocabulary learning for preschoolers. The English vocabulary, English children's songs, and development of English Vocabulary in preschoolers were presented descriptively. The review concludes that songs can be an alternative media in vocabulary learning for preschoolers.
title: Songs for Teaching Vocabulary: English Learning Media for Preschoolers
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: songs for teaching vocabulary English learning media for preschoolers in terms of language acquisition preschoolers are associated with the golden age this led to the awareness of the importance of mastering English as early as possible vocabulary learning is an important aspect of learning a language because the basis of language is vocabulary however a lack of strategy in introducing English vocabulary is the problem faced by preschool teachers this study is a literature review that aims to review the use of songs in vocabulary learning for preschoolers in addition to the success of using songs in English vocabulary learning for preschoolers which was reported by a lot of studies is thought to be paramount to discuss this study refers to references which are books or articles from journals related to the use of songs as a medium in vocabulary learning for early childhood therefore this article is intended to review the use of songs in english vocabulary learning for preschoolers the english vocabulary english children's songs and development of english vocabulary in preschoolers were presented descriptively the review concludes that songs can be an alternative media in vocabulary learning for preschoolers

desc: Kurangnya pemanfaatan media melalui proses pembelajaran membuat siswa kurang aktif dalam belajar. Melalui media gambar pembelajaran di kelas bisa membuat suasana belajar lebih aktraktif dan siswa lebih termotivasi dan penuh perhatian terhadap pembelajaran. Intensi penelitian ini yaitu untuk menganalisis efek kinerja guru terhadap atensi peserta didik dan moderasi media gambar pada efek kinerja guru terhadap atensi peserta didik. Penelitian ini mengambil pendekatan kuantitatif dengan konfirmatori (confirmatory). Model Moderate Regression Analysis (MRA) dipakai dengan analisis Pertial Least Squares (PLS). Model tersebut digunakan untuk melihat pengaruh variabel media sebagai variabel moderating dalam memperkuat hubungan variabel kinerja guru terhadap efek variabel atensi peserta didik. Teknik sample jenuh dipakai pada penelitian ini. Hasil penelitian menemukan bahwa media gambar dapat memediasi pengaruh hubungan kinerja guru terhadap atensi peserta didik sekolah dasar yang berada di Kecamatan Motilangi Kabupaten Gorontalo. Adanya media pembelajaran berupa media gambar yang digunakan guru akan meningkatan partisipasi dan atensi siswa untuk mengikuti proses pembelajaran.
title: Efek Kinerja Guru terhadap Etensi Peserta Didik Kelas Awal dengan Media Gambar sebagai Variabel Moderating
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
