desc: This study aimed to describe the management of finger painting games in improving fine motor skills in children with ingredients obtained and relatively inexpensive, namely dish soap concoction. The research method uses a qualitative approach to get an idea of the finger painting game (concoctions dishwashing soap) direct observations when doing finger painting at RA Maysitoh VI. Sources of information were obtained from interviews with school principals, teachers, parents, and students. The results showed; RA Maysitoh VI institution implements finger painting game management in stimulating students' motoric growth using, planning activities, implementing fun finger painting methods, and assessing children's development. The results obtained by playing finger painting (concoctions dishwashing soap) showed significant effects on children's motor skills as indicated by their interest in forming flowers, writing letters, and making patterns with their finger brushes. This finger painting activity indirectly trains the flexibility of the child's fingers in carrying out further fine motor activities such as writing, cutting, tearing, collage, and so on
title: Management of the Game "Finger Painting" in Improving Fine Motor Skills In Early Childhood
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: management of the game finger painting in improving fine motor skills in early childhood this study aimed to describe the management of finger painting games in improving fine motor skills in children with ingredients obtained and relatively inexpensive namely dish soap concoction the research method uses a qualitative approach to get an idea of ​​the finger painting game concoctions dishwashing soap direct observation when doing finger painting at ra maysitoh vi sources of information were obtained from interviews with school principals teachers parents and students the results showed ra maysitoh vi institution implements finger painting game management in stimulating students motor growth using planning activities implementing fun finger painting methods and assessing children's development the results obtained by playing finger painting concoctions dishwashing soap showed significant effects on children's motor skills as indicated by their interest in forming flowers writing letters and making patterns with their finger brushes this finger painting activity indirectly trains the flexibility of the child's fingers in carrying out further fine motor activities such as writing cutting tearing collage and so on

desc: Fenomena rendahnya partisipasi laki-laki sebagai pendidik Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini  (PAUD) bukan hanya terjadi di lembaga PAUD melainkan juga di perguruan tinggi penyelenggara Program Studi PAUD. Hal ini menyebabkan lembaga PAUD kekurangan figur guru laki-laki bagi anak usia dini. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif untuk mengekplorasi persepsi calon guru dan guru laki-laki sebagai minoritas gender PAUD. Ada enam subyek penelitian yang terdiri dari 2 calon guru laki-laki, dan 4 guru PAUD laki-laki di area Kudus. Peneliti menggunakan in-depth interview didukung dengan Focus Group Discussion (FGD). Partisipan memilih bidang PAUD karena motivasi intrinsik dan ekstrinsik. Persepsi partisipan terkait keterlibatan laki-laki di PAUD positif meskipun ada berbagai tantangan. Stereotipe gender membuat pihak eksternal masih memandang negatif laki-laki yang memilih program studi PAUD atau bekerja di lembaga PAUD namun ada juga dukungan. Semua partisipan yakin berkarir di PAUD namun tindak lanjut dari program studi dan lembaga PAUD diperlukan untuk mengikis stereotipe yang ada termasuk pemenuhan kesejahteraan guru.
title: Persepsi Calon Guru dan Guru Laki-Laki sebagai Minoritas Gender di Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The perception of prospective male teachers and teachers as gender minorities in early childhood education. The phenomenon of low participation of men as early childhood education educators does not only occur in early childhood education institutions but also in universities that organize early childhood education programs. This causes early childhood education institutions to lack male teacher figures for early childhood. This study is a qualitative study to explore the perception of prospective male teachers and teachers as gender minorities in early childhood education. There are six research subjects consisting of prospective male teachers and male early childhood education teachers in the Kudus area. The researcher used in-depth interviews supported by focus group discussions. FGD participants chose the early childhood education field because of intrinsic and extrinsic motivation. Participants' perceptions regarding male involvement in early childhood education are positive, although there are various challenges. Gender stereotypes make external parties still view men who choose early childhood education study programs or work in early childhood education institutions negatively. However, there is also support. All participants are confident in having a career in early childhood education. However, follow-up from early childhood education study programs and institutions is needed to erode existing stereotypes, including the fulfillment of teacher welfare.

desc: The students’ communication ability of mathematical about linear program material of SMA Negeri 1 Salo Kampar was low. It needs improvement on the learning system which is done by the teachers. This research was conducted at analyzing the influence of Learning Approach of Problem Posing Through Cooperative Learning Model STAD in communication ability of mathematical of student’ capability high initial and capability low initial.
title: Pengaruh Pendekatan Problem Posing dengan Model Pembelajaran Kooperatif Tipe Stad terhadap Kemampuan Komunikasi Matematis  Siswa Kelas Xii Sma Negeri 1 Salo Kabupaten Kampar
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of the problem posing approach with the Stad type cooperative learning model on the mathematical communication abilities of class the teachers this research was conducted at analyzing the influence of learning approach of problem posing through cooperative learning model stad in communication ability of mathematics of student capability high initial and capability low initial

desc: Peran pola komunikasi orang tua dalam perkembangan anak sangat dibutuhkan, terlebih di masa new normal ini intesitas kebersamaan anak dengan orang tua menjadi lebih sering. Penelitian ini untuk mengidentifikasikan temuan peran pola komunikasi orang tua terhadap perkembangan emosi anak usia 4-5 tahun di TK Darmawanita Macanan 2, Kecamatan Jogorogo, Kabupaten Ngawi. Dengan mengamati anak 4-5 tahun yang merespon positif pembelajaran daring, metode penelitian studi kasus dengan pendekatan kualitatif, Miles and Huberman adalah teknik analisis data yang digunakan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan dalam melakukan komunikasi bentuk pola komunikasi yang diterapkan orang tua adalah terbuka, kompromi dan support positif. Bentuk ini muncul karena adanya proses pola komunikasi seperti mengajak bermain anak, memberikan telling story, dan ice breaking yang menarik kepada anak. Adapun kesabaran orang tua, kreativitas orang tua, dan ketersediaan APE merupakan faktor yang mempengaruhi pola komunikasi orang tua yang baik dengan anak sehingga perkembangan emosi anak dapat berkembang dengan baik
title: Peran Pola Komunikasi Orang Tua terhadap Perkembangan Emosi Anak Usia 4-5 di Masa New Normal
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: the role of parental communication patterns on the emotional development of children aged in the new normal era the role of parental communication patterns in child development is very much needed especially in this new normal era the intensity of togetherness between children and parents becomes more frequent this study is to identify the findings of the role of parental communication patterns on the emotional development of children aged years in Darmawanita Macanan Kindergarten, Jogorogo District, Ngawi Regency by observing children who responded positively to online learning the case study research method with a qualitative approach miles and huberman is a data analysis technique used the results of the study show that in carrying out communication the form of communication patterns applied by parents is open compromise and positive support this form arises because of the process of communication patterns such as inviting children to play giving interesting telling stories and ice breaking to children as well as parental patience, parental creativity and availability of ape are factors that influence good parental communication patterns with children so that children's emotional development can develop well

desc: Salah satu metode yang dapat digunakan dalam pembentukan karakter anak usia dini adalah melalui story telling. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menganalisis lebih mendalam efektivitas story telling digital dengan story telling konvensional dalam pembentukan karakter anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah metode deskriptif analitis dengan pendekatan kualitatif. Data dikumpulkan melalui observasi perilaku anak-anak dan wawancara dengan guru TK. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah meliputi reduksi data, penyajian data, dan kesimpulan atau verifikasi. Penelitian ini juga menggunakan triangulasi untuk menguji validitas data. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa story telling digital lebih efektif dalam membentuk karakter anak usia dini dengan menunjukkan perubahan yang signifikan dalam aspek kemandirian dan tanggung jawab. Sedangkan pada kelompok anak yang mengikuti sesi story telling konvensional tidak terdapat perubahan perilaku yang signifikan
title: Story Telling dan Pembentukan Karakter Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Story telling and character building of early childhood one of the methods that can be used in character building of early childhood is through story telling this study aims to analyze in more depth the effectiveness of digital story telling with conventional story telling in character building of early childhood the research method used in this study is descriptive analytical method with qualitative approach data collected through observation of children's behavior and interviews with kindergarten teachers data analysis techniques used in this study include data reduction data presentation and conclusion or verification this study also uses triangulation to test the validity of the data the results of the study show that digital story telling is more effective in shaping the character of early childhood by showing significant changes in aspects of independence and responsibility while in the group of children who participated in conventional story telling sessions there were no significant changes in behavior

desc: Usia dini adalah masa krusial, oleh karenanya stimulasi mutlak diberikan, salah satunya melalui pendidikan. Tetapi, fenomena yang masih kerap ditemui, siswa cepat bosan dan kurang antusias selama pembelajaran. Penyebabnya seperti anak kurang dilibatkan aktif, belum memberikan kemerdekaan belajar, media belajar kurang beragam. STEAM didukung pemanfaatan Loose Parts dipandang dapat menjadi solusi dan inovasi. Penelitian bertujuan mendeskripsikan penerapan STEAM dengan pemanfaatan Loose Parts dan hasil pembelajaran siswa. Jenis penelitian kualitatif deskriptif, teknik pengumpulan data dengan wawancara, dokumentasi, dan observasi. Subjek penelitian terdiri dari 1 guru kelas, 1 guru pendamping dan 7 peserta didik. Metode analisis data yakni pengumpulan, data, reduksi, penyajian data, dan penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian, penerapan STEAM dengan pemanfaatan Loose Parts dapat diterapkan pada PAUD dengan mengintegrasikan kelima komponennya dengan tingkatan yang sederhana sesuai tahapan usianya. Loose Parts terbukti dapat mendukung penerapan STEAM, meningkatkan keingintahuan dan antusiasme serta siswa menunjukkan respon positif selama pembelajaran.
title: Pembelajaran STEAM dengan Media Loose Parts di Kelompok Bermain Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: steam learning with loose parts media in early childhood playgroups early age is a crucial period therefore absolute stimulation is given one of which is through education but the phenomenon that is still often encountered students get bored quickly and are less enthusiastic during learning the causes are such as children are not actively involved have not given freedom to learn learning media is not diverse enough steam supported by the use of loose parts is seen as a solution and innovation the study aims to describe the application of steam with the use of loose parts and student learning outcomes type of research qualitative descriptive data collection techniques with interviews documentation and observation research subjects consist of class teachers assistant teachers and students data analysis methods namely data collection reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions research results the application of steam with the use of loose parts can be applied to early childhood education by integrating its five components with simple levels according to their age stages loose parts are proven to support the application of steam to increase curiosity and enthusiasm and students show a positive response during learning

desc: Masa pandemi menimbulkan berbagai permasalahan baik dari guru, anak dan orang tua. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui tingkat stress pada orang tua dalam mengasuh anak di masa pandemi. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif. Subjek penelitian dalam penelitian ini yaitu dua keluarga (ayah dan ibu) yang memiliki anak usia 5 dan 6 tahun. Jenis data dalam penelitian ini yaitu menggunakan data primer. Teknik pengumpulan data dalam penelitian ini yaitu observasi dan wawancara. Teknik analisis data yang digunakan yaitu model Miles dan Huberman. Hasil penelitian ini yaitu meningkatnya stress orang tua dalam mengasuh anak usia dini disebabkan oleh tidak stabilnya emosi orang tua, orang tua mengalami tekanan mental, sulit membagi waktu dalam mendampingi anak, kekurangan dalam segi materi, kesulitan jaringan internet dan sifat anak yang mudah bosan dengan belajar daring, pola pengasuhan yang diterapkan yaitu otoriter. Kebaruan penelitian ini yaitu mengetahui kendala dalam mengasuh anak di masa pandemi, tingkat stress yang di alami orang tua, pola pengasuhan yang diterapkan dan peran orang tua dalam pengasuhan. Implikasi penelitian ini diharapkan menjadi masukan kepada orang tua dalam mengasuh anak usia dini.
title: Analisis Tingkat Stress Orang Tua Ketika Mengasuh Anak Selama Masa Pandemi
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of parental stress levels when raising children during the pandemic The pandemic has caused various problems for both children's teachers and parents. This study aims to determine the level of stress in parents in raising children during the pandemic. This study uses a qualitative approach. The subjects of this study are two families of fathers and mothers who have children aged 15-20 years. The type of data in this study is using primary data. The data collection technique in this study is observation and interviews. The data analysis technique used is the Miles and Huberman model. The results of this study are that increasing parental stress in raising early childhood children is caused by unstable parental emotions. Parents experience mental pressure. It is difficult to divide their time in accompanying children. Lack of material. Difficulty with internet connections. And the nature of children who get bored easily with online learning. The parenting pattern applied is authoritarian. The novelty of this study is knowing the obstacles in raising children during the pandemic. The level of stress experienced by parents. The parenting pattern applied and the role of parents in parenting. The implications of this study are expected to be input for parents in raising early childhood children.

desc: Logical mathematical intelligence is important to be trained from an early age in the demands of 21st century competencies, because it is related to problem-solving ability, a logical thinking, and numerical processing skills in daily life practices of early children. One alternative way to increase this intelligence is to use interactive media as a practice of digitalization and differentiated instruction in learning activities.  Based on the problem, this study aims to increase the logical-mathematical intelligence of early childhood through the implementation of interactive media in learning activities.  This research method used pre-experiment design in the form of one group pre-test and post-test.  The sample in this study were children aged 5-6 years with a total of 21 children.  Data collection instruments using logical mathematical intelligence observation sheets.  Data analysis techniques using paired sample t-test.  The result of the data analysis showed that the Sig. (2 tailed) of 0,000  0,05.  Thus, there is an effect of implementing interactive media to improve logical-mathematical intelligence in early childhood learning by using differentiated learning practices.
title: Interactive Media for Increasing Logical-Mathematical Intelligences in Differentiated Instruction Practice
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: interactive media for increasing logical mathematical intelligences in differentiated instruction practice logical mathematical intelligence is important to be trained from an early age in the demands of st century competencies because it is related to problem solving ability a logical thinking and numerical processing skills in daily life practices of early children one alternative way to increase this intelligence is to use interactive media as a practice of digitalization and differentiated instruction in learning activities based on the problem this study aims to increase the logical mathematical intelligence of early childhood through the implementation of interactive media in learning activities this research method used preexperiment design in the form of one group pretest and posttest the sample in this study were children aged years with a total of children data collection instruments using mathematical intelligence observation sheets data analysis techniques using paired sample ttest the result of the data analysis showed that the sig tailed from thus there is an effect of implementing interactive media to improve logical mathematical intelligence in early childhood learning by using differentiated learning practices

desc: Tujuan dalam penelitian ini untuk mengetahui model pembelajaran cooking class dalam meningkatkan motorik halus anak usia dini, menguji efektifitas pembelajaran cooking class untuk meningkatkan motorik halus anak, serta faktor-faktor yang mempengaruhi perkembangan motorik halus anak usia dini. Metode penelitian yang digunakan yaitu metode Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK) yang ditujukan untuk lembaga PAUD yang didirikan di daerah miskin di kabupaten magelang salah satu output program Iptek Bagi Wilayah (IbW) Kabupaten Magelang Tahun 2016-2018 yaitu POS PAUD Ar-Rayyan yang meliputi perencanaan penelitian, pelaksanaan penelitian, pengamatan dan refleksi penelitian. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan implementasi cooking class berbasis kearifan lokal mampu meningkatkan kemampuan motorik halus anak. Selain itu faktor yang mempengaruhi perkembangan motorik halus anak usia 3-4 tahun yaitu diantaranya stimulus yang diberikan oleh orang tua dan pendidik, kemandirian anak dalam kegiatan pembelajaran, kesadaran orang tua akan pentingnya proses daripada hasil, kepercayaan orang tua terhadap kemampuan anak, dan kedekatan emosional antara pendidik dan peserta didik.
title: Cooking Class Berbasis Kearifan Lokal Meningkatkan Motorik Halus Anak di Daerah Miskin
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: cooking class based on local wisdom improves children's fine motor skills in poor areas The purpose of this study was to determine the cooking class learning model in improving fine motor skills in early childhood to test the effectiveness of cooking class learning to improve children's fine motor skills and factors that influence the development of fine motor skills in early childhood. The research method used was the PTK classroom action research method aimed at early childhood education institutions established in poor areas in Magelang Regency. One of the outputs of the science and technology program for the IBW Magelang Regency area in 2018 was the Arrayyan PAUD Post, which included research planning, research implementation, observation and reflection. The results of the study showed that the implementation of local wisdom-based cooking classes was able to improve children's fine motor skills. In addition, factors that influence the development of fine motor skills in children aged 20-30 years include stimuli provided by parents and educators, children's independence in learning activities, parents' awareness of the importance of the process rather than the results, parents' trust in children's abilities, and emotional closeness between educators and students.

desc: Penulis mengangkat judul ini berdasarkan kondisi di lapangan bahwa banyak peserta didik berprestasi akademik cenderung sudah menemukan gaya belajar yang tepat sesuai dengan karakteristik diri mereka. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui gaya belajar dari peserta didik berprestasi akademik di SDN Kedawung 1. Subjek pada penelitian ini adalah peserta didik berprestasi akademik peringkat 1,2, dan 3 pada kelas bawah. Jenis penelitian ini adalah kualitatif deskriptif dengan desain studi kasus. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan cara wawancara, observasi, dan dokumentasi. Teknik analisis data mengacu pada konsep Milles dan Huberman yaitu model interaktif, dengan menganalisis data dalam langkah seperti reduksi data, penyajian data, dan dan menarik kesimpulan. Hasil dari penelitian ini menyatakan bahwa peserta didik dominan menggunakan karakteristik gaya belajar visual, auditori, dan kinestetik (VAK). Tetapi karakteristik gaya belajar VAK yang digunakan setiap peserta didik memiliki proporsi yang berbeda-beda. Sehingga gaya belajar VAK bukanlah pengaruh utama prestasi akademik yang dicapai, tetapi terdapat faktor lain yang mendukung seperti faktor dorongan keluarga, faktor genetik, faktor guru, dan lain-lain
title: Gaya Belajar Peserta Didik Usia Dini Berprestasi Akademik
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Learning styles of early age students with academic achievement The author raised this title based on conditions in the field that many students with academic achievement tend to have found the right learning style according to their characteristics This study aims to determine the learning styles of students with academic achievement at SDN Kedawung The subjects in this study were students with academic achievement in the lower grades This type of research is qualitative descriptive with a case study design Data collection techniques using interviews, observation and documentation Data analysis techniques refer to the concept of Milles and Huberman, namely an interactive model by analyzing data in steps such as data reduction, data presentation and drawing conclusions The results of this study state that students predominantly use the characteristics of visual, auditory and kinesthetic learning styles VAK, but the characteristics of the VAK learning style used by each student have different proportions so that the VAK learning style is not the main influence on academic achievement achieved but there are other supporting factors such as family encouragement factors, genetic factors, teacher factors and others

desc: Waste that is appropriately managed will produce creativity that can make. Waste is also able to develop children's intelligence with proper utilization. This study aims to examine the use of kitchen waste as a medium in increasing students' creativity. The place of research was conducted at an early childhood education institution located in the Probolinggo area, namely the Salih Children's Education Park; this institution is under the auspices of the Nurul Jadid Paiton Foundation Probolinggo. The research method uses a qualitative approach type of case study to get an idea of increasing students' creativity by utilizing kitchen waste media. Informant sources were obtained from school principals, ustadzah-ustadzah and Taman Pendidikan Anak Salih students. The results showed; That every weekend, namely Saturday, the Anak ShalihEducation Park institution conducts routine cooking class activities carried out at school; this activity produces kitchen waste; in anticipation that waste does not become a negative thing and remains functional, the Ustadzah of Anak ShalihEducation Park innovates to manage kitchen waste media to be used as creativity material for students. The use of kitchen waste as a learning medium is carried out by; Preparatory analysis, applying waste media, and creativity assessment. By using cooking class kitchen waste as a learning medium, students are more enthusiastic, creative, exploratory, innovative and able to find new ideas by using various media to produce different kinds of artwork.
title: Utilization of Kitchen Waste as a Learning Media in Increasing Children's Creativity
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI

desc: The e-learning program is a new program implemented at the early childhood education level. The teacher of the main character in the application of e-learning has a dilemma in running this program. The focus of the study identified the consistency of early childhood education teachers in implementing e-learning programs during the Covid-19 pandemic. Using quantitative methods with purposive sampling technique. Data obtained through interviews (G-Form) with respondents 50 ECE teachers in the city of Surakarta. Field facts are that there is no teacher consistency in implementing e-learning programs such as the absence of daily or weekly learning plans in implementing e-learning, uncertain teaching schedules, and unsupported learning media. This shows that 80% of ECE teachers implement e-learning and 20% implement mixed learning. Teacher consistency can be improved through training provided by the government, provision of educational facilities by schools, learning innovations according to health protocols and initial motivation to teach
title: Early Childhood Education Teachers Consistency of E-Learning Programs
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: early childhood education teachers consistency of elearning programs the elearning program is a new program implemented at the early childhood education level the teacher of the main character in the application of elearning has a dilemma in running this program the focus of the study identified the consistency of early childhood education teachers in implementing elearning programs during the covid pandemic using quantitative methods with purposive sampling technique data obtained through interviews gform with respondents ece teachers in the city of Surakarta field facts are that there is no teacher consistency in implementing elearning programs such as the absence of daily or weekly learning plans in implementing elearning uncertain teaching schedules and unsupported learning media this shows that of ece teachers implement elearning and implement mixed learning teacher consistency can be improved through training provided by the government provision of educational facilities by schools learning innovations according to health protocols and initial motivation to teach

desc: Pandemi covid-19 membatasi ruang gerak dan interaksi manusia. Mengharuskan kegiatan dilakukan secara daring, termasuk dalam proses pembelajaran pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk menjawab pertanyaan peneliti tentang bagaimana pembelajaran jarak jauh secara daring yang dilakukan pada anak usia dini di masa pandemic covid-19 dan memperkaya literatur media pembelajaran jarak jauh melalui daring pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode studi literatur dengan instrumen utama penelitian kualitatif adalah peneliti sendiri dengan menggunakan format tabel literatur review. Teknik analisis data yang dilakukan adalah reduksi data, penyajian data dan menarik kesimpulan. Berdasarkan hasil kajian literatur pembelajaran jarak jauh melalui daring dapat dilakukan pada anak usia dini. Sumber belajar atau media yang dapat digunakan untuk menghadirkan pembelajaran bermakna selama pembelajaran jarak jauh  secara daring pada anak usia dini adalah dengan menggunakan video, pemutaran film, aplikasi multimedia interaktif serta game edukatif. Serta penting bagi guru untuk mengedukasi anak dan orang tua tentang literasi teknologi, sehingga pemanfaatan teknologi dapat memberikan efek positive dalam proses pembelajaran. Peranan orang tua untuk mendampingi anak selama proses pembelajaran juga sangat menentukan terciptanya proses pembelajaran yang bermakna dan tercapainya tujuan pembelajaran
title: Pembelajaran jarak jauh: Media Daring untuk Anak Usia Dini di masa pandemi Covid-19
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: distance learning online media for early childhood during the covid pandemic the covid pandemic limits human movement and interaction requiring activities to be carried out online including in the learning process in early childhood this study aims to answer the researcher's question about how distance learning online is carried out in early childhood during the covid pandemic and enrich the literature on distance learning media online in early childhood this study uses a literature study method with the main instrument of qualitative research is the researcher himself using a literature review table format the data analysis technique used is data reduction data presentation and drawing conclusions based on the results of the literature review distance learning online can be done in early childhood learning resources or media that can be used to present meaningful learning during distance learning online in early childhood is by using video film screenings interactive multimedia applications and educational games and it is important for teachers to educate children and parents about technological literacy so that the use of technology can have a positive effect on the learning process the role of parents in accompanying children during the learning process also greatly determines the creation of a meaningful learning process and the achievement of learning goals

desc: This research is motivated by the existence of various literacy problems in kindergarten and elementary school. The purpose of this research is to find out the challenges faced by teachers in teaching literacy to children and the teacher's strategy in teaching literacy to children with special needs. This research is qualitative research in which the data is collected through open-ended questionnaires and interviews and analyzed descriptively. Result:1) Not all teachers accompanying children with special needs have adequate knowledge in teaching basic literacy skills; teachers find it difficult to find appropriate learning programs and media to assist children with different abilities,2) Strategies to teach basic literacy: implementing adaptive learning programs, providing supporting facilities; using differentiated learning; teaching pre-academic abilities; learning with nature and all the senses in the teachable moment. Early childhood education is the formation period for preparing children to study in elementary school. Therefore, a collaboration between kindergarten and elementary teachers in teaching literacy is required
title: Teachers’ Challenges and Strategies in Teaching Literacy Skills for Children with Special Needs
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: teachers challenges and strategies in teaching literacy skills for children with special needs this research is motivated by the existence of various literacy problems in kindergarten and elementary school the purpose of this research is to find out the challenges faced by teachers in teaching literacy to children and the teachers strategy in teaching literacy to children with special needs this research is qualitative research in which the data is collected through open ended questionnaires and interviews and analyzed descriptively result not all teachers accompanying children with special needs have adequate knowledge in teaching basic literacy skills teachers find it difficult to find appropriate learning programs and media to help children with different abilities strategies to teach basic literacy implementing adaptive learning programs providing supporting facilities using differentiated learning teaching preacademic abilities learning with nature and all the senses in the teachable moment early childhood education is the formation period for preparing children to study in elementary school therefore a collaboration between kindergarten and elementary teachers in teaching literacy is required

desc: Pembentukan kualitas dan pencapaian kesiapan belajar adalah salah satu dari peran kepemimpinan yaitu memberikan pengaruh arah dan arahan  kepada anggotanya. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui dan menganalisa kepemimpinan pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD). Menggunakan pendekatan kualitatif dengan metode studi kasus. Responden penelitian ini adalah kepala sekolah, guru, dan stakeholder eksternal di wilayah Indramayu Jawa Barat. Temuan di lapangan menunjukkan bahwa masih ditemukan guru yang kurang termotivasi. Hal ini dikarenakan kurikulum yang belum sesuai, proses pembelajaran yang tidak maksimal, serta pembiayaan yang tidak memadai.  Kepemimpinan pada PAUD sangat dibutuhkan kebijaksanaan dan kecendekiaan untuk mencapai kualitas pendidik,  selain adanya pelatihan yang terus menerus dan berkesinambungan. Dapat diimplementasikan keefektifannya melalui perencanaan, pengorganisasian, pengarahan dan pengawasan. Faktor ini dikaitkan dengan hasil belajar siswa dan  kurikulum, proses pembelajaran, dan metode pengajaran. Keefektifan tersebut dikaitkan dengan hasil belajar siswa dan kurikulum, proses pembelajaran, dan metode pengajaran dilaksanakan bersama guru dan wali murid serta unsur sekolah.
title: Kepemimpinan Pendidikan Masa Pandemi Covid-19 Pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Educational leadership during the covid pandemic in early childhood education, the formation of quality and achievement of learning readiness is one of the roles of leadership, namely providing direction and direction to its members. The purpose of this study was to determine and analyze leadership in early childhood education using a qualitative approach with a case study method. The respondents in this study were school principals, teachers and external stakeholders in the Indramayu area, West Java. Findings in the field showed that there were still teachers who were less motivated. This was because the curriculum was not in accordance with the learning process that was not optimal and inadequate funding. Leadership in early childhood education really needed wisdom and scholarship to achieve the quality of educators. In addition to continuous and ongoing training, its effectiveness can be implemented through planning, organizing, directing and supervision. This factor is associated with student learning outcomes and the curriculum. The learning process and teaching methods are carried out together with teachers and guardians and school elements.

desc: Pursuant to report result Research Into The Elementary Health (RISKESDAS) 2010 indicating that baby getting ASI ekslusif in Indonesia only 15,3%, while goals of national of coverage of gift of ASI ekslusif of equal to 80%. This research aim to know the education, knowledge, work, age and information from health worker with the gift of ASI Ekslusif. this Desain Research is analytic survey with the approach of cross sectional. Population in this research is Mother having age baby 6-11 month in the Village Petapahan in The Area of Tapung Maintenance Health Center of March period 2013. Technique of Intake sampel is simple random sampling that is as much 56 people. This research is conducted at date of 21-24 June 2013, with the research instrument in the form of kuisioner. Analyse the data used by is Univariat and Bivariate, by using Test of Chi-Square and Yet Correction. Result of research got by frequency of gift of ASI Ekslusif in the Village Petapahan in The Area of Tapung Maintenance Health Center of equal to 41%. P Value of each variable is 0,002, 0,008, 0,758, 0,064 and 0,001. Variable of which deal with gift of ASI Ekslusif that is education, knowledge and information from health worker. While variable which do not correlate is work and mother age .
title: Faktor-Faktor yang Berhubungan dengan Pemberian ASI Ekslusif pada Ibu
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: factors related to giving exclusive breast milk to mothers suitable to report results of research into the elementary health risks, data indicating that babies getting exclusive breast milk in Indonesia only while goals of national coverage of gift of exclusive breast milk of equal to this research aim to know the educational knowledge work age and information from health workers with the gift of exclusive breast milk this research design is analytical survey with the approach of cross sectional population in this research is mothers having age baby month in the village Petapahan in the area of ​​Tapung maintenance health center of march period technique of intake sample is simple random sampling that is as many people this research was conducted at date of june with the research instrument in the form of questionnaire analysis of the data used by is univariate and bivariate by using test of chisquare and yet correction result of research got by frequency of gift of exclusive breast milk in the village Petapahan in the area of ​​tapung maintenance health center of equal to p value of each variable is and variable of which deal with gift of exclusive breast milk that is education knowledge and information from health workers while variable which do not correlate is work and mother's age

desc: Kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia dini sangat penting untuk ditingkatkan. Tujuan dalam penelitian ini adalah meningkatkan kemampuan motorik kasar anak melalui kegiatan permainan tradisional pada anak usia dini di TK SIKL. Penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kuantitatif dengan subjek penelitian 15 anak kelas 1 SD dengan rentang usia 6-7 tahun. Kegiatan penilaian atau asesmen dilakukan menggunakan metode rating scale dengan total 5 kemampuan yang dinilai. Hasil penilaian menunjukkan bahwa semua anak yang terlibat dalam kegiatan pelatihan memiliki kemampuan motorik kasar yang sangat baik dan sesuai dengan target capaian usia perkembangannya dengan rata-rata kemampuan motoric kasar 3,85. Kesimpulan dalam penelitian ini adalah permainan tradisional dapat meningkatkan kemampuan motoric kasar pada anak usia dini di TK SIKL. Hasil penelitian ini dapat dijadikan dasar menggunakan permainan tradisional sebagai sarana meningkatkan kemampuan motoric kasar anak.
title: Peningkatan Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Melalui Permainan Tradisional pada AUD di SIKL
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Improving gross motor skills through traditional games in early childhood in kindergarten cycles Gross motor skills of early childhood are very important to improve. The purpose of this study is to improve children's gross motor skills through traditional game activities in early childhood in kindergarten cycles. This study is a quantitative study with research subjects of elementary school children with an age range of years. Assessment activities or assessments are carried out using the rating scale method with a total of assessed abilities. The results of the assessment show that all children involved in the training activities have very good gross motor skills and are in accordance with the target achievement of their development age with an average gross motor ability. The conclusion of this study is that traditional games can improve gross motor skills in early childhood in kindergarten cycles. The results of this study can be used as a basis for using traditional games as a means of improving children's gross motor skills.

desc: Orang tua memiliki peran penting dalam mencegah kekerasan seksual pada anak (KSA), mereka harus memiliki informasi yang tepat mengenai pencegahan KSA. Tujuan penelitian untuk untuk mengidentifikasi kebutuhan informasi bagi orang tua terkait pencegahan KSA di Indonesia. Desain penelitian scoping review. Pencarian artikel menggunakan database (Cinahl Ebsco, Pubmed, Perpustakaan Nasional), search engine (Google Scholar, Science Direct), dan pencarian manual dengan menggunakan kunci berbahasa Inggris dan Indonesia. Hasil pencarian awal didapatkan 55.154 artikel kemudian screening berdasarkan kriteria inklusi dan dinilai kelayakannya sehingga diperoleh 6 artikel yang eligible. Hasil penelitian ditemukan tiga topik utama kebutuhan informasi bagi orang tua terkait pencegahan KSA, yaitu: sarana dan prasarana untuk pencegahan KSA, penyampaian informasi yang tepat dan sesuai bagi anak, media edukasi mengenai KSA. Dengan demikian ada tiga topik kebutuhan informasi pencegahan KSA yang diperlukan orang tua, sehingga dapat dijadikan evidence base dalam menentunkan intervensi yang tepat dalam meningkatkan informasi pencegahan KSA bagi orang tua.
title: Kebutuhan Informasi Pencegahan Kekerasan Seksual Pada Anak Bagi Orang Tua Di Indonesia : Scoping Review
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Information needs for prevention of sexual violence against children for parents in Indonesia scoping review parents have an important role in preventing sexual violence against children they must have the right information about prevention of sexual violence the purpose of the study to identify information needs for parents related to prevention of sexual violence against children in Indonesia scoping review research design article search using cinahl ebsco pubmed national library search engine google scholar science direct and manual search using English and Indonesian language keys the initial search results obtained articles then screening based on inclusion criteria and assessed their eligibility so that eligible articles were obtained the results of the study found three main topics of information needs for parents related to prevention of sexual violence, namely facilities and infrastructure for prevention of sexual violence, delivery of appropriate and suitable information for children educational media about sexual violence thus there are three topics of information needs for sexual violence prevention that parents need so that they can be used as an evidence base in determining the right intervention in improving information on prevention of sexual violence for parents

desc: Pembelajaran sastra memerlukan media yang bervariasi dan belum banyak digali oleh para guru untuk diperkenalkan kepada anak usia dini. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mengetahui proses dan peningkatan hasil belajar pembelajaran pengenalan sastra yang dilakukan pada TK Ruhama. Metode penelitian menggunakan metode Penelitian Tindakan Kelas (PTK) pada TK Ruhama kota Bekasi Jawa Barat. Data diolah dengan mengikut proses pengumpulan data, pemriksaan data, olah data, dan kesimpulan. Responden sebanyak 24 siswa kelas B. Penelitian melibatkan 2 guru kelas. Teknik pngmbilan data dilakukan dengan wawancara, proses PTK, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa proses pengenalan sastra diberikan dengan pola yang menyenangkan dan terarah dengan adanya perencanaan yang baik, serta adanya peningkatan kemampuan berbahasa dan kemampuan mengenal berbagai ciri budaya sastra diberbagai daerah pada siswa. Para guru disarankan dapat membuat rencana pembelajaran sastra yang sesuai dengan perkembangan emosi dan mental anak.
title: Cerita Rakyat Nusantara sebagai Media Pengenalan Sastra pada Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Indonesian folklore as a medium for introducing literature to early childhood learning of literature requires a variety of media and has not been widely explored by teachers to be introduced to early childhood the purpose of this study was to determine the process and improvement of learning outcomes of learning introduction to literature carried out at TK Ruhama the research method used the classroom action research method PTK at TK Ruhama, Bekasi City, West Java the data was processed by following the data collection process data checking data processing and conclusions respondents as many as class B students the study involved class teachers data collection techniques were carried out by interview PTK process and documentation the results of the study showed that the process of introducing literature was given with a fun and directed pattern with good planning and an increase in language skills and the ability to recognize various characteristics of literary culture in various regions in students teachers are advised to be able to make a literature learning plan that is in accordance with the emotional and mental development of children

desc: Perkembangan revolusi industri 4.0 yang sangat pesat dan tantangan pembelajaran anak usia dini abad 21 menyebabkan perkembangan psikolinguistik anak yang kurang optimal. Penelitian bertujuan mendeskripsikan pengembangan psikolinguistik anak usia dini menggunakan game interaktif berbasis role play game (RPG). Jenis penelitian ini yaitu menggunakan studi kualitatif deskriptif. Lokasi penelitian di Taman Kanak-kanak Fadhillah Amal 3 Kota Padang. Teknik pengumpulan data dengan observasi, wawancara dan dokumentasi. Analisis data menggunakan teknis Milles and Hubberman, dengan tiga langkah: reduksi data, display data dan verifikasi. Temuan penelitian menunjukkan : 1) pada tahap perencanaan, game interaktif berbasis RPG dirancang dengan mengintegrasikan ranah psikolinguistik dengan tema Pembelajaran, karakteristik anak serta lingkungan sosial, 2) pada tahap pelaksanaan, game interaktif berbasis RPG merangsang perilaku pengembangan psikolinguistik anak, 3) pada tahap evaluasi, game interaktif berbasis RPG menumbuhkan minat anak dalam pengembangan psikolinguistik. Berdasarkan hasil penelitian dapat disimpulkan bahwa game interaktif berbasis role play membantu perkembangan psikolinguistik anak seperti mengenal bunyi huruf, arti kata, dan aturan kata atau kalimat.
title: Studi pengembangan Psikolinguistik Anak  dengan Game Interaktif Berbasis Role Playdi Taman Kanak-kanak Fadhillah Amal 3 Kota Padang
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Child psycholinguistic development study with interactive role play-based games at fadhillah amal kindergarten in padang city The rapid development of the industrial revolution and the challenges of early childhood learning in the 20th century have caused suboptimal child psycholinguistic development. The study aims to describe the development of early childhood psycholinguistics using interactive role play-based games RPG games. This type of research uses a descriptive qualitative study. The research location is at fadhillah amal kindergarten in padang city. Data collection techniques include observation, interviews and documentation. Data analysis uses milles and hubberman techniques with three data reduction steps. Data display and verification. Research findings show that at the planning stage, interactive RPG-based games are designed by integrating the psycholinguistic domain with the theme of learning characteristics of children and the social environment. At the implementation stage, interactive RPG-based games stimulate children's psycholinguistic development behavior. At the evaluation stage, interactive RPG-based games foster children's interest in psycholinguistic development. Based on the results of the study, it can be concluded that interactive RPG-based games help children's psycholinguistic development, such as recognizing sounds, letters, meanings of words and rules of words or sentences.

desc: Keluarga menjadi pondasi pertama mengajarkan pendidikan karakter kepada anak usia dini sebagai nilai dasar kemanusiaan diantaranya keberanian berbicara serta mencari tahu hal baru. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah mengetahui stimulasi karakter komunikatif untuk melayani karakter rasa ingin tahu yang diterapkan oleh keluarga kepada anak-anak usia (1-3) tahun. Penelitian ini mengguakan metode deskriptif dengan pendekatan kuantitatif. Populasi dalam penelitian ini adalah keluarga di Tanjung Payang Dusun 1 yang berjumlah 60 keluarga, dan sampel pada penelitian ini berjumlah 30 keluarga dengan mengambil partisipan 30 orang dengan teknik pengambilan sampel menggunakan teknik simple random sampling. Pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan menggunakan angket. Teknik analis data yang digunakan dengan perhitungan presentase. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan stimulasi karakter komunikatif dan karakter rasa ingin tahu pada anak yang diberikan oleh keluarga kepada anak usia dini yaitu terdapat sembilan orang berada pada kategori sangat sering memberikan stimulasi, sebelas orang berada pada kategori sering dalam memberikan stimulasi, dan 10 orang berada pada kategori pernah memberikan stimulasi. Hal tersebut menunjukkan bahwa sebagian besar keluarga sudah berada pada kategori sering dalam memberikan stimulasi karakater komunikasi dan karakter rasa ingin tahu pada anak.
title: Stimulasi Karakter Komunikatif dan Rasa Ingin Tahu Anak Usia (1-3) Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Stimulation of communicative character and curiosity of children aged years old family becomes the first foundation for teaching character education to early childhood as basic human values ​​including the courage to speak and find out new things the purpose of this study is to determine the stimulation of communicative character to serve the character of curiosity applied by families to children aged years old this study uses a descriptive method with a quantitative approach the population in this study is families in tanjung payang hamlet which consists of families and samples in this study consist of families by taking participants people with a sampling technique using a simple random sampling technique data collection is carried out using a questionnaire data analysis technique used with percentage calculations the results of the study show stimulation of communicative character and curiosity character in children given by families to early childhood, namely there are nine people in the category of very often giving stimulation eleven people in the category of often in giving stimulation and people in the category of ever giving stimulation this shows that most families are already in the category of often in providing stimulation of communication character and curiosity character in children

desc: Kemandirian merupakan kondisi dimana seorang individu dapat berdiri sendiri dan tidak bergantung kepada orang lain. Sikap ini perlu ditanamkan kepada semua orang tak terkecuali anak usia dini. Masa ini merupakan masa pondasi anak untuk menerima stimulasi dari luar sebagai bekal menghadapi kesulitan dimasa mendatang. Salah satu upaya yang dapat dilakukan guru untuk membentuk perilaku kemandirian anak sesuai dengan kurikulum merdeka yaitu melalui kegiatan metode proyek. Fakta dilapangan didapat kurangnya kemampuan kemandirian anak didalam kelas ditunjukkan dengan anak belum berani dalam mengungkapkan pendapat maupun melakukan perintah guru pada saat pembelajaran didalam kelas. Tujuan penelitian ini untuk mendeskripsikan pembelajaran metode proyek dapat menjadi salah satu strategi dalam membentuk kemandirian anak usia dini. Penelitian ini dilaksanakan selama 6 bulan melalui pendekatan penelitian deskriptif kualitatif. Teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan data primer dan sekunder dengan analisis Miles, Huberman, dan Saldana. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa metode proyek menjadi strategi yang mudah dilaksanakan bagi guru dalam membentuk kemandirian anak usia dini melalui kegiatan pembelajaran yang kreatif, dan menyenangkan bagi anak didalam kelas.
title: Pembelajaran Metode Proyek Kurikulum Merdeka Sebagai Strategi Pembentukan Kemandirian Anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: learning the independent curriculum project method as a strategy for forming children's independence independence is a condition where an individual can stand alone and not depend on others this attitude needs to be instilled in everyone including early childhood this period is the foundation period for children to receive external stimulation as provisions to face difficulties in the future one of the efforts that teachers can make to form children's independent behavior in accordance with the independent curriculum is through project method activities facts in the field obtained the lack of children's independence in the classroom is indicated by children not daring to express opinions or carry out teacher orders during learning in the classroom the purpose of this study is to describe project method learning can be one strategy in forming the independence of early childhood this study was conducted for months through a qualitative descriptive research approach data collection techniques using primary and secondary data with analysis miles huberman and saldana the results of the study showed that the project method is an easy strategy to implement for teachers in forming the independence of early childhood through creative and fun learning activities for children in the classroom

desc: In growing a child's concentration level, an appropriate method is needed to stimulate more stable focus and concentration. This study aims to examine efforts to increase children's learning concentration by managing sensory-motor play in early childhood, which is carried out at an institution under the auspices of the Nusus Salam Foundation, namely RA Nurus Salam. The research method uses a qualitative case study approach. To get an idea of the Efforts to Increase Children's Learning Concentration Through Sensory Motor Play Management, the researcher went directly to the institution and observed the RA Nurus Salam institution by interviewing the principal and three teachers. The results showed that; The RA Nurus Salam institution uses the management of sensory-motor play to stimulate the increase in children's learning concentration and the involvement of teachers' strategies in the direction of sensory-motor play using; first, lesson planning. Second, implementation of learning design, and third, evaluation. The implication is that children's concentration and focus are more stable when carrying out activities with sensory-motor management.
title: Concentration of Children's Learning in Motor-Sensory Play Management Development Framework
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: concentration of children's learning in motorsensory play management development framework in growing a child's concentration level an appropriate method is needed to stimulate more stable focus and concentration this study aims to examine efforts to increase children's learning concentration by managing sensorymotor play in early childhood which is carried out at an institution under the auspices of the nusus salam foundation namely ra nurus salam the research method uses a qualitative case study approach to get an idea of ​​the efforts to increase childrens learning concentration through sensory motor play management the researcher went directly to the institution and observed the ra nurus greetings institution by interviewing the principal and three teachers the results showed that the ra nurus salam institution uses the management of sensory motor play to stimulate the increase in children's learning concentration and the involvement of teachers strategies in the direction of sensory motor play using first lesson planning second implementation of learning design and third evaluation the implication is that children's concentration and focus are more stable when carrying out activities with sensory motor management

desc: The development of children's creativity has not developed optimally, this can be seen from children's activities in generating new ideas and problem solving that have not been seen. The purpose of this study was to determine the effect of inquiry-based collage activities using colored shells on the development of early childhood creativity. This type of research uses quantitative methods with a quasi-experimental design. The population in this study were all students in Adzkia Air Bangis Kindergarten with a sample of 60 students which included 30 students in B1 and 30 students in B2. Data collection techniques in this study is by observation. The data analysis technique used normality test, homogeneity test and hypothesis testing, namely the independent sample test. Based on the results of this study, it was found that in the normality test the data were normally distributed with a significant value of Kolmogrov-Smirnov in each class, namely  0.05. In the homogeneity test, it was found that the value based on the mean was 0.789  0.05, which means the data is homogeneous. Meanwhile, in hypothesis testing, the value of sig (2 tailed) is 0.001 0.05. Thus, it can be concluded that inquiry-based collage activities using colored shells have an effect on the development of creativity in early childhood
title: Inquiry Based Colage Activities Using Colored Shells on The Development of Creativity of Early Children
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: inquiry based colage activities using colored shells on the development of creativity of early children the development of children's creativity has not developed optimally this can be seen from children's activities in generating new ideas and problem solving that have not been seen the purpose of this study was to determine the effect of inquiry-based collage activities using colored shells on the development of early childhood creativity this type of research uses quantitative methods with a quasi-experimental design the population in this study were all students in adzkia air bangis kindergarten with a sample of students which included students in b and students in b data collection techniques in this study is by observation the data analysis technique used normality test homogeneity test and hypothesis testing namely the independent sample test based on the results of this study it was found that in the normality test the data were normally distributed with a significant value of kolmogrovsmirnov in each class namely in the homogeneity test it was found that the value based on the mean was which means the data is homogeneous whereas in hypothesis testing the value of sig tailed is thus it can be concluded that inquirybased collage activities using colored shells have an effect on the development of creativity in early childhood

desc: Pendidikan literasi saat ini marak diagunkan karena memiliki peran penting bagi masa depan anak. Namun, berbanding terbalik dengan teori, praktik pendidikan literasi di lapangan masih memerlukan perhatian. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendesain dan mengembangkan big book storytelling dwibahasa untuk mendukung perkembangan literasi anak usia dini. Menggunakan bahasa Indonesia dan bahasa Inggris, big book disampaikan dengan teknik mendongeng yang bertujuan untuk mengembangkan kosakata anak dan minat mereka terhadap kedua bahasa tersebut. Penelitian ini menggunakan desain penelitian pengembangan berdasarkan model Reeves (2006) dan melibatkan 74 guru taman kanak-kanak yang ada di Banjarmasin. Data dikumpulkan dengan teknik wawancara dan observasi. Tahapan pengembangan terbagi menjadi empat fase: analisis kebutuhan, pengembangan produk, implementasi, dan refleksi. Validasi ahli menunjukkan bahwa big book yang dikembangkan telah layak dan dapat digunakan untuk anak usia dini baik dari segi psikologis, pembelajaran, kualitas fisik, dan bahasa. Anak-anak juga menikmati belajar dengan menggunakan media ini berdasarkan hasil observasi
title: Pengembangan Big Book Storytelling Dwibahasa untuk Meningkatkan Literasi Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: development of bilingual big book storytelling to improve early childhood literacy literacy education is currently widely used because it has an important role for the future of children but in contrast to the theory of literacy education practices in the field still require attention this study aims to design and develop bilingual big book storytelling to support the development of early childhood literacy using Indonesian and English big books are delivered with storytelling techniques that aim to develop children's vocabulary and their interest in both languages ​​this study uses a development research design based on the Reeves model and involves kindergarten teachers in Banjarmasin data was collected using interview and observation techniques the development stages are divided into four phases analysis of product development needs implementation and reflection expert validation shows that the developed big book is feasible and can be used for early childhood both in terms of psychological learning physical and language quality children also enjoy learning using this media based on observation results

desc: This study aims to determine the implementation of strategies to improve the ability to read and literacy of the Quran for early childhood through the tartiila method at the Early Childhood Tahfidz Education (TAUD) institution. This research uses qualitative descriptive method. The data collection techniques used in this study were interviews, observation and documentation. The research subjects in this study were 2 educators and 10 early childhood children at TAUD Roudhotul Qur'an Cimahi City. The data analysis technique used in this study is triangulation. Based on the results of the study, the implementation of learning strategies to improve literacy in reading the Quran in early childhood with the tartila method was carried out with the talaqy method, then with the approach of the function of letters or letter sounds (Thoriqotushautiyah) by learning to read Arabic letters directly snaring or marching. In addition, the Qur'an learning strategy with the tartila method is carried out with a sorogan system, emphasis on tone and recitation thus the educator brings an active and pleasant learning atmosphere. The use of this tartila method is proven to improve literacy in reading the Qur'an in early childhood. This study recommends that Qur'an teachers at the Early Childhood Tahfiz Institute can use this tartila method to improve Qur'an reading literacy in early childhood.
title: Practical Implementation Strategies of Tartila Method for Improving Early Childhood’s Al Qur’an Reading Literacy
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: practical implementation strategies of tartila method for improving early childhoods al quran reading literacy this study aims to determine the implementation of strategies to improve the ability to read and literacy of the quran for early childhood through the tartiila method at the early childhood tahfidz education taud institution this research uses qualitative descriptive method the data collection techniques used in this study were interviews observation and documentation the research subjects in this study were educators and early childhood children at taud roudhotul quran cimahi city the data analysis technique used in this study was triangulation based on the results of the study the implementation of learning strategies to improve literacy in reading the quran in early childhood with the tartila method was carried out with the talaqy method then with the approach of the function of letters or letter sounds thoriqotushautiyah by learning to read arabic letters directly snaring or marching in addition to the quran learning strategy with the tartila method is carried out with a sorogan system emphasis on tone and recitation so the educator brings an active and pleasant learning atmosphere the use of this tartila method is proven to improve literacy in reading the quran in early childhood this study recommends that quran teachers at the early childhood tahfiz institute can use this tartila method to improve quran reading literacy in early childhood

desc: Guru PAUD di era digitalisasi ini dituntut untuk memiliki kompetensi yang memadai, baik dari segi wawasan maupun penggunaan teknologi digitalnya. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk melihat tingkat kompetensi digital guru PAUD. Pendekatan dan metode dalam penelitian ini adalah deskriptif kualitatif. Pengumpulan data dilakukan melalui observasi dan wawancara pada 10 orang guru PAUD di Kecamatan Babakan Ciparay, Kota Bandung. Dari hasil penelitian ditemukan bahwa tingkat kompetensi digital guru PAUD pada area pembuatan konten dan pengetahuan, evaluasi dan problem solving serta teknis pengoperasian masih rendah. Sedangkan pada area kolaborasi dan etika serta tanggung jawab sudah lebih tinggi. Hal ini disebabkan oleh adanya tuntutan kebutuhan mereka untuk berinteraksi dengan relasi dan menjadi bagian dari komunitas online. Dibutuhkan pelatihan dengan materi wawasan dan penggunaan teknologi digital terutama di dalam mengakses, mengelola informasi, dan menjadikannya sebuah konten dalam pembelajaran di PAUD
title: Analisis Kompetensi Digital Guru PAUD dalam Mengelola Pembelajaran Daring Anak Usia Dini
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Analysis of digital competence of early childhood education teachers in managing online learning for early childhood early childhood education teachers in this digitalization era are required to have adequate competence both in terms of insight and use of digital technology this study aims to see the level of digital competence of early childhood education teachers the approach and method in this study are descriptive qualitative data collection is carried out through observation and interviews with early childhood education teachers in Babakan Ciparay District, Bandung City from the results of the study it was found that the level of digital competence of early childhood education teachers in the area of ​​content creation and knowledge of evaluation and problem solving as well as technical operations is still low while in the area of ​​collaboration and ethics and responsibility it is higher this is due to the demands of their needs to interact with relations and become part of an online community training is needed with insight material and the use of digital technology, especially in accessing, managing information and making it content in early childhood education learning

desc: Aspek fisik motorik kasar menjadi suatu output pada pelayanan dalam lembaga pendidikan PAUD sebagai hal terpenting dalam memperhatikan pengawalan pertumbuhan serta perkembangan peserta didik. Tujuan penelitian ini agar tahu pengaruh dalam menggunakan pembelajaran tari tani terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini memiliki metode eksperimen dengan menggunakan bentuk pretest posttest control group design. Penemuan hasilnya yaitu di kelas eksperimen memperoleh persentase lebih unggul daripada kelas kontrol,  pembelajaran tari secara langsung ini efektif digunakan untuk pembelajaran yang membutuhkan latihan/bimbingan untuk peningkatan motorik kasar yang diajarkan ke anak selangkah demi selangkah . Adanya pengaruh signifikan dalam penggunaan pembelajaran tari tani terhadap kemampuan motorik kasar anak usia 5-6 tahun. Jadi kesimpulannya terdapat hasil rata-rata yang berbeda pada penilaian kemampuan motorik kasar dari kelas yang melakukan pembelajaran tari tani secara langsung dan kelas yang menggunakan pembelajaran tari tani hanya berbantuan media video.
title: Pengaruh Pembelajaran Tari Tani terhadap Kemampuan Motorik Kasar Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: The influence of farmer dance learning on gross motor skills of children aged years The physical aspect of gross motor skills becomes an output in services in early childhood education institutions as the most important thing in paying attention to the supervision of growth and development of students The purpose of this study is to find out the influence of using farmer dance learning on gross motor skills of children aged years This study has an experimental method using the form of pretest posttest control group design The findings of the results are that in the experimental class, the percentage is superior to the control class This direct dance learning is effective for learning that requires guidance exercises to improve gross motor skills that are taught to children step by step There is a significant influence in the use of farmer dance learning on the gross motor skills of children aged years So the conclusion is that there are different average results in the assessment of gross motor skills from classes that carry out direct farmer dance learning and classes that use farmer dance learning only assisted by video media

desc: Usia dini merupakan masa yang paling tepat dalam mengembangkan berbagai potensi yang dimiliki anak sejak lahir. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk memberikan stimulasi terhadap kecerdasan anak terutama pada kecerdasan naturalis anak yang berusia 5-6 tahun. Penelitian ini menggunakan jenis penelitian kualitatif deskriptif. Populasi diambil secara acak atau random sampling. Sedangkan sampel yang diambil adalah anak yang berusia 5-6 tahun saja. Hasil dari penelitian ini menunjukkan bahwa pentingnya mengembangkan kecerdasan naturalis untuk anak usia dini karena masing-masing anak memiliki potensi berbeda. Kecerdasan tidak hanya terletak pada kemampuan otak saja. Namun masih banyak kecerdasan yang harus diberi stimulasi. Kegiatan life science sangat berdampak pada kecerdasan naturalis pada anak. Melalui kegiatan life science ini terlihat anak sangat menikmati dan bersemangat mengikuti proses pembelajaran serta anak menjadi tertarik untuk menjaga lingkungan sekitarnya dengan cara merawat dan membersihkan. Dengan adanya kegiatan life science ini membentuk kecerdasan terutama kecerdasan naturalis anak yang saat ini jarang diberikan stimulasi sejak usia dini. Hal ini sangat berkaitan dengan indikator pada kecerdasan naturalis pada anak usia dini.
title: Stimulasi Kecerdasan Naturalis Anak Usia 5-6 Tahun melalui Kegiatan Life Science
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: stimulation of natural intelligence of children aged years through early life science activities is the most appropriate period in developing various potentials that children have since birth this study aims to provide stimulation of children's intelligence, especially the natural intelligence of children aged years this study uses a descriptive qualitative research type the population was taken randomly or random sampling while the samples taken were children aged years only the results of this study indicate that the importance of developing natural intelligence for early childhood because each child has different potential intelligence does not only lie in brain ability but there are still many intelligences that must be stimulated life science activities have a great impact on natural intelligence in children through these life science activities it can be seen that children really enjoy and are enthusiastic about following the learning process and children become interested in maintaining their surroundings by caring for and cleaning with the existence of these life science activities forming intelligence especially the natural intelligence of children who are currently rarely given stimulation from an early age this is closely related to indicators of natural intelligence in early childhood

desc: Setiap orang tua senantiasa menginginkan kebahagiaan untuk anaknya termasuk seorang ibu tunggal yang membesarkan anak sendirian, dapat pastikan ingin memberikan kebahagiaan bagi anaknya. Penelitian ini dilakukan dengan tujuan untuk mendeskripsikan dan menganalisis lebih mendalam orientasi happiness atau kebahagiaan pada ibu dengan status single mother atau ibu tunggal. Subjek penelitian adalah seorang ibu tunggal yang cerai mati dengan suaminya. Metode penelitian yang digunakan adalah penelitian kualitatif dengan studi kasus. Adapun pengumpulan data yang dilakukan dalam penelitian ini adalah dengan cara dokumentasi, wawancara dan observasi. Sedangkan teknik analisis data yang digunakan adalah melalui pengumpulan data, reduksi data, display atau penyajian data dan verifikasi data untuk penarikan kesimpulan. Hasil penelitian ini adalah seorang ibu telah berupaya bangkit dan tangguh dalam menjalankan kehidupannya demi merawat dan mendidik anak dengan orientasi hidup yang menyenangkan, melibatkan diri dalam aktifitas sosial di masyarakat dan memiliki makna hidup
title: Orientasi Happiness pada Single Mother dalam merawat dan mendidik anak
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Happiness orientation in single mothers in caring for and educating children Every parent always wants happiness for their child including a single mother who raises a child alone can be sure to want to give happiness to her child This study was conducted with the aim of describing and analyzing in more depth the happiness orientation or happiness in mothers with single mother status or single mothers The subject of the study was a single mother who was divorced by her husband The research method used was qualitative research with a case study The data collection carried out in this study was by means of documentation Interviews and observations While the data analysis technique used was through data collection Data reduction Display or presentation of data and data verification for drawing conclusions The results of this study are that a mother has tried to rise and be strong in living her life in order to care for and educate children with a pleasant life orientation, involve herself in social activities in the community and have a meaning in life

desc: Upaya peningkatan mutu pendidikan harus dilaksanakan dalam berbagai aspek seperti perencanaan, pelaksanaan dan evaluasi. Salah satu konsep evaluasi yang ditawarkan adalah Asesmen Kompetensi Minimal atau AKM. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk mendeskripsikan Konsep Pra AKM di PAUD meliputi pra literasi membaca dan pra literasi numerasi, dengan menggunakan indikator asesmen pada anak usia dini. Penelitian ini menggunakan metode kualitatif dengan pendekatan library research. Data penelitian berupa informasi dari buku-buku referensi baik hardcopy maupun softcopy yang bisa dipertangungjawabkan. Teknik analisa data menggunakan analisis isi. Hasis analisis data menunjukkan bahwa bentuk-bentuk pra AKM merupakan asesmen yang diberikan kepada anak usia dini dengan prinsip tetap bermain dan menyenangkan, sehingga anak tidak merasa dilakukan evaluasi. Dengan konsep-konsep kasus realitas akan memberikan pemahaman kepada peserta didik.
title: Pra Asesmen Kompetensi Minimal (AKM) pada Pendidikan Anak Usia Dini (PAUD)
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: Pre-assessment of minimum competency of AKM in early childhood education PAUD efforts to improve the quality of education must be implemented in various aspects such as planning, implementation and evaluation. One of the evaluation concepts offered is the minimum competency assessment or AKM. This study aims to describe the concept of pre-AKM in PAUD including pre-literacy reading and pre-literacy numeracy using assessment indicators in early childhood. This study uses a qualitative method with a library research approach. Research data in the form of information from reference books, both hardcopy and softcopy, which can be accounted for. Data analysis techniques use content analysis. The results of the data analysis show that the forms of pre-AKM are assessments given to early childhood with the principle of continuing to play and have fun so that children do not feel that they are being evaluated. The concepts of reality cases will provide understanding to students.

desc: Penelitian ini mengkaji tentang analisis keterampilan literasi informasi yang dimiliki para pendidik di Kabupaten Lampung Timur dalam penyusunan bahan ajar mitigasi bencana untuk meningkatan disaster self-awareness anak usia 5-6 tahun agar menjadi generasi muda yang tangguh bencana. Penelitian ini menggunakan pendekatan kualititatif dan metode studi kasus, dengan teknik analisis kualitatif deskriptif. Sebanyak 5 orang pendidik PAUD di Kecamatan Labuhan Ratu Kabupaten Lampung Timur menjadi informan dalam penelitian ini. Seluruh proses pengumpulan data secara daring dan luring, dengan mematuhi protokol kesehatan covid-19. Melalui penelitian ini diharapkan akan tercapai tujuan khusus berikut ini, yaitu: (1) Memetakan tingkat keterampilan literasi informasi pendidik dalam penyusunan bahan ajar mitigasi bencana yang dapat meningkatkan disaster self-awareness anak usia dini; dan, (2) Menganalisis kebutuhan pendidik dalam menyusun rancangan pembelajaran mitigasi bencana yang dapat meningkatkan disaster self-awareness anak usia dini.
title: Pembelajaran Mitigasi Bencana Berbasis Literasi Informasi untuk Meningkatkan Disaster Self Awareness AUD
journal: JURNAL OBSESI: JURNAL PENDIDIKAN ANAK USIA DINI
data_cleaned: disaster mitigation learning based on information literacy to increase disaster self awareness aud this study examines the analysis of information literacy skills possessed by educators in East Lampung Regency in compiling disaster mitigation teaching materials to increase disaster self awareness of children aged years to become a resilient young generation disaster this study uses a qualitative approach and case study method with descriptive qualitative analysis techniques as many as 1,000 early childhood education educators in Labuhan Ratu District, East Lampung Regency became informants in this study the entire data collection process online and offline by complying with the Covid health protocol through this study it is hoped that the following specific objectives will be achieved, namely mapping the level of information literacy skills of educators in compiling disaster mitigation teaching materials that can increase disaster self awareness of early childhood children and analyzing the needs of educators in compiling disaster mitigation learning designs that can increase disaster self awareness of early childhood children
